name: Running Lab
location: F1.89B (First Floor, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Running Lab at Sunway Pyramid is a fantastic sportswear store! They offer a great selection of sports shoes, caps, sandals, water bottles, and socks. The store is well-organized, and the staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Whether you're into running or just need casual sportswear, this place has plenty of high-quality options. Definitely worth a visit! | review_rating:5, text:I visited Running Lab at Sunway Pyramid today, and the store absolutely deserves my 5 star review! I had the pleasure of being assisted by En. Ahmad Ridzwan, who provided exceptional service. As a runner himself, he understood my needs perfectly and recommended running shoes that suited me the best. What impressed me the most was his suggestion to try the shoes on a treadmill to ensure the right fit - a thoughtful touch that truly sets this store apart. En. Ahmad's deep knowledge of the products and his friendly, encouraging attitude made the experience unforgettable.

When the size we wanted was out of stock, En. Ahmad went above and beyond to source it from other branches for us. His dedication and willingness to help were truly outstanding.

I've been to several Running Lab branches before, but I've never encountered someone as dedicated and knowledgeable as En. Ahmad. I am so glad I decided to visit this branch today! Both my sister and I ended up making purchases, and we left feeling completely satisfied.

Thank you Running Lab Sunway Pyramid, and especially En. Ahmad Ridzwan, for such a fanstatic experience. Highly recommended for anyone looking for expert advice and top-notch service! | review_rating:5, text:I had a great experience visiting the store for the first time. As I’ve told the shop assistant that I am currently surveying a particular brand at the moment and will not be buying anytime soon however they were still so kind to assist me along sharing their in-depth knowledge of all the shoes selection. Thanks again Wan and Imran for your kind assistance, I’ll definitely pop-in when the needs arise! | review_rating:5, text:Came to look for Hoka Slides but not available, got recommended by staff to get Oofos slides instead. Quite comfortable for my feet which suffers Plantar Faciistis. Great customer service by Emran | review_rating:5, text:Customer Service bagus, Seller Imran terbaik.

name: BEBEK GORENG PAK NDUT
location: LG2.49, Lower Ground Two, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:2 days ago while shopping in Sunway Pyramid with my family, we were rather hungry at 6 pm. It was already dinner time for us all. We didn’t want any Chinese nor Western food . So we walked around the restaurants here to pick n choose what best to eat. So my niece who is rather adventurous , wanted to try some Indonesian food. We also happened to pass by this restaurant called Bebek Goreng Pak Ndut that serves duck n chicken cuisine Indonesian style. So we took a table n ordered our dinner. We ordered 2 pax of grilled duck n original duck plus another 2 pax of crispy fried chicken n grilled chicken. The food, to our surprise, was good . The prices were also reasonable. There were some Malay as well as some Chinese customers too. After our dinner when we left , we saw their special promotions during weekdays from 2.30pm - 5.30 pm. | review_rating:4, text:The duck is crispy outside and soft and fluffy inside thus making it very delectable. The grilled duck is the best IMO.

There is an assortment of condiments that are available and it's unlimited. A delight especially for spice lovers. | review_rating:3, text:Plenty of seats to choose. Ordered the fried duck. Nothing to shout about. It's too dry for my liking. At least the sambal provides a good cover. The cracker also not all is crunchy.

So, overall it's just mid. | review_rating:4, text:Food (Bebek Goreng/Bakar) - it is good as expected and definitely value for money. Perhaps just change the raw cabbage with some other veggies that can be eaten raw by most people.

Food (Beef soto betawi) - This was my original order but I asked to cancel because the beef was tough (tougher than your bully brother lol). Like real tough, plus the ligaments of the meat is everywhere. 😂 I asked to change to bebek goreng.

Service - This is Awesome! Overall the crew was kind and nice. One of the crew even ask me to do this review, which I don’t want to. Haha but he insisted so that they can continue to improve! That is bold! | review_rating:4, text:The duck was really good, especially with their red sambal. The gado gado was interesting as it had tomatoes and potatoes. The peanut sauce was also too watery.

location: OB.K8, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The service here is really good, and the food is equally delicious as well. Definitely one of the best branch! You should try their Wantan mee, the texture is a bit chewy, which makes it nice. The Mala soup is also a great choice, especially if you love spicy stuff. | review_rating:4, text:Portion of food consider satisfied, value for the money. We order Mala Spicy noodle and wine soup noodle. Mala spicy included pork chop and two wantan. Tasted delicious and worth it. Surrounding comfortable and this restaurant located edge of the mall. | review_rating:5, text:Visit date: 11/1/2025

Good selection of noodles. Spacious dining area with indoor and outdoor options.

Classic pork noodles (RM17.90 nett) is pretty good in taste and portion.

Service is prompt and friendly | review_rating:5, text:Ordered Tomato Soup Pork Belly Noodle 🍅
Taste good! They also provided disposable apron here so that your clothes still stay clean after eating 🫶🏻 | review_rating:5, text:The curry noodle is yummy. The environment here is comfortable. I like it. Will try other food for next visit 😊

name: Don Don Donki
category: asian_grocery_store, grocery_store, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1.39B, Ice Skating Rink, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Order Saba Don, you will have 10% discount when grab the Don after 6pm.

It’s delicious, just a little salty. There’s microwave for you to reheat your food and place to dine.

Got the Saba Don for RM12.80 (after discount). | review_rating:4, text:Lots of food and snacks and flavours available, especially Japan ones that is hard to find locally. Pretty good place to shop if you like cooking too as they sell a lot of meat and coming ingredients. If you want to dine in there's a seating area complete with a microwave to heat your food up. The convenience section Jumbo Chicken that I got tastes a bit old, maybe the food turnover rate for takeaway food is not high enough in this branch. | review_rating:5, text:Lots of assorted food and drinks over here mostly imported from japan. Sushi, beef, takoyaki, green tea, beer, ramen, jap cooking ingredients and so many more | review_rating:4, text:there were a lot of snacks n items like a Japanese one.
clean shop and kind staff | review_rating:5, text:Crowded with many Japanese products, the self-service checkout system is convenient and user friendly. There is a seating area where you can sit and eat or charge your device.

name: ABC One Cafeteria
location: LG2A 03B LOWER GROUND TWO A, SUNWAY PYRAMID, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:It's a good establishment if you're looking for cheap food in sunway pyramid. It's a lil bit hidden but it's right next to a lift. Do note that this place is self-serve so it's not your usual mamak where the waiter will come to serve you. Since the staff's number are a lil bit limited, it might take a while if you're ordering food that need some cooking (mi goreng mamak etc.) If you're looking for something filling (and you want it fast), I would recommend you to order their nasi campur. The payment method here are by card, duitnow qr (you have to scan their duitnow qr) and also cash. The location has some echo to it, so you might have to speak louder when ordering your food/chatting with you companions.  Overall, I had a good experience dining here, though I wish the staff had called me promptly when my tapau-ed food was ready. Despite this, the quality, price, and convenience make it worthy of a four-star rating. | review_rating:1, text:Price is totally out so expensive some more staff making fool us we eat 3 person rice nasi goreng ayam kam thn nasi campur ikan kari … but thm put extra one nasi goreng biasa after we said u put extra charges pls change bill thn agine same price said tex need to pay for tex also cut rm 3 alrdy. After thm said now u have to pay bcz bill out alrdy omg very bad service fst time i see like that thts our last no more visit this restaurant | review_rating:1, text:The food is nice not bad, price also cheapt. The only thing the service is not good , especially attitude of the staff ( Bangladesh) not good. How they serve , how they speak to customer is very bad. The Bangladesh staff the fat guy using uniform red t-shirt no is manners. He was call me using his language, he was call me " nani" or grandma..
Yes am 42. am old but am not grandmom. Its not 1 time but many time he call me like that. If he small kids am agree he call me that. But he is old guy ( 30+) suppose he call me kakak. This considering insult and not respect.am customer.
If person's attitude good, its mean everything on him
is good. But he has bad attitude , it's mean all on him is bad. | review_rating:1, text:food is good but for the staff i give 0 star especially the guy with “kopiah” one (cashier)..so rude so slow and no manner at all..the way he look at the customer like he very hate his job..hate this kind of people | review_rating:1, text:Can u please change the cashier? The guy with beard and spectacle…he so slow..he know customer stand in front of him but he like “ i dont care at all” other staff give a good service but not him..he make other customer waiting so long

name: Nars
location: G1.128, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I came in to try some foundations, blush and lipsticks, and the salesperson Troy was SUPER FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL. All the products that he introduced me were all so suitable and really helped me in deciding what to buy!

Too bad Lazada is doing sales and that's the reason I went to physical store. So i ended up buying online. T-----T (Sorry Troy, sincere thanks for helping!)

NARS pleaaaase come up with ideas where both the customers and salespersons can walk away happily. Your salespersons should be rewarded if their service encourage customers to buy Nars products online! | review_rating:1, text:HONEST REVIEW : I went here in 30th august 2024, the stuff is not friendly at all, and lack of knowledge.
1. I just want to come inside but she already serve me and my friends with RBF.
2. I ask for NARS BA lipstick shade which is the one the hoshi and scoups used. But she dont even know their OWN ambassador !
3. As a high brand, i think this is really bad service. | review_rating:5, text:I have been wanting a prefect match foundation for my skin. I was hoping to get my shade today at Nars, the sales person Adelaine ( I apologize if the spelling is wrong ) really helped me out to find my perfect shade and on top of that she also assisted with the blush and bronzer I wanted to try. I’m new to makeup, she was very helpful throughout my choosing process. She did not push in selling anything more than I need. | review_rating:5, text:Mr Elbert, the Nars stores salesperson was highly professional and choosed the best matching product for my face. He was very friendly and knowledgeble. I purchased almost all the products he recommended, but at the same time he did’nt forced to sell anyting more than i needed. | review_rating:5, text:For me, the salesgirl was well educated on the products. She knew what was ‘grey’ ‘ashy’ ‘red/olive/honey/yellow’ undertones. She picked a good match for my skin tone. Been there twice, and bought great products to match my skin tone and undertone.

name: Harvestz Fashion
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: 108 Matcha Saro
location: G1.122C, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Nee matcha specialty shop at Sunway Pyramid Blue Atrium.

Seating is very spacious and comfortable. Deco is clean and simple with a hint of Japanese design tone.

Prices are around RM17 for an iced matcha latte and RM16 for soft served ice cream. Not cheap but won't break your bank.

Good place for a quick stop without having to queue up or fight for seats. | review_rating:4, text:Signature 108 Matcha Love Parfait are perfect, rich with matcha taste with chocolate drip. Soft serve are perfect too. Although the biscuit are tasteless. Overall their deserts are good but slightly over price | review_rating:3, text:The design of the cafe and the menu looks very promising but honestly the matcha drinks and desserts here are not as nice as it looks. The matcha latte tastes so bland, the matcha drink with ice cream has too much ice cube in it, the doriyaki tastes so so. It's overprice, in my opinion | review_rating:1, text:On weekend you can’t find a proper seating with helpless waiter or waitress just staring at you even though there are seats but selfish selfish young customers outlive others by blindly occupying seats with their shopping bags or items , even with a family the parents does the same how despicable! What makes matter worst was the level of service, a family of 4/5 hogging one big table and they just order one drink. Can’t they be moved away ? Where is the dining policy during peak hour then or u der standing, if ur restaurant or cafe is full out a sign out saying it full not making us the paying customer to rush the chairs to seat our elders and what’s even more disgusting was having to face these young kids and parents who are guilty of deaf and table hogging. It was alright dessert wise. Nothing to shout about paying so much premium prices for it all. | review_rating:1, text:Overprice for an unknown grade matcha, RM18.90 for a cup of hot matcha latte. Even though they claimed it's directly source from Uji, Kyoto, but which grade? Lowest grade or?

Taste milky and the too much matcha powder at the bottom, the brewer didn't whisk the matcha powder properly. Not recommended.

name: Jardin Coffee & Tea
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: G1.96A&1, 96B, Ground Floor, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Came for lunch at the spur of the moment. It is quite busy.

Spicy smoked duck oglio is pretty good. Duck is tender. It's not too spicy.

One can have add on of cake and coffee at a minimal cost. In fact add on of americano is free!

Americano is quite strong and to my liking. Oreo cheesecake is satisfactory.

Friendly staff. | review_rating:3, text:Jardin Coffee & Tea at Sunway Pyramid offers a simple and relaxing ambiance, making it a nice spot to unwind. The café serves a great selection of cold coffees and snacks, perfect for a quick refreshment. The overall atmosphere is calm, ideal for those seeking a quiet break from shopping. However, the service could use some improvement in terms of speed. Despite this, the staff is friendly and welcoming. It's a pleasant place to stop by when you're in the mood for a chilled coffee or a light bite. | review_rating:1, text:Ordered two cakes, Dark Choc Orange Mouse and Blueberry cheesecake, look nice but dry like very dry. Better go Coffee Bean or Starbucks 🥲 | review_rating:5, text:I had the mushroom onion sandwich and honestly did not expect it to taste so good. The portion is big and shareable between 2 people. Prices for food is generally OK for the quantity and quality.
I got my iced latte for free with my Sunway Super App birthday rewards.
Staff attitude can be improved. The male cashier looked like he was fooling around while taking orders.
There's limited seating and can get quite full when there's a convention going on in the mall. | review_rating:5, text:My first time coming here with my partner. I can say the foods are very well-cooked, my carbonara and my bf's aglio olio tasted so good! The price suits the quality and taste of the foods. The service from staffs is nice and welcoming. Besides, they didn't made us wait for the foods long, it was prepared fast. The cake is also bon appetite! Will come again here

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
category: cafe, breakfast_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Ground Floor, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:One of the slowest coffee bean cafe. Queue is super lengthy despite have 6 workers. I had terrible experience ordering for Spanish latte. I request without sugar but they remove the vanila powder . Not only that, the cashier was hesitate to accept card payment. I insist since i left my wallet at home. I heard an indonesian girl feels upset as she do not have cash at that time and want to use card payment. Usual order usually takes 30 mins for a cup of coffee. The queue was the most painful part | review_rating:4, text:The atmosphere is good for a quick break or catching up with friends. The service was fast and efficient. Had their cold brew and  bagels, coffee was good and bagels were absolutely delicious. Definitely a spot I'd recommend for anyone looking to relax and enjoy a good snack or coffee. | review_rating:1, text:My experience with Coffee Bean usually good But this one at Sunway Pyramid is worst.  When ordering, this cashier shown a sour face.  Don't answer question. And show me an impatient attitude in ordering.  It's Saturday 14 sept. As usual a busy weekend. But I felt the customer does not deserve a sour face.  The cashier can smile or laugh with the staff/ colleagues but not to the customer is something very wrong.
If you the management of coffee bean, pls do something. Improve staff competency and attitude. You are in the F&B industry.
I believe you can find your staff at the receipt attached. | review_rating:5, text:A very convenient joint located at G floor of Sunway Pyramid. You can enjoy your coffee and meal while watching people skate. Or it is a perfect place to have a sip or two while waiting your loved ones do their shopping .

This is not my first time here. Been here many times for their nice food, good coffee, good vibes, and yes.... clean toilet is nearby. What a good  setup.

Great service too. I think it is an enjoyable place to meet up with friends or to complete simple paper work, as I always see people with their laptops.

Starting your day with a perfect blend of good coffee and being surrounded with many people from all walks of life....is always amazing. | review_rating:2, text:First CBTL outlet that refuses to give me a straw for iced drink. Staff said straws are reserved for “ice blended” beverages only. Is this policy only applicable to this outlet? Coz other outlets just give me one straw for each cold beverage without any problems.

name: Sulwhasoo
location: G1, 62 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Im giving 5 star to Pyramid Sulwhasoo outlet and the staff Ms.Rubee for being so attentive and giving me full concentration when i ask loads of questions during my very 1 st visit. It was back in 2020 and till now im still using Sulwhasoo.  Its the best for my skin. Within the 1st 30 days i can see changes qnd improvement in my skin texture.  After 6 months i have loads of compliments from friends and family. The staff Ms. Rubee has always been very helpful and always keep me updated and also monitors my skin from time to time. I am very grateful she updateds me on new regime and products acording to my skin current condition . I would say she was my 1st best beauty advisor who cares for customers needs. | review_rating:5, text:Great salesperson in-store who took her time to explain and let us try the products (and was not pushy). I bought the Ginseng range, which is wonderful! | review_rating:5, text:Great service here . | review_rating:5, text:Helpful staff at this outlet ..recommend suitable skincare for my skin. | review_rating:5, text:I like sulwhasoo skincare

name: MULTICS COMPUTER ACCESSORIES & SERVICE
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Ramen Matsuri
category: ramen_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, restaurant, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Lot LG2.87, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:One of the most satisfying ramen I ever had. Tried the spicy & black garlic ones..., Both were equally delicious. Worth repeating if the soupy craving hit me again.

Also tried the fried dumplings. It was edible.. not too bad but I wished they fried it properly. So it's nice and crispy

Service was nothing to write about. It's neither good nor bad. Unmemorable actually.

Food was served in reasonable time, considering I was in my  hangry mode. | review_rating:4, text:I recently visited Ramen Matsuri and ordered the Black Garlic Special Ramen. The dish was superb—packed with rich, bold flavors, and the ramen itself had that perfect stringy texture I love. The broth was delicious and well-balanced, making every bite enjoyable.

However, I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because I noticed the staff brought out the rubbish bin through the front door in front of customers, which wasn’t ideal. Apart from that, everything else was fantastic! Definitely worth a visit for the ramen alone.

Feel free to tweak it as you like! | review_rating:5, text:I have always love simple ramen and in my opinion, Matsuri Ramen have the best Toripaitan Ramen. The food are served hot and fast, services are good too! | review_rating:5, text:One of my favourite places to get simple ramen. I usually get the Torikoku Original, which is a ramen dish with lightweight but flavourful chicken broth. They're always super generous on the chicken - they're so thick and big, and I'd struggle to finish everything unless I'm absolutely starving.

I also love the black fungus topping - it adds a nice crunch, and they give plenty of chopped green things (don't know what it is but it adds nice flavour).

I love the noodles they use too. They're nice and thin, and never undercooked or overcooked. They always taste on point. The chicken broth tastes best hot (always served hot anyway) and is great for rainy days.

I'm surprised it's almost always empty when I come here haha. I think the price charged for the quality of food is very reasonable. I hope more people will come here more often because I don't want one of my favourite ramen places to close down...I haven't found any other place that serves ramen like this 🙏🙏🙏

The ventilation can improve a bit more though. Last last ime I went it was so very stuffy. It's been improving though. | review_rating:2, text:The Ramen Matsuri restaurant offers an underwhelming experience with its Red Spicy ramen lacking in umami richness and depth of flavor. While the spiciness is detectable, it fails to compensate for the overall lack of taste. Additionally, the green tea leaves much to be desired, as it tastes stale, raising concerns about its freshness. Overall, the dining experience falls short of expectations, failing to deliver on both taste and quality.

location: Sunway Pyramid, LG2.146A, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Bata @ Sunway Pyramid

We visited Bata at Sunway Pyramid to look for shoes for our daughter. The store offers a wide variety of shoe designs, making it easy to explore different styles. The shop was neat, organised, and provided a comfortable shopping experience. Although we didn’t find a pair that suited our daughter’s taste & size, it was still enjoyable browsing through the selections. | review_rating:5, text:They offer a variety of design for shoes and sandals and quite fashionable. The price is very reasonable and now they are having raya promotion and it is quite worth to buy. The shop looks neat and very comfortable to shop. Staff are also very friendly and helpful. | review_rating:4, text:With over 100 years of history in the shoe business, Bata must have done something right to be around this long. I recall even during our schooldays this was the brand to go for. Even to date, their pricing remains very reasonable with offers of discounts. The merchandise mix comprise of diverse collections as there are fashionable, trendy and up-to- date designs for every season. Really feeling nostalgic again! | review_rating:5, text:Mia, the employee at bata sunway pyramid, provides very good service. The size I wanted was out of stock, she helped me place an order from the warehouse and delivered to my house. She kept following up on the delivery progress and arrived safely. Thanks to her manager for helping me correct the address. | review_rating:5, text:The staff were super helpful and friendly at this outlet! Had initially bought a pair and found that it couldn't fit my child so went back to exchange another pair. This time I brought kiddo along and found that even the reserved pair could not fit as well. 😅 So had to try on a few other pairs and finally settled on one. Thank you so much to the staff for being so accommodating 😊

name: Hana Dining + Sake Bar
category: restaurant, sushi_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, bar, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: OB2.G.U1, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I frequent the Hana Dining restaurant in IPC quite a bit, so I was looking forward to trying this branch out. The food is about the same, so that's good. The service is also not bad. In those regards, they're the quite similar. The ambience and atmosphere, however, is much better here. There is a lot more space, and it's got a more chilled vibe in comparison. The menu is also extensive, so there's something for everyone. I would say it's a good place to visit for a nice dinner after shopping and/or a movie, especially if you love Japanese food. Recommended! | review_rating:3, text:Decent japanese restaurant at Sunway Pyramid.

Service is pretty friendly. Seating is both ample and spacious.

Interior deco at the entrance has a Japanese feel.

The food however is mediocre is both taste and quality compared to the price you pay. Not bad but not great either.

The sake quality is also mediocre, At a range of RM150++, again you get what you pay for.

Overall, an acceptable place for a Japanese meal but nothing awesome. | review_rating:5, text:Food was decent and also fresh during my dining. Staff was pretty friendly from start till end of the service experience.

The soothing atmosphere along with the music being played just makes the experience more delightful.

Great work | review_rating:2, text:Those foods were not very surprised and the price was worth for nothing. Everything wasn’t served hot enough and those sashimi weren’t fresh also… taste sour of tuna and the prawn was too fishy… Maybe i’d over expected to this restaurant before visited … | review_rating:1, text:Skip this place! There were worms in the drinks, and the food and service are absolutely terrible. The staff have terrible attitudes—ask them a question, and they won’t even bother responding. The few dishes I ordered that were supposed to be hot came out ice-cold, and they didn’t even provide a spoon. To make matters worse, they only served the green tea after everything else. And that guy in the picture? His disrespectful glare and complete lack of customer service are infuriating. Worst of all, they let worms fly or crawl all over their teapot before serving it to customers. Avoid this place at all costs!!!

review_rating:5, text:This place provides the best explanations and persons that i ever meet before. The services are satisfied and i am very happy and grateful. Asked the male Chinese staff in a blazer at the counter about their styling session and he said you have to book in advance although none of the staff were attending to any customers. We asked for more information on how to book on the website and he wasn't very helpful. Called up multiple locations all of which were unavailable but said Sunway Pyramid has availability today. I called them up again and the same staff said there was availability but when I mentioned I was there just now he said there was only availability tomorrow. Seems like there is no proper standard to customer service as staff aren't trained well. Staff are making up when they're available even though other stores have their availability on their systems. please stop lying to customers, will purchase from Shark instead. | review_rating:5, text:My purchase was assisted by a wonderful sales advisor, Yaya. She was very sweet and concise with helping me understand the product better and gave useful advices on the warranty. | review_rating:1, text:The review for this shop does not even deserve any stars. Recently I dropped by Dyson service center due to the device having a technical issue. The CS informed my device record was not found in their system. On that day itself I just found that the sales person Foizah Diris did not register my device into the dyson system. Question, why did my purchase device receipt and extended warranty went missing in the system? This is a very big surprise because I need to find the physical receipts and go thru all the checking process which it should be done from your end.

location: Lot LG1.112, Level LG1, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The setting is more spacious compared to the previous outlet. The dishes we had are delicious and nourishing, with highlights including their signature herbal soups. The portions are suited for only 2-3 people and may feel slightly pricey.

Anyway the flavours and quality make it worth a visit. | review_rating:4, text:The four-star rating was for the double-boiled wild mushroom nourishing soup. While the portion size was small and the price was high, the taste was good.  However, the braised chicken feet with abalone sauce was average. | review_rating:5, text:Very cosy environment with healthy Chinese herbal cuisine.  Customer service is good.  We also brought their products and make herbal soups at home too.  Highly recommended for dining or buying their products | review_rating:5, text:First visit to Souper Tang @ Sunway Pyramid. It’s clean and spacious. Very attentive, observant and helpful stuff. The food is delicious especially this hot stone rice bowl. Highly recommended and will come back for next visit. | review_rating:3, text:I went to this branch a couple of times but seem like the staffs are not attentive whether they are busy or not.

The soup is not 炖 but a concentrated version. With that I think the price is a bit steep. The bird nest is a tad expensive with the amount of bird nest that mixed with white fungus to confuse non-regular consumers of bird nest. The fried egg truffle is definitely over priced with minimum truffle taste. (Went on 20th Dec 2024).

I visited another time on 3rd Jan 2025 and went back to have the herbal chicken which has lower chance to go wrong.

Somehow I feel that the general food portion can be improved since most dishes are priced higher than average.

name: Sunway Lagoon
category: wildlife_park, tourist_attraction, zoo, water_park, amusement_park, amusement_center, park, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/11, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a really great time with the whole family. The wife was happy to watch some of our stuff near the small wave pool while the kids and I hit the rides. It was a great time for us to go as there were not very big crowds meaning it did not take very long to get on the rides other than climbing all the steps to get up to them. Highly recommended for all the family from young kids to young adults. The big wave pool with 5m high waves every 1 minute from 4.30pm was a highlight too. Make sure you get to the front. | review_rating:5, text:Each park was truly fun. There are a lot of activities for you to do despite age. There are many water activities. So, it's wise you wear your swimwear and roam around. There are lockers in every park as I remember and you can rent a locker to keep your belongings safe. I went on  weekend so there were too many people and had to wait in lines for a considerable amount of time. But enter the place when it opens and you can enjoy every activity. Overall really fun day! Recommended! | review_rating:4, text:A family fun water park having a big wave pool, water rides and an area train to reach various fun areas of this big park. Apart from the water park, Sunway Lagoon has various other attraction parks like a small zoo, Scream room a 5 D theatre and many other attractions. You get an entrance band to go to all activities. Once you reach the park you need to go down with multiple level escalator. There are many changing areas separate for both men and women with showers and different size lookers to store your belongings and clothes. Overall it was a family fun for the whole day. | review_rating:5, text:My wife and I recently booked the villa package for 2 days and 1 night at around RM1.6K, and we had an amazing experience! A big thank you to Sunway for allowing us to check in early at 11 AM instead of the usual 2 PM. This thoughtful gesture made our trip so much smoother, as we could head straight to the theme park without worrying about our belongings.

The villa itself was spacious, beautifully designed, and incredibly comfortable—perfect for a relaxing retreat. A special shoutout to Shahmin and his team for their outstanding hospitality; they were friendly, helpful, and truly enhanced our stay. While the food was decent, it could be improved to match the overall high standards of the experience.

Overall, we would rate our stay 8.5/10 and would definitely consider returning. Thank you, Sunway, for a wonderful time! | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing Experience – Not Worth the Money

I genuinely cannot understand why this place gets 5-star ratings. The ride attendants are rude and unhelpful, and customer service is clueless—even the so-called “customer specialists” don’t know how to handle guests. The park itself is old, decaying, and poorly maintained. The shacks and huts are a complete waste of time, and the wave pool only operates for 45 minutes at the very end of the day. The whole place smells bad and feels like it’s falling apart.

For a family of five, we spent $700 AUD—absolutely not worth it. There are so many better places in Malaysia to visit for a fraction of the cost. Even with a quick pass, there was no need to wait for rides, which only made the purchase feel like a scam. The photos online are misleading, so don’t fall for the marketing.

This was our experience in January/February 2025. Save your money and your time—there are far better options out there.

name: Asus Concept Store
location: F1.AV.126-127, 129 & 130, Asian Avenue, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Yesterday, I had the pleasure of purchasing the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED, and the experience was nothing short of excellent. The seller was communicative and professional from start to finish, making the entire process smooth and enjoyable.

Before finalizing the purchase, I had a discussion with him regarding the laptop, its specifications, and additional items. He was knowledgeable, patient, and happy to address my questions. As part of the deal, I also received a laptop bag and a complimentary pen drive, which added great value to the purchase.

What stood out most was his approach—he wasn’t pushy or overly eager to close the deal. Instead, he gave me ample space and time to make an informed decision, which I truly appreciated. His cool and professional demeanor made it easy to trust his recommendations and services.

The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED itself is a fantastic device—sleek, powerful, and visually stunning with its OLED display. Coupled with the seller's outstanding service, it was a purchase I’m very satisfied with.

For anyone looking for a stress-free buying experience, I highly recommend this seller. It's rare to find someone who combines professionalism with a personal touch so effortlessly! | review_rating:5, text:Needed a basic laptop for my daughter's work. Bought a Asus E1404F, 8GB Ram, 512gb SSD from this store, the salesperson is very helpful and experienced. Good model for students. | review_rating:5, text:I just brought asus vivobook go E1504F ( R3-7320U, 8 gb ram, 512gb ssd 15.6 fhd amd radeon graphic, sliver w11h, H&S)
,no bad for student on study | review_rating:5, text:I recently Purchased an Asus Vivobook 16 as a replacement for my old Asus x570 which is 6 years old. The new Vivobook is thin, light, has larger 16 inch clear screen and came with 16GB RAM which makes browsing very fast. The AMD R5 7530U also uses very low power consumption. It came with free bag and also had Raya discount which is an added plus point. | review_rating:5, text:Like Vivobook series for they are light weighted laptop with attractive features and specifications. I selected Vivobook 16 for bigger display screen and latest processor yet affordable.

review_rating:1, text:We had a disappointing experience at the Sunway Pyramid branch on September 1, 2024, around 4:30 pm. The male staff member who assisted us was extremely slow and appeared disinterested, as though he was fasting. He informed us that all shoes on the rack were 31% off, while new arrivals were not on sale. However, as we were about to make our purchase, another staff member told us that the prices on the shoes were fixed, and the discount was only 15% if we signed up for a membership. This significant discrepancy in pricing led us to leave without questioning them further. To add to our frustration, when I mentioned our expectation of a 31% discount, a female staff member wearing a tudung rolled her eyes and began discussing us as we exited the store. We were deeply disappointed by the lack of proper customer service and hospitality at Clark's. Horrible customer service and misleading price offered to customers. | review_rating:1, text:2 days ago I went to Clarks Pyramid. just ask if there is a warranty on the purchase of shoes only. I especially impressed by how their explain the product very well & very soft-spoken and courteous I was able to purchase my dream shoes even the crowd on weekend is very pack but the staff name Danny treat me very well , and the entire shopping experience with the staff name Danny was enjoyable and memorable. Thank you for making my day so special Danny! I will be back to find you again! 🤟🏻 | review_rating:4, text:This store must be one of Puma's flagship stores, with a huge statue of a Puma at the entrance. The store offers the brand's latest sportswear, shoes and sports accessories. | review_rating:5, text:I have a great experience here. Really good communications and helpful from each staff.Two times I come here just to purchase latest Nitro both for me and husband. Latest experience is where I wanted to purchase Nitro for my husband but they seemed to not have available size that we want and since we are from Melaka and possibly can’t come again near future to exchange. For this reason they are willing to help ship specific size to Puma Melaka just to help our exchange experience easier. I recommended to meet staff with name GG. She is very polite and cheerful with lots of recommendations together with her team. | review_rating:5, text:I visited because the runners I follow on Instagram are either part of the Puma Run Club or regularly attend Puma Run Club training events, and I really wanted to try the leg analysis. When I was there, the staff were great. Even when I was just sitting down, they asked if I needed any help. Although this is something normal, it really impressed me because my previous experiences at physical stores had either been poor or non-existent.

The store was very clean, with bright lighting. It also smelled lovely—soft and pleasant, not overpowering. Combined with the cool air-conditioning, it was incredibly comfortable. The store is spacious, and the different sections are well-organized by category.

Overall, after doing the leg analysis, I walked around to browse, and to my surprise, while I was looking at the shoes, a staff member immediately approached me to explain the details. Thank you so much for great shopping experience.

name: Huawei Customer Service Centre
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Walked in to find a watch for my husband, but the customer service was terrible—judgmental and completely status-driven. The staff member gave me a dismissive look, scanning me from head to toe without even greeting me.

He should take both his outfit and attitude elsewhere. | review_rating:5, text:The reputation of Watatime has not been lost in history 👍👍👍

Really appreciate the service and care you guys put to serve me and for sure my next Watch purchase will be by you Mindy 😉

Thx again for reserving my Breitling ⌚ | review_rating:1, text:this shop at Sunway pyramid , staff type are like dog eyes. look down on people who walk in to the shop, they dont care you buy or not buy, when you wear normal they wont come and serve you at all, even when you asking a question they will just simple answer you with stupid answer. | review_rating:1, text:Customer service very bad. Sales guy is very status driven. Bro wore only a Tag Heuer and thought everyone is below him | review_rating:1, text:Walked in to get a wedding gift for my fiancé, but customer service was trash and very status-based. No worries, happy to take business else where.

The staff should take his outfit else where too, along with his attitude.

name: Mr. Tuk Tuk
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Always be me & husband's favourite Thai restaurant. This time we have tried their new menu set which contain fish, veges, white rice & drinks for 2 pax. Absolutely delicious! The price is affordable, the ambience is great. And the service from staff was top notch! We love Mr Tuk Tuk so much❤️ | review_rating:5, text:This iconic Thai green papaya salad strikes the perfect balance of spicy, sour, salty, and sweet. The crisp shredded papaya, crunchy peanuts, and a punch of lime make it incredibly refreshing. A must-try for those who love bold and vibrant flavors! | review_rating:3, text:Review by expat Londoner:
Yet another Thai restaurant I visited in search of the perfect Mango sticky rice pudding. Before that we ordered the Pineapple rice served in a pineapple, Laksa, Chicken wings, a set meal and fried rice. The sticky rice was so sticky we needed a knife to cut it through, the coconut milk was too salty, the Laksa had an underwhelming flavour but the show stealers were the green chilli sauce that was the condiment on the table and minced chicken that came with the set meal. We were served a drink with the set meal that had an aftertaste of cough syrup. I still gave it 3 stars for food because the mango was nice and the fried rice and the pineapple rice were enjoyed by my friends. The chicken was described to be juicy and tender. | review_rating:4, text:I ordered the Thai Laksa coz I was curious as to how it tastes like. It tasted amazing! It is like an enhanced version of the northern asam laksa. Really tasty.

However, the portion that came was really, really small. I spoke to the waitress about it, saying that it’s really small for the price charged. Without question asked, she came back with more noodles for me. Great service!

My wife had the pineapple fried rice set and it also tasted really nice. | review_rating:5, text:Came from Sabah and wanted to try something new in Sunway pyramid. To my surprise their food actually tasted good, the food was made with authentic flavour. Ordered their special looking pineapple fried rice and it has good taste with fresh shrimp. The pandan chicken set was good too accompanied with fish. Will come again next time

name: Estee Lauder
location: G1. 128B, GROUND FLOOR, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:My mom went to the store to check her membership, but she mistakenly thought her membership was with Estée Lauder instead of Channel. We politely thanked the staff, but three of them rolled their eyes and said, "It's Channellllll, not Estée Lauder," in a very rude tone, particularly the Malay staff member.

With such untrained staff, I guess there's no hope for my mom to try any of your products.

I use Estée Lauder, but I will not be purchasing any items from this store. I believe the management should consider sending in "mystery shoppers" to assess service quality. It's awful. | review_rating:5, text:We dropped by this well stocked Estee Lauder outlet. The shop assistant was helpful and took time to explain the product differences and applied the samples to try. We are happy with our purchase here. | review_rating:5, text:This comment is for Ms Janice. She is a good SA . I have get a good sales service from her. | review_rating:1, text:I’m writing this as a very disappointed customer. I am a working mother and can’t really find a time to go physical store to buy it. Since I need urgently as my current stock is almost finishing. Then I book a delivery guy (Lalamove) to help me to buy. As the moment Lalamove guy was there the sales person at Estée Lauder Sunway pyramid refuse to sell to him saying they can’t buy on behalf.. how is this practical? In that case my husband can’t buy fro me? Or I can’t hire a delivery person to buy for me. Isn’t that the product must reach to customer for the convenience side. I had to pay the delivery guy for nothing.

Worst customer service ever. | review_rating:1, text:I went there to ask something about the products with my bf but we saw there are only one staff there serving a customer so we choose to come back later. After that, we came back into the shop again she was still serving the customer so we waited there but this staff has no sign of wanted to serve us she even not looking at us at all I know we look younger than the customer but she shouldn't act like we are a transparent glass I'm so disappointed at this shop.

name: Madam Kwan's
location: Lot LG1.47, Lower Ground 1, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I have dinner at this restaurant and dissatisfied regarding the time after order the food. It take very long time for them to serve. Second point is the Asam fish head not fresh for the fish head. Got one smell, and the fish got a lot of scale. The only the I feel is nice is the coconut rice smells good and taste delicious. This is the thing you can try.
Overall this visit is unpleasant. Cause other table already serving and we keep waiting almost 40/45 mins. We order around 9 dishes, yet nothing come first. Till we complain with the waiter only one of the ladies apologise. In the end there is a guy waiter who see us very unhappy and provide us the desert cendol. Lastly this waiter guy good and smart help us cancel the two dish , cause other food we eat till 80/90% finish. Still hope they could improve in future. Cause other outlet so far didn’t have this issue. 💪 | review_rating:4, text:Taste is subjective. Tried ordering online & struggled. Thankfully waitress was helpful. Had the Cantonese fried beef noodle RM 24.90 & local ice coffee white RM 7.50. plus 10% + 6%.
I was expecting tough beef but it was nice & tender & piping hot. Coffee was nice to complete the meal. Good crowd helped me decide where to eat. | review_rating:4, text:This is my second time dining at this outlet, and the food here continues to be the best compared to all the other outlets. We had dumpling soup, glass noodles with soft shell crab and otak-otak fried rice.

The dumpling soup is a delightful blend of flavours and textures. The minced prawn and chicken filling in the dumplings is succulent and well seasoned, providing a savoury bite with each spoonful. The broth is light yet flavourful, perfectly complementing the dumplings.

The claypot glass noodles with soft shell crab is a dish that truly standout. The glass noodles are stir fried in dark soy sauce, giving them a rich and umami flavour. The highlight, of course, is the soft shell crab, which is cooked to perfection. The crab is crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, adding a delightful crunch to the dish. The combination of textures and flavours makes this a must try.

Lastly, the otak-otak fried rice is a unique and flavourful dish. The rice is perfectly cooked and infused with the distinct taste of otak-otak, a special fish cake. The dish is well balanced and not overly spicy, making it enjoyable for a wide range of palates. It’s a creative twist on traditional fried rice that is sure to impress. | review_rating:5, text:You must dine at Madam Kwan’s at Sunway Pyramid. The Satay is the best i have tasted in my lifetime! Madam Kwan has perfected her Satay with the juiciest and perfect satay marinade and the satay sauce is also the best in terms of taste and consistency. Madam Kwan’s Salted Fish Fried Rice is to die for. Its very rich in flavour, moist and the bits of salted fish is so crunchy and they do not stinge on it. There are even toppings of ikan bilis. We just had to order a second plate of the Salted Fish Fried Rice ! The Nasi Bojari is also the best so far. These dishes were recommended by their staff Ika who is very  friendly and her customer service is unparalleled!  We ended our meal with another recommendation by Ika - Fritters with Ice Cream. The batter was just right, light and tasty and the banana wasn’t sweet and was complimented very well with the vanilla ice cream. Well done Madam Kwan ! | review_rating:5, text:I can't lie about Madan Kwan's food—it's excellent as usual. I have nothing to complain about regarding the food; however, it was my first time visiting the Sunway Pyramid branch over the weekend, and the service was not as expected. It was much worse than I anticipated. I had to call the staff for everything, including utensils, plates, and even coffee, which was served with out sugar! I had to reach out multiple times for assistance. I hope they can improve this aspect of their service.

name: Ah Cheng Laksa
location: Lot LG2.88, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Was having dinner at Ah Cheng Laksa Sunway Pyramid on 23/2. Ordered a buttermilk chicken chop rice and it came as picture shown below. The chicken was completely over fried and became black on the top. Voiced out to the staff in the kitchen and the manager responded with “it’s cooked in this way, usually. Doesn’t seem to be something wrong.” The staff clearly did not admit this is wrong and they did not try to compensate or offer anything to replace. I would say this is the worst thing that could possibly happen to a F&B company. Quality control - bad. Staff quality - not up to standard and not educated as they did not know what’s the right thing to do they face issues. Perhaps this is the last time that I would step into the same restaurant unless the company is willing to change and make it better. | review_rating:4, text:It's a bit crampy. No service as you scan to order. Fried Popiah Aet Rm11.90 with 1 drink (popiah, outside crunchy but inside like not cook, could be it's inside freezer n they fried it when there's order), Keropok lekor Set Rm11.89 with 1 drink (Lekor is too soft inside) & Laksa Junior set Rm15.90 with 1 ABC (theres kidney beans, corn, peanuts & cincau). | review_rating:4, text:The food was good, but the service was super slow. We needed to ask several times before we got our food | review_rating:4, text:Halal certified.  The Asam Laksa is the best seller for a good reason. Super tasty and just a bit spicy.  Added fish and it was totally worth it.  Staff are friendly and the kitchen is lightning fast. Dining area is clean and the place has a good vibe. | review_rating:4, text:Must try the Asam Laksa! The longer you eat it the better it gets. The Ayam Rendang was ok but nothing special about it. One thing I noticed was everything was cooked to order which was a surprise. I recommend trying this place out when you visit Sunway.

name: Spectrum Forex Money Changer
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:They delivers exceptional service and unbeatable rates, far better than the other branches. It’s a weird why more customers don’t know about this fantastic shop. Friendly, professional, and always goes the extra mile. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great deals and outstanding customer care.
I would recommend mr.fairoze services at SPECTRUM 3 in Sunway Pyramid Mall
Don’t miss out this is the place to go! | review_rating:1, text:Good rate but bad attitude.

I went to the G floor branch (next to Parkson).

The first time I went to counter 1 to change A currency, I said I wanted to split two receipts, he said he couldn’t split the transaction and asked me to queue up again.

OK, Second time I went to counter 1 again (only 1 counter is open) and changed A currency.

Seeing that there was no one in line behind me, I said I wanted to change B currency, he said no, he could only change money from one country per person at a time, which means I had to wait until someone came to queue up to change money before I could change money for the third time?

Meanwhile counter 2 is open, then I pointed to counter 2 and asked if I could change money, counter 1 said NO, because counter 2 is new and he didn’t know how to do it.

So does a money changer have such a rule now??? | review_rating:4, text:SMALL MONEY CHANGER IN A BIG MALL. FAST SERVICE.
EXCHANGE RATE IS AVERAGE.
MUST SHOW YOUR NRIC OR PASSPORT TO BUY OR SELL THE CURRENCIES. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recomended.Good rate and good service. Same rate as the other shop in the middle but no queue compared to the middle one. | review_rating:5, text:This is consider the best rate money changer in Subang Jaya area and after Mid Valley. Another option you may go for competitive rate within same area is Subang Parade. To those customers who had issue with uncle previously, it is depend on how you talk or behave toward him at first. I had deal with him for more than 10 years but never have any issue based on mutual respect of each others. He is a nice guy anyway. Recommend this place!

name: Starbucks Reserve
location: Lot G1.129, OB3.G.1 & OB3.G.2, Ground Floor, Oasis Boulevard, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Starbucks Reserve at Sunway Pyramid is an excellent spot for coffee lovers. The staff are friendly, helpful, and always provide great service, making each visit a pleasant experience. The cozy and clean atmosphere is perfect for relaxing or catching up on work. Their Caramel Macchiato is my absolute favorite—rich, flavorful, and always satisfying. While the prices are on the higher side, the quality of the drinks and overall experience justifies the cost. Whether you’re grabbing a quick coffee or unwinding, this place is a standout. Definitely a five-star café worth visiting! | review_rating:1, text:Based on my previous visiting experience, I confirmed that the latest batch of the barista are new. Their service tells me everything.

First, they doesn't seems very familiar with the name of the drink on the reserved menu. They need to double check on the menu to confirm what's really customer mentioned when place order.

Secondly, the ticket doesn't place / stick well to the drinks producing counter. It caused that no barista noticed that there are a pending order to make (reserve coffee menu). After all, they keep calling customer name while food ready but nobody making the drink.

At the end,  the drink has served finally, but as photo shown, been ordered a Reserve menu coffee, but served without the Starbucks Reserve black sleeve and the complimentary chocolate. Definitely not well trained enough.

P.S. t
Then I saw a barista served the food over to a female customer to her table but forgot the drink itself. The female customer has to get up and go over the waiting section to get the drink by herself after all.

I been supporting this branch frequently, the previous batch of baristas are all in tip-top condition in many factors.

Well I guess the customers need to have more patient for the newest batch to shine like the rest. =) | review_rating:5, text:The staffs here are helpful and friendly. Special credit to the store manager who served during my visit in CNY. She spoke politely and very proactive asking people if they need any assistance. Well done. | review_rating:5, text:Dropped by here for getting my americano! Staff so friendly and fast yet punctual , space is spacious, comfy as well, interior also nice and super homey i can say 👻👻👻👻 and coffee as well as good as other branch 🤍🤍🤍 | review_rating:2, text:Ordered Iced creamy pure matcha latte, but it doesn’t look like matcha latte at all, not to mention the taste, only milk taste with a little tiny matcha flavour, very sweet even ady remarks for less sweet.
Picture is for illustration purpose only, certainly.

name: THE ONE ACCESSORIES
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

I hope the management takes this seriously and educate your workers. | review_rating:5, text:Special thanks to Ms Miki for her outstanding customer service and dedication!
