name: A&CO
location: Malaysia, Selangor, Subang Jaya, Bandar Sunway, MY Selangor Petaling Jaya No 3, JALAN PJS 11/15,Bandar Sunway LG1.101,Lower Ground Floor ，Sunway Pyramid邮政编码: 46150
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had the pleasure of having Christine Lee do my manicure and pedicure at A&CO. Nail Bar, and I couldn't be more impressed! From start to finish, she was fantastic. Her attention to detail, skill, and professionalism were top-notch. My nails have never looked better! The service was relaxing and efficient, and I truly felt that it was worth every penny. Highly recommend Christine for anyone looking for exceptional nail care. She’s amazing! 👍👍👍 | review_rating:1, text:I’m extremely disappointed with my recent manicure experience at this salon. From the beginning, I felt something was off, but I didn’t expect to be left so frustrated by the end of the session. The technician didn’t inform me that she was a trainee until the very end, which would have been helpful to know upfront. The lack of experience was painfully evident throughout the entire process.

The session took over 2 and a half hours, which I found completely unnecessary, especially since I was only getting a basic gel manicure with no color. I had specifically asked for nail extensions prior, but I was told that they would take too long. However, even with just a simple gel application, the technician insisted that coloured gel wouldn’t look good on my short nails, and in the end, my nails were actually cut even shorter during the process.

The results were far from what I expected. My nails look uneven, and the entire experience was frustrating and uncomfortable. I left feeling like I had wasted both my time and money.

To make matters worse, the next day, I noticed that my thumb nail wasn’t even coated with the last layer of gel. I returned to the salon to ask them to at least put on the top coat, but when they did, it ended up looking completely different in color because the worker allegedly forgot what shade she had used. It’s hard to believe that such an oversight could happen at a salon, especially with something as simple as a top coat.

I really wish the salon had been more transparent about the technician’s skill level beforehand. I won’t be returning or recommending this place to anyone. | review_rating:1, text:Went here for gel manicure . It cost me rm78. But the service is lousy. Such a lazy and rude staff. The worst ever outcome and experience. The shape is square , one short and one long. The nail polish not dry enough, but she ask me to leave and as you can see in the picture there are dust on my nails. Please change your staff otherwise teach her some respect and skills. | review_rating:1, text:not profesional hair stylish very rashing to finished my haircut.Not satisfy with my hairdo. I visited this salon on today (2/1/2024) around 8.20pm .At the end I just had a worst feeling and hair cut. This salon charge me senior hair pricing at rm40 but I really fell the work done is literally not the senior levelllll. Not recommend this saloon | review_rating:1, text:Very disappointed! I show them a picture of what I wanted and  they did a horrible job Don’t waste your money there rather go to somewhere else.

name: Manuka
location: LG1.112A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Really like this Manuka Honey drinks. It's colorful and pretty looking. That's what gets me all the time. What's more, it's Manuka Honey and not the pure sugar that is making it sweet. My choice of the Immune Booster was just nice with the sweetness level. Not that I'm hoping that my immune systems will get a boost from this, I'm not naive. But the drinks do suit my taste buds. | review_rating:5, text:As a fan of health-conscious beverages, I recently tried Manuka honey drink, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in both taste and nutritional benefits.

Firstly, let's talk about the flavor. Manuka honey drink offers a delightful blend of sweetness from the honey with a subtle hint of earthiness. The richness of the honey provides a comforting warmth to each sip, making it a truly enjoyable experience.

Beyond its taste, the health benefits of Manuka honey are well-documented. Renowned for its antibacterial properties, Manuka honey is believed to support immune health and promote overall well-being. Knowing that each sip of this delicious beverage may contribute to my health gives me even more reason to indulge.

What I appreciate most about Manuka honey drink is its versatility. Whether enjoyed hot as a soothing beverage on a chilly day or chilled for a refreshing pick-me-up, it never fails to satisfy my cravings for something both healthy and delicious.

In conclusion, Manuka honey drink has earned its place as a staple in my beverage repertoire. Its delectable flavor and potential health benefits make it a standout choice for anyone looking to elevate their drinking experience. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and your body will thank you. | review_rating:5, text:Just nice packing and very gentle staff. Never get a chance on lucky draw, the Energy Boost is flavour full, just feel the rich honey. Hangover Cure, not much of a cure but it does refreshing, very cool drink. Also it is buy 1 and get free until 31st of March. Good chance to have an additional drink. | review_rating:3, text:Can get drinks to try the honey before purchasing (currently there's some promo ongoing) 🍯 honey were okay (slightly pricey as it's RM12.9 for a small drink) but the chinese girl staff wasn't too friendly | review_rating:5, text:I like Signature 10 drink because Manuka honey mix perfectly with Konjac jelly texture to give us a refreshing and satisfying taste while providing us  healthy nutrients, immunity booset and skin care elements.

reviews: review_rating:1, text:19/11/2022 me and my fiancé went there to get a white shirt(slim fit). The moment we went in we found what we wanted and we asked salesman to packed. The price tag on the shirt was rm129. Then he told us he will get us the new one. Twice he went in took totally different shirt from what he asked. Twice we correct him. 3rd time he brought the shirt that my fiancé tried and removed the price tag and at the same time he brought the new shirt. Then he said the price is rm149. I did where is the price tag in earlier shirt and why did you removed it. The stupid answer he gave me "the display shirt is from other outlet and the new shirt from our outlet". Different outlet different price. Really you guys have different outlet different price range for same shirt?

name: Oriental Sun
location: Sunway Pyramid, Lot G1.42, Ground Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:We love their traditional Shunde dishes and local dishes such as claypot loh shu fun and dim sum . Best claypot loh shu fun we had in KL ! Dim sum of superior ingredients and their daily specials such as pig stomach soup is flavorful and delicious. 2nd time here within 3 months  and will return to try their other special Shunde dishes ! | review_rating:3, text:Bill total below RM850. Usual Oriental group fare. nothing earth shatteringly good. | review_rating:5, text:Dim sum selection which includes truffle infused ones and very quick service with dedicated servers every few tables. Too bad the Sunway Points takes 2 weeks to be credited. | review_rating:5, text:Had my simple tea ceremony and dinner at their private room. Food is excellent  and Mr Samuel very accommodating to my requests to have the room decorated by my team and even willing to slightly switch the package menu dish. All staffs are very friendly and helpful.

Definitely recommended to have a celebration events here. | review_rating:4, text:Delicious dim sum. Attentive service. Tables are arranged slightly too close. And some of the furniture looked worn out.

name: Zara
location: LG1.11 & LG1.17, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very spacious and well-set up.. kids department is also very good size. Fragrance smell from perfumes all over the store 😅⭐️ | review_rating:5, text:Such a medium sized store in Sunway Pyramid and lots of product to choose 🩺🏊 Store always quite packed but staff informative and helpful when I ask few things regarding products I asked 💨🎉 Overall nice experience to shop here 🦊 | review_rating:1, text:I recently shopped at Zara in Sunway Pyramid, and unfortunately, the experience was disappointing. The cashier was unwelcoming and seemed uninterested. When I asked a simple question about the t-shirt I had just purchased, the response was curt and unprofessional. In contrast, I’ve always had great experiences at Zara in Mid Valley, where the staff are friendly and attentive. I hope the service at Sunway Pyramid can be improved to match the high standards I’ve experienced elsewhere. And also please smile to customer | review_rating:4, text:Used to love to shop for this brand for my daily working, formal and casual outfits but it is no longer interesting and not the same as before MCO (March, 2020) anymore with more choices, style, colours, cutting but the quality is getting worse, promotion not that good or attractive anymore, and the price went up even it is made in Cambodia, Bangladesh, Indonesia, India, Pakistan, Vietnam and China, it is very difficult to find something made in Morocco, Turkey, Spain and Portugal anymore | review_rating:1, text:This Zara branch has always been my go-to. They usually have great stock availability, an excellent layout that makes shopping easy, and the staff used to be welcoming. But my last visit was disappointing.

At the counter, without greeting, the cashier immediately assumed I was returning the item, which I found strange but amusing at first. But then, after paying, she stamped "no exchange" on my receipt with no explanation and an annoyed look. While I can overlook the rude attitude, this isn’t typical based on my shopping experience at Zara - most staff would clarify if there’s a special condition for a purchase. As far as I know the item was new and it was most definitely a first-time purchase.

I still love the layout and ambience of the store, I hope the staff’s attitude is something management can work on to make sure a better experience for all customers.

name: First Aid Kit
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: LUCKIN COFFEE
category: cafe, coffee_shop, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Visited this coffee shop during their launch week, and the place was understandably busy. The queue and waiting time were over 45 minutes, but I have to say, it was worth it. The coffee tasted great, and the pricing was reasonable.

Definitely a spot worth checking out if you're a coffee lover. Just be prepared for the wait during peak times, especially during their early days! | review_rating:4, text:Last week I took a few friends who came from outstation to shop in Sunway Pyramid. We walked around this huge n complex shopping mall cos there were so many different exits n entrances. It was like a maze n you can easily lose your direction n get lost. We bought a couple of snacks n then on the ground floor we saw a large crowd queuing up outside a shop. Being curious n feeling kiasu, we went over to have a look. Wow it was Luckin Coffee the popular n famous brand of coffee from China. But why the large crowd? We discovered that they were having a promotion. Only RM 2.99 per cup of coffee of your choice from their menu. They offer a wide variety of coffees which range from RM 10 _ RM 15. So cheap n highly affordable. So we also joined the queue. The workers worked very fast n were very efficient in preparing the coffee. We didn't need to wait long before we got our coffee. They were very orderly n systematic in their operation too. First we had to scan the QR code n then download the app n then register n then choose your coffee n then you make your payment. Finally just wait for your order n then collect your coffee from the main counter. Everything went very smoothly n fast n without any mistakes at all. Wonderful experience for us all to see n watch how this China system worked. | review_rating:4, text:During the launch week, I happened to visit Sunway and was able to use the offer rate to get a drink and handle the queue.
It took an hour to receive the drinks after making a reservation through the application because I was there during the first week. My friends purchased coffee, and the taste of my drink—chocolate—was passable. According to the menu, the price seems reasonable. | review_rating:4, text:Tasty coffee. Nice interior. Well built app. But due to the new opening offer, the queue and waiting time was too long. I waited more than 30 minutes to get my coffee. | review_rating:5, text:Came here on grand opening day and waited almost 30mins to get my order! coffee was good, got nice promo on that day and staff are a lot and they serve pretty quick despite long q 🎉🇫🇷🐷

name: Din Tai Fung
category: asian_restaurant, chinese_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot G1.41 & G1.PT01, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Food: it was good as usual. First time tried the crab meat xiaolongbao, it was ok, personally still prefer the pork xiaolongbao. The mushroom vegetables fried rice was surprisingly good.

Service: the waiting time is very long. We were being told the waiting time is only 30 minutes but we ended up waited for an hour. Not recommended if you are in a hurry. The service was just at an average level which personally found it to be under my expectations.

Atmosphere: it was conducive to have meal. | review_rating:5, text:Vegetarian friendly for certain menu
Their number queue system is effective, once you got the number please wait outside your number will be called soon.
You may fill up your order form while queueing then once u got the table just pass the order form to them.
Food serve fast and hot.
Their vegetarian fried rice is delicious. | review_rating:4, text:Food was great except the chilli fried fish which tasted like nuggets. Service needs to be improved, no one knows what to do after serving or proper way talking to customers. Too many new staffs I guess... | review_rating:4, text:This store still serves one of the best xiao long bao over the years. Ginseng chicken soup was bland and just a slight taste of ginseng. Fried rice with pork chop was good as the pork was cooked and well seasoned. Fried rice was not that oily and salty. | review_rating:5, text:Loved how quick and efficient the service is at this outlet. There was a short queue but me and my friend were able to get seated within 5 minutes. The food was also served fairly quickly.
Pork chop fried rice is good, the 小笼包 as well. But the main highlight was the 辣子鱼片 that was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside and cooked to absolute perfection.
Definitely the best DTF outlet here!

name: A-Saloon
location: F1.77 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I wanted a reasonably priced hair cut without burning the pocket. And a place where they don't push you for hard sell. Glad I found A-Saloon for a wash and cut at RM83 at my hair length. Such a pleasant, positive, and swift experience as I didn't want to spend too much time. Was greeted by beautiful and friendly Moon, loving the vibes then on. Bryann was amazing, did his layering magic on my hair and Cat did the wash. Thank you A-Saloon! | review_rating:5, text:Passed by this salon at Sunway Pyramid, initially I just wanted a cut and treatment, but stylist Vaan suggested I touch up my roots (I have bleached blond hair ends) to have more uniform colour. My total package for the visit includes haircut, 2 bleach, colour, treatments.

A big shout out to stylist Vaan. He’s so meticulous and he managed to do all of the items within 2 hours as I have a flight to catch. Every step of the chemical treatment there’s scalp protector and additional ampoule to not be so painful for my scalp during the chemical processes and he kept checking on my hair and whether I can take the pain.  He is also very good at picking colours- I only do cool tone colours and without me saying he already mixed the silver-gray as a colour to uniformly tone my colour.

I recommend this place, so happy I randomly found a good salon that can visit again when I’m in KL. | review_rating:5, text:Been a repeated customer here, service is always amazing and efficient. Staffs and stylist are friendly and take their time to communicate all the hair treatment steps despite being a very busy salon. They do not rush you to make any decision and are not pushy at all and want the best for your hair. KC was particularly helpful in checking the condition of my hair and understand my issue before advising on the hair treatment. 💯💯 | review_rating:5, text:Got my hair cut last week with Madeline. She was amazing and gave me a warm and welcoming experience! She even taught me a great technique to improve my blow-drying skill~  | review_rating:5, text:I would liked to give a 5 stars rating for Hairstylist Mr Vaan Tai. No hardcore selling, professional recommendation according to your needs . I opt for haircut, dye and treatment and was very satisfactory.   I will definitely returned and strongly recommend Mr Vaan Tai. Thumbs up!

name: Chili's
location: G1.97, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Had lunch at Chili’s in Sunway Pyramid, and I have to say the food was fantastic! The steak was cooked perfectly—tender, juicy, and full of flavor. Everything we ordered tasted amazing, and the portions were just right. The restaurant was quite crowded, but it didn’t bother me too much as the atmosphere was still lively and fun. However, the service was just okay—polite but a bit slow at times. It wasn’t terrible, but there’s definitely room for improvement. Hopefully, they work on that because the food is worth coming back for. Overall, still a great spot for a delicious meal! | review_rating:5, text:I had dinner at Chili's in Sunway Pyramid, and it was absolutely worth it. The food was delicious, especially the fajitas with incredibly tender and juicy chicken. I thoroughly enjoyed the meal overall. Although the service was a bit slow, it didn’t take away from the great experience, and I had a wonderful time at the restaurant. | review_rating:5, text:After 10 years didn't visit here, food standard remain the same , great environment, enjoy the food very much . Only food portion become slightly smaller but still delicious 😋. Both my daughter like it very much 😍. 👍👍👍 | review_rating:4, text:Pretty popular lunch and dinner spot for family and friends. Ordered the buffalo chicken salad and chicken fajitas and both meal was good. Same old classic environment and gotta admit, they maintained their taste and services over the years. | review_rating:4, text:One of the nicer Chili's outlets. Clean, bright & cheerful. Friendly & attentive service. Reasonable pricing considering the quality & portions. Not that crowded during weekday lunch. Great for families or couples.

We ordered their mushroom jack fajitas & monterey chicken. Both came piping hot. The highlight has to be the fajitas. My favorite at Chili's. From the juicy chicken & beef slices to the flavorful mushrooms topped with all the gooey cheese. Great on its own but better with the tortilla wrap. Sadly they don't give guacamole anymore unless added as a side. The monterey chicken was also good. Juicy & flavorful. Both were very filling. We were stuffed for the whole day. Washed it all down with their bottomless soda & juices.

We enjoyed our lunch. Will surely return when the Tex Mex cravings kick in.

name: Yong Kang TCM
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47400 Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Frankly, there are better TCMs out there. I felt the doctor was more focused on money than offering proper care.

A female doctor checked my pulse and charged a consultation fee but gave no health advice. Of all the checking, she insisted I take their Chinese medicine despite my hesitation, and the receptionist billed me anyway.

For my right-hand pain, I received cupping and acupuncture. The cups were too large, kept falling off (she knows it), however she left me unattended. During acupuncture, I felt nothing, and she used fewer than 5 needles, which made me question whether she was addressing the issue effectively.
I’m not happy with the RM350+ bill, no results or personalized care. | review_rating:5, text:Dr.Meng is very professional at her job and very helpful in taking care of us, suggesting treatment plans and you walk out completely refreshed and recharged every time ! location: F1.77 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I wanted a reasonably priced hair cut without burning the pocket. And a place where they don't push you for hard sell. Glad I found A-Saloon for a wash and cut at RM83 at my hair length. Such a pleasant, positive, and swift experience as I didn't want to spend too much time. Was greeted by beautiful and friendly Moon, loving the vibes then on. Bryann was amazing, did his layering magic on my hair and Cat did the wash. Thank you A-Saloon! | review_rating:5, text:Passed by this salon at Sunway Pyramid, initially I just wanted a cut and treatment, but stylist Vaan suggested I touch up my roots (I have bleached blond hair ends) to have more uniform colour. My total package for the visit includes haircut, 2 bleach, colour, treatments.

A big shout out to stylist Vaan. He’s so meticulous and he managed to do all of the items within 2 hours as I have a flight to catch. Every step of the chemical treatment there’s scalp protector and additional ampoule to not be so painful for my scalp during the chemical processes and he kept checking on my hair and whether I can take the pain.  He is also very good at picking colours- I only do cool tone colours and without me saying he already mixed the silver-gray as a colour to uniformly tone my colour.

I recommend this place, so happy I randomly found a good salon that can visit again when I’m in KL. | review_rating:5, text:Been a repeated customer here, service is always amazing and efficient. Staffs and stylist are friendly and take their time to communicate all the hair treatment steps despite being a very busy salon. They do not rush you to make any decision and are not pushy at all and want the best for your hair. KC was particularly helpful in checking the condition of my hair and understand my issue before advising on the hair treatment. 💯💯 | review_rating:5, text:Got my hair cut last week with Madeline. She was amazing and gave me a warm and welcoming experience! She even taught me a great technique to improve my blow-drying skill~  | review_rating:5, text:I would liked to give a 5 stars rating for Hairstylist Mr Vaan Tai. No hardcore selling, professional recommendation according to your needs . I opt for haircut, dye and treatment and was very satisfactory.   I will definitely returned and strongly recommend Mr Vaan Tai. Thumbs up!

name: TMT Megastore by Thunder Match
location: F1.85A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I wanna give a very honest review on this.

So I bought a logitech mouse for 300+ which sells between 250-300 on lazada. You have to understand that all shops here especially the tech shops in Asian Avenue will sell items at higher prices. This is because rent for pyramid is high. Those who give ratings such as *overprice* without a good reason - no comments.

I did NOT buy a laptop so I am not aware of the quality of service this place offers and so you have to take ur own risk when buying from here.

Pros: You can exchange faulty peripherals with other peripherals from other brands within 14 days of purchase if u are a member. (Rm300 purchase gives u free membership).

You also get 1 year warranty.

Cons: Slightly more expensive.

_________

My personal opinion: I try not to buy from lazada and stuff for electronic devices because they is no certification that it is original and it is very difficult to exchange or send ur device for warranty when u purchase it online. I would pay the extra RM 50 for the reassurance from this shop. (Peripherals ONLY)

For laptops: I can't give a review so do keep that in mind. | review_rating:1, text:Worst store ever. I've let them changed my HDD to SSD. They secretly changed my BIOS and say that my BIOS was slow but actually they have put a defect one in my laptop. | review_rating:1, text:I bought a RM4k laptop right there and it's 1 year ago and 6 months is on service. I went to there for 5 more times just for repairing my laptop | review_rating:1, text:I have to back and forth for my newly brought laptop , really piss me off . Really regret to have my laptop bought here , I have to get back to here for the third time in order to solve my laptop problem | review_rating:1, text:very bad warranty claim system and they sell overpriced items.don't buy from them

name: Samsung Service Centre
location: Lot F1.27, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I am writing to formally lodge a complaint regarding the poor service I experienced at your authorized service centre in Sunway Pyramid. The lack of communication, persistent stock shortages, and difficulty in reaching the service centre have caused significant inconvenience. Below is a timeline of the incident and my key concerns.

Timeline of the Incident:
16 February 2025 – I contacted the Sunway Pyramid service centre to schedule a screen replacement for my Samsung S23 Ultra. I was informed that the screen was out of stock but would be restocked on 18 February 2025. Following this, I requested to book an appointment for 22 February 2025, and the service centre advised me to send my details via WhatsApp. I did so, and they acknowledged my request with a "noted" response. Based on this, I assumed my appointment was confirmed.

22 February 2025 – I called the service centre to reschedule my appointment to 23 February 2025. It was only then that I was informed that the screen was still out of stock.

Complaint Points:
Poor Communication – If I had not called on 22 February, I would have traveled to the service centre on 23 February only to find out the screen was still unavailable. Why wasn’t I informed in advance that the stock had not arrived? As a service provider, the service centre should proactively notify customers if their scheduled repairs cannot proceed due to stock unavailability.

Frequent Stock Shortages – Why does the service centre frequently face stock shortages for essential replacement parts? Does this mean customers will always have to wait indefinitely to get their devices repaired? Being unable to use my phone for an extended period has caused unnecessary inconvenience, and potential financial losses.

Extremely Difficult to Contact – I found it extremely difficult to reach the service centre. As an authorized service provider for a global brand like Samsung, the service centre should have a more accessible and responsive customer support system.

The poor service I experienced has been frustrating and unacceptable. As a loyal Samsung customer, I expect better service quality and a more reliable repair process | review_rating:2, text:Left my fold 4 with the center on Saturday, received a call to collect in on Thursday. They claim to replace the screen but I can see that it is still the same screen (there is a slight mark on the screen. It is still there, meaning it's the same screen). They fix the issue with the phone turning off when using the inner screen. However, the center returned my phone with scratches and screen bubbling. They do not handle your phone with care. I suggest take lots of photo and video as evidence before you hand over to them. | review_rating:5, text:came in with a flip 3 samsung that half of the screen was damage, i want to tranfers my data from that phone but couldnt since the screen cant be use. the obvious solution was to replace the flip 3 screen that cost rm1k but i dont want to do that since it was an old phone and already have a new one. however, there was this nice uncle samsung worker who go out of his way to help me, even took out a usb mouse to help me tranfer the data. couldnt be more grateful for the uncle | review_rating:1, text:Brought my s20 to repair for cracked screen but after repair my screen have issues with tapping which it move around itself. Visiting 2nd time within a week and informed that my phone when sent it to them it is already have this issue which supposed I am sure supposed not to be. As luckily I have video record as proof my phone condition before left my phone to them.

The problem didn't been solved and I don't wish to send my phone there again. Now it become my backup phone and I bought another new phone because of their poor workmanship.

Please be reminded they may told you estimated 4 to 5 working days but you still need to chase them for a follow-up and at last can be taken even more than 1 week time to collect your item. Worst thing is your phone's problem didn't get solved after long waiting time.

I am a Samsung users for more than 10 years but tbh if your phone have problems, it is better you find phone repair specialist rather than their authorized service center. Why? because my new phone's screen cracked again and i decided to bring my to phone repair specialist. Price is similar to them but service lagi tip-top. | review_rating:5, text:Am really happy with the attentiveness and the problem solving measures done by the customer service personal. He explained well and was very friendly. Keep up the good work!!

I had an amazing time shopping here and I truly appreciate the kind help. | review_rating:5, text:We passed by and had no intention to buy. But the right shirt caught our eyes and the service was so good, we bought 2 items! | review_rating:5, text:Very good customer service with friendly staff who is willing to explain how to carr for the shirts that we bought. Well done! | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to buy a jacket which was labelled 30% discount on an Sunday night. Upon paying, the cashier told my husband that there’s no discount for the jacket. Initially when I asked, the Indian sales promoter lady confirmed the price labelled was before discount. What a fraud. They should honour what was labelled. However, when I re-checked the jacket a 2nd time, they have secretly removed the 30% discount label. The senior guy cashier called his boss and came up with a “solution” that they can use their staff rate discount to give us 50% discount provided we buy another item from the shop. We agreed to that. As it was a Sunday, he said he can’t do it now as their office is closed. They asked for our phone number and promised to call us the next day which they NEVER did. What a Scammer indeed.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Fresh
location: G1.48, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic experience at Fresh Boutique in Sunway Pyramid. Jasmine provided wonderful service, and the treatment was incredibly relaxing. The tea, facial products, and massage were exceptional. They even personalize the room with your chosen EDP. After the facial, Christy patiently explained all the products used, detailing their ingredients and functions. Thanks to Sunway for offering such excellent complimentary treats for platinum members. Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Christy's service and friendliness was amazing. She was very patient while explaining each product that were suitable for my skin. Really recommend seeking out for her if you are planning to visit the Sunway branch! | review_rating:5, text:I went to Fresh initially just to look around..but ended up buying a whole bunch of skincare due to Christy’s explanation. she took the time to choose which product suitable for me and teach me how to use the products correctly. I would always come back to this outlet if i want to buy more skincare. Guys, if you want a really good sales assistant pls look for her!! Kuddos fresh. Thanks Christy!! | review_rating:5, text:Had my facial with Jasmine, which was nothing short than relaxing. Following that I had a consultation with Christy, who was not only knowledgable in her products but very accommodating to my enquiries. She was not judgemental but shares her personal view as an avid fresh product user which makes Fresh relatable to me. Well done Christy! | review_rating:5, text:One of the best natural skincare catered to customers. Their staff Christy was very friendly and detailed on explaining each of the ingredients and skincare usage! Their new perfume - Rose Morning was so good!

name: Coffea Coffee
category: cafe, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG 1 . 106, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I was there on a friday, from early when they opened until around 11am, and the vibes were pretty nice, the dark, wooden aesthetics are nice, and it was quiet and chill.

I got a pain au chocolat and a caramel latte for 9.50 and 16.00 respectively, totalling to 27.05 after tax, which is a little steep of a pricing to be honest, but its just a little more expensive than usual cafe prices nowadays, so its still acceptable.

the pain au chocolat was average, nothing extraordinary, it had nice layers and a fair amount of chocolate inside, but for the price, I personally wouldn’t get it again, but it’s not bad.
the caramel latte was actually quite enjoyable, it fit my tastes well, it’s somewhat sweet with good caramel flavour, but not overwhelmingly sweet, and the coffee flavour was present but more mellow than others i’d say, which is still quite nice. and their ice is really crunchy👍🧊

service was standard too, order and pay at counter, get a beeper thing, take a seat and wait until it beeps to go get your order.

overall not bad, would be back again to try different things.

🐊🐊 | review_rating:3, text:First time tried it here in sunway pyramid. The coffee is surprisingly bad. The overburnt and the acidity is way off chart. Coffea coffee in Plaza Masalam Shah Alam is way better. Here is very meh. Please standardize ur barista | review_rating:4, text:Recommendations for contemporary coffee places, very happy to find a good coffee location. After being tired of shopping, the iced coffee and various pastries are very delicious. Good service, very affordable prices. will be a regular here again | review_rating:3, text:Food
Butter cake:
It was just delicious paired with hot chocolate, So soft and buttery just like a homemade cake

Croissant:
Pretty good and it came with a bit of butter. Nice to dunk it in hot chocolate

Ice tea:
It was to diluted and did not taste good

Service:
Its Self service

Atmosphere:
Chill cafe in the middle of the mall, good place to hangout with friends

Quite pricey and the Ice tea was not worth it | review_rating:1, text:This is the worst cheesecake I've ever eaten in my life. It tasted weird & dry. The coffee was good, but this cake spoiled the whole experience 🤢

name: CHIC STUDIO
location: Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I purchased a cheongsam from this shop on 20 January 2024 around 8 PM. The boss told me it was the last piece and a display item. I initially hesitated to buy it, but the boss assured me it had only been put on display that morning and was in good condition. He even said, “It’s almost Chinese New Year, and you’re lucky to find one that fits you.”

However, when I prepared to wash it, I found a very noticeable defect on the sleeves, making the dress unwearable. This issue is unacceptable, especially since I trusted their assurance of the dress’s condition.

I have reached out to the shop to request an exchange or refund, but they have completely ignored me. This experience has been incredibly disappointing. Selling defective items while claiming they’re in perfect condition, especially for CNY, shows a lack of professionalism and care for customers.

DO NOT RECOMMEND TO BUY FROM THEM !!!! | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to try the outfit in blue but staff don’t allow. Only can try the size I want in pink. How do I know if I look good in blue or not if I’m not allowed to try ? First time encounter such clothing store that doesn’t allow customer to try on other colour. Wanted to buy it and really like the design but decided to not buy cause staff rude and don’t allow to try. 😅 | review_rating:1, text:I understand that customers have to queue to enter the store as it is quite small. However, we ended up waiting for a very long time (over 30 minutes). The ladies in front of us had already gone in, shopped, and left, yet we were still stuck outside like 🤡. The staff wouldn’t let us in, even though there were very few customers inside, while the queue outside kept growing.
What a terrible queue management. Also a lady casually walked in, supposedly to ask about her daughter’s clothes, but ended up browsing for herself ☺️, knowing that she’s cut the queue but still act dumb (or maybe she’s just dumb ☺️). The staff saw it happen and just acted like nothing was wrong 🤷🏻‍♀️. I would never enter this shop again 🙂 | review_rating:1, text:Although the clothes are nice, the staff's attitude is extremely negative. During Chinese New Year, they exhibit a type of expression that implies they have no money to buy their clothes like that. And I also saw a lot of negative reviews about the staff. If the shop's attitude remains unchanged, I will make a complaint to Sunway Pyramid Management. | review_rating:1, text:If I could give zero stars, I would. The service was absolutely terrible. The queue was incredibly long, and when we asked if we could go in—especially since most of the customers inside had already left—the staff told us to wait. To make matters worse, a customer blatantly cut the queue and went in, and the staff didn’t even bother to address it. This level of service is unacceptable

name: Maisen Tonkatsu
location: LG1.45, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:This is my first visit.
The restaurant was busy during lunch time on Christmas.
Foods were served quite fast (within 15 mins).
I ordered 3 different dishes and they taste good.

I felt the seating was a bit too close. Not only lack privacy but also hard to move. | review_rating:2, text:First try, the tenderloin pork is separate and not firm at all. Doesn’t give you a good satisfied bite, the texture is just too weird. Cabbage is too thick and .Will think twice before I revisit. There is better tonkatsu next door 🫢 | review_rating:5, text:First time here to try out iberico katsu, the texture are smooth & taste are sweet. Plus match with their specialize black sauce it's perfect! Free refill for rice & miso soup if order in set which comes with pickles, fruits & tofu. | review_rating:3, text:My daughter ordered the Katsu Mabushi set, where there is a procedure of putting the rice in a separate bowl, add the garnishing then the soup. The taste was okay.

I ordered the Jumbo Tenderloin Katsu set to share with my parents. The pork was tender and nicely bartered and fried. It tasted better with the sauce, as it is a little dry. My parents liked that we can order refills for the cabbage, which we did, twice! And similarly, it was paired with a cabbage seasoning sauce. | review_rating:4, text:Went here because I won a Tonkatsu set from dinning in Ippudo.
Quite a lot of customers here. We were lucky to come early.

Food mainly don and ramen.
Price a higher range. But fresh.
The ssignature sauces are great. Good to try it out.
Free refill of rice and salad if you order set.

The tamago (dashimaki kushikatsu) was not compact enough. It broke in the middle.

Staffs are friendly and attentive.

name: Honey Bibi
location: Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:This is the first time I felt so mad, what attitude is this, my friend and I took a white dress and wanted to try, when we went to the fitting room, the staff just stand inside the fitting room hiding behind the curtain stare at you weirdly without saying anything, when they finally walk away, and we wanted to get in, there isn’t anyone wanted to serve us, it’s ok, but they didn’t talk to us that we can’t try white color clothes, instead one of the staff madly doing her stuff and point at the sign that mentioned white clothes are not allowed to try. I understand about their concern but I really don’t understand their attitude. | review_rating:1, text:It would be great if we can review without giving any star. From all the reviews I read about this store on their customer service , all are very bad. Same here , just bought a white long skirt for my daughter. Before that, we found other colours available but not white . We spotted the same piece in white but was on the mannequin so we politely asked if we could get that ? There are 2 female staff (one taller and slimmer whereas the other one is on the chubby side ). The slimmer staff threw us a weird look when we asked for the piece on the mannequin  and she did not answer us immediately but informed her colleague about our request and after that the slimmer staff came back to  us and rudely told us ‘white one cannot try’. I said OK..  both staff are not friendly and they looked as if they have never been trained to serve customer and don’t know the right way to even communicate. Very bad for the shop cos after so many bad reviews , it seems owner of the business has done nothing to improve. | review_rating:1, text:Staff ：Make sure you try already will buy
So pity the boss got like this staff. No next visit. | review_rating:1, text:Poor service and staff are rude, asking them for the size and their face like want you to leave quickly. Ask what also don’t know don’t know, don’t want to do business at all | review_rating:1, text:This is probably the worst store I have ever visited. The display item didn’t have S size, so I went to the counter and ask them for S size, and they told me I can’t try white clothes, which I’m not going to try it on. After that one of the worker gave me S size but there was some make up stain on the skirt so I went again and ask them if they could exchange another one for me, they told me so rudely again that I can’t try on, I said I’m not going to. It’s just the skirt is dirty, which I would want another one. Then they just ask me so rudely whether I want to buy or not. Omg I feel so criticised by their words. and they didn’t even say sorry to me. PLEASE DON’T EVER VISIT THIS STORE.

name: G2000
location: g1, 20, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:As you can see,I purchased this shirt and i wanted the staff there to ironed it because they took it out of the store and it was very unpresentable. They ironed it and left the water stain on the shirt..very unethical behaviour..If you hate to do customer services than dont work lah..rather than giving hard time to customers. | review_rating:5, text:I don’t catch the name of the lady in the store today. It was pretty late, close to the closing time. I needed help and she had graciously helped me in picking the right pants, the right colour. Though I had to try many on with shirts and jackets, she was very patient and assisted very kindly. I had an amazing time shopping here and I truly appreciate the kind help. | review_rating:5, text:We passed by and had no intention to buy. But the right shirt caught our eyes and the service was so good, we bought 2 items! | review_rating:5, text:Very good customer service with friendly staff who is willing to explain how to carr for the shirts that we bought. Well done! | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to buy a jacket which was labelled 30% discount on an Sunday night. Upon paying, the cashier told my husband that there’s no discount for the jacket. Initially when I asked, the Indian sales promoter lady confirmed the price labelled was before discount. What a fraud. They should honour what was labelled. However, when I re-checked the jacket a 2nd time, they have secretly removed the 30% discount label. The senior guy cashier called his boss and came up with a “solution” that they can use their staff rate discount to give us 50% discount provided we buy another item from the shop. We agreed to that. As it was a Sunday, he said he can’t do it now as their office is closed. They asked for our phone number and promised to call us the next day which they NEVER did. What a Scammer indeed.

name: POPI SELL HAPPINESS
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:would give a zero star if possible, ordered a customised t -shirt for our friend and she charged us 95 ringgit for the t shirt and printing which is totally fine with us. But when the result came out, the design is not even covering the whole shirt it's just a small section in the middle, when you're thinking of a design of a t-shirt it should be covering the generally area of the t-shirt but we got this instead for RM95, totally unacceptable. ( blurred out our friends face)

ps. it was printed in just 15min, so keep that in mind | review_rating:5, text:Had something very urgent to print while the owner mentioned they usually don't print documents, he was very accommodating and agreed to print without any qualms. Very friendly as well. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recommended!!! I needed some personalized items and this shop did not fail. They also set the delivery to my home address smoothly. The price is reasonable with execellent quality. The shop created my personalized request for multiple items in less than 2 hours. Superb service!! Will promote ur shop to my friends. Thank u so much!!! | review_rating:5, text:Printed some custom items here a few times. Great for last minute gifts. Got my printing done in less than 1 hour. The lady at this shop is friendly | review_rating:1, text:Unreliable . Staff always not at station. Came two Sundays in a row and nobody stationed. Called the number that given for enquiry, she asked to come back 1 hour plus later as she is ‘out’

name: Acer Concept Store
category: electronics_store, wholesaler, store, consultant, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1.AV. 106, 107A, 108, 119, 120A & 121, Asian Avenue, Sunway pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:I had a great experience at the Acer Official Concept Store at Sunway Pyramid. The customer service was friendly, professional, and informative, helping me find exactly what I was looking for. Although the store isn’t very large, it’s well-organized and packed with a good selection of Acer laptops and accessories. I was impressed with the affordable prices and managed to purchase a laptop for under RM3,000. The staff even helped me install antivirus software on the spot, making the entire process smooth and convenient. Highly satisfied with the service here! | review_rating:5, text:I had an excellent experience at the Acer Laptop Store. The staff specially Abullah was friendly and knowledgeable, helping me find the perfect laptop for my needs. The selection was impressive, with various models available at competitive prices. Plus, the warranty options provided extra peace of mind. I highly recommend this store for anyone in the market for an Acer laptop! | review_rating:5, text:I had a FANTASTIC time with Abdullah here. He was very patient, I came several times, had a million questions, and he handled all of it extremely professionally, on top of being super friendly. The products on display are quite variegated, and it seems there a laptop for every type of customer. There's high-end laptops, affordable units, as well as gaming options, and for all of them, the deals are great compared to what I saw in Low Yat. Well done guys! Happy customer :) | review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful experience at the Acer Laptop Store, largely thanks to Abdullah. He was very helpful and well-informed, assisting me in selecting the perfect laptop for my requirements. The store offered a wide variety of models at reasonable prices. Abdullah's friendly support made my visit enjoyable and stress-free. I highly recommend this store for anyone searching for an Acer laptop! | review_rating:5, text:I recently made a purchase of acer swift go 14 in the sunway pyramid acer store. The salesperson (Rehan) was friendly and professional while introducing which model met my study requirements (basic programming and stuff). I really enjoyed the visit and purchase, which came along with affordable student price.

name: OBJET
location: LOT LG-1.96, LG-FLOOR, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:This store offers a wide variety of products for home decoration and enhancement. For living spaces, they have stylish nightstand lamps, decorative candle holders, and elegant ceramic vases.

In the dining area, you can explore their selection of ceramic serving dishes, decorative serving bowls, and charming glass teapots. They also carry glass jars, cups, and containers, perfect for storage and organization.

To add cozy touches around the home, browse their plush door stoppers, dried floral arrangements, and fashionable tissue box holders. You'll also find beautiful rattan baskets for storing household items as well as comfortable cushions in vibrant colors and designs.

Their diverse inventory may have just what you need to create a warm and inviting living environment. With so many stylish options, decorating your dream home is made easy. | review_rating:3, text:Newly opened homewares store on 1st floor within Sunway Pyramid. Concept is very much similar to Hooga so i guess the more the competition, the better for us consumers. Their range is not as diversed as Hooga, but they do have some interesting stuff on display. Pricing is a little more on the high side, but overall its still quite ok. | review_rating:4, text:Exceptionally affordable pricing for homeware, kitchenware and tableware (hardly anything over $30aud!!!)🤯😱

My haul was substantial due to the crazy good deals to be had🤭, and they were very accommodating, wrapping each piece of flatware, as well as allowed me to inspect the tea box before finalising my purchase.

I'd say Objet is the Malaysian equivalent to Kmart here in Sydney. Good value, not the highest quality items but still worth it - For example, the tea box I bought had a knob that I needed to buy the correct screw for, in order for it to sit securely on the lid and thus be functional. Not a deal breaker for me, but would be annoying for those not into figuring out a surprise DIY project 😅🛠 would return nonetheless!

Thanks Objet!!🥰 | review_rating:5, text:In love with this shop all item i want have also have membership right now lot of benefits i get . All staff very helpful and service bring my item to car also will repeat come … | review_rating:5, text:Merchandise are really cute and good overall. But store is quite hard to find.
Its located on LG1 nearby ice skate rink (This should help people pinpoint its location better) rather than current photos and bad address.

name: TIT TAR MAN
location: LG1.087A, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Master Philip at Subway is one if the Best at Tit Tar. I am patient from Indonesia especially came and all muscles bones problems can be immediately cure. this is based in my own experience and I honestly feel very comfortable. it is good to have to regular check on our muscles since relax muscles will ease lots of problems and pain. | review_rating:5, text:I’m very happy with my treatment from Steve and will definitely come back. Very very good and I’ve been to a lot of different chiropractors. Genuinely impressed with his knowledge and technique.
Only thing that I wasn’t expecting was that I won’t be given a change of clothes like in all the other chiro clinics I’ve been to (but they were all in other countries so that’s not their fault, just my wrong assumption) Still would be nice to mention to the customer to wear comfortable clothes or mention it to me at the reception when I’m wearing a skirt. | review_rating:5, text:I have been experiencing back & waist pain for the past few months. After several treatments here at Tit Tar Man, I have gotten much better and definitely sleep more well at night.

Glad that I made the visit! | review_rating:3, text:The establishment looks high-end on the outside. When you walk into the treatment area, it's a rude awakening. Treatment areas are divided only by curtains and you can hear every word and every conversation from the master and his/her patient next to you. To me, this lack of privacy is quite unnerving.

It's also time for the management to consider changing the treatment table. It's kind of disgusting to lie on this disintegrating surface knowing that many others have been in the same position. | review_rating:5, text:Saw the ad from social media and came for the promo. staff was nice and advised clearly about the pricing and services Treatmentwise, the masters are very professional and helpful. targetting your problem area. highly recommended for an alternative to medicine.

name: Paris Baguette
category: bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG1.33A, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:The atmosphere is great, with seating available for both small and large groups.

I ordered the Big Breakfast and upgraded the complimentary black coffee to a latte for an additional RM 5.00.

**Big Breakfast:**
- Taste: 9/10
- Portion: 5/10

The tomato was too large and not grilled for added flavor. It would have been better if it were served in smaller pieces. Additionally, there was only one small piece of bread.

The service was okay, though only one counter was open and card payment was unavailable. However, the food was brought to the table. | review_rating:4, text:Many choices and types of breads, buns and pastries to choose from. They also provide cooked foods such as big breakfast. The buns were quite good, soft, balanced between the sweetness and buttery. Coffee a bit bitter but overall it was hot and nice.

Services were reasonable. Prices were above average. | review_rating:4, text:Garlic Bread with Cream Cheese was very garlicky, with quite a strong raw garlic taste (iykyk). Mushroom soup in bread bowl was abit expensive, and very salty for my taste. Overall, good to try once but would not return again. Plenty of seating options and choices of pastries. | review_rating:1, text:Your staff on New Year’s Eve is disappointing…. How can you serve customer with melted plastic cup??? Please teach them to brew the tea using steel mugs before putting any hot water into plastic cup! You expect me to receive iced drink with dented bottom?? How to stand the cup??? This is so rude for such an establishment! TERRIBLE STAFF SERVICE!

Not only that, he also gave us back torn rotten RM5.00 cash as they cannot accept card or QR at that moment! Useless!

You guys should be PARIS PACK YOUR BAGS! instead of baguette! | review_rating:5, text:Staffs here are friendly especially azfar. He greeted everyone with friendly and charm face. Recommend to sit here and dine. Thank you for letting us dine here and unboxing labubu.

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:So big center only have one working counter, also dint inform need to scan qr for queing number. They just expect us to look for that small qr code( not visible because staff blocking). Many workers walking around are just sales worker | review_rating:1, text:Staff here tend to ignore you like as if you don't exist. Even if you scan for a QR code to queue up properly, they would even end up skipping some numbers registered and they won't even call your attention for it and leave you wondering if someone will assist you or not. When someone is finally assisting us, another customer was prioritized even if we came first. Just horrible experience here unlike in the NU Sentral branch. | review_rating:1, text:Worst experience ever.
Start ticket queueing at 7.30pm
After waiting for over 40minutes, staff said system down. Went for dinner. Come back again at 9pm, 9.15pm 930pm. They said need to wait for the staff that served me earlier. Wasted 2 hours plus for nothing. | review_rating:1, text:You’re welcomed to visit here if you don’t mind getting ignored by the racist staff, queue getting cut, and wasted 2 hours on the spot then got informed that they are no longer supporting Maxis home fibre termination at the centre.

If you didn’t get any response after gotten a case no. (No one calls back), don’t bother to visit service centre because there’s nothing they can do. Just spam calling the hotline until they decided to help you.

Don’t waste your time at this branch people. Also watch out for the staff Mr.Anuar because he will ask you to take a queue number for case follow up which they won’t 🤷🏻‍♀️. | review_rating:5, text:I had an outstanding experience shopping at Maxis Center Sunway Pyramid, thanks to ROY.

From the moment I walked in, he greeted me with a friendly and welcoming attitude.  Roy took the time to listen to my needs and offered helpful suggestions without being pushy.

His knowledge of the products was impressive, and he went above and beyond to ensure I found exactly what I was looking for.

The entire process was smooth, and I left the store feeling valued as a customer. I highly recommend Roy for anyone looking for excellent service.

name: Formosa
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:19.08.2024 Monday My first try at this place. The braised pork rice was quite tasty for me. I ordered their RM13 rice set with tofu and egg. Though it looked small bowl, but it's enough for a small eater like me. Food was hot and it was served quick. I will come back to try other dishes. More people come to eat after 12pm. I was there 1130am and the place was empty. | review_rating:5, text:Always best! Although chicken is getting thinner but the taste from 10 years ago until today is still the same! | review_rating:5, text:We were just walking by this place and saw the huge Taiwanese style fried chicken chop on other people's tables. We had to try it after seeing it. Can smell the Taiwan night market from their foods. | review_rating:4, text:Ordered this set for only RM 13, it has braised meat rice, tofu and braised egg. It doesn't taste like your typical taiwanese braised meat rice, but it has its own unique and delicious taste to it! Portion is just nice too. Highly recommend! | review_rating:4, text:Located within Sunway Pyramid Mall, Formosa is a venerable Taiwanese food stall that has stood the test of time as one of the oldest eateries in this bustling mall. It's a place where Asian comfort food takes center stage, and their Taiwanese Hot Crispy Chicken Rice Set exemplifies this perfectly.

This dish, priced from RM19.50, is a true indulgence. It features crispy, slightly spicy fried chicken served flat out, accompanied by their incredibly flavorful braised sauce and a bed of tofu rice. This combination of textures and flavors is nothing short of addictive.

The Taiwanese Hot Crispy Chicken Rice Set doesn't stop at the chicken alone; it includes a full meal experience. Alongside the crispy chicken, you'll find a serving of braised sauce-topped rice, with the option to add a braised egg, tofu, or both, depending on your preference. To complete the meal, it even comes with a refreshing bubble milk tea.

For those looking to elevate their culinary adventure, an extra plate of Taiwanese sausage is a wise choice. When everything is combined and generously topped with their garlicy chili sambal paste, the flavors harmonize in a symphony of deliciousness that's sure to leave your taste buds dancing.

Formosa has earned its reputation as a go-to spot for students in the area seeking a quick and satisfying lunch or dinner. With its reasonable prices and substantial food portions, it offers a dining experience that's not only delicious but also budget-friendly.

review_rating:1, text:I am a regular customer at lucky gem .Usually, I went to Mid Valley or Lalaport branch. Service at mid valley or lalaport is good . However, This is the first time I went to pyramid branch and the service was terrible. There is a very rude , wearing spec skinny aunty. Her face is like owning her some million dollar and asked her opinion. She is not patient to answer my question.The string prior adjust , she asked me is it to fix at this point. However, it ended up wearing tightly . I asked her to readjust it but she reluctant and mentioned that it is normal and was told that it will loosen after wearing many times . She mentioned that if is consider tight, my hand will have mark. I asked to readjust for 3 times and more she still reluctant and she did not provide me the extra crystal , until I asked it. At the end of day, I wore it for a day and there is really mark on my hand.
I will not visit this branch anymore. Dear management , please ensure a good customer service at this branch. Mid valley or Lala port branch will advise me whether which length fits me. | review_rating:1, text:What a disappointment !
I'm a regular customer of Lucky Gems but, the branch I usually went to is Sunway Velocity and Midvalley. Since I shopping in the mall I decided to went inside for a stringing service.

What a rude long hair, wearing spectacle, skinny aunty ! What do you meant you cannot help to string ? What do you meant you scare the beads will gone or get stolen because too busy with customer ? Hello ! Please use your common sense, I'm sitting at the counter there and you are in front of me. You dare to say, you need to serve customer when half-way stringing my bracelet ?

I already come inside sit there patiently waiting you to finish serve the customer before me,  but when another customer come in you straight ran to her. Hello please, is stringing not worth your time and commission ? Please don't work in this service industry if you have such judging character aunty.

Management please educate your staff before allowing them to serve customer and take our customer complaints seriously. | review_rating:1, text:I was extremely disappointed with the staff working here, she was really rude towards me. I wanted to buy a birthstone for my mother in law, and when I asked her if they sold birthstones here, she raised her voice and never gave me a yes or no answer. I thought I could get advice about the birthstones and how they would be set as well as their charges, but this particular staff who was an older female was very crude in her answers. She should not be working there, I hope the management does something about this. As a customer looking to buy something pricey,I would expect better treatment at the very least. I walked out without even having a look at their selections just because of her rude behaviour. Utterly disappointing! | review_rating:2, text:Bought a rose quartz bracelet from here. Quality varies so choose properly. I asked if the piece I picked is with a discount and the female staff who attended to me calculated the price like as if I’m buying gold! I’m not sure if the final price is fixed or I’ve been cheated but it was within my budget for a gift, so I took it. | review_rating:1, text:I have been a very regular customer of them and on single purchase I spend almost 4-5k but i was away from country for 1 year and once i got back i wanted something specific and since i was staying in my in law house this time in Seremban i didnt want to travel so far away so i called up the shop asking to send 1 pic only of the item the staff was saying the line connection in shop is bad and annoying part is the staff even didnt bother to use their own mobile to send the picture.
