name: Maison Berger Paris
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

But overall, I would still return because of the variety. | review_rating:1, text:Extremely disappointed with 2 foreigners staff on their attitude, wondering why the restaurant able to tolerate such employee
If you take this survey seriously, please review back the CCTV to check the time around 1900 to 2030 | review_rating:1, text:horrible food & bad service.
no one come & approach us when we enter the shop, we go inside & find our own seat.

The food taste so so bad, i don’t recommend anyone to come try it out, but you can try if you want.

the baked cheese pork rice taste so horrible. As u can see from the picture, the rice is not well mixed with the sauce, the texture of the rice is bad as well, weird smell (think they didnt wash the rice properly), the texture of the pork is hard, which i believe it’s a overnight food.

sorry for giving such a bad review, but quality control & taste of the food have to be improved if you want more customer coming in. (this is my honest opinion from my pov, if anyone wanted to try, you are welcome to.) | review_rating:5, text:We had lunch here and found the decor pleasant. Food was served soon after ordering. The set lunch is very worth the price as the food serving is large and comes with soup and coffee or tea in a tall glass. They also have breakfast and all day set meals. | review_rating:2, text:Yesterday tried this Hong Kong-style restaurant and ordered their chicken chop with egg and rice. I was genuinely shocked by the portion size—the egg was the smallest I’ve ever seen, and the chicken chop was so thin it felt like eating paper. Just two small bites and it was gone.

While RM15.90 isn’t expensive, I’ve dined at other Hong Kong-style restaurants in Pyramid, and they consistently serve generous portions. Unfortunately, this place didn’t meet those standards. Even the hot tea was disappointing.

This was my first visit, and it will definitely be my last. Not recommended.

name: CHIC STUDIO
location: Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I purchased a cheongsam from this shop on 20 January 2024 around 8 PM. The boss told me it was the last piece and a display item. I initially hesitated to buy it, but the boss assured me it had only been put on display that morning and was in good condition. He even said, “It’s almost Chinese New Year, and you’re lucky to find one that fits you.”

However, when I prepared to wash it, I found a very noticeable defect on the sleeves, making the dress unwearable. This issue is unacceptable, especially since I trusted their assurance of the dress’s condition.

I have reached out to the shop to request an exchange or refund, but they have completely ignored me. This experience has been incredibly disappointing. Selling defective items while claiming they’re in perfect condition, especially for CNY, shows a lack of professionalism and care for customers.

DO NOT RECOMMEND TO BUY FROM THEM !!!! | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to try the outfit in blue but staff don’t allow. Only can try the size I want in pink. How do I know if I look good in blue or not if I’m not allowed to try ? First time encounter such clothing store that doesn’t allow customer to try on other colour. Wanted to buy it and really like the design but decided to not buy cause staff rude and don’t allow to try. 😅 | review_rating:1, text:I understand that customers have to queue to enter the store as it is quite small. However, we ended up waiting for a very long time (over 30 minutes). The ladies in front of us had already gone in, shopped, and left, yet we were still stuck outside like 🤡. The staff wouldn’t let us in, even though there were very few customers inside, while the queue outside kept growing.
What a terrible queue management. Also a lady casually walked in, supposedly to ask about her daughter’s clothes, but ended up browsing for herself ☺️, knowing that she’s cut the queue but still act dumb (or maybe she’s just dumb ☺️). The staff saw it happen and just acted like nothing was wrong 🤷🏻‍♀️. I would never enter this shop again 🙂 | review_rating:1, text:Although the clothes are nice, the staff's attitude is extremely negative. During Chinese New Year, they exhibit a type of expression that implies they have no money to buy their clothes like that. And I also saw a lot of negative reviews about the staff. If the shop's attitude remains unchanged, I will make a complaint to Sunway Pyramid Management. | review_rating:1, text:If I could give zero stars, I would. The service was absolutely terrible. The queue was incredibly long, and when we asked if we could go in—especially since most of the customers inside had already left—the staff told us to wait. To make matters worse, a customer blatantly cut the queue and went in, and the staff didn’t even bother to address it. This level of service is unacceptable

name: Ole-Ole Bali
location: G1.136, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:As a plant-based diner, finding a satisfying meal at a predominantly meat-centric restaurant can be a challenge, but Ole Ole Bali at Sunway Pyramid pleasantly surprised us with its thoughtful vegetarian options.

During a recent lunch treat by my boss, I opted for the Grilled Vege Ciabatta, a delightful combination of chargrilled vegetables nestled in a warm, crusty ciabatta. The flavors were well-balanced, and the fresh ingredients made for a hearty and satisfying bite. Accompanying my meal was the Lemongrass Mojito, an incredibly refreshing drink that was the perfect antidote to the sweltering afternoon heat. The vibrant mix of lemongrass and mint was both cooling and invigorating—highly recommended for those looking for a non-alcoholic thirst-quencher.

While my colleagues enjoyed their respective meals, I truly appreciated the effort put into crafting a flavorful and well-prepared plant-based option. Ole Ole Bali may not be a fully vegetarian restaurant, but it certainly caters to those seeking fresh, wholesome, and delicious plant-based alternatives.

Here are some pictures of our meals—because good food deserves to be shared! | review_rating:4, text:Excellent ambience. Makes you feel you are in Bali more than Malaysia. Food presentation is good & food is served relatively quickly. The portion is huge and more than adequate for two persons to share. Only the grilled chicken seems a bit tough. Would have been better if they had used fresh chicken. | review_rating:3, text:2nd visit to this chain restaurant.

Personally the dishes aren't quite my taste, everything seems a bit bland or not much flavor n  too oily for me either grilled or fried dish.

The same side dish is served at every rice set dish.

Chicken chop looks a bit over fried, it is a bit too dry.

Grill chicken is very oily.

Original serving of the pulut hita drink is too sweet... Should request for less sugar.

Somehow the food presentation is awesome.

Everyone has got different expectations n preferences on food taste.

The management has a great way of promoting the restaurant with a free birthday meal...... | review_rating:5, text:Big portion. We only ordered 2 mains and a dessert, and left the place full! Delicious grilled chicken and nasi campur. The pisang bakar dessert was outstanding as well. The wait can be a little long. | review_rating:5, text:Loved this restaurant! It has a stunning Bali vibe, and the decor is simply amazing, perfectly complementing the Indo-Bali cuisine. It was our first visit, as we came to celebrate a birthday. All the dishes were great, the Tipat Cantuk stood out as my favorite.

Visited on a weekday around 7pm and waited about 20 minutes in front of the restaurant after receiving a waiting number. A phone call/watsapp notification for our turn would have been more convenient.

name: Shiino Pieces
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Went for a quick window shopping but ended up buying lots of items! Mazni was very friendly and convince me to join the Ongoing promotion 😄
Together with Dania and belle i finally convinced! Thank
You for the great help and friendliness. Appreciate it all! 🥰 | review_rating:5, text:I recently visited Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall and had a fantastic experience at the Foot Locker store. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making our shopping experience a delight. We bought Nike sport shoes for my daughter, and she absolutely loves them. The staff member who assisted us was exceptionally helpful, ensuring we found the perfect pair. His welcoming attitude and smiley face made everything smooth and enjoyable. Thank you for the wonderful experience! We will definitely be coming back. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Yi Shien, one of the new workers that started recently was super friendly and ecstatic to work and sell shoes, i can see the passion in her that this is what God has called her to do. The Lord will gift her mountainous blessings | review_rating:5, text:Big shoutout to Jordon for being super helpful and patient with me! Just got my very first pair of New Balance 530s. Thanks again, Jordon! ✌🏻☺️ | review_rating:5, text:Excellent service from staffs named Suvarn, Jordan, Sahrul. Will definitely recommend this to my friends and relatives. Thumbs up!!

name: Jipinhe Scones
location: LG2.38B, Lower Ground 2, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:What they called scone is basically pastry with meat inside (like pie). It's actually pretty good when eaten warm. But the dumpling is so terrible I cant finish it. The skin is too thick, inside is nothing but egg white with a little bit of meat. And they dont sell water only some sweet bottled drinks that is too sweet and tastes a bit weird | review_rating:4, text:Have seen this Jipinhe Scones in Grab Food for quite some times but was hesitant to order because I never had Chinese Style Scone before ~ until one day i decided to order and found it was actually very delicous & their Chilled Sour Plum Juice was nice too. Just to highlight ~ there is limited seat and table (in fact just a small store) so avoid peak hours if want to dine-in. | review_rating:5, text:Was looking for a place to eat & chanced upon this eatery. Decided to try when I saw Hot & Sour Potato Noodles as I like Hot & Sour soup. Ordered that, Spicy Red Oil Dry Noodles with Herb Braised Drumstick, & Cumin Lamb Scones. Surprisingly tasty & flavourful. I really enjoyed all the dishes ordered & wished I had more tummy space for more scones flavour. Chilled Sour Plume Juice for drinks - must try! | review_rating:5, text:2 out of 5 of the bun we bought took a bite was sour, rotten and smelly.

They acknowledge and we got the refund for 2.
Case close. | review_rating:3, text:To be honest the signature sour noodle was not to our liking , potato noodle was so so , soup was meh 🫤. Waited more than 20 mins for food and I wonder why when there’s not much customer . The Chinese scones was nice though ( outer pastries taste like curry puff flaky type , just the filling here more choices to choose )

name: Esquire Kitchen
location: Lot G1 - 42A, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Dinner at Esquire on a weekday night was superb. Friendly service. Food served quickly, was tasty n good portion. Not crowded. With fish n drinks, bill came up to about rm50+ per head. | review_rating:4, text:We ordered the Mapo Taufu, fried shanghai dumpling and stir fried chicken with paprika, the dishes are quite big portion even we ordered small size. The Mapo taufu taste just nice, not so spicy or salty. While the stir fried chicken with paprika was a bit salty. The fried shanghai dumpling taste delicious. The environment was very clean, spacious and comfortable. | review_rating:4, text:Some of the dishes are really good. The sauteed eggplant is very nice. The dumplings is also good. The lotus root soup is just so so and also the fried beehoon. Overall ok, price is a bit expensive | review_rating:2, text:Haven’t been to Esquire for a long time. Then, i would say a 4 ⭐️ but this day, sigh…
We had:
- dumpling - the pork inside was warm not hot. But the kids like them.
- sweet and sour chicken - chicken has that strong overnight chicken taste. Nothing special. I ate more of the onions than the chicken.
- HK Kailan - huge kailan and were not properly cut. It was kind of difficult to eat. Taste wise nothing special. Just blenched vegetables with some sauce that were not that great
- soup - we order peanut soup and lotus root soup. One soup came. Piping hot. Which was good. But taste wise…not that great. Kids who loves soup didnt even finished it. The other soup, waiter came much later to say peanut soup no more. So we changed it to pig stomach. It didnt make it to our table till we almost finished our meal. And the soup wasnt even hot. Never had double boiled soup like that before. The boil was only medium warm 😣
- drinks - ordered 3 only 2 came. 😵‍💫 | review_rating:3, text:Got pulled in because seen the Hot and spicy soup, and the Xiao Long Bao from their menu, and no queue. (Maybe that is not a good sign, on Saturday evening, in one of the most busy mall in town)

Price wise on the dishes portion is consider cheap, in a mall. But the taste……

Dong Po rou 东坡肉, will say is very disappointed, soy sauce with some lettuce? Xiao Long Bao, seriously, nothing like Xiao Long Bao, if it just call it pork dumplings will be fine. Mixed vegetables stir fried prawns, just taste of oyster sauce 😂

In general, food quality is quite poor.

name: LAVENDER
category: bakery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2-45 & LG2-46, Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Purchased 1 pandan gula melaka , craving for it so bad but doesn’t meet my expectations. Cake was bit bland , dry and very mild taste of pandan also no kick for the gula melaka | review_rating:4, text:It was terrible when I just tried it at very first time in City Square, JB in 2007, and forget about the outlets in Klang Valley, it was worst. BUT until few years back, when it started opened in Mid Valley, Pavilion Bukit Bintang and now in Sunway Pyramid, it has improved and changed with 360 degree with better taste, texture, more innovative and in trend. But my sister in Singapore is still complaining for the taste in Singapore. Anyway, well done and keep up the good work! Recommend to try the new items- Flat Croissant and Le Crookie, it is delicious to eat together with coffee. The cashier (Malay lady with black tudung) did not ask for membership number even I showed my membership number, when back home only noticed that they is no 10% discount on both new launch promotion item, please train and brief your staff wisely | review_rating:4, text:Seems one of the nicest bakeries in the mall, but still nothing “above”. Tried sweet potato bun - looks nice, tastes like ordinary bun with a bit of sweet potato filling inside.
Hanjuku mini cheesecakes were okay.
Liked prune lapis though. Probably the best from what I got there | review_rating:4, text:One of the better bakeries around.

Decor is clean and simple.

Prices are reasonable where there are lots of choices.

Good place for your daily bread. | review_rating:5, text:My personally favourite bakery in Malaysia. So many options of sweet or savory pastries and they are not boring at all many interesting and new flavours or seasonal variations too. Very soft and fresh. Please check the pictures for more details. I will come back, enjoy 😋

name: Jaya Grocer
category: grocery_store, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2-130, Lower Ground Floor 2, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Jaya Grocer at Sunway Pyramid was an overwhelming experience, earning it 3 stars. The store was packed with people, and the atmosphere felt chaotic, making it difficult to shop comfortably. The crowd seemed impatient, adding to the sense of suffocation as I navigated the aisles. While the selection of products is good, I would much prefer grocery shopping in a setting that feels calm and organized. For those planning a visit, I recommend coming during quieter times to avoid the busy rush. Overall, it’s a decent grocery spot but best enjoyed when the crowds are minimal. | review_rating:5, text:12 November 2024 - Yes! finally it is opened at the permanent location, congratulations! It look good and cozy but it is below my expectations due to space as it is not as big as the branches in Jaya Shopping Centre PJ, Starling Mall PJ and Sunway GEO Avenue. Anyway, so far so good but lots of work on improvement on shelf arrangements, merchandise displays and stabilisation of the self service cashier check out counters need to be done, as this is the very good potential location in Subang Jaya area.

Before November 2024 - This is the 2nd temporary outlet after forced to moved down from LG2 due to major renovation after AEON moved out (after 20 years there) from the mall. This time the outlet look more better feel with space & more variety of items. Hope it can be ready with permanent outlet at LG2 by December 2024 for Christmas with big space & different from others outlet | review_rating:1, text:I rarely give bad reviews but i've bought a tray of kampung eggs (exp. far away) from Jaya Grocer Sunway Pyramid on Dec 24, 2024—6-7 were rotten and black.

Raised a serious food safety concern with Nutriplus and customer service, but the response was pathetic. Days passed with no meaningful reply or action. No escalation to a manager, no urgency, just radio silence. And to top it off, they tried upselling me in their response? Are you kidding? Food safety isn’t optional—this should’ve been addressed immediately, with proper follow-up and resolution.

Jaya Grocer CS, learn from ZUS Coffee  they don’t mess around when customers raise valid concerns. Step it up. | review_rating:1, text:12/2/24 , just bought crispy roast pork at jaya grocer sunway pyramid costs me $18.67 but gave me all hard skin n not fresh one. i used to buy at jaya grocer empire subang n no issue. my son used to eat tis but tis time he was upset as all are hard skin n cant eat at all. super duper angry n cheated ppl $ | review_rating:4, text:Great place to stock up on food and supplies. It is basically the Fairprice of Malaysia, only comparable to Lotus or  Costco. Many foods that are imported from the US, and honestly a whole lot of people. More checkouts should definitely be implemented. Otherwise, this is a great supermarket as a whole!

name: Toys 'R' us
location: Lot G2.13, LG2, 15,16, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:One of the fastest outlets to get the newest and hottest stocks, especially HotWheels. Plethora of cars to choose from so that you confirm will not leave empty handed. Shoutout to Hikmah for being extremely helpful and friendly! | review_rating:5, text:if you are a toy collector then this is heaven on earth for you. every toy that your collector's heart could ever want would most definitely be here! last time i went here i bought a draculaura g3 doll and she is so beautiful. store is very wide and has a very wide selection from new movie merchandise to gundams. damn near bought the barbie movie dolls but later.... next time.... one day....... | review_rating:5, text:Very patient staff handling difficult customers👍🏼The female staffs are very well trained and they wrapped the gifts very quickly! I am very impressed n will come back again to purchase more toys! Kudos to ToysRus Sunway for having amazing staffs.. I believe the female staff name is Aina but the other girl is great too but I didn't remember her name👏🏼👏🏼 | review_rating:1, text:ive went here a few times but when i went with my group of friends there was a rude staff (short, middle part hair, male, malay). when i was looking at other stuff, my group of friends got shouted at because they were testing the silent basketball?? never coming back. toys r us needs to retrain the staff in this outlet. other than that while the staff was walking to my friends, he hit me with his shoulder very hard and acted like it was an accident, even though no way that you saw someone but still hit someone with so much pressure. | review_rating:5, text:Die-cast collectors heaven! Every brand you need! HotWheels, Matchbox, Majorette, Jada, they have it here! Check by often and you might get lucky and catch a restock and score your favourite cars! Super friendly and helpful staff, especially Hikmah!

name: Medifeet
location: No. F1.87B, First Floor, Orange Atrium, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 46100 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Shop assistant very helpful to let us try different type of patterns, for exercise & office wear.

Member Birthday month with 10% discount.

Finally decided to buy 2pairs.

Take sometime to locate the venue.

Closed, renovated & newly open. | review_rating:5, text:Purchased a pair today. Excellent customer service from Ms May. She handled 2 customers at the same time but never did I feel ignored. Great service and friendly. Happy with my purchase. | review_rating:4, text:For me the service was fine. They suggest few sandals for me. My only concern no discounts. Medifeet need to provide discounts on 2nd purchase at least. Hehehe. | review_rating:5, text:Store Staff, Ms Zakiah is a very efficient and highly motivated. She was alone and managed to multitasking handling 2 customer at one time. She is a real asset to the company. The shoes are always great and long lasting too. | review_rating:1, text:Sales assistant service is OK, just some may not be well trained, dun really manage to provide for alternative or not sure the shoe models/series.

And don't expect must have professional foot diagnostic and expert prof advice like other medical footwear brand. If you are just looking for comfort shoe, this is OK for a try~

They are no support for exchange. With few hundreds pay price, better check out other medical footwear brand like Spenco, Medisole, MyFeet. Others may have diagnostic and expertise in shop, and most of them support exchange after sell. Just humble sharing 😊

name: Mr. Tuk Tuk
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Always be me & husband's favourite Thai restaurant. This time we have tried their new menu set which contain fish, veges, white rice & drinks for 2 pax. Absolutely delicious! The price is affordable, the ambience is great. And the service from staff was top notch! We love Mr Tuk Tuk so much❤️ | review_rating:5, text:This iconic Thai green papaya salad strikes the perfect balance of spicy, sour, salty, and sweet. The crisp shredded papaya, crunchy peanuts, and a punch of lime make it incredibly refreshing. A must-try for those who love bold and vibrant flavors! | review_rating:3, text:Review by expat Londoner:
Yet another Thai restaurant I visited in search of the perfect Mango sticky rice pudding. Before that we ordered the Pineapple rice served in a pineapple, Laksa, Chicken wings, a set meal and fried rice. The sticky rice was so sticky we needed a knife to cut it through, the coconut milk was too salty, the Laksa had an underwhelming flavour but the show stealers were the green chilli sauce that was the condiment on the table and minced chicken that came with the set meal. We were served a drink with the set meal that had an aftertaste of cough syrup. I still gave it 3 stars for food because the mango was nice and the fried rice and the pineapple rice were enjoyed by my friends. The chicken was described to be juicy and tender. | review_rating:4, text:I ordered the Thai Laksa coz I was curious as to how it tastes like. It tasted amazing! It is like an enhanced version of the northern asam laksa. Really tasty.

However, the portion that came was really, really small. I spoke to the waitress about it, saying that it’s really small for the price charged. Without question asked, she came back with more noodles for me. Great service!

My wife had the pineapple fried rice set and it also tasted really nice. | review_rating:5, text:Came from Sabah and wanted to try something new in Sunway pyramid. To my surprise their food actually tasted good, the food was made with authentic flavour. Ordered their special looking pineapple fried rice and it has good taste with fresh shrimp. The pandan chicken set was good too accompanied with fish. Will come again next time

name: Miga
location: LG2.38, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Lower Ground One, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Overall, good quality halal Korean food. The jaejangmyeon is really good. However, my favorite is the grilled chicken that comes with rice. Personally I love meat a lot so to see that there's more chicken than rice served is something awesome for me.

The chicken is tender, flavor filled and juicy too. I finished everything including all the onions that come with it.

A recommended place for simple, homely Korean food 😁 | review_rating:3, text:Limited choice of food, basically they have soup/jigae, noodle and kimbap. Food is just ok for me. The rabokki is spicy. The kimbap was abit dry for me.

The seating area is limited and the table is small. You’ll need to pay your food right after ordering. | review_rating:2, text:This place used to be good years ago, but not anymore. There is a noticeable quality drop. Yukgaejang and Kimchi Jjigae are not as flavourful as before. The pancakes (pajeon) tasted like the dough used was diluted. I gave low rating for service because I am wondering why were certain customers asked to pay first when ordering before the food arrived, and some are able to pay after they finish eating? This is the last time I come here and never coming again. There are many other nicer Korean restaurants nearby | review_rating:2, text:Hmmm, I was here because everywhere else was full. Tried a few dishes here. But everything is not at my liking. Im sorry. But maybe you can take care of your dishes more. Or was it just because it was kind of express outlet. The place is super small too. Its not convinient. | review_rating:3, text:Kimchi fried rice and kimbap was nice but the tteokbokki was absolutely disappointing. The rice cake had no taste. Not chewy also.

name: Future Land
location: F1, 20, Sunway Pyramid Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:This is a VR place and I had lots of fun being here with my friends. There are over 5 VR games and all of them are fun. IMO, the best game is the exo jet - we were in the rollercoaster and turned 360 degrees. Worth to try! | review_rating:5, text:Israfil and the team were fantastic! Had an amazing time with the VR games—totally next level! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a fun experience. | review_rating:5, text:The customer service is so good and the facilities here are really fun and also the price is cheap too. Especially the staff “Karam” really providing a good service for us. Support! | review_rating:5, text:It is really fun especially for the 360 exo jet and the staff here named Karam is really kindful and nice service. Enjoyed playing here. | review_rating:5, text:We had a fun time playing their VR games here. Brought my little cousins here and they had a great experience. The staff were friendly too.

name: ATM Maybank E-Kawanku
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

location: Lot G-1.39, Sunway Pyramid Mega Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:Royal Selangor here is a small but reasonably well-supplied outlet with wide variety of branded souvenirs and friendly personnel. It isn't easily trackable, but worth visiting. | review_rating:5, text:Went there to get a retirement gift for 1 of my bosses. Got him a mug, for him to enjoy his morning coffee ;). The staff, Emily was very helpful. She expertly helped to nicely wrap the box with a ribbon. Store doesn't keep large number of stocks, better call to check with the staff on the items availability. | review_rating:4, text:The sales associate that attended me was really friendly but I do wish they had more options for cuff links. Lucky coin or a cloud design for a loved one is appropriate any time of the year though. | review_rating:4, text:stunning | review_rating:5, text:I like the staff

name: Lovisa
location: G1.52, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:My daughters had their ears pierced for the first time. What a pleasant experience it was. Would like to specially mention the Store Manager, Ross for her patience and excellent customer service in explaining to us the best options for my girls. And to top it off, Lovisa issued a Certificate of Bravery to both my girls. For parents who want to have their girls ears pierced for the first time, Lovisa is strongly recommended especially the Sunway Pyramid outlet. Service at the best. Thanks Ross for making it a memorable experience for the girls 🤼‍♀️ | review_rating:5, text:Ross did an amazing job piercing my daughter’s ears. She was really scared, but Ross was incredibly patient and gentle, making her feel comfortable throughout the whole process. The two free gifts to comfort her were such a thoughtful touch. Highly recommend Ross for anyone looking for a great piercing experience, especially if you’re nervous! | review_rating:5, text:Got our piercings done today, and was rlly in love with the service by a lady named Ross. The store do look like they needed more assistance tho, but despite that she’s the only one is store at that moment, she was rlly patience with every customer with their questions and also providing services to them. She was assuring me that she’ll come to me too to get my piercing done cuz the store that time was packed with customers. Overall a great experience, would definitely recommend anyone that’s looking to get their piercings done here. | review_rating:5, text:I did my first set of lobe piercings here! I entered the store to browse, but one of the staff there, Ross, started a conversation with me and that's when I asked about their piercing services.
I was planning to get needle piercing elsewhere at first but because Ross was helpful and knowledgeable, I ended up coming back here for their hand-pressure piercing.
Was pierced by Ross, who made me feel comfortable throughout - the whole thing was super quick and painless! It's been a week now and following the aftercare advice my ears are healing nicely with no swelling and minimal pain.
I've been to other Lovisa branches and honestly I am usually skeptical of the staff's skills but this Sunway Pyramid branch proved me wrong, they are professional, friendly and helpful.
I'll be back here for some surgical steel or titanium earrings once my healing period is up 🙌🏼 | review_rating:5, text:Went for piercing today, the Malay lady was super attentive and thank you for piercing very professionally!

If there’s anymore piercings I’d like to do in the future or to recommend my friends I would definitely recommend!! ☺️

location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Rides are ok but games are a scam. The duck catching game has way more #1 than any other number. Ring toss score of 500 is also abit crazy to hit! | review_rating:1, text:The cashier cheated customers!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬
Asked for Day Pass ticket but he tried to pusing2 tell u got 2 types: the ring type no refund and the card type got refund….🤷‍♂️
A normal human being sure buy the one w card got refund right😅 So I pay exactly RM60 for the Day Pass under the card type!!

After 6 plays then he said NO! Tis card is not the Day Pass! All ur balance in the card finished need to top up to again!😮
Bro! I wanted the card type why I pay u exactly RM60??!!😤

After tat I complaint to the Mgmt then only he refund to me….🙄 and I told him I’ll donate out tis money to others and don’t CHEAT again!! | review_rating:5, text:Price for kids park. Reasonable | review_rating:1, text:In the past i had never give poor rating,but this is my first time because your park worker is so rude,my card was accidentally deducted twice by park worker and I was asking nicely but got impatient and shockingly rude response(sorry not just disrespectful,is shockingly rude) as if I owe him money !!!was a frequent visitor but this will be the last time i set my foot in this place. | review_rating:5, text:This place is childish for me. But good for my little sisi! :-)

name: NANYANG CAFE
location: G1.PT.07, Level Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:First things first, the food is very good.

Straight to the point we ordered their famous wanton noodles and butter buns and they were out of this world.

Their other food items like we ordered such as Luncheon meat noodles and rice , and yam bun were okay at best but still acceptable as they tasted very fresh and weren't too salty which means the limited usage of MSG which is a positive in my books 👍🏻

However, the reason why I'm rating it a 4 star is the delay of the food arrival as I understand there are a lot of customers but the kitchen staff should combat this and push dishes out quicker.

Environment wise, the cafe is very clean and has a vibrant decor which makes it welcoming for potential customers. There is an open window area on the side for people to look outside and embrace the nature where you can even see Sunway University in the distance.

If you are looking for a quick snack or have no idea what you should eat in a mall as big as Sunway Pyramid, then this place could be suitable 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:November 2024. Had a great lunch here with good choices for elderly parents and kids alike. Some items were missed out but it didn't take long for them to serve it after we reminded the staff about them. Staff were definitely very accommodating and helpful. Food is consistent since the last few times we were here. | review_rating:3, text:Noodle nothing special and the vegetable is not fresh (see photo). Luckily didn't find any worms. Had the Seafood option, limited items, just few pieces prawn and fish (compare advertised photo vs actual served). The peanut polo bun is good. Waiter not so attentive providing stained cutlery. Have a good view of the lagoon. | review_rating:2, text:limited menu, poor location. definitely not worth coming unless you are staying in the hotel.

wantan noodles are second to the Sahara desert in terms of dryness, dumplings are ok. | review_rating:3, text:UPDATE: The food standard here has dropped. From 5 stars, I have no choice but to give 3 stars as the taste of the dishes does not meet expectations. But the staff here are as helpful and service is fast. Seating is still comfortable. It’s just the dishes have suffered. What a shame.

This place looks great and the food tastes great. The staff are very attentive to your order and will even clear your plates when you’re done. The noodles’ texture is sparingly and slightly chewy. I loved the pork trotters noodle and really enjoyed it. The serving is generous. Most notable is the Ying Yang coffee and tea combo. It’s aromatic and… just really nice. Not easy to find good coffee tea combo done right.

From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I want to express my appreciation for Simon's outstanding service. name: Lazo Diamond
location: N 0, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Bought a bracelet from this branch. 5 star service from staff Joana. I needed my bracelet shorten and she went up and beyond to make sure that I get my bracelet back within such a short period of time. Happy with service | review_rating:5, text:Very good service by ms Joana. She is very Detail-oriented and always gave professional advice. Really appreciate her nice service👍 | review_rating:5, text:I want to say thank you so much to Joana, for helping me choose my new pendant. & also for being so patient (I did come back 2 days later to exchange my pendant design😆). Best customer service 🫶🏻
This is my first purchase from Lazo Diamond.
and I’m really impressed on the white gold selections. Everything is so nice + trendy designs.
If you’re a fan of white gold & diamonds, please come here & look for Joana. She deserves a raise!
Will definitely come back again☺️ | review_rating:5, text:Bought my necklace and ring from sales advisor - Clay, he’s very attentive and patient. I love how he’s friendly and helpful to us, will definitely come back and look for him again if I ever need to purchase any jewelry in future ! | review_rating:4, text:First time to this outlet. Purchased a ring, chain and pendant. Except for one male staff member, the rest of the ladies were not bothered at all about hospitality. They 'forgot' to smile 😳
To that one person who took the time to be so helpful, thank you. Keep up the great job Carl and all the best!! 👍😊😊😊 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

**Please train your staff to be courteous to anyone who walks in the store even if they are just coming in to look. Thank you #BeLikeCarl 😊

name: The Elixir Kombucha
location: F1.K2A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very refreshing hand crafted Kombucha. Many flavors including first ever coffee kombucha. Interesting flavors. Tasted many in the market, this stands out.
Certainly will buy on regular basis as it is good for my guts. | review_rating:5, text:I really like the their kombucha especially the pink guava and the emerald amber flavour. Pink guava is my TOP 1. Definitely have to try this flavour if you are a kombucha lover. If you are not a kombucha lover but u would like to try then I would recommend the emerald amber flavour. | review_rating:5, text:The kombucha here is the best I've ever had—so fresh and flavourful! I love that they use great quality ingredients. The staff is fantastic; they’re always so cheerful and helpful. It’s clear they’re passionate about what they do. This place is a must-visit! 🩷 | review_rating:5, text:Great tasting kombucha! Loved all the flavours and the range they have. The coffee kombucha was a surprise, but I would totally repeat it. 10/10 will definitely come again! | review_rating:5, text:Still the best kombucha i’ve tasted, unlike other kombucha its not super sour. Balance between sweet and sour. Also love their pineapple flavour, I have bought at least 5 bottles already!! They have coffee kombucha also which was smtg new I have never seen before. Worth coming back again!

Asked for Day Pass ticket but he tried to pusing2 tell u got 2 types: the ring type no refund and the card type got refund….🤷‍♂️
A normal human being sure buy the one w card got refund right😅 So I pay exactly RM60 for the Day Pass under the card type!!

Bro! I wanted the card type why I pay u exactly RM60??!!😤

After tat I complaint to the Mgmt then only he refund to me….🙄 and I told him I’ll donate out tis money to others and don’t CHEAT again!! | review_rating:5, text:Price for kids park. The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: AsterSpring
location: LG 1.97, Lower Ground One, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful experience at AsterSpring! The staff Janet was incredibly professional, and the environment was calm and relaxing. My facial treatment left my skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Highly recommend for anyone looking to pamper themselves with quality skincare treatments! | review_rating:5, text:Janet provides very good service. Always love a good therapeutic session with aster spring! | review_rating:5, text:Aster Spring excels in service, and Tracy Tham, the Manager, personifies their commitment.
Tracy's outstanding leadership and customer-centric approach make each visit memorable.
The entire staff, under Tracy's guidance, goes above and beyond, showcasing exceptional
customer service. Highly recommend for skincare needs! | review_rating:1, text:I did the acne targeted facial here “acne recovery therapy” and I’m not happy at all at the results after two facials. The skin on my face is more sensitive and prone to spots than ever. I have started to get breakouts on my chin which I have never done before! My pores are more open I feel which is where the breakouts come from. the forehead also have stubborn breakouts that won’t go even with 2 months on highly rated dermalogica products such as the “age bright serum” which was super expensive yet has done little for my breakouts. Before this acne treatment, my “acne” was hardly noticeable and persistent but after this treatment it is due to my skin being more sensitive. I am extremely disappointed and frustrated. As I am from abroad and was only staying at Malaysia for short-term, I am not able to make a complaint in person or fight to get compensation - so I leave this review to warn other customers. If your skin breakouts aren’t severe and inflammatory, just go for natural treatments. This one was intensive and only made my skin worse. | review_rating:5, text:I have been a member of Aster Spring from the time it opened till present and Tracy (Sunway Pyramid branch) has always been very helpful, polite and I just love her facials plus product recommendations. My daughter too loves her facials and is always very happy with her service. Am going to sign up for facials for my son as well. Kathy too has always been polite and helpful. Love the service we get at this branch! They’re both assets to the company. Keep up the great work!

name: Loong Kee
location: LG2.72, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Bought 2 cans of their seaweed pork floss at RM14.90 each, ended up throwing away both cans as it has a plastic smell and taste. Totally inedible. A total waste of money. | review_rating:1, text:**Review:**

I recently visited this shop to buy chicken coin and had an extremely disappointing experience. I paid RM 12.25 using my debit card, and I received an SMS confirmation of the transaction. Additionally, the charge was reflected in my bank account. Despite having proof of payment, the staff insisted that I pay again, claiming they did not receive the payment.

When I refused to pay a second time, the situation escalated quickly. The staff member became visibly angry and started throwing the debit machine around, creating a very hostile and uncomfortable environment. Their behavior was completely unprofessional and showed a total lack of respect for customers.

I was shocked by the poor service and the aggressive reaction of the staff. This kind of treatment is unacceptable, and I will definitely not be returning to this shop. I strongly advise others to avoid this place due to their terrible customer service and disrespectful staff. | review_rating:5, text:Many people queue up to buy at their store during Saturday. CNY is coming soon. This is our must eat CNY food.
We ate with Hainam Bread is so delicious ! | review_rating:4, text:Updated in January 2024

My go to store to purchase annual Chinese New Year gift sets for our loved ones.

This outlet is a bit compact, so it could be a tight squeeze for their potential customer or a bit of a turn off for them to enter. | review_rating:1, text:Change your staff 's attitude, can't even listen to what customers say first.. We cannot  communicate with the staff.. Dk is stpd la or what . The lady who served us is blonde hair lady.

name: Clicknet Service Centre
category: cell_phone_store, electronics_store, consultant, wholesaler, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1.AV, 92, 93, 95, 96, 97 & 98, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:it was a very good experience purchased my first laptop here. The sales assistant which is Mr. Noor was very helpful to convince me from the beginning. He also helped me to install the software that i want. Overall 5 star rating! | review_rating:5, text:A very good assist from the staff name Zam.

Explain every product, give a good comparison between different product, pro and cons.

All item sold was checked after payment to make sure all working properly. Really recommend the shop. | review_rating:5, text:Purchased ASUS vivobook go 15” here, very good service, it’s already my 3rd purchase here. They accept trade in service which I think is extra good service. | review_rating:5, text:Bought our Dell laptop computer at the above shop and was served by this young Indian nationality gentleman Mr Noor .

He was knowledgeable / patient / friendly guy in explaining the products to us which eventually we purchased the dell laptop & other accessories . ( the purchase was done is Feb 2024 - after CNY ) .

Fast forward to today 13/10/24 where we have some minor issues that require the assistance from the shop especially with the power bank ( malfunction & within warranty period )

. Mr Noor was still around and we were delighted to see him . Like always , he attended to us with his usual Smiling and friendly service  and quickly diagnosed our malfunction power bank purchased but attempt failed , suggested try to claim for us from the supplier but not guarantee the replacement which we agreed .

We bought some extra accessories from him too .

This shop indeed is a good place to shop for all electronic gadgets though . They even have a repair centre which is adjacent to the shop . Overall , it’s a good experience shopping & with excellent after sale service

(To the owner , you should reward the good staffs that can draw more customers to the shop & it’s not easy to get one good nowadays ) . Keep it up  !! Thanks | review_rating:5, text:The service is really good, I was thoughtfully guided as per my request.

From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: A&W
location: Lot LG2.42A, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:[holiao]
1) Overall - Fast food chain selling various of food such as root beer, waffle, fried chicken, coney, float and more, almost self service, spacious seating with washing basin provided by
A&W at Sunway Pyramid
2) coney - juicy coney with generous of minced beef gravy, highly recommended
3) mozza burger - tender and juicy beef patty, flavorful, fluffy bun, must try
4) curly fries - never disappoint
5) waffle - tasted good, fluffy and fragrant | review_rating:1, text:Gee thanks a&w for serving my rootbeer in a broken mug while not providing any straws anymore, very progressive of you. Like bro what if people are physically challenged and need a straw genius at least have some in stock. And broken mugs cannot throw? Clearly not the first knock this mug experienced and yall still continue serving this. Whats worse is i got served brown straight cut fries when my order says curly fries. I get it yall think your customers can’t tell shapes apart lmao | review_rating:1, text:I had a disappointing experience at this A&W outlet, primarily due to the poor food quality which was notably inconsistent. The waffles were unappealing, appearing artificial and were served cold and overly crispy. The ice cream was haphazardly presented in fragments rather than in a complete, rounded scoop. Additionally, the curly fries were served cold, suggesting they had been sitting out for hours. The root beer float lacked fizziness and was served without a straw, which was inconvenient. Furthermore, the spoon provided for the float was incorrect; it wasn’t the long spoon typically used for such drinks. This experience was starkly inferior compared to what I’ve previously enjoyed at other A&W locations abroad. Very disappointing overall. | review_rating:4, text:Nice roots beer n orange juice , but the need to beware of the floor skirting near the front counter, see lots of ppl nearly fall due to uneven floor skirting | review_rating:5, text:1. Black pepper mushrooms nice, beef soft & mantap

2.chicken sedap, saiz besar.

3. Add on bun ice cream RM4.00 price affordable.

4.rootbear rasa maintain sedap..

5. Good service from Staff Nadirah & dapat free  lagi air botol..

6. Staff Nadirah help me to order with service kiosks

name: Lacoste
location: G1.33, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Very poor service despite no one bother when you go in and when asked if got sell shoes sales very rude answer | review_rating:1, text:Bought a sling bag for my husband for his birthday from Lacoste Sunway Pyramid. After 9 days of using it (Yes, just 9 days!) the paint on the logo came off. We went in and request for an exchange or refund or ANY sort of solution with the original receipt and tag because it was clearly faulty. The lady that was “in-charged” says they can’t do anything. It is clearly faulty that I think even a fake one from online won’t do that within a month, let alone only 9 days of using it. They provide no solution at all and just ask us to contact Lacoste ourselves by giving us the generic website. It wasn’t even an discounted item and we paid FULL PRICE for such absurd product and service. The quality of the product is already disappointing enough, but with the attitude of that staff showing no sympathy (yup, not even an apology and all she say was “cannot refund” without any explanation) was just enough to show how Lacoste as a brand and their staffs value their customers. Period. | review_rating:1, text:Do not shop here, staff do not honour guarantee and will be rude to you when you ask for a refund or replacement, manager will hide in the corner texting the staff what to say to you instead of being upfront and honouring the brand. | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to exchange a shoe whitin 7 days, but failed. The shoe made my leg hurtled and even can see the wound. They still can't do exchange. What the xxxx? | review_rating:1, text:Do not recommend any foreigners or locals make purchases at this store until management is changed and customer values are in mind at the store as we made a purchase here and the item was defective, we returned within the guarantee period and the staff had 0% care when handling us about the defective product they made me come back an hour later just to say "can't" exchange or refund with no explanation why, we pushed for a reason even mentioning Malaysian consumer law word for word to them with no care at all from them, they gave us a website saying email the website but the website isn't even a Lacoste website, do not shop here at Sunway Pyramid.

Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. name: Smiggle
location: LG 1 69A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Moderate shopping experience, I was left on my own to pick up stuff from high shelves and was not introduced to any of the promotions (pwp).

Anyway got what I came for. School bags were a good size, good designs and good quality. Kids been using em and have 0 complaints.

Would I return to this particular outlet? No.
Will I continue buying Smiggle elsewhere? YES. | review_rating:1, text:Too expensive and none of the products have price tags!!! You need to ask the salesperson for the price and it's outrageously priced. Consumers enforcement should check this shop for failure to display price tags eventhough there's notice that they priced the products. | review_rating:5, text:Kids love this place | review_rating:1, text:The reason why I gave a 1 because I bought a smiggle bubble top pencil case and it got ripped while few days of using it and it was very expensive. | review_rating:5, text:I like the thing and it's very awesome they have a beg  water botel.  All of our school stuff and a toys

name: Pazzion
location: LG1.125, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:We dropped by this place for ladies shoes. They have a nice variety of shoe styles from casual to formal and even some with bling. They have some handbags too. The staff was helpful and friendly and we managed to find a nice pair of shoes to buy. | review_rating:5, text:After being quite taken aback from visiting a larger department store within the same complex, and seeing their lack of leather footwear on offer, I was delighted to come across Pazzion at Sunway Pyramid.😊 Extremely helpful and friendly staff, who also gave appropriate recommendations according to me specifications without being salesy or pushy - Came away with two pairs of excellent quality, unique and beautiful leather shoes to add to the wardrobe. Thank you!🙏🏼💖 | review_rating:5, text:PAZZION Malaysia at Sunway Pyramid is a super cute shoe store! They have a great selection of shoes, from sandals to heels, and the styles are all really trendy. The store is well-decorated and has a cozy vibe. The staff are friendly and always ready to help you find the perfect pair of shoes. The prices are a bit on the high side, but the quality is worth it. I always leave the store feeling super stylish! | review_rating:5, text:Friendly and helpful staffs. No hard-selling at the same time. Great experience here. | review_rating:5, text:Great place to shop for handbags and shoes. Staffs here really friendly and helpful when you need suggestions and assistance.

name: SHOPLOOOH
location: LG1.76, Sunway Pyramid Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Used to be fans of Shoploooh, always wanted to support local brand but the price getting more and more expensive with poor quality & very simple design, 79 for a singlet! Definitely not worth for it... | review_rating:5, text:I was greeted very warmly by a kind petite lady as I entered the outlet. She actively suggested few outfits for me without behaving pushy, making me really comfortable with her service! Their clothes are of good quality too, definitely reasonable at the price point. Keep it up! ♥︎ | review_rating:5, text:Shoploooh set their aesthetic line. Street fashion, Office wear and many different styles. Good quality fabrics and unique design. A boutique that you are able to find clothing that suit your needs as well as gifts to friends and family. | review_rating:2, text:Understand limitation of customer entering shop to follow sop. But when queue up and stand outside and staff already saw it just ignore us and no smiling. Suggest that staff could have greetings with customer even customer waiting.Even we get inside, the lady boss not smiling at all like we owe her money. The fitting room side Indian staff serve good and have recommendations for outfit. | review_rating:1, text:Went to this shop with my sister. We paid the bill separately. I bought 5 units while my sister bought 2 units. I made payment first. The counter lady informed my sister that they ran out of small paper bag and try to fit into my bag instead. I told her we need to separate but she insisted NOT to give her a bigger size paper bag. Spent almost more than 800 bucks in there together but not willing to give an additional big size paper bag. Speechless.
Would give zero star if I can.
15th Jan 2022, 8pm. In case the management needs to investigate who was the cashier lady who worked that day. If she is the boss herself, read it and admit your own terrible service.

name: Bread History
category: bakery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: F1.K2A & F1.K2B, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Bread History at Sunway Pyramid offers a good selection of pastries, buns, and bread, all at generally affordable prices. The bakery is clean and well-maintained, making it a pleasant place to browse through the different baked goods. Service was quick during my visit, allowing for a smooth and efficient experience. Whether you're picking up a snack or something for later, it's a reliable choice for fresh and tasty treats. Four stars for quality, cleanliness, and great service! | review_rating:1, text:Brought a big bread and request them slices the bread,they told me don't have knife,but I saw the knife in kitchen. Pay with RM 20 told me not small change and the time is in the evening.
This is my last time visit this shop. | review_rating:4, text:It's my second most favourite cake shop after Lavender . The prices here are reasonable and the QC is good . | review_rating:1, text:Malay cashier wearing scarf, Answering rudely,  terrible customer service and annoying face - as though I owe her something. Pls employ someone who is polite, eager to serve and greets with smile. | review_rating:1, text:Cakes and orange bread ok but I wonder why their wholemeal bread is ultra salty. I want to regurgitate after every bite, all I can taste is SALT. Like the baker emptied whole container of salt into dough. UGH! Bread History, pls taste it yourself. If you think it's fine, then you hv VERY high salt tolerance level. First and last time buying this.

name: Pizza Hut
category: pizza_restaurant, fast_food_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Unit Nos. LL2.40 Lower level 2, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Staff are helpful
The only down side is long waiting time after order
Also why dont they serve in plates if it is dine in, i can understand they use paper box if take away
The good taste delicious especially MElts
The brownie cake is really petite and dry, even the spoon is larger than the cake | review_rating:3, text:I just visited to buy a personal pizza for takeaway. Just sat near the collection counter. Food was ready on time but there's no info on the order process screen for online orders. Hope it can be included too. Thank you. | review_rating:3, text:stuff very good....but too many time waiting after order... food ok but not best | review_rating:1, text:Waste my money RM8 for this all bread "cheese bites" all the cheese is gone and burned. I better buy in auntie Annie's and the staff attitude is not well mannered and seems not interested in talking with customers or future customers. | review_rating:4, text:The food was alright for a fast food pizza joint. Mushroom soup was creamy enough. Only complaint I have is their service, seems like not enough staff to handle peak dining crowds.
