name: Caring Pharmacy
location: Lot LG 2.77,LG2 Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Yesterday i bought the herbs of gold q10, there is promotion if buy 1 can get free fish oil, but they did not inform me about the promotion. And then, they did not inform that the nutrigo q10 has buy 2 box free 1 bottle promotion. They did not check properly before letting the customer know, we got the promotion at others outlet. I bought so many from this place yesterday but staff there dont even bother to check on the promotion for me. Bad service | review_rating:5, text:The BEST Pharmacy in KL 👏 I placed an urgent BIG order and they made sure it happened exactly as discussed. Full trust in their ability and service 🥳 Well done Team 👍 Cheers. Dr Aly, FANZCA Anaesthetist | review_rating:5, text:The staff here are awesome especially Kausalyaa and Agalya. Very helpful and knowledgeable about the products. Managed to introduce the right supplements for customers. Highly recommended | review_rating:5, text:One of the best pharmacy in Malaysia!
Let's join their membership ship & get more rewards & benefits!
Good service & good product 💯 | review_rating:1, text:The cashier misled the customer. When the customer wanted to make a payment and gave her the Sunway Pals card to scan, she said the payment had to be made first. Then she asked if I had a Caring membership. After giving her the membership and making the payment, she said that after using the Caring member card, the Sunway Pals card couldn't be used. What a joke!!
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Thai Odyssey
location: Lot LG 2A.01 (B), Lower Ground 2-A, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Had regularly visited this chain of branches in other states. As usual, the place is clean and staff is good. However a massage is only as good as the skills of the therapist. My therapist this time round didn't use/have sufficient strength despite telling her to go harder. The rhythm was also slower then normal. Hope her skills improve quickly. | review_rating:3, text:Went for leg massage 60 min for RM102.6 as other body massage was fully booked today during public holiday. The place was quiet and relaxing. The standard of foot massage was not up to par with the like of full body massage in TO. Acupressure was light, I didn’t get much relief from my tired legs, the therapist’s nails graze my skin on some strokes .  I’ve been to other TO outlets and had both full body aromatherapy and Thai massage many times. I must say this is by far the most disappointing service I received from TO. Not worth of my money.
I also went for leg massage with another competitor (its name starting with “S”) , and it was a great experience! | review_rating:2, text:The experience was unpleasant!

Came to T.O about 3pm for Traditional Thai Massage, coincidentally have available time slot for this service that I prefer.

But the assigned masseur I think she is new and I can feel that she is unsure about what she’s doing, is like thinking what’s the next sequence. The pressure point and the strength was just okay only…

Didn’t really enjoy the whole massage process and don’t feel relax at all. | review_rating:4, text:Please do call for booking as it's always fulled. I want to say thank you to the staff who help massage me. She not just good massager but also very friendly and warm with smile. I like it very much especially your aroma oil. The 2 things lack are very less sign to your shop which I tour whole mall to locate your shop as this is my first time to this branch as I been to many of your branches and bad in noise cancelling. Basically I can't relax much because of it. The noise from ice skate area can be hear which spoil the relaxation mood. The place is clean and comfy. Overall was just fine. | review_rating:5, text:If you're reading google review to ensure if it's the right place to get a massage, stop reading and just go fot it!! Seriously, this is the best place ever! The strength of the therapist is just perfect for me! (p.s. I rarely go for a massage). For woman, worry not, all of the therapist are woman. Their service is 💯! My therapist today is from thailand, she can't understand english that much, but we are able to communicate well. I'm telling you! The ambience, massage, service, hygiene, everything is just perfectt!!!! However, this place have 1 cons, they don't have toilet inside. For me, I use mall's toilet before I enter Thai Odyssey.
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Shuyi
location: LG2-08, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I bought the freshly steamed yam paste and mochi and grape yogurt. I like the yam paste and mochi so much, it was fresh and healthy. For grape yogurt also not bad, but I suggest order 30% sugar for it. | review_rating:3, text:I bought their 'Signature Grass Jelly Milk Tea'. I really didn't expect the generous amount of toppings that they include together. I think there are grass jelly, red beans, raisins, peanuts, pearls, etc. Regular size costs around RM9.90. It's nice that they provide a spoon together with the beverage that I bought😄 Overall taste, there's nothing special about it except for the toppings. You enjoy both drinking and eating in a single cup. The milk tea is a bit diluted and there's definitely too less ice in it. I haven't tried the other drinks in the menu. I might be coming again to give it a try✌🏻 | review_rating:3, text:The shop is located next to Daiso. Space is small. People who want to gathering need to consider. Ordered signature grass jelly milk tea. Price is affordable compared to others milk tea shops. The amounts of fillings are generous but the drink was less cold. | review_rating:4, text:I ordered the signature milk tea and was surprised by the amount of toppings in the cup! Nearly 70% of the drink is toppings, haha.

It was quite interesting to try it out.

The toppings included boba, grass jelly, nata de coco, raisins, red beans, and peanuts. I felt full after this drink. | review_rating:3, text:Order signature milk tea glass jelly. A lot of ingredient but not able to suck up by the straw.
Taste so so to me. But I may come back to try yam paste drink, it looks good.

name: Kenangan Coffee
category: cafe, coffee_shop, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Lot LG1.118A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Salted Caramel Macchiato is like at Starbucks but half the price. Decent curry puff that was reheated properly. Great service too. Would come here next time! | review_rating:2, text:Nothing fantastic about the coffee. Just wanted to support local brand. Even registered my membership. Please train your staff. Went to collect my drink. The malay lady staff has attitude problem. She was not very friendly. Not even a thank you from her. She even threw a tantrum by banging my drink on the counter like she was unsatisfied! | review_rating:5, text:Always a great coffee time in Kenangan. Has to be the best coffee chain ever! | review_rating:3, text:New coffee chain in town. Simple & clean set up. A handful of seats around the cafe. Usual cafe pricing. Friendly staff. Been here twice now. Once with 50% promo for 1st time users & the other with certain amount off.

We had the avocado milk & avocado coffee on both occasions. There were good although a bit sweet. The coffee version is the best. Interesting combination. Avocado adds an interesting creaminess to the drink. Also tried their firecracker sausage & banana choco chip muffin. Average at best. Happy that they can warm it up for dine in.

Felt a bit too pricey for what it is. Even with the promos. Many better options around. | review_rating:3, text:Heard of this so called famous Indonesian chain coffee. Decided to give it a try. We ordered kenangan latte, creamy latte and one slice of chocolate cake. The kenangan latte is super sweet and it is horrible. Luckily we ordered less sweet for the creamy latte. This outlet has very limited seats. There am were many people waiting around for others to finish their drinks and leave.

name: OBJET
location: LOT LG-1.96, LG-FLOOR, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:This store offers a wide variety of products for home decoration and enhancement. For living spaces, they have stylish nightstand lamps, decorative candle holders, and elegant ceramic vases.

In the dining area, you can explore their selection of ceramic serving dishes, decorative serving bowls, and charming glass teapots. They also carry glass jars, cups, and containers, perfect for storage and organization.

To add cozy touches around the home, browse their plush door stoppers, dried floral arrangements, and fashionable tissue box holders. You'll also find beautiful rattan baskets for storing household items as well as comfortable cushions in vibrant colors and designs.

Their diverse inventory may have just what you need to create a warm and inviting living environment. With so many stylish options, decorating your dream home is made easy. | review_rating:3, text:Newly opened homewares store on 1st floor within Sunway Pyramid. Concept is very much similar to Hooga so i guess the more the competition, the better for us consumers. Their range is not as diversed as Hooga, but they do have some interesting stuff on display. Pricing is a little more on the high side, but overall its still quite ok. | review_rating:4, text:Exceptionally affordable pricing for homeware, kitchenware and tableware (hardly anything over $30aud!!!)🤯😱

My haul was substantial due to the crazy good deals to be had🤭, and they were very accommodating, wrapping each piece of flatware, as well as allowed me to inspect the tea box before finalising my purchase.

I'd say Objet is the Malaysian equivalent to Kmart here in Sydney. Good value, not the highest quality items but still worth it - For example, the tea box I bought had a knob that I needed to buy the correct screw for, in order for it to sit securely on the lid and thus be functional. Not a deal breaker for me, but would be annoying for those not into figuring out a surprise DIY project 😅🛠 would return nonetheless!

Thanks Objet!!🥰 | review_rating:5, text:In love with this shop all item i want have also have membership right now lot of benefits i get . All staff very helpful and service bring my item to car also will repeat come … | review_rating:5, text:Merchandise are really cute and good overall. But store is quite hard to find.
Its located on LG1 nearby ice skate rink (This should help people pinpoint its location better) rather than current photos and bad address.

name: Din Tai Fung
category: asian_restaurant, chinese_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot G1.41 & G1.PT01, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Food: it was good as usual. First time tried the crab meat xiaolongbao, it was ok, personally still prefer the pork xiaolongbao. The mushroom vegetables fried rice was surprisingly good.

Service: the waiting time is very long. We were being told the waiting time is only 30 minutes but we ended up waited for an hour. Not recommended if you are in a hurry. The service was just at an average level which personally found it to be under my expectations.

Atmosphere: it was conducive to have meal. | review_rating:5, text:Vegetarian friendly for certain menu
Their number queue system is effective, once you got the number please wait outside your number will be called soon.
You may fill up your order form while queueing then once u got the table just pass the order form to them.
Food serve fast and hot.
Their vegetarian fried rice is delicious. | review_rating:4, text:Food was great except the chilli fried fish which tasted like nuggets. Service needs to be improved, no one knows what to do after serving or proper way talking to customers. Too many new staffs I guess... | review_rating:4, text:This store still serves one of the best xiao long bao over the years. Ginseng chicken soup was bland and just a slight taste of ginseng. Fried rice with pork chop was good as the pork was cooked and well seasoned. Fried rice was not that oily and salty. | review_rating:5, text:Loved how quick and efficient the service is at this outlet. There was a short queue but me and my friend were able to get seated within 5 minutes. The food was also served fairly quickly.
Pork chop fried rice is good, the 小笼包 as well. But the main highlight was the 辣子鱼片 that was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside and cooked to absolute perfection.
Definitely the best DTF outlet here!

name: TANYU 探鱼
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Uniqlo
location: Unit No. LG1.67, LG1.68, LG1.69, LG2.66, LG2.65 Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I had a fantastic experience at Uniqlo in Sunway Pyramid! The service was incredibly efficient—staff were friendly, attentive, and quick to help with any questions or sizes. The store was well-organized, making it easy to find everything I needed. As always, Uniqlo’s clothing and accessories are top-notch in quality, with a great range of stylish yet practical options for every season. Whether you’re shopping for basics or something trendy, they have it all. Highly recommend this location for its excellent service and high-quality products! | review_rating:4, text:This Uniqlo store has two floors. The clothes are well-organized, tidy, and neat. The clean environment provides good vibes for browsing, and you may find something that suits your preference and style. | review_rating:5, text:Shop attendant is very friendly, arrangement of the clothing section is very convenient for shopping purposes, quite like the concept compare to other Uniqlo stores | review_rating:5, text:This branch of Uniqlo is very large, occupying two floors. The decor is nice and the store is very well stocked. Items on offer are reasonably priced. It's worth visiting to buy some clothing here. | review_rating:5, text:at first i went to H&M, but they said close already so i came to Uniqlo and got me a pant. the service was really good. the staff who assisted me was so friendly. i felt so welcomed, compared to H&M.

they also asked me if i wanted an alteration, even when it was about 20-30 minutes before the closing. but they managed to make it done in few minutes. kudos to the team.

name: HOTPOT KITCHEN
location: OB. K7, OASIS BOULEVARD, SUNWAY PYRAMID MALL, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:I usually visit this restaurant at Sunway Pyramid specifically for their pork intestine, which I absolutely love. The way they cook it is fantastic, and it keeps me coming back. Unfortunately, on my recent visit, the pork intestine was unavailable, which was disappointing. I enjoy both the baby spicy and original flavors, but I prefer the original with extra garlic. However, this time, the garlic tasted off—almost spoiled, which was a letdown.

The soup has been consistently good since my first visit, and it didn’t disappoint this time either. I also tried the cheese mantou today. While the exterior was crispy and nice, the cheese filling had a strange low-quality plastic container smell, and when eaten together, it tasted slightly sour. It wasn’t a pleasant experience.
New series fruit juice(peach) tastes like chemicals, better order Chinese tea. | review_rating:5, text:you may choose your own vege, meat or any other sides to your liking! then, they will cook for you based on your desired flavours and level of spice! 🤗 the service offered are fast as well! when you're looking for a great place to eat in Sunway Pyramid, Hotpot Kitchen is the place to go! 😋 | review_rating:5, text:Always dropped by here for eat their dry malaxiangguo! well seasoned,=> price also reasonable eventhough queue quite long like 30mins to get seat , staff serve so fast also, definitely will be back for more if i drop by Sunway Pyra 🥳🥳🥳🥳 | review_rating:3, text:Good atmosphere at good location of the mall. Unfortunately, the dry hotpot here isn’t great at all👎👎. It’s too bland, just plain spicy and lack of good flavor (i don’t know why they wana add cumin flavor into it cos it’s actually meant for chinese bbq but they added this into dry hotpot which made it really weird). Nevertheless, the mala soup actually tastes really good 👍(but you get the same flavour from Master Kang instant noodles🤣) .

Another thing that put me off  is the so-called member price. It’s free to join then you get discount, but why bother to require that when you already allow everyone join for free. Wasting time and just finding excuse to charge more. Price actually is quite reasonable though. But overall i won’t go back to this brand outlets again. 😅

Finally reminder, when you select the pork or beef, it is usually rolled up so it’s easy to clip, MAKE SURE you tell the counter that you don’t want it to be cut into smaller pieces, my pork belly roll mysteriously ended up as 2 small pieces only 😹. I have read many others commented the same issues but i rather not presume that is the fact.. now i tried and proved that those claims were pretty accurate 🤣🤣 | review_rating:5, text:Actually for first try is not bad, all the vegetables and meat are fresh choice a lot (that’s my favorite part), food and service is good but still can improve. Furthermore, food are quite spicy suggest those who like spicy food can try.

name: Zen House Japanese Vegetarian Restaurant
location: LG2.99, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:We had lunch here and found the decor pleasant and restaurant clean. Service was polite and food served soon after ordering. The bento sets we ordered were delicious with large quantity of food. It was also nice that the green tea was refillable. We had a  nice meal here and will be back to try other items on their very extensive menu. | review_rating:5, text:The best Japanese vegetarian food that I have tried. Even bought takeaway after eating in the restaurant. Recommend to eat the food while it is hot! Service was great, slightly pricely but worth it. | review_rating:4, text:I was delighted to discover this Japanese vegetarian restaurant after browsing a few options at the Sunway Pyramid mall. Finding vegetarian dining options beyond the typical Chinese restaurants can be challenging, so I was pleased to come across this establishment.

For my meal, I ordered an egg roll dish, okra skewer, and kimchi soup ramen. While the okra skewer may not have had the most visually appealing presentation when it arrived at the table, I was pleased to find that the okra was not overcooked. Instead, it maintained a satisfying crunchiness, which is how I prefer my okra to be prepared.

The kimchi ramen was decent overall, though I didn't particularly enjoy some of the ingredients, such as the bean sprouts and cabbage. Personal preferences aside, I appreciated the opportunity to find a suitable vegetarian restaurant option within the Sunway Pyramid mall.

Overall, I'm glad I was able to discover this Japanese vegetarian restaurant, as it provided a refreshing change of pace from the more common Chinese vegetarian offerings in the area. It's always encouraging to see a diverse array of meatless dining options becoming available. | review_rating:5, text:Wonderful Japanese food for vegetarians! Loved the katsu don and inari sushi especially. | review_rating:4, text:If you are in vegeterian and looking for Japanese food, this is a great place to be. Their sushi and shasimi really tasted 'real'. Good food. Only complain is their wasabi does not have the kick as you usually in a normal Japanese restaurants.

location: Lot LG2.132D, Lower Ground Two, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:26 September 2024 - come here to fix my watch.. I've been searching other shops repair but they couldn't fix it.. Then i come to this shop and ask if they can fix it, the guy said he can fix it.. Really thankful to the guy that guy.. Forgot to ask his name.. Really recommended for other people to come.. Very reasonable price.. Thank you | review_rating:5, text:This is by far the best watch shop in pyramid i have visited- . The uncle there is very friendly and attentive. Shares a lot of information as well. The younger male staff is also very helpful. Ive fixed and changed my watch battery here ever since.  Brought a friend here abd she was equally happy with the service too! ☺️. Its located at the Oasis of sunway pyramid, opposite Pineyard cafe | review_rating:5, text:I had to resize my watch strap and went to few places but they could not do it due to the design of the strap.
I was then recommended to this shop and they went extra miles to get the strap resized with a very reasonable price and short stint of time.
I highly recommend this shop if your looking for an excellent service for your watch as they are very good and helpful. | review_rating:5, text:I thought my watch out of battery and wanna replace a new battery. The uncle boss told me that the battery is not flat yet and then my watch continues ticking. He is very kind, professional and helpful. Very satisfied and happy with his service. Strongly recommended. | review_rating:5, text:Very kind staffs. Went in with my sis and friend. The uncle explained the repair process meticulously to us. Also gave foc strap hole punch.

location: LG2.K.7 Sunway Pyramid Jalan PJS11/15, Bandar Sunway Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Love this place! I do all my piercings here now. I don't experience any pain after piercing (of course I can't sleep on my ear for a while). But if I don't touch my ear, there's no pain at all. And they staff is well prepared. I told her I wanted the rubber earring holder instead of the metal one because its harder and more painful to take off. And she had them ready for me and packed the metal holder in a packet for me. And the price is good; only RM10 per piercing. | review_rating:3, text:Have gotten piercings here over the years and yes they're good, but bought some septum jewellery and they started rusting in my nose.. quite disappointed. The jewellery aren't the greatest quality but the customer service and the actual piercing service is alright. | review_rating:1, text:Service is very terrible by a female hijab worker. We asked her if there are any other rings available & she made an annoyed face and showed to us rudely to the section. When we asked her what size is the ring bcs there were no labels, she literally said “idk check on your own” we were like ???? excuse me u work there you’re supposed to know what size it is & even if u don’t, u have to assist to measure the ring instead of standing there & repeatedly saying “idk anything” disappointed that the service has worsened | review_rating:1, text:My friend went here few weeks ago to get helix piercing and the one that help her pierce didn't mark the dot that used to mark instead the worker just cincai tembak and now my friend is inside hospital because of it! Even my ears didn't get mark first before pierced! PLEASE BE RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR ACTION | review_rating:5, text:Very like their piercing services! Professional! Good experiences,very satisfied! reviews:
review_rating:3, text:I got to try a few before choosing which flavors I wanted. Then I would put the order in the machine and make the payment. Choosing the flavors I wanted and paying was far from easy and without the help of the staff it was almost impossible to operate the machine correctly. It's a shame to have such a complicated ordering and payment process for such good ice cream flavors. | review_rating:4, text:Enjoyed 31% on Wednesday with my pink shirt. Got to enjoy double junior scoops with rm10.50.
Vatieties of choices to choose. Love the nutty ice cream. | review_rating:1, text:the ice cream is not cold enough!!!
other than that the service of the worker need too be improve. they is one malay service is so rude i don’t think so this is how to serve as a serve crew ! such a shame | review_rating:4, text:Best place to have Baskin Robbins ice-creams here. You can sit as long as you want after tired shopping because it's hidden from the counter and at the back of it. Also, this outlet has more variety flavors and ice-cream cakes ready-made. | review_rating:1, text:The counter person was not there when the shop was supposed to be open. It said on a small note that there are gone for a while. It looks very unprofessional. Hope there is improvements.

name: Eggette Lab
category: dessert_shop, confectionery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Sunway Pyramid Mall, Red Atrium, Lot F1.AV.11, 1st Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:One of my favourite “kai dan zai” franchise. Have try a lot times and many flavours.

My personal favourite is the classic original and also the chicken floss. Recently prefer chicken floss as the savoury taste of the chicken floss match well with the sweet batter of eggette.

Most of time quality are ok but on and off they slipped in quality where the product are soggy and the side are not crispy.

Overall are good. Queue are much more lower than like 3-5 years ago where we can get it quite fast now compare to last time usually need to wait more than 30min. | review_rating:1, text:Such a disappointment. The eggette look like dog bite. No appetite to eat.  You take salary make properly please. | review_rating:3, text:Always long queue.

Didn’t purchase at my first time visit because the queue was way toooooo long. It was my second visit few days ago, and I waited around 15mins to collect my order. Consider quick..?

Tried their original classic eggette. It was crunchy at the outside, soft on the inside. Smell good, but the taste for me was so so only. Not the best eggette I have ever tried.

Would revisit and try other flavours, if there is no long queue. 😛 | review_rating:5, text:The food is really nice. I especially love the sweet potato mochi flavour. it always has a long queue everytime I visit the shop. However you will have to wait for atleast 10 minutes to get your food , which really requires your patience. | review_rating:1, text:Bad service! I arrive at stall at 7.30 the sales said that charcoal cheese is out have to wait for 30mins i agreed to wait so i went for a walk and came back at 8. But the order i receive is truly disappointing. Product is cold like been sit under a pile for more than 15mins. The whole thing is also squished!

name: Paris Baguette
category: bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG1.33A, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:The atmosphere is great, with seating available for both small and large groups.

I ordered the Big Breakfast and upgraded the complimentary black coffee to a latte for an additional RM 5.00.

**Big Breakfast:**
- Taste: 9/10
- Portion: 5/10

The tomato was too large and not grilled for added flavor. It would have been better if it were served in smaller pieces. Additionally, there was only one small piece of bread.

The service was okay, though only one counter was open and card payment was unavailable. However, the food was brought to the table. | review_rating:4, text:Many choices and types of breads, buns and pastries to choose from. They also provide cooked foods such as big breakfast. The buns were quite good, soft, balanced between the sweetness and buttery. Coffee a bit bitter but overall it was hot and nice.

Services were reasonable. Prices were above average. | review_rating:4, text:Garlic Bread with Cream Cheese was very garlicky, with quite a strong raw garlic taste (iykyk). Mushroom soup in bread bowl was abit expensive, and very salty for my taste. Overall, good to try once but would not return again. Plenty of seating options and choices of pastries. | review_rating:1, text:Your staff on New Year’s Eve is disappointing…. How can you serve customer with melted plastic cup??? Please teach them to brew the tea using steel mugs before putting any hot water into plastic cup! You expect me to receive iced drink with dented bottom?? How to stand the cup??? This is so rude for such an establishment! TERRIBLE STAFF SERVICE!

Not only that, he also gave us back torn rotten RM5.00 cash as they cannot accept card or QR at that moment! Useless!

You guys should be PARIS PACK YOUR BAGS! instead of baguette! | review_rating:5, text:Staffs here are friendly especially azfar. He greeted everyone with friendly and charm face. Recommend to sit here and dine. Thank you for letting us dine here and unboxing labubu.

name: Chagee
location: LG2.142B, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Had a wonderful experience at this Chagee branch in Sunway Pyramid. One of the workers, Nabila, provided a pleasant experience from guiding me on how to order and helping send my beverage to my table. Such service left a very positive impression on this branch. Keep it up! | review_rating:5, text:All Staff very efficient on jobs.. drink most nice and make my mood feel good.. the product is good for health.. I love the grapefruit jasmine tea..not so sweet.. just enjoy the tea with love worth for money .. | review_rating:5, text:As a tea lover, I have been a lot of Chagee store, some store doesn’t give excellent service but this Chagee @ LG2 Sunway Pyramid is something different. Nabila (staff) was the one who approached me, she took her time to explain every drinks in the menu and recommend me a few drinks. Even though i know which one is the best tea but her diligence and excellent service is what matters. Thanks to the excellent experience I had, I would come again to this branch and without a doubt I will recommend it to others. Again, I would like to give a shoutout to Nabila for making my day! | review_rating:5, text:Beautiful shop, seating area a bit compact, not for long stay or sit in and do work. If there's window oversee outside could be nicer. Service all ok. | review_rating:4, text:Very busy location and queue, theres currently a promotion for a 7 years anniversary pin. It was a bit confusing that the poster on the wall tells you to order online to get a promotion, but it does not go together for the pin. The drinks were fine not worth the price of almost 30RM for 2.

name: Wonderful Mondays
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: ALOHA KARAOKE & CAFÉ
location: Aloha the sunshine karaoke Lot OB2-LG1-01, Lower Level 1 Oasis Boulverd 2, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Nice family karaoke at Sunway.

Prices are wallet friendly, especially Macallan 12 years comes in at RM488.

Rooms are well lit with decent air conditioning. | review_rating:1, text:Look like scam place .. keep change big room for us .. not allow us to take small room even we can fit … really roti canai kareoke I meet before … pls do not come here .. n bad services … | review_rating:5, text:I haven't try the food yet. But that's so cool
You can have shisha in the room. :) | review_rating:5, text:I booked a medium room to fit ard 18 of us, it was nice. They deco the place accordingly and we were surprised they have someone in froggy costume to pop up in the room and make the kids so happy. The system was ok, only as it’s newly upgrade and little error on the scoring so little disappointed, also the bell wasn’t inform and made us quite a bit until we know about it . The rest are ok. The food was good and big portion. Price was reasonable and we had very nice evening there. | review_rating:5, text:We had birthday party on 11/9/22. Such a wonderful event. The food dam good n very delicious. Specially the staff are so kind n friendly. Sounds system fuuuuu yoooo power. Nice place to have gatherings n we really enjoy our day. Thanks to all the staff. 👌👍👍🍻🍻🍻🍻👌👌👌👍👍

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I just got back from travelling Japan and Europe and coming to this cafe really reminded me of how relaxing and peaceful. The concept of this coffeehouse is pure minimalist cozy. I seriously recommend coming here. | review_rating:5, text:I recently had a fantastic experience shopping for sneakers at Atmos Sunway. I want to give a special shout-out to Zul, who attended to me throughout the buying process. His professionalism and friendly attitude made the entire experience smooth and enjoyable. Zul assisted me over the phone as I couldn’t be there physically. He got me the pair i wanted and prepared it well so that the runner could take it and pass it to me. Finally, the delivery was successful done and I got the pair i want perfectly! Thank you zul for your excellent service, I'll definitely go to Atmos Sunway for my future sneaker needs. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:great service from Balqis! been trying to get a pair of shoes because i stand a lot so i need a really good one. bought a pair here based off of her recommendations and it's so comfy. will be back for sure 👍🏻👍🏻 | review_rating:4, text:The comics & magazine are for displays only, a very pretentious choice of decor in my opinion.
I’ve been to cafe of similar caliber in Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan, comic that are placed so close to the customers, with cabinet lights, without glass are suppose to be readable.
Anyway, we ordered v60 coffee, and they were great. No problems over their quality of coffee. | review_rating:3, text:Coffee volume is not a lot and it is quite pricey. Only  special menu worth trying.

name: Marks & Spencer
location: G1.69 & 68, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Marks & Spencer @ Sunway Pyramid

This store offers a well-organized layout that is clean and easy to browse. It features a variety of fashionable clothing for children, young adults, and adults. Don’t miss their food section. It's worth exploring for delicious snacks and treats, including biscuits and chocolates! | review_rating:4, text:Marks & Spencer at Sunway Pyramid offers a great shopping experience with a well-organized layout and a variety of high-quality products. The clothing section is particularly appealing, featuring stylish and comfortable pieces for all ages. Their food section is also worth exploring, with delicious snacks and treats like biscuits and chocolates. The store is clean, and the staff is friendly and helpful, making it easy to find what you need. However, prices can be on the higher side, which might not appeal to everyone. Overall, a reliable spot for quality British goods. | review_rating:1, text:No wine and beer sold here like some of the photos shown here.
Only KLCC and Midvalley have wine in KL.
Don’t waste your time here.
Photos from others years ago were misleading info. | review_rating:5, text:The ever popular food section has since been expanded reflecting the relative popularity of this section compared to the clothing department. Popular items here include their huge selection of various packed biscuits and cookies. Depending on the season, there are offers for certain goods especially during the yuletide season when the store stocks up on associated items that are Christmas related. You'll encounter alcohol infused fruitcakes and puddings which are very good indeed. At present there is also a coffee bar which has a small selection of freshly baked pastries and cookies. Highly recommended. | review_rating:4, text:I have been to kul a few times looking for crumples.

Finally this trip to kul,managed to find it at marks & Spencer, sunway pyramid.  16nov2024.

Thanks.

name: APT
location: F1.AV.03, First Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I was service by a short hair female hair stylish. Her cutting skill was good. However it will be better if she could put on a friendly smile. She looks very stern.
Anyway I'm happy with my hairdo for RM40. Is worth it. | review_rating:5, text:a very much thank you to stylist Anne which attended to my hairstyling. Not only Anne give a good haircut, she attentive and provides a good chat. Anne also recommend treatment for my hair, which after a few days my hair really did felt better and much stronger. I’ve also bought a product recommended by her, it does help. Overall a great experience. | review_rating:1, text:I went to APT for a hair wash and normal dry. I went here because I've been to APT Salon several times when I lived in Penang and the service and quality there was good. And even prices were very reasonable.
Over here, in Sunway Pyramid, they charged me 60+ RM for my thin hair. I was still okay to pay because I wanted good service.
The person who washed my hair couldn't understand a word of English. He took me directly to the hair wash basin for the wash, unlike how it used to be done at the Penang branch. Before starting I asked him to shampoo only once as my hair tends to get too dry with double shampooing. But he went ahead and shampooed twice anyway.
Then when he was applying conditioner I requested that he leave it on for a couple of minutes so it can actually condition my hair and he said ok, but washed it off in less than 15 seconds. 🤷‍♀️
Then, while blowdrying he used the high heat blast from the very beginning and kept bringing it very close to my scalp. And he kept focussing on the back of my scalp while the front was just airdrying and setting to become kind-of messy-frizzy..
After he was done I had to ask him to apply hair serum, and That's something that he should have done without me asking considering how sadly he had blow-dried my hair.
After the wash my scalp has been completely damaged. It's been almost 3 weeks now since this hair wash and my scalp has not recovered yet. The back portion of my scalp is still soar and extremely itchy and i usually never have an itchy scalp. I've never faced this issue ever before. I'm not sure if it's bad products used or bad technique or both together, but it's ruined my scalp. All I wanted was a relaxing hair wash. But instead left disappointed with a damaged scalp.
One thing salon Staff should understand is that everyone coming there has different hair types and should be handled according to that. ONE METHOD/FORMULA DOESN'T FIT ALL when it comes to hair. Especially in Malaysia where you find a mix of people from so many ethnicities it's expected all the more.
Anyway all in all, bad service and disappointing experience.
I will definitely not return to this salon again | review_rating:5, text:Did my hair (colour and cut) with Bryan. Was lucking when i came walkin he’s attended me. Love the consultation and also the result! Will definitely come again 👍🏼 | review_rating:1, text:Serena i really don't understand what she is thinking, doesn't she feel guilty for giving someone else a haircut like this? Spending RM399 on a haircut like this, shame on you. aunty 👎

name: The Coach Coffeeshop
location: Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Coffee was good but only in one size small cup , quite disappointing for me. The sfaff was nice suggesting which bean i should try. The lemon donut was good omg?? | review_rating:2, text:The yellow interior of the space really makes it pop out compared to other cafes. Being associated with the Coach brand, we naturally had higher expectations. Unfortunately the food and coffee does not meet the standards, especially since the price point is higher than average (rm 18++ for a cafe latte). Portion is small and the coffee lacks aroma. Grilled cheese sandwich (rm38++) was burnt at the sides. | review_rating:2, text:I went in with zero expectations because big brands like this normally open a cafe just for money and I was lowkey right :/ we tried their crullers and coffee.

The raspberry crullers were nice, the maple one was meh but in general both had a very basic taste to it (RM12 each is okay I guess?)

The coffee tho, was super overpriced (RM16) when it tasted just like normal cheap coffee 😂

I feel like this cafe is okay if you just wanna go there for the sake of trying but def not rly a place that I would go to repeatedly lol | review_rating:2, text:Over priced coffee ,rm16 for a cup of iced americano ( still need to top up rm2 for single origin bean) , tasteless and watery coffee ,soggy and over sweet dessert , overhype place and not worth for second visit | review_rating:4, text:The COACH Coffee Shop has now open up in Sunway Pyramid right in front of The COACH near the main entrance of the mall 😁

Seems like luxury brands are also into cafe with LV and now COACH 😁😝
#coach #thecoachcoffeeshop #sunwaypyramid

name: Fleurs
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Torii Teppanyaki
location: LG2.131B, Level LG2, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic lunch at Torii Teppanyaki! They offer a wide variety of interesting menu options, making me excited to visit again when I’m in Sunway. The staff was friendly and welcoming, and the plating made the dishes look even more appealing. Plus, the food was served quickly, so I didn’t have to wait long. Overall, a great lunch experience! | review_rating:5, text:Had a great experience at Torii Teppanyaki! The staff were super friendly and made us feel really welcome. The food was delicious—fresh, flavorful, and cooked perfectly right in front of us. The place is also really clean and comfortable. Definitely worth a visit! | review_rating:5, text:The food tasted even more delicious with the friendly and attentive staff, and it arrived in a timely manner. The warm and welcoming atmosphere made the experience even more enjoyable. I highly recommend their signature dish, the chicken katsu set meal—it’s absolutely delicious! | review_rating:5, text:Value for money teppanyaki place. The beef is really nice! Salmon okonomiyaki was good. Chicken teppanyaki & the prawns were also nice. The lamb rice could be better as the lamb was overcooked & tough, better to order other proteins cuz the plate is sizzling. Hausboom drinks are fun & tasty. Service is good. | review_rating:3, text:Ordered the golden prosperity bundle and got ourselves chicken and beef.
The beef slice was overly done, too hard to chew. The cook needs more training as the serving was in hot plate (this continued to cook the beef). On the other hand, chicken was cooked perfectly. Not to give too high expectation on the free lou sang.

name: Mr. Dakgalbi
location: Lot F1.86C, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:This my second time eating at Mr Dalgakbi after 10 years, not liking it. Just full of carbo, not much chicken, nothing else in the pot unless you order side, taste basically gochujang sauce with a lot of sugar.
Service and place is ok. | review_rating:4, text:The food is average depending on what you've ordered. There are some options for spicy and original so need to double check before ordering the food. The price I would say is reasonable. The service is fast but feels like the staffs are foreigners so you need to explain to them a few times before placing the order. Overall, it's a good place to have lunch with friends or colleagues. | review_rating:5, text:The best Mr Dakgalbi branch, been here for the past 3 years. Service is fast and the food never disappoints.

We always order (for 3 pax)
- 2 pax set Mr Dakgalbi chicken
- Add on 1 dakgalbi
- Add on 2 ramen
- Add on 1 cheese fondue
= best combo ever! ❤️‍🔥

Tips: Add on cheese fondue instead of cheese if you are a cheese lover, recommended.

The chicken is tender, enough spiciness kena dengan tekak Malaysians. Side dishes like kimchi and radish are always served fresh.

The staffs are always friendly and helpful. They remember your order without jotting down anything! | review_rating:5, text:Superb food here. Tasty and juicy.. big portioning and good service.

Octopus and chicken is irresistible !!

Staff was friendly and helpfuk | review_rating:5, text:The portion vs the price is totally worth it. And I cannot stress enough the thigh honey fried chicken which uses breadcrumbs batter is as good if not better than Kyochons honey chicken wings. These ones are boneless.

Service for this branch is great too. Waiters and waitresses are friendly, responsive and helpful.

name: Sox World
location: Malaysia, Selangor, Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, Jalan PJS 11/15, LG1,90A邮政编码: 46150
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Sox World at Sunway Pyramid deserves a full five stars! The service here was fantastic, thanks to the one staff on duty, a super pleasant and patient lady. She really knew her stuff—gave me solid advice on the best socks for what I needed and made the whole experience feel easy and friendly. The shop itself has a great selection, so plenty to choose from without feeling overwhelmed. A small, but awesome spot if you’re in need of quality socks and helpful service! | review_rating:1, text:Staff not friendly. I want to look some stuff but the ladies ask what you want. You can find it here. Looks like she want me to buy it quickly and leave.Maybe she lazy to serve customers. Been there twice but still the same. | review_rating:2, text:Unsmiling auntie bring son to work. Unreasonable exchange policy. Can't inspect the night dress inside the box, bought home found yellowish smelly stain. | review_rating:1, text:The Chinese stuff very bad attitude,9.36pm telling me their closing soon and ask me don’t join their member for discount | review_rating:1, text:EXTREMELY rude and lazy staff

name: Seoul Garden
location: Lot LG2.126, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Friendly Ms Siti promoted the buffet lunch of rm29.90 nett, & encouraged me to look at the buffet selections. Everything in pics are free flow & I definitely had a very hearty lunch, yay. Thank you so much! | review_rating:5, text:The premium meat here is exceptionally fresh compared to other outlets. You can immediately tell by the vibrant red color and the juicy texture of the cuts. The restaurant is clean and comfy. Overall, i really enjoy my meal here ✌️ | review_rating:5, text:The food is so good! Especially the beef. The new menu, wakame soup tasted great! I can feel the "umami" in it. Services from the staff is also excellent, especially Mr. Khant from Myanmar, he tried his best to serve us and I appreciate it so much. Recommended to come again! | review_rating:5, text:Haven't been here for years. But I came over with some Muslim friends and got the superior package. The tiger prawns and salmon was awesome. Bigger variety of meats too.

Oh! And try their milky seafood 🤤

And their service is awesome! We had Siti Mariam checking on us and ensuring our soups are refilled and grill is changed every 30+ minutes.

Definitely recommend right now as food quality and service is way way way better now👍💝 | review_rating:5, text:Bought the weekday promo lunch buffet for 29.90 nett and it was awesome! Big thanks for his prompt actions and hospitality to staff name khan men htet for attending all our questions and needs.

name: SHISEIDO
location: Sunway Pyramid, Parkson, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Selangor, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a pleasant first experience with Shiseido today. Their beauty consultant Vonny is just lovely, she immediately knew the exact lip tone i described and wanted, and extra service with her Korean style lip makeup, no pressure, no judginess, just plain “ikhlas” at doing her duty. Hope Shiseido treats you well my dear, because you are a treasure. | review_rating:5, text:Thanks to Secret who’s working at Shiseido , He is helpful and attentive . My product sold out , I requested him to what’s app me if it’s available again and reserve it for me . I finally able to purchase it . Happy | review_rating:3, text:Store is easily found. Good location
Went for free samples.
Unlikely other skincare store, the staff here let me feel like they don't need new customer 😅 I was there literally just to receive sample. No bond between staff and customer.
Without a good communication, I don't think customer will come back if they think the product are good to purchase.
Maybe another branch will do. | review_rating:5, text:A flagship store for the Japanese cosmetic giant at one of the area's premium shopping galleries. This outlet caters to the skincare and cosmetic needs for both women and men alike. The retail advisors here are not pushy and very experienced in product recommendations. They have on hand, the lastest range, some of which are available for testing in-house. | review_rating:5, text:Went here and Parkson Shiseido and to redeem free samples and both store advisors are really friendly and explain patiently how to use the product. Thank you!

name: JUICY FRESH JUICE BAR
location: LG 1.70A Sunway Pyramid Jalan PJS 11/15, Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:I normally get my juice fix here because the menu is easy to understand.
But the service here is lackluster, like what most reviews have said. The cashier was a foriegn worker and I didn't know what he was mumbling.
Most tables are left dirty and not cleaned. The rubbish bin looks disgusting. | review_rating:1, text:I’ve always wanted to try Juicy ever since I started using Shopee e-vouchers. Today, I finally gave it a shot and ordered an Avocado drink since it was on sale for just RM8. While it was tasty and decent for the price, I don’t think it quite met the standard of a full-priced RM12.90 drink.

What really let me down, however, was the cashier’s attitude during my visit. As a first-timer at Juicy, I was hoping for a little guidance, but the female staff didn’t bother explaining the avocado drink options on the menu. Instead, she abruptly asked, “Avocado apa?” without pointing out the choices from the start. After I paid, she handed me the receipt without a word of thanks. Even though I said “thank you” to her, she didn’t smile or acknowledge it—her expression clearly showed she didn’t want to be there.

The lack of professionalism became even more apparent when the next customer (as seen in the photo) pointed out a mistake in their order. Rather than apologising and fixing the drink, the staff exchanged annoyed glances with each other. Based on this experience and previous Google reviews, it’s obvious that the staff could use serious training in customer service and might not be suited for Front-of-House roles in F&B. | review_rating:5, text:Have always love the juices here. My A Time FAV, AVOCADO Milk. Rm12.90 , 1 size only. Its licated at LG1, opp of Leather Avenue. After a tired shopping, may drop by here chillax with a cup of juice. | review_rating:1, text:I don’t leave usually like to leave negative reviews but I have noticed this pattern with your employees especially the new cashier. Today I came at 9:20, they were already tallying up the cash which is fine but as  I approached the counter they look disinterested in taking the order infact I would say they were annoyed that I came to buy. They were whispering when I approached. I am a frequent visitor at sunway pyramid but I realised that this only happens at your shop and I have noticed this multiple times prior to this occasion also. I understand everyone wants to finish  and close up to go back home but 9:20 it’s seems ridiculous. Even after my turn there were 3 more group of customers and the main cashier’s attitude was the same. What’s weird is that the cashier and the other worker seem to be giggling with each other but when serving customers they seemed like they just couldn’t care. I am not asking for much, just at least pretend to be interested if you’re in the service industry. I work in f&b too so I understand. | review_rating:1, text:Poorly trained staff very rude, acting like they will doing you a favour. Juice  itself
was good. Should of walked to look for a Boost Juice. Will not support again.

name: Celebrity Fitness
location: Lot LL2A.01 & LL3.01A, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:One of the worst customer services i have ever experienced, we were told our subscription is for 4months ONLY but it was all false advertising from their sales manager and the contract was actually technically forever till u cancel it( we didnt know that, we thought it was 4 months like they said) found out 2 months later and got charged for two extra months after that!! When we tried to explain that we didnt know that, they didnt even wanna hear us and kept mentioning its in the contract and at one point threatened us to sue if we refuse to pay. They never ATLEAST apologised but instead they were talking rudely back. Never recommending this place to anyone ever. I would give it zero stars if i can | review_rating:1, text:SCAM GYM DO NOT GO HERE me and my friend signed up together for 4 months subscription but end up THEY CHARGE US FOR A WHOLE YEAR CAUSE DIDNT CANCEL AUTOMATICALLY AFTER 4 MONTHS ???? i only realized after i noticed suspicious specific amount being deducted from my bank account every month which is their monthly fee DISHONEST ESTABLISHMENT DISHONEST STAFF SEEMS LIKE ITS BEEN GOING ON FOR YEARS JUST READ THE REVIEWS | review_rating:4, text:One of the furst few branches of celebrity fitness in Malaysia. Used to be a 2-storey gym, but they did a renovation during MCO, and the 2nd floor was shut down...
Still, this is branch can be considered larger than other new  branches such as jayaone, mytown, metro kajang, the mines, palm mall etc...
The free weight area of this branch is relatively large, even larger than midvalley branch.. the equipments are well maintained...
However, during weekday's after office hour, the gym would be super crowded.... even on weekends, this outlet is more crowded than other branches, probably due to its location in a shopping mall..
For easier access from the carpark, you may choose the carpark entrace that is heading tonthe underground carpark (from the main carpark entrance).. | review_rating:1, text:They focus on keep signing up people without having the manners to treat customers, having a bad attitude toward customers, not having a good faith about the payments and facilities. I know being strict is an essential thing for a fitness gym but when they are not honest this act feels like a scam. Facilities mostly either work poorly or are broken and need repair. And in some hours the gym is full of people, basically not enough equipment to use, with the price they request, there should be more than enough. | review_rating:1, text:Bad enough you guys open earliest 7am which is a rush for those who work to have a proper workout. On sats at 8am like today for example none of  your machines are switched on. Sleeping huh

name: Mail Boxes Etc
location: CP3.01, Car Park Level 3 (Orange Atrium) Sunway Pyramid, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The guy in counter is soft spoken. despite the long line. he handled customers very well. Kudos to him and this place to set up a printing service in the mall. Paid M40 price for photostat IC but it was worth not going out in the hot sun to find another place | review_rating:2, text:I went to collect my parcel today. After the foreign worker asked me for the pin, he asked me, "Sampai bila?" I was confused by his question and thought he was asking about the expiry or last collection date. So, I showed him my phone, but he started checking all the previous messages. I reminded him that the other parcels mentioned in the previous messages had already been collected and that he only needed to check the last message.

He spoke to me in an unfriendly manner and asked, "Parcel bila sampai?" That was when I finally understood his question. I informed him that the parcel had just arrived today. However, at the end, he said to me in a blaming tone, "Lain kali bagi tahu parcel bila sampai, sini parcel banyak."

Another staff member (Kakak with glasses) kindly explained to me that, because they have so many parcels, they usually categorize them by the received date.

I understand the workload, but I must say this:

Normally, I drop my parcels at the Mentari branch, but since that branch was full, I decided to use this branch instead. However, I will never drop my parcels here again.

Please provide proper training to your foreign worker in Bahasa Malaysia to avoid giving customers incorrect information and then blaming us for it afterward. | review_rating:5, text:The malay staff is veryyyyyy friendly and provided good services! | review_rating:5, text:Friendly staff, make easy process to shipping. Very helpful... | review_rating:1, text:Dropped my parcels at 7pm  today, and they have 2 hours to scan before closing and yet they did not scanned it.

Thanks to them I have lost my Preferred status in Shopee due to "Late Shipment" even though I as a seller has already tried my very best to post it out on the very same day.  However, we seller being "punished" for these irresponsible staff working in this outlet.

Yes I know you need to serve your walk ins, but please be mindful to scan it la after serving them, so hard to scan ke?

Not demure at all. Not responsible at all.

Don't forget we platform sellers, are your customers too.

Update to reply owner:

Your reply already shows that you don't even bother about it. Thanks for proving my point. Again , I dont expect the parcels to scan IMMEDIATELY.  Expecting people to give you good review and rating while don't even have the means to reply customer that you will try your best to serve better? How you know that I don't bother to change my rating? Arrogant.

name: Jewelry Fashion Boutique
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

The fat malay lady then come and tell me to contact my bank side as I'm the one being frustrated. Dude imagine you paid double and the merchant told you they got nothing and puss everything to bank.
The initial cashier girl then saying previously there's customer who faced this problem as well. I was like if your terminal on and off have problem, don't play with other money.

name: BUNGKUS KAW KAW
location: LG2.75A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:The taste of the nasi lemak bungkus is no longer what it was. The sambal udang taste was flat. Non-spicy.
The toasted bread had a tiny slice of butter. I would think that they have lost their charm.
Service, too, is dropping. | review_rating:2, text:Normal, very normal. Hot Coffee at RM7.80 without the taste of coffee, only sweetness.
But they are conveniently situated in the mall, this is the expensive version of Old Town White Coffee. Nothing special. | review_rating:5, text:Delicious Bungkus at Sunway Pyramid!

I recently visited Bungkus Kawkaw at Sunway Pyramid and was thoroughly impressed with my meal. The New Nasi Lemak Rendang was a highlight - the rendang sauce was creamy, spicy, and perfectly balanced, served with a side of fragrant coconut rice.

To quench my thirst, I opted for the Teh Kawkaw, which was a strong and bold black tea that hit the spot.

The ordering process was efficient - simply pay and wait for your food to be prepared. The wait was well worth it, as the food was freshly prepared and packed with flavor.

Overall, I highly recommend Bungkus Kawkaw for a satisfying and delicious meal. Don't miss out on the Nasi Lemak Rendang and Teh Kawkaw - a perfect combination! | review_rating:1, text:My first time breakfast here. Not coming back. Very disappointed. Overrated and overpriced. Food taste nothing special. Quantity below average. A small cup of teh tarik is RM6.70. Basic nasi lemak bungkus daun pisang with only half an egg is RM4.90. Like airline prices.

Not sure what the hype is all about. You can easily get better and cheaper alternatives for breakfast elsewhere nearby. | review_rating:4, text:Conveniently located in the mall. Super cheap and simple tasty food. Limited selection but I guess that’s the idea. Nicely packaged in paper and banana leaf for take away. Lot of drink options.Plenty of a sitting area. Takes both cash & card.
