name: Tai Er
location: LOT G1.98A&98B, SUNWAY PYRAMID SHOPPING MALL, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Overall, the experience here is pleasant. The food tastes good but leans towards a heavier and oilier base. If you can't handle spicy food, I’d recommend avoiding the dishes I ordered.

Portion-wise, the servings are generous, but the pricing is on the higher side. For example, the medium-sized Spicy Sour Soup Dory Fish costs RM108, but it's enough to be shared among four ladies. The 双椒辣子鸡 costs RM49, which I find a bit overpriced because the chicken cubes are really small and mixed with other ingredients. Based on the taste, I believe they’ve added fried potato cubes, so most of the dish consists of vegetables—mainly two types of chili and potato cubes. The potato is fine to eat, but the chili depends on your spice tolerance.

Service-wise, I was impressed. They have a unique way of calling for staff using a peace ✌🏻 hand sign, which I found interesting (but personally for me as an introverted person, I was really shy to do it). The service team was attentive and had a good attitude.

I might return, but I’d definitely bring at least two more friends to share the portions—if you're a small eater, you won’t be able to finish everything on your own! | review_rating:5, text:Today finally managed to get a chance to dine here after 2 times failed to get in for the past 1 year.  Now I understand why this restaurant and their branches are always long q and full house. This is a happening modern Chinese restaurant with nice environment, vibes and prompt service. The foods were very good and delicious, white rice was nice, free flow of dried mandarin orange skin tea, hot and ice water are available. Phone charging cable, USB plugs and good quality of tissue paper are provided. Really have nothing to complain and no idea of what to pin point or find fault. Highly and strongly recommend to dine here, no regret! | review_rating:4, text:Popular chinese sour fish soup spot. Decently great food and their signature taste good. Fish used was normal though and a tad bit oily.

The chicken in spicy 🌶 oil is worth trying whereas the prawns with fen si is savory but a bit oily as well. The veggies was normal but the fried chicken with sweet & sour sauce was worth the try.

Prepare to wait on hols or weekends but they do have a queue system which is good and the service staff will give u a call when it's your turn. | review_rating:5, text:Some may say it is cheap fish but I think it tasted delicious. That’s what matters most, isn’t it? Spices+pepper on point, spicy just the way we like it🫶🏻

Not recommended to order the spicy chicken with chilli pepper, it was expensive and taste was really just so so. The order took a while to come, when we were almost done with our meal.

Free Roselle + orange peel drink on self service.

Overall very happy with the fish ❤️ | review_rating:5, text:Food is delish, sauerkraut spicy fish portion is huge, its so cute how the dish is served. fragrant spicy not too spicy, unlimited roselle dried mandarin peel drink, always nice service
We had mala century egg
Dried chilli long bean
Sweet & sour pork with fish crackers
Signature sauerkraut spicy soup fish

name: Fresh Line
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Arokaya House (Thai Traditional Massage)
location: LG2 110,111,112, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Not recommended this place. They didn’t ask at all whether we would like to have male or female massager. Very unprofessional. Not to mention the massaging skill. Overall unsatisfactory | review_rating:5, text:Was serviced by Lu and my mum by Bong. They were very very polite and professional. We felt so comfortable and they managed to target all the severe spots. Make an early booking for these two masseuse. | review_rating:1, text:Very harsh massage. And the masseuse keep talking with the lady next room, it was not at all relaxing. And the staff at the reception wasn’t friendly. | review_rating:1, text:Wouldn’t recommend this place.
I was told by the receptionist lady that there was no masseuse available, so I thought a masseur would do because I had requested a 1 hour head, shoulder, and back massage. I told the lady to tell him to avoid from the sensitive areas like the chest and underarms.
We agreed & proceed with the payment.

However, there are a few things that have severely disappointed me:

1. The masseur asked me to lie face down and begin with leg massage. I was confused and asked him, but his response was brief: "wait" till he focused on so much of my hip, at which point I asked if he could start with head and shoulder massage?

2. When we continue with the head and shoulder massage, he tends to “massage” my chest, which makes me feel so uncomfortable that I have to stop him right away.

3. He assumed the massage was 30mins instead of 60 mins until I ask him to double check with the receptionist again.

4. I think they need proper training / professional training, comparable what he has done on the right side, but it was different on the left. Either too much emphasis on the right or only for a short time on the left.

5. Overall experience was really bad due to poor communication. Even if you ask a basic question, either no response or unable to communicate. The massage was ineffective as it did not help on my stiff shoulder and heavy head. | review_rating:4, text:Good massage after long day walk in Sunway pyramid shopping mall. Not cozy environment but reasonable price if compared to Thai Odyssey

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I have so much anger for this restaurant.

1) No one gives me a QR code when I sit down. I had to go to the counter to take it MYSELF! The waiters weren't even busy, the restaurant only has a few (5-6) customers.

2) Just as my food was served, I saw a cockroach climbing on my table. I raised my hand for so long (and 3 times) yet no one comes.

The customer service is so bad that I will never come here anymore. I absolutely DON'T recommend this restaurant to anyone. | review_rating:1, text:1. Customer service is out! No greetings, No smile and No explaination given as to how to order etc.

2. Cutleries is dirty and table is not clean when customer leave eventhough outlet is not busy.

3. Ordered their gyudon n yakiniku beef but we felf cheated as the same beef is being used for those menu. When asked their staff, they said oh! gyudon & yakiniku is actually the cooking style (MEANS THEY DON'T EVEN HAVE PRODUCT KNOWLEDGE)! No manager / No supervisor at the outlet. Staff had to call the manager and to my surprise, even the manager do not have product knowledge as to what is gyudon & yakiniku is! Manager blammed on the management. So as the customer i feel you guys are cheating ur customers. Price is different for both gyudon & yakiniku. | review_rating:1, text:Regret. Truly regrettable coming here. Better put other food in my belly and experience great pyramid eateries beside this one. Food is same as other reviewers, disappointing, cold, even for plating they don't put a single effort.

Outstanding mention goes to the service: the woman working here that I will put the picture as listed. Not friendly, not polite, almost fall down bring my food just in front of my table without any single apologise directly throw the food on my table. I was quite shocked honestly but she's just not supposed to be in F&B industry. If u had a bad day, it's the worse decision to throw it to customers. that say Yakiniku Don comes with thicker beef slice than the Gyudon offers. Came to surprise is just the same beef from the menu gyudon with higher selling price. reviews: review_rating:5, text:I am a fan & supporter of this Korean brand since I switched from Laneige 5 years ago in 2019 when Yoona was the spokesperson for this brand. But nowadays I don’t see much variety and colours of this brand anymore, many products has discontinued, it is getting more & more casual and simple, the colour & shape of products are almost the same and very difficult to identify the item that I am looking for until I read the shelf taller or told & explain by the staff. She genuinely understood my skin condition and gave excellent advice. | review_rating:1, text:Came in to buy sunscreen so i grab one from the shelves. Then i wanted to browse some more but i was suddenly approached by one of the shop staff and she just grab the sunscreen from me and started to follow me around. I felt uneasy and uncomfortable as it seems like she felt i would've steal things. Tbh im fine with her just following me around but the grabbing of things from me was so ughh. So i just told her i wanted to pay and i left after paying. I was in and out for less than 3 mins because of this experience. I will never step foot in this innisfree anymore. This is the first time i was treated this way. And i actually read through some of the reviews of this outlet and there are others who experience this. My time stamp was 22nd Nov 2024 1.56pm.
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Brooks
location: F1.58C, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had an excellent experience at the Brooks Outlet, thanks to Mr. Iskandar! From the moment I walked in, he was incredibly attentive, friendly, and helpful. He took the time to provide detailed information about the different trail shoes, ensuring I found the perfect pair for my needs. What impressed me the most was his knowledge and dedication—he even taught me the proper way to tie my shoes for the best fit and support.

It’s rare to find such outstanding customer service, and Mr. Iskandar truly went above and beyond. Kudos to Brooks for having such an amazing employee! I highly recommend visiting if you're looking for expert advice and top-notch service. | review_rating:5, text:I had been served by two friendly handsome guys and a gentle lady. ISKANDAR AND MANSON look for them. They not only salesperson. They have very good knowledge. | review_rating:5, text:I was so happy with my purchase today. At first the shoes I like doesn’t have my size. Manson is so great at recommending suitable shoes for my feet and also explain the functionality of the shoes and how to take care of it, plus how to wear it properly so you can protect ur feet/leg. It was a fun and happy moment having Manson during the purchase. My friend couldn’t resist and also bought the limited ed cascadia. I got myself a Ghost max. Super happy and will come back for Manson for next purchase. Super duper recommended! | review_rating:5, text:The salesperson, Manson is very knowledgeable about the functions of the shoes. He explained to me patiently and recommended the shoes that suits me. Great experience and good service. | review_rating:5, text:1) I went to this Brooks outlet for the first time. I was served by Mr.Syed. He seemed knowlegeable about shoes, polite and not hard-pressing me to buy. He listened to my preferences and opinions intently until I said I wanted to compare Brooks with another shoe store nearby.
2) I went to the other shoe store and in summary was not satisfied with my encounter there.
3) I returned to Brooks and Mr.Syed took the time to entertain my queries with enthusiasm. I finally bought a pair of 17 for trail and hiking. By this time, the store owner arrived and I expressed my satisfying experience there. The owner requested me to write a review and this is why you can read this note now.
4) One lesson learnt is, respect and honour your customer well by employing a knowlegeable staff with the correct attitude and aptitude, like Mr.Syed. Tqvm.

name: MAHNAZ FOOD
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Things are not sold as advertised. It states clearly 10% off for all types of honey but when we were paying, the cashier charged full price. When we asked about the discount she said this is full price, 10% is only for selected honey. Not that I mind paying full price but dishonest marketing is what ticks me off. I went back and look at the advertisement again: no fine print saying selected honey. This is a fraud. | review_rating:1, text:I I bought before 2 weeks olive oil bottle for 36 RM now it's 50 how come it's still same my old bottle it's not new goods | review_rating:4, text:Credit card payment ok | review_rating:5, text:No Review | review_rating:5, text:No Review

name: Honey Bibi
location: Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:This is the first time I felt so mad, what attitude is this, my friend and I took a white dress and wanted to try, when we went to the fitting room, the staff just stand inside the fitting room hiding behind the curtain stare at you weirdly without saying anything, when they finally walk away, and we wanted to get in, there isn’t anyone wanted to serve us, it’s ok, but they didn’t talk to us that we can’t try white color clothes, instead one of the staff madly doing her stuff and point at the sign that mentioned white clothes are not allowed to try. I understand about their concern but I really don’t understand their attitude. | review_rating:1, text:It would be great if we can review without giving any star. From all the reviews I read about this store on their customer service , all are very bad. Same here , just bought a white long skirt for my daughter. Before that, we found other colours available but not white . We spotted the same piece in white but was on the mannequin so we politely asked if we could get that ? There are 2 female staff (one taller and slimmer whereas the other one is on the chubby side ). The slimmer staff threw us a weird look when we asked for the piece on the mannequin  and she did not answer us immediately but informed her colleague about our request and after that the slimmer staff came back to  us and rudely told us ‘white one cannot try’. I said OK..  both staff are not friendly and they looked as if they have never been trained to serve customer and don’t know the right way to even communicate. Very bad for the shop cos after so many bad reviews , it seems owner of the business has done nothing to improve. | review_rating:1, text:Staff ：Make sure you try already will buy
So pity the boss got like this staff. No next visit. | review_rating:1, text:Poor service and staff are rude, asking them for the size and their face like want you to leave quickly. Ask what also don’t know don’t know, don’t want to do business at all | review_rating:1, text:This is probably the worst store I have ever visited. The display item didn’t have S size, so I went to the counter and ask them for S size, and they told me I can’t try white clothes, which I’m not going to try it on. After that one of the worker gave me S size but there was some make up stain on the skirt so I went again and ask them if they could exchange another one for me, they told me so rudely again that I can’t try on, I said I’m not going to. It’s just the skirt is dirty, which I would want another one. Then they just ask me so rudely whether I want to buy or not. Omg I feel so criticised by their words. and they didn’t even say sorry to me. PLEASE DON’T EVER VISIT THIS STORE.

name: Dior
location: LOT G1.137, GROUND FLOOR SUNWAY PYRAMID SHOPPING MALL, NO. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I went to this store today with my mom. Maybe it's because we dressed casually, but when we entered, I tried some perfume samples and decided to buy a new one, as I had used it before. Unfortunately, an auntie SA suddenly approached us, briefly promoted the product, and then just left us there. My mom noticed that her expression seemed to suggest she thought we couldn't afford the price, and as a result, she didn't want to serve us . Immediately, my mom took me to another brand, where the SA was much more professional. Please make sure to properly train your sales associates. Cuz same price customer can get different service | review_rating:2, text:The concerns raised in other reviews about the service are valid—don’t expect exceptional treatment, especially from the older staff.

When I walked in and asked for input on specific product, I needed some opinions on what to get, an older staff simply pointed me to a section without offering any real help and quickly moved on to attend to someone else while also showing a strong attitude.

Only reason I'm giving 2 stars instead of 1 is because there's a chinese guy that is much friendlier and attentive compared to the rest. If he wasn't there, I wouldn't recommend anyone to go if service matters to you. | review_rating:1, text:I visited the Dior store in Sunway Pyramid on 24/12/2024, the female staff had single eyelids, tall figure, I don't remember her name, she advised me and showed contempt for me, I bought a product of Sauvage men's perfume 100ml, and with such contempt for customers, I will never return to the Dior store again. | review_rating:3, text:Previously i used to buy my makeup at Dior Sunway Pyramid. Used to entertain by a sales girl. They did a great job. But few days back, i went there to buy perfume. But unfortunately, a chinese specky sales boy who entertained me doesnt ask for my email (member). Normally they did keyed-in my data before i made a payment but this guy doesnt ask for my data at all. So i’m quite disappointed. Either he forget or he doesnt want to entertain me as his client. | review_rating:1, text:This happened a couple of years back. I'm writing now because another person said something about an old woman who works there. So here's what happened. This old lady that worked there was extremely rude and basically said that there's no shade for my skin tone in their shop in a condescending manner when I entered the store. Mind you, I'm Indian. She was constantly making comments on my skin texture by comparing it to my sister's. It made me feel very insecure.  She was also hesitant to help out. No smile or polite gestures. I left without buying anything because I was so upset. A couple of weeks later I passed by dior again. The same woman was very smiley and inviting to a few Chinese girls who were walking across to enter the branch. Feels very racist. The management should do something about this.

It's highly unprofessional for someone to treat a customer in such a manner. Do better, Dior Sunway Pyramid

name: Hua Wei
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Black Tap Craft Burgers & Shakes
location: Lobby Level, Sunway Resort, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:First-time customers. I came here with my family, and we all left with our bellies full and smiles on our faces. The food was great, everything we ordered was cooked to perfection. The music choice was very much appreciated (up tempo hip hop from the 90s and some new Jack swing) in the background while I watched the 2024 Olympics. The customer service we received from Cole, who gave us the best advice when ordering our food (and he makes excellent milkshakes). Wheng and Natsuha also made our experience lovely. We were made to feel very welcomed to the BLACK TAP. I would gladly go back and do it all over again. | review_rating:4, text:Nice air conditioned restaurant, plenty of seatings. The burgers were mediocre, the burgers I ordered had dry patties that were under seasoned; quite disappointing but the milkshake and fries are good. Gotta love the over the top milkshakes.
Overall a good experience. | review_rating:4, text:Ive visited here since it opened and with time, the lunch deals Portions has been getting smaller .

I can finish the food nowadays compared to the initial days when it opened :(
Taste still decent, but i prefer american portion for an american restaurant.
I like that the lunch menu expanded, and iced tea is now sugar free but my complain is the portion. | review_rating:5, text:First time guest in blacktap. Had a Good atmosphere and excellent service! | review_rating:3, text:The burgers were mediocre, but the milkshake and onion rings were good. I’ve visited many black taps, this branch pales in comparison to the others. Both burgers we ordered had dry patties that were under seasoned; quite disappointing.

Overall a below average experience.

name: Michael Kors
location: Lot G1.12 & 1.13, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:That one free hair chubby girl was very rude, my mom went to the store under dressed and only wear slippers, the girl look down on her as she did not served my mom well until my mom told her that she own michael kors’ watch where she bought from US. Then only the girl start to serve well. But still it’s very rude. You’re just a salesgirl tho. | review_rating:5, text:Staff named Farah offered a great customer service to me during my visit on 28/11/2022. She was really helpful and always smiling when dealing with customer. Keep it up Ms. Farah! ❤️ | review_rating:1, text:The service sucks. Not friendly at all.  I went in and no one greeted us and instead was busy chit chatting away. Didnt even bother helping me with my shoe size. Just because I was dressed down doesnt mean I’m any less of your customer. Nevertheless, came out with a pair of shoes just because i was desperate to get it if i wasnt i wouldve just left. How tired or moody you were, youre still working in customer service please fix the arrogant attitude. -1/10 wont be coming back to this outlet. | review_rating:4, text:Staff are attentive. But product design has dropped. They used to be good. | review_rating:5, text:The service is excellent, and Farah is very patient, providing me with perfect after-sales service.

name: Watches of Switzerland Repair Centre
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:I drop by to this place because i want to switch my watch bracelet to fabric strap, but the lady told me to put down my watch for 2 weeks, and wait for quotation...??? , changing strap with tools usually can be done in 2 minutes. She just said: I dont know anything about watch. | review_rating:1, text:The chinese old aunty that literally wasted my time. I made a call to ask her if the store provides authentication service, she said " have to bring for my bos to check ". I drove my way to the mall, brought my watch only to discover she doesn't understand a single thing in regards of my queries. She doesn't know what is fake or what is original watch. I had to repeat a lot of times that , thats the reason why I am there in the first place. I want to know if the watch is real or not. Pls work on your customer skills. I wouldn't be going there if it weren't for you. Respect other people's time. | review_rating:1, text:I sent my mom’s watch for a fix here in November 2022. They kept telling me that they would let me know when the watch is ready because they have to send it somewhere else for the parts. I waited for months and they never called or provided any explanation for it taking so long or any further follow up. In the end they did not fix it at all. Very unprofessional and unreliable company. 0/5. Would not recommend. | review_rating:1, text:Very bad service which was meant to specialize in swiss watches. Kept delaying and no news about my watch still. Its been 2 months. | review_rating:1, text:Would leave 0 star if i could to leave a review. Lady scratched and dented my battery cover only to find out she doesn’t have the right tools to open it. No replacement no explanation. Terrible service 🤮

name: Parkson
location: G1.22,LL1.26, LL2.21 & LL3.05, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:We dropped by this place to look for ladies apparel. They have many brands with reasonable prices, especially during sales. The sales assistant at one of the sections was helpful and got us a new item from stock. A good place for clothes during festive season. | review_rating:3, text:A similar store to other Parkson stores. However, it is on three floors and each floor is geared towards a different gender. The ground floor is aimed at children and young people. | review_rating:4, text:Parkson is a reliable place for a quality shopping experience. They offer a great range of products, from clothing and accessories to home essentials and beauty items, catering to different tastes and budgets. The store layout is well-organized, making it easy to find what you need. The staff is friendly and generally helpful, providing good customer service. The sales and discounts are a nice bonus, offering great deals on quality products. The only room for improvement would be a more diverse variety in certain sections, but overall, it's a great place to shop! | review_rating:4, text:Love the clothes and items here but we all know it’s the holidays. Queue to Pay is extremely long and only 1 person at counter…
Should have more staff to handle during peak times.
Choices 5*
Service/Cashier 1* | review_rating:1, text:very bad experience at here, for Brand Larrie girl shoes, all way we need to try shoes, no body to serve us, staff at the photo Larrie Brand are playing phone, or chit chat with Scholl brand staff only, and  discuss about holiday, and plan for MC to get their holiday, and the way he talk is going instruct me to make payment at cashier 2, very horrible service.

name: DubuYo
location: LG2.92, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The food is amazing! Don’t be fooled by the small portion sizes (for me)—they left me completely full by the end. However, the spicy chicken isn't very spicy, so if you're a spice lover, your cravings might not be fully satisfied here. | review_rating:4, text:I order spicy seafood ramyeon and the food is exactly like the pic on menu, the set was included with drinks and side dishes for rm20. The ramyeon was really tasty, spicy enough and did NOT SOGGY! ...The roasted barley was good bcs i dont want to drink sweet peach tea ....but the side dishes was like meh to me... Only the kimchi was okey for me....staff service also polite and overall I rate 4.5/5!!! | review_rating:1, text:Disgusting. Should have read the google reviews before coming. Posts that says dirty or food poisoning, mostly is 99% true. Went and had dinner, had few bites of the tofu stew, and then i saw the squid ring.

First time in my life i see squid ring has this “texture”. I tried to scrap off with my finger and it came off easily. Made a complain to cancel the food and asked what was it. The staff came back later and say because its frozen squid ring, after cooked, the skin becomes like this cause of the bubbles. Really? Like really im supposed to believe that? Or is it a fly laid eggs on it thats why it has those white things? Don’t say they are sesame seed also because they are smaller than that. I’ve asked a chef that has been dealing with frozen squid rings for years, he mentioned he never seen such thing before.

Third photo is an example of fly eggs (zoomed in) that was sent by my friend that works in pest control company. Not sure if its the same thing found on the squid, but better be safe than sorry.

Last visit for Dubuyo outlets. | review_rating:4, text:Great food options with affordable prices and set menus available too.

Got the honey garlic chicken lunch set. Portion is worth the price.
But while the food was still tasty, the chicken did not actually taste like honey garlic. Food presentation for this dish could be improved. The iced barley tea was also extremely watered down. Tasted like nothing but ice water.

Would still come back but maybe try a different dish.

The soondubu and ramyeon looked good. | review_rating:5, text:Great place! The food was delicious, the portions were big, and everything was satisfying. but there was a small mix-up with my friend’s order. However, they quickly fixed it, so overall, it was a nice experience.

name: LC WAIKIKI
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Maisen Tonkatsu
location: LG1.45, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:This is my first visit.
The restaurant was busy during lunch time on Christmas.
Foods were served quite fast (within 15 mins).
I ordered 3 different dishes and they taste good.

I felt the seating was a bit too close. Not only lack privacy but also hard to move. | review_rating:2, text:First try, the tenderloin pork is separate and not firm at all. Doesn’t give you a good satisfied bite, the texture is just too weird. Cabbage is too thick and .Will think twice before I revisit. There is better tonkatsu next door 🫢 | review_rating:5, text:First time here to try out iberico katsu, the texture are smooth & taste are sweet. Plus match with their specialize black sauce it's perfect! Free refill for rice & miso soup if order in set which comes with pickles, fruits & tofu. | review_rating:3, text:My daughter ordered the Katsu Mabushi set, where there is a procedure of putting the rice in a separate bowl, add the garnishing then the soup. The taste was okay.

I ordered the Jumbo Tenderloin Katsu set to share with my parents. The pork was tender and nicely bartered and fried. It tasted better with the sauce, as it is a little dry. My parents liked that we can order refills for the cabbage, which we did, twice! And similarly, it was paired with a cabbage seasoning sauce. | review_rating:4, text:Went here because I won a Tonkatsu set from dinning in Ippudo.
Quite a lot of customers here. We were lucky to come early.

Food mainly don and ramen.
Price a higher range. But fresh.
The ssignature sauces are great. Good to try it out.
Free refill of rice and salad if you order set.

The tamago (dashimaki kushikatsu) was not compact enough. It broke in the middle.

Staffs are friendly and attentive.

name: Auntie Anne's
location: LG1.38 A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:Auntie Anne's at Sunway Pyramid is a go-to spot for tasty pretzels. They're always fresh, warm, and have that perfect balance of softness and chewiness. Whether you're into the classic pretzel or have a sweet tooth for the cinnamon sugar, they've got you covered. The service is friendly and quick, even when there's a bit of a queue. The place is clean and well-maintained, making it a nice stop during a shopping trip. Prices are fair for the quality, and the pretzels are consistently delicious. Four stars for sure! | review_rating:4, text:Tried auntie anne's multiple times. My first time, the pretzels were very tough to chew - I suspected they were not fresh. My second time, their payment system was not working and they could only take cash, which is a huge issue in this day and age. Finally, today I had my first good experience. No issue with payment, my order was served hot, and the jumbo cheese sausage tasted fantastic. Hope they keep this up | review_rating:2, text:The stix was made earlier and become stale. Even the chocolate is very little and no friendly service by the staffs. Even didnt understand English..should improve the preparation of the food since the price is also increasing. | review_rating:5, text:my favourite snack while coming to Sunway Pyramid definitely Auntie Annes! loved the texture of the pretzels and sauce it’s so tempting! | review_rating:1, text:Had a shitty experience, waited in line for >5minutes and nobody was at the cashier taking any orders, with no staff informing of the long wait. All 3 staff seemed too busy minding their own business than actually serving up any orders. Even a few customers behind me walked away. What a lousy experience.
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: PENANG CHENDUL
location: LG2.90, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Penang Chendul at Sunway Pyramid was a bit of a letdown. The service was slow and unremarkable, with food delivery feeling sluggish. While the coffee was strong and sweet, the overall dining experience didn't stand out. The ambience was quite plain, lacking any unique charm. Given the number of better dining options nearby, I’d rate this restaurant 2 stars. There’s definitely room for improvement. | review_rating:3, text:For those craving for the famous Cendol at Lorong Selamat, Georgetown, Penang, can come here for temporary enjoyment. During the 1st 2 years from opening, the green cendol, Melaka sugar and coconut milk were very good, original and same as the original stall in Penang, but the taste and quality had dropped after that and recently it was back to standard but not that original since it opened anymore. The restaurant right now more look like Warong or Malay Restaurant, just come here for a bowl of cendol is more than enough or just drive up to Georgetown for the original type. The owner of this Cendol, not the owner of this restaurant as it is the franchise restaurant, Mr. Tan Chong Kim and his family (Jimm, Florence & Owen) should regular visit and spot check on the quality and standard at the franchise restaurants before the franchise restaurants screw up the taste and image of his father or grandfather’s (Mr. Tan Teik Fuang) hard created cendol. You may consider to terminate the franchise agreement with them, if you feel that the taste is not as original or tasty as from your stall | review_rating:5, text:Currently got first sign up gift buy one free one signature chendul, claiming process is very fast, and muarchi Rm3 with any purchase👍🏻
Asam laksa and rojak was delicious here👍🏻
Only setback was not enough air-conditioning here. | review_rating:5, text:I was contemplating to eat a good cendul until I came across Penang Chendul in Sunway pyramid when the staff Verral approached me.
He was very attentive and keen to let me know the current promotion and also suggest what to eat in the shop.
I'm very happy with the services and would come again for sure! | review_rating:5, text:One of my favorite places for cendol. Can redeem with maxis or hotlink for a cheaper price. Food ok.

name: nononsense coffee
location: LG 1.33 LG 1.35 - LG Sunway Pyramid Sunway City Sunway 3, Jalan PJS 11/15 Sunway City, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:First visit today; Friday morning 11am. Not too busy. Had a simple black coffee hot. Not much of a serious coffee drinker; taste different from normal; amazing fragrance and deep taste. Enjoyed the coffee and ambience. Great port of call away from the busy mall scene outside. | review_rating:5, text:A very unique spot tucked away, offering a peaceful escape from the busy mall atmosphere. The coffee was fantastic – rich and full of flavor. However, found the chocolate roll to be a bit underwhelming, as it lacked the depth of flavors I was hoping for. Overall, it’s a great place to unwind with a good cup of coffee. | review_rating:4, text:I love the ambience of the place, very unique and is based on Japanese anime. The staffs were very friendly and helpful. They have desserts and drinks so I ordered the dark chocolate cake and a fujisan drink. Honestly, the dessert is just average but I like their drink. It is slightly pricey and the place is small but it's a good place for those who want to do quick office work. | review_rating:5, text:A cozy and quiet coffee shop hidden away in a busy mall. The coffee selection was great and I really enjoyed my cup! Great place to sit down and relax in the midst of a busy mall. Will visit again and definitely recommend to others. | review_rating:5, text:Price is on the higher end, the coffee was very good but a little too sour for my own preference, match latte was perfect. Great atmosphere.

name: LAMY
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Lung Ngen Claypot Coffee
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.138, C2, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway46150, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Visited during the opening.

Ordered a Claypot Thai Milk Coffee.

Was so looking forward to an "immersive tasting experience". Unfortunately, none at all! Neither was there any touted "exotic aroma" nor "intricate flavours". Coffee was mediocre -- lacked strength and richness. Disappointed!

Also ordered Pak Lung's Roti Bakar. Pandan was good - smooth, rich, creamy and fragrant. But roti bakar was squashed as if someone had squeezed it and wasn't well toasted.

Nevertheless, splendid location with good vantage point to watch the world go by. Good pitstop to take a break from shopping. | review_rating:4, text:The aroma is very nice when you are near the shop.
I like their menu choices, habe tried the thai milk tea and butterfly pea milk. Both refreshing and smells very nice.
Only downside is that its way too sweet for me. | review_rating:5, text:Opening Promotion till 11/11/24, buy 2 free 1.

Excellent coffee with a unique flavor where it is fused with Pandan leaves.

Do remember to ask for your preferred level of sweetness.

Good place to sit and watch the world breeze by. | review_rating:5, text:Located at LG2, beside the escalator near Bungkus Kaw Kaw..

The atmosphere is great and comfy.. eventhough there is only 7 table at this shop.. to stop and take a stop is great here.. have your coffee or teatime here..

Currently the menu that i LOVE is Claypot Thai Tea Milk, Claypot Thai Tea Coffee, Claypot Thai Cocoa, Claypot Thai Horkasai, Thai Lemon Tea and Last But Not Least Thai Claypot Thai Green Milk Tea.. The Price is reasonable to upgrade only Add On RM1.. The packaging itself is nice and engaging..

Staff is friendly and great.. very helpful and help customer to guide what is their signature drink.. overall happy with this drink..

Recommended to try here in LUNG NGEN Thai Claypot Coffee.. ☕️🍵

Just come here again.. as usual the service is topnotch.. :) | review_rating:5, text:Honestly one of the good (not too sweet) tea or coffee if you like it Thai Style. The prices are in the reasonable range of about RM10-12. Should give it a try!

name: Mr Bean
location: F1. 92 & 93, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I had a pleasant experience visiting Mr Bean at Sunway Pyramid. The menu offered a variety of fresh soy-based snacks and beverages, perfect for a quick, healthy treat. I tried their signature soymilk, which was delicious and freshly prepared. The staff service was okay but could be improved, as it took slightly longer than expected. I hope it will be quicker next time. The outlet was clean and well-maintained, making it an inviting spot to relax. | review_rating:4, text:Healthy tasting dessert. Recommend for soy milk lovers!

We ordered:
☑️ Ginger soup Tau Fu fah —  mild spicy ginger kick. Taro balls are chewy. Recommend for ginger lovers.
☑️ Original soy ice cream — prominent soy bean flavor which I loved. Recommend!
☑️ Chocolate Japanese Obanyaki Pancake — chocolate flavor is jot too strong. Tastes like what you would expect.

Staff are friendly and service is quick. | review_rating:1, text:I’m really disappointed with my recent visit to MR. Bean. I ordered a soya bean curd with taro ball add-on, which cost RM3 extra, but it only came with 4 mini taro balls. This was shocking, so I questioned the cashier. They added 2 more mini taro balls, but it still felt like very poor value for money.

Additionally, the soya bean curd itself lacked the rich, authentic soya taste I was expecting. It was bland and did not meet the standard I’ve experienced at other similar shops.

Overall, this was not a good experience for the price I paid, and I hope the shop can improve its quality and portion sizes. | review_rating:4, text:No, this Mr Bean has nothing to do with Mr Bean the classic comedy series. Yes, it is yet another dessert chain outlet that serves overpriced artisan Tau Fu Fah.

I've nothing against such outlets as it is good that the traditional dessert is enjoying a sudden resurgence of late. However, Tau Fu Fah is a rather simple dessert and I've always found it difficult to swallow the sky-high prices.

Prices aside, the Tau Fu Fah here is smooth and creamy, just the way I like it. It is nice that customers have options on the type of sugar and the sugar level but on the other hand be prepared to pay up to RM2 more for some of the sugar options. Ironically, you don't get a discount if you opt for just 25% sugar level.

Besides the soya items, they also serve Japanese Pancakes with a variety of both sweet and savory fillings. These are pretty good but also pretty pricey. | review_rating:4, text:the pancake is a bit dry, filling is very less and only the dough is thick. for the dessert is decent

name: TGV Cinemas
location: F1.01, Level 1, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Attend for Red One Premiere, I hate the person in charge just too restricted on checking time on my phone just telling not use phone, Hello I am not using phone, try to understand your customer before say something.

Not to come this place again | review_rating:5, text:Nicest movie theater in town. The cinema screen, sound system are brilliant for me. | review_rating:1, text:They need to REVAMP this ENTIRE CINEMA.

1) It smells so bad, like a pungent smell, something like stinky, musty socks EVERYWHERE here. Either it's coming from the nasty and dirty carpets, or the mold growing on the ceiling.

2) I remember when this cinema used to be one of the coldest cinemas I went to, and now, it's so stuffy and warm here. Broken AC or just being a cheapskate?

Please CONSIDER these two problems but please deal with problem no. 1 especially. Avoiding this cinema until they decide to actually fix the smell and the mold problem.

Do not go here if you are very sensitive to nasty smells. | review_rating:2, text:The movie experience is always fantastic, and the IMAX is superb. The only thing that could be improved is the popcorn. The signature caramel popcorn is often stale—fresh and crisp popcorn would make the experience even better! | review_rating:5, text:The sound and picture are great.  Theaters are at a good temperature. The IMAX theater is awesome.  All the theater seats are so comfortable. The beanie theatre is pretty cool. Clean washroom.  Lounge area available.  Exits are well lit. No WiFi.  There's always a display you can interact with even within the mall. Make sure to snap some pictures.

name: Spectrum Forex Money Changer
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:They delivers exceptional service and unbeatable rates, far better than the other branches. It’s a weird why more customers don’t know about this fantastic shop. Friendly, professional, and always goes the extra mile. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great deals and outstanding customer care.
I would recommend mr.fairoze services at SPECTRUM 3 in Sunway Pyramid Mall
Don’t miss out this is the place to go! | review_rating:1, text:Good rate but bad attitude.

I went to the G floor branch (next to Parkson).

The first time I went to counter 1 to change A currency, I said I wanted to split two receipts, he said he couldn’t split the transaction and asked me to queue up again.

OK, Second time I went to counter 1 again (only 1 counter is open) and changed A currency.

Seeing that there was no one in line behind me, I said I wanted to change B currency, he said no, he could only change money from one country per person at a time, which means I had to wait until someone came to queue up to change money before I could change money for the third time?

Meanwhile counter 2 is open, then I pointed to counter 2 and asked if I could change money, counter 1 said NO, because counter 2 is new and he didn’t know how to do it.

So does a money changer have such a rule now??? | review_rating:4, text:SMALL MONEY CHANGER IN A BIG MALL. FAST SERVICE.
EXCHANGE RATE IS AVERAGE.
MUST SHOW YOUR NRIC OR PASSPORT TO BUY OR SELL THE CURRENCIES. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recomended.Good rate and good service. Same rate as the other shop in the middle but no queue compared to the middle one. | review_rating:5, text:This is consider the best rate money changer in Subang Jaya area and after Mid Valley. Another option you may go for competitive rate within same area is Subang Parade. To those customers who had issue with uncle previously, it is depend on how you talk or behave toward him at first. I had deal with him for more than 10 years but never have any issue based on mutual respect of each others. He is a nice guy anyway. Recommend this place!

location: Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:3, text:Accompany my gf to buy eyeliner. Nothing special. No staff attended to us, they were just chatting. Nice ambience though. Surprised to find they do sell masks too. Maybe nowadays masks are sold everywhere. | review_rating:1, text:Walked in few times, no one bother to entertain. Staffs were busy chatting. I was a bit put off and rather not buy anything, even though there is a sale going on. name: Mr Bean
location: F1. 92 & 93, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I had a pleasant experience visiting Mr Bean at Sunway Pyramid. The menu offered a variety of fresh soy-based snacks and beverages, perfect for a quick, healthy treat. I tried their signature soymilk, which was delicious and freshly prepared. The staff service was okay but could be improved, as it took slightly longer than expected. I hope it will be quicker next time. The outlet was clean and well-maintained, making it an inviting spot to relax. | review_rating:4, text:Healthy tasting dessert. Recommend for soy milk lovers!

We ordered:
☑️ Ginger soup Tau Fu fah —  mild spicy ginger kick. Taro balls are chewy. Recommend for ginger lovers.
☑️ Original soy ice cream — prominent soy bean flavor which I loved. Recommend!
☑️ Chocolate Japanese Obanyaki Pancake — chocolate flavor is jot too strong. Tastes like what you would expect.

Staff are friendly and service is quick. | review_rating:1, text:I’m really disappointed with my recent visit to MR. Bean. I ordered a soya bean curd with taro ball add-on, which cost RM3 extra, but it only came with 4 mini taro balls. This was shocking, so I questioned the cashier. They added 2 more mini taro balls, but it still felt like very poor value for money.

Additionally, the soya bean curd itself lacked the rich, authentic soya taste I was expecting. It was bland and did not meet the standard I’ve experienced at other similar shops.

Overall, this was not a good experience for the price I paid, and I hope the shop can improve its quality and portion sizes. | review_rating:4, text:No, this Mr Bean has nothing to do with Mr Bean the classic comedy series. Yes, it is yet another dessert chain outlet that serves overpriced artisan Tau Fu Fah.

I've nothing against such outlets as it is good that the traditional dessert is enjoying a sudden resurgence of late. However, Tau Fu Fah is a rather simple dessert and I've always found it difficult to swallow the sky-high prices.

Prices aside, the Tau Fu Fah here is smooth and creamy, just the way I like it. It is nice that customers have options on the type of sugar and the sugar level but on the other hand be prepared to pay up to RM2 more for some of the sugar options. Ironically, you don't get a discount if you opt for just 25% sugar level.

Besides the soya items, they also serve Japanese Pancakes with a variety of both sweet and savory fillings. These are pretty good but also pretty pricey. | review_rating:4, text:the pancake is a bit dry, filling is very less and only the dough is thick. for the dessert is decent

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I’m absolutely in love with the staff. They were so friendly and helpful with me (just an aunty trying to get free stuff). Guiding me thru the app and how to redeem a B1F1. It was kind of them to be so patient with me. The drinks were exceptionally good, as always. I love ZUS!! Thank you again, for the wonderful experience and memories! | review_rating:4, text:This is my very first time to try the drinks in this outlet. The look and feel of the outlet were good, service was good, the taste of the drinks was good with lots of creative favours but not enough aroma and kaw yet, anyway your drinks are much much more better a lot than Costa Coffee in KLIA 1 | review_rating:5, text:My drinks were served lightning fast. They even remember who ordered what, so instead of calling out the order number, they gestured to me when my drinks were ready. I tried the honey lemon and iced chocolate. Both were very good, especially the honey lemon. I can taste a lot of honey when most businesses usually put a lot of lemon or tea. The price is very reasonable for the quality. Considering the other options, I think I'm switching to Zus Coffee as my go-to drinks shop. | review_rating:5, text:I’m absolutely in love with the staff. They were so friendly and helpful. The drinks were exceptionally good, as always. I love ZUS!! Thank you again, for the wonderful experience and memories! | review_rating:5, text:Very efficient staff despite a big crowd of customers. Cashier was also friendly. And surprisingly my Butterbae was ready within 5 minutes!
Highly recommend this outlet!

reviews:

Had to call up CS and made arrangements to replace my order. Such a hassle for small order. | review_rating:1, text:I'm waiting for my food for almost 20 mins. I saw all staff prioritize takeaway orders. When my food came, then my orders were not accurate, no coslow and mash. I did ask the kakak without tudung and tudung, but they just ignored me for almost 10 mins. They replied ok and ok and ok. KFC management should emphasize this attitude to all staff. Customer first! | review_rating:4, text:Ordered:
1. crispy chicken satay burger with B1F1 promotion
2. combo set of samyang cheezilla burger (incl. A fried chicken, mashed potato & drinks)

Satay chicken burger
✅️ we loved it
✅️ crispy and hot
✅️ bigger chicken fillet size

Although we waited for quite awhile because kitchen was preparing but for the crispiness it is acceptable.

Samyang cheezilla burger

Staff

✅️ walking around to serve | review_rating:1, text:Total wait time was about an hr 30mins, had to order at the counter due to vouchers. They have their waiting numbers, but somehow the staff do not follow them according to the order. Which is confusing, whoever reads this, Please fix your systems and staff. Staff Was also very very rude. Heard her saying to her co worker, “ Bodoh punya customer. Suruh dia tunggu “. Which questions me, is this how your front of the line staff is supposed to treat your customers ?

name: Harvestz Fashion
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: adidas Brand Center
category: shoe_store, clothing_store, sporting_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot LG1.18 - 1.20A, LG Floor, 47500, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Massive store, that’s why it’s the brand centre I suppose? I went to pick up an online order and unfortunately, there were some hiccups. After showering my order number, the staff went to look for my parcel and said it’s not there. Impossible, because I have a picture of it being delivered. After the second time, they managed to find my parcel. That was the only issue. While waiting for the staff to look for my item, I browsed around and they had a crazy sale. I ended up buying shoes because it was up to 70% off for it! | review_rating:5, text:Fantastic set up. This is the biggest and the most comprehensive outlet of Adidas. Best Adidas outlet in Malaysia without a doubt. The staffs are all pro-active and very knowledgeable about its products. It has 2 floors. Adidas Performance at the lower floor and Adidas Originals on the upper floor. Widest selection is available here and you get the latest products and customization here too 👍 highly recommended. Well done! | review_rating:1, text:I was at your adidas branch on the 26th of January on Sunday. Went there to purchase & customize a Jersey. STAFF no. 1 served me and went to confirm with the customization team which letters and numbers were available in stock. After confirming, STAFF no. 1 said that ONLY THE LETTER A was not in stock so he recommended me to purchase the letter at the Liverpool store opposite of adidas ( apparently he said that adidas customers do that when adidas runs out of letters or numbers ) So I went and purchase the letter A at the Liverpool store and went back to adidas to finally purchase the jersey. When I came back to the store I was served by STAFF NO. 2. STAFF NO. 2 brought me to the customization area to confirm the customization after I had told them the story of me purchasing the letter A. When I was at the customization counter suddenly the customization staff now said NUMBER 1 is also out of stock? To add another plot twist to the story after going back and forth with the staffs there, the same customization staff that initially SAID THE LETTER A and NUMBER 1 was unavailable suddenly said THE LETTER S is also out of stock when I showed him the player’s name and number for the second time? And what would have happened and how would it have been resolved if I went to the Liverpool store again and purchased the number 1 only for the hopeless customization staff to say that now the letter S is also out of stock? :D
( Do note that In the midst of encountering all these 3 incompetent staff and me going back and forth purchasing the unavailable letter at a different store I already showed them the Name and Number I wanted to put on the Jersey ) I don’t usually get triggered or mad at things like this as I am also working as a retail staff and I know how fussy certain customers can get sometimes but honestly it was your staffs fault for handing out wrong information over and over again. Wouldn’t it just be settled if any of the 3 staff actually would have just told me which letter and number was unavailable in the first place? Hence, today was probably the dumbest customer service I’ve encountered in my years of being a customer.

On a happy note, another Female customization staff was working on that day but she was at the upper floor as she was in charge of the redemption counter on that day ( based on the information given to me ) she was the one who apologized and insisted on reimbursing me for the initial letter A that I purchased. Kudos to her for helping out in settling the matter as the other Male customization staff kept laughing and saying that “I don’t know” a million times throughout the whole issue. Felt bad that she was the one who had to take out money from her own pocket when it was the initial 3 useless staff that caused the whole problem with their wrong information to begin with.

According to the female staff, she said that the customization team and the retail team aren’t linked together. So my opinion / suggestion is for both side to get correct information beforehand so something stupid like this does not happen again because it’s quite troublesome for your customers when each staff is giving out a different story every time. | review_rating:1, text:Had a sales guy ( Ashraf? Not sure how to spell his name) , we wanted to purchase 2 shirts, then he tried to force us to buy a pair of sneakers (???) coz was on discount, even though we said the shoes were not to our fitting and liking.

When we went to pay for the shirts, he got angry when we refused to purchase the shoes, gave an angry stare down,

Semi threw a tantrum ... gave the cashier his sales ID and walked off on a big huff.

😅Dude...don't scold customer lah if you can't hit your sales target...wuuuttt. | review_rating:5, text:Myself and my husband were browsing Adidas online store and there were few unique edition which has limited unit and size. We contacted several outlets and I would say Sunway Pyramid customer service is top notch from staff name Anis. We arrived the outlet 2 hour after conversation via phone and when we arrived Anis walked to us and greet us immediately if we are the one call and enquiry. We were  completely impressed with her professionalism and customer service. She patiently answer and feedback about the shoes we were looking for. Definitely extra mile staff 👍
