location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

I didn’t feel forced to purchase anything but rather felt as if a true friend was helping me out. Her friendly and approachable demeanor made the shopping experience enjoyable and stress-free. Kudos to Hani for making my visit memorable! I highly recommend seeking her assistance if you visit the store! 10/10! | review_rating:5, text:Went to try some dunks at this outlet and the female staff with blonde hair is very helpful , she knew my size but brought two different sizes just for me to compare which pair I feel more comfortable in, not only that but she made it very personalised as she asked what style I like , what colour and whether I’m a high or low toe person .Even though I came very close to store closing hours , the staff took her time and made sure I had the right size . name: Pineyard
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2.133, 31, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Pineyard is a new cafe that opened up in the Oasis section of Sunway Pyramid. They were having a 20% discount offer for their hot food offerings when I visited.

I ordered the chicken pie that came with a side of brown gravy and mashed potato. The pie crust was okay although I wished it was a little lighter and fluffier. It was also not as warm as I would have preferred it. Nonetheless, the filling was flavorful with a mix of chicken and mushroom. For the price however, they could have given more pieces of chicken.

Service was relatively fast although there were only 2 occupied tables. Seating was comfortable and the decor had a nicer minimalist look that I appreciate. | review_rating:4, text:I popped into Pineyard at Sunway Pyramid with my mum recently, hoping to find a cosy spot for brunch. We decided on the grilled sourdough sandwich first; it was nicely buttered and crisp on the outside but turned out rather hard and chewy. The filling of mushrooms, spinach, and cheese had a lovely flavour, albeit a bit on the oily side.

The carbonara was rich, creamy, and made even more indulgent by a runny poached egg. The deep-fried chicken ham added a satisfying crunch and extra savouriness. We also had an iced gula melaka and an orange juice—both decent choices.

Price-wise, Pineyard leans slightly towards the higher end, but I must say the service was prompt and friendly. | review_rating:5, text:I had their carbonara for dinner and it was so good, I really love it. I also bought their pasties and they're really soft even if you eat it the next day.

The price for the dish and pastries are slightly expensive but I'd say it matched with the quality of the food.

Staffs are excellent, they're friendly and professional.

Overall my experience here was lovely and I'd love to drop by this place again in the future. ☺️ | review_rating:5, text:The food here is absolutely amazing! Every dish is bursting with flavor, fresh ingredients, and beautifully presented. The service is friendly and attentive, making the experience even better. Highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a delicious meal! | review_rating:4, text:I am not usually a fan of pastries but their salted egg croissant was unexpectedly delicious. Shame about their latte though its quite bad, so because of that have to minus 1 star.

name: Future Trend
location: No 7 Digital Centre,F1.AV.88 & F1.AV.89 Asian Avenue,First Floor Sunway Pyramind, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I’m not sure how this shop has such high ratings on Google, but my experience with their customer service was DISAPPOINTING. I purchased a phone case from this shop because my old one was broken. I asked the guy (circled in red) if they had a phone case for the Honor 50. He mentioned that since the Honor 50 is an older model, it was lucky they had one last piece in stock. Trusting his word, I decided to purchase it without asking the price, there was no price tag label on the phone case packaging.

At the counter, he started cleaning my phone screen without asking me first. After that, he charged me RM69 for the phone case—much more than I expected! When I politely asked if there was any discount, he only reduced the price by RM2, bringing it to RM67. I reluctantly paid and left the shop, but after discussing it with my friend, my friend and I felt that the guy "scammed" me since similar phone cases are sold on Shopee for RM10-30.

Within an hour, I returned to the shop with the receipt to request a refund. However, the guy refused, saying that once the package is opened, they cannot resell it. I considered reporting this to MDTCA, but the process would take too long. I strongly advise anyone to not visiting this shop. | review_rating:5, text:Good service! Always come here to change my screen protector and finding uniq casing w cheaper price from machine | review_rating:5, text:So many vape here good! Seller are good and responsible! Recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Highly recommended!! Excellent services!! Friendly staff.. good job Jackson & Danny👍👍👍 the only  place know what you need!! | review_rating:5, text:My go to place for all my phone accessories needs. Loved their services.

This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: A Cut Above Salon
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. name: Yong Kang TCM
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47400 Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Frankly, there are better TCMs out there. I felt the doctor was more focused on money than offering proper care.

A female doctor checked my pulse and charged a consultation fee but gave no health advice. Of all the checking, she insisted I take their Chinese medicine despite my hesitation, and the receptionist billed me anyway.

For my right-hand pain, I received cupping and acupuncture. The cups were too large, kept falling off (she knows it), however she left me unattended. During acupuncture, I felt nothing, and she used fewer than 5 needles, which made me question whether she was addressing the issue effectively.
I’m not happy with the RM350+ bill, no results or personalized care. | review_rating:5, text:Dr.Meng is very professional at her job and very helpful in taking care of us, suggesting treatment plans and you walk out completely refreshed and recharged every time ! Highly recommended to come ! 要来就找孟医师！ | review_rating:5, text:Physician was professional n patient in explaining my body condition. Had a lovely experience doing moxibustion n acupuncture. My stiff neck was much relief after the treatment.

And Receptionist is very patient explain to me all the packages and provide good advice to me which package more suitable for me. | review_rating:5, text:Dr.Meng is very professional, skillful and caring in treating my body condition. She is very experienced in acupuncture. Love so much the treatment and superb good 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Dr Meng Hui Jing is very good, just one session, I feel less pain when raising my arms and in my body overall. Prices are reasonable and service is good.

name: Sunway Lagoon Kedai Runcit
category: wildlife_park, tourist_attraction, zoo, water_park, amusement_park, amusement_center, park, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/11, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a really great time with the whole family. The wife was happy to watch some of our stuff near the small wave pool while the kids and I hit the rides. It was a great time for us to go as there were not very big crowds meaning it did not take very long to get on the rides other than climbing all the steps to get up to them. Highly recommended for all the family from young kids to young adults. The big wave pool with 5m high waves every 1 minute from 4.30pm was a highlight too. Make sure you get to the front. | review_rating:5, text:Each park was truly fun. There are a lot of activities for you to do despite age. There are many water activities. So, it's wise you wear your swimwear and roam around. There are lockers in every park as I remember and you can rent a locker to keep your belongings safe. I went on  weekend so there were too many people and had to wait in lines for a considerable amount of time. But enter the place when it opens and you can enjoy every activity. Overall really fun day! Recommended! | review_rating:4, text:A family fun water park having a big wave pool, water rides and an area train to reach various fun areas of this big park. Apart from the water park, Sunway Lagoon has various other attraction parks like a small zoo, Scream room a 5 D theatre and many other attractions. You get an entrance band to go to all activities. Once you reach the park you need to go down with multiple level escalator. There are many changing areas separate for both men and women with showers and different size lookers to store your belongings and clothes. Overall it was a family fun for the whole day. | review_rating:5, text:My wife and I recently booked the villa package for 2 days and 1 night at around RM1.6K, and we had an amazing experience! A big thank you to Sunway for allowing us to check in early at 11 AM instead of the usual 2 PM. This thoughtful gesture made our trip so much smoother, as we could head straight to the theme park without worrying about our belongings.

The villa itself was spacious, beautifully designed, and incredibly comfortable—perfect for a relaxing retreat. A special shoutout to Shahmin and his team for their outstanding hospitality; they were friendly, helpful, and truly enhanced our stay. While the food was decent, it could be improved to match the overall high standards of the experience.

Overall, we would rate our stay 8.5/10 and would definitely consider returning. Thank you, Sunway, for a wonderful time! | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing Experience – Not Worth the Money

I genuinely cannot understand why this place gets 5-star ratings. The ride attendants are rude and unhelpful, and customer service is clueless—even the so-called “customer specialists” don’t know how to handle guests. The park itself is old, decaying, and poorly maintained. The shacks and huts are a complete waste of time, and the wave pool only operates for 45 minutes at the very end of the day. The whole place smells bad and feels like it’s falling apart.

For a family of five, we spent $700 AUD—absolutely not worth it. There are so many better places in Malaysia to visit for a fraction of the cost. Even with a quick pass, there was no need to wait for rides, which only made the purchase feel like a scam. The photos online are misleading, so don’t fall for the marketing.

This was our experience in January/February 2025. Save your money and your time—there are far better options out there.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Their ciku is always the best!! they sell fresh fruits as well. | review_rating:2, text:I bought fruit rojak today for the first time on 19/10/2022. There was this lady wearing orange hijab. Based on the slang, she probably from Indonesia. I wanted to buy fruit rojak so i ask her how do i order? There was many fruits so i thought maybe i have to choose the fruits first.

I think she was on her period or something she explained to me angrily. After i paid, not even a “thank you”. That will be my first and last. | review_rating:5, text:Always fresh and nice.. opening_hours: N/A

name: TONKATSU BY MA MAISON
location: G1.PT.09, The Link, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:We went on Monday around 6:40 PM, there was no queue.

No one bothered to show us to a table. After waiting for a few minutes, a staff member finally told us to sit wherever we liked. Once we sat down, no one brought us the menu until we asked for it.

The restaurant has a good ambience and a nice view, overlooking part of Sunway Lagoon.

The fried pork was very crispy, but it had an unpleasant smell and wasn’t tender. The side dishes, like cabbage, rice, and soup, were refillable but not for sharing. Since we were still full, we only ordered one set. | review_rating:4, text:As it is tonkatsu, the menu looks very same for different item, kinda hard to decide what to order.

The pork is hard and take much effort to chew. It's marinated quite well with a unique taste.

Chicken curry is very nice, but chicken portion much smaller and not enough for my liking.

There is a lot of condiments available to mix-in with your meal, the soup and cabbage are freeflow refillable.

Waiters are not very responsible and tend to be a bit slow. | review_rating:5, text:Right from the first staff who allocates you table, to the waitresses who took care of our table - huge thank you for making our family dinner such a pleasant one! Your attention to detail (wait staff saw our uncle gesturing eating rice with spoon to one of us and before we asked, wait staff had come over with a spoon already) and doing your best to get us a big enough table to sit comfortably deserves a huge applause.
Environment was cosy, food was good, and staff were generous in giving us our refills or offering refills when she saw our cabbage/miso/rice were almost done.
Overall a very nice evening, and feeling lucky that we chose to dine here 😄 will definitely be back again, highly recommend! | review_rating:2, text:Came here for the 2nd set of katsu for 50% till 28th Feb only… this place is honestly a miss… you won’t regret it if you have been passing by here often and telling yourself that you’d like to try it one day… I’d say.. keep walking because….. both loin and fillet I ordered wasss DRY…. DRY AF…. D.R.Y!!!! It’s not enjoyable at ALLL….. the fats on the pork did not do justice… knowing the breadcrumbs around it will
Definitely cut the top of your mouth but expecting the pork meat to be tender or atleast melts in your mouth…. ? NOPE… all is dryyyyyyyy it was hard to chew throughout 6pieces…. My jaw was tired…. Flavor wise, not much, very mild, it’s not mind blowing.

The only Thing that was good was the miso soup that came together.
Service of replenishing cabbage was 👍
Choice of white rice or multigrain and comes with tea iced or not.

This will be my first and my last.. | review_rating:1, text:Same incident happened again. I’ve saw others put a review regarding their service, we really feel disrespectful and being looked down by their staff just because we ask for refill cabbage and soup.

Before we ordered, we did ask the waiter can we share one main course by adding another side dish? If not we just add in the bottomless refill package. (Here i need to mention that I’ve dine in at another branch - Mid Valley so i knew it was workable. And the reason for us to share is we really can’t finish all if we order two main course)

The waiter said OK without explaining anything. But when we ask for refill he take the menu to us said that if u want to refill you need to add the bottomless refill, but we did ask at the very beginning. He said OK! And the way he explain to us is really make us uncomfortable is like we asking for food. But hello? It’s just cabbage? How much it cost? And fine, i know you have your own rules, but why you didn’t mention it clearly at first?

And after that we said nvm, we continue having the rest of our food. After that he suddenly come over and refilled the cabbage for us, without saying anything. This really makes us feel uncomfortably and disrespectful.

For those who want to dine here, pls think twice before you walk in. Other branches is fine, only this.

Don't worry about transporting it around the mall as well, the sales team will help to carry it to your car! | review_rating:5, text:I recently had the pleasure of visiting Segway at sunway piramid. So i come from Penang to Sunway Pyramid to meet him personally!! Well done and great service by him!! Thanks ya!

name: Dunkin Donuts
category: donut_shop, bakery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot LG2.43 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47400 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I ordered a box of 3 Assorted Donuts through Grab and I got the Blueberry Filled, Bavarian Filled along with the Sugar Raised donuts for RM12.60. The donut flavours were not my first few choices since most of them were sold out around 5pm. It was also my first time having Dunkin' Donuts and the donuts were absolutely amazing! The Blueberry Filled donut was what I expected it to be but the Bavarian Filled donut had an interesting flavour, however I wish there were more fillings inside. You also cannot go wrong with the Sugar Raised donuts and honestly only getting one was not enough. I would definitely try more flavours next time since I really enjoyed my late afternoon snack :) | review_rating:1, text:A Disappointing Experience

I recently visited a Dunkin' Donuts outlet and was left feeling frustrated and disappointed by the customer service.

When I was deciding on my order, the staff member insisted that I purchase four donuts to receive a box. While I understand the desire to minimize waste, it felt inflexible and inconvenient, especially for a smaller order.

Moreover, the lack of a larger bag to carry the individual paper bags was surprising. It seemed like a minor detail, but it added to the overall inconvenience of the experience.

While Dunkin' Donuts has historically offered boxes for smaller orders, this recent experience suggests a potential downgrade in customer service. It's important to remember that good customer service can significantly impact a customer's overall satisfaction.

I hope that Dunkin' Donuts will take steps to improve their customer service policies and training to ensure a more positive experience for future customers. | review_rating:3, text:Sweet treat is not for me, but I do drop here to pack these colourful, vibrant, attractive and hunger calling donuts. Just so pleasant to look at, I opted for the 6 in a pack, chosen between the various types donuts, the latest to coincide with Spider-Man concept. Had just a tiny bite, when I dropped the pack at my friend's, sure, soft and fluffy, sugar rush treats. | review_rating:5, text:One of the best Dunkin' Donuts, always fresh. Usually run out of the popular choices towards the ens of the night | review_rating:1, text:Worst experience... Please refer to the pictures as evidence... I bought the half dozen dd n ice coffee with less ice... Unfortunately, my cup were half filled only... Hahaha... When i ask why is it like this? The staff said Because you only get 75ml of coffee... Hahaha... I say is it ok looking like this? The bright short round girl said yes its like that if less ice... Previously, i've work at F&B such as Subway, pizza hut in my study years n one thing commonly they teach us is courtesy and politeness towards customer... Put yourself in my shoes n imagine if u received ur drinks looking like this... All the best...

name: Starbucks Reserve
location: Lot G1.129, OB3.G.1 & OB3.G.2, Ground Floor, Oasis Boulevard, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Starbucks Reserve at Sunway Pyramid is an excellent spot for coffee lovers. The staff are friendly, helpful, and always provide great service, making each visit a pleasant experience. The cozy and clean atmosphere is perfect for relaxing or catching up on work. Their Caramel Macchiato is my absolute favorite—rich, flavorful, and always satisfying. While the prices are on the higher side, the quality of the drinks and overall experience justifies the cost. Whether you’re grabbing a quick coffee or unwinding, this place is a standout. Definitely a five-star café worth visiting! | review_rating:1, text:Based on my previous visiting experience, I confirmed that the latest batch of the barista are new. Their service tells me everything.

First, they doesn't seems very familiar with the name of the drink on the reserved menu. They need to double check on the menu to confirm what's really customer mentioned when place order.

Secondly, the ticket doesn't place / stick well to the drinks producing counter. It caused that no barista noticed that there are a pending order to make (reserve coffee menu). After all, they keep calling customer name while food ready but nobody making the drink.

At the end,  the drink has served finally, but as photo shown, been ordered a Reserve menu coffee, but served without the Starbucks Reserve black sleeve and the complimentary chocolate. Definitely not well trained enough.

P.S. t
Then I saw a barista served the food over to a female customer to her table but forgot the drink itself. The female customer has to get up and go over the waiting section to get the drink by herself after all.

I been supporting this branch frequently, the previous batch of baristas are all in tip-top condition in many factors.

Well I guess the customers need to have more patient for the newest batch to shine like the rest. =) | review_rating:5, text:The staffs here are helpful and friendly. Special credit to the store manager who served during my visit in CNY. She spoke politely and very proactive asking people if they need any assistance. Well done. | review_rating:5, text:Dropped by here for getting my americano! Staff so friendly and fast yet punctual , space is spacious, comfy as well, interior also nice and super homey i can say 👻👻👻👻 and coffee as well as good as other branch 🤍🤍🤍 | review_rating:2, text:Ordered Iced creamy pure matcha latte, but it doesn’t look like matcha latte at all, not to mention the taste, only milk taste with a little tiny matcha flavour, very sweet even ady remarks for less sweet.
Picture is for illustration purpose only, certainly.

name: ALOHA KARAOKE & CAFÉ

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Nice family karaoke at Sunway.

Prices are wallet friendly, especially Macallan 12 years comes in at RM488.

Rooms are well lit with decent air conditioning. | review_rating:1, text:Look like scam place .. keep change big room for us .. not allow us to take small room even we can fit … really roti canai kareoke I meet before … pls do not come here .. n bad services … | review_rating:5, text:I haven't try the food yet. But that's so cool
You can have shisha in the room. :) | review_rating:5, text:I booked a medium room to fit ard 18 of us, it was nice. They deco the place accordingly and we were surprised they have someone in froggy costume to pop up in the room and make the kids so happy. The system was ok, only as it’s newly upgrade and little error on the scoring so little disappointed, also the bell wasn’t inform and made us quite a bit until we know about it . The rest are ok. The food was good and big portion. Price was reasonable and we had very nice evening there. | review_rating:5, text:We had birthday party on 11/9/22. Such a wonderful event. The food dam good n very delicious. Specially the staff are so kind n friendly. Sounds system fuuuuu yoooo power. Nice place to have gatherings n we really enjoy our day. Thanks to all the staff. 👌👍👍🍻🍻🍻🍻👌👌👌👍👍

name: King Koil
category: furniture_store, home_improvement_store, home_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Finally bought new mattress and have a good experience with the high quality item. The staff also give advice for back problem issue and at the end i found a good mattress for my own use. Definitely will recommend to my family and friends | review_rating:5, text:Purchased a queen size mattress from there, very professional service & consult from the salesman Mr Radzli. Very detail explanation to make customer understand more about mattress. It was such a great experience, i am planning to get another set from there again. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Very good and friendly staff , the mattress very good quality , this is my second time buying from them . recommend. but, i dont know why they have very bad review, just go and meet them they all very nice people . | review_rating:5, text:Recommend you to have a visit and get advice from their staff which is has a good explanation about mattress and back problem issue. I have a good experience to purchase with them.👍🏻 | review_rating:1, text:Bought 3 mattress with bed frames with King Koil Sunway branch. Full payment was made when purchase. However, the bed frame for 1 of the bed was wrong. Clearly, no quality control before the items are sent out. 2nd and 3rd delivery were all in wrong color. 4th delivery, the color of bedframe was finally correct but in wrong size! Trying to resolve the issue with the manager, the staff is pushing and not willing to provide the contact. Really disappointed and angry with this purchase. STRONGLY DISCOURAGE ANYONE TO PURCHASE FROM THEM.

reviews: review_rating:5, text:Life is to be treasured and to be enjoyed everyday. Playing ukulele can enhance joy, peace and happiness. name: CIMB Fast Banking
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Honor
location: Lot F1.48, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I recently visited the Honor store at Sunway Pyramid and had an excellent experience, thanks to the outstanding service provided by Jayden, one of the sales assistants. Jayden was incredibly knowledgeable about the products, patiently answered all my questions, and guided me to choose the perfect phone that met my needs and budget.

His professionalism and friendly attitude made the shopping experience smooth and enjoyable. He also took the time to explain the features of the phone I purchased and made sure I understood everything before leaving the store.

I highly recommend this store for anyone looking for an Honor device, and a special shoutout to Jayden for his exceptional customer service!

Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ | review_rating:5, text:First time been here, nice and friendly staff's.. Will recommended you guys out there to drop by here. Staff named: Hayley. Thanks so much. 😃 | review_rating:5, text:Great place, I had a emergency of needed of temporary phone. I managed to get a good phone which was under RM500, which helped by Mr Kenny. He was extraordinary in helping me get a phone according to my request. He was not like any salesman, he helped me from price point and the price point. Kudos!! to the team, hope we get to do business more in near future. Once again would give at most appreciation to the team. | review_rating:5, text:Recommend salesman Kenny as he has been very helpful and patiently answer and explain towards my questions and enquiries
Bought my phone from here | review_rating:5, text:I can't speak highly enough of Honor Sunway Store. The entire experience, from the moment I walked in, was fantastic. Ms Hayley serviced me when I was there to get an elderly friendly mobile phone for my father. I was asking for a phone which is with bigger font and stylus compatible. She recommended me for the model Honor 90. Ms Hayley was not only knowledgeable but also took the time to address all my questions and concerns with her professionalism.
I left the store feeling satisfied with the service I received. If you're looking for a reputable mobile store with a compassionate customer service, look no further than Honor Sunway Store .

name: ABC One Cafeteria
location: LG2A 03B LOWER GROUND TWO A, SUNWAY PYRAMID, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:It's a good establishment if you're looking for cheap food in sunway pyramid. It's a lil bit hidden but it's right next to a lift. Do note that this place is self-serve so it's not your usual mamak where the waiter will come to serve you. Since the staff's number are a lil bit limited, it might take a while if you're ordering food that need some cooking (mi goreng mamak etc.) If you're looking for something filling (and you want it fast), I would recommend you to order their nasi campur. The payment method here are by card, duitnow qr (you have to scan their duitnow qr) and also cash. The location has some echo to it, so you might have to speak louder when ordering your food/chatting with you companions.  Overall, I had a good experience dining here, though I wish the staff had called me promptly when my tapau-ed food was ready. Despite this, the quality, price, and convenience make it worthy of a four-star rating. | review_rating:1, text:Price is totally out so expensive some more staff making fool us we eat 3 person rice nasi goreng ayam kam thn nasi campur ikan kari … but thm put extra one nasi goreng biasa after we said u put extra charges pls change bill thn agine same price said tex need to pay for tex also cut rm 3 alrdy. After thm said now u have to pay bcz bill out alrdy omg very bad service fst time i see like that thts our last no more visit this restaurant | review_rating:1, text:The food is nice not bad, price also cheapt. The only thing the service is not good , especially attitude of the staff ( Bangladesh) not good. How they serve , how they speak to customer is very bad. The Bangladesh staff the fat guy using uniform red t-shirt no is manners. He was call me using his language, he was call me " nani" or grandma..
Yes am 42. am old but am not grandmom. Its not 1 time but many time he call me like that. If he small kids am agree he call me that. But he is old guy ( 30+) suppose he call me kakak. This considering insult and not respect.am customer.
If person's attitude good, its mean everything on him
is good. But he has bad attitude , it's mean all on him is bad. | review_rating:1, text:food is good but for the staff i give 0 star especially the guy with “kopiah” one (cashier)..so rude so slow and no manner at all..the way he look at the customer like he very hate his job..hate this kind of people | review_rating:1, text:Can u please change the cashier? The guy with beard and spectacle…he so slow..he know customer stand in front of him but he like “ i dont care at all” other staff give a good service but not him..he make other customer waiting so long

name: Ace Hardware
location: Lot LG 2.11, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Bought yesterday. Expired. I should have checked. They should have checked. We all should have checked. | review_rating:4, text:The store initially was near the Aeon store. However, it moved to another area, I think the area used to be a Brand Outlets store. Now it is next to the Daiso. P/S: Daiso moved as well. For some reason, Ace Hardware store always smell unpleasant, maybe because of the hardware they were selling. Every time I pass by the store, the unpleasant smell can be smelled from the outside. Perhaps they can do something about it. | review_rating:1, text:I went there to buy some mouse catcher that day. After a while, I go to the counter to pay for my products. But, at the end I change my mind. I wish to cancel off some of the items which i think i dont need that item. The balded cashier which i believe is one of the manager at that shop (heard one of the worker call him boss) at first did not allow me to cancel and showing very very very bad attitude to me. He ask why am I taking the product when I do not want to buy it. I should have made my mind when I was at the shelf there. I have not experienced this very bad experience with any shop where I cannot cancel product that has not even paid. At the end, I still paying for the rest of my products and left. This is one of my worst experience in my shopping time. I will not recommend my family and friends to this shop. And I won't ever come to this shop again. Thanks. | review_rating:5, text:If you need a good DIY item, browsed before buying, this is the place. Staff are very helpfull and items are layout very well according to the usage. Only 1 comment regarding the staff, one of them care to make a statement that can actually insult the customer intelligence and with that, it shows how he was not prepared for work and did not know the product in store. Kudus to the supervisor who makes time to check the product in question. | review_rating:4, text:My go to place to get items that I cant get anywhere  else like the big tub of distilled vinegar, fel napha soap and such. Service is good though some are not very well verse in the products. Can be quite pricey especially the imported products.

Give her more training as she doesnt even know any code of the lipstick and instead asking us for the name. 🤷🏻‍♀️ | review_rating:5, text:The staff here were very kind , and knowledgeable about the product  , Mina was the right person for us to consult.

manning the outlet. | review_rating:5, text:Bought 3 Honor bands from Adrian and a Huawei handphone as well. Service was beyond excellent. opening_hours: N/A

name: KakatooGo
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

It isn't easily trackable, but worth visiting. | review_rating:5, text:Went there to get a retirement gift for 1 of my bosses. Got him a mug, for him to enjoy his morning coffee ;). The staff, Emily was very helpful. She expertly helped to nicely wrap the box with a ribbon. Store doesn't keep large number of stocks, better call to check with the staff on the items availability. | review_rating:4, text:The sales associate that attended me was really friendly but I do wish they had more options for cuff links. Lucky coin or a cloud design for a loved one is appropriate any time of the year though. | review_rating:4, text:stunning | review_rating:5, text:I like the staff

name: Nars
location: G1.128, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I came in to try some foundations, blush and lipsticks, and the salesperson Troy was SUPER FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL. All the products that he introduced me were all so suitable and really helped me in deciding what to buy!

Too bad Lazada is doing sales and that's the reason I went to physical store. So i ended up buying online. T-----T (Sorry Troy, sincere thanks for helping!)

NARS pleaaaase come up with ideas where both the customers and salespersons can walk away happily. Your salespersons should be rewarded if their service encourage customers to buy Nars products online! | review_rating:1, text:HONEST REVIEW : I went here in 30th august 2024, the stuff is not friendly at all, and lack of knowledge.
1. I just want to come inside but she already serve me and my friends with RBF.
2. I ask for NARS BA lipstick shade which is the one the hoshi and scoups used. But she dont even know their OWN ambassador !
3. As a high brand, i think this is really bad service. | review_rating:5, text:I have been wanting a prefect match foundation for my skin. I was hoping to get my shade today at Nars, the sales person Adelaine ( I apologize if the spelling is wrong ) really helped me out to find my perfect shade and on top of that she also assisted with the blush and bronzer I wanted to try. I’m new to makeup, she was very helpful throughout my choosing process. She did not push in selling anything more than I need. | review_rating:5, text:Mr Elbert, the Nars stores salesperson was highly professional and choosed the best matching product for my face. He was very friendly and knowledgeble. I purchased almost all the products he recommended, but at the same time he did’nt forced to sell anyting more than i needed. | review_rating:5, text:For me, the salesgirl was well educated on the products. She knew what was ‘grey’ ‘ashy’ ‘red/olive/honey/yellow’ undertones. She picked a good match for my skin tone. Been there twice, and bought great products to match my skin tone and undertone.

name: SHABU-YO
location: Malaysia, Selangor, Subang Jaya, Bandar Sunway, Jalan PJS 11/15, Lot G1.99, Ground floor
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Shabu-yo, what happened?

- Menu changed from beef, pork, chicken TO lamb, pork, chicken.
- if you want beef, need to choose beef, pork, lamb and chicken. (More expensive)
Price increased, which is not the main issue.

THE PROBLEM IS:

Meat quality dropped!
(My partner and I hoped that this day would never come)
First time we came here was in 2023, we thought the quality of meat here was amazing especially for the price range. The pork belly/shoulder and beef karubi used to be so tender, but I can no longer say it is the same.
We are regular customers and we recommended this restaurant to many of our friends and family (because of the beautiful meat quality), but now we have to think twice if we’d want to eat here again.
- When sat down at our table, we found out that even EGGS are no longer part of the buffet. They need to be added on for RM1/egg. So extremely disappointing!!!
- sauces here isn’t very good but the meat dipped in eggs always made it better, again, utterly disappointed with Shabu-yo charging for eggs (?!?!?!)

- kitchen staff is so noisy. Dropping bowls and plates and cheering every time someone drops another bowl/plate. Kinda annoying to be hearing this when seated near the kitchen.

Honestly, all this complaints could be tolerated but then the meat quality dropped, that’s not ok with me. | review_rating:5, text:I love this place. They have reasonable price for buffet and their meat and veggies choices are so much more than other japanese buffet. I also like that they have high quality onzen egg that you could eat raw. | review_rating:1, text:The worse steamboat buffet I've ever been, this will be my first and last in this restaurant. All the staff have to go through deep and serious training. Even the foods was so so only, everywhere is very messy tot think that it's not that busy. And even though on busy times should not let your buffet bar messy, dirty tissues everywhere, veggies all over the place. Staffs no basic manners, clear table just take plates, serve the food just bang on your table without saying anything. All are black face and not talking, robot is better at least they greet but these people nothing. But when they are chatting while clearing tables their voices are so loud and happy back to customer gave you poker unhappy face. Most of the waitresses hair are so messy too not appropriate in F&B standard. Kitchen door widely open can see how messy and dirty inside, staff room door open too showing us all shoes while eating is it? The another long hair waitress arranging all the pots banging so loud makes the diners disturb if not happy why not go back home. Ice cream melted, waffle bitter and put there no cover at all. Your golden soup is the worse I've ever tasted too no taste at all, other beef cutting is wrong side making it so tough. Most of the sauces are all chili taste without any saltiness or sweetness I know we can add on seasoning but do we need to adjust everything on our own meh? I came here because it was recommended by my colleague who always eat at Sunway Velocity, she said must try very nice. I was totally in regret that I tried and paid full price with 10% service charge without even providing any service. | review_rating:5, text:food are 9/10! especially their ice cream is sooooo CREAMY and not too sweet. Got superior dining experience there! Thanks my friend irvin, sak and ronan served us, and also entertaining us! Hahhahaha | review_rating:5, text:Decent, nice, and well maintained dining spot inside Sunway Mall. Wide variety of fresh vegetables.

They have rice, fries, takoyaki, chicken karaage, desserts like ice shaved, and waffle making in the buffet menu. Which is very reasonable for its price.

The buffet is about 40 rinngit gross, but that includes the mains to drinks and desserts.  Dining limits to 90 mins.

Quite a few choices of base soup. it's less tasty than arashi, though, but very accoetable for its price. . Many staff were  around to help.

Overall definitely worth it.

name: Legend of Tea
location: LG 1.98, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Amazing tea, bought the 普洱 with 糯米香叶, a type of 熟茶which is smooth and fragrant! Highly recommend the tea here, with friendly and knowledgeable staff! Usually very crowded on weekends, so come here on weekdays to have a relaxing Yam Cha session 😎 | review_rating:5, text:Shoutout to the guy who looks around 20-is bcs he gives me great customer service! Should give him an increment!  Good knowledge, he explained about the benefits to me. Very friendly staff! He even suggested the tea that's suitable about my problem! I bought the osmanthus tea bcs of his suggestion! | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing matcha ice cream. Used to be good but standards were not maintained at all. You’re better off w Family Mart’s matcha green tea ice cream for less than RM3 vs paying for this nonsense for RM4.60. Worse yet - it’s coupled with a horrendous customer service by the person running the place (specked tan guy w receding hair). Plain rude. This will be my last visit.
Food taste - 3/10
Customer service - 0/10

Not worth the visit. | review_rating:5, text:This place is manager by 2 very courteous, friendly and attentive gentlemen. Both are very knowledgeable in the art of tea. Should you have a need to find a suitable present or corporate gifts, be sure to check with them for appropriate gift sets.

However, if you are a newbie in the art of tea, don't worry. They do have a tea tasting session to figure out what's suitable to your body and taste that tickle your taste buds.

.I bought varieties of tea from them. | review_rating:3, text:Green tea ice cream is nice, but the staffs is not so kind.. that day i was buying two ice cream, when i want to pay, i have no hand to pick up the 2nd ice cream, so the staff just put it on the counter table, and what happen next is, the ice cream drop on the floor... The staff then just pass me some tissue to let me clean myself and the mess. After that, i thought the staff is going to give me another cone as their apology, since i dun even touch the ice cream yet, but no, i was paying for a dropped ice cream which i think it's not even my careless to drop it... Felt a bit disappointed with the service...

name: LAC Nutrition for Life
location: LG2.02, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:The store itself leaves a positive impression, with a good selection of products. However, the experience was overshadowed by the behavior of the staff member present. The individual came across as rude and dismissive, with a judgmental attitude that lacked basic courtesy.

Despite multiple attempts to seek assistance, I had to wait nearly an hour before receiving any attention. When I was finally assisted, the interaction lacked professionalism, particularly in addressing my queries about protein and creatine supplements suited to my needs.

It would be beneficial for the staff to receive training on customer service, including effective communication and creating a welcoming atmosphere. While the products appear genuine and of good quality, the overall experience was quite unpleasant due to the lack of proper customer care. | review_rating:5, text:Premium price but Excellent Products. I find the staff friendly & knowledgeable in explaining the products. There are also good membership points to redeem from both LAC & Sunway Pal Apps. They even throw in great gifts which are attractive & useful. Highly recommended outlet to visit! | review_rating:1, text:Rude, arrogant and unhelpful staff, will never be a member or visit again. | review_rating:5, text:Good service, Mr Syahdan can literally explain all my needs, a really good customer service, 2nd time talking to Mr Syahdan in here, | review_rating:5, text:Bought my protein shake from here!

name: Black Tap Craft Burgers & Shakes
location: Lobby Level, Sunway Resort, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:First-time customers. I came here with my family, and we all left with our bellies full and smiles on our faces. The food was great, everything we ordered was cooked to perfection. The music choice was very much appreciated (up tempo hip hop from the 90s and some new Jack swing) in the background while I watched the 2024 Olympics. The customer service we received from Cole, who gave us the best advice when ordering our food (and he makes excellent milkshakes). Wheng and Natsuha also made our experience lovely. We were made to feel very welcomed to the BLACK TAP. I would gladly go back and do it all over again. | review_rating:4, text:Nice air conditioned restaurant, plenty of seatings. The burgers were mediocre, the burgers I ordered had dry patties that were under seasoned; quite disappointing but the milkshake and fries are good. Gotta love the over the top milkshakes.
Overall a good experience. | review_rating:4, text:Ive visited here since it opened and with time, the lunch deals Portions has been getting smaller .

I can finish the food nowadays compared to the initial days when it opened :(
Taste still decent, but i prefer american portion for an american restaurant.
I like that the lunch menu expanded, and iced tea is now sugar free but my complain is the portion. | review_rating:5, text:First time guest in blacktap. Had a Good atmosphere and excellent service! | review_rating:3, text:The burgers were mediocre, but the milkshake and onion rings were good. I’ve visited many black taps, this branch pales in comparison to the others. Both burgers we ordered had dry patties that were under seasoned; quite disappointing.

Overall a below average experience.

review_rating:1, text:I have responsibilities to check on my own to when before I pay but I mislook this time because I was rushing.

name: Skechers
location: G1.91, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a good experience buying here. Got to be a member since I spent more than rm250. The sales assistant were helpful to my enquiries. I got 50%off on second item. Some of the shoes are cute! And for sure comfy | review_rating:5, text:Always my choices place if I want a pair of Sketches . This week got special promotion , whole store all item 50% discount . Queue from morning till evening , especially weekend is crazy for everyone. For people want to go in to bought a pair of shoes during weekend, you need to queue up at least an hour before you had chance to go in for a pair of shoes. Lack of staffs to handle you during weekend as they just too busy to look for shoes stocks in store room. But anyway , Skechers always my first choice of casual shoes wear if compared to others . As the comfortable level of the shoes always on tip top .Well do ne and keep it up 👍💪👍💪 | review_rating:5, text:Thanks Viviana for the amazing service and friendliness! My aunties had a great experience here because of you. | review_rating:1, text:I'm here to convey something about an employee at skechers there are two people who look me up and down and they laugh at my mom like why do they want to laugh at my mom? they are not qualified to work there I hope skechers Sunway pyramid take action against the two workers I don't remember their names but I remember their faces one wears a hijab and the other is a man I hope you take action🙏🏻🙏🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Skechers are my mom's fav brand so obviously when she needed a new pair of walking shoes, we had to come back here.
The staff was accomodating and they do limit customers in their store.

reviews: review_rating:5, text:We dropped by this shop looking for some warm clothing. They also sell luggage and travel accesories. Prices were reasonable for offer items. Luggage and winter wear choices seems decent but expect premium pricing for sure. Great place to buy gifts for friends to travel. | review_rating:3, text:Rather small Universal Traveller store inside Sunway Pyramid shopping mall, selling items for travelling such as warm clothes, jackets, luggage, accessories, etc. Items were well displayed and arranged. Not much space inside the store so might be a little cramp for window shopping. Only 1 fitting room, where quite some queue during peak seasons. Price rather competitive. I hope the management takes this seriously and educate your workers. | review_rating:5, text:Special thanks to Ms Miki for her outstanding customer service and dedication! name: GIFTOPRECIOUS
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Jo Malone
location: G1.71B, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had an amazing experience while shopping for gifts here.

I did not catch the name of the guy who attended to me, but he was friendly, informative and great at small talk. Very knowledgable and helpful too; he was able to help me find the perfect scents I needed. Also really appreciate how he rushed out to greet me. The rest of the staff were lovely as well, and they made sure I got the most out of my purchse.

Can't wait to make this my preferred branch for Jo Malone. | review_rating:5, text:Superb service! Having a good experience during my first purchase here. Staff is very knowledgeable and patient, explaining everything thoroughly.
Good job!👏🏼 | review_rating:5, text:Attentive and friendly staff, no pressure to buy. Ansley was very knowledgeable and showed me the right scents based on my preferences. | review_rating:5, text:Attended by Jaila twice, gentle and polite. Very professional and no hard selling. He treated me well even though  I turn down some of his recommendations. Professional and efficient! Kudos to Jaila! | review_rating:5, text:Whether at SURIA KLCC or Sunway Pyramid, Jo Malone treats the customer with pleasure and passion for their job.

name: A Decade
location: LG2.52 & 2.53, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The restaurant is really nice and offers good food for fair prices. There is a wide range of different food: western food, traditional local food and wok. All very nice, the same with the drinks which we enjoyed. Definitely coming back for another meal if I am in this Mall again. | review_rating:5, text:We really enjoyed our Nasi Kerabu, and the portions were great too. For small eater, better to order one main and one appetizer to share for 2 pax.

We struggled to finish our own Nasi Kerabu. Drinks were great too. Kat Chai Bing, and Teh Tarik were on point.

Only thing maybe the beef rendang was too little, but the ayam percik was just nice. | review_rating:5, text:What a great experience dining here! I really fall in love with all the foods that i ordered. My husband was having a Nasi Goreng Udang, and me having a Moonlight Hokkien Kuey Teow suggested by a lovely hijabi waitress ; Intan. Tbh, the food is beyond the universe. It was my first time having a hokkien kuey teow that super delicious!! We also having a Original Cheong Fun. Sedap gila ! Kudos to the kitchen team for the super nice meal. Thank you chef and team! Thank you kakak for the nice drink also! Thanks to  the floor team for the great service! Thank you A Decade for the very best experience ever 🫶🏻 | review_rating:5, text:An amazing dining experience from start to finish! The menu had a great variety, and everything we tried was cooked to perfection. The service was quick and professional, and the decor added a lovely touch to the overall vibe. Highly recommend for anyone looking for great food and a great time! | review_rating:4, text:Nasi lemak daging rendang is nice. But the ice cendol is not recommended because the ice is not fluffy and is very hard as if eating stone, otherwise i will give 5 stars

name: Yakiniku Kuro
location: LG2.39, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Food is good. Went there for 3rd visit, taste is consistent. But the kimchi marination for beef getting lesser each time. Take 150g beef will be enough for 1 person. Long waiting time during weekend if they did not have spot for 2 person. They will asked if you willing to join table with another customer. Service is fast as not much preparation on their side. The grilling smell is not too overwhelming, doesn’t really stick to your cloth. Overall, all good. Wish they had more seating so people don’t need to wait to the table | review_rating:5, text:Latest Yakiniku joint in Sunway Pyramid. Great spread of premium beef (Angus and Wagyu), seafood, lamb, chicken and sides. Individual BBQ pit with good ventilation exhaust does not leave any odour in the air or on clothes 👍

Service staff were attentive and polite.

Marinated BBQ meats were moist, tender and tasty. Seafood and vegetables could have better been served with some oil/marinade on the side to prevent it from being too dry during BBQ.

Overall nice dining venue and would surely come back again. | review_rating:5, text:Latest Yakiniku in Sunway Pyramid, I like that I have the option to sit at my own mini table, it remind me of Ichiran ramen solo table. The meat quality especially the beef tongue was better then expected and the miso soup quality was also decent. I recommended people to don't skip order the beef tongue despite there's no set for it. It's quite surprise to know that they provide himalayan pink salt instead of normal salt.

The waiter was very professional and trying to make me feel comfortable. He was patiently explain to me about the menu. I also overheard him explain to an old couple behind me for quite a long time without getting annoyed. Big respect for the waiter patience.

Overall, the pricing may be a bit steep but for the quality they provided and the service they provided i think it's worth it. Would visit again if I got pass by. | review_rating:5, text:Had a pleasant dining experience at Yakiniku Kuro~ Especially love their Premium Australia Infused Steak Cut! Beef is so juicy and delicious! Love it 😻 Would definitely revisit again! | review_rating:5, text:Literally my favorite yakiniku restaurant. I had a similar one in Thailand but personally I think the fatty beef (idk the name) one is so much better, much juicier. The sauce is just great but I love eating meat with just salt. Once I’m bored of salt I eat their sauce.

review_rating:1, text:Not good at talking. If you put it nicely, it's called straightforward; if not, it's impolite and bad at doing business. I just think ORIS provides good service, except for the Sunway branch. | review_rating:1, text:One of the worst salesman i’ve ever come across.I just simply ask why the price is a bit different from the other shop that I went ( not Oris boutique).I know it’s a silly question but it’s kinda big money for me so I thought I’ll just ask whatever in my mind at that time  before I make the purchase.I was so shocked when he replied ‘Go and buy at that other place la!’ .So arrogant as if he owns the shop). Is this how you treat your potential customer? Such a turn off.I ask his name and he said ‘WK’. I don’t know if that is his real name or not.

PS : I went to Omega boutique and the sales person is 10 times more professional than you lot. Good luck! | review_rating:1, text:Saw the authorised Oris shop in Sunway , went into shop today and asked whether they provide Oris watch repair but the staff that on duty (tall with spec) answered this to me “u think our service centre small like this shop?”
Didn’t expect this kind of reply from ur staff.with the unwelcome attitude staff,I think no one customer still have mood to look or buy a new watch. | review_rating:1, text:Sent in watch for repair yesterday but the male staff (taller) responded with unwelcome tone and his attitude was cold, without giving much response except keep emphasizing that the repair would take four months; a long period, if I send back to service center through the shop.
The watch was not bought there, it didn't exist at the mall, three years ago, but the staff should act professionally in dealing with after sale service. There's no other customer in the shop anyway. Another male staff (shorter) was more attentive with his gesture and few words even he was not the one who served me. | review_rating:5, text:Nice place to buy watch. Premium look of shop. I’ll definitely be returning! | review_rating:5, text:Very nicely appointed and done up boutique under the Clarins label with the full range of skin care and cosmetics. I wish to rate zero star since it's not allowed! To the clarins team please hire someone with class!!! name: Liverpool FC
location: LG1.28, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Only Official LFC Store in Malaysia! Though they have limited options on the items available for sale, offered a great deal with 30% discount on all items. Staff were friendly. | review_rating:1, text:My brother, who lives in Johor, bought a shirt here only to find out that one of the staff members (a lady) gave him the wrong one. So we had to come back to exchange it on 31/1/25, which wasted our time and energy. We also met the same lady the second time we returned, and unfortunately, she gave us a cold look and didn’t even apologize for her mistake.

When the shirt was exchanged, I asked for a receipt, which she initially tried to dismiss. I was surprised to see that the receipt had been tampered with. I also read other reviews mentioning that this mistake has happened before.

Management, please address this issue. | review_rating:5, text:Can someone provide me the link or website to purchase? Since im stay in KL would like to buy and do lalamove. Cant find it everywhere for the store website | review_rating:3, text:I was surprised to see this store. Wonder how it didn't catch my eyes during my previous visits.
