name: H&M
location: No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:H&M at Sunway Pyramid is a spacious and well-organized store, offering a wide variety of clothing options for men, women, and children. The layout is easy to navigate, making it simple to find what you’re looking for, whether it’s casual wear, office attire, or trendy accessories. The staff are generally helpful and friendly, though sometimes it can take a while to get assistance when the store is busy. They keep the store clean and well-stocked, and the fitting rooms are comfortable and well-lit. Overall, it’s a great place to shop for affordable fashion, with a good selection of styles and sizes. Four stars for a reliable shopping experience! | review_rating:5, text:H&M Branch in Sunway super spacious and well organized, aircond is cold and fitting room are a lot 💥🙃🏊 Staff is informative and friendly as well which is good ⚫️⚫️✈️ | review_rating:4, text:Well known overseas brand in the local market. Huge shop in the mall, probably lacking the signage to the fitting room in a corner. Came about the fitting room’s location when I was looking around for a place to sit. Please ensure you are able to stand/walk around (no any seats available), while your other half/members are browsing-shopping/queuing for the fitting room (to try out the variety of clothing designs/fashions - huge age-range able to cater). Probably lacking in the customer’s satisfaction in terms of finer details, like providing a little seats. | review_rating:3, text:It is no longer interesting and not the same as before MCO (March, 2020) anymore with more choices, style, colours, cutting but the quality is getting worse, promotion not that good or attractive anymore, and the price went up even it is made in Cambodia or Bangladesh | review_rating:1, text:I'm not allow to follow my girl to the fitting room. The malay girl in charge without tudung is very inpolite. Her tone of the voice was very loud. She embaress me in front of other customers. She told me I have to stand outside. When my girl opens the door then only i can walk towards to the door. I  am not even allow to stand outside of the entrance door of my girl's fitting room. What kind of rules is This?? No other shopping outlets practice This!!. It's ridiculous!!. Very dissapointing!!. Your customer service need to improve!! NEVER WANT TO GO TO H&M SUNWAY OUTLET AGAIN!! Please look into this very seriously.

name: Sunway Pyramid Hotel
location: Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:We stayed at Sunway pyramid hotel for one night after 31st night celebration. The location of the hotel is fine. The deluxe room comes with the basic amenities and the space is manageable. Our room was a bit old but it was clean. The body wash in the bathroom had a very foul smell, so probably it has expired. It would be better if the cleaning staff could pay more attention to this. Other than that the room was manageable for a one night stay. | review_rating:3, text:Sunway Pyramid Hotel - 3⭐ Review

🏨 Hotel (3/5)
•	Crowded lobby, long queues for check-in.
•	Late check-in issue – even at 3 PM, the room wasn’t ready.
•	Extra bed charge is RM 189, quite expensive.
•	Parking costs RM 15 even after validation.

📍 Location (5/5)
•	Perfect location – directly connected to Sunway Pyramid Mall.
•	Easy access to restaurants and shops without leaving the hotel.

🛏️ Room (3/5)
•	Smelly sofa, affecting comfort.
•	Slow WiFi connection.
•	Old mattress – uncomfortable, caused body aches.
•	No kids channel on the TV, limited entertainment options.

🍽️ Breakfast (3/5)
•	Expensive – RM 65 for kids, around RM 90 for adults.
•	Very crowded, sharing the same breakfast area with Sunway Resort Hotel.
•	Quite a walk to the dining area – not convenient for families with small children.

💰 Overall (3/5) - Not Worth the Price

For a 4-star hotel, the price feels too high compared to the overall experience. The location is the only highlight, but service, facilities, and comfort need improvement. | review_rating:4, text:Cleanliness could be better. The room offers privacy and a good view. Good value for money. The breakfast spread is good with a wide range of choices. However, it’s a bit of a hassle to walk to Sunway Resort since breakfast is served at the hotel next door. The plus point is it is conveniently located next to Sunway Pyramid Mall. | review_rating:5, text:Booked 4 rooms. Although initially they mentioned they couldn’t get adjacent rooms for us, but at the end, they managed to do so albeit the check in time for each room varied. They allowed early check in for 3 rooms. Rooms were neat and clean. No free car park though. | review_rating:4, text:Sulit hotel!! Good price, biiig rooms and great location. So why not 5 stars?? Bathroom was a little small and could use some renovating. Overall great hotel though. And service was also friendly and helpful.

name: Zing
location: LG2.K.7 Sunway Pyramid Jalan PJS11/15, Bandar Sunway Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Love this place! I do all my piercings here now. I don't experience any pain after piercing (of course I can't sleep on my ear for a while). But if I don't touch my ear, there's no pain at all. And they staff is well prepared. I told her I wanted the rubber earring holder instead of the metal one because its harder and more painful to take off. And she had them ready for me and packed the metal holder in a packet for me. And the price is good; only RM10 per piercing. | review_rating:3, text:Have gotten piercings here over the years and yes they're good, but bought some septum jewellery and they started rusting in my nose.. quite disappointed. The jewellery aren't the greatest quality but the customer service and the actual piercing service is alright. | review_rating:1, text:Service is very terrible by a female hijab worker. We asked her if there are any other rings available & she made an annoyed face and showed to us rudely to the section. When we asked her what size is the ring bcs there were no labels, she literally said “idk check on your own” we were like ???? excuse me u work there you’re supposed to know what size it is & even if u don’t, u have to assist to measure the ring instead of standing there & repeatedly saying “idk anything” disappointed that the service has worsened | review_rating:1, text:My friend went here few weeks ago to get helix piercing and the one that help her pierce didn't mark the dot that used to mark instead the worker just cincai tembak and now my friend is inside hospital because of it! Even my ears didn't get mark first before pierced! PLEASE BE RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR ACTION | review_rating:5, text:Very like their piercing services! Professional! Good experiences,very satisfied! Will veery take care of my piercings ~~Thank you!

name: ATM Public Bank
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Mojoskins
location: Lot LG2.102, Level LG 2, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:MojoSkins at Sunway Pyramid is a great spot for phone accessories! The customer service was impressive—super attentive and professional without being pushy. They helped me pick out the perfect screen protector and case, and I felt like they really knew what they were talking about. The selection is above average too, with a good variety of styles and options to choose from, especially for screen protectors and cases. Prices are reasonable for the quality, and they even offered to apply the screen protector for me, which was a nice touch. Definitely recommend stopping by if you’re in the area! | review_rating:5, text:Noey been super duper helpful and amazing giving me tips on wireless powerbank and with cables. Sabar je dengan soalan saya hahaha. She’s very helpful. Also she did the skin wrap on my phone with care. Love every details she did. Keep up the good work! | review_rating:5, text:Good n friendly service fr sales rep, smiling faces n sweet girl🤩 | review_rating:5, text:you guys should come here cause many cute casing and more choice here, staff also friendly!! recommend❤️ | review_rating:5, text:Thank you for your good servce 🥰🥰 sgt kemas dan lawoo

name: DayOne DayOne
location: F1.75 & F1.76, first floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:The service is extremely slow and workers were not trained properly. I arrived at 3:30pm which is not peak hour, only a handful of tables seated with customers, mostly food were served. However, after waiting for 30min my food were not served, some other customers who arrived much later than me, food were already served. I wanted to asked the waiter on my order who just delivered the food to the table next to mine. But when I called him, he pretended not hearing and walked away to chit chatting with other. When I approached him again, he rudely walked to the cashier asked another person to attend to my queries.

From the place I sat I could see the kitchen staff were eating in the kitchen. While another few were standing stay far away from their customers without checking nor having eye contact with the customers. Unfortunately, the table I saw at without the bell.

The herbal noodle soup I ordered is bland and over price. I requested for soya sauce, when delivered that time there is oil inside, make me wonder if the sauce plate unclean or it's recycle. At the end I did not consume.

Definitely will not go back again. Food over price with not meeting expectations quality and services. | review_rating:5, text:If you are new to this restaurant, you might consider to try out their signature noodles. I personally don’t feel the noodle has much different with the other branches.

Only thing is that the staffs here lack of smiles. They would be more cute and handsome if they do. | review_rating:3, text:Dry Noodles were alright. The beef stew was average. The broth was tasty but a tad too salty and with the star anise just made it not very nice. Personally I don't like it. The portions were small given the high price point compared to other noodle resto. Very little contact with staff cos order thru QR and they just serve. Not sure if I'd patronize this place again. | review_rating:2, text:Had great experience in other branches and decided to have lunch here. The service here is not very bad but they seem to be much slower and also less enthusiastic.

Food, ordered their promotion bowl pork yakiniku, the taste is so weird with peppercorn in it, it never mentioned that this Japanese fusion bowl has a little bit of spice.. not what I expected from the menu. | review_rating:2, text:I had good experience eating at other branches so I decided to have lunch here. Ordered the signature braised pork chew noodles and saw a decent amount of pork under the egg. But don't let that fool you. A good 60% or more of those were actually fats and there were barely any actual meat. Wanted to fill myself up with the pickled cucumber instead so I tried asking for a refill and got rejected. Only thing decent was the atmosphere.

name: Goldheart
location: G1.78, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:We really appreciate how professional and attentive Libby was throughout the process. Libby was so helpful and kind. She made the whole shopping experience a pleasure. | review_rating:1, text:The customer service I experienced from them is all good until I brought my ring to Sunway Pyramid Goldheart on 28 September 2024 to do size adjustment. The adjustment was done on the day and I’ve tried it as well.

They say engraving have to wait till the next day 12pm only can be done, on Sunday I called them they said the ring can be done before 2pm. Unfortunately at 1pm when I’m on my way to Sunway Pyramid I received a call from them, said that the engraving can only be done after 4pm. So I’m not able to collect it on Sunday because I don’t want to waste my time waiting there.

Today 1 October Tuesday, I went to collect my ring but the condition is bad, the surface of the ring is scratched. What I’m angry the most is the staff no inform me at the phone about this until I go and collect it they also didn’t mention about anything to me until I saw the scratches on the ring. I asked them why is it like this. Their answer is this can only be fixed at Hong Kong in 2-3 months time. I send a good condition ring over but received a scratched ring? The staff didn’t mention anything about before I ask. The staff should have realise this issue before hand and inform customer and give customer solution to solve this. When the staff handover to me, she just said, the ring is done adjustment and engraving please check, they didn’t even admit they are sorry for scratched the ring and how they can solve it until I ask them. And the scratches are on top of the ring I don’t believe no one else has seen it.

This kind of customer service attitude are bad because it’s not about how far I came to collect it or am I urgently need to use the ring. We bought the marriage ring to wear it not just to use it. It Is the customer expectation to collect a beautiful fit ring from the shop.

Kindly train your staff again and provide a right compensation to customer. Thank you. | review_rating:5, text:Professional friendly staff here
Patiently to share knowledge to client like me.
If people spend money here probably is 70% staff service follow by 30% quality design provided here. | review_rating:5, text:Excellent services provided by Carol. I am really happy with her attitude and the assistance she offered. She follows up and provides a good explanation. I highly appreciate her dedication to customer satisfaction. | review_rating:5, text:Great service from Libby! Bought our wedding band here. My fiance and I are satisfied 😊

review_rating:5, text:Syvr was very helpful and friendly! Boss should give him a Bigggg Angbao!
Love the service very muchhh.
I will definitely come back again to purchase more ! | review_rating:4, text:I love their garments in general, particularly the oversized t-shirts and trousers. The material they use is generally cotton with nylon/rayon/polyester knitted mix, slightly thick but which gives the materials a better fall/structure to the body. The garments are generally oversized but stylishly cut. And their prices are quite competitive, ie cheaper than Uniqlo or Muji. | review_rating:5, text:Stylish collections with unique colour collection for all. | review_rating:5, text:The t-shirt sold here is really worth the money and very smooth. Comparing to some big brands, their clothes really amazed me. Recommended.

reviews: review_rating:1, text:Car wash RM 140+ they will give you some free stain inside your interior and leave those dust at your dust mat😉 | review_rating:1, text:I wanna give no star if possible! Fell for their trap paid 350 for free 6 months membership n free Polish n car wash but lousy job, my car still very dirty here and there, at least clean properly lah.. What's the point of getting a car wash then? Can't even do the basic job damn it I'm so angry! Didn't even throw away trash in my trash bin seriously?!?! I wanna get refund! | review_rating:1, text:This place is a scam, super unfriendly service and a joke. Before Request for a car wash, the person ask to join membership which i decline, and quote me RM400 just for a simple car wash. What a joke | review_rating:1, text:If can don’t come to this cp2 outlet, I reach the outlet on a Friday (27.09.2024)12pm, and I told the guy in charge that I want the car by 1pm latest, then he said latest can do by 2pm but your apps say 30mins car wash, he then give me all sorts of excuses then I said it’s alright I will just bring it to cp4 outlet, he str8 away said can do it. What kind of working attitude is this? Anyhow, seeing him so eager, I just let him do it. He charge me rm76 for car wash+OTIO, when I receive the car and drove away then I realize my figurines on my car dashboard was spoilt, if it was spoilt infront of the guy, I will str8 diu 9 him, and I saw the person in charge smoking with his collegues just beside the car wash centre, UNPROFESSIONAL! My first and last, then I checked the app Member’s day discount till 15.10.2024 , car wash + OTIO RM49 only LOL that day he didn’t even bother to mention and changed me normal price. So guys think twice before sending your car to the CP2 outlet, other outlets in pyramid I can’t judge. | review_rating:5, text:Best services from this Car international branch(Level LG) .They let me utilise my voucher in my app.👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

name: Velife Snack Bar
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: The Parenthood
location: SPWF003, First Floor, Green Zone Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:This place is more suitable for older children and not toddler as all the slides are quite high up and the surface not soft enough for toddlers. Furthermore there is a bus area whereby there is some kitchen toys and soft blocks available for play but the condition is very bad, the soft blocks has been chew off and there isn’t much kitchen utensils to play with, only an empty kitchen counter there. Worst still there are many uncovered electric plug points there whereby toddlers will be able to touch it freely, the electric plug point shouldn’t be built there or at least it must be covered up with child protection measures. My young daughter went to play with the switch and i have to constantly tell her not to touch it! This is unacceptable as this is a children playground. Overall this place are more suitable for older kids whereby they can climb higher and know not to touch electric points. There isn’t much things available for toddlers i would say. | review_rating:5, text:We recently hosted our son’s 5th birthday party at The Parenthood, Sunway Subang, and it was an absolutely amazing experience! From start to finish, the entire process was seamless, and both our family and friends had an incredible time.

The venue itself is perfect for kids with a variety of activities that kept everyone entertained. The indoor play areas are spacious, well-maintained, and suitable for children of all ages. My son and his friends had a blast exploring all the fun attractions. It was also a great place for adults to relax and catch up, while keeping an eye on the little ones.

The staff at The Parenthood were super friendly and helpful, making sure everything ran smoothly. They took care of all our needs, from setup to ensuring the kids were safe and having fun.

The birthday party packages were fantastic too, offering a wide selection of entertainment options, delicious food, and even personalized touches to make the day special. We couldn’t have asked for a better place to celebrate this milestone.

Overall, our experience at The Parenthood was outstanding, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking to host a memorable party for their little ones. Everyone had a blast, and it was a birthday celebration to remember! | review_rating:5, text:We celebrated our son’s birthday at Parenthood, and it was an incredible experience! The staff was wonderfully attentive, making sure everything was set up perfectly and that all the kids were having a blast. The play areas were safe, clean, and full of fun activities that kept the kids entertained for hours. They even offered a variety of options for party themes, and the decorations made it feel magical. The food was kid-friendly and tasty, and they took care of every little detail, so we could just relax and enjoy the day with family and friends. Highly recommend Parenthood for any birthday celebration—our son had the best day! | review_rating:5, text:Came across this huge playground and had the pleasure of trying with my child one weekday.

Entry was swift. Staff are helpful and accommodating. Siligent on cleaning even on a non busy day. It has different play sections, which is good, so older kids will not hurt by accident the younger ones. There are lots of slides, which is fun even for small built adults.

The entrance fee is very reasonable for a whole day play.  About 30 ringgit on weekday / 60 ringgit on weekend, public and school holiday.
Re entry is allowed as long as within that day and with a guardian or parent going in together. Extra guardian or parent is charged 5 ringgit.

Socks is needed to enter like most playgrounds. They charge a reasonable 7 ringgit in case you need it.

There's also a cafe inside where parents could rest while waiting. Opposite the playground is a  shop for kids stuff.

Overall, it's worth it to try. | review_rating:3, text:A beautifully designed play area for children, with the London bus outside being the most attractive feature! It’s a fun place for kids to explore and enjoy.

However, I felt a little disappointed as the playground space is smaller than last year, and the horse carousel ride is no longer there. The area feels shorter than before, which affects the overall play experience.

One major concern is safety—the staff should keep an eye on kids playing rough, especially on the big slide. Since children of all ages play together, some older kids don’t follow the play rules, making it scary for kids under 7 to enjoy themselves.

Hope the management can improve the playground space and safety monitoring in the future!

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Service crews are so kind and helpful with warmest smilling. They helped me to get a table to sit four of my gals. Some playground customers occupying those tables without purchase food from Waffuru. This is unfair to customers like me purchased food and with kids. Fortunately , crews helped , thanks and great work!
I will definately come again❤️❤️❤️❤️ | review_rating:1, text:Waffle is nice but charging a paper bag for rm1 is abit too much if is rm0.20 cents is fine. | review_rating:5, text:A nice place to get a classic waffle with the classic flavours like Chocolate and peanut butter.

One of the few places in Sunway Pyramid offering waffles.

Price ranges from RM6.50 for one. The taste is not bad. | review_rating:5, text:Tahaeen very helpful and friendly person.. excellent customer service | review_rating:5, text:Im not very sure name of cashier but service very tiptop! Im happy!
opening_hours: N/A

name: Kyochon
location: 2.95, Level LG2, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I recently visited KyoChon 1991 at Sunway Pyramid, and I must say, it was an amazing experience from start to finish!

The food is absolutely delicious – the Korean fried chicken is crispy, flavorful, and perfectly seasoned. I highly recommend trying their signature Red Pepper Whole Chicken, they’re simply mouthwatering.

Not to forget the must have radish and seaweed soup to complete your meal! The portions are generous too, making it great value for the quality of food.

The service was exceptional. The staff were friendly, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed without being intrusive. It really added to the overall positive experience.

The atmosphere of the restaurant is cozy and welcoming, with a modern yet comfortable vibe, perfect for a casual meal or a gathering with friends. The interior is well-designed, and you can tell they put a lot of thought into creating a relaxing dining environment.

All in all, KyoChon 1991 is a fantastic spot for anyone craving quality Korean fried chicken and top-notch service. I’ll definitely be coming back! | review_rating:3, text:Located at LG2 near MBG Fruit Shop and DIY Shop.. Atmosphere is great and place is quite big..

The Menu is okay but compare to other Outlet i think the menu is too little or perhaps already change of menu?

Food is great.. the spicyness is wow quite spicy suitable for spicy lover and the honey garlic is also delicious.. price is moderate.

Service? Okay the thing make one to eat here was the waiter out front that is friendly...but when i sat at the table their is two malay lady that is not so friendly while taking order...they even argue who to take order. What a snub. The cashier staff was great..

Overall - Meh but okay...can try here, no obligation but for me, i rather go different outlet.. experience wise is not great. | review_rating:5, text:Look for En Khairul if you want a great experience. Very attentive and cheerful handling order and customer. We can see he is giving the best service. Thank you 👍 | review_rating:5, text:The service is good and fast. Their food especially the boneless chicken portion is just right for me. Their dessert is totally delicious, especially considering that I'm a fan of chocolate. Really love it!😋 | review_rating:3, text:Waited almost 30 minutes for our food. The cup of tea was so small and not refillable😅 The chicken tasted good though. Crunchy and savoury. Though the set looked quite sad  in portion wise and sides for rm20 something.

name: 7 Eleven
category: convenience_store, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: 5, Jalan PJS 11/28b, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:The 7-Eleven on Jalan PJS 7/18 in Bandar Sunway is a reliable 24-hour convenience store. It's perfect for grabbing snacks, drinks, and essentials at any time of day or night, making it a handy spot for both locals and visitors in the area. | review_rating:2, text:Love the variety of snack options here but be careful of what you get because not everything is fresh. I bought the bagel and it was rock hard even after heating up so I think it must have been kept for a long time. Croffle was hard too. Tried the wedges and I thought the sauce will be separate based on the picture but they actually pour it on the wedges. The cappucino was quite good. Soya bean with konjac jelly was good. | review_rating:1, text:Got a few 7-11 around this area, but I'm talking about the one at the main entrance of Sunway Pyramid. I usually always carry coins with me and the first time I didn't (today), the cashier had the audacity to said 'tsk' and didn't fully give me my remaining balance. he was suppose to give me back 3.80 and he only gave me 3. hello? not everyone's earning money in sleep? so rude. | review_rating:1, text:Never ever buy SIM cards from 7 eleven stores . Outside coke is RM1.80, in 7Eleven, it's RM 3.50.. why? Very costly | review_rating:1, text:There's 3   7-11 shop around Sunway Pyramid, there's one outside Sunway pyramid ,same row with Public Bank / just next to Nasi Kandar Mamak Stall. The cashier always didn't find back my change, sometimes RM1 or a few sen. He just say "no change/ no syiling." He didn't feel sorry at all. I mean its okay once awhile for this kind of unprofessional act. But I was staying here for years at PJS so I know this guy cashier always did this as it's not the first time I dealing this with him.

name: Juice Works
location: LG1.Rink, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Have been patronising juice work thru out their outlets across klang valley. Their quality are always consistent.

Few of my favourite are mango passion, strawberry kiss and banana blast. Haven’t try their greenery option.

The only complaint will be the price point. Is getting way more expensive compared to other fruit beverage maker. Hopefully they can price back appropriately to the market level as around 20 ringgit for fruit juices is a bit too expensive. Should cap around 15 or lesser. Anyway hope they can sustain their market as competition are a lot and consumers have other choices too. | review_rating:2, text:Had the dragon sparkle which was good as well as the lychee paradise which was a let down. Every mouthful was filled with mango fibers which even though the drink tasted good, the mango fibers made it so hard to drink I had to throw it away. With that said, it’s a comfortable place to sit and rest | review_rating:5, text:First time I go to the Juice work, the staff there is really 100% friendly.. they're so gentle and always smile.. they also welcoming people too... They are so nice and easy going people... It feel so refreshing and nice being there ... Their juice is delicious and tasty too... | review_rating:4, text:After done Huawei RM 1.00 Screen Protector stopby here at Juice Works for the RM 1.00 Special Promotion Lychee Cooler (their Facebook photo info claim the normal price is RM 11.15)
2020 October 10 | review_rating:1, text:Worst experience out of the juice works outlets we have been to. The staffs are rude and have no responsibility.
We ordered the healthy drink Power size with #myDigi app promotion. The staff poured the drink to the Power size cup and it wasn't full so she added a cup of ice and blended again to pour it into the cup to make it full. We drank it and it was too bland and tasteless. We nicely feedback to the staffs and the replies we got was it's bland because it's health drink without yogurt in it and both the staffs keep insisting that's the reason the juice got bland. We then told them that they have added so much ice into it and they kept insisting they only add in half cup of ice which we saw there are a total of 2 full cup of ice (before blended the first round and 2nd round another cup). They didn't want to take responsibility for it and just simply give reasons to shoo us away instead of helping the paying customers. We then went to the cashier to tell the cashier thinking she might be the person who could at least solve the problem but she just acted blur and turned away. The staffs also asked us to move away and not blocking the cashier for other customers to make payment which then there were no customers behind us. This is SUPER RUDE. One of the staff then get our drink and then asked to pour away the ice but it was blended and we wonder how she would do that to pour away the ice? We saw her just pour the drink out to the blender and pour some juice away into the sink then pour back into the cup. And guess what the content becomes even lesser and the TASTE IS STILL BLAND. The staffs are trying to CHEAT on customers CONSTANTLY. We were so tired of their NONSENSE. At last the staff took the drink back and pour back into the blender and add one tiny piece of pineapple to add abit of taste to blend. It had a bit of taste but still the TASTE IS OFF. We were so TIRED OF talking to them anymore which lead to deaf ears so we just walked away with the healthy drink that just taste like WATER. Such A HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT.

name: Signature Healthland
location: Ob3 G1-10, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Definitely will be back for our thai massage here. Our masseurs were very skillful.

At first they suggested for us to take packages, but we weren’t sure whether we would like the massage as many masseurs were not that good based on past experiences.

But they proved us wrong. Next trip we will take the package and visit at least once or twice a month.

We were served by two different receptionist and both were polite with us. After seeing the reviews here, we thought we would experience the same rudeness. Glad that they have improved their customer service.

Kudos! | review_rating:5, text:Had a 90 minutes foot, head and shoulders massage here. It was amazing. Overall I'm happy with the service provided by the staff , from the front desk staff to the masseuse. They served cold tea before the massage, which was perfect on a hot sunny day. The massage took place in a cinema-like room and they would play a movie during the whole process. After the massage, the masseuse served us hot ginger tea. The only thing that spoiled my whole experience was a group of customers who were being so loud and talking on the phone. Good thing they arrived when my massage was about to end. I hope Healthland can impose a rule for customers to be quiet and phones should be on vibrate/silent mode. | review_rating:5, text:Finally enjoyed a nice 2 hours Aroma Oil treatment massage and it was legendarily great. Very professional masseuse and the whole place was beautiful, quiet and relaxing. Most probably advisable to go there in the early hours of their time to avoid the rush hour. All in all, I will definitely come back again and again... Your body feels extremely relax and calmer after the massage here.. | review_rating:5, text:For the promotion price of RM130 for two hours worth of message (foot + traditional Thai) this is a steal!  The atmosphere and facilities was top notch you could even say the best. Guess that’s why this is ‘signature’. Thumbs up to their service and masseuse too! | review_rating:5, text:Had a very great 2 hours massage from the Therapist no 1112.  I had back pain for a while. And she managed to relief it. Will definitely come back . They have different types of massages. I choose the Aromatherapy.

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Another new player in the "potong kaki" beverage shop from China. What caught my eye was their signature mango pamelo sago which was one of my favorite desserts. Sugar level at 70% was ok for me. Yes drinks were pricey but still acceptable for once in awhile indulgence 😄. | review_rating:5, text:Opening Buy 1 Free 1.. located at lower ground floor.. currently js crowded because of the promo.. long queue but manageable..

The drink is okay cause it is newly open so only have 6 drink. The price is quite high a bit compared to other competitors drink company.. drink making take sometime cause many order..

There is scratch card u can get free fan painting or other give.. can try to see whether it is suitable for you guys. | review_rating:5, text:Ordered the Muscat Jasmine tea with less sugar. It has the fruit and jelly and is super tasty. Perfect for a summer day. Fast service and friendly staffs as well. | review_rating:5, text:Delicious! name: T&T Station
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Ichiban Ramen
category: ramen_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Unit No.LG 2.31, Lower Ground Two, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:the food is good here, especially their ramen; the  broth is quite creamy and delicious! and dumpling filling is alot too.
recommended | review_rating:4, text:Had lunch at Ichiban Ramen and tried the spicy Ichiban ramen. The ramen noodles were perfectly kenyal (springy) and had a nice texture, which I really enjoyed! However, the broth could use a bit more kick—the spice level was milder than expected and didn't quite hit the mark.

The environment was comfortable, not too hot or too cold, which was nice. I ordered the lunch set, but it required an additional RM3 for an iced lemon tea, which felt a bit off since you'd expect the set to be a better value without add-ons.

The service was okay, though sometimes it took a while to get the staff's attention as they didn’t always check for raised hands. Overall, an okay experience, but a few improvements would make it even better | review_rating:3, text:Food was ok, even though it could have been better. The chicken slightly dry. Ramen also slightly pricey to compare with big bowl but normal portion (at least to us lah). Ramen soup also ok-lah just like that. AND do not add on extra chilli. Not worth it to pay for small chilli plate size. The kimchi fried rice quite decent. Can come and try but might not come again so soon. | review_rating:5, text:Decided to go there for a quick lunch Service was great especially by the waiter Daniel He was super attentive Price was reasonable for the lunch set which comes with a drink, fruit and soup | review_rating:3, text:Quite busy. Food could be better, portions are a bit small, and too salty. Food took quite some time to get here also. All in all, not really a restaurant I would come back to.

name: KFC
location: Lot LL2.40, Lower Level 2, Sunway Pyramid Mega Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I was waiting for 15mins to get half order, then I have waited 30mins plus to get full order which original chicken and zinger burger. Even the the original chicken I asked for drum stick but they gave me thigh part. All the employees working like a turtles. Please make it fast as possible, that’s why we called it fast food. People are hungry here. | review_rating:1, text:I bought 15 pcs at this outlet on the 22 Jan. When I reached home, realised it's on 12 pieces, less 3. So frustrated with their service. Had to call up CS and made arrangements to replace my order. Such a hassle for small order. | review_rating:1, text:I'm waiting for my food for almost 20 mins. I saw all staff prioritize takeaway orders. When my food came, then my orders were not accurate, no coslow and mash. I did ask the kakak without tudung and tudung, but they just ignored me for almost 10 mins. They replied ok and ok and ok. KFC management should emphasize this attitude to all staff. Customer first! | review_rating:4, text:Ordered:
1. crispy chicken satay burger with B1F1 promotion
2. combo set of samyang cheezilla burger (incl. A fried chicken, mashed potato & drinks)

Satay chicken burger
✅️ we loved it
✅️ crispy and hot
✅️ bigger chicken fillet size
✅️ the satay sauce 😋
Although we waited for quite awhile because kitchen was preparing but for the crispiness it is acceptable.

Samyang cheezilla burger
✅️ delicious
❌️ wasn't warm enough so the cheese couldn't pull

Staff
✅️ cleaned table shortly after customer left
✅️ walking around to serve | review_rating:1, text:Total wait time was about an hr 30mins, had to order at the counter due to vouchers. Had to wait at the counter for about 30mins before they took my order. Waited another hr to receive my food, noticed that people and orders after me were getting theirs first. They have their waiting numbers, but somehow the staff do not follow them according to the order. Which is confusing, whoever reads this, Please fix your systems and staff. Staff Was also very very rude. Heard her saying to her co worker, “ Bodoh punya customer. Suruh dia tunggu “. Which questions me, is this how your front of the line staff is supposed to treat your customers ?

name: A-WOW-ME
location: 2.79, Lower Ground Second Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I recently visited this saloon for a haircut and hair dye, and I couldn’t be happier with the results! The salon was beautifully clean and had a calming vibe. Lucas took the time to listen to what I wanted, suggested some tweaks, and completely nailed it. The color is exactly what I envisioned—soft, natural, and perfectly blended. The entire staff was warm and welcoming. Strongly recommend Lucas and will definitely be returning! | review_rating:5, text:Kevin really understands our request.
We just wanted to trim the length and layer it a bit.
The result is really satisfying.

Some stylists sometimes just ignore and cut however they feel like.

Will definitely come again!
👍👍👍 | review_rating:5, text:Have an amazing hair cut, hair dye and keratin treatment by Lucas. She is friendly, nice , very experience stylist and she truly understand my needs and delivered a good and obvious result. As a slight curl based hair girl, I finally got an opportunity to try out new korean style of hair cut🤩Lucas definitely done an absolute jobs. I love the hair dye outcome, it was eye opening. Beside, it was really comfortable during the hair wash, almost fall a sleep with that😂. Super duper recommend for those who wanted to change a new hair style and hair colour to come and find Lucas.Promise that you will get to smile out of the salon . 🤭 | review_rating:5, text:First time visiting this salon and I had a pleasant experience with Lucas! She is very skilled and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended. Looking forward to my next haircut here^^ | review_rating:5, text:Had an amazing experience as a hairstyle model! The stylist did an incredible job, and I love how my hair turned out. The attention to detail and creativity were impressive, and the entire process was smooth and professional. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a fresh, stylish look!
Hair stylish: Lucas Gan

name: Marks & Spencer
location: G1.69 & 68, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Marks & Spencer @ Sunway Pyramid

This store offers a well-organized layout that is clean and easy to browse. It features a variety of fashionable clothing for children, young adults, and adults. Don’t miss their food section. It's worth exploring for delicious snacks and treats, including biscuits and chocolates! | review_rating:4, text:Marks & Spencer at Sunway Pyramid offers a great shopping experience with a well-organized layout and a variety of high-quality products. The clothing section is particularly appealing, featuring stylish and comfortable pieces for all ages. Their food section is also worth exploring, with delicious snacks and treats like biscuits and chocolates. The store is clean, and the staff is friendly and helpful, making it easy to find what you need. However, prices can be on the higher side, which might not appeal to everyone. Overall, a reliable spot for quality British goods. | review_rating:1, text:No wine and beer sold here like some of the photos shown here.
Only KLCC and Midvalley have wine in KL.
Don’t waste your time here.
Photos from others years ago were misleading info. | review_rating:5, text:The ever popular food section has since been expanded reflecting the relative popularity of this section compared to the clothing department. Popular items here include their huge selection of various packed biscuits and cookies. Depending on the season, there are offers for certain goods especially during the yuletide season when the store stocks up on associated items that are Christmas related. You'll encounter alcohol infused fruitcakes and puddings which are very good indeed. At present there is also a coffee bar which has a small selection of freshly baked pastries and cookies. Highly recommended. | review_rating:4, text:I have been to kul a few times looking for crumples.

Finally this trip to kul,managed to find it at marks & Spencer, sunway pyramid.  16nov2024.

Thanks.

name: Harvey Norman
category: department_store, electronics_store, furniture_store, home_improvement_store, home_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.140 Lower Ground Two, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic experience at Harvey Norman in Sunway Pyramid. The service was professional and attentive from the moment I walked in. The staff was knowledgeable and ready to assist, making sure I found exactly what I needed. They carry a wide selection of high-quality electrical products like air conditioners, fridges, washing machines, ceiling fans, and much more. The quality and variety of options make this a great one-stop shop for home appliances. It’s definitely worthwhile to shop here during their promotions as you can get excellent deals on premium products. Highly recommended! | review_rating:4, text:Ever walk into Harvey Norman and get drawn straight to the tech section? They have everything from laptops and phones to vacuums, washing machines and TVs. But that's not all! Harvey Norman also boasts an impressive selection of cool furniture. Planning a bedroom makeover? You might find the perfect inspiration there.

Plus, the staff is helpful. Don’t hesitate to ask about any deals they might have going on—you could score a sweet price on your next tech gadget or furniture piece! | review_rating:1, text:Philips promoter name Prakash at this outlet is very rude. Never encounter such rude staff of Harvey Norman before. All Harvey Norman staffs are friendly except today. I was looking for air fryer, he came and I asked him which one is good. He just showed me the bigger one. Then i wanted to ask him about the smaller 4.2L one,  he just walked away thinking i was not interested. What a rude staff! I was not happy hence I went out and came in after my dinner thinking of getting the air fryer without dealing with him. I took the box and walked to the counter to pay. He came and grab the box away from me and gave the box to another staff. And he walked away! The lady staff was so nice and attended to me. OMG what’s wrong with him . Goodness | review_rating:5, text:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Exceptional Service by Prakash Philips …

I had one of the best shopping experiences at Harvey Norman, all thanks to Prakash Philips! From the moment I walked in, he was attentive, friendly, and incredibly knowledgeable. He went above and beyond to guide me through every detail, ensuring I got the best home appliances suited to my needs and budget. His patience, professionalism, and deep product knowledge truly set him apart.

Prakash didn’t just sell products—he provided outstanding customer service, making the entire process smooth, enjoyable, and stress-free. His recommendations were spot-on, and he genuinely cared about helping me make the right choices rather than just making a sale.

Harvey Norman is lucky to have such a dedicated and passionate promoter. If you’re shopping there, I highly recommend looking for Prakash Philips—you won’t regret it | review_rating:5, text:I had the pleasure of interacting with Prakash Phillips and I was thoroughly impressed with his level of knowledge and professionalism. He took the time to explain everything in a clear and thorough manner, ensuring that I understood all the details. His expertise was evident, and he answered all my questions with confidence and clarity. It’s rare to find someone so well-informed and dedicated to providing excellent service. I truly appreciated his assistance and would highly recommend him to anyone seeking help

category: ice_cream_shop, dessert_shop, confectionery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Got in the queue at 6.49pm for the usual discounts on Wednesday. Once reached the counter, only to be informed that the staff had passed the “end of queue for promo” sign to the person 2 steps in front of me. No communication or whatsoever from staff when I was in the queue. Maybe this is the marketing strategy to make people still buy cause customers already wasted their time queuing for nothing🤷🏻‍♂️ | review_rating:1, text:llao llao luxe is not worth it, paid rm 20.9 for such a mini yogurt ice cream (way smaller than medium size llao llao) | review_rating:5, text:Thank you, Llao Llao SP staff! Even though it was busy with the 33% promotion, they were so kind and polite, giving the best service. | review_rating:1, text:Bad service!!I requested for extra small spoon as usual but the staff stated that Rm1 is required for an extra small spoon??? The dessert is already expensive and still want to charge for extra tiny spoons? Last time it used to be free! | review_rating:1, text:Mr. Frank if I am not mistaken, provided the worst service possible today. We had llao llao at this branch today around 3pm. We ordered 2 at first and requested to add on another. When we reached the cashier, he shouted at us if we ordered 2 or 3 even after telling him that we ordered 3... Not sure whether he was having a bad day but that shouldnt be the way to treat your customers.
Also, he showed a lot of attitude when we requested for some tissue.
I have been a loyal customer to your brand and this branch but after being trated like this in front of so many people, i dont think i will ever visit this branch again.
Here is a picture of the staff that showed a lot of unnecessary attitude. Hopefully your company would improve on the quality of your service.
Really disappointed with everything that happened at llao llao today.

name: Top Secret Studio
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

location: Lot LG2-69 Lower Ground 2, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Service so bad here in this sunway pyramid digicentre.
1. No QMS machine but to take Queue no from 1 and the only staff standing there and without indicating that, "pls take queue no from me". Ended up, I'm roaming around to fine the ticketing machine.
2. When explained to the staff, asked to wait lo. Then I said cannot be ma.. since 10/12 no update at all
3. There are 11 ppl ahead from me, 30 mins past, still waiting mode 🙄
4. No proper sitting area for those waiting customers
5. They don't keen on my enquiry that I placed order online but still not yet receive my item. The queue no lady even asked me to just wait lah... 😒 but waited for more than 3 working days from klang valley delivery only.
Just waste of time here. | review_rating:1, text:Went here today to fix my name, it was captured wrongly when I self register in the Digi app when I purchase the number. It's my second number. There's one Chinese lady I'm not sure her name she was at counter 5. She told me it cant be done since I got outstanding amount, I have to clear everything. I just want to fix my name that's all. She make faces and look at me up and down. So so bad!!! I wasn't satisfied then I came again and met with one Indian guy at counter 6. He was very helpful!!! The reason I came again is because I have been waiting for an hour to get number with my 2 starving kids!!!! | review_rating:1, text:I've been waiting for an hour (update I waited for almost 2 hours to be seen). I came on a weekend before.. It was horrible and now I am here on a weekday and it is WORSE. EXPAND. You have this ONE store that can handle special contracts. The company expanded to celcome so it HAS to expand its customer service. Wasting everyone's time here. The line is out of the store into the walk way.

Overall I waited and was there for 2+ hours. | review_rating:1, text:Terrible customer service experience

There were 2 sales assistants and both were serving their customer respectively. Understand that they have to complete the request of current customer before move to next to customer. However, I was standing there 5 minutes ++ and none of them took any actions to inform or let me know how long I would need to wait. | review_rating:1, text:me and my husband came to the store wanted to ask a question from them but nobody serve us. we did asking for help from the two chinese worker but they say to wait for a minute, while one of them did serve a chinese customer before us. i think it’s a bit racist, cause we waited and waited. even maxis have a lot of customer they can serve us so much better than you guys. please improve your customer service, thank you

name: LAC Nutrition for Life
location: LG2.02, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:The store itself leaves a positive impression, with a good selection of products. However, the experience was overshadowed by the behavior of the staff member present. The individual came across as rude and dismissive, with a judgmental attitude that lacked basic courtesy.

Despite multiple attempts to seek assistance, I had to wait nearly an hour before receiving any attention. When I was finally assisted, the interaction lacked professionalism, particularly in addressing my queries about protein and creatine supplements suited to my needs.

It would be beneficial for the staff to receive training on customer service, including effective communication and creating a welcoming atmosphere. While the products appear genuine and of good quality, the overall experience was quite unpleasant due to the lack of proper customer care. | review_rating:5, text:Premium price but Excellent Products. I find the staff friendly & knowledgeable in explaining the products. There are also good membership points to redeem from both LAC & Sunway Pal Apps. They even throw in great gifts which are attractive & useful. Highly recommended outlet to visit! | review_rating:1, text:Rude, arrogant and unhelpful staff, will never be a member or visit again. | review_rating:5, text:Good service, Mr Syahdan can literally explain all my needs, a really good customer service, 2nd time talking to Mr Syahdan in here, | review_rating:5, text:Bought my protein shake from here!

name: Yi Poh
location: F1.AV.147 & F1.AV.195, First Floor, Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Nice place at Asian Street in Sunway Pyramid. There are many options of noodles. I took the premium char siew rice set .. the food is ok, but rice is a bit undercooked. My friend had the noodle set, and it's quite value for money. We also ordered some side dishes. | review_rating:3, text:Value meals are among my more affordable food in the mall. Ordered Hakka noodles which texture and taste was somewhat lacking in that traditional chewiness, aroma and taste of a good old bowl of traditional hakka noodles. Then fried wanton was a little bland. Prefer Tang Ping restaurant in SS2.
Ordering process thru the phone including payment was clinical and somewhat impersonal and distant. Slight mistake in the delivery of the drink and similar mistake observed in other customer order. Both the food, environment and service fail to draw me back there again. | review_rating:5, text:Nice atmosphere👍👍. Great view! Located at the top floor food street. Unlike some other branches, This Yi Poh branch is consistently serving quality dishes👍👍. Serving is by robots, waiting time not too long. Good crowds during weekends. Need to order by scanning QR codes (bad for older people) 🥲. Price is very reasonable. ⭐️.

Recommended place for a good value quick meal in Sunway Pyramid | review_rating:3, text:Was there for dinner around 845pm. Had hotpot mala pan mee (super spicy but nice :)), Wantan Mee dry (fried wantan is nice, noodles biasa je) & Wantan mee soup (tasteless). While eating baby croaches, climb onto my leg, ask hubby for help. Phobia ald, keep looking at my leg while I eat. The croaches could have come from some other place as I see Yi Poh staff,  sweeping n moping the floor around 950pm. | review_rating:1, text:Been taking YiPoh for so many times and the food was good and amazing however today to my surprise the curry mee which i always order beside Hakka Mee and Wan Tan Mee is totally waste of money .

It doesn't taste like Curry Mee and doesn't look like Curry Mee. It looks like Hokkien Prawn mee Soup.. but taste not even near it. No coconut milk at all!

This was the worst Curry Mee i had ever tasted and experience in YiPoh Sunway.
I wish im able to load a video. Pic doesn't show how bad it was , as it was colour corrected.
I bet the standards n SOP of food prep has gone downhill Pls do something 🙏🏻

Thank you

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:i ordered strawberry earl grey latte from Gong cha sunway pyramid through grabfood sebab i was attracted to the loads amount of strawberry puree in the drink when i saw reviews online. tapi bila this drink delivered to me, the amount of strawberry in my drink was so pathetic. Jauh macam langit dengan bumi compared to the ones i saw online. I minum pun dah tak balance rasa strawberry and earl grey tu sebab amount of the puree so pathetic. lagi rasa earl grey je. Kalau i nak minum earl grey kosong semata, baik i order mixue je. disappointing. | review_rating:1, text:I have the similar experience with previous reviewer NG NG too.

Was there this afternoon.
Only 1 Malay lady manning the store.
She ignored me for 30 secs, while we waited at the counter, waiting for her to serve us.
She was next to the counter wiping some containers.
We have to call her to make an order, obviously she saw us all the while.
She then reply with a sour grape face say wait. Then I saw there is QR on the counter and I proceed to scan the QR and play my phone.
She then continue ignore me after done her wiping. Another client come and she served them and continue ignore me.
The QR link to a order website but is pointed to ss15 branch. After ordering show to she, she say not sure if can switch to here Sunway branch. In the end I need go ss15 branch to collect my drink. When arrive there is a Malay lady manning the store too but say no prepare my drink cause not sure if I come? Luckily she can prepare the drink in short time.

Overall have bad experience with ordering from Gong Cha staff in this Sunway branch. There is no improvement since other buyer have comment similar few months ago. | review_rating:1, text:Was there today afternoon around 7pm above. A malay girl was at the front counter. The way she attend to us was very not welcoming to the customer. No smile at all, with sour face.  Even after we say thank you to her also she didnt reply anything plus with bored face. Maybe that girl baru kena tinggal boyfriend kot, but with that kind of attitude jangan lah jaga front counter. Bawa lari rezeki je. | review_rating:1, text:Cannot cash?? Only QR & debit?? I que in 15 minutes and there's no sign till i want order and cashier say cannot cash. Then just the shop & no need to open if cannot cash. Cashier also speak with lower voice. | review_rating:2, text:Haven't order for so long while this time when I pick up my drinks when my order was ready, I asked the staff to make sure the order was mine meanwhile the staff at the cashier just moved her sight from her phone to me 1 second and nodded her head without saying anything. This also happened when I'm ordering, should have improve your service.

name: STUFF’D
category: turkish_restaurant, mexican_restaurant, american_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.53A, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Good place for healthy, light meals. Taste-wise its really not bad and they don't skimp on ingredients.

Ordered chicken kebab today (though I almost got hurt biting into a bone chip). Saw another review here that they also found bone chips in their kebabs. Something that I've not encountered in their other outlets. Perhaps a quality control issue.

The newly renovated stuff'd now uses machine ordering. The machine lagged when I was making payment, and staff were too busy to entertain my problems because Grab riders were more of a priority. After awhile, one of them rerouted the payment to the normal counter cashier (what was the point of the machine, then?)

Waiting time: Almost 20 minutes for a kebab. Not really acceptable considering most customers are here during their short lunch break. Like I've mentioned up there, they prioritize Grabfood more than walk-in orders.

The space is too tiny for the amount of customers that drop by. Best to takeaway.
Probably won't be back in a long time until they've fixed their machines and service. | review_rating:3, text:Update**
Bought kebab today and it's absolutely soaked. Dripping everywhere as soon as I start eating and towards the end it was hard to even take a bite with all the water. Maybe teach your staff to properly drain the vege so we don't end up with damp kebab.

Frequent this place, always order chicken, today first time order beef and regretted. There were 3 bone chips in my beef kebab, could easily had chip my tooth. | review_rating:3, text:so is it burrito or kebab?

if the former, then it simply isn't as good as the competition round the corner.  which is the general dilemma of "premium" fast food. | review_rating:5, text:As was ordering for a lunch meeting, pre-ordered the bowls.

The bowls were made just prior to collection as they were packing up when I reached.

It's a hearty meal & with options to add or omit as desired.

The veg bowl option selected is  guacamole (hummus is the other, or can add it with a charge).

The sauces selected were habanero sauce (fiery & it lit my day) & mayo cucumber. The cilantro rice has a good flavour.

Will certainly be back. | review_rating:4, text:[holiao]
1) Overall - kebab shop selling healthy food that comes with varieties of fresh ingredients to choose from, good service with online ordering too, limited seating, great place for quick lunch and takeaways, food selection are burrito, beef taco, chicken quesadilla, salad bowl and kebab from
Stuff'd @ Sunway Pyramid

reviews: review_rating:1, text:I drop by to this place because i want to switch my watch bracelet to fabric strap, but the lady told me to put down my watch for 2 weeks, and wait for quotation...??? , changing strap with tools usually can be done in 2 minutes. I made a call to ask her if the store provides authentication service, she said " have to bring for my bos to check ". I drove my way to the mall, brought my watch only to discover she doesn't understand a single thing in regards of my queries. She doesn't know what is fake or what is original watch. I had to repeat a lot of times that , thats the reason why I am there in the first place. I want to know if the watch is real or not. Pls work on your customer skills. I wouldn't be going there if it weren't for you. Respect other people's time. | review_rating:1, text:I sent my mom’s watch for a fix here in November 2022. They kept telling me that they would let me know when the watch is ready because they have to send it somewhere else for the parts. I waited for months and they never called or provided any explanation for it taking so long or any further follow up. In the end they did not fix it at all. Very unprofessional and unreliable company. 0/5. Would not recommend. | review_rating:1, text:Very bad service which was meant to specialize in swiss watches. Kept delaying and no news about my watch still. Its been 2 months. | review_rating:1, text:Would leave 0 star if i could to leave a review. Lady scratched and dented my battery cover only to find out she doesn’t have the right tools to open it. No replacement no explanation. Terrible service 🤮
