name: Chili's
location: G1.97, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Had lunch at Chili’s in Sunway Pyramid, and I have to say the food was fantastic! The steak was cooked perfectly—tender, juicy, and full of flavor. Everything we ordered tasted amazing, and the portions were just right. The restaurant was quite crowded, but it didn’t bother me too much as the atmosphere was still lively and fun. However, the service was just okay—polite but a bit slow at times. It wasn’t terrible, but there’s definitely room for improvement. Hopefully, they work on that because the food is worth coming back for. Overall, still a great spot for a delicious meal! | review_rating:5, text:I had dinner at Chili's in Sunway Pyramid, and it was absolutely worth it. The food was delicious, especially the fajitas with incredibly tender and juicy chicken. I thoroughly enjoyed the meal overall. Although the service was a bit slow, it didn’t take away from the great experience, and I had a wonderful time at the restaurant. | review_rating:5, text:After 10 years didn't visit here, food standard remain the same , great environment, enjoy the food very much . Only food portion become slightly smaller but still delicious 😋. Both my daughter like it very much 😍. 👍👍👍 | review_rating:4, text:Pretty popular lunch and dinner spot for family and friends. Ordered the buffalo chicken salad and chicken fajitas and both meal was good. Same old classic environment and gotta admit, they maintained their taste and services over the years. | review_rating:4, text:One of the nicer Chili's outlets. Clean, bright & cheerful. Friendly & attentive service. Reasonable pricing considering the quality & portions. Not that crowded during weekday lunch. Great for families or couples.

We ordered their mushroom jack fajitas & monterey chicken. Both came piping hot. The highlight has to be the fajitas. My favorite at Chili's. From the juicy chicken & beef slices to the flavorful mushrooms topped with all the gooey cheese. Great on its own but better with the tortilla wrap. Sadly they don't give guacamole anymore unless added as a side. The monterey chicken was also good. Juicy & flavorful. Both were very filling. We were stuffed for the whole day. Washed it all down with their bottomless soda & juices.

We enjoyed our lunch. Will surely return when the Tex Mex cravings kick in.

reviews: review_rating:5, text:Absolutely loved my experience at Yolé in Sunway Pyramid! The service was outstanding—staff were friendly, attentive, and quick to help. It’s clear they take pride in both their service and quality. Perfect place for a sweet treat; definitely worth a visit. Five stars! | review_rating:5, text:it was a pleasant surprise. The texture was smooth without any icy or grainy feel. It contains no added sugar, but is not too sour in taste. The environment was also clean, modern, and welcoming. The ambiance made it a great place to relax and enjoy the frozen yogurt. | review_rating:5, text:Really good with the bubble waffle 💕 yogurt is 0% added sugar, the sauces make it sweet 😜 | review_rating:5, text:I ordered the frappe and it’s not too sweet, absolutely delicious! | review_rating:5, text:The best frozen yoghurt I had ♥️🤍✨ it is our ho to place and we keep ordering this online too

location: F1.AV, 92, 93, 95, 96, 97 & 98, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:it was a very good experience purchased my first laptop here. The sales assistant which is Mr. Noor was very helpful to convince me from the beginning. He also helped me to install the software that i want. Overall 5 star rating! | review_rating:5, text:A very good assist from the staff name Zam.

Explain every product, give a good comparison between different product, pro and cons.

All item sold was checked after payment to make sure all working properly. Really recommend the shop. | review_rating:5, text:Purchased ASUS vivobook go 15” here, very good service, it’s already my 3rd purchase here. They accept trade in service which I think is extra good service. | review_rating:5, text:Bought our Dell laptop computer at the above shop and was served by this young Indian nationality gentleman Mr Noor .

He was knowledgeable / patient / friendly guy in explaining the products to us which eventually we purchased the dell laptop & other accessories . ( the purchase was done is Feb 2024 - after CNY ) .

Fast forward to today 13/10/24 where we have some minor issues that require the assistance from the shop especially with the power bank ( malfunction & within warranty period )

. Mr Noor was still around and we were delighted to see him . Like always , he attended to us with his usual Smiling and friendly service  and quickly diagnosed our malfunction power bank purchased but attempt failed , suggested try to claim for us from the supplier but not guarantee the replacement which we agreed .

We bought some extra accessories from him too .

This shop indeed is a good place to shop for all electronic gadgets though . They even have a repair centre which is adjacent to the shop . Overall , it’s a good experience shopping & with excellent after sale service

(To the owner , you should reward the good staffs that can draw more customers to the shop & it’s not easy to get one good nowadays ) . Keep it up  !! Thanks | review_rating:5, text:The service is really good, I was thoughtfully guided as per my request.

name: Future Trend
location: No 7 Digital Centre,F1.AV.88 & F1.AV.89 Asian Avenue,First Floor Sunway Pyramind, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I’m not sure how this shop has such high ratings on Google, but my experience with their customer service was DISAPPOINTING. I purchased a phone case from this shop because my old one was broken. I asked the guy (circled in red) if they had a phone case for the Honor 50. He mentioned that since the Honor 50 is an older model, it was lucky they had one last piece in stock. Trusting his word, I decided to purchase it without asking the price, there was no price tag label on the phone case packaging.

At the counter, he started cleaning my phone screen without asking me first. After that, he charged me RM69 for the phone case—much more than I expected! When I politely asked if there was any discount, he only reduced the price by RM2, bringing it to RM67. I reluctantly paid and left the shop, but after discussing it with my friend, my friend and I felt that the guy "scammed" me since similar phone cases are sold on Shopee for RM10-30.

Within an hour, I returned to the shop with the receipt to request a refund. However, the guy refused, saying that once the package is opened, they cannot resell it. I considered reporting this to MDTCA, but the process would take too long. I strongly advise anyone to not visiting this shop. | review_rating:5, text:Good service! Always come here to change my screen protector and finding uniq casing w cheaper price from machine | review_rating:5, text:So many vape here good! Seller are good and responsible! Recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Highly recommended!! Excellent services!! Friendly staff.. good job Jackson & Danny👍👍👍 the only  place know what you need!! | review_rating:5, text:My go to place for all my phone accessories needs. Loved their services.

Have seen not only Chinese but other races drinking some of their herbal tea.
If you don't like the black bitter herbal tea., You can try their boiled sugar cane water.

name: Shiino Pieces
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews: review_rating:5, text:Im giving 5 star to Pyramid Sulwhasoo outlet and the staff Ms.Rubee for being so attentive and giving me full concentration when i ask loads of questions during my very 1 st visit. It was back in 2020 and till now im still using Sulwhasoo.  Its the best for my skin. Within the 1st 30 days i can see changes qnd improvement in my skin texture.  After 6 months i have loads of compliments from friends and family. The staff Ms. Rubee has always been very helpful and always keep me updated and also monitors my skin from time to time. I am very grateful she updateds me on new regime and products acording to my skin current condition . I would say she was my 1st best beauty advisor who cares for customers needs. | review_rating:5, text:Great salesperson in-store who took her time to explain and let us try the products (and was not pushy). I bought the Ginseng range, which is wonderful! | review_rating:5, text:Great service here . | review_rating:5, text:Helpful staff at this outlet ..recommend suitable skincare for my skin. | review_rating:5, text:I like sulwhasoo skincare

name: 30DEGREES
location: LG1.02, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:The quality of the innerwear from this brand is actually quite good, and for my size (F100) they are one of the few that holds large size and have more than 3 back clip which i love, aside from that, the customer service is average.

My sister and I just recently purchased innerwear from here (22/4/2023) and the employees there are quite alright, I manage to find my size but my sister took some time in finding it, which she later noticed its not the right size for her on that day when we got back home.

I understand its her incompetence when it comes to choosing something you wear everyday and still able to choose wrong. So we went back to the store for an exchange (24/4/2023) and it's a different staff this time. Though I find this employee to be somewhat irritated due to her tone when she's serving. But the biggest problem was that she secretly CUT OFF the price tag after my sister had finally done choosing the right size WITHOUT informing us and for me, that just leaves a sour taste in my mouth.

I believe staff have to at least inform the customers that they will cut off the price tag due to whatever reasons presents. Either its because customers can only exchange product once or any other reason at all, for the staff to cut off the price tag like that is just another stamp approval of me not visiting this store anymore.

I'm not sure about the name of the employee but I believe the Person in charge can find out who that is. (24/4/2023. 12.46pm) | review_rating:5, text:Their zero bra is so comfortable and soft yet offers good support and securely fits.   Customer service lady  is quite knowledgeable and helpful. Sometimes need to visit their other branches  for the popular colors and  designs that quickly ran out of size or stock. | review_rating:5, text:On behalf of my girlfren, found tat tis brand inner wear is awesome. Customer Service is exceed expectation because they will give suggestion n advise. Keep it up, kudos! | review_rating:1, text:Service very BAd | review_rating:1, text:Service is so rude

name: 108 Matcha Saro
location: G1.122C, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Nee matcha specialty shop at Sunway Pyramid Blue Atrium.

Seating is very spacious and comfortable. Deco is clean and simple with a hint of Japanese design tone.

Prices are around RM17 for an iced matcha latte and RM16 for soft served ice cream. Not cheap but won't break your bank.

Good place for a quick stop without having to queue up or fight for seats. | review_rating:4, text:Signature 108 Matcha Love Parfait are perfect, rich with matcha taste with chocolate drip. Soft serve are perfect too. Although the biscuit are tasteless. Overall their deserts are good but slightly over price | review_rating:3, text:The design of the cafe and the menu looks very promising but honestly the matcha drinks and desserts here are not as nice as it looks. The matcha latte tastes so bland, the matcha drink with ice cream has too much ice cube in it, the doriyaki tastes so so. It's overprice, in my opinion | review_rating:1, text:On weekend you can’t find a proper seating with helpless waiter or waitress just staring at you even though there are seats but selfish selfish young customers outlive others by blindly occupying seats with their shopping bags or items , even with a family the parents does the same how despicable! What makes matter worst was the level of service, a family of 4/5 hogging one big table and they just order one drink. Can’t they be moved away ? Where is the dining policy during peak hour then or u der standing, if ur restaurant or cafe is full out a sign out saying it full not making us the paying customer to rush the chairs to seat our elders and what’s even more disgusting was having to face these young kids and parents who are guilty of deaf and table hogging. It was alright dessert wise. Nothing to shout about paying so much premium prices for it all. | review_rating:1, text:Overprice for an unknown grade matcha, RM18.90 for a cup of hot matcha latte. Even though they claimed it's directly source from Uji, Kyoto, but which grade? Lowest grade or?

Taste milky and the too much matcha powder at the bottom, the brewer didn't whisk the matcha powder properly. Not recommended.

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Nice drink buy one free one , quite nice for this pandan kokuto latte

Updated Review: from 4 - 1 Star

The staff was friendly and hardworking, but I felt bad for her—she was running around trying to serve a crowd all by herself. It’s unacceptable for one person to handle everything. This is a clear failure of management, not the staff’s fault. | review_rating:5, text:This outlet considered as the most happening FamilyMart in town. Like to hang out here with Japanese ice cream cone after lunch or dinner and buy Japanese bread for next morning breakfast | review_rating:1, text:I came here to bought oden. I requested them to pack the mee separate. They said the packaging is out of stock and I asked them can you use the soup bowl? They said cannot. And don’t even apologize.. | review_rating:1, text:I bought udon yesterday, no fork or spoon provided, everthing out of stock,expect me eating udon with bare hand?, shouldn't except the payment if u can't provide utensil. | review_rating:2, text:The sandwiches & items are expensive. The shrunken size of the items don’t match the prize. One of the worst outlets we hv been to as normally only 2 staff, one or two counter is open everyday and on weekends!! They’re understaff. The long line of customers waiting to pay makes it very frustrating & inconvenient!! Rather go somewhere else. The Management shld hire more staff or put in place payment kiosks for customers convenience like the Bandar Sunway outlet in Jalan PJS 11/9

name: H&M Home
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Dolly Dim Sum
location: LG2.28 Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall No. 3 Jalan PJS11/15 Bandar Sunway 47500 Petaling Jaya Selangor MY, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Seriously good for halal certified dim sum.  The siew Mai, prawn egg fried rice, Har Kao, glutinous rice, prawn fritter, fried beef Kway teow were good. | review_rating:4, text:The best halal place to get halal tasty dim sum fast and near! Immediate location to go to in order to satisfy that tastebud!

The portion is getting smaller and smaller by the day. Such a disspointment though. Everything seems to shrink. Sad! Food, drink, size...quantity!

New menus available especially when it comes to dishes so we tried those salted butter prawn and the portion is so not what we expected. They should really mention "for illustration purposes only" in the menu.

Service is acceptable and everything else is tolerable. What a letdown if it keeps going from utterly amazing to barely good. | review_rating:4, text:Good services as usual. Efficient and attentive to customer. All food come out great, price are slightly on higher side but reasonable. All their dimsum come with thin layet with good portion of filling. The golden fried rice and beef ball are our favorite, congee also really good as comfort food if you are not feelling weel. We are regular patron and will continue to support. All menu is halal. | review_rating:5, text:So delicious. I love the golden fried rice, porridge and the crispy chee chong fun. | review_rating:3, text:Food taste not bad, but very atas price. A small tiny glass of water cost rm1 which wasn't expected. Service was good and staff was really nice. Overall, good experience but wont eat again.

name: Jelly Bunny
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Very bad attitude. I buy shoes there 5 jan 8.15pm, one female staff throw the shoes behind me because i don’t want pay display item and choose other item. Pls teach your staff to be good attitude to customer. Tq | review_rating:1, text:Bought one shoe today with price tag of RM129.
When im about to pay I give RM150 and she (female staff)  returned RM50 to me, and said ‘ ada 50 sen tak’ - and i told her ada but what for the shoe is RM129 with no cent. As im about to get the 50 cent, she saw RM5 in my bag and said ‘ tu ada RM5 tu’ . I was baffled and ask her how much is the shoe she said in mumble ‘ RM64.50’ . But i couldnt hear her so i asked again how much was it? I thought its RM100 something. And she said arrogantly and annoyingly: 64.50 la nak ke bayar harga asal?
I didnt even know theres promo price in the first place.
Hate that shop now.
Short hair female staff wearing black shirt.
Lain kali bagi tau dekat customer ada sale. Bukan main mintak another bank note in the bag. | review_rating:5, text:The shop smell good, like everyone said. Had a very pleasant time 1st time buying from here, the staff also very polite and friendly. | review_rating:5, text:Good service jelly bunny Sunway pyramid  👌 | review_rating:5, text:Pleasant experience with a variety of collections, staff wasn't hard selling.

location: Lot G1.82a, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful first experience at the XIXILI in Sunway Pyramid!  The staff was fantastic, especially the malay lady who assisted me.  She was incredibly knowledgeable and experienced, taking the time to properly measure me and patiently guiding me through several options until I found the perfect fit.  I really appreciated her expertise and personalized service. Was very satisfied with the purchase. Highly recommend!!! | review_rating:5, text:Was attended by a Malay lady, very experienced and friendly. Felt safe and comfortable with her helping me with my fit. | review_rating:5, text:Was served by Min, a malay lady. She is very attentive and helpful. She provided her professional suggestion in deciding which to choose and superb friendly. Initiated in helping me to get the right size in changing room without the need to step out. Definitely deserve a shout out! The registration hv some prob but she is very patient and did it on behalf of me later on. | review_rating:5, text:Had a pleasant experience here. The lady that attended to me was knowledgeable and showed me the right bra size for me. It's always hard finding a right fit for those with large cup size. I suggest you try xixili's. No back and shoulder pain. No headache. | review_rating:1, text:Got such a bad experience over there.
Was told can get a rm15 discount using an apps but was not given any proper instructions to do so due to the aunty was multi-tasking and serving other customer while I was doing payment. After that was told was my mistake why didn’t click the voucher and was not given chance to refund even jus newly bought. Wil never ever come back again, very very disappointed for the services! Was never expect can get a discount, but if u inform a customer wil get a discount pls guide ur customer next time.

name: AVEDA
location: Malaysia, Selangor, Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, G1.125B, Ground Floor邮政编码: 47500
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I was drawn to the free scalp check sign while I was strolling through Sunway Pyramid. The staff truly knows how to explain and offer recommendations, which improved my impression of their products and brand even though I don't know a lot about the brand. Now, when it comes to hair care products, Aveda is one of my fave brands. Along with a soothing shoulder massage, their scalp check treatment was very useful in establishing the health of my scalp. My overall satisfaction with their services and goods is excellent. | review_rating:1, text:I recently visited this establishment for a hair and scalp review, but unfortunately, the experience was not pleasant. The staff who greeted us had a sullen face and made us feel unwelcome right from the start. This was disappointing as it's not the kind of experience you want when seeking professional advice.

During the review, the staff member assigned to us couldn't provide much helpful advice regarding the scalp issue we were experiencing. It was clear that more training is needed for the staff to be able to give expert advice to customers.

After we decided to purchase a few items, we noticed a change in behavior from one of the staff members who became friendlier. However, the other staff member still maintained an unprofessional and unfriendly demeanor, which was a letdown.

Overall, the experience was not great, and the staff's behavior was disappointing. We hope that management will take appropriate action and ensure that their staff are better trained to provide customers with a welcoming and professional experience. | review_rating:1, text:I went there for a scalp check but the promoter said they don’t  provide that particular facility in Aveda sunway pyramid , and the best part is they had a board promoting the scalp and hair check. So if you have an idea of checking your scalp , please do not go to aveda sunway pyramid , you would be dissapointed! | review_rating:1, text:I went there freaking no one is there, I have a lot of things to do and waited more than 15 mins when the sign is written “toilet break for 15 mins” | review_rating:4, text:No Review

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Clicknet HyperStore
category: cell_phone_store, electronics_store, wholesaler, store, consultant, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1.AV, 92, 93, 95, 96, 97 & 98, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:it was a very good experience purchased my first laptop here. The sales assistant which is Mr. Noor was very helpful to convince me from the beginning. He also helped me to install the software that i want. Overall 5 star rating! | review_rating:5, text:A very good assist from the staff name Zam.

Explain every product, give a good comparison between different product, pro and cons.

All item sold was checked after payment to make sure all working properly. Really recommend the shop. | review_rating:5, text:Purchased ASUS vivobook go 15” here, very good service, it’s already my 3rd purchase here. They accept trade in service which I think is extra good service. | review_rating:5, text:Bought our Dell laptop computer at the above shop and was served by this young Indian nationality gentleman Mr Noor .

He was knowledgeable / patient / friendly guy in explaining the products to us which eventually we purchased the dell laptop & other accessories . ( the purchase was done is Feb 2024 - after CNY ) .

Fast forward to today 13/10/24 where we have some minor issues that require the assistance from the shop especially with the power bank ( malfunction & within warranty period )

. Mr Noor was still around and we were delighted to see him . Like always , he attended to us with his usual Smiling and friendly service  and quickly diagnosed our malfunction power bank purchased but attempt failed , suggested try to claim for us from the supplier but not guarantee the replacement which we agreed .

We bought some extra accessories from him too .

This shop indeed is a good place to shop for all electronic gadgets though . They even have a repair centre which is adjacent to the shop . Overall , it’s a good experience shopping & with excellent after sale service

(To the owner , you should reward the good staffs that can draw more customers to the shop & it’s not easy to get one good nowadays ) . Keep it up  !! Thanks | review_rating:5, text:The service is really good, I was thoughtfully guided as per my request.

name: TGV Cinemas
location: F1.01, Level 1, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Attend for Red One Premiere, I hate the person in charge just too restricted on checking time on my phone just telling not use phone, Hello I am not using phone, try to understand your customer before say something.

Not to come this place again | review_rating:5, text:Nicest movie theater in town. The cinema screen, sound system are brilliant for me. | review_rating:1, text:They need to REVAMP this ENTIRE CINEMA.

1) It smells so bad, like a pungent smell, something like stinky, musty socks EVERYWHERE here. Either it's coming from the nasty and dirty carpets, or the mold growing on the ceiling.

2) I remember when this cinema used to be one of the coldest cinemas I went to, and now, it's so stuffy and warm here. Broken AC or just being a cheapskate?

Please CONSIDER these two problems but please deal with problem no. 1 especially. Avoiding this cinema until they decide to actually fix the smell and the mold problem.

Do not go here if you are very sensitive to nasty smells. | review_rating:2, text:The movie experience is always fantastic, and the IMAX is superb. The only thing that could be improved is the popcorn. The signature caramel popcorn is often stale—fresh and crisp popcorn would make the experience even better! | review_rating:5, text:The sound and picture are great.  Theaters are at a good temperature. The IMAX theater is awesome.  All the theater seats are so comfortable. The beanie theatre is pretty cool. Clean washroom.  Lounge area available.  Exits are well lit. No WiFi.  There's always a display you can interact with even within the mall. Make sure to snap some pictures.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I have good experience while shopping here, this one is my third purchase already. The salesman that always assist me is Jaydoo and Albert. They are very nice, polite and very helpfull person. 😍 next time will buy again here! I hope they get salary increase because both of them deserve it!! Much love 🫶🏻🫶🏻 | review_rating:5, text:I really love the necklace i bought earlier, thumbs up to the design and quality of the Jewelry. Also, they provided me excellent customer service, thank you Jaydoo and Albert, both are knowledgeable and friendly. Not just salestalk but they both build rapport and treat customers with care prefectly, Superb service👍 They also recommended what suits best for me. We'll definitely come back. | review_rating:5, text:The designs incredible & Elegance, I buy Bracelet & Ring. Super Good Quality. The Seller Are Also Very Friendly And Satisfying. They Handle Their Customers With Personal Attention. You Earn My Loyalty!! Will Be Coming Back Sooon. Thank You. | review_rating:5, text:Had a really great experience shopping there with my fiancé. We were attended by Jaydoo -  super professional & very knowledgeable. He could tell our ring size just from one look & is able to pick out styles that fits us individually and as a couple. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Had good experience at Vinstella Sunway. Was looking for couple rings at Vinstella because their rings are beautiful and affordable. I was appreciated with salesman Jaydoo's service as he was very helpful and patient although it was close to closing time (We can see his passion in his job until we thought he was the boss)
The ring size we wanted was nt available in his branch, but he helped us check with other branches for the availability . Vinstella even has ring engravement service, so he help us do all the processes and assist us in the delivery of rings to us after the rings are ready. As it was CNY, we got some cute free gift also. Thank you so much! 💍💍

name: Spectrum Forex Money Changer
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:They delivers exceptional service and unbeatable rates, far better than the other branches. It’s a weird why more customers don’t know about this fantastic shop. Friendly, professional, and always goes the extra mile. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great deals and outstanding customer care.
I would recommend mr.fairoze services at SPECTRUM 3 in Sunway Pyramid Mall
Don’t miss out this is the place to go! | review_rating:1, text:Good rate but bad attitude.

I went to the G floor branch (next to Parkson).

The first time I went to counter 1 to change A currency, I said I wanted to split two receipts, he said he couldn’t split the transaction and asked me to queue up again.

OK, Second time I went to counter 1 again (only 1 counter is open) and changed A currency.

Seeing that there was no one in line behind me, I said I wanted to change B currency, he said no, he could only change money from one country per person at a time, which means I had to wait until someone came to queue up to change money before I could change money for the third time?

Meanwhile counter 2 is open, then I pointed to counter 2 and asked if I could change money, counter 1 said NO, because counter 2 is new and he didn’t know how to do it.

So does a money changer have such a rule now??? | review_rating:4, text:SMALL MONEY CHANGER IN A BIG MALL. FAST SERVICE.
EXCHANGE RATE IS AVERAGE.
MUST SHOW YOUR NRIC OR PASSPORT TO BUY OR SELL THE CURRENCIES. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recomended.Good rate and good service. Same rate as the other shop in the middle but no queue compared to the middle one. | review_rating:5, text:This is consider the best rate money changer in Subang Jaya area and after Mid Valley. Another option you may go for competitive rate within same area is Subang Parade. To those customers who had issue with uncle previously, it is depend on how you talk or behave toward him at first. I had deal with him for more than 10 years but never have any issue based on mutual respect of each others. He is a nice guy anyway. Recommend this place!

name: Nam Heong
location: Lot LG1.98B, No.3, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:How come the sunway branch serves chicken rice with so little chicken? even the chicken rice from stalls outsides gives more chicken. i always go to the one in main place and the portion is so big and the staff there are ready to serve. Here hardly can find staff on floor. Always missing in and out. Not coming here anymore. | review_rating:5, text:Delicious chicken rice! The flavors were spot on, and the chicken was tender and juicy. The rice was fragrant and perfectly cooked. The restaurant has a clean, welcoming atmosphere with great service. Definitely a five-star experience—I’ll be coming back! | review_rating:2, text:After renovation, this place just became their petaling street branch. Limited selection of dishes, no more pastry.

Chicken rice is overpriced for providing only 4 pcs of chicken and most of the part is bone. Ginger minced is tasteless and chili sauce doesnt have enough garlic taste. The BBQ chicken is tender and the sauce abit to salty for me.

Kopi still hit the spot and liver taste great. | review_rating:4, text:A restaurant located inside Sunway Pyramid shopping mall (next to Mr DIY) - 2 floors below Asian Village.

Serving all and everything Ipoh. Especially like their chicken tart. The fillings are delicious, and the pastry is so fluff and nice in your mouth.

Their coffee, nothing to criticise as it gives you the full flavor of Ipoh. Anything more, it's not Ipoh already.

October 8, 2024 - it's been a while we didn't visit this old hangout of ours. As they are having a Tuesday promo of free Ipoh White Coffee, and so happened, we were hungry, so we ordered bbq meat rice and Wonton noodles. The noodles are good, but the bbq meat is a bit too saucy. | review_rating:4, text:Really like the atmosphere and decor of this restaurant. Friendly tentative staff.  Speaking to the Tea Time Specials, they're all a good price and the portions are amazing.  Egg tarts are pretty good.  The butter kaya toast was delicious.  White coffee was good too.  Clean facility.  Free WiFi.

location: LG2.83 Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a great experience dining at Dipndip Sunway. It’s very kids friendly as they provided pens and paper for each of my children, which was really helpful. They were also very welcoming. Will definitely come again to satisfy my cravings! | review_rating:5, text:Good place to relax and spike ur glucose level😝. Fast service and good dessert. Will come to enjoy dessert again. | review_rating:5, text:Our choice was the exquisite Crunchy Triple Chocolate Crepe. This delectable crepe boasted a moist texture with delightful crunchy crumbles. It featured a generous serving of vanilla ice cream, generously topped with a frozen chocolate sauce and drizzled with premium flavored chocolate sauce. What surprised me most was that, despite the abundance of chocolate, the dessert had a well-balanced, not overly sweet taste. I had expected it to be much sweeter, but the overall flavor was just right. | review_rating:4, text:During my visit to Malaysia, I had the pleasure of staying at the Sunway Pyramid Hotel. One evening, we decided to indulge in a delightful snack at Dipndip, conveniently located just a few floors away from our hotel lobby. They are located at Sunway Pyramid Mall.

Our choice was the exquisite Crunchy Triple Chocolate Crepe. This delectable crepe boasted a moist texture with delightful crunchy crumbles. It featured a generous serving of vanilla ice cream, generously topped with a frozen chocolate sauce and drizzled with premium flavored chocolate sauce. What surprised me most was that, despite the abundance of chocolate, the dessert had a well-balanced, not overly sweet taste. I had expected it to be much sweeter, but the overall flavor was just right.

Without a doubt, this crepe ranks among the finest desserts I've ever had the pleasure of tasting. I highly recommend giving it a try! | review_rating:5, text:Dipndip at Sunway Pyramid exceeded all expectations and provided an unforgettable experience for my family this evening. From the moment we stepped in, we were greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere that set the perfect tone for a delightful evening. The staff was incredibly friendly, attentive, and eager to ensure that our visit was exceptional.

Now, let's talk about the star of the show—their chocolate creations. Dipndip boasts an impressive array of mouthwatering desserts that are truly a chocolate lover's dream come true. Each bite was a heavenly explosion of rich, velvety chocolate combined with a variety of delectable toppings and fillings. From their signature chocolate fondue to the indulgent crepes and waffles, every dish was crafted with precision and love.

What made the experience even more enjoyable was witnessing the skilled chocolatiers in action. The live chocolate preparations added an interactive element and allowed us to appreciate the craftsmanship behind each creation. It was a pleasure watching them pour, drizzle, and sculpt the chocolate into beautiful works of art.

Furthermore, the attention to detail in both presentation and taste was remarkable. The desserts were beautifully presented, showcasing the artistry and passion that goes into every dish. As we savored each bite, we could taste the quality of the ingredients and the dedication put into creating a truly exceptional dessert experience.

Moreover, Dipndip's commitment to creating a family-friendly environment was evident. The cozy and inviting seating arrangements, along with the charming decor, made us feel right at home. The staff went above and beyond to ensure that our children were comfortable and catered to their needs.

Overall, our evening at Dipndip in Sunway Pyramid was nothing short of extraordinary. We left with satisfied taste buds, happy hearts, and wonderful memories. If you're a chocolate enthusiast or simply looking for a memorable dining experience with your loved ones, Dipndip is the place to be. Prepare to be enchanted by their chocolate wonders and indulge in a sweet journey like no other.

name: Jin Hayari (Pop Up)
location: F1, AV 159 & 160, 1st Floor, Asian Avenue, Sunway Piramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Last time have bad experience in Mid Valley. Yesterday got worst experience in Sunway Pyramid. I realize foreigners working really in bad manner. I just try out one short dress and return because is not suitable, the staff show me black face and talk my bad in front of me. Your shop is not allow people on trying then please put a BIG SIGNAGE OUTSIDE. Please consider before you try or please try after you buy. This kind of words. So disgusting that your dress is not that clean as well to let customer try on. I wont go your shop again. | review_rating:5, text:Jin Hayari Sunway Pyramid offers a great selection of stylish clothes that look fantastic. The quality is impressive, and the fabrics feel durable. Best of all, the prices are affordable. Recommended | review_rating:1, text:The short hair lady refused to let me try on the dress I wanted
I was afraid I had misunderstood her and even double-checked with her to see if the dress I was looking at could be tried on, and she did not disappoint me. She said the dress didn't fit me. I asked if the customer insisted on trying it on, couldn't she do that too?
She replied in a very firm tone: "Yes, you can't."
I was like wow, this store owner has trained a very good staff and very principled.
What I want to say is that customers have to try it on only know whether it suits them or not, they DON’T NEED YOUR STAFF TO CONCLUDE. She behaved so rude | review_rating:5, text:I like the service of the boy-cut hairstyle retail representative. She knows her stuff well and offered suitable size for me to try on, and even helped tidying up my dress after I had put it on, checked with me if she tied the waist too tight, and even offered a heel for me to wear for the long dress I tried.

Initially I got a smaller size for the first piece, she had a look on my size and offer me a bigger pieces.
Next when I wanna try the second piece, she offer me a smaller size and told me that the cutting is much bigger, so advice me to try the size first, if I needed a bigger size, then I can let her know.

This is exactly the service we need to get whenever we’re in fashion shop. Not some representative who just stand there and following us only.

Kudos to you, thank you so much, I’ve always wanna tried your dress, and the experience today makes me wanna have a second visit. | review_rating:1, text:WILL NEVER SHOP HERE AGAIN. i was in the sunway branch with my sister, while my sister was looking at dresses, the store clerk lady came up to her and told her nothing in the store would fit her. we asked if there was an L size for the dress and she said even that would not fit her and even placed the dress on my sister as if showing her that it would not fit. i asked if my sister could try the dress on and the lady kept saying it would not fit. i kept insisting on letting her try and the lady finally gave in but demanded that she would be the one pulling the zipper on the dress for my sister. in the end the dress did fit, but my sister did not show the lady as it was not worth her (my sister’s) time to go back and forth with the lady again. when we passed the dress to the lady as we were about to leave, she called us to stay and look at her test if the zipper was broken. it was absurd. why hire a clothes store clerk that bodyshame women??? i understand that its hard to employ people, but there should at least be a standard. overall, never shopping there again.

name: GORDON RAMSAY BAR & GRILL
category: fine_dining_restaurant, bar_and_grill, bar, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lobby Level Sunway Resort, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Gordon Ramsay’s restaurant at Sunway Resort offers a stylish atmosphere and impeccable service, but unfortunately, the food doesn’t quite live up to the premium price tag. While the dishes are well-presented and the flavors are decent, they don’t offer the bold, unforgettable taste one might expect from a Michelin-starred chef. For the price, the portion sizes feel a bit lacking, leaving it hard to justify the value for money. A nice experience for those looking to try a celebrity chef’s restaurant, but there are better options for the price in KL. | review_rating:5, text:My husband and I had a delightful afternoon tea here on Valentine’s Day, and it was an experience to remember. From the moment we arrived, the staff were incredibly warm, professional, and attentive, ensuring we felt welcomed and well taken care of.

The ambience was elegant yet cosy, creating the perfect setting for a relaxing afternoon. To make the occasion even more special, a live violinist performed romantic melodies, adding a beautiful touch to the atmosphere.

The afternoon tea selection was beautifully presented, featuring a wonderful assortment of freshly made pastries, sandwiches, and fine teas. One of the highlights was Gordon’s signature Beef Wellington, which was cooked to perfection—crispy on the outside, tender and flavorful on the inside. Every dish was crafted with high-quality ingredients and impeccable attention to detail.

Despite the exceptional quality of the food and service, the price was quite reasonable, making it a great value for the experience provided. Everything from the service to the ambience exceeded our expectations. It was a truly enjoyable and romantic afternoon, and we would highly recommend this place for anyone looking for an elegant yet affordable afternoon tea experience. We will definitely be returning! | review_rating:5, text:My husband and I had the most unforgettable birthday celebration here. From the moment we walked in, I was in awe of the stunning interior decor and the exceptional, five-star service. Anthony, who served us, and all the staff went above and beyond to make the evening feel truly special. They even surprised us with a beautiful card and a complimentary non-alcoholic gin and tonic, which added a thoughtful touch to the experience. Thanks a lot Anthony for your superb service and everyone there!

As fans of Gordon Ramsay, dining at his restaurant was a thrill, especially seeing a photo of the celebrity chef himself on the wall! Our three-course meal was incredible, every dish worth every penny. For any Ramsay fan, this place is a must-visit, perfect for a memorable celebration.

We can’t wait to return to explore more of the menu and perhaps indulge in their afternoon tea. Highly recommended! | review_rating:4, text:Celebrated a special occasion here and it was a very enjoyable experience with good food on the whole and even better service. We arrived earlier for pre-dinner drinks at the bar and the cocktails were exceptional - among the best we've had in Malaysia and definitely a strong start to the evening. A surprising menu highlight was the Bone Marrow (beef tartare) which was excellent. Signature dishes (Beef Wellington, Arnold Bennett Souffle, Apple Tarte Tartin) did not disappoint. Only underwhelming dish was probably the Black Cod which we found underseasoned and lacking in flavor. Extensive wine list even by the glass. All in all a great place to go for an evening to remember. | review_rating:5, text:I recently dined at Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill in Sunway City, Kuala Lumpur to celebrate my wife’s birthday, and it was an unforgettable experience that truly lived up to its renowned reputation.

Food:
The food was nothing short of perfection. The Bar & Grill Burger was a standout, bursting with flavour and crafted to absolute perfection. The Grilled Miso Salmon was another highlight, with its rich, umami flavors and tender texture. To top it all off, the Blackberry Parfait was a dessert masterpiece, refreshing, indulgent, and the perfect ending to an incredible meal. Each dish was thoughtfully prepared and presented with finesse.

Drinks:
The drinks selection was outstanding, featuring a carefully curated range of beverages to complement the exquisite dishes. Whether you prefer a fine selection or something refreshing, the options are tailored to enhance the overall dining experience.

Service:
The service was impeccable. The staff were attentive, friendly, and ensured we had everything we needed for a special evening. They went above and beyond to make my wife’s birthday celebration memorable.

Important Notes:
1. If you make an online reservation, the payment made during booking will be deducted from your final bill, a seamless and convenient process.

2. For Muslim diners, the restaurant offers a ‘Halal’ dietary exception option when making reservations, showcasing their thoughtful consideration for all guests.

Overall, Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill offers a fantastic dining experience with exceptional food, drinks, and service. Highly recommended for special occasions or anyone looking to indulge in fine dining!

name: Oppo Kiosk
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

Overall, i really enjoy my meal here ✌️ | review_rating:5, text:The food is so good! Especially the beef. The new menu, wakame soup tasted great! I can feel the "umami" in it. Services from the staff is also excellent, especially Mr. Khant from Myanmar, he tried his best to serve us and I appreciate it so much. Recommended to come again! | review_rating:5, text:Haven't been here for years. But I came over with some Muslim friends and got the superior package. The tiger prawns and salmon was awesome. Bigger variety of meats too.

Oh! And try their milky seafood 🤤

And their service is awesome! We had Siti Mariam checking on us and ensuring our soups are refilled and grill is changed every 30+ minutes.

Definitely recommend right now as food quality and service is way way way better now👍💝 | review_rating:5, text:Bought the weekday promo lunch buffet for 29.90 nett and it was awesome! Big thanks for his prompt actions and hospitality to staff name khan men htet for attending all our questions and needs.

review_rating:1, text:Poor customer service quality and not professional salesman. I bought a watch from this store (2k worth of watch). However, the salesman should've at least wear a GLOVE and careful with my watch. Seriously, i feel like buying from pasar malam. 2K watch become 2 ringgit watch real quick. Regret.. regret.. regret .

Lesson learn:

If you plan to buy 1K watch above, dont go to this store. Straight up to the brand store, maybe rm10 watch also they treat like luxury. | review_rating:1, text:I don't usually give low reviews but wow this place surprised me man. The sales staff intentionally avoid eye contact and when I approach them they just walk away/pretend didn't notice. | review_rating:4, text:Staff experience in watches is exceptionally excellent particularly at One Utama and Subang Parade outlets. Environment is OK but can be upgraded to marque level. Prices is reasonable. However, the Internet information especially on the telephone numbers are not up to date. Website is linked to HK and in a single language, Mandarin. English should be added to facilitate those who are not conversant in Mandarin. Overall a good place to source for watches. | review_rating:5, text:Recently bought a Seiko watch from this store. We were approached by a sales lady named Jessie, she was informational, accommodating and professional. She helped us find a right watch and was very attentive to our conversation. She kindly included birthday sales . If you ever look for this shop, I recommend to find Jessie from City Chain.

10/10 would visit for next shopping of watch. | review_rating:5, text:Had a good time shopping for watches with the assistance of Jessie. She was kind and knowledgeable, helpful and not pushy at all.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a good dining experience between 2pm to 5pm so it’s not too crowded. Soup broth was thick (加浓), and the ingredients were so fresh! Love the free flow desserts (ice cream, soy bean curd, ice jelly, and hot white fungus.  Another Kano Delighter was the photo printing station, what a delight to be able to print 3 photos! | review_rating:5, text:I have been to Hai Di Lao Sunway Pyramid many times, but this visit truly stood out thanks to the exceptional service provided by 繆聪治. His cheerful demeanor and constant smile made my dining experience extra enjoyable.

What impressed me the most was his thoughtful gesture when he found out my birthday is next week. Following the restaurant’s SOP, he brought out a complimentary birthday cake, but this time, he went above and beyond by using creative plating techniques that gave the presentation a fine dining touch. It was truly memorable and made me feel so special!

Thank you, 繆聪治, for your outstanding service and attention to detail. I will definitely be returning and recommending this place to friends and family! | review_rating:5, text:Finding parking in Sunway Pyramid is kinda headache during weekend. No queue when arrive this restaurant. It was surprisingly that we got the same table like last time. Food is great and fresh although massively overpriced. We ordered 4 hotpot soup with different base. All soups are tasty. My family was really enjoying the lunch here. | review_rating:5, text:It so great to have this Eng yik jun 邢偉俊to serve us today, we felt very welcome from him & giving us very great service & he has good knowledge to recommend & assisting to introduce the today’s special menu/food; it’s indeed our lucky day to visit this Hai Di Lau outlet today. | review_rating:3, text:Even though the food is fresh, the prices are on the high side.

They were having a promotion and one of the waitresses and a waiter would do a song and dance for you. A promotional novelty.

The place is clean and the service is rather attentive even though there is one waiter serving 5 to 6 tables.

You get 4 different types of soup which were good. The tomato base soup is good for those not able to handle spicy soup.

The ice cream stick servednis the local ice cream and the fruit  slices were fresh especially the watermelon pieces.

name: Sunway Pyramid Ice
category: ice_skating_rink, athletic_field, sports_complex, sports_activity_location, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:You ride in a huge puddle, if you don't skate very well, take a change of clothes with you.

According to their rules, you must ride in gloves, gloves can be bought at the entrance for 9rm (their cost price is not more than 2rm) - I think everyone understands why it is necessary to ride in gloves.

I rented PREMIUM skates - they gave out ancient, worn boots with torn clips and laces 😅

And most importantly, the skates are absolutely not stoned, it's impossible to skate.

The lockers are free, it's good, but I literally had to bend the lock and lock the door to close my drawer.

The toilet is free (thank you), but it doesn't smell very good.

In general, a dubious pleasure for Overprice | review_rating:1, text:"WE WERE GLIDING ON WATER, NOT SKATING ON ICE" ❌❌❌❌

HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE THIS TUME⛔⛔⛔

We booked Season 3, it was already wet and watery
Within a few minutes, it became sooo watery and slippery you cannot skate anymore

PLUS

So many people were skating and falling which made it impossible to enjoy it this time. | review_rating:5, text:Recommended place for ice skating. RM35/per head on school holidays, buy online RM30 only. | review_rating:3, text:Overall we had a good time however, there are room for improvements. The floor is wet and just worsen over time. So if you fall, expect to get soaked in cold waters. The surface isn't as smooth as other place I've visited.

They provide free locker rental. | review_rating:5, text:Malaysia's 1st proper ice skating rink that is world-class standard and always has people skating. On weekends, the rink can be crowded. I am happy to know that this hobby is available in a tropical country.
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 7:30 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 7:30 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 7:30 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 7:30 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 7:30 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 7:30 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 7:30 PM

name: ATM RHB Bank
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Another new player in the "potong kaki" beverage shop from China. What caught my eye was their signature mango pamelo sago which was one of my favorite desserts. Sugar level at 70% was ok for me. Yes drinks were pricey but still acceptable for once in awhile indulgence 😄. | review_rating:5, text:Opening Buy 1 Free 1.. located at lower ground floor.. currently js crowded because of the promo.. long queue but manageable..

The staff is friendly for some of them but there some that is moody. They want to give flyer but not confident, some customer even ask themself.

The drink is okay cause it is newly open so only have 6 drink. The price is quite high a bit compared to other competitors drink company.. drink making take sometime cause many order..

There is scratch card u can get free fan painting or other give.. can try to see whether it is suitable for you guys. | review_rating:5, text:Ordered the Muscat Jasmine tea with less sugar. It has the fruit and jelly and is super tasty. Perfect for a summer day. Fast service and friendly staffs as well. | review_rating:5, text:Delicious! Let’s yum cha with cha cha 🐼 | review_rating:1, text:无法理解买一杯果茶17.90
为什么要收服务费
还是打包带走的

name: Muji
location: LG1.113,Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:It's a fairly large store with a welcoming interior. They sell a little bit of everything here. Suitcases and travel accessories, beds, pillows, sheets, duvets, towels, storage boxes, beauty accessories and makeup, pots and pans, cutlery, office supplies, clothes, food and coffee.There are chairs and tables to sitt and eat/drink. | review_rating:5, text:MUJI Cafe at Sunway Pyramid is a great spot for coffee, desserts, pastries, and gelato. The selection of cakes, pastries, and refreshing gelato pairs perfectly with their rich, aromatic coffee. The minimalist and cozy setting makes it a nice place to relax while enjoying a sweet treat. Perfect for a casual stop during shopping or to unwind with a coffee. Friendly service and a lovely atmosphere! | review_rating:5, text:MUJI at Sunway Pyramid offers a calm and minimalist shopping experience. The store is well-organized, making it easy to find their signature simple and functional products. From quality clothing to home goods and stationery, the variety is impressive. The staff are helpful and polite, though the store can get crowded at peak times, which slightly affects the browsing experience. Overall, it's a great place for anyone who appreciates MUJI's aesthetic and philosophy. Would definitely return for more essentials! | review_rating:5, text:Beautiful bright space with lovely merchandise display. There is a cafe within which serves pretty good coffee at a reasonable price. Highly recommend their matcha ice cream too! | review_rating:4, text:Went to the newly open MUJI store at the Oasis. The area was huge. They provide map in store so that you know where to get your item.

Coffee and gelato is available in the store. But there is always a long queue.

The staff was attentive and very helpful. Kudos for the customer service.

name: Esquire Kitchen
location: Lot G1 - 42A, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Dinner at Esquire on a weekday night was superb. Friendly service. Food served quickly, was tasty n good portion. Not crowded. With fish n drinks, bill came up to about rm50+ per head. | review_rating:4, text:We ordered the Mapo Taufu, fried shanghai dumpling and stir fried chicken with paprika, the dishes are quite big portion even we ordered small size. The Mapo taufu taste just nice, not so spicy or salty. While the stir fried chicken with paprika was a bit salty. The fried shanghai dumpling taste delicious. The environment was very clean, spacious and comfortable. | review_rating:4, text:Some of the dishes are really good. The sauteed eggplant is very nice. The dumplings is also good. The lotus root soup is just so so and also the fried beehoon. Overall ok, price is a bit expensive | review_rating:2, text:Haven’t been to Esquire for a long time. Then, i would say a 4 ⭐️ but this day, sigh…
We had:
- dumpling - the pork inside was warm not hot. But the kids like them.
- sweet and sour chicken - chicken has that strong overnight chicken taste. Nothing special. I ate more of the onions than the chicken.
- HK Kailan - huge kailan and were not properly cut. It was kind of difficult to eat. Taste wise nothing special. Just blenched vegetables with some sauce that were not that great
- soup - we order peanut soup and lotus root soup. One soup came. Piping hot. Which was good. But taste wise…not that great. Kids who loves soup didnt even finished it. The other soup, waiter came much later to say peanut soup no more. So we changed it to pig stomach. It didnt make it to our table till we almost finished our meal. And the soup wasnt even hot. Never had double boiled soup like that before. The boil was only medium warm 😣
- drinks - ordered 3 only 2 came. 😵‍💫 | review_rating:3, text:Got pulled in because seen the Hot and spicy soup, and the Xiao Long Bao from their menu, and no queue. (Maybe that is not a good sign, on Saturday evening, in one of the most busy mall in town)

Price wise on the dishes portion is consider cheap, in a mall. But the taste……

Dong Po rou 东坡肉, will say is very disappointed, soy sauce with some lettuce? Xiao Long Bao, seriously, nothing like Xiao Long Bao, if it just call it pork dumplings will be fine. Mixed vegetables stir fried prawns, just taste of oyster sauce 😂

In general, food quality is quite poor.
