name: Ramen Matsuri
category: ramen_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, restaurant, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Lot LG2.87, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:One of the most satisfying ramen I ever had. Tried the spicy & black garlic ones..., Both were equally delicious. Worth repeating if the soupy craving hit me again.

Also tried the fried dumplings. It was edible.. not too bad but I wished they fried it properly. So it's nice and crispy

Service was nothing to write about. It's neither good nor bad. Unmemorable actually.

Food was served in reasonable time, considering I was in my  hangry mode. | review_rating:4, text:I recently visited Ramen Matsuri and ordered the Black Garlic Special Ramen. The dish was superb—packed with rich, bold flavors, and the ramen itself had that perfect stringy texture I love. The broth was delicious and well-balanced, making every bite enjoyable.

However, I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because I noticed the staff brought out the rubbish bin through the front door in front of customers, which wasn’t ideal. Apart from that, everything else was fantastic! Definitely worth a visit for the ramen alone.

Feel free to tweak it as you like! | review_rating:5, text:I have always love simple ramen and in my opinion, Matsuri Ramen have the best Toripaitan Ramen. The food are served hot and fast, services are good too! | review_rating:5, text:One of my favourite places to get simple ramen. I usually get the Torikoku Original, which is a ramen dish with lightweight but flavourful chicken broth. They're always super generous on the chicken - they're so thick and big, and I'd struggle to finish everything unless I'm absolutely starving.

I also love the black fungus topping - it adds a nice crunch, and they give plenty of chopped green things (don't know what it is but it adds nice flavour).

I love the noodles they use too. They're nice and thin, and never undercooked or overcooked. They always taste on point. The chicken broth tastes best hot (always served hot anyway) and is great for rainy days.

I'm surprised it's almost always empty when I come here haha. I think the price charged for the quality of food is very reasonable. I hope more people will come here more often because I don't want one of my favourite ramen places to close down...I haven't found any other place that serves ramen like this 🙏🙏🙏

The ventilation can improve a bit more though. Last last ime I went it was so very stuffy. It's been improving though. | review_rating:2, text:The Ramen Matsuri restaurant offers an underwhelming experience with its Red Spicy ramen lacking in umami richness and depth of flavor. While the spiciness is detectable, it fails to compensate for the overall lack of taste. Additionally, the green tea leaves much to be desired, as it tastes stale, raising concerns about its freshness. Overall, the dining experience falls short of expectations, failing to deliver on both taste and quality.

name: Spectrum Forex Money Changer
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:They delivers exceptional service and unbeatable rates, far better than the other branches. It’s a weird why more customers don’t know about this fantastic shop. Friendly, professional, and always goes the extra mile. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great deals and outstanding customer care.
I would recommend mr.fairoze services at SPECTRUM 3 in Sunway Pyramid Mall
Don’t miss out this is the place to go! | review_rating:1, text:Good rate but bad attitude.

I went to the G floor branch (next to Parkson).

The first time I went to counter 1 to change A currency, I said I wanted to split two receipts, he said he couldn’t split the transaction and asked me to queue up again.

OK, Second time I went to counter 1 again (only 1 counter is open) and changed A currency.

Seeing that there was no one in line behind me, I said I wanted to change B currency, he said no, he could only change money from one country per person at a time, which means I had to wait until someone came to queue up to change money before I could change money for the third time?

Meanwhile counter 2 is open, then I pointed to counter 2 and asked if I could change money, counter 1 said NO, because counter 2 is new and he didn’t know how to do it.

So does a money changer have such a rule now??? | review_rating:4, text:SMALL MONEY CHANGER IN A BIG MALL. FAST SERVICE.
EXCHANGE RATE IS AVERAGE.
MUST SHOW YOUR NRIC OR PASSPORT TO BUY OR SELL THE CURRENCIES. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recomended.Good rate and good service. Same rate as the other shop in the middle but no queue compared to the middle one. | review_rating:5, text:This is consider the best rate money changer in Subang Jaya area and after Mid Valley. Another option you may go for competitive rate within same area is Subang Parade. To those customers who had issue with uncle previously, it is depend on how you talk or behave toward him at first. I had deal with him for more than 10 years but never have any issue based on mutual respect of each others. He is a nice guy anyway. Recommend this place!

her/his (I'm not sure) attitude was not pleasant and I felt like I was holding the staff up from going home

location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Koi The
location: Sunway Pyramid, Lot LG2.125, Lower Ground 2, Blue Atrium, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Even though I’m not really into the tea craze nowadays, I found KOI Thé’s Iced Black Tea Lychee refreshing and enjoyable. The drink was nicely crafted with a pleasant balance of flavors, perfect for a quick cool down. However, the place was quite packed, and the service felt a bit slow. The waiting wasn’t the best part, but overall, a decent spot for a treat. | review_rating:4, text:KOI tea is really aromatic and rich in tea flavor. It is not something common like all other bubble tea competitors served. The ingredients like bubble and grass jelly are fresh and not over cooked. Although the tea choices is quite limited, but every tea choices in menu is up to standard and really worth to try. You can choose the sweetness of drinks in 5 level. The staff is also caring enough to cover your cold drink cup with a piece of tissue (to block your hand from touching the cold surface of cup directly). | review_rating:4, text:Bubbles are so chewy and not hard. Flavor is nice but their 50% sugar tasted like 25%. Looking at other "too sweet" reviews, I guess their sugar isnt very standard. Otherwise, flavors here are nice. I got hazelnut milk tea and my friends got and enjoyed other flavors. | review_rating:1, text:Unpleasant experience from order Koi in foodpanda, the shop staff wrongly prepare order, I've order 3 cups but they only prepare 1 cup and to add on it even the drink is incorrect. This is such a ridiculous mistake, I have to go through a lot of hassle to cancel order through foodpanda. | review_rating:4, text:There are some seats inside the shop. Most of ppl took it to go. Matcha series was good and Caramel macchiato was too sweet (even though I said ' less sugar')

Golden honey bubble tea was the best for me so far. :)

name: 4Fingers
location: LG2.127, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:I recently visited 4fingers and decided to try their deep-fried calamari, priced at RM20+ after tax. Unfortunately, the dish was underwhelming. The squid was not cooked properly—it was still rubbery and slightly wet, which made it unpleasant to eat.

I informed the staff about the issue, but to my disappointment, they didn’t take any meaningful action. Instead, they just took a photo of the dish. I didn’t want to cause a fuss, as I understand they were busy, but I still left feeling let down by both the food and the lack of response.

For the price, I expected better quality and service. I hope the restaurant takes this feedback seriously and makes improvements, both in the kitchen and in their customer service. Until then, I wouldn’t recommend this dish. | review_rating:5, text:First time having meal at this outlet.. Not crowded so I enjoyed myself.. I always eat Rice box.. love the taste of mix sauce.. a big portion for me.. Staff name Maisarah approaches me.. Ask for my experience here..Thumbs up for her excellent & friendly service.. Keep it up! | review_rating:5, text:I could not remember when last time I dined in here but today it's very peaceful lunch hour. The taste still delicious as I remembered . Already ate salad half of the way 😂 | review_rating:1, text:staff is not friendly with kids, feel like not welcome kids allow. bad service. Need to improve Staff for Providing the best service. | review_rating:5, text:fast service. good environment to chill with friends. the staff were super friendly to us. definitely will come again at this outlet.

name: Tomaz Watchmaker
location: 1st Floor, Lot F1, 56, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I was originally searching for Grand Seiko and decided to stop by their store while my girlfriend went to the toilet. I was drawn in by the staff, who provided detailed explanations and answered all my questions about their watches. What started as a five-minute visit turned into thirty minutes, during which I took a look at one of their limited edition watches. The staff shared extensive details about that watch, and I encouraged my girlfriend to choose one as well. In the end, I decided to purchase because of the ethics and professionalism they demonstrated. I will take pride in wearing the Tomaz ethic on my watch. I entered as a non-fan but left as a new enthusiast. Thank you! They also give us two pairs of shoes as a gift with a huge discount on the two watches! ❤️ | review_rating:5, text:The ambiance here is always inviting and comfortable. I was completely impressed with their professionalism and customer service. We are served by staff named Tracy. She's trying her best to give us the best she can. Thank you for your services. | review_rating:5, text:Our 1st time here. We were greet by Tracy who is very attentive. She entertained us with passion and knowledge. Finally bought a watch for my wife. Thanks Tracy for ur hospitality! Keep up the positive vibe! | review_rating:5, text:Our first time here. We couldn't be happier with this customer experience from the moment step into the outlet. Miss Yan handled us the utmost professionalism (deserves 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟). | review_rating:5, text:Watchmaker, and I couldn’t be happier with my experience! The craftsmanship of the watches is exceptional—elegant, reliable, and truly a testament to fine watchmaking.

A special shoutout to Yan, the sales representative, for providing top-notch customer service. Yan was incredibly knowledgeable, patient, and attentive, ensuring I found the perfect watch to suit my style. They answered all my questions with professionalism and made the entire shopping experience smooth and enjoyable.

name: D'NATUREL
location: LG2.105 Sunway Pyramid Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:I'm starting to feel suspicious about the purity of their essential oil. Because when you think about it, on the bottle label it says 'Product of UK'. Is it Ulu Klang? I challenge you, D'Naturel, to provide clear evidence that you source your oils from the United Kingdom. If you don't respond to this question, it means it's fake. | review_rating:5, text:A really nice gem of a shop I came across. Friendly staff and really appealing products. All natural and organic soaps with a price well worth it's quality. Becareful if you have children because the soaps looks so good it looks delicious that they might cry thinking they're treats. These make really wonderful gifts! I will come back again in the future | review_rating:1, text:Very bad experience with sales manager there at Nu mall, I bought few items and I am frequent customer
I am buying it for friend to give her experience  she herself came to me leaving behind her customer I was not convinced with oils moved to soap section asked her to advise what to buy for first time users and told her they live in Middle East. She started shouting at me how does it matter where they live and we r selling it for humans , you disturbed me from customer. I tried to understand why is she so arrogant and told I am considering climate for which she says what’s “climate” and give respect to her. I asked plz call manager she says she is the manager keep shouting
Looking at her I felt pity for her poor customer communication and angry issues she has I came out from shop
I request respective floor floor manager to address her issues
This happened around 430 pm on 9 July I couldn’t get her name | review_rating:5, text:I am from the UK. I can confirm that the products available in this store are from the UK. | review_rating:1, text:On 29th January 2024, I was not expected to be sarcastically and rudely assisted by one of your staff name "TARA" fyi Indian . She being prejudice and judgy. I was looking for a products for my photoshoot for my clients. Considering your so called Handmade products suitable for the campaign. Her way of answering question is rude and sassy, I believe not many customers also shop at your outlet and nobody knows the brand including me. Expecting more friendly and more information shared for me to understand the products. She is not the right person to be at front desk, need to fix her attitude and also her face skin. This will show the level of your products quality in personal care line business. I dont have time to write this long, but I have to because Im a business owner too and I have more than 30 staff working for me. I did complaint to Paradigm Mall customer service too. Hope she will be fired at least. Thanks.

name: Pull & Bear
location: Lot G1, 59 & 60 Grd Flr, 3, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Trendy clothes, lot of to choose from, love those collaboration collections! Average prices consider reasonable. Bought a few clothes from this store, some of the knitwear looks nice, bought one as well. Would love to see more of collaborations! Keep up the good work! | review_rating:1, text:Clothes are alright, just that the staff are questionable. They crowd together rather than helping customers. One of the male staff shouted really loudly which gave me a bit of a scare. The changing rooms are technically open for people to peek through. | review_rating:4, text:Design, quality, price and sale are better a lots than Zara and Mango. The staff there will reply you in Malay when you ask them in English, the management should give more priority to employ the English speaker to work there as here is not kampung area, East Coast or Northern | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to change the size of the shirt after my girlfriend brought the shirt. Salesperson did told her that she could take out the price tag and change it within 30 days. Today I went to Pull&Bear in Sunway Pyramid, they said as per the policy the price tag cannot be taken out.

Dear Pull&Bear, please do take this seriously as your staff are not properly trained. Show us your the purchase and refund policy.

Such ridiculous staff you had there. Don’t even care to look at the receipt.

Need an explanation for this matter. Thanks! | review_rating:1, text:We experienced extremely unprofessional behavior from Eva, a Malay lady staff with glasses who works at the counter on November 3rd.

When we informed her that the clothes we had reserved were no longer available, she not only failed to apologize but also displayed a dismissive attitude with side-eye, which is entirely inappropriate for someone work in the customer service industry.

P&B HR department please look into this matter, as such conduct is unacceptable in a customer-facing role.

name: NANYANG CAFE
location: G1.PT.07, Level Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:First things first, the food is very good.

Straight to the point we ordered their famous wanton noodles and butter buns and they were out of this world.

Their other food items like we ordered such as Luncheon meat noodles and rice , and yam bun were okay at best but still acceptable as they tasted very fresh and weren't too salty which means the limited usage of MSG which is a positive in my books 👍🏻

However, the reason why I'm rating it a 4 star is the delay of the food arrival as I understand there are a lot of customers but the kitchen staff should combat this and push dishes out quicker.

Environment wise, the cafe is very clean and has a vibrant decor which makes it welcoming for potential customers. There is an open window area on the side for people to look outside and embrace the nature where you can even see Sunway University in the distance.

If you are looking for a quick snack or have no idea what you should eat in a mall as big as Sunway Pyramid, then this place could be suitable 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:November 2024. Had a great lunch here with good choices for elderly parents and kids alike. Some items were missed out but it didn't take long for them to serve it after we reminded the staff about them. Staff were definitely very accommodating and helpful. Food is consistent since the last few times we were here. | review_rating:3, text:Noodle nothing special and the vegetable is not fresh (see photo). Luckily didn't find any worms. Had the Seafood option, limited items, just few pieces prawn and fish (compare advertised photo vs actual served). The peanut polo bun is good. Waiter not so attentive providing stained cutlery. Have a good view of the lagoon. | review_rating:2, text:limited menu, poor location. definitely not worth coming unless you are staying in the hotel.

wantan noodles are second to the Sahara desert in terms of dryness, dumplings are ok. | review_rating:3, text:UPDATE: The food standard here has dropped. From 5 stars, I have no choice but to give 3 stars as the taste of the dishes does not meet expectations. But the staff here are as helpful and service is fast. Seating is still comfortable. It’s just the dishes have suffered. What a shame.

This place looks great and the food tastes great. The staff are very attentive to your order and will even clear your plates when you’re done. The noodles’ texture is sparingly and slightly chewy. I loved the pork trotters noodle and really enjoyed it. The serving is generous. Most notable is the Ying Yang coffee and tea combo. It’s aromatic and… just really nice. Not easy to find good coffee tea combo done right.

The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Secret Recipe
location: LG 2.48, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:"Secret Recipe" at Sunway Pyramid is a well-loved establishment that consistently receives positive feedback from its customers. The vibrant atmosphere, coupled with its diverse menu, ensures that patrons keep coming back for more. The restaurant offers a wide array of dishes ranging from Western classics to local Malaysian favorites, catering to different tastes and preferences. Their cakes, which are a signature of the brand, are especially popular, with flavors like chocolate indulgence and cheesecake often earning rave reviews.

Many visitors appreciate the consistent quality of the food, as it’s always freshly prepared and served with care. The portions are generous, making it a satisfying dining experience for both individuals and groups. The attentive staff are another highlight, with many customers mentioning how friendly and professional they are, adding to the overall pleasant dining atmosphere.

For those who value convenience, Secret Recipe at Sunway Pyramid is conveniently located within the bustling mall, making it an ideal spot for a break from shopping or after a movie. The ambiance is perfect for casual outings, family gatherings, or even business meetings, offering a relaxed yet stylish setting.

Whether it’s the delicious food, the great customer service, or the convenient location, Secret Recipe continues to receive glowing feedback from its patrons, earning it a solid reputation as one of the top dining options in Sunway Pyramid. | review_rating:5, text:I love going to secret recipe...fairly easy to order through the QR for dine in and claim the voucher and points at the payment counter after eating...I love all their cake slices...they also have promotions for the heavy meals, pastry and cake at specific times. I definitely recommend coming here...price wise is standard. | review_rating:5, text:I love their customer service so much. When I enter the shop, they greet me with big smile on their face and assist me to my table. I love the staff especially all the waiter that serve me and I remembered few staff’s name that serving me that time, if Im not mistaken their name is Asyiqin and Sarah.. both is so friendly and helpfull. They always smiling while serving their customers . The food was amazing too. Very delicious and tasty. My favorite is their Mee Kari and manggo lassi. So sedap and sangat banyak! ♥️ | review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing experience at Secret Recipe today! The staff were friendly, courteous, and incredibly attentive. I was pleasantly surprised by the complimentary fish crackers, and they were more than happy to switch my spaghetti to chicken since I can’t eat beef. One of the staff even brought me extra serviettes without me asking, as she noticed mine were already filthy — such a thoughtful touch! Their exceptional service truly made my day. Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Food here was awesome, Service was also great. Waiters were friendly and food also came quick.
Cashier was also friendly and asked about our food here

name: MOG
location: LG1.53 Lower Ground One Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing experience purchasing my new spectacles! The staff (Mr. Azlan) was incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and friendly. They guided me through the selection process, answered all my questions, and ensured I found the perfect pair that suits my needs and style. The quality of service was outstanding, and I truly appreciate the attention to detail. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great service and quality eyewear! | review_rating:3, text:MOG Boutique at Sunway Pyramid offers a decent selection of eyewear, including trendy frames and reliable brands. The store is well-organized, making it easy to browse the options. However, the customer service could use some improvement as staff members weren't very attentive during my visit. Prices are on the higher side, which may not suit all budgets. While the quality of the products is satisfactory, the overall shopping experience didn't stand out. If you're looking for a specific brand, it's worth a visit, but don't expect exceptional service. | review_rating:5, text:MOG was very very helpful in helping me get my eyes tested for free, and referring to previous history in helping me come to a decision on my next step! The staff were attentive and kind in their explanation. Would absolutely recommend this outlet for prescription glasses and contact lenses | review_rating:5, text:My prescription glasses lens fell out and I was finding for the nearest optical shop to help put it back. MOG Staff, Eng Vie was kind enough to put it back in for free. It took less than 5 minutes. For their excellent and friendly service, I highly recommend anyone who seeks to get their glasses to drop by MOG at Sunway Pyramid. Would definitely visit again should I need to purchase glasses in the future | review_rating:5, text:The only optical shop that can accept to take my frame that dont have screw hard to open but En Azlan manage to open few minutes compare to optical 88 & other famous shop only look at glance & rejected mine.. In result I do 2 zeiss lenses & advance brand..  I used to sent my gentle monster few months back, now im sending another gentle monster here.. Very recommended 👌

name: Fitness Concept
location: LG2.75, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I recently bought a treadmill at Fitness Concept @ Sunway Pyramid. From my experience:

- I m totally satisfied with the service provided by the staff name Aishah Kamaruddin
- Given some knowledge from the staff how to take care of my treadmill which never been given to me from my previous purchase
-  Good after sales service

Recommended for those looking for sports equipment. Thumbs up 👍 | review_rating:5, text:Kudos to the store manager. Very good service indeed.

We bought our goods 2 weeks ago but needed an amendment on the receipt. The store manager went out of her way to assist us in getting the receipt corrected. Always our preferred choice for fitness equipments.

Thank you FC Sunway Pyramid team | review_rating:5, text:I owe Mr. Adam a review. He was accommodating in carrying the 20 kg weight all the way to my car park. He is also knowledgeable about the product and gave good recommendations. Overall, the shopping experience was good. The only complaint I have is the very outdated POS system :). | review_rating:5, text:Ms Aishah was such a humble sales person. Very Good at her work and well versed with the product in hand | review_rating:5, text:Staff at the outlet were friendly and very helpful.
Ms Aysha managed to locate what I was looking for at their warehouse and got them to deliver it to their outlet. Thank you!!

name: Miga
location: LG2.38, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Lower Ground One, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Overall, good quality halal Korean food. The jaejangmyeon is really good. However, my favorite is the grilled chicken that comes with rice. Personally I love meat a lot so to see that there's more chicken than rice served is something awesome for me.

The chicken is tender, flavor filled and juicy too. I finished everything including all the onions that come with it.

A recommended place for simple, homely Korean food 😁 | review_rating:3, text:Limited choice of food, basically they have soup/jigae, noodle and kimbap. Food is just ok for me. The rabokki is spicy. The kimbap was abit dry for me.

The seating area is limited and the table is small. You’ll need to pay your food right after ordering. | review_rating:2, text:This place used to be good years ago, but not anymore. There is a noticeable quality drop. Yukgaejang and Kimchi Jjigae are not as flavourful as before. The pancakes (pajeon) tasted like the dough used was diluted. I gave low rating for service because I am wondering why were certain customers asked to pay first when ordering before the food arrived, and some are able to pay after they finish eating? This is the last time I come here and never coming again. There are many other nicer Korean restaurants nearby | review_rating:2, text:Hmmm, I was here because everywhere else was full. Tried a few dishes here. But everything is not at my liking. Im sorry. But maybe you can take care of your dishes more. Or was it just because it was kind of express outlet. The place is super small too. Its not convinient. | review_rating:3, text:Kimchi fried rice and kimbap was nice but the tteokbokki was absolutely disappointing. The rice cake had no taste. Not chewy also.

The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Smart Master
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:19/11/2022 me and my fiancé went there to get a white shirt(slim fit). The moment we went in we found what we wanted and we asked salesman to packed. The price tag on the shirt was rm129. Then he told us he will get us the new one. Twice he went in took totally different shirt from what he asked. Twice we correct him. 3rd time he brought the shirt that my fiancé tried and removed the price tag and at the same time he brought the new shirt. Then he said the price is rm149. I did where is the price tag in earlier shirt and why did you removed it. The stupid answer he gave me "the display shirt is from other outlet and the new shirt from our outlet". Different outlet different price. Really you guys have different outlet different price range for same shirt?
opening_hours: N/A

name: CMY
location: F1.23 & F.23A,Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Totally a joke, I remember that gentleman who served me has totally 0 knowledge on the product, the funny part is we all should  how important a power supply is in a HiFi product. Quoting what that gentleman says "upgrading a lps for a DC in product makes no sense, as it's not 240V AC in type" you can't compare.

You are feeling a bit lost here? No worries, I believe he has no idea what he is talking about, they even bash their own product and having the mindset of expensive stuff must always be better. I believe a salesman who works in Hi-end HiFi shop should have the basic knowledge, having someone shytting on the brand they carry just because it's cheaper, and the fact that he doesn't appreciate the difference a good power supply can do in a system even for a DC in product, I don't think that guy is qualified for the job.

Furthermore, the guy is being very impatient and kinda rude, you will get a feeling of they don't want to serve you if you don't bring a stack of cash and put it on the counter to show them you are a serious buyer. Definitely would not buy from such guy even if I like the system.

As someone who has bought from other CMY branch, I feel disappointed with such service was provided.

There are more to add, when I try to test him out if he knows what he is selling. the product definitely said "analog volume", which switches between relays for the volumes control. When I bring up this topic, he is very sure that it's a false claim from the manufacturer, he claims that all manufacturers claim so, but it's a chip base digital gain volume control. So I would appreciate that if the salesman learn more about the product they are selling, if you are unsure, don't act like you know all of them. Thanks | review_rating:1, text:Very good service when you want to purchase but extremely bad service when need to repair or service the audio system bought from them, take ages to only troubleshoot the issue and not able to resolve the problem by months…this should not be happening for branded & expensive audio system | review_rating:5, text:Outstanding quality hi-fi & sound products.

Fantastic Service! Great products with brilliant recommendations & most of all peerless after sales service especially from Steve & friendly professional mates.🙏🏻🙇🏻‍♂️ | review_rating:5, text:Recently i was bought a set of Hi-Fi system. I been here many times and this round i decide bought a system with CMY @ Sunway Pyramid due to staff STEVE & Wei, provide a good quality and knowladgeble with patience and warm hospitality.
Keep it up CMY | review_rating:5, text:Been there recently,variety of amps and speakers here,the staff name, Yap is very kind and responsive to my question. highly recommended!

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Not good at talking. If you put it nicely, it's called straightforward; if not, it's impolite and bad at doing business. I just think ORIS provides good service, except for the Sunway branch. | review_rating:1, text:One of the worst salesman i’ve ever come across.I just simply ask why the price is a bit different from the other shop that I went ( not Oris boutique).I know it’s a silly question but it’s kinda big money for me so I thought I’ll just ask whatever in my mind at that time  before I make the purchase.I was so shocked when he replied ‘Go and buy at that other place la!’ .So arrogant as if he owns the shop). Is this how you treat your potential customer? Such a turn off.I ask his name and he said ‘WK’. I don’t know if that is his real name or not.

PS : I went to Omega boutique and the sales person is 10 times more professional than you lot. Good luck! | review_rating:1, text:Saw the authorised Oris shop in Sunway , went into shop today and asked whether they provide Oris watch repair but the staff that on duty (tall with spec) answered this to me “u think our service centre small like this shop?”
Didn’t expect this kind of reply from ur staff.with the unwelcome attitude staff,I think no one customer still have mood to look or buy a new watch. | review_rating:1, text:Sent in watch for repair yesterday but the male staff (taller) responded with unwelcome tone and his attitude was cold, without giving much response except keep emphasizing that the repair would take four months; a long period, if I send back to service center through the shop.

name: Diamond & Platinum
location: Lot G1.133, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Diamond & Platinum is well known for its exquisite craftsmanship .

In terms of design, Diamond & Platinum offers a diverse range, from simple and elegant pendants to elaborate statement pieces. Their designs strike a balance between classic and modern aesthetics, making them versatile enough for daily wear or special occasions.

The customer service experience at Diamond & Platinum is also one of the best. Their staff is knowledgeable, patient, and willing to assist in finding the perfect piece that suits personal preferences and budget. Additionally, their certification process ensures authenticity, giving customers confidence in their purchase.

Definitely my preferred choice. | review_rating:5, text:Great design with awesome service. Purchased our engagement ring here and returned for other accessories. Shout out to Sean Lee for his splendid service and follow ups on phone messages too. It's been a journey with D&P from engagement rings to wedding accessories. | review_rating:5, text:Bought my diamond chain and necklace from SA Vivian and she’s very patient in advising and gives honest recommendation on whats suitable. The designs are very modern, beautiful and competitive compared to other boutiques. Great service! | review_rating:5, text:Came here to bought my engagement ring and special thanks to Jinnie Pung for her excellent services and follow- ups via WhatsApp. We have a pleasant experience from jewelry introductions to ensuring the ring was delivered to the most convenient location for us. Will definitely visit again ! | review_rating:5, text:I really love the design that D&P has. Jane is really helpful in helping me choosing the right fit for the ring! Definitely will come here again.

name: Linkway Café
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lobby Level, Sunway Resort, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Comfortable seatings and reasonably polite staff. A bit warm.

Ordering: QR order system is hopeless. Doesn’t show everything that is on the actual menu, and also doesn’t show when a certain item is unavailable. Instead, the system crashes when you try to order the item that is unavailable.

Food: They look appealing but I’ve had better food in-flight. No plate for a rock hard sandwich that is 20% edible. Very messy.

Drinks: Fair. | review_rating:5, text:Had some really tasty dessert. The turkey cheese was my highlight and pistachio khunafa a close second. Very buttery, substantial and full of flavors. Might be a bit on the sweet side so best paired with coffee! | review_rating:5, text:It's a lovely cafe with friendly staff & reasonably priced.

The cafe has comfy seats & with a lovely view.

Been here numerous times. The berries smoothie is a favourite.

Tried the chocolate chip cookie & it tasted great...it was warmed slightly & that made it decadent with the chocolate chips melting when bitten Into.

The strawberry tart was mildly sweet.

The matcha latte is a perfect cuppa for matcha lovers. | review_rating:1, text:what would you least expect when visiting 5 stars hotel and accommodations is the ignorance from this restaurant manager,well he was with typical manager attire at cashier, and compromising smiles. it was very unpleasant moment that ruined our new year eve evening eventhough we changed location celebrating new year thereafter. we planned to send an email to explain the situation. we were quite familiar with sunway hotels and resorts both international or in the past of which none had ruined reputation on a travel plan. other create fame. breach of trust upholds intransigent fiasco. | review_rating:5, text:Ordered a Rojan puff and a cappuccino. I enjoyed the service and atmosphere. Quiet, coosy and if you need to do some work; it's perfect.

name: JOLLIBEE
location: Lot LG2.126A, Lower Ground 2, Blue Atrium, Sunway Pyramid Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Came by for a quick late lunch since there was almost no queue at the ordering kiosks. The orders were quickly fulfilled via a numbered ticket on your order receipt.

Taste wise, biting into either their fried chicken or beef burgers is quite nostalgic if you have had their offerings from childhood. It still tastes pretty decent and some of the menu options on display do reflect the pinoy influence on the menu options here. All in all, a decent alternative to the competition at the Golden Arches and other similar outlets. Oh, and they have Mountain Dew. Recommended if you've never tried this or used to enjoy their offerings as a kid. | review_rating:5, text:First time tried Jollibees. Love it. Fried chickens taste different from others franchise. Like the sweetness of the spaghetti (suit for my kid). Kinda fond with pineapple juice to cleanse the taste after the meal. Mashed potatoes not too soft and the gravy not thick which I preferred thick. Coleslaw fresh and sweet. Unfortunately service kinda slow. | review_rating:2, text:This isn't my first visit here, but my most recent visit left me dissappointed with the food. I ordered the Burger steak thay comes with a rice and a burger patty. Needless to say, check out my photo to see how depressing that burger patty looks. I had to hold it up with a fork to take this photo or else its so thin that it sinks beneath the sauce. The taste was ok, but portion was really not worth the money.
The only saving grace was the peach mango pie which has been my all-time favourite.
Will I be back? Maybe, but I would go for the Jolly spaghetti or chicken next time. | review_rating:4, text:My first time trying Jollibee yesterday. I ordered a set which had 1 piece of chicken, a burger, spagetti and a drink. And I added an ala carte hotdog so that I get to try a wide range of their food.
The burger was relatively small in size but the taste of the burger meat was pretty nice, compared to other fast food burgers. It had a pleasant distinct smoky flavour.
Am happy they had spagetti because I love spagetti.
The special thing about their fried chicken was their brown sauce which had herb taste in it. And the chicken seasoning was nice too.
The sausage in the hot dog tasted good too - it had a unique smoky taste to it too. The BBQ sauce was a tad too sweet and overpowering.
A bit disappointed their drink was not re-fillable.

A shout out to the sweet server staff who help bring the whole lot of food to my table instead having me go collect to food fm the counter myself. | review_rating:2, text:It is very disappointing that rice and chicken together only got very small portion of gravy, cannot add on extra gravy also, the cleanliness of the seat also quite bad, need to self service to clean up the table and eat. Please improve.

name: Celebrity Fitness
location: Lot LL2A.01 & LL3.01A, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:One of the worst customer services i have ever experienced, we were told our subscription is for 4months ONLY but it was all false advertising from their sales manager and the contract was actually technically forever till u cancel it( we didnt know that, we thought it was 4 months like they said) found out 2 months later and got charged for two extra months after that!! When we tried to explain that we didnt know that, they didnt even wanna hear us and kept mentioning its in the contract and at one point threatened us to sue if we refuse to pay. They never ATLEAST apologised but instead they were talking rudely back. Never recommending this place to anyone ever. I would give it zero stars if i can | review_rating:1, text:SCAM GYM DO NOT GO HERE me and my friend signed up together for 4 months subscription but end up THEY CHARGE US FOR A WHOLE YEAR CAUSE DIDNT CANCEL AUTOMATICALLY AFTER 4 MONTHS ???? i only realized after i noticed suspicious specific amount being deducted from my bank account every month which is their monthly fee DISHONEST ESTABLISHMENT DISHONEST STAFF SEEMS LIKE ITS BEEN GOING ON FOR YEARS JUST READ THE REVIEWS | review_rating:4, text:One of the furst few branches of celebrity fitness in Malaysia. Used to be a 2-storey gym, but they did a renovation during MCO, and the 2nd floor was shut down...
Still, this is branch can be considered larger than other new  branches such as jayaone, mytown, metro kajang, the mines, palm mall etc...
The free weight area of this branch is relatively large, even larger than midvalley branch.. the equipments are well maintained...
However, during weekday's after office hour, the gym would be super crowded.... even on weekends, this outlet is more crowded than other branches, probably due to its location in a shopping mall..
For easier access from the carpark, you may choose the carpark entrace that is heading tonthe underground carpark (from the main carpark entrance).. | review_rating:1, text:They focus on keep signing up people without having the manners to treat customers, having a bad attitude toward customers, not having a good faith about the payments and facilities. I know being strict is an essential thing for a fitness gym but when they are not honest this act feels like a scam. Facilities mostly either work poorly or are broken and need repair. And in some hours the gym is full of people, basically not enough equipment to use, with the price they request, there should be more than enough. | review_rating:1, text:Bad enough you guys open earliest 7am which is a rush for those who work to have a proper workout. On sats at 8am like today for example none of  your machines are switched on. Sleeping huh

reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Bread History at Sunway Pyramid offers a good selection of pastries, buns, and bread, all at generally affordable prices. The bakery is clean and well-maintained, making it a pleasant place to browse through the different baked goods. Service was quick during my visit, allowing for a smooth and efficient experience. Whether you're picking up a snack or something for later, it's a reliable choice for fresh and tasty treats. Four stars for quality, cleanliness, and great service! | review_rating:1, text:Brought a big bread and request them slices the bread,they told me don't have knife,but I saw the knife in kitchen. Pay with RM 20 told me not small change and the time is in the evening.
This is my last time visit this shop. | review_rating:4, text:It's my second most favourite cake shop after Lavender . The prices here are reasonable and the QC is good . | review_rating:1, text:Malay cashier wearing scarf, Answering rudely,  terrible customer service and annoying face - as though I owe her something. Pls employ someone who is polite, eager to serve and greets with smile. | review_rating:1, text:Cakes and orange bread ok but I wonder why their wholemeal bread is ultra salty. I want to regurgitate after every bite, all I can taste is SALT. Like the baker emptied whole container of salt into dough. UGH! Bread History, pls taste it yourself. If you think it's fine, then you hv VERY high salt tolerance level. First and last time buying this.

name: SHABU-YO
location: Malaysia, Selangor, Subang Jaya, Bandar Sunway, Jalan PJS 11/15, Lot G1.99, Ground floor
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Shabu-yo, what happened?

- Menu changed from beef, pork, chicken TO lamb, pork, chicken.
- if you want beef, need to choose beef, pork, lamb and chicken. (More expensive)
Price increased, which is not the main issue.

THE PROBLEM IS:

Meat quality dropped!
(My partner and I hoped that this day would never come)
First time we came here was in 2023, we thought the quality of meat here was amazing especially for the price range. The pork belly/shoulder and beef karubi used to be so tender, but I can no longer say it is the same.
We are regular customers and we recommended this restaurant to many of our friends and family (because of the beautiful meat quality), but now we have to think twice if we’d want to eat here again.
- When sat down at our table, we found out that even EGGS are no longer part of the buffet. They need to be added on for RM1/egg. So extremely disappointing!!!
- sauces here isn’t very good but the meat dipped in eggs always made it better, again, utterly disappointed with Shabu-yo charging for eggs (?!?!?!)

- kitchen staff is so noisy. Dropping bowls and plates and cheering every time someone drops another bowl/plate. Kinda annoying to be hearing this when seated near the kitchen.

Honestly, all this complaints could be tolerated but then the meat quality dropped, that’s not ok with me. | review_rating:5, text:I love this place. They have reasonable price for buffet and their meat and veggies choices are so much more than other japanese buffet. I also like that they have high quality onzen egg that you could eat raw. | review_rating:1, text:The worse steamboat buffet I've ever been, this will be my first and last in this restaurant. All the staff have to go through deep and serious training. Even the foods was so so only, everywhere is very messy tot think that it's not that busy. And even though on busy times should not let your buffet bar messy, dirty tissues everywhere, veggies all over the place. Staffs no basic manners, clear table just take plates, serve the food just bang on your table without saying anything. All are black face and not talking, robot is better at least they greet but these people nothing. But when they are chatting while clearing tables their voices are so loud and happy back to customer gave you poker unhappy face. Most of the waitresses hair are so messy too not appropriate in F&B standard. Kitchen door widely open can see how messy and dirty inside, staff room door open too showing us all shoes while eating is it? The another long hair waitress arranging all the pots banging so loud makes the diners disturb if not happy why not go back home. Ice cream melted, waffle bitter and put there no cover at all. Your golden soup is the worse I've ever tasted too no taste at all, other beef cutting is wrong side making it so tough. Most of the sauces are all chili taste without any saltiness or sweetness I know we can add on seasoning but do we need to adjust everything on our own meh? I came here because it was recommended by my colleague who always eat at Sunway Velocity, she said must try very nice. I was totally in regret that I tried and paid full price with 10% service charge without even providing any service. | review_rating:5, text:food are 9/10! especially their ice cream is sooooo CREAMY and not too sweet. Got superior dining experience there! Thanks my friend irvin, sak and ronan served us, and also entertaining us! Hahhahaha | review_rating:5, text:Decent, nice, and well maintained dining spot inside Sunway Mall. Wide variety of fresh vegetables.

They have rice, fries, takoyaki, chicken karaage, desserts like ice shaved, and waffle making in the buffet menu. Which is very reasonable for its price.

The buffet is about 40 rinngit gross, but that includes the mains to drinks and desserts.  Dining limits to 90 mins.

Quite a few choices of base soup. it's less tasty than arashi, though, but very accoetable for its price. . Many staff were  around to help.

Overall definitely worth it.

name: Galaxy Ace
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
category: cafe, breakfast_restaurant, restaurant, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Ground Floor, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:One of the slowest coffee bean cafe. Queue is super lengthy despite have 6 workers. I had terrible experience ordering for Spanish latte. I request without sugar but they remove the vanila powder . Not only that, the cashier was hesitate to accept card payment. I insist since i left my wallet at home. I heard an indonesian girl feels upset as she do not have cash at that time and want to use card payment. Usual order usually takes 30 mins for a cup of coffee. The queue was the most painful part | review_rating:4, text:The atmosphere is good for a quick break or catching up with friends. The service was fast and efficient. Had their cold brew and  bagels, coffee was good and bagels were absolutely delicious. Definitely a spot I'd recommend for anyone looking to relax and enjoy a good snack or coffee. | review_rating:1, text:My experience with Coffee Bean usually good But this one at Sunway Pyramid is worst.  When ordering, this cashier shown a sour face.  Don't answer question. And show me an impatient attitude in ordering.  It's Saturday 14 sept. As usual a busy weekend. But I felt the customer does not deserve a sour face.  The cashier can smile or laugh with the staff/ colleagues but not to the customer is something very wrong.
If you the management of coffee bean, pls do something. Improve staff competency and attitude. You are in the F&B industry.
I believe you can find your staff at the receipt attached. | review_rating:5, text:A very convenient joint located at G floor of Sunway Pyramid. You can enjoy your coffee and meal while watching people skate. Or it is a perfect place to have a sip or two while waiting your loved ones do their shopping .

This is not my first time here. Been here many times for their nice food, good coffee, good vibes, and yes.... clean toilet is nearby. What a good  setup.

Great service too. I think it is an enjoyable place to meet up with friends or to complete simple paper work, as I always see people with their laptops.

Starting your day with a perfect blend of good coffee and being surrounded with many people from all walks of life....is always amazing. | review_rating:2, text:First CBTL outlet that refuses to give me a straw for iced drink. Staff said straws are reserved for “ice blended” beverages only. Is this policy only applicable to this outlet? Coz other outlets just give me one straw for each cold beverage without any problems.

reviews:

Food is great and tasty and delicious, price is okay, quantity is okay.. fast service for food to deliver, only the fried take some time to come..like way more time.. haha..

Service is great, always smiling and do their best.. recommended to try.. :) | review_rating:5, text:Review for Din Sunway
I had a wonderful experience at Din Sunway. The staff were exceptionally polite and welcoming, making the visit pleasant from start to finish. The food was decent, with flavors that matched the reasonable pricing. I would happily rate their service 5/5 for their kindness and attentiveness.

Message to the Team: Please continue maintaining this level of warmth and courtesy towards your customers – it truly makes a difference! | review_rating:5, text:Today, I went to try. The atmosphere of the newly-opened Din Taifeng in sunway is very comfortable and clean. The waiters are warm and thoughtful, and the service speed is quite fast. The food is also rich and varied. I used to eat non halal. I also feel very good when I come to try halal this time. I recommend everyone to eat it. | review_rating:4, text:The restaurant atmosphere is good and the staff are friendly. Fried rice and xiao long bao is considered ok. However, For the salty egg prawn, the outer skin is too hard | review_rating:5, text:Lovely service by the staff. Food was delicious. Price reasonable. Must try!

name: The Boring Coco
location: LG1.25, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:small seat yet nice to chill and enjoy coconut shake & icecream 🍨
their ice cream is superb! | review_rating:5, text:Finally found Coconut Blended drink (with or without ice cream) in Klang Valley that is delicious! I don't have to go far away anymore for Coconut drink!
Recommended to try! | review_rating:5, text:Had my coconut ice cream at Sunway Pyramid outlet today. Absolutely love it. Personal opinion, better than "the other" brand.

The ingredients use here is fresh. Had mine with peanuts, nata and coconut flakes. You'll definitely know if your nuts are not fresh.

The sweetness of the ice cream is just spot on. Not too overpowering. And it is just so creamy and smooth, like how a good quality ice cream should be.

Will come back again. | review_rating:1, text:Just bought their fresh coconut drink. Totally disappointed with the drink. Charged me RM10.90 but gave me an iced water. The staff said it is like water because there’s no sugar. I couldn’t believe the reply from them. I’m am sure they made a mistake because I can differentiate the taste of water and fresh coconut with no sugar. Will never buy from them again. Just hope I don’t get sick because of what they served. | review_rating:5, text:Need to write review before can redeem birthday gift. Will update honest opinion after trying!

Updated:-
Taste: somewhere in the middle, not the best but not too bad too. If I had to pay rm13+ for it, there is another stall that sells better coconut shake at half the price, but not near pyramid la 🥲

name: Jin Hayari (Pop Up)
location: F1, AV 159 & 160, 1st Floor, Asian Avenue, Sunway Piramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Last time have bad experience in Mid Valley. Yesterday got worst experience in Sunway Pyramid. I realize foreigners working really in bad manner. I just try out one short dress and return because is not suitable, the staff show me black face and talk my bad in front of me. Your shop is not allow people on trying then please put a BIG SIGNAGE OUTSIDE. Please consider before you try or please try after you buy. This kind of words. So disgusting that your dress is not that clean as well to let customer try on. I wont go your shop again. | review_rating:5, text:Jin Hayari Sunway Pyramid offers a great selection of stylish clothes that look fantastic. The quality is impressive, and the fabrics feel durable. Best of all, the prices are affordable. Recommended | review_rating:1, text:The short hair lady refused to let me try on the dress I wanted
I was afraid I had misunderstood her and even double-checked with her to see if the dress I was looking at could be tried on, and she did not disappoint me. She said the dress didn't fit me. I asked if the customer insisted on trying it on, couldn't she do that too?
She replied in a very firm tone: "Yes, you can't."
I was like wow, this store owner has trained a very good staff and very principled.
What I want to say is that customers have to try it on only know whether it suits them or not, they DON’T NEED YOUR STAFF TO CONCLUDE. She behaved so rude | review_rating:5, text:I like the service of the boy-cut hairstyle retail representative. She knows her stuff well and offered suitable size for me to try on, and even helped tidying up my dress after I had put it on, checked with me if she tied the waist too tight, and even offered a heel for me to wear for the long dress I tried.

Initially I got a smaller size for the first piece, she had a look on my size and offer me a bigger pieces.
Next when I wanna try the second piece, she offer me a smaller size and told me that the cutting is much bigger, so advice me to try the size first, if I needed a bigger size, then I can let her know.

This is exactly the service we need to get whenever we’re in fashion shop. Not some representative who just stand there and following us only.

Kudos to you, thank you so much, I’ve always wanna tried your dress, and the experience today makes me wanna have a second visit. | review_rating:1, text:WILL NEVER SHOP HERE AGAIN. i was in the sunway branch with my sister, while my sister was looking at dresses, the store clerk lady came up to her and told her nothing in the store would fit her. we asked if there was an L size for the dress and she said even that would not fit her and even placed the dress on my sister as if showing her that it would not fit. i asked if my sister could try the dress on and the lady kept saying it would not fit. i kept insisting on letting her try and the lady finally gave in but demanded that she would be the one pulling the zipper on the dress for my sister. in the end the dress did fit, but my sister did not show the lady as it was not worth her (my sister’s) time to go back and forth with the lady again. when we passed the dress to the lady as we were about to leave, she called us to stay and look at her test if the zipper was broken. it was absurd. why hire a clothes store clerk that bodyshame women??? i understand that its hard to employ people, but there should at least be a standard. overall, never shopping there again.

name: dipndip
category: dessert_restaurant, breakfast_restaurant, diner, brunch_restaurant, chocolate_shop, dessert_shop, candy_store, confectionery, cafe, restaurant, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.83 Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a great experience dining at Dipndip Sunway. It’s very kids friendly as they provided pens and paper for each of my children, which was really helpful. They were also very welcoming. Will definitely come again to satisfy my cravings! | review_rating:5, text:Good place to relax and spike ur glucose level😝. Fast service and good dessert. Will come to enjoy dessert again. | review_rating:5, text:Our choice was the exquisite Crunchy Triple Chocolate Crepe. This delectable crepe boasted a moist texture with delightful crunchy crumbles. It featured a generous serving of vanilla ice cream, generously topped with a frozen chocolate sauce and drizzled with premium flavored chocolate sauce. What surprised me most was that, despite the abundance of chocolate, the dessert had a well-balanced, not overly sweet taste. I had expected it to be much sweeter, but the overall flavor was just right. | review_rating:4, text:During my visit to Malaysia, I had the pleasure of staying at the Sunway Pyramid Hotel. One evening, we decided to indulge in a delightful snack at Dipndip, conveniently located just a few floors away from our hotel lobby. They are located at Sunway Pyramid Mall.

Our choice was the exquisite Crunchy Triple Chocolate Crepe. This delectable crepe boasted a moist texture with delightful crunchy crumbles. It featured a generous serving of vanilla ice cream, generously topped with a frozen chocolate sauce and drizzled with premium flavored chocolate sauce. What surprised me most was that, despite the abundance of chocolate, the dessert had a well-balanced, not overly sweet taste. I had expected it to be much sweeter, but the overall flavor was just right.

Without a doubt, this crepe ranks among the finest desserts I've ever had the pleasure of tasting. I highly recommend giving it a try! | review_rating:5, text:Dipndip at Sunway Pyramid exceeded all expectations and provided an unforgettable experience for my family this evening. From the moment we stepped in, we were greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere that set the perfect tone for a delightful evening. The staff was incredibly friendly, attentive, and eager to ensure that our visit was exceptional.

Now, let's talk about the star of the show—their chocolate creations. Dipndip boasts an impressive array of mouthwatering desserts that are truly a chocolate lover's dream come true. Each bite was a heavenly explosion of rich, velvety chocolate combined with a variety of delectable toppings and fillings. From their signature chocolate fondue to the indulgent crepes and waffles, every dish was crafted with precision and love.

What made the experience even more enjoyable was witnessing the skilled chocolatiers in action. The live chocolate preparations added an interactive element and allowed us to appreciate the craftsmanship behind each creation. It was a pleasure watching them pour, drizzle, and sculpt the chocolate into beautiful works of art.

Furthermore, the attention to detail in both presentation and taste was remarkable. The desserts were beautifully presented, showcasing the artistry and passion that goes into every dish. As we savored each bite, we could taste the quality of the ingredients and the dedication put into creating a truly exceptional dessert experience.

Moreover, Dipndip's commitment to creating a family-friendly environment was evident. The cozy and inviting seating arrangements, along with the charming decor, made us feel right at home. The staff went above and beyond to ensure that our children were comfortable and catered to their needs.

Overall, our evening at Dipndip in Sunway Pyramid was nothing short of extraordinary. We left with satisfied taste buds, happy hearts, and wonderful memories. If you're a chocolate enthusiast or simply looking for a memorable dining experience with your loved ones, Dipndip is the place to be. Prepare to be enchanted by their chocolate wonders and indulge in a sweet journey like no other.

name: Sunway Lagoon
category: wildlife_park, tourist_attraction, zoo, water_park, amusement_park, amusement_center, park, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/11, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a really great time with the whole family. The wife was happy to watch some of our stuff near the small wave pool while the kids and I hit the rides. It was a great time for us to go as there were not very big crowds meaning it did not take very long to get on the rides other than climbing all the steps to get up to them. Highly recommended for all the family from young kids to young adults. The big wave pool with 5m high waves every 1 minute from 4.30pm was a highlight too. Make sure you get to the front. | review_rating:5, text:Each park was truly fun. There are a lot of activities for you to do despite age. There are many water activities. So, it's wise you wear your swimwear and roam around. There are lockers in every park as I remember and you can rent a locker to keep your belongings safe. I went on  weekend so there were too many people and had to wait in lines for a considerable amount of time. But enter the place when it opens and you can enjoy every activity. Overall really fun day! Recommended! | review_rating:4, text:A family fun water park having a big wave pool, water rides and an area train to reach various fun areas of this big park. Apart from the water park, Sunway Lagoon has various other attraction parks like a small zoo, Scream room a 5 D theatre and many other attractions. You get an entrance band to go to all activities. Once you reach the park you need to go down with multiple level escalator. There are many changing areas separate for both men and women with showers and different size lookers to store your belongings and clothes. Overall it was a family fun for the whole day. | review_rating:5, text:My wife and I recently booked the villa package for 2 days and 1 night at around RM1.6K, and we had an amazing experience! A big thank you to Sunway for allowing us to check in early at 11 AM instead of the usual 2 PM. This thoughtful gesture made our trip so much smoother, as we could head straight to the theme park without worrying about our belongings.

The villa itself was spacious, beautifully designed, and incredibly comfortable—perfect for a relaxing retreat. A special shoutout to Shahmin and his team for their outstanding hospitality; they were friendly, helpful, and truly enhanced our stay. While the food was decent, it could be improved to match the overall high standards of the experience.

Overall, we would rate our stay 8.5/10 and would definitely consider returning. Thank you, Sunway, for a wonderful time! | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing Experience – Not Worth the Money

I genuinely cannot understand why this place gets 5-star ratings. The ride attendants are rude and unhelpful, and customer service is clueless—even the so-called “customer specialists” don’t know how to handle guests. The park itself is old, decaying, and poorly maintained. The shacks and huts are a complete waste of time, and the wave pool only operates for 45 minutes at the very end of the day. The whole place smells bad and feels like it’s falling apart.

For a family of five, we spent $700 AUD—absolutely not worth it. There are so many better places in Malaysia to visit for a fraction of the cost. Even with a quick pass, there was no need to wait for rides, which only made the purchase feel like a scam. The photos online are misleading, so don’t fall for the marketing.

This was our experience in January/February 2025. Save your money and your time—there are far better options out there.
