name: Mr. Siew Bao
category: bakery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Mr. Siew Bao at Sunway Pyramid is a solid spot for local pastries! I’d give it four stars because the service is friendly, and the pastries are above average. The Siew Bao and egg tarts hit that local flavor just right, and prices are reasonable, so you can grab a few without overthinking it. Good choice if you’re in the mood for some tasty, classic Malaysian treats! | review_rating:5, text:the pastries here is fresh and superb! the choco tart is not too sweet which I love it so much and for the puffs i got durian and chocolate, everything is perfect surprisingly. | review_rating:2, text:Located inside the sunway pyramid and taste it for myself for total disappointment.

The durian cream puff.
There is nothing taste and smell like a durian. It was flat. If u ever know the famous durian cracker (keropok) in yellow packaging...it has better taste and aroma.
Honestly i tried few places too....nothing good compared to the one sell at jonker walk, melaka. | review_rating:5, text:👍🏻👍🏻 | review_rating:1, text:女员工套着手套拿了食物，没脱掉手套收钱
然后又用摸过零钱的手套 继续拿食物 给其他顾客 再收钱💁
可以不要这么不卫生吗？会拉肚子的勒...

name: Kiehl's Since 1851
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: VILLAGE ROAST DUCK
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:One of my family’s favourite place for roast duck with pancakes. The roast pork and char siew is good too. The recent outlet refurbishment made the place more spacious with more seats at the expense of higher prices. A whole duck which used to cost less than RM100 is now RM108.
Overall still recommended with free soup and dessert being offered. | review_rating:5, text:Expect a queue during lunch and dinner times. This place is well worth the hype. I'm personally not a fan of roast duck or BBQ Pork, but the ones in Village Roast Duck are really that good. The fried rice was also fragrant and had wok hey.
Prices are on the higher side but the quality does match up to it. | review_rating:4, text:We really love the duck from this brand. Overall good experience so far. Will have a meal when visiting this mall.
My favourite from this restaurant is there are complimentary soup and gualinko desert.
Tips: Nearby Sunway Pyramid Hotel and recommended when staying at the hotel. | review_rating:5, text:Food is served fast and the meals are delicious and flavorful. Newly renovated more dinning capacity but at peak times there's a queue. | review_rating:4, text:It is a smaller branch compare to Mid Valley. But the dishes are as good as Mid Valley. The queueing time for seating is about 20 minutes during peak hour. If you like to chit chat with family members or friends after the dinner, it is not a suitable restaurant due to the compact dinning area and good business.
I would recommend the Beijing Roast Duck and pork belly with taro which are delicious.

name: The Coach Coffeeshop
location: Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Coffee was good but only in one size small cup , quite disappointing for me. The sfaff was nice suggesting which bean i should try. The lemon donut was good omg?? | review_rating:2, text:The yellow interior of the space really makes it pop out compared to other cafes. Being associated with the Coach brand, we naturally had higher expectations. Unfortunately the food and coffee does not meet the standards, especially since the price point is higher than average (rm 18++ for a cafe latte). Portion is small and the coffee lacks aroma. Grilled cheese sandwich (rm38++) was burnt at the sides. | review_rating:2, text:I went in with zero expectations because big brands like this normally open a cafe just for money and I was lowkey right :/ we tried their crullers and coffee.

The raspberry crullers were nice, the maple one was meh but in general both had a very basic taste to it (RM12 each is okay I guess?)

The coffee tho, was super overpriced (RM16) when it tasted just like normal cheap coffee 😂

I feel like this cafe is okay if you just wanna go there for the sake of trying but def not rly a place that I would go to repeatedly lol | review_rating:2, text:Over priced coffee ,rm16 for a cup of iced americano ( still need to top up rm2 for single origin bean) , tasteless and watery coffee ,soggy and over sweet dessert , overhype place and not worth for second visit | review_rating:4, text:The COACH Coffee Shop has now open up in Sunway Pyramid right in front of The COACH near the main entrance of the mall 😁

Seems like luxury brands are also into cafe with LV and now COACH 😁😝
#coach #thecoachcoffeeshop #sunwaypyramid

name: Clinique
location: Lot.G1.69A, Ground Floor , Sunway Pyramid Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Staff looks professional but with zero attitude aka ‘annoying’. I just want to buy one makeup product, very straight forward to the product and not even trying first. Yet they still ‘passing around’ among them who will treat the customer which is looks super anonoying. Then comes another their ‘super potential customer’, walaoweh, very good services eh 😌 mybe im not worth for their sales that day. It’s horrible even I don’t want to give any star but impossible. So 1 star is ONLY for their product which is so good 😊 | review_rating:5, text:Visited the outlet with my wife today, bought some skin care products and received some free gifts. The service is professional and courteous. Miss Bowie Wong patiently explained and carefully labelled each products and free gifts with a sticker label to indicate the product usage application | review_rating:1, text:Horrible customer service for me. I entered into Clinique sunway pyramid the other day and saw a customer being served by a woman in white lab coat. As i entered, she did not even regard me. No eye contact, no greeting. She just continued to serve her rich-looking customer as if I was invisible. Was it because im a small girl who doesnt seem rich? I find this extremely rude. Horrible customer service? No, more like NO customer service. Please change, Clinique. | review_rating:1, text:service so so, not professional, I been told and received email that i can have Birthday treat, can receive my Birthday 6pc Gift if i go buy items on my birthday month, but the stuff check my member at their system don't say anything, and remind me for the birthday treat that I would be have, i receive nothing, just the samples doesn't write same as the email | review_rating:5, text:Loved the service!! Staff were very helpful n friendly. Will definitely come again!!

name: Go Noodle House
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Delicious meat slice and meatballs with savoury soup. Compliments perfectly with the chilly. This outlet has good seatings. Service is fast. Kids meal are great value. Comes with toys too. | review_rating:4, text:Had lunch here.

Indoor full house. So sit outside. It seemed like not enough of staffs. Only 1 staff on the floor.
Sat outside open area with fan. But not hot luckily.

Food was served fast. Just that snacks were served wrongly and the staff discovered fast. Or else we ate it.

Lunch hour quite a lot of customers.
Hope to have more set lunch to chooce. | review_rating:5, text:Crew response very quickly to serve upon our arriving.
University students can sign up their member to enjoy special deals for student.
The menu is improved so much, even more types of soup other than their signature. Now even have nyonya laksa soup base.
Got mi xian, ramen, mi hun and pan mee.
Noodles lover can come here.
They also got set meal, worth to try.
Restaurant is clean.
Aircond enough, and the Chinese BGM is on point. | review_rating:5, text:GoNoodle’s Special Dark Sauce Pan Mee is a must-try! The springy noodles, rich sauce, and crispy toppings make every bite flavourful and satisfying. Pair it with their chili sauce for an extra kick. Comfort food done right—highly recommend! | review_rating:4, text:Pan mee is satisfactory, yet the soup tends to be slightly salty. There's also a preference for more al dente noodles, as the current texture leans towards being too soft.

We always enjoy their bursting meatball mixian; opting for the premium version intensifies the taste.

A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. name: Sacoor One
location: Unit: G1.06, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I came to purchase a suit for formal occasions, and was pleasantly surprised by the range and quality of options. The suits here are ready-made but will be altered to fit to your specific body shape.

The highlight of my visit was the excellent customer service from Izzul. He was respectful, attentive, and also proactive in making recommendations based on his experience and taste. This is a level of professionalism that sets a new standard in Malaysia. Well done Sacoor One and Izzul! | review_rating:1, text:Teribble shopping experience! Will not be shopping here anymore or any sacoor one outlets! Bought clothes and paid for the clothes and just went it for pinning and alteration. But the service was teribble, the female staff seemed very rude, untrained and questioned me on my purchases. I had to produce a receipt before she was able to retrieve my purchases which I had already paid for. There was no manager on duty and i couldnt lodge an official complain. I have since requested a full refund as I will not be treated as such after spending RM1.2K. I will take my money else where and shop else where. You just lost a customer of 5 years! | review_rating:5, text:I recently bought a suit from Sacoor One at Sunway Pyramid, and the experience was exceptional, largely thanks to a sales associate named Izzul. He was professional, offering great advice on suit alterations and how to match clothing for any occasion.

What stood out was Izzul’s patience; he made me feel comfortable and confident in my purchase. I also want to extend my gratitude to abang tailor for his professionalism. The alterations made to my new suit were impeccable, fitting me perfectly.

Beyond the excellent service, the quality of clothing from Sacoor One is top-notch, ensuring that each piece is not only stylish but durable. I highly recommend visiting Sacoor One and asking for Izzul if you’re looking for quality clothing and outstanding service. If the management reads this, please consider giving Izzul and the tailor a pay raise or incentives for their exceptional customer service. 👍👍👍 | review_rating:1, text:Bad experience, bought 2 shirts for a wedding and couldn’t use them since they screwed with the sleeves. | review_rating:5, text:I just bought two suits from here and shoutout to Izzul for the great customer service and shopping experience!! Thank you so much for spending so much time with me and giving me great advice in picking the right suits for me.

name: A&CO
location: Malaysia, Selangor, Subang Jaya, Bandar Sunway, MY Selangor Petaling Jaya No 3, JALAN PJS 11/15,Bandar Sunway LG1.101,Lower Ground Floor ，Sunway Pyramid邮政编码: 46150
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had the pleasure of having Christine Lee do my manicure and pedicure at A&CO. Nail Bar, and I couldn't be more impressed! From start to finish, she was fantastic. Her attention to detail, skill, and professionalism were top-notch. My nails have never looked better! The service was relaxing and efficient, and I truly felt that it was worth every penny. Highly recommend Christine for anyone looking for exceptional nail care. She’s amazing! 👍👍👍 | review_rating:1, text:I’m extremely disappointed with my recent manicure experience at this salon. From the beginning, I felt something was off, but I didn’t expect to be left so frustrated by the end of the session. The technician didn’t inform me that she was a trainee until the very end, which would have been helpful to know upfront. The lack of experience was painfully evident throughout the entire process.

The session took over 2 and a half hours, which I found completely unnecessary, especially since I was only getting a basic gel manicure with no color. I had specifically asked for nail extensions prior, but I was told that they would take too long. However, even with just a simple gel application, the technician insisted that coloured gel wouldn’t look good on my short nails, and in the end, my nails were actually cut even shorter during the process.

The results were far from what I expected. My nails look uneven, and the entire experience was frustrating and uncomfortable. I left feeling like I had wasted both my time and money.

To make matters worse, the next day, I noticed that my thumb nail wasn’t even coated with the last layer of gel. I returned to the salon to ask them to at least put on the top coat, but when they did, it ended up looking completely different in color because the worker allegedly forgot what shade she had used. It’s hard to believe that such an oversight could happen at a salon, especially with something as simple as a top coat.

I really wish the salon had been more transparent about the technician’s skill level beforehand. I won’t be returning or recommending this place to anyone. | review_rating:1, text:Went here for gel manicure . It cost me rm78. But the service is lousy. Such a lazy and rude staff. The worst ever outcome and experience. The shape is square , one short and one long. The nail polish not dry enough, but she ask me to leave and as you can see in the picture there are dust on my nails. Please change your staff otherwise teach her some respect and skills. | review_rating:1, text:not profesional hair stylish very rashing to finished my haircut.Not satisfy with my hairdo. I visited this salon on today (2/1/2024) around 8.20pm .At the end I just had a worst feeling and hair cut. This salon charge me senior hair pricing at rm40 but I really fell the work done is literally not the senior levelllll. Not recommend this saloon | review_rating:1, text:Very disappointed! I show them a picture of what I wanted and  they did a horrible job Don’t waste your money there rather go to somewhere else.

name: Chicken Claypot House
location: Lot No. OB2.G.U2, Oasis Boulevard, Ground Floor Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Short review:
Sesame Chicken Claypot ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Suancai Fish ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Long review:
In my 4th visit, I decided not to go for those chicken hotpot options and settled for a sesame chicken claypot and suancai fish. Yes, even Chicken Claypot House cannot deny the popularity of this dish now in Malaysia and has introduced it into their menu as a seasonal offer.
Sesame Chicken Claypot ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
I thoroughly enjoyed this dish. The sauce was really savory with just enough of that sesame taste. In addition to that, the finely chopped and pre-fried ginger gave this dish that extra fragrant taste. So it was not good for my dieting plan as I ended up having two and a half bowl of rice just because of it. The chicken was also pre-marinated I believe. It was flavorful although the kitchen staff gave me mostly chicken breast.

One criticism I have for this restaurant is its rice. It's very lumpy and has limited the joy of having this sauce on the rice. 1 star for the rice.

Suancai Fish ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
For this dish, it came in a humongous bowl. There's not a lot of fish slices but the quality of the fish is there. No earthy taste unlike Tai Er. For me, that is my number one criteria when it comes to eating fish. To be fair to Tai Er, the first and the last time I was there was about one and half years ago. I hope things have changed now for them. Coming back to Chicken Claypot House's version, the peppercorn soup gives you quite the heat after consuming it for a while. But it was good and I like the fact that the sourish taste did not go overboard as to render it acidic in taste. Another important thing to note is that it did not come with a THICK layer of oil unlike the others that I have tried before. So I did not have to spend time filtering away the oil. So it does hold up well to other restaurants that specialize in this dish. | review_rating:4, text:Soups are super tasty and big bowl .love the fish soup portion reasonable come with 龟苓膏 and herbal tea. Recommended. | review_rating:4, text:1. Signature claypot chicken: It was delicious and paired well with rice. The chicken was flavorful.

2. Herbal chicken soup: Just okay. The herbal taste wasn't particularly strong, with limited chicken pieces.

3. Fish head steamboat: A new addition to the menu. The dish had a decent taste.

Generally, the food here had a heavy flavor and left us feeling quite thirsty after the meal. It was enjoyable, but we would recommend having a beverage on hand to counterbalance the strong taste. | review_rating:3, text:Indoor aircond environment, not to worry having steamboat even under warm weather. This eatery has few branches and their have several main dishes / pot soup to choose from, then you can add other ingredients.

Taste ok, nothing much to shout about. Definately not a cheap choice | review_rating:3, text:First time there and I have to say it wasn't a happy experience. RM78 chicken herbal soup for two is steep. You have to pay rm2 for Condiments. We added on tongho vegy and just a small handful costed rm8.90. the pricing and portions didn't make any sense.

Worked out to over rm60/pax with just veg and tofu added, 2 small rice and one glass of Chinese tea. I can't say I have much to say about the service either.

name: CHATERAISE
category: dessert_shop, confectionery, bakery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Sunway Pyramid, LG2-33, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:The Double Fantasy was filled to the brim with delicious custard and cream. RM5.80 well spent. Will repurchase.

Chocolate eclair was hard, chocolate cream not to my taste, very jelak. Should have chosen the matcha instead. RM6.80

Will try the cakes and mochi next. | review_rating:4, text:I ordered 2 cakes with my mom. Both cakes were delicious, and I liked the Japanese fresh cream in the cakes.

However I didn’t like that they used a tea pot which had a crack (not shown in my pic). | review_rating:5, text:Can't express how much I like this new outlet here? They have dine-in area and also serving coffee counter. I always love their mousse cakes but hard to take-away especially shopping in the mall. But now, I can sampling their mouse cakes, desserts, puddings, jelly,  cookies and ice-cream.

Must try their ice-cream, affordable price and imported from Japan. Very tasty, not easily melt.👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Need to try their milk popsicles, pretty nice and you can taste up milky flavour and texture. Cakes are good, definitely need to get their strawberry short cake. Able to dine in which is great but spaces are pretty small and limited, only have 4 big table. | review_rating:5, text:I've been to the other outlets in OU and Isetan but here's their latest one. I love their pastries, they're imported from Japan and I love that they maintain the quality in terms of taste and presentation. All of them look very appealing and artistic. I love their Mochi and strawberry shortcakes. I've also tried their cream puff, and while the filling tastes really good, because they're not freshly made, the outside layer is not as tasty as I had tasted elsewhere.

For Muslim patrons, I advise you to inquire before purchasing because some of the items have alcohol but they're not written on the dislay. The staff was attentive and helpfully pointed out to me when I was choosing my desserts. Would recommend the store to display the ingredients especially sensitive ingredients like nuts and alcohol so it's easy for us patrons to carefully make our choices.

name: MyTimeTrade
location: Lot LG2.132D, Lower Ground Two, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:26 September 2024 - come here to fix my watch.. I've been searching other shops repair but they couldn't fix it.. Then i come to this shop and ask if they can fix it, the guy said he can fix it.. Really thankful to the guy that guy.. Forgot to ask his name.. Really recommended for other people to come.. Very reasonable price.. Thank you | review_rating:5, text:This is by far the best watch shop in pyramid i have visited- . The uncle there is very friendly and attentive. Shares a lot of information as well. The younger male staff is also very helpful. Ive fixed and changed my watch battery here ever since.  Brought a friend here abd she was equally happy with the service too! ☺️. Its located at the Oasis of sunway pyramid, opposite Pineyard cafe | review_rating:5, text:I had to resize my watch strap and went to few places but they could not do it due to the design of the strap.
I was then recommended to this shop and they went extra miles to get the strap resized with a very reasonable price and short stint of time.
I highly recommend this shop if your looking for an excellent service for your watch as they are very good and helpful. | review_rating:5, text:I thought my watch out of battery and wanna replace a new battery. The uncle boss told me that the battery is not flat yet and then my watch continues ticking. He is very kind, professional and helpful. Very satisfied and happy with his service. Strongly recommended. | review_rating:5, text:Very kind staffs. Went in with my sis and friend. The uncle explained the repair process meticulously to us. Also gave foc strap hole punch.

name: JOHOR MINI STEAMBOAT & VILLAGECIOUS
location: Lot F1 Av.155 &195A, Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Am very surprised with the taste and pricing.

A combo meal of rice or noodles with lemontea drink each for only rm 10+-.

The taste is very flavorful too.

Our rice portion is huge! Like huge covering the entire plate with fried rice. Sorry my picture shown is after i consume almost of it haha

The asam laksa soup base is very rich! Kaw!

Plus they have various sources/condiment too

And the young chap here is very nice, who served us to the table to be sitted.

Definitely recommended to try out. Value for money especially in a shopping mall. ✌️ | review_rating:2, text:I came not expecting anything bcos at the special promo price for food and drinks, I can't ask for much at an outlet in a mall. But this is really way below my expectations. I gv two stars out of consideration bcos, shop still need to do business. The taste of prawns noodles soup is terrible, I can't force myself to finish. | review_rating:4, text:Lala soup was decent though it went cold very quickly, would’ve been better if there was a way to keep it hot. Assam laksa also nice, value for money with lemon tea at RM10.90 | review_rating:1, text:Was very surprise to see a dead mini cockcroach inside my soup. They've made changes. Serve a new soup. But the experience was terrifying and traumatic. Sanitary measure inside kitchen should be given a full check up. | review_rating:5, text:First time trying here, the Assam laksa is good. Very thick soup with generous ingredients inside. Not too big or too small either. Price is considered cheap even though it's inside the shopping mall. Will come next tie again for the mini hot pot. 👍

name: Al-Ikhsan Sport
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

review_rating:5, text:Yes 👍 Yes 👍 Yes 👍
My FIRST shopping experience with GUARDIAN @ Sunway Pyramid 😍 as it was my first trip to Malaysia 🇲🇾 my friends recommended me this store and ✨I LOVED IT✨❤️❤️❤️ Thanks to EFFE for consulting me about all the local products and “must have” items because of EFFE I left the store with 3 large shopping bags 🛍️😄 and thanks Hakeem for fast checkout at the cashier 💸🧾 Thanks to a lady from Medicine/Vitamins 💊section for explaining me about local Malaysian products 😊 By the way, there are great OFFERS and PROMOTIONS, which makes you save money 💰 for more shopping 👏😉🌟 I CAN NOT WAIT TO BE BACK TO KUALA LUMPUR and shop at GUARDIAN store again 🥰

Enjoy, Diana💋 | review_rating:1, text:I am writing to share feedback about my recent experience at your store involving one of your cashiers, Nurul.

While waiting in line at her counter, there was no signage indicating that the counter was closed. When I reached her, she instructed me to go to another counter, which was already occupied with refund issues. After some time, I noticed that she reopened the counter and served another customer instead of inviting me back.

This situation caused unnecessary inconvenience and frustration. I would appreciate it if you could address this matter and ensure clearer communication in the future to improve the overall customer experience.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. | review_rating:5, text:I recently did my AIA Vitality health check here, and the pharmacist, En. Naim, was extremely helpful and patient. Before purchase the PWP item, it is better to clarify with the counter staff for better understanding the details. In general, the staff is friendly and helpful. | review_rating:5, text:I bought some plaster here.  The staff are really nice.  Although the product has been mentioned, but the staff still mention it clearly to me. Really a great place. Recommend it.

name: Dar Al-Arab
category: middle_eastern_restaurant, lebanese_restaurant, fine_dining_restaurant, meal_delivery, food_delivery, indonesian_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.123, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Finding this restaurant is like a treasure hunt if you are coming here for the first time.  To find it you need to enter via the Sunway Lagoon side of the Sunway Pyramid Mall and then head to a little alley at the side of the Jollibee restaurant. Walk approximately 10-15 metres and then where you'll see the restaurant on your right.

Now the decor and atmosphere of the restaurant is a close replica of a typical Middle Eastern cafe in the movies unless you have actually travelled there.

The waiting staff is courteous and accommodating.  Furthermore the staff that waited on us was pretty proficient in Mandarin and Hokkien which was a delightful surprise to me and my friend.

Now for the food... What can I say. It was really yummy with the lamb stewed to falling of the bone and the chicken was fork tender. The mix platter kebabs was scrumptious as well with just a minor misharmony with the chicken kebab being a tad dry in this symphony of good food vibes.

The pricing for the food is quite reasonable with each pax coming to approx RM30-40.

The verdict. Definitely will come again for a special occasion or to have. A taste of the Middle East. | review_rating:5, text:Delicious and authentic middle eastern food! We ordered the big platter and we satisfied. Service was fast. The place has a nice decor and cozy. Would return here the next time we are at Sunway. | review_rating:5, text:Friendly and helpful staff who even came out all the way to the atrium to bring me into the restaurant. Nice place to celebrate birthday with family with freebie and discount. Delicious food with huge serving, tender juicy lamb | review_rating:5, text:Their food is so so good!! Every dish we got were just *chef’s kiss*. Their balcony/outdoor seating looks over Sunway lagoon so you can enjoy ur meal with a view! They have great service too, Mr Abdur-Rahman was very friendly!! | review_rating:5, text:I missed Arabic food. Thus, I tried to search around kl but couldn't find many choices. Luckily, I found one inside the sunway pyramid shopping mall! Quiet place, nice food, fast serving, and very friendly waiter! Price wise, I think acceptable as the portion consider big (somemore inside shopping mall). If I ever miss Arabic food, here is my choice!

name: BEBEK GORENG PAK NDUT
location: LG2.49, Lower Ground Two, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:2 days ago while shopping in Sunway Pyramid with my family, we were rather hungry at 6 pm. It was already dinner time for us all. We didn’t want any Chinese nor Western food . So we walked around the restaurants here to pick n choose what best to eat. So my niece who is rather adventurous , wanted to try some Indonesian food. We also happened to pass by this restaurant called Bebek Goreng Pak Ndut that serves duck n chicken cuisine Indonesian style. So we took a table n ordered our dinner. We ordered 2 pax of grilled duck n original duck plus another 2 pax of crispy fried chicken n grilled chicken. The food, to our surprise, was good . The prices were also reasonable. There were some Malay as well as some Chinese customers too. After our dinner when we left , we saw their special promotions during weekdays from 2.30pm - 5.30 pm. | review_rating:4, text:The duck is crispy outside and soft and fluffy inside thus making it very delectable. The grilled duck is the best IMO.

There is an assortment of condiments that are available and it's unlimited. A delight especially for spice lovers. | review_rating:3, text:Plenty of seats to choose. Ordered the fried duck. Nothing to shout about. It's too dry for my liking. At least the sambal provides a good cover. The cracker also not all is crunchy.

So, overall it's just mid. | review_rating:4, text:Food (Bebek Goreng/Bakar) - it is good as expected and definitely value for money. Perhaps just change the raw cabbage with some other veggies that can be eaten raw by most people.

Food (Beef soto betawi) - This was my original order but I asked to cancel because the beef was tough (tougher than your bully brother lol). Like real tough, plus the ligaments of the meat is everywhere. 😂 I asked to change to bebek goreng.

Service - This is Awesome! Overall the crew was kind and nice. One of the crew even ask me to do this review, which I don’t want to. Haha but he insisted so that they can continue to improve! That is bold! | review_rating:4, text:The duck was really good, especially with their red sambal. The gado gado was interesting as it had tomatoes and potatoes. The peanut sauce was also too watery.

reviews: review_rating:1, text:If you guys don’t mind buying bootlegs figurine at the price of original, then this is the perfect place for you, almost 99% of the stuff in this store is all bootleg, if you really want to buy good quality original figurine, just spend 20 mins and drive to midvalley, I can assure any figurine store in there is better than this store | review_rating:3, text:Animix is a Animation Toy Modeling Collection. Definetely gonna buy more 😻😻 | review_rating:5, text:Excellent products! The quality of the comics is fabulous as well as the other products. I am outside Malaysia right now but I still wish I could visit Animix everyday! | review_rating:1, text:I'm surprised this was in the JAPAN SECTION, Everything here is fake, the figurine boxes are inaccurate to the official ones, worst part is official banpresto rem cost RM 80 at Midvalley, here fake one but also cost RM 80. I'm quite disappointed in this as not only that you are supporting fake figurines, u even print fake Manga, giving the money to frauds instead of the original creator.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Firstly, I’m gate keeping the cologne I got, but it’s damn good 😃

Well, I found my scent. Good luck in finding yours! | review_rating:5, text:Today on 11/11/2024 i bought the perfume BELLA with sales girl Emma, very friendly and easygoing. Due to his attitude i went off and walk off . Ill go to times square and will purchase my favourite perfume | review_rating:5, text:One of the best oriental middle east perfume..highly recommended for those who love arab fragrances..good services as well from their sales person named Ahmad..this guy deserve a raise..bought 3 oriental perfumes from him base on his recommendation and i totally satisfied with his work and advise!!! | review_rating:1, text:Would not recommend to buy from here. The sales lady will judge you and act like you could not afford their perfume. name: Cruz
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Worst service from owner.
Came to the store and requested the dress Im looking for. Went to fitting room and started changing.

The fitting room there were no doors only curtain that hang at the door frame to cover.
2 curtains from both sides per fitting room.

Was changing the dress halfway. The owner did not ask for my consent not inform me anything and just barged in and looked at me wearing the dress halfway. She asked ok or not after that and thought Ididnt know how to wear the dress correctly as ifs upside down/flippers over. I said ok then I said I can do it I'm wearing now. Then she left but the curtain was left opened about half.

Complaints:
Did not ask for my permission/consent before coming in.
Did not inform me verbally before coming in.
Did not have my INFORMED CONSENT before coming in.
Invasion of privacy (doesn't matter if they have their clothes on or not)
The cctv was angled outside the fitting room. This incident was RECORDED and there is a solid evidence. If there's none from the footage, I believe you have probably deleted it. But I have witnesses as well.

I've read your reviews and turns out I'm not the only victim that encounter this. You either apologize or might as well shut down the store. With that kind of behavior I don't think anyone would even come and help/support with your business.

I felt to traumatized and speechless during that incident because it was very random and unexpected and I was not even informed. I was so close to burst out in tears full of fear but I managed to handle it well.

So what if you're a female? Does that give you any rights for you to just barged in like that without my consent? You're not even my family member nor friends what gives you the right to treat your customers like that? Did no one teach you how to respect others privacy?

Please fix your behavior. I will not report you to the police but I will make sure others know about your behavior. Either you fix it now or you can start to prepare yourself in court. Tq. | review_rating:5, text:don't have enough salesperson to assist , is more of selfservice like mcdonald somehow is happy with the purchase | review_rating:1, text:Staff has terrible attitude towards customer | review_rating:1, text:service rude. i tengah try baju main buka je langsir 😡 and dari mula masuk sampai habis asyik follow belakang i. harap boleh diperbaiki | review_rating:1, text:No Review

name: Supamala Hotpot
location: Lot LG2.122C, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had lunch here with my friends, and it was a wonderful experience! We didn’t make a reservation, but luckily, they had a table available. We were attended by Ms. Hana, who was incredibly helpful and attentive throughout our meal. We requested the staff to sing the birthday song for our birthday celebration, and Ms. Hana kindly fulfilled our request even though it usually requires a booking.

The restaurant offers a wide variety of meat choices and set menus with varying prices. The meat slices were thick and satisfying, and it’s free flow, which is fantastic! I highly recommend trying their mango + red bean bingsu—it’s absolutely delicious.

Overall, the food was great, but what stood out the most was their top-notch customer service. We’ll definitely be coming back! | review_rating:5, text:I’d love to share my first dining experience at Supamala Hotpot in Sunway Pyramid. We received outstanding service from Ms. Hanna, who explained the menu to us in detail. The highlight of our visit was Ms. Hanna’s thoughtful effort in organizing a birthday celebration, making the experience even more memorable 🥰 .This was my best lunch experience here 🩷 Highly recommended and I will definitely be back! Thanks a lot Ms Hanna 🫰🏻 | review_rating:5, text:This hotpot buffet restaurant offers unlimited beef, lamb, and seafood ingredients—a paradise for meat lovers!  ✨ Ramadan Special Lunch Deal (11AM - 4PM) ✅ 90-minute dining time ✅ 🆓 Free buffet set upgrade! Order the Basic Set and get upgraded to the Meaty Set, or the Meaty Set to the All-In-One Set! No extra cost, just more enjoyment!  We tried four soup bases: 🔥 Sichuan Spicy Butter Soup — authentic and fiery! 🍲 Japanese Sukiyaki Soup — sweet and savory, perfect for meat 🐔 Collagen Chicken Soup — mild and smooth 🍄 Wild Mushroom Soup — great for those who prefer a lighter flavor  The main meat options include: 🥩 Lamb shoulder, lamb leg, beef slices, and brisket—all premium cuts! Paired with a variety of veggies like potatoes, lotus root, spinach, broccoli, and soup-absorbing crispy rolls. Noodle lovers can enjoy Supamala noodles too!  Unlimited refills of Teh O Ais (iced tea) to keep you refreshed throughout the meal!  Overall rating: 🍽️ Food: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 👥 Service: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 🍃 Ambiance: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 | review_rating:5, text:I recently had an early dinner with my family at Supamala Hotpot, and it was a great experience! The service was excellent—friendly staff and quick with bringing everything we needed, which made the meal smooth and enjoyable. The hotpot buffet was a hit with everyone; it was fun, tasty, and had plenty of options to keep both adults and kids happy. The restaurant was spotless, and the view of Sunway Lagoon from our table added a nice touch to the atmosphere. Perfect for families, including young kids, though I think they could improve by adding a better variety of Malay kuih muih to the dessert selection. Definitely worth a visit! | review_rating:5, text:This is our fifth visit to Supamala Hotpot and once again, the food has exceeded our expectations. The quality and taste have remained consistently impressive, it is a go to spot for hotpot lovers.

Our favorites soup is the Wild Mushroom and Chicken Collagen Soup. It's rich, flavorful, and perfect for a comforting meal. The combination of the earthy mushrooms and the creamy, nourishing collagen broth is a standout.

The service is another reason we keep coming back. The staff is always friendly, attentive and ready to assist, ensuring a smooth dining experience.

We’ve enjoyed both their buffet and a la carte offerings and both have been great choices. .

Overall, Supamala Hotpot continues to be a place that guarantees a satisfying meal every time.

The pictures are from our first visit here.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Located at LG floor near the sunway lagoon entrance. Atmosphere is great, welcoming..

Food is great and tasty and delicious, price is okay, quantity is okay.. fast service for food to deliver, only the fried take some time to come..like way more time.. haha..

Service is great, always smiling and do their best.. recommended to try.. :) | review_rating:5, text:Review for Din Sunway
I had a wonderful experience at Din Sunway. The staff were exceptionally polite and welcoming, making the visit pleasant from start to finish. The food was decent, with flavors that matched the reasonable pricing. I would happily rate their service 5/5 for their kindness and attentiveness.

Message to the Team: Please continue maintaining this level of warmth and courtesy towards your customers – it truly makes a difference! | review_rating:5, text:Today, I went to try. The atmosphere of the newly-opened Din Taifeng in sunway is very comfortable and clean. The waiters are warm and thoughtful, and the service speed is quite fast. The food is also rich and varied. I used to eat non halal. I also feel very good when I come to try halal this time. I recommend everyone to eat it. | review_rating:4, text:The restaurant atmosphere is good and the staff are friendly. Fried rice and xiao long bao is considered ok. However, For the salty egg prawn, the outer skin is too hard | review_rating:5, text:Lovely service by the staff. Food was delicious. Price reasonable. Must try!

reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Cheese crepes were sooooo gooooddd. Not so sweet. Perfect with coffee. Price wise a bit on the high side. But it's worth it. Coffee beans taste fresh. Service was a bit lousy, though.

The place is located inside the mall. Centralised AC. Ample space. Overall, ok to try. | review_rating:3, text:I visited Nadeje at Sunway Pyramid last night and ordered a cup of coffee. The place wasn’t too crowded, and the staff was friendly. If you're looking for a peaceful spot to take a break while shopping at Sunway Pyramid, Nadeje is a great choice. I’ll definitely be back to try more of their drinks or desserts next time! | review_rating:4, text:Great place to eat Mille crepe, creamy and yummy. | review_rating:3, text:Had cappuccino and the chocolate mint cake. name: Oppo Kiosk
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: PRO MEDIC
location: CP 2.01 Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Thank you dr tang and nurse, uma for treating my scalded skin. Had to move to another clinic as my burned wound was not healing properly in the previous clinic. Both of them deserve more than 5 stars and I’m glad I’ve found Pro Medic in time!

To Dr Tang: thank you for treating me so carefully and it’s really recovering better on my second visit after just few days!

To nurse Uma: thanks for offering your hand knowing that I’m in pain and I hope that I didn’t squeeze your hand too hard! 🤣

You guys rock and thanks for taking me in today although it’s during your lunch hours💕 | review_rating:5, text:I had an exceptional experience at Pro Medic Clinic. The doctor and staff were warm, professional, and attentive from the moment I arrived, and the clinic itself was clean and well-organized. The medical team thoroughly explained my condition and treatment options, answering all my questions with patience and clarity, making me feel genuinely cared for. The entire process was efficient, with minimal wait time and seamless coordination. I’m grateful to have found such a compassionate and high-quality clinic, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of excellent care! | review_rating:5, text:I recently had the pleasure of visiting the Pro-Medical Clinic at Sunway, and I must say, it was an excellent experience!

The doctor at this clinic is incredibly accommodating. They took the time to listen to my concerns and provided thoughtful advice tailored to my needs. It was evident that they genuinely care about their patients' well-being.

Additionally, the assistant was equally friendly and helpful. They made the entire process smooth and comfortable, ensuring that I felt at ease during my visit.

One of the standout features of this clinic is its spotless cleanliness. The environment was well-maintained, which added to my overall comfort and confidence in the care I received.

I highly recommend the Pro-Medical Clinic at Sunway to anyone seeking quality medical attention. You won’t be disappointed! | review_rating:5, text:The clinic is clean and well-organized. The process from registration to the doctor’s check-up and receiving medication was smooth.

The doctor took time to thoroughly diagnose me. A staff member named Uma was especially kind and thoughtful, following up with me the next day to check on my condition, and I appreciate that.

Overall, it was a great experience. | review_rating:5, text:As a foreigners visiting Malaysia all the way from South Africa, my husband and I just wanted to leave a note to say how grateful we are to Pro Medic Clinic staff. We were treated with the utmost professionalism and everyone was so welcoming, helpful and amazing. Visiting a clinic in a foreign country was daunting but they really helped us recover from illness, they even took blood tests to ensure we were treated correctly. We are so impressed with the service.
6 Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Bought here our wedding mattress and pillow. The mattress I'm satisfy so far after about 3 years plus. The pillow now getting sunken. A bit slow for the delivery if I'm not mistaken for the delivery of mattress. | review_rating:1, text:Bad services!!! Beware everyone!!!
1. I ordered mattress bed set but ended up received with insufficient screwsss!!
2. Dropped message on their website but they don't even serve or respond to your message!!
3. Attitude of the sales girl that serve isn't professional, the face totally forced to be barely smile, not in their professional to serve customer!
4. Display mattress here are little due to their limited space. It's recommend to rather go mid-valley branch which have more displays!!
5. Conclusion, Failed!!! Failed!!! Failed to serve customer!!! | review_rating:1, text:Staff (chinese, male) were very rude with a bad attitude. He could not help or address questions well regarding pillows and other items. | review_rating:1, text:They will only notify 3 days before delivery with no expected delivery time. I told the person my whole family is overseas and nobody is able to receive the two mattresses. The solution given was: either you take it on the only date we give you or wait until after Chinese new year which is more than a month later. 👏👏

Told the girl I want to speak to someone else as she definitely can’t understand English well and unable to facilitate my queries. She just ignore me 👍 | review_rating:1, text:If only I could give 0 stars… asked for a pillow but out of stock. The staff could’ve said it in a nicer tone, if you’re so impatient better don’t work or open your own store and tarnish your own rep. Whether you’re the boss or just an employee, remember if you don’t have customers you won’t have salary. If you don’t even know basic customer service then don’t bother opening a retail store to tarnish your reputation.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Johnson Fitness
location: LG2.78 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I really like this store because there are many interesting options,more variety of equipment, reasonable prices even for quality products and the employees are very friendly and willing to provide a lot of good information | review_rating:1, text:Super bad after sales service!!

I bought a Johnson treadmill from Sunway pyramid outlet. Always face misalignment problem.

Call for service appointments, only allow “one date in a month” for appointment. Ok fine. They set me 12-2pm for service. I purposely take leave and wait for the technician come, until 3pm still no show face and not even a call. I tried call the technician several time only pick up my call. He told me can’t make it!! What? If u can’t make it, why not early inform? Why wait customer to call u several time only inform?

This not the 1st time, last time I wait at home until 9pm also no show face!

I will never buy from Johnson anymore!
Other fitness equipment shop have more good after sales service! | review_rating:5, text:Very good service and friendly staff .. enjoying when purchase from them .. recommend this brand for beginners thats want to buy an equipment for workout.. | review_rating:5, text:super helpful staff and provide good info | review_rating:5, text:Good service and explaination.

name: Tea Garden
location: LG1.40 & 1.41, Lower Ground 1, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Tea Garden Restaurant at Sunway Pyramid is an absolute gem for anyone looking for delicious Halal-certified Chinese cuisine with a great variety of dishes. The food was fresh, flavorful, and well-presented, making for an excellent dining experience.

We ordered the fried rice, porridge, and stir-fried radish cake, and every dish was perfectly cooked with the right balance of seasoning. The fried rice was aromatic, packed with shrimp and eggs, while the porridge was silky smooth with crispy shallots and fresh spring onions. The radish cake had a nice crisp exterior with soft, flavorful bites.

The ambiance is warm and inviting, perfect for families and friends. The service was fast and friendly, ensuring we had a pleasant meal. With their Halal certification, this restaurant is a great spot for Muslims who love authentic Chinese flavors.

Highly recommend for those craving quality comfort food in a cozy setting. Definitely coming back! | review_rating:4, text:Food is not bad. I actually wanted to go to another restaurant but they were having blackout issue so my Mrs suggested this shop and their Radish Cake.

It’s really nice. The coffee was also as how I asked for it, less sugar.

There is plenty of other dishes which I wanted to try out but I didn’t have much time to couldn’t try others.

Service is good. Nice ambiance.

Ohh and they have HALAL cert. | review_rating:3, text:The Restaurant is serving local food. The local bread dish like roti bakar is not up to the local standards. Can get better options. Nasi Lemak and meehoon is a little above average | review_rating:5, text:Although I’ve been staying in this area for around two years, this was my first time trying this restaurant.

It’s in a corner of the mall, and I only just noticed it.

The restaurant mainly serves Malaysian cuisine, and I ordered the cendol and fried kuey teow. The food was average, but the ambiance and staff service were good. The serving pace was also fast. | review_rating:2, text:The white coffee ice was a total let down. It's diluted/ watery. They skimmed on ice. By the time the ice fully melted, the coffee became near tasteless. The nasi lemak rendang I had was so so.

name: MOG
location: LG1.53 Lower Ground One Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing experience purchasing my new spectacles! The staff (Mr. Azlan) was incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and friendly. They guided me through the selection process, answered all my questions, and ensured I found the perfect pair that suits my needs and style. The quality of service was outstanding, and I truly appreciate the attention to detail. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great service and quality eyewear! | review_rating:3, text:MOG Boutique at Sunway Pyramid offers a decent selection of eyewear, including trendy frames and reliable brands. The store is well-organized, making it easy to browse the options. However, the customer service could use some improvement as staff members weren't very attentive during my visit. Prices are on the higher side, which may not suit all budgets. While the quality of the products is satisfactory, the overall shopping experience didn't stand out. If you're looking for a specific brand, it's worth a visit, but don't expect exceptional service. | review_rating:5, text:MOG was very very helpful in helping me get my eyes tested for free, and referring to previous history in helping me come to a decision on my next step! The staff were attentive and kind in their explanation. Would absolutely recommend this outlet for prescription glasses and contact lenses | review_rating:5, text:My prescription glasses lens fell out and I was finding for the nearest optical shop to help put it back. MOG Staff, Eng Vie was kind enough to put it back in for free. It took less than 5 minutes. For their excellent and friendly service, I highly recommend anyone who seeks to get their glasses to drop by MOG at Sunway Pyramid. Would definitely visit again should I need to purchase glasses in the future | review_rating:5, text:The only optical shop that can accept to take my frame that dont have screw hard to open but En Azlan manage to open few minutes compare to optical 88 & other famous shop only look at glance & rejected mine.. In result I do 2 zeiss lenses & advance brand..  I used to sent my gentle monster few months back, now im sending another gentle monster here.. Very recommended 👌

name: Sunway Pyramid Hotel
location: Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:We stayed at Sunway pyramid hotel for one night after 31st night celebration. The location of the hotel is fine. The deluxe room comes with the basic amenities and the space is manageable. Our room was a bit old but it was clean. The body wash in the bathroom had a very foul smell, so probably it has expired. It would be better if the cleaning staff could pay more attention to this. Other than that the room was manageable for a one night stay. | review_rating:3, text:Sunway Pyramid Hotel - 3⭐ Review

🏨 Hotel (3/5)
•	Crowded lobby, long queues for check-in.
•	Late check-in issue – even at 3 PM, the room wasn’t ready.
•	Extra bed charge is RM 189, quite expensive.
•	Parking costs RM 15 even after validation.

📍 Location (5/5)
•	Perfect location – directly connected to Sunway Pyramid Mall.
•	Easy access to restaurants and shops without leaving the hotel.

🛏️ Room (3/5)
•	Smelly sofa, affecting comfort.
•	Slow WiFi connection.
•	Old mattress – uncomfortable, caused body aches.
•	No kids channel on the TV, limited entertainment options.

🍽️ Breakfast (3/5)
•	Expensive – RM 65 for kids, around RM 90 for adults.
•	Very crowded, sharing the same breakfast area with Sunway Resort Hotel.
•	Quite a walk to the dining area – not convenient for families with small children.

💰 Overall (3/5) - Not Worth the Price

For a 4-star hotel, the price feels too high compared to the overall experience. The location is the only highlight, but service, facilities, and comfort need improvement. | review_rating:4, text:Cleanliness could be better. The room offers privacy and a good view. Good value for money. The breakfast spread is good with a wide range of choices. However, it’s a bit of a hassle to walk to Sunway Resort since breakfast is served at the hotel next door. The plus point is it is conveniently located next to Sunway Pyramid Mall. | review_rating:5, text:Booked 4 rooms. Although initially they mentioned they couldn’t get adjacent rooms for us, but at the end, they managed to do so albeit the check in time for each room varied. They allowed early check in for 3 rooms. Rooms were neat and clean. No free car park though. | review_rating:4, text:Sulit hotel!! Good price, biiig rooms and great location. So why not 5 stars?? Bathroom was a little small and could use some renovating. Overall great hotel though. And service was also friendly and helpful.
opening_hours: Monday: Open 24 hours, Tuesday: Open 24 hours, Wednesday: Open 24 hours, Thursday: Open 24 hours, Friday: Open 24 hours, Saturday: Open 24 hours, Sunday: Open 24 hours

name: VILLAGE ROAST DUCK
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:One of my family’s favourite place for roast duck with pancakes. The roast pork and char siew is good too. The recent outlet refurbishment made the place more spacious with more seats at the expense of higher prices. A whole duck which used to cost less than RM100 is now RM108.
Overall still recommended with free soup and dessert being offered. | review_rating:5, text:Expect a queue during lunch and dinner times. This place is well worth the hype. I'm personally not a fan of roast duck or BBQ Pork, but the ones in Village Roast Duck are really that good. The fried rice was also fragrant and had wok hey.
Prices are on the higher side but the quality does match up to it. | review_rating:4, text:We really love the duck from this brand. Overall good experience so far. Will have a meal when visiting this mall.
My favourite from this restaurant is there are complimentary soup and gualinko desert.
Tips: Nearby Sunway Pyramid Hotel and recommended when staying at the hotel. | review_rating:5, text:Food is served fast and the meals are delicious and flavorful. Newly renovated more dinning capacity but at peak times there's a queue. | review_rating:4, text:It is a smaller branch compare to Mid Valley. But the dishes are as good as Mid Valley. The queueing time for seating is about 20 minutes during peak hour. If you like to chit chat with family members or friends after the dinner, it is not a suitable restaurant due to the compact dinning area and good business.
I would recommend the Beijing Roast Duck and pork belly with taro which are delicious.

name: Ecco
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
