name: Attic
location: F1.AV.151, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:A few weeks ago, I went to this earring store in Sunway Pyramid to get my ears pierced. The piercing was done by a female staff member with glasses. I specifically told her I wanted both ears pierced and repeatedly emphasized that the piercings needed to be at the same height on both sides. She seemed very impatient and assured me that they would be even. She then pierced my ears very quickly, took the payment, and said I could leave immediately.

Now that I’m home, I realize they are indeed uneven, and even people around me can notice the difference.

This was my first time getting my ears pierced, and I didn’t expect it to leave such a disappointing experience. I am very dissatisfied with the results and the customer service attitude of the staff at this branch. I hope the shop owner takes this issue seriously, improves staff training, and ensures more patience in verifying alignment carefully before piercing. | review_rating:5, text:Great and fast service! It is definitely more pain imo for helix needle piercing in that first injection for awhile. But bearable. I'd done it at Lovisa and it didn't hurt as bad = different type

Price is also quite expensive. So be prepared if you have $$$
RM90 for needle piercing ONE side
Additional RM49 AND ABOVE for titanium earrings selection that are flat back which is great. This one was about RM179 additional for helix

Overall great experience and will come back if I decide to do | review_rating:5, text:just wanted to update: 0 bleeding, 0 redness! i totally forgot i pierced them when i got back home.

finally mustered up the courage to get an ear piercing for the first time. if you're looking for somewhere sanitary, sensitive skin, first timers, safe, Attic @ Sunway is a good choice.

i paid a total of rm300+ for needle piercing (much better than a gun) for both sides, upgraded to titanium earrings (rm45 each), cleaning spray & the cream. 100% worth it.

the lady with the headscarf & lots of piercings (i did not get her name sadly), was very kind, explained things, friendly, gave suggestions & was sanitary and quick.

i was in & out within 10 minutes, ears pierced & with everything i needed. | review_rating:5, text:My go-to piercing place. This is my third time here and yesterday I went to get a double lobe on my right ear. I was pierced by Aisyah and she was so gentle and nice. The whole thing was done in five minutes. I did change to a titanium earrings and that bumps up the price a little bit. Two lobe piercings with titanium earrings cost me RM268. I also did ask Aisyah if I have the anatomy for a rook piercing and thankfully I did. Next time when I got the courage🤞🏼 | review_rating:1, text:Previously I did my belly piercing at this shop around 2018 which was done by a Chinese lady and it’s still perfectly intact and I didn’t have any reactions nor pain, so I went to the same shop around last year June to do my snake eye piercing, it was a Malay lady who did for me, and she literally pierced my tongue twice!! Cuz she messed up on the first piercing and it was too obvious that it wasn’t parallel, the second time was still wasn’t parallel but not too obvious like the first one😑, I took out the piercing around last year November cuz I was so much in pain and itchiness for the whole time, cuz obviously it wasn’t done properly 😑 it was quite expensive almost around RM200 something but I honestly don’t mind to pay RM200 for a good piercing but it turned out to be otherwise !! I’m never going back to this shop ever again 😑😑 if you’re not well trained then don’t bother doing the job 😑 I feel so mad cuz it was a waste of money and I’m literally traumatised cuz she pierced my tongue twiceeeee😑 and the she has the audacity to tell me that “sengettt sangattt” when she messed it up as tho I did a mistake😑
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Shuyi
location: LG2-08, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I bought the freshly steamed yam paste and mochi and grape yogurt. I like the yam paste and mochi so much, it was fresh and healthy. For grape yogurt also not bad, but I suggest order 30% sugar for it. | review_rating:3, text:I bought their 'Signature Grass Jelly Milk Tea'. I really didn't expect the generous amount of toppings that they include together. I think there are grass jelly, red beans, raisins, peanuts, pearls, etc. Regular size costs around RM9.90. It's nice that they provide a spoon together with the beverage that I bought😄 Overall taste, there's nothing special about it except for the toppings. You enjoy both drinking and eating in a single cup. The milk tea is a bit diluted and there's definitely too less ice in it. I haven't tried the other drinks in the menu. I might be coming again to give it a try✌🏻 | review_rating:3, text:The shop is located next to Daiso. Space is small. People who want to gathering need to consider. Ordered signature grass jelly milk tea. Price is affordable compared to others milk tea shops. The amounts of fillings are generous but the drink was less cold. | review_rating:4, text:I ordered the signature milk tea and was surprised by the amount of toppings in the cup! Nearly 70% of the drink is toppings, haha.

It was quite interesting to try it out.

The toppings included boba, grass jelly, nata de coco, raisins, red beans, and peanuts. I felt full after this drink. | review_rating:3, text:Order signature milk tea glass jelly. A lot of ingredient but not able to suck up by the straw.
Taste so so to me. But I may come back to try yam paste drink, it looks good.

name: Swich Café
category: ice_cream_shop, dessert_shop, confectionery, bakery, wholesaler, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.133B, Lower Ground Level Two, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3 Jalan, Jalan PJS 11/5, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Once upon a time, there was a cafe serving cakes and coffee at the old former HP Towers, this was many years back. And somewhere last year we patron a cafe of the same name at Atria without realizing it was the same owner…and now they have opened a new outlet at Sunway Pyramid and come to ‘realize again’ that the owner is a good friend’s sister hahaha…they serve really nice cakes like the durian and cempedak cakes, valhorna chocolate croffle, tiramisu, gelatos and not forgetting good coffee…should give it a go. 20250121 back here with the missus, the durian bomb is still the best | review_rating:4, text:Nice cosy cafe at Sunway Pyramud new wing with good seating.

Prices for cakes, drinks and waffles come at a slight premium of RM20+

Deco is clean and simple.

Cakes, drinks and waffle are quite tasty.

Worth the quick dessert stop. | review_rating:5, text:New cafe located at Sunway Pyramid's newly renovated space, The Oasis. Randomly walked past and saw the variety of cakes sitting in the fridge display.

They have alcoholic and non-alcoholic options. We tried 2 non-alcoholic cakes, cempedak cake and chocolate valrhona cake. The cempedak cake was an absolute delight - sponge layer was soft and light, while the cream was sweet and fresh. Couldn't get enough of it!

Unfortunately, the chocolate valrhona was quite disappointing. The supposed mousse inside was hard and didn't taste fresh. Actually, the whole cake felt pretty tough and hard to cut and chew. It just felt like i was eating a few days' old cake.

Besides cake, they sell gelato, waffles and other desserts too. It's definitely worth a try. | review_rating:5, text:Their tiramisu gelato is the best tiramisu gelato i’ve had. It’s not just tiramisu flavour but as if you’re having bits of tiramisu. We had their delicious buttermilk waffle topped with Sicilian pistachio gelato. We were greeted and served by wilson who is amazing. | review_rating:5, text:I always love their cakes since they started in Atria. I went to the one at sunway last week- and Cempedak cake is still as good as i remembered. Friendly staff and good place to chill over coffee and desserts !

reviews: review_rating:1, text:terrible service of the shop keepers. they were busy watching their videos at the counter; when i approached them for the pricing of an item, they were like “what do u want? can’t u see it yourself”. will NEVER ever step into this shop again. | review_rating:1, text:Staff very rude | review_rating:1, text:员工的态度很差，脸很臭 态度很不好 应该炒掉 影响顾客的心情 原本要买7件的 态度烂到爆 直接走人去隔壁买！！😡😡 | review_rating:5, text:No Review | review_rating:5, text:No Review

name: THE OWLS CAFE
location: Unit G1.PT.08, Ground Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:The Mentaiko fried bointo flakes were done perfectly.  Fries were so good.  Such a crispy snap.  The Waffles here are pretty good too. Crispy exterior, soft interior and smells so good. All the dishes are so well presented.  Great place to stop for a snack, date or meal.

Friendly staff.  Fast kitchen. Free WiFi.  Clean facility.  Nicely decorated interior.  Lots of natural light.

Prices are a little high for the portion.  Location is very noisy on weekends.  Located between hotel and mall. | review_rating:2, text:For a cafe that heavily advertises their waffles, be prepared to wait at least 40 mins for 1 waffle order. We went at 4pm, off-peak hour. They said they only have 2 waffle maker machines, and each waffle order takes time to prepare. Imagine ordering more than 1! The staff will try their best to avoid you knowing that you will ask for your order. Once the order is delivered, there were no apologies as they will rush off and away from you as fast as they could. Also, the photos showed whole blueberries and bigger strawberry pieces on the waffles, but you only get them in halves. Who cuts blueberries that are already tiny anyway? 😂 The price charged for the food and service was not worth it. The staffs were not welcoming either, maybe they’re new and don’t know how serve customers. Very disappointing 😢 please do better. | review_rating:4, text:A cozy cafe in Sunway Pyramid, near the Sunway Lagoon Hotel side. I like the owl themed deco, with the light streaming through the glass wall overlooking Sunway Lagoon theme park. I shifted my table there but realized it was a little too warm at 6pm, and shifted back to the other corner where there were cushion seats.

The salad made me feel so healthy - it was colourful and delicious. I wanted to try the savoury chicken waffle, but ended up eating the chicken with the salad, and treating the fluffy waffle as my dessert! 🤣 | review_rating:5, text:The Owls Cafe in Sunway Pyramid offers a delightful selection of desserts that are sure to satisfy any sweet tooth. From waffles to cakes, each dessert is crafted with care and bursts with flavor. The cafe's location provides a stunning view of the Sunway Lagoon Theme Park, making it an ideal spot for visitors to take a break, relax, and enjoy the scenery. With its cozy atmosphere and delicious treats, it’s the perfect place to unwind after a day of shopping or exploring the theme park. | review_rating:4, text:part of the charm here is expectation of management, which is executed here at maskirova levels.  we managed to order off the waffle and breakfast menus, besides notices that both were unavailable.

the chicken and waffles was very good.  the shasukha less so.  the latter came in a portions too dimunitive, and with a taste profile more italian than moroccan.  so some call to tinker there, and to not reuse the pasta sauce.

this is a pricey joint, so expectations would be higher.

name: TOMAZ SHOE
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Aeroline
location: LG, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Jalan Pjs 11/15, Taman Bandar Sunway, 46150, Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:VLT 8817, Scania 6X2 Double Deck equipped with the SKSBUS D3DD body.

14/10/2024
Seats 61A, 61B
8:30AM
Aeroline Penang—Corus Hotel KL

Trip started PROMPTLY at 8:30 AM, no delays. Driver and crew, Faiz was very nice. They helped with check in, seat directory and baggage. The driver was very skilful when navigating through the narrow roads. In one instance, it was a 2 lane road and there was one car illegally parked.  The driver still managed to drive by without even needing to reverse.

At around 8:35, Faiz came down the row with comfy blue blankets and headphones.  The headphones worked great with the on-board entertainment (OBE). The OBE was equipped with many movies and songs, of different genres.

At about 9, Faiz served food to us. It had spicy rice, potato wedges and egg. The food was 9/10, tasty! He also served hot drinks which also tasted great!

The rest of the trip, he went around a few times to collect trash.

There was one stop at a fuel station for 15 MINUTES break.

At about 1PM-1:30PM, we arrived at Corus Hotel. Driver was nice enough to let me take videos of the bus.

2 mineral water bottles with Aeroline branding is provided.

Overall, awesome ride. It deserves more than 5 stars!

Bus Quality:

Can clearly tell that the bus was very well kept. The seats were clean and comfortable, recliner and leg rest was working. Screen was working, WC was also very clean. Tray Table also works perfectly fine. | review_rating:4, text:Suggest the food to be improved because the portion is too little. Other than that overall is good. Thanks. | review_rating:3, text:For those who want to travel with Aeroline, tips: DO NOT choose lower cabinet, it's near the toilet) as it smells bad everytime other passagers open the toilet door. Especially during evening journey. | review_rating:5, text:Superb bus service. They have a lounge in the ground floor of the bus where you can literally have a work desk.  You can get lot of work done on your commute from KL to Singapore or vice versa. Staff are nice. There is a small toilet and pantry next to the lounge which also has a tv. | review_rating:4, text:One of the most comfortable method to get into Singapore. Very comfortable buses with huge seats and included meals also. Toilet available in bus as well. It's a little more expensive than normal express bus, although for the comfort, it's quite worth the little extra money. Recommended.

name: Kedai Kopi Malaya
location: LG2.133, SUNWAY PYRAMID MALL, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Hope this brand close down for good. Such rubbish service, staff don't even know how to use the Point of Sales console. No crowd yet took so long for food to arrive and my order was not in the system.
Here is the worst part, uncooked chicken! Egg, anchovies and peanut premade and stored in a large container so hard as rock.

I lost count how many times I had to remind the staff where is my food!

Also... the unimaginable... zero hygiene common sense when serving food...

Please avoid visiting this branch | review_rating:2, text:Teh ice tasteless n bland...worse than mamak resto despite double/ tripple the price. Nasi lemak ayam goreng, now...how can u F up this I wonder, chicken was dryyy despite being drumstick, rice was too wet no fragrance, cheecheongfun not fresh, use of frozen roti canai soaked in oil gosh...need to change chef otherwise surely close down in mall where kakatoo and kopi bungkus kaw is steps away. | review_rating:3, text:There are many food outlets carved out from the previous aeon space which is a good place to hunt for new places to try. This outlet is small size and limited seats, and we just had a drink since we ate beforehand. The drinks are okay, not too sweet. But it took 15 mins to deliver them !!! 😨 mamak stall can deliver within 5 mins and there aren’t many ppl too at the time too which is after 9 pm.  Other than that, we have no complains as maybe that was only an overlook. | review_rating:5, text:First time visit this branch for late breakfast.

Ordered Soto Ayam, Indomee with fried eggs, Butter Kaya Toast, 2 sets of half boiled eggs, Milo ice and Teh O hot - Foods are acceptable. Love their Soto Ayam.😋 Spent about RM60.

The service is good. We used QR ordering - food was served a bit slow due to the crowd and there were only 2 staff (if I'm not mistaken), but Yas apologised with a smile. Thank you, Yas and his colleague. :) | review_rating:5, text:Had brunch at this outlet today.
Food is delicious. We had roti canai, soto  nyonya kuih and fried rice. The cham is superbly creamy. They are having a promo for some dishes@ RM10,  definitely worth it!

name: HOTPOT KITCHEN
location: OB. K7, OASIS BOULEVARD, SUNWAY PYRAMID MALL, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:I usually visit this restaurant at Sunway Pyramid specifically for their pork intestine, which I absolutely love. The way they cook it is fantastic, and it keeps me coming back. Unfortunately, on my recent visit, the pork intestine was unavailable, which was disappointing. I enjoy both the baby spicy and original flavors, but I prefer the original with extra garlic. However, this time, the garlic tasted off—almost spoiled, which was a letdown.

The soup has been consistently good since my first visit, and it didn’t disappoint this time either. I also tried the cheese mantou today. While the exterior was crispy and nice, the cheese filling had a strange low-quality plastic container smell, and when eaten together, it tasted slightly sour. It wasn’t a pleasant experience.
New series fruit juice(peach) tastes like chemicals, better order Chinese tea. | review_rating:5, text:you may choose your own vege, meat or any other sides to your liking! then, they will cook for you based on your desired flavours and level of spice! 🤗 the service offered are fast as well! when you're looking for a great place to eat in Sunway Pyramid, Hotpot Kitchen is the place to go! 😋 | review_rating:5, text:Always dropped by here for eat their dry malaxiangguo! well seasoned,=> price also reasonable eventhough queue quite long like 30mins to get seat , staff serve so fast also, definitely will be back for more if i drop by Sunway Pyra 🥳🥳🥳🥳 | review_rating:3, text:Good atmosphere at good location of the mall. Unfortunately, the dry hotpot here isn’t great at all👎👎. It’s too bland, just plain spicy and lack of good flavor (i don’t know why they wana add cumin flavor into it cos it’s actually meant for chinese bbq but they added this into dry hotpot which made it really weird). Nevertheless, the mala soup actually tastes really good 👍(but you get the same flavour from Master Kang instant noodles🤣) .

Another thing that put me off  is the so-called member price. It’s free to join then you get discount, but why bother to require that when you already allow everyone join for free. Wasting time and just finding excuse to charge more. Price actually is quite reasonable though. But overall i won’t go back to this brand outlets again. 😅

Finally reminder, when you select the pork or beef, it is usually rolled up so it’s easy to clip, MAKE SURE you tell the counter that you don’t want it to be cut into smaller pieces, my pork belly roll mysteriously ended up as 2 small pieces only 😹. I have read many others commented the same issues but i rather not presume that is the fact.. now i tried and proved that those claims were pretty accurate 🤣🤣 | review_rating:5, text:Actually for first try is not bad, all the vegetables and meat are fresh choice a lot (that’s my favorite part), food and service is good but still can improve. Furthermore, food are quite spicy suggest those who like spicy food can try.

name: Eggette Lab
category: dessert_shop, confectionery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Sunway Pyramid Mall, Red Atrium, Lot F1.AV.11, 1st Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:One of my favourite “kai dan zai” franchise. Have try a lot times and many flavours.

My personal favourite is the classic original and also the chicken floss. Recently prefer chicken floss as the savoury taste of the chicken floss match well with the sweet batter of eggette.

Most of time quality are ok but on and off they slipped in quality where the product are soggy and the side are not crispy.

Overall are good. Queue are much more lower than like 3-5 years ago where we can get it quite fast now compare to last time usually need to wait more than 30min. | review_rating:1, text:Such a disappointment. The eggette look like dog bite. No appetite to eat.  You take salary make properly please. | review_rating:3, text:Always long queue.

Didn’t purchase at my first time visit because the queue was way toooooo long. It was my second visit few days ago, and I waited around 15mins to collect my order. Consider quick..?

Tried their original classic eggette. It was crunchy at the outside, soft on the inside. Smell good, but the taste for me was so so only. Not the best eggette I have ever tried.

Would revisit and try other flavours, if there is no long queue. 😛 | review_rating:5, text:The food is really nice. I especially love the sweet potato mochi flavour. it always has a long queue everytime I visit the shop. However you will have to wait for atleast 10 minutes to get your food , which really requires your patience. | review_rating:1, text:Bad service! I arrive at stall at 7.30 the sales said that charcoal cheese is out have to wait for 30mins i agreed to wait so i went for a walk and came back at 8. But the order i receive is truly disappointing. Product is cold like been sit under a pile for more than 15mins. The whole thing is also squished!

name: BOBO STATION
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: AGift with Care
location: LG1.96A, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This perfume store is a local brand that sells quality perfume.
I remember back in those days when the company started, they used to have charity, perfume bottles drawn by down syndrome kids. But now it's more of generic packaging.

Their shower gel smell really good.
For the perfume, they're selling EDT and EDP.
Angelique smell really calming and the smell is not that bold. Rosette smells like just rose scent. Magnolia is very popular with it's fruity and flowery scent.
The price of their products is moderate and more near to commoners price range.
So if you want a special memorable gift that is affordable, this local brand is really a good choice. | review_rating:5, text:Steel Magnolia. Nice and Pleasing Parfume
Good Customer Services from Elyssa.
Highly Recommended to All😊😊 | review_rating:5, text:Very nice interior design with a variable of choices of product. I like the concept of the store. The staff also very helpful to choose my favourite fragrance 😊👍 | review_rating:3, text:Other said the business got good fragrance. Im gonna check it myself soon. | review_rating:5, text:Great Service and worth the price, love all their products and Services.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:First of all for it's price and hefty portion it is REALLY REALLY worth it.😤

Now I ordered a Satay Rollti with Chicken  and it was really good BUT I wish there was either more gravy or I can order more gravy on the side to dip/drizzle cause it was abit dry.

Although it was abit dry it have POTENTIAL 🔥 🔥 🔥 and I never knew eating roti rolled up would taste this good.

Will definitely come back next time to try the other Rollti | review_rating:5, text:I ordered the Chicken Chill la Grill la which comes with corn, cabbage and dhal curry. Delicious and I like the double layer packaging that keeps your wrap warm for takeaway. Service is great and I think theur ongoing promo for B1F1 is very affordable. For Sunway or Mall tenant staff, let them know beforehand for 10% off in the future. | review_rating:5, text:Very friendly and welcoming. Vijay is being really helpful at explaining about the menu promotion and info of the restaurant. Taste good! | review_rating:5, text:First of all for it's price and hefty portion it is REALLY REALLY worth it especially the daily special menu.

Surely have POTENTIAL 🔥 🔥 🔥 and I never knew eating roti rolled up would taste this good.

Will definitely come back next time to try the other Rollti | review_rating:5, text:guys... pls come here. the portion is so big and the staffs, dj and alex are so nice. order keju deja vu sangat sedap

name: Lizzie Café & Bakery
location: Lot No. G1.76A, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:While shopping in Sunway Pyramid 2 days ago, I came across this cafe n bakery. It was around 5pm at that time, so the cafe was not that busy as it was past tea time for most of the shoppers. So the tables n chairs around this cafe were almost empty except for one or two customers buying some drinks. Anyway , the shelves where  all the pastries n cakes were displayed , were almost empty. So many of their pastries were already sold out. There were a wide range of different types of drinks such as coffee n drinks on sale. Browsing through the pastries, I chose to buy some pastries to take back home as breakfast the next morning. What I bought was some pastries such as 3 croissants, 2 fruit tarts n 4 slices of cheese cakes, lemon cakes n some slices of fruit cakes. | review_rating:5, text:📍Located on the west side of Sunway G floor, next to Bobbie Brown.

🍰Coffee Basque cheesecake is really good.
Delicious! Very smooth creamy taste, the wet paste I like! No need to chew, it melts in your mouth~ The coffee flavor is super strong, plus enough cream cheese, it's delicious! The sweetness is just right. Recommended!

☕️Hot latte was ok.

🌲environment：
The dining area is quite large. The seats are retro and comfortable.

🧕🏼Service：
The staffs were busy with their own work. If you need anything, just go ask, they would love to help.

🎬2025.2.1 | review_rating:3, text:So happy that Lizzie is now in Sunway Pyramid! 🙌 A sister cafe of Lisette's, it offers an extensive array of pastries and cakes, as well as grab & go meals. A 10% discount is applicable to Sunway students and employees too.

Currently an opening promotion is going on which you can redeem a free coffee by any purchase of 2 items! 🌟

Ordered:
Pandan Gula Melaka Cake 🍰 (RM17)
Looks visually appealing, but the taste was really meh; it had a super strong pandan fragrance which overpowered the cake ☹️ the texture was also dry, seemed like it may have been refrigerated overnight so it didn't taste as "fresh" so there's a mushy mouthfeel. Honestly, could have opted for other cakes instead within a similar price range.

Crookie 🥐 (RM13)
Lizzie's best seller - croissant and soft cookie in one with a thin layer of chocolate spread inside! Not mindblowing, but the standpoint was the croissant, which retained its flakiness throughout; texture isn't soggy too 👍 Not a must try, but it's worth trying if you would like to have a dessert-pastry fusion!

Iced Latte ☕️⭐️ (RM13)
Got this for free as a promotion! Serving cup is bigger than most cafes I have been to so honestly this is reasonable according to price point 😬

Personally visited the first outlet in NU Sentral and my experience was better, probably due to the items I have personally tried. Ambiance wise, the interior is more spacious than the current outlet, plus it's also easier to find seats compared to the current one.

Though Lizzie has both hits and misses, I might return to this outlet again (maybe) to try out some other pastries. | review_rating:2, text:Besides the nice setup here, I've nothing much to say about this cafe. Their ongoing promo "free 1 coffee with purchase of two items" is misleading, and only limited to food. Anyways the staff aren't very sharp or attentive, and the service was so slow. We only ordered 3 drinks no food, considering that we were the only customers.
My dirty matcha latte was so-so, and overpriced for the quality. | review_rating:5, text:Wide selection of quality pastries, cake and meal boxes. Coffee is very good compared to many grab & go places. Reasonably priced, i.e. egg sandwich for rm9..

name: JOHOR MINI STEAMBOAT & VILLAGECIOUS
location: Lot F1 Av.155 &195A, Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Am very surprised with the taste and pricing.

A combo meal of rice or noodles with lemontea drink each for only rm 10+-.

The taste is very flavorful too.

Our rice portion is huge! Like huge covering the entire plate with fried rice. Sorry my picture shown is after i consume almost of it haha

The asam laksa soup base is very rich! Kaw!

Plus they have various sources/condiment too

And the young chap here is very nice, who served us to the table to be sitted.

Definitely recommended to try out. Value for money especially in a shopping mall. ✌️ | review_rating:2, text:I came not expecting anything bcos at the special promo price for food and drinks, I can't ask for much at an outlet in a mall. But this is really way below my expectations. I gv two stars out of consideration bcos, shop still need to do business. The taste of prawns noodles soup is terrible, I can't force myself to finish. | review_rating:4, text:Lala soup was decent though it went cold very quickly, would’ve been better if there was a way to keep it hot. Assam laksa also nice, value for money with lemon tea at RM10.90 | review_rating:1, text:Was very surprise to see a dead mini cockcroach inside my soup. They've made changes. Serve a new soup. But the experience was terrifying and traumatic. Sanitary measure inside kitchen should be given a full check up. | review_rating:5, text:First time trying here, the Assam laksa is good. Very thick soup with generous ingredients inside. Not too big or too small either. Price is considered cheap even though it's inside the shopping mall. Will come next tie again for the mini hot pot. 👍

reviews: review_rating:5, text:This store has been getting more & more popular with lot of customer for its affordable price, good deal, fashionable, good quality & up to trend. The price of short pant @ RM39, long pant @ RM49 & 3 T-shirt @ RM55 are always the signature good deal, recommend to visit & buy from this store, especially on current globally economy inflation | review_rating:4, text:This shop offers a wide range of wardrobe essentials for men, women, and children. Take a stroll through and you might just discover everything you need for your wardrobe – from casual to career wear, innerwear to accessories. Explore the possibilities! | review_rating:1, text:have staff name sofea very rude after i ask to take new shoes inside stor 😪😪😪. mcm kita freee | review_rating:1, text:Rude staff screaming to us. At fitting area. | review_rating:1, text:Went there yesterday and have to say I feel very uncomfortable browzing through this outlet because their security guards literally tailed me closely from one rack to another as though I'm about to shoplift the moment i step in (assuming because i was alone with a shopping bag). Zero effort in doing it discreetly. Brands Outlet maybe you should really train your guards how to profile people properly. I'm utterly disgusted and offended at their action.

name: BananaBro
location: LG2.85 Lower Ground Two, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I enjoyed my lunch w the set it was fulfilling.
The service was quite fast from 1 waiter man but quite slow from 1 waiter lady which can clearly saw her attitude I'm not certain if she has a lot of things on her plate but it was quite unprofessional judging her from her body posture.

I can see a bit lack of staffing or poor task delegations. The waiter be the cashier and serve the customers at the same time cleans the table. That is why only 4star.

Highly recommended for food but need to have patience for the staff to clear tables and serves customers the food. | review_rating:5, text:I have been to many banana bro branches. I must say the service here is superb. Very friendly staff. Very generous portion that they service. They even reminded me to use my points to redeem free drinks and side dishes.
Will definitely return to this place in future. | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing Experience – Poor Management & Slow Service

I had one of the worst dining experiences at this restaurant. Despite six empty tables, we had to wait 30 minutes just for the staff to clean one so we could sit. The place is clearly understaffed, crammed and the existing employees work extremely slowly—taking orders, serving food, and even handling payments not within stipulated time-frame which leads for congestion and long queue.

Most frustrating and disappointing scenarios is thier very own employee is serving the customers without break time and most of the suffering with empty stomach for accomplishing duty.

The lack of crowd management and efficiency is frustrating, especially for hungry customers waiting for food. If you value your time and good service, this is not the place to visit. Definitely not worth the wait! | review_rating:4, text:Would have given 5 star if not for that poor service. Waited for some time for a table even though there were empty ones but not cleared. One staff had the audacity to ask to move from a bigger table (cleared) to a smaller table (dirty and full of uncleared dishes). She should have the courtesy to clear the smaller table before asking anyone to change table.

Anyway, food was good and portion was generous. Will definitely come back with more people so that I can order more side dishes. | review_rating:1, text:Shortage of staff working when we arrive around6pm during weekend. Table not full but they close to receive customers saying they can’t afford full house customers. Return to try after 1hr then only they open their door. Food serve weren’t hygiene. What I scooped from the cabbage? Seems like bite n spit back. Hav I guess wrongly? Even though they mentioned vegetables  are refillable but only managed to eat one round then no more add on because not enough vege..seriously gonna wait for more than half an hour for refill.. yea no fried veggies to refill even though they said is refillable. Very disappointed with this shop. Only rempah fried chicken was good. Not worthy. Will not return.

name: K Fry
location: Lot OB.K4, Oasis Boulevard, GF, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:It was really good and quite similar with real Korean chicken. I thought the six pcs of boneless chicken will small portion but actually the portion was huge! 100% recommend! Must order anchovies rice ball! | review_rating:3, text:Alright this place absolutely deserves its stars , I was skeptical as anyone is with a new shop. But I decided to order and the service by Raesa was top tier for a busy fast food. As for food I was expecting the least but I was surprised by the flavor one of the best fried chicken in Malaysia (imho)soo crispy but juicy AND flavorful not too salty either. Would definitely visit again to try the other dishes on their menu. Note : I ordered the snow cheese spicy chicken (and the portion was massive). Keep up the service guys.

Editing this review because I have had an upset stomach after trying this place twice but didn’t expect really. | review_rating:5, text:Love the smell and the taste of the tuna rice ball! The cheesy bumbuk spicy tastes good as well but it's kinda too spicy for me as someone don't really can eat spicy.

The service was great! The waiter noticed that I didn't have a fork and bought one for me without me requesting it. | review_rating:5, text:Loved my experience here! First time here and loved the food. The waitress was kind enough to explain to us before we ordered our food. Very delicious! | review_rating:4, text:Service is consider top notch for an averagely priced restaurant in a shopping mall, the food is good, but I find that the fried chicken is a little bit lack of flavor, rice balls and japchae was really delicious, will definitely come back again for more.

name: Sunway Lagoon Hotel
location: Jalan PJS 11/15, Off, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I love this hotel. They are indeed one of the best ones I have gone to so far. The staffs were very friendly and welcoming. The room was clean and comfy. I love the room's view. Just that the room's door is not soundproof so you can basically hear the outside noise since my room is next to the home keeping room. Otherwise this is a perfect place for families to spend time together since they have Sunway lagoon theme park next to the hotel. | review_rating:5, text:Had the pleasure of staying at Sunway Lagoon Hotel. The staffs were very friendly, especially Tayyab. Always helpful whenever we need assistance. Breakfast at the buffet restaurants has an abundance of delicious choices. Would love to return for a stay here. Highly recommended. Keep up the great job! | review_rating:5, text:Awesome experience. Rooms are nice, TV could be better. Right next to a mall, and a theme park, so good for a getaway vacation.Buffet has quite large variety. Probably the best in Puchong/Sunway. | review_rating:5, text:I recently had the pleasure of staying at Sunway Lagoon Hotel, and i cannot speak highly enough about the exceptional hospitality and service I experienced. From the moment I arrived, the staff went above and beyond to make me feel welcome. The check-in process was smooth, and every member of the team was friendly, attentive, and genuinely interested in ensuring my stay was perfect.

The rooms were not only impeccably clean but also beautifully designed with comfort in mind. I appreciated the thoughtful touches, from the cozy bedding to the well-stocked amenities that made my stay feel luxurious.

What truly stood out, however, was the personalized service. The staff always greeted me with a warm smile. It’s rare to find such a balance of professionalism and warmth, and it made all the difference in my stay.

I highly recommend the Sunway Lagoon Hotel for anyone seeking a memorable and comfortable stay. The hospitality here is unmatched, and I will certainly be returning on my next visit. Five stars.. well done.

Specially thanks goes to Mrs.Karen and Mrs.Yukiko for providing a personalized and impeccable experience.

Thank you.. appreciated | review_rating:5, text:We had a very good experience here. The bellhop was very cheerful towards my kids, even playfully teasing them and made us laugh. He was also very helpful and careful with our luggages. Thank you so much for the experience

I didn’t get his name, but his face was shown in this video walking by 😊 in his brown uniform.

Loved the food there ❤️ I was fascinated with the cute donut tree
opening_hours: N/A

name: Putien
location: LG1.43A, Lower Ground 1, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Visited a few Putien restaurants and always enjoy the dishes served. However, recent visit to this particular Putien restaurant located at Sunway Pyramid was disappointing. Perhaps it was due to Chinese New Year that the dishes from the set meal were served in a rush and a few of the dishes were served at the same time.

The table is not big enough and the staff were busy transferring the dishes to smaller plates. It was chaotic and customers were not able to eat in peace. The acoustic was poor and it was really noisy. The squirrel fish was over fried and stingy with the sauce. Would not recommend to dine in this particular branch. | review_rating:3, text:Visited today for dinner. Female Staff taking Q n waiting list is very kind enough to bring me to see the atmosphere of the restaurant .
The food is slightly below average.  The chicken meat is very dry...
Ending our 7-8 courses meal. The guy staff left the order list on the table and quickly keep our dirty / finish plate.
At this moment, felt like they are rushing us...  needed to improve on the service  n food | review_rating:5, text:Love their food very much, it is fresh and very delicious, the service is very good, attentive and thoughtful, and the environment is clean. Worth coming again | review_rating:5, text:Great Fujian Michelin restaurants inside the Sunway Pyramid. Food quality is excellent and well maintained.
There is a meal set that suits 3-4 people with only RM188. We normally will order the meals set that comes with their popular dishes, eg. Deep Fried Squirrel Fish, lychee meat, special spinach, crispy oyster etc. And added a few more side dishes.
The service is good and friendly staff. Their price is on the high side, and it is good for business dining or for some special occasions. | review_rating:5, text:Two of us had dinner at Putien this evening. We decided to have Braised Bean Curd with Chinese Cabbage and Fried Heng Hwa Bee Hoon. The Braised Bean Curd had a simple broth but the ingredients made it very flavourful. Putien is generous in their ingredients content. The Bee Hoon vermicelli is very fine and though the condiments look very basic, it was the best Bee Hoon we had tasted so far. The service by Alvin Lim was really great as he introduced himself to us and said to call on him should we need further assistance. He was very polite and attentive. We ended the meal with a very refreshing and complimentary dessert. We strongly recommend having a great meal with good service at Putien !
opening_hours: Monday: 11:30 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 11:30 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 11:30 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 11:30 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 11:30 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 11:30 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 11:30 AM – 10:00 PM

name: POPI SELL HAPPINESS
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Ukunili Ukulele
location: Level F-PC207, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Life is to be treasured and to be enjoyed everyday. Playing ukulele can enhance joy, peace and happiness. It keeps our mind active remembering ukulele chords, timing and tune. Strumming and singing help to exercise our fingers and lungs. It can improve our reflex action and good health. Playing ukulele also helps us to release stress after a busy day. Let's sing and play  the ukulele. Cheers! | review_rating:4, text:No Review
opening_hours: N/A

name: Ace Hardware
location: Lot LG 2.11, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Bought yesterday. Expired. I should have checked. They should have checked. We all should have checked. | review_rating:4, text:The store initially was near the Aeon store. However, it moved to another area, I think the area used to be a Brand Outlets store. Now it is next to the Daiso. P/S: Daiso moved as well. For some reason, Ace Hardware store always smell unpleasant, maybe because of the hardware they were selling. Every time I pass by the store, the unpleasant smell can be smelled from the outside. Perhaps they can do something about it. | review_rating:1, text:I went there to buy some mouse catcher that day. After a while, I go to the counter to pay for my products. But, at the end I change my mind. I wish to cancel off some of the items which i think i dont need that item. The balded cashier which i believe is one of the manager at that shop (heard one of the worker call him boss) at first did not allow me to cancel and showing very very very bad attitude to me. He ask why am I taking the product when I do not want to buy it. I should have made my mind when I was at the shelf there. I have not experienced this very bad experience with any shop where I cannot cancel product that has not even paid. At the end, I still paying for the rest of my products and left. This is one of my worst experience in my shopping time. I will not recommend my family and friends to this shop. And I won't ever come to this shop again. Thanks. | review_rating:5, text:If you need a good DIY item, browsed before buying, this is the place. Staff are very helpfull and items are layout very well according to the usage. Only 1 comment regarding the staff, one of them care to make a statement that can actually insult the customer intelligence and with that, it shows how he was not prepared for work and did not know the product in store. Kudus to the supervisor who makes time to check the product in question. | review_rating:4, text:My go to place to get items that I cant get anywhere  else like the big tub of distilled vinegar, fel napha soap and such. Service is good though some are not very well verse in the products. Can be quite pricey especially the imported products.

name: Kedai Kopi Malaya
location: LG2.133, SUNWAY PYRAMID MALL, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Hope this brand close down for good. Such rubbish service, staff don't even know how to use the Point of Sales console. No crowd yet took so long for food to arrive and my order was not in the system.
Here is the worst part, uncooked chicken! Egg, anchovies and peanut premade and stored in a large container so hard as rock.

I lost count how many times I had to remind the staff where is my food!

Also... the unimaginable... zero hygiene common sense when serving food...

Please avoid visiting this branch | review_rating:2, text:Teh ice tasteless n bland...worse than mamak resto despite double/ tripple the price. Nasi lemak ayam goreng, now...how can u F up this I wonder, chicken was dryyy despite being drumstick, rice was too wet no fragrance, cheecheongfun not fresh, use of frozen roti canai soaked in oil gosh...need to change chef otherwise surely close down in mall where kakatoo and kopi bungkus kaw is steps away. | review_rating:3, text:There are many food outlets carved out from the previous aeon space which is a good place to hunt for new places to try. This outlet is small size and limited seats, and we just had a drink since we ate beforehand. The drinks are okay, not too sweet. But it took 15 mins to deliver them !!! 😨 mamak stall can deliver within 5 mins and there aren’t many ppl too at the time too which is after 9 pm.  Other than that, we have no complains as maybe that was only an overlook. | review_rating:5, text:First time visit this branch for late breakfast.

Ordered Soto Ayam, Indomee with fried eggs, Butter Kaya Toast, 2 sets of half boiled eggs, Milo ice and Teh O hot - Foods are acceptable. Love their Soto Ayam.😋 Spent about RM60.

The service is good. We used QR ordering - food was served a bit slow due to the crowd and there were only 2 staff (if I'm not mistaken), but Yas apologised with a smile. Thank you, Yas and his colleague. :) | review_rating:5, text:Had brunch at this outlet today.
Food is delicious. We had roti canai, soto  nyonya kuih and fried rice. The cham is superbly creamy. They are having a promo for some dishes@ RM10,  definitely worth it!

name: Ayam Penyet Express
location: Bandar Sunway LG2.86, Lower Ground 2, Marrakesh, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Petaling Jaya Sunway, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I've been patronising this restaurant whenever I'm here in Sunway Pyramid, I bring my friends here too. But I've noticed the drop in food quality.

The chicken doesn't smell and taste fresh. The colour of the fried chicken is dark and dull in colour (as compared to the past, and also compared to other penyet shops).

The dark colour of the chicken doesn't feels alright to me. But since I've ordered, I just finish it, and see what will happen @@.

The sambal also look different too, now very dull in colour, watery and doesn't have the good sambar chilli smell.

I'll try out another shop that is newly open in the mall instead next time. | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing and Unfair Treatment

I had a very disappointing experience at this restaurant. A group of eight people before me was allowed to dine in, but when I, alone, asked for a table, I was refused without any clear explanation. The waitress seemed willing to accept my request, but the cashier refused. This inconsistency in service made me feel unwelcome and unfairly treated. If there are specific policies about solo diners, they should be communicated clearly and applied consistently. Unfortunately, based on this experience, I wouldn’t recommend this place to others. | review_rating:3, text:Delicious and spicy sambal and dish. Need improvement on the fried chicken and fish.
Cozy environment,  good service. Price is good. | review_rating:3, text:Nasi ayam penyet - Dry chicken meat and black bones, taste very plain and dry. Please improve the food quality. | review_rating:5, text:Recommended to try their food, really flavorful and filling. Waitress is really nice and the place is comfortable to eat.

I usually go for the lele but my friend swears by the chicken. It’s crispy and nice and the sambal is really the cherry on top!

Delicious!

name: iORA
location: LG1.06, 07 & 10, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:This used to be one of my favourite shops previously. But now I have to say you provide TERRIBLE SERVICE! ( I went to Sunway Pyramid branch )

The staff completely ignored me—no greeting, no help, nothing. ( Instead they were just walking around and tidying their own dress in front of the mirror )

I was holding several pieces of clothing, and they just walked past like I didn’t exist. Not even a shopping bag offered! So rude and unprofessional.

I went in fitting room to try on, another lady was leaning against the wall and moody expressions could be clearly seen when I walked in. No “THANK YOU” and no any gestures of welcoming customers. Instead I was the one that smile and said thank you!

PLEASE ENSURE THE QUALITY OF SERVICES PROVIDED ARE ADJACENT WITH THE PRICE OF YOUR PRODUCT. THANKS!!! | review_rating:4, text:Shoppers enjoy spacious layout and friendly service at this local women's clothing store. The store is designed to feel roomy and comfortable, with plenty of space to browse the latest fashions. Staff members are helpful and friendly, and there are even a few seats for me to relax while waiting for my daughter to pick the clothes she wants. | review_rating:2, text:I like the store as it is spacious, making it comfortable to browse through the items.
However, the service level seriously needs improvement. The staff were unfriendly and unapproachable, with visibly moody expressions. When I asked a sales associate if the shirt I was holding was available in another color, I received an immediate “no” without any effort to check. When I then inquired about other available colors, the associate asked me to show the shirt again—clearly indicating she hadn’t even bothered to check initially.
I was lining up for payment and there were 3 person in front of me and at least 4 behind me and only 1 cashier is opened.
My friend had the same "unfriendly" manner in another outlet.
Perhaps the management should look into training the staff to have basic courtesy at least if not professional. | review_rating:5, text:not sure about the staffs and services here as i've not visited. but i met a pretty girl at the centre management office on tuesday. not going to say her name. but if she sees this, i hope i can get her instagram account or any social media platforms :) | review_rating:2, text:I’m visiting from US and thought everything was Super cute, but not one person in there greeted me or was kind at all! Rude personal! Reminding me of closing time and made faces.

The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Chez Choux
category: bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.50 (Lower Ground 2 Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I randomly stumbled into this shop while walking around to find food and no cap, it's the best dessert i ate that day. The outer feels so crunchy when you bite it and inside it full of cream. The cream was not too sweet nor bland. Just nice to my taste bud. I like it, and will come again to try other flavours. | review_rating:5, text:Ordered Chouz vanilla and durian musang king. Personally I like it, not too sweet and just nice.

In terms of serving speed, there is room to improve. Have been waiting for more than 10 mins even though it’s only 3 orders ahead me. can see a cashier who also help with filling, one staff handle the filing and another one is baking. So need a longer wait time to my turn. Hopefully they can get more helper during peak hour/weekend. | review_rating:4, text:Recommend Choux cream puff with vanilla custard filling. When freshly baked, is crispy outside and soft and creamy with the filling inside. | review_rating:4, text:The box itself is pretty and so cute. The pastry wow. Just delicious!! | review_rating:1, text:I bought 2 durian and 2 chocolate cream puffs, but they came with 4 original ones instead. Very disappointed.

name: Sakae Sushi
location: OB.K6, Ground Floor, Oasis Boulevard, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Waaaah, happy to see Sakae sushi offering other types of meals than sushi. It shock me to see the food come out this way. Big brand, but presentation and food quality is totally out. Ordered the Sundubu Jjigae RM26 (soup is cook with chilli flakes. Too much, it tends to be bitter), taste like f*&^%.....oooops mind my language, tofu smashed, eggs gone, my jjigae become a pile of vomits (check out my photo & Sakae photo). Kimchi fried rice RM22 (portion was unbelievable small) & finally Kyushu Paitan Ramen Rm20 (Soup terribly oily, noddles overcook, taste wise 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢) . Well, bye-bye & tata to this restaurant. Horrible meal. I seldom give 1 star unless it's really terrible. | review_rating:2, text:Had the worst shoyu ramen today. Soggy noodles, tasteless broth. It's a large portion of noodles, which is usually a good thing for me but with this one it felt like it took forever to finish it because it just wasn't good. Added probably 2 tbsp of their table soy sauce into the soup. It's possible the dish was left too long before it was served, because there was very little soup - maybe all soaked up by the noodles 🙈  Even my husband, who likes his noodles soft, didn't enjoy this.

The kimchi lava fried rice was also mediocre - the rice was mushy (my husband liked it that way tho), not enough flavour so this also had to be eaten with their soy sauce. The "lava" is just a runny egg omelette - you need to top up cheese to get the cheesey effect shown in the photos. At least we got a 20% discount for this dish though.

Service was decent, place is clean and tidy. But never coming back here. Super regret that we decided to try this (enticed by the photos!) instead of going to our regular noodle place 2 doors down. | review_rating:4, text:Less crowd this section of place. Food could be better, but with the quietness of the area, we like to eat it here. | review_rating:4, text:An outlet in the famous Sunway Pyramid Mall. Quality is ok. Design is ok. Staffs look very young. Overall is ok. Most importantly, it looks clean and well maintained. Hygiene is one of if not the most important thing. This is located in a corner area near G2000, which is a little hidden and not so easy to find. | review_rating:2, text:Rather expensive for a sushi restaurant so I thought maybe then it would be good. Albeit the food was okay, the environment wasn't very clean. It looks clean from the outside but small cockroaches are walking around on the table. It really put off the mood to eat. Regretful that I didn't check the reviews before coming here because it seems like it's been a problem for a while. Took a picture despite being grossed out by it.. 🤢

Overall, my first time experience here was not great. Staff was good, food was okay, cockroaches... 👎👎 Probably won't come back until they fix the 🪳 problem.

name: Go Noodle House
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Delicious meat slice and meatballs with savoury soup. Compliments perfectly with the chilly. This outlet has good seatings. Service is fast. Kids meal are great value. Comes with toys too. | review_rating:4, text:Had lunch here.

Indoor full house. So sit outside. It seemed like not enough of staffs. Only 1 staff on the floor.
Sat outside open area with fan. But not hot luckily.

Food was served fast. Just that snacks were served wrongly and the staff discovered fast. Or else we ate it.

Lunch hour quite a lot of customers.
Hope to have more set lunch to chooce. | review_rating:5, text:Crew response very quickly to serve upon our arriving.
University students can sign up their member to enjoy special deals for student.
The menu is improved so much, even more types of soup other than their signature. Now even have nyonya laksa soup base.
Got mi xian, ramen, mi hun and pan mee.
Noodles lover can come here.
They also got set meal, worth to try.
Restaurant is clean.
Aircond enough, and the Chinese BGM is on point. | review_rating:5, text:GoNoodle’s Special Dark Sauce Pan Mee is a must-try! The springy noodles, rich sauce, and crispy toppings make every bite flavourful and satisfying. Pair it with their chili sauce for an extra kick. Comfort food done right—highly recommend! | review_rating:4, text:Pan mee is satisfactory, yet the soup tends to be slightly salty. There's also a preference for more al dente noodles, as the current texture leans towards being too soft.

We always enjoy their bursting meatball mixian; opting for the premium version intensifies the taste.

name: Whisk
location: Level LG1, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Dropby for afternoon tea, ordered their own house blend cafe latte with lemon cake.
7oz latte ice with price RM 14.80 before tax really high and taste really so so, espresso should be more to make it more bold taste.
Lemon cake soft & moisturise, taste good, just a bit sweet, sugar level if reduce 2 steps will be perfect. | review_rating:5, text:Good coffee here and granny apple cake is yummy

Love the banana nut bread too.

Located in new oasis area. LG1.

One level above Jaya Grocer | review_rating:3, text:So did Whisk managed to whisk me away from my usual Zus with its iced latte? At RM15.70 and in a smaller volume, not quite yet. It is fine with its mild bitter aftertaste lingering just briefly to let the milk taste break through. I will however stay with my usual Spanish latte at RM11.20. Sometimes I get two for the price of one. I think Whisk has another one at Mont Kiara and I remembered I had the same iced latte in a bigger glass. Anyway, this is at Sunway Pyramid. | review_rating:5, text:Hands down best coffee I had in a long time. Carrot cake was also really good. | review_rating:5, text:Fantastic vibes and people. The guys here know their coffee. The filter coffee is great. Prices are reasonable. Much better than the other chains coffee around.

name: Attic
location: F1.AV.151, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:A few weeks ago, I went to this earring store in Sunway Pyramid to get my ears pierced. The piercing was done by a female staff member with glasses. I specifically told her I wanted both ears pierced and repeatedly emphasized that the piercings needed to be at the same height on both sides. She seemed very impatient and assured me that they would be even. She then pierced my ears very quickly, took the payment, and said I could leave immediately.

Now that I’m home, I realize they are indeed uneven, and even people around me can notice the difference.

This was my first time getting my ears pierced, and I didn’t expect it to leave such a disappointing experience. I am very dissatisfied with the results and the customer service attitude of the staff at this branch. I hope the shop owner takes this issue seriously, improves staff training, and ensures more patience in verifying alignment carefully before piercing. | review_rating:5, text:Great and fast service! It is definitely more pain imo for helix needle piercing in that first injection for awhile. But bearable. I'd done it at Lovisa and it didn't hurt as bad = different type

Price is also quite expensive. So be prepared if you have $$$
RM90 for needle piercing ONE side
Additional RM49 AND ABOVE for titanium earrings selection that are flat back which is great. This one was about RM179 additional for helix

Overall great experience and will come back if I decide to do | review_rating:5, text:just wanted to update: 0 bleeding, 0 redness! i totally forgot i pierced them when i got back home.

finally mustered up the courage to get an ear piercing for the first time. if you're looking for somewhere sanitary, sensitive skin, first timers, safe, Attic @ Sunway is a good choice.

i paid a total of rm300+ for needle piercing (much better than a gun) for both sides, upgraded to titanium earrings (rm45 each), cleaning spray & the cream. 100% worth it.

the lady with the headscarf & lots of piercings (i did not get her name sadly), was very kind, explained things, friendly, gave suggestions & was sanitary and quick.

i was in & out within 10 minutes, ears pierced & with everything i needed. | review_rating:5, text:My go-to piercing place. This is my third time here and yesterday I went to get a double lobe on my right ear. I was pierced by Aisyah and she was so gentle and nice. The whole thing was done in five minutes. I did change to a titanium earrings and that bumps up the price a little bit. Two lobe piercings with titanium earrings cost me RM268. I also did ask Aisyah if I have the anatomy for a rook piercing and thankfully I did. Next time when I got the courage🤞🏼 | review_rating:1, text:Previously I did my belly piercing at this shop around 2018 which was done by a Chinese lady and it’s still perfectly intact and I didn’t have any reactions nor pain, so I went to the same shop around last year June to do my snake eye piercing, it was a Malay lady who did for me, and she literally pierced my tongue twice!! Cuz she messed up on the first piercing and it was too obvious that it wasn’t parallel, the second time was still wasn’t parallel but not too obvious like the first one😑, I took out the piercing around last year November cuz I was so much in pain and itchiness for the whole time, cuz obviously it wasn’t done properly 😑 it was quite expensive almost around RM200 something but I honestly don’t mind to pay RM200 for a good piercing but it turned out to be otherwise !! I’m never going back to this shop ever again 😑😑 if you’re not well trained then don’t bother doing the job 😑 I feel so mad cuz it was a waste of money and I’m literally traumatised cuz she pierced my tongue twiceeeee😑 and the she has the audacity to tell me that “sengettt sangattt” when she messed it up as tho I did a mistake😑
