name: KRISPY KREME DOUGHNUTS
category: donut_shop, bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Taste not fresh. The donuts need to improve, texture too soft. I ordered half dozen, and almond not crispy, those Oreo/biscoff not fresh.
Good things is buy 6 free 2. But the taste need to improve 🙃 | review_rating:5, text:I just want to compliment their service. the staff called Meera/Mira is such a sweetheart. I had a pleasant experience with her service. Such a warm welcome and she provided very good service to me. | review_rating:4, text:Krispy Kreme Ramadan Treats by @krispykreme.malaysia #malaysia

Krispy Kreme Malaysia 🇲🇾 has come up with 3 superb flavours in conjunction of the Ramadan month 🌙. So we managed to try the ..
-Ketayap 🍩. Based on the local snack “kuih ketayap” which is stuffed with sweetened coconut filling and pandan juice . So yeaaa.. the sweetness does replicate the pandan and the coconut 🥥 filling was a great addition.

-Eid Ketupat🍩. Based on Ketupat prints , which is rice packed inside a diamond-shaped container of woven palm leaf pouch.
The outer layer is colour icing sugar and the inside is a custard cream ... superb bonus 😋

-Almond London🍩. Based on local famous chocolate almond cookies. It has a coat of chocolate 🍫, topped with biscuit and almond crumbles. This is our least favourite among all.

-Double chocolate 🍩. Well this is one of the favourite of all time , Chocolate toppings and chocolate filling 🍫🍫🤟. That’s a double hit combo !!

Happy Friday!!!

#krispykreme #krispykremedoughnuts #ketayap #eidketupat #almondlondon #bestoftheday #klfoodie #klnow #bbcfood #foodinsider #eater #tasty #cafehoppingmalaysia #mycafefood #buzzfeedfood #netflixfood #eatnowkl #bestfoodfeed #worthit | review_rating:1, text:Purchased half dozen of donuts on 3rd August around 8pm. And the staff was ignoring us while we are standing waiting to be served. Not just that, none of them are smiling at all. The worst customer service ever for Krispy Kreme. | review_rating:3, text:I think I prefer Dunkin Donuts than Krispy Kreme.
Their texture, jam, fillings and toppings, all of these, I think Dunkin is better
But I have to say their Powdered Strawberry Filled is nice. The jam wasn’t that sweet and you can eat  some strawberry flesh inside.
Others were just normal.
Price is reasonable.

I bought this One Dozen Assorted Doughnuts on grab, and I only get 3 non-chocolate donuts 🥲
Sweetened chocolate easy to get jelak and seriously don’t know how they distribute the donuts flavor 🥲

name: Lizzie Café & Bakery
location: Lot No. G1.76A, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:While shopping in Sunway Pyramid 2 days ago, I came across this cafe n bakery. It was around 5pm at that time, so the cafe was not that busy as it was past tea time for most of the shoppers. So the tables n chairs around this cafe were almost empty except for one or two customers buying some drinks. Anyway , the shelves where  all the pastries n cakes were displayed , were almost empty. So many of their pastries were already sold out. There were a wide range of different types of drinks such as coffee n drinks on sale. Browsing through the pastries, I chose to buy some pastries to take back home as breakfast the next morning. What I bought was some pastries such as 3 croissants, 2 fruit tarts n 4 slices of cheese cakes, lemon cakes n some slices of fruit cakes. | review_rating:5, text:📍Located on the west side of Sunway G floor, next to Bobbie Brown.

🍰Coffee Basque cheesecake is really good.
Delicious! Very smooth creamy taste, the wet paste I like! No need to chew, it melts in your mouth~ The coffee flavor is super strong, plus enough cream cheese, it's delicious! The sweetness is just right. Recommended!

☕️Hot latte was ok.

🌲environment：
The dining area is quite large. The seats are retro and comfortable.

🧕🏼Service：
The staffs were busy with their own work. If you need anything, just go ask, they would love to help.

🎬2025.2.1 | review_rating:3, text:So happy that Lizzie is now in Sunway Pyramid! 🙌 A sister cafe of Lisette's, it offers an extensive array of pastries and cakes, as well as grab & go meals. A 10% discount is applicable to Sunway students and employees too.

Currently an opening promotion is going on which you can redeem a free coffee by any purchase of 2 items! 🌟

Ordered:
Pandan Gula Melaka Cake 🍰 (RM17)
Looks visually appealing, but the taste was really meh; it had a super strong pandan fragrance which overpowered the cake ☹️ the texture was also dry, seemed like it may have been refrigerated overnight so it didn't taste as "fresh" so there's a mushy mouthfeel. Honestly, could have opted for other cakes instead within a similar price range.

Crookie 🥐 (RM13)
Lizzie's best seller - croissant and soft cookie in one with a thin layer of chocolate spread inside! Not mindblowing, but the standpoint was the croissant, which retained its flakiness throughout; texture isn't soggy too 👍 Not a must try, but it's worth trying if you would like to have a dessert-pastry fusion!

Iced Latte ☕️⭐️ (RM13)
Got this for free as a promotion! Serving cup is bigger than most cafes I have been to so honestly this is reasonable according to price point 😬

Personally visited the first outlet in NU Sentral and my experience was better, probably due to the items I have personally tried. Ambiance wise, the interior is more spacious than the current outlet, plus it's also easier to find seats compared to the current one.

Though Lizzie has both hits and misses, I might return to this outlet again (maybe) to try out some other pastries. | review_rating:2, text:Besides the nice setup here, I've nothing much to say about this cafe. Their ongoing promo "free 1 coffee with purchase of two items" is misleading, and only limited to food. Anyways the staff aren't very sharp or attentive, and the service was so slow. We only ordered 3 drinks no food, considering that we were the only customers.
My dirty matcha latte was so-so, and overpriced for the quality. | review_rating:5, text:Wide selection of quality pastries, cake and meal boxes. Coffee is very good compared to many grab & go places. Reasonably priced, i.e. egg sandwich for rm9..

name: Top Secret Studio
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Jinjja Chicken
location: LG2.47, SUNWAY PYRAMID, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:My sister was right – this place is incredible! I'm a huge Korean chicken fan, and their buffet promotion was perfect for me. But the real highlight was the kimbap – it was exactly what I've been searching for! It's a bit of a drive, but I'm already planning my next visit. Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:One of my absolute favourite places for Korean Food. Please open more branches!

Clean and well lit. Great atmosphere with up to date kpop MVs for entertainment.
Food is always served quickly and there are frequent rotations of promotions.
Staff and cutlery are readily available so no hassle with service.

Highly recommend trying the Chicken Burger and the Rabokki.
The cheese sticks are also amazing.
Kimbab is so-so. Suitable for people with lighter palates. | review_rating:5, text:Lactose-free, egg-free fried chicken in vegetable & palm oil FINALLY!!! No tree nuts used in the fried chicken. Those who have severe multiple types of allergies will definitely find this place a haven😋 unless you’re also gluten intolerant 😭 So please JINJJA , do not change your ingredients. | review_rating:4, text:They served the best Korean chicken I’ve tasted so far. Superjuicyy freshh 🫶🏼portion of drumstick was quite good. I had the soy garlic seasoning nice and not overpowering in flavour. Love the bulgogi beef rice rolls😘 Thumbs up and will be back for more. | review_rating:5, text:really loves their monster sauce. choose this sauce if u like to suffer. monster sauce is spicy spicy.

their fried chicken, chicken burger, seaweed fries, beef bulgogi kimbab, and kpop chicken have been my go to menu since 2021 (if i am not mistaken).

finally had the chance to dine in as i previously order via grabfood. the food quality is consistent. never disappoints.

name: Strip
location: F1-29, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I am a regular customer at Strip Sunway Pyramid and I've always come back because of the professionalism and good service.
My therapist Joeann was amiable, knowledgeable and skilled at her job. She also recommended skincare products without being overly pushy, which is something I appreciate.
Overall, there's a level of comfort and care offered that I value and I'll be returning every time I'm back in town! | review_rating:5, text:I have been to several places for waxing and Strip Sunway Pyramid is on top of my list. Clean and tidy outlet with friendly staff. My favourite waxing therapist is Suki. She’s very jovial, and have good attitude all the time. She always make sure I’m comfortable and relax during our sessions and thus making it less painful and pleasant experience. I also purchased and tried the laser AFT treatment because i’m very comfortable with Suki. I would totally recommend everyone to get her service. This outlet also recently renovated and look so nice and cozy now. | review_rating:5, text:Been coming here since 2017, they have the best services until now. The best therepist is Suki I love her! Very kind polite and gentle when waxing. Alma & Yuri are very friendly and fast to respond my appointment msgs. | review_rating:5, text:Joeann was a great therapist and did the waxing job well. This place is also very punctual in their timing and will remind you of your appointment. Quality of products are always the best here as usual. #votestripfav | review_rating:5, text:Therapist: Joeann
My service with Joeann was excellent! She’s so professional and polite. She made me feel comfortable and was vey quick but efficient with her service! Love love love Strip!!

name: Old Nanyang Coffee
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LOT NO F1.AV.177-181, 1ST FLOOR, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Food was super value for money. Not only the value is there but the taste is good. A great variety to choose from makes the eating experience better for a choosy eater like me or diner with kids. I love the red bean soup, many people can’t cook red bean soup well so it’s hard to find a restaurant with nice red bean soup. The abalone mix roasted meat rice will be the reason why we return again. A feedback for the owner, pls wash table cloth properly, the table we first sat stink, we changed seats immediately. | review_rating:5, text:My family we always hunt for nice or decent Siew Yok (roast pork belly).

This place serves a nice one. It is crispy skin, with the nicely tasty seasoned base. And most important, the meat doesn’t have the after taste or frozen meat smell!

You can see we even ordered extra siew yok to savour again! | review_rating:1, text:1.  Spaghetti (Bolognese)
- The sauce appears watery, pooling around the edges of the plate, which indicates poor consistency.
- The sauce-to-spaghetti ratio seems off, with an excess of liquid making the dish look less appetizing.

2. Chicken Chop with Fries and Coleslaw
- The chicken chop looks over-sauced, which might result in a soggy texture, especially if it's fried.
- The sauce consistency appears thin and overly glossy, which might make the dish feel greasy.
- Fries seem undercooked or lacking a crispy appearance, making them look unap

3. Iced Drink - Ribena Longan
- The iced drink has a murky appearance, which could be due to uneven mixing or dilution from melted ice.
- The lemon slice is visible but seems more like an afterthought rather than a deliberate garnish.

Our dining experience was further diminished by poor service. When we arrived, the waiter insisted on showing us to a smaller table, despite us expressing our preference for a larger one. While we understand that some larger tables were reserved, the staff made no effort to check for other unreserved options that could have accommodated us comfortably. This lack of initiative and effort left a poor impression and made us feel like an inconvenience rather than valued customers. | review_rating:5, text:Came here for a quick lunch. name: Chizu
category: cafe, bakery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG1.08, sunway pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Restaurant Review: A Disappointing Dining Experience

I recently visited this restaurant after being drawn in by a 50% discount promotion. Unfortunately, the experience left me feeling underwhelmed and questioning the value for money. Here’s a breakdown of my visit:

Atmosphere ★★★★☆ (4/5)
The restaurant has a cozy and inviting vibe with wooden tables and tasteful decorations. Since it’s located inside a mall, the air conditioning keeps the space comfortable, making it a pleasant spot to sit and relax. However, the ambiance didn’t quite make up for the other shortcomings.

Service ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
The ordering process is straightforward—you place your order at the counter, and the staff delivers it to your table. While the staff was polite, it took about 10 minutes for our food to arrive, which is reasonable but not particularly fast. The service was average, with no standout moments of hospitality.

Food ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
The food was disappointing overall. The portions were noticeably smaller than advertised, and the quality didn’t justify the price.
•	Chicken Katsu Cromburger ★★☆☆☆ (2/5):
The burger looked promising at first glance, with fresh and soft bread. However, the chicken was tough and difficult to chew, which ruined the dish. I added scrambled eggs and vegetables for an extra RM8, but they were bland and didn’t add much flavor.
•	Chicken Pepperoni Croissant ★★★☆☆ (3/5):
This dish fared slightly better than the cromburger. The croissant was flaky and buttery, but the chicken pepperoni filling lacked seasoning and excitement. It was edible but not memorable.
The overall taste of the dishes felt uninspired, with no standout flavors or attention to detail in preparation.

Price ★☆☆☆☆ (1/5)
This is where things went downhill fast. The 50% discount promotion was misleading—it only applied if you ordered an overpriced drink. I ended up ordering a Bloody Mocha with Cheese for nearly RM17, which was overly sweet and gimmicky. With additional charges like RM8 for scrambled eggs, my total bill for two people came to almost RM78 after taxes. For this price, I expected much higher quality food and larger portions.

Parking - N/A
Since this restaurant is located inside a mall, parking depends entirely on the mall’s facilities. It wasn’t an issue during my visit, but this will vary based on location and time of day.

Final Verdict: Not Worth Revisiting
With its tricky marketing tactics, overpriced menu items, and below-average food quality, I won’t be returning to this restaurant anytime soon. While the atmosphere was pleasant enough, it doesn’t make up for the lackluster dining experience or poor value for money. If you’re looking for better options in this price range, there are plenty of other restaurants that offer superior quality at a fairer price.
Ideal Times to Visit: If you’re still curious about trying this place despite its flaws, visiting during off-peak hours might ensure faster service and a quieter atmosphere.

Legend:
•	★☆☆☆☆ = Bad
•	★★☆☆☆ = Below Average
•	★★★☆☆ = Average
•	★★★★☆ = Good
•	★★★★★ = Excellent | review_rating:3, text:I wished they had an option to make it hot cause it tasted cold and not that crisp. The matcha croissant icing is kinda sweet for my liking, the filling is good and creamy. The ribbon croissant has good taste on the pistachio side but the chocolate side tasted cheap, definitely not high quality chocolate. | review_rating:4, text:Chizu at Sunway Pyramid offers delicious pastries that are definitely on the pricier side, but the taste makes them worth trying. The pastries are fresh, with unique flavors that pair well with their drinks. The service was average—nothing remarkable—but the staff were polite and efficient. The café has a cozy vibe, making it a pleasant spot to relax or catch up with friends. While the prices might deter some, the quality of the food makes it a nice indulgence for pastry lovers. Overall, a tasty experience! | review_rating:4, text:Small cafe in the middle of the mall with an appealing selection of pastries. Tried the original egg tart which was okay! Had an oat milk cappuccino which was quite strong. Food and drinks took a while to arrive but were delivered to the seat. | review_rating:4, text:Having a great banana loaf which served in warm, the taste just fit to buds 😋
Tart and puff not served in hot with a bit disturbed after the banana loaf🫢
Fair price with the service, food and environment 👌

name: Unix Collections
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Aldo
location: Lot 1.93, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This my second time to the store,  Jesselyn is so professional and nice at the same time. She show you anything you wish with kindness without knowing if you are going to buy or not. Jesselyn keep her standard very high.
Salespeople like her need to be supported.
Thank you 🙏 | review_rating:1, text:ALDO a brand with nice shoes collections but unexpectedly I had a very unpleasant shopping experience at Sunway Pyramid outlet on 7th June 2022. I was served by a sales executive (I’ve forgotten his name, a skinny softie Malay guy) I was looking for a pair of sandals, while browsing around, a beautiful and comfy pair catches my eyes.The shopping experience was unfriendly. We are not welcomed by the team at the first stage. Not even a single word or voice from the so called sales executive during attending me. I’m the one who approaching him and asking for the size availability, asking for the ongoing promotions and things lead into the payment stage at the cashier counter. My shopping was less than 10 minutes until the payment stage. It’s just a pair of sandals cost at RM229 (if I’m not mistaken with the accurate price) The guy passed me an iPad without saying anything by putting it on the cashier directly in front of me. When looked into it ,noted that was a CRM customer details membership form and I just fill in the the details. I have doubt with the “password” column. Therefore , I clarify with the staff “excuse me, may I know why & what the password required for? “ It was unexpected that the staff’s attitude was rude instead of explaining to me regarding my concerns, he took the iPad from me directly key in & reconfirm the required password by himself. What an attitude????
Not even saying anything but showing his annoying face and the body signs was so OMG!!!!
It was really a big turn off and ruined my shopping experience! I’ve changed my mind not to proceed the the purchase. I’ll make it short into conclusion, it was unpleasant shopping experience, very rude customer service manners, staffs training not up to the standard in retails & customer service line. I do hope The Management ALDO look serious in this matter as in brand image & future improvements. | review_rating:5, text:Third time i go here to take a look for a shoe, after that salesgirl named jesselyn, answered my enquires that so much help and cause me to accidentally purchase one of the shoe she suggested. With this knowledge of the salesman i recommended to go here to get a consultant by the salesman which give you so much pleasure to shopping here | review_rating:5, text:Great service , they offered to bring down my shoe size which was sold out ,  from another branch ! | review_rating:1, text:I ordered shoes online from aldo the website as a gift for my friend. When received, it was nicely packed so i gave to packed to my friend and didn't check at that time but when my friend opened it in home later. the shoes were used, it was clearly visible from the sole that they were either used or "try shoes". Pathetic experience and very irresponsible

name: 7 Eleven
category: convenience_store, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 5, Jalan PJS 11/28b, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:The 7-Eleven on Jalan PJS 7/18 in Bandar Sunway is a reliable 24-hour convenience store. It's perfect for grabbing snacks, drinks, and essentials at any time of day or night, making it a handy spot for both locals and visitors in the area. | review_rating:2, text:Love the variety of snack options here but be careful of what you get because not everything is fresh. I bought the bagel and it was rock hard even after heating up so I think it must have been kept for a long time. Croffle was hard too. Tried the wedges and I thought the sauce will be separate based on the picture but they actually pour it on the wedges. The cappucino was quite good. Soya bean with konjac jelly was good. | review_rating:1, text:Got a few 7-11 around this area, but I'm talking about the one at the main entrance of Sunway Pyramid. I usually always carry coins with me and the first time I didn't (today), the cashier had the audacity to said 'tsk' and didn't fully give me my remaining balance. he was suppose to give me back 3.80 and he only gave me 3. hello? not everyone's earning money in sleep? so rude. | review_rating:1, text:Never ever buy SIM cards from 7 eleven stores . Outside coke is RM1.80, in 7Eleven, it's RM 3.50.. why? Very costly | review_rating:1, text:There's 3   7-11 shop around Sunway Pyramid, there's one outside Sunway pyramid ,same row with Public Bank / just next to Nasi Kandar Mamak Stall. The cashier always didn't find back my change, sometimes RM1 or a few sen. He just say "no change/ no syiling." He didn't feel sorry at all. I mean its okay once awhile for this kind of unprofessional act. But I was staying here for years at PJS so I know this guy cashier always did this as it's not the first time I dealing this with him.

name: Sox World
location: Malaysia, Selangor, Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, Jalan PJS 11/15, LG1,90A邮政编码: 46150
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Sox World at Sunway Pyramid deserves a full five stars! The service here was fantastic, thanks to the one staff on duty, a super pleasant and patient lady. She really knew her stuff—gave me solid advice on the best socks for what I needed and made the whole experience feel easy and friendly. The shop itself has a great selection, so plenty to choose from without feeling overwhelmed. A small, but awesome spot if you’re in need of quality socks and helpful service! | review_rating:1, text:Staff not friendly. I want to look some stuff but the ladies ask what you want. Been there twice but still the same. | review_rating:2, text:Unsmiling auntie bring son to work. Unreasonable exchange policy. name: Nando's
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The atmosphere of this place is really inviting with its modern and unique interior design. The wooden framework on the ceiling adds a distinctive touch, creating a cozy and relaxed vibe. The lighting is just right not too bright making it comfortable to sit and enjoy a meal for a while.

As for the service, the staff seem efficient and quick in attending to customers, even though the place can get quite busy. The arrangement of tables and chairs is comfortable, with enough space to maintain some privacy. Overall, it’s a great spot to hang out and enjoy a meal with friends or family. The atmosphere and service here definitely make for a pleasant dining experience. | review_rating:5, text:Always loved grilled chicken from Nando’s. During our stay at Sunway pyramid hotel we visited this outlet of Nando’s several times . Service was always satisfactory and food was served quickly so we didn’t had to wait for the food whenever we were in hurry . Alhamdulillah our overall experience was always satisfactory. Tried their burger for the first time and loved it . Would definitely recommend this place in shaa Allah (SWT) !! | review_rating:1, text:Having lunch here after walk around the mall we choose nandos for our lunch.. que was normal but really shocking after get ice chocolate for rm15.90 one serving and bottomless rm7.90.. ice chocolate just normal taste like mamak milo rm3.50 for that price and i really upset on that.. PLUS!! GET FORK LIKE ON THE PICTURE that i almost get the cut on my lips, i cant imagine if my 7 years old daughter had it.. i call your staff regard this and tell her, guest what her reaction??  Just take it and show to her friend and laugh.. funny isnt your client almost having injury with no say sorry and just act like that was nothing. And today the restaurant feel hot and didnt feel the aircondition.. really feel bad experience. . . Mood spoiled whole day event have a good morning time with my family.. food ok but services is hmmm... I AM SO PISSED AND UNHAPPY.. | review_rating:5, text:Everything was great. I went there twice. Food was great, atmosphere was great and staff were amazing. We got a muffin free on valentine's day too. Would recommend! | review_rating:4, text:Tried dinner at Nando's. Tried it several times in other countries, trying to like the sauce. The chicken is good, but not to my taste for the sauce.

name: LAVENDER
category: bakery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2-45 & LG2-46, Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Purchased 1 pandan gula melaka , craving for it so bad but doesn’t meet my expectations. Cake was bit bland , dry and very mild taste of pandan also no kick for the gula melaka | review_rating:4, text:It was terrible when I just tried it at very first time in City Square, JB in 2007, and forget about the outlets in Klang Valley, it was worst. BUT until few years back, when it started opened in Mid Valley, Pavilion Bukit Bintang and now in Sunway Pyramid, it has improved and changed with 360 degree with better taste, texture, more innovative and in trend. But my sister in Singapore is still complaining for the taste in Singapore. Anyway, well done and keep up the good work! Recommend to try the new items- Flat Croissant and Le Crookie, it is delicious to eat together with coffee. The cashier (Malay lady with black tudung) did not ask for membership number even I showed my membership number, when back home only noticed that they is no 10% discount on both new launch promotion item, please train and brief your staff wisely | review_rating:4, text:Seems one of the nicest bakeries in the mall, but still nothing “above”. Tried sweet potato bun - looks nice, tastes like ordinary bun with a bit of sweet potato filling inside.
Hanjuku mini cheesecakes were okay.
Liked prune lapis though. Probably the best from what I got there | review_rating:4, text:One of the better bakeries around.

Decor is clean and simple.

Prices are reasonable where there are lots of choices.

Good place for your daily bread. | review_rating:5, text:My personally favourite bakery in Malaysia. So many options of sweet or savory pastries and they are not boring at all many interesting and new flavours or seasonal variations too. Very soft and fresh. Please check the pictures for more details. I will come back, enjoy 😋

name: SPORTS DIRECT
category: clothing_store, bicycle_store, sporting_goods_store, shoe_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F180,182&183, 1st Flr, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:Sports Direct at Sunway Pyramid provides a solid shopping experience for sports enthusiasts. The store is spacious, well-organized, and stocked with a wide variety of quality sportswear and equipment for all needs. Prices are reasonable, with occasional great deals on branded items. The service was above average—staff were helpful and responsive, though there’s still room for improvement in providing personalized assistance. Overall, it’s a reliable and convenient spot for finding the right gear. Four stars! | review_rating:3, text:Sports Direct at Sunway Pyramid is a great place for sports gear! They have a wide range of sports shoes, clothes, equipment, and accessories at good prices. The store is well-organized, and the staff is helpful. Whether you're looking for sportswear or gear for different sports, this store has it all! | review_rating:5, text:The best customer service received by DIAN, I was soooooo overwhelmed by the shop and did not know what to buy and where to find what I wanted. She helped me find the correct size, colours I liked. She was with me all through and I’m so happy I came here. Will be bringing my sister too 🩵 please ask for her when you go there. So sweet girl. | review_rating:4, text:During my short visit, I received good help in navigating the different variants of the product I was looking for. Even though they didn't have the metallic variant I wanted, I was satisfied with the help I received from the knowledgeable staff. | review_rating:1, text:Doesn't know how to string a tennis racket properly. The string pattern is messed up at the bottom part. They also broke my grommet and its a brand new racket never strung before and the strings are damaged badly like it has been purposely cut (i didn't buy the string from them). I am really disappointed due to the damaged grommet because this particular racket doesn't sell replacements. I wish you can train your staff more instead of causing damages to customers properties now I have to re string the racket and hope the string doesn't snap because of the broken grommet.

name: Hou Duck
location: LG2.129A, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 2 & 136D, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:New food shop located right beside Jaya Grocer. Tried the Peking duck (half), signature fried rice and braised noodle. Food was above average. Very tender duck meat and crispy duck skin. Popiah skin paired with duck sauce, cucumber, leek and crispy duck skin. Braised noodle in Hokkien style was generous with ingredients : prawn, fishcakes and squid

One downside is the fried rice is quite oily. | review_rating:3, text:The roasted duck is super skinny 👀.
The char siu is chewy and delicious.

The waitress seemed very kancheong rushing me to place an order and not giving time to think. The serving time was quite long too.

Overall, it’s considered pricey for the portion they provide. | review_rating:3, text:The whole Peking duck is really worth the value to try.
Whole duck come with twenty pancake (Chun Bing), each pancake with "divider" in between, not like some restaurant, the whole pancake stack together, hard to remove.

Nut the rice doesn't feel like it has any water, maybe the water ratio is not correct.
Noodle are too salty. | review_rating:5, text:Peking Duck: Crispy, Full of Aroma, Juicy & tender
Authentic!
Braised noodles with duck meat: full of wok hei yummy

trio eggs vege: average, small portion

Environment: relatively small as compared to traveling duck (same boss) | review_rating:5, text:Had an amazing dining experience at Hou Duck @ Sunway Pyramid! The Peking duck was simply divine – perfectly crispy skin with tender, flavorful meat. The presentation was impeccable, and the wraps and condiments complemented the duck beautifully. The ambiance was cozy, and the service was attentive. Highly recommend for Peking duck lovers!

name: CK Dental Surgery
location: LG2A. 02-03, LG2A (B1) Floor, Blue Zone, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:bad experience ever this dental.. I waiter for 3 hours.. when i asked what is the estimated time of waiting, and the counter just keep repeating the same thing which is “this is normal for walk in”.. the counter is playing tiktok and ignore me as customer.. as i waiting, there are few customers that are yelling because of this bad services too waiting without proper timing! will not come here.. there are lot of dental way better.. | review_rating:5, text:Recently had a root canal(4 roots) & crown done by Dr Siow who did an excellent job. I highly recommend him because he never rushes & explains in detail the task at hand. If you have a fear of dentist, he will calm your anxieties. He works out of Sunway Pyramid & Sunway Velocity. All who work at these 2 locations are very helpful too. | review_rating:4, text:Highly recommend Dr Liew here !

As a patient, i feel like she is super professional and provide all solutions to me, analysis good or bad then let me choose.

She make me feel comfortable and dare to ask all questions about my teeth. Even i bring my father come here to check his teeth, my father has good feedback to her too. | review_rating:5, text:Dr. Joanne is a very kind, smart, and intelligent dentist. She understands quickly what the patient wants and does things that are exactly what the patient needs. I want to recommend CK Dental Clinic at Sunway Pyramid. Dr. Joanne is the dentist you can rely on, one of the best dentist in Malaysia. | review_rating:5, text:Dr Siow is a nice and patient doctor. He’s also very friendly and soft spoken. Recommend this dental clinic to solve your teeth problem. This is definitely a good choice for you. 👍🏻👍🏻

name: AmLife
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Dragon Silver
location: F1.71, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:the staff are super rude here, especially the older lady that works here. was going to get my piercing done here but she was so rude and unhelpful that it convinced me to go elsewhere | review_rating:2, text:got my earlobe piercing done here, i usually don’t even do reviews but i was really unhappy ;  sorry to say, the older aunty has a very bad attitude, she didn’t even want to admit that she pierced wrongly and was angry after i told the other staff (she also saw me checking that i wasn’t happy with it after I paid and then just went inside the back room and didn’t come out until after) she did the marking but pierced behind it, and said that’s how it’s suppose to be.. then why do the marking if you’re not going to follow it ? thankfully the other younger girl with her was much better and was kind enough to re-pierce for me again..for how cheap it was i would only recommend the place if the younger girl was doing it for you…if not then you’re better off going somewhere else lol | review_rating:5, text:Did my earlobe piercing through needle today. Staff in charge was super friendly and helpful in explaining the process. She was very careful and also told me how to take care of the piercing. Really recommend coming here if you want to do needle piercings! | review_rating:1, text:If you get your piercings here beware. They dropped our piercings on the floor TWICE and after a quick spray they wanted to pierce my friends ears with it. We refused and demanded a new sterile package to be opened and they just popped the dirty old piercings back into the package for the next customer. Please think twice before getting pierced here. | review_rating:1, text:Not recommended if you want to do your piercing here. So unprofessional. They didn’t even mark the piercing part and just pierced it randomly, so my pierces now are not balance at all, and it’s hurt! I’ve done several piercings before, but this one is really painful even though already few hours passed.

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Although the girls are really kind and pleasant, the male staff member may not comprehend the concept of personal space. When I visited/shopping there, he stayed so close to me that it seemed like I intended to steal their clothes. All I want to do is pay, okay?? | review_rating:2, text:Staff service are good but the bosses service is very bad and also bad altitude.
The clothes looks nice but ONCE you wash the colour fade off. YES ONLY ONCE. The price is not match with quality. 👎 | review_rating:1, text:I really like to go this place and buy clothes but there is one time i was looking for male jeans for my brother and there is one old guy server which i believe is the manager(?) Apparently he compared the jeans with hype. He said that the jeans is in a good quality and cheap than hype. After i went to this place i go and check the quality at hype which apparently is better and stretchable. Hype is expensive but is in better option. I like romp design but the same guy keep showing me other design that i hate. He said the price is higher because the quality is good. But i went to other shop and found a same design with a cheaper price and mich more better quality. This server is very  annoying. Because i want to try the clothes that i choose but he always comeback and bring other design. I hate the mathcing pair. I want to choose my own  clothes 🙄 i hope they let us breath and choose whatever we want to wear🙄 | review_rating:1, text:I just saw a review and i had a same experience as the person who made the review. The same old server keep pestering me even when i say i would like to walk around myself. I also notice that some of the tshirt had the same design but different writing which i find ridiculous. There is one time i bought the skirt and i thought he would give me a new one. But he gave me the display and i hate it so much. I heard the staff ask if she would take the new skirt for me but i saw the guy say no need. But thankful the staff get me a new pair of skirt and change the one the guy had pit at the counter. I hope they didnt do this again because it is the same as fraud and lie to the customer. | review_rating:4, text:The quality and design of the skirts and jeans is best and reasonable , but the service is too hard sell , i just want to look and see to carefully thinking what to buy bcos they are variety of choices , then got 1 female aunty keep hard sell me to buy all , these makes me frustrated as i have budget

name: Famous Amos
category: confectionery, bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2K12 & LG2K12A, Lower Ground Two, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, 46150, Bandar Sunway, Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:I love shopping at this outlet as there are variety of gift collections. Unfortunately, staff named Yasmin was a bit rude to me. I accidentally stand in her way, and she did a smirk and annoying sound to indicate that she is irrirated. When i wanted to pay at the counter, she only stare at me, and waiting for her team member to assist eventhough she clearly saw that her tm going out for break. Service 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 | review_rating:1, text:Staff named Yasmin is extremely rude. I wanted to pay in cash but the store did not have any coins to give me my change. I didn’t have coins either to which Yasmin then responded “well what do you want me to do” and stared at me waiting for me to provide a solution. In the end she cancelled the purchase. | review_rating:5, text:Ordered a lot of cookies n needed to pack nicely with ribbon.
We came during the late evening, took them 3 hours to do. This is the biggest order, according to the outlet.
They did OT until 11.30pm without complaining. When we came to collect, everything was packed nicely. And can see that they're very tired. But still put on a smile when they hand us the cookies.

Thank you very much for the best customer service ever by the 2 Malay girls🙏🏻❤️
Thanks to them, we are able to get all of the cookies gifts for the next day's event. | review_rating:1, text:this happened 2 months ago. There was 2 cashier, 1 malay girl and another one too (i didnt pay attention at this person). So this malay cashier was at the counter and i asked her this cookie, before she even proceeded to scoop out the cookie she showed attitude. It was ok i let it brush out but the simplest thing as a worker in a any store need to be patience right but this girl as if she dont want any customers she straight up says the bill. What the hell?? Without even asking “is there anymore else maam” , not even that she just said this much (to pay) hello i can buy the whole shop if i wanted to do it. There is no manners or whatsoever. Just because i were choosing much more, she removed the glass window (which is normal i understand) but she literally banged that down (glass window) :) i just stared and just start pointing out without speaking because i reallly dont like her and her attitude/manners. Then during payment finish she didnt hand out the cookies instead bang it on the counter. There is a difference of just putting down and slam/bang on it. I can hear that sound of bang. I really lose my shit on there and wanted to scold her. I had endured every stages she has showed me , not necessarily to bang my cookies which I bought in MY MONEY not hers at all. We are the one paying her, if she cannot show a proper service dont work lah. Why are you making yourself a joke to the public. Even you have a major problem in home dont show that in your work place, work place is not a space for you to release your anger especially to your customers. I did not scold her and decided to stop going to Sunway Pyramid Famous Amos outlet anymore. This malay girl was wearing a glasses , i didnt saw the name but yes she was really a bad cashier. Better fire her. If she is not treating her customers well then no need to work. Very bad service. | review_rating:1, text:Both of the staff are very rude especially Yasmin. Keep on throwing things and seems annoyed whenever I asked about the products. Very very rude even had the audacity to scold customer zzzz. Very unprofessional

name: Rocku Yakiniku
location: LG 1.43, LG 1, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:I wanna highlight the food and live band were really enjoyable, but the service left me feeling disappointed. After ordering, I waited over 10 minutes for my food, only to then wait an additional 10 to 20 minutes when I asked for a new grill net because the one in use was charred with black coal, which I feared would affect the meat. The   Despite repeatedly ringing the service bell, no staff member attended to my table until half an hour before our allotted time was up, as the staff ask us to make the last order because there is a lot of customer are coming in as he said which make me rushed to make the last  order. This hurried approach felt completely unjustified, especially considering the 6% service tax I had already paid is it worth it? | review_rating:5, text:We chose this restaurant for dinner on a Wednesday afternoon, and the kebab was very tasty, with some of the sauces marinating the flavours. But I personally liked it best plain without the seasoning. The gentleman who served us was also very responsive! Changed the charcoal for us and was very appreciative of the service. Will be back next time! | review_rating:5, text:From the cozy, Japanese-inspired decor to the sizzling grills at each table, this Japanese grill offers an unforgettable experience. We ordered a selection of meats, and the quality of every ingredient was top-notch. The beef was incredibly tender, and the rich, marbled flavor paired perfectly with the house sauces. Maybe due to shortage of staff and not able to attend to us immediately and need to call for 2-3 times.However, I still highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for an authentic Japanese grill experience with buffet style, eat as much as you can! | review_rating:5, text:I’d like to take a moment to share my experience:

1.    This was my first time dining at the restaurant.
2.	I was particularly impressed by the front counter staff member, Nicole, who provided an excellent introduction to the menu. Her friendly demeanor and warm smile made the experience welcoming, and she explained the menu thoroughly, understanding customers’ preferences and offering tailored recommendations. Her attentiveness and professionalism in promoting the dishes contributed to a positive first impression.
3.	Regarding the dining experience, there was one point of dissatisfaction with the garlic butter side dish. Although I ordered garlic butter, it arrived without any butter. I requested it a second time, but unfortunately, it was still served without butter. I also noticed a customer at a nearby table sharing similar feedback with the staff.
4.	When I mentioned this issue to Nicole, she was genuinely surprised and expressed her intention to relay the feedback to her supervisor. Her responsiveness and willingness to address the concern, despite it being a minor issue, were greatly appreciated.

Overall Impression: Aside from the missing butter, the overall dining experience was enjoyable, thanks largely to Nicole’s kindness and helpfulness. Her proactive approach to resolving the issue demonstrated her commitment to customer satisfaction. | review_rating:3, text:I was here 23/12/24 and i came here to eat at 2.22pm till around 4.15pm. When i came here there were some tables not being cleared.. and some of the other tables were still with customers eating.. ok Fine.. as i was eating, i saw more and more tables that were left uncleared till i feel the whole restaurant was like a dumpster.. on top of that, the service was slow. I am not sure what these staff were doing but tables that are uncleared SHOULD not be left unattended but still can welcome new customers to come into the restaurant.. plus, the trolley that is used to collect the plates and cutleries were left where customers are eating.. this for me is unacceptable.. the food is good here.. but this is shocking for me! What the hell is going on?

name: Focus Point
location: LG2.06 (A), 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The sales assistant  Aliyah was amazing.. so amazing we went to three other shops ..but still came back to her. And eventhough she didn't  have the design  we wanted in the premise.. she found it and ordered the exact one. Plus this store gave us a 50 percent discount | review_rating:5, text:I went here to get my eyeglass. The lady who served me was very polite and helpful. Focus point have good selection of frames, from affordable ones to expensive ones.

They have wide selections of lenses too. You can easily customize your eyeglass according to your specs and budget.

I got my eyeglass within 2 working days. Very fast service.

Located at LG2.06. You can get there from the main entrance lobby, take the stairs 2 floors down. | review_rating:4, text:"Attended by staff member Kar Soon, who was very pleasant and provided excellent service. I'm very happy with his assistance." | review_rating:5, text:I went to Focus Point Sunway Pyramid to buy a new pair of reading glasses.   I was advised to have my eyes checked thoroughly.  Mr. Ben and his team members are so knowledgeable and explained to me with excellent customer service.  I didn’t feel rushed and took a  longer time to get the perfect lenses for my eyes.  They also have a great selection of quality frames, great advice and make sure everything is correct and good with your new glasses.   They will advise you to try frames until you find the right pair without any pressure to buy them that fits your budget.  It is highly recommended to come here for excellent customer service and quality frames.  Looking forward to coming again!! | review_rating:5, text:I am a regular Focus Point customer and have visited their several stores around Klang Valley. The staff is always very polite in every store. However, my experience with this particular store was amazing. I interacted with Ben here, and I must say he really knows details about glasses and understands customer service very well. Keep up the good work. Highly recommended.

name: Sushi Zanmai
category: sushi_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: OB2-L1-01, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:3, text:The Ebidon was disappointing. The egg, which should have been a soft-cooked egg spread over the rice, felt more like a boiled egg. Additionally, the batter on the fried shrimp was soggy and lacked crispiness. On top of that, there didn’t seem to be enough staff to serve customers efficiently, which affected the overall dining experience. I hope the restaurant can improve on these aspects. | review_rating:5, text:Went during weekend, the table is unattended by waiter due to lack of staff so we have to wait for table quite a while. Service is great. Food is delicious and exceptional like always. The Spicy Ramen (S) is quite filling together with sushi moriwase. | review_rating:5, text:Sushi Zanmai food never disappointed. Menu prices start from RM15, good food at affordable pricing! Friendly staff as well | review_rating:1, text:Not children friendly, why can't you have a place to wash hands? Staff asked us to go out to the toilet, on top of that slow service. Also, i dont understand why many sushi joints dont populate the belts with sushi, this one worst so far, only 2-4 sushi at any one time during peak period. Ordered Food taste ok2x. | review_rating:1, text:please tell me the condition of the food. dont just serve it. u can obviously see with nakêd eyes that it is still frozen. from the chef to the server. both ignore that weird looking sashimi and still serve it. i dont mind to change my order or etc. staffs were chitchating so loud too. hope u can improve the quality of your food and SERVICE thanks.

name: Skechers
location: G1.91, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a good experience buying here. Got to be a member since I spent more than rm250. The sales assistant were helpful to my enquiries. I got 50%off on second item. Some of the shoes are cute! And for sure comfy | review_rating:5, text:Always my choices place if I want a pair of Sketches . This week got special promotion , whole store all item 50% discount . Queue from morning till evening , especially weekend is crazy for everyone. For people want to go in to bought a pair of shoes during weekend, you need to queue up at least an hour before you had chance to go in for a pair of shoes. Lack of staffs to handle you during weekend as they just too busy to look for shoes stocks in store room. But anyway , Skechers always my first choice of casual shoes wear if compared to others . As the comfortable level of the shoes always on tip top .Well do ne and keep it up 👍💪👍💪 | review_rating:5, text:Thanks Viviana for the amazing service and friendliness! My aunties had a great experience here because of you. | review_rating:1, text:I'm here to convey something about an employee at skechers there are two people who look me up and down and they laugh at my mom like why do they want to laugh at my mom? they are not qualified to work there I hope skechers Sunway pyramid take action against the two workers I don't remember their names but I remember their faces one wears a hijab and the other is a man I hope you take action🙏🏻🙏🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Skechers are my mom's fav brand so obviously when she needed a new pair of walking shoes, we had to come back here.
The staff was accomodating and they do limit customers in their store.

name: Digi Concept Store
location: LG2.69, Lower Ground 2 Floor, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:As usual pathetic services from Digi. Only 1 person/counter that could give numbers on a Saturday noon and the queue is super long. The same counter spends a lot of time answering queries to customers while there are dedicated counters for it. I see a lot of unhappy customers. Another man questioned them. But their response was yea, just 1 counter. Could do better. | review_rating:1, text:I don’t understand the hospitality of the staff here. I was sitting on one of the chairs while waiting for my number to be called. Then this one staff just turned out from nowhere and asked me to move to other spot because she needed to call out another customer’s ticket number. There were so many empty spots. Instead of asking your customer to move, why didnt the staff move instead? Other than that, I was requesting to transfer to other provider. The staff who served me did not even try to persuade me to continue using their services. I found out that there were competitive packages offered by browsing through a file on the side, but not even one word from the staff l. I guess the file is only for decoration purpose. Great way to keep business up by losing customer. | review_rating:1, text:Horrible and ridiculous ticketing system with no info provided. The staff with tablet gave a ticket number but only 1 counter was in service, it takes 15mins for 1 number to be called. In fact, there are several other staff at no-number counters that moved through customers more quickly than the ones who got the ticket number. Insanely inefficient and punishing system. | review_rating:5, text:Excellent customer service by one of your staff name Shakti. At first they ask to take Que and it take sometime but He able to fullfill my inquiries and change my e-sim without need to wait for counter Que.I understand maybe they still not renovate yet as I went toTTDI outlet before and just scan for QUE.TQ Shakti, superb | review_rating:5, text:Mr Shah and Mr Suffian endeavour to help me to set the correct APN settings for Digi Broadbsnd and the speed is fantastically fast

name: Al-Ikhsan Sport
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:with in sunway pyramid lg2.
very nice and well decorated shop.u can try as many as u can before buying! staffs r very helpfull | review_rating:1, text:Came back after 10 years, and the staff's attitude is still just as bad as it was back then | review_rating:1, text:1st time bought tidbits that are stale compare to other places and the staffs there doesnt even bother to serve you. Standing at the counter with black face waiting you to pay and go. Never gonna visit this place anymore again. | review_rating:4, text:Good place to have dry fruits, jelly type chocolates, biscuits,nuts here. There are lots of varieties here.

It's within the sunway pyramid mall.

Here dry fruits, chocolates are not packed you can take as much you want, it's sale as per gram basis. | review_rating:2, text:My pumpkin seeds & sunflower seeds “masuk angin” already, not crunchy. And one pack the lady didn’t seal properly, the seeds dropped everywhere. Expensive place to purchase candies too.

name: Shake Shack
category: hamburger_restaurant, american_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: OB.K2, OB.K3 & OB.K3C, Oasis Boulevard, Main Entrance, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Second Shake Shack outlet in KL, had the Double Shack Burger, 50-50, and the fries. Burger had sufficient crust and the meatiness came thru. I appreciate a burger that’s more about the meat and cheese and less about the sauce it’s drowned in. Was better than the one in TRX.

Fries were fresh, crispy and well salted but I’m not a fan of crinkle cut. The 50-50 had a strong lemony taste with a hint of tea. Not too sweet.

Overall not too bad, though go into it like you’re getting a burger at a sit down restaurant, not fast food as the prices are definitely not cheap. | review_rating:2, text:Honestly expected a lot from a burger for this price range I mean its not five guys lol.

Taste was average or should I say no taste at all ? Loads of meat does NOT equal to good food.

Exorbitant price for the burger and it comes on its own ? Bro are you serious no sides I mean at least should mention that on the menu so that we can order the sides together.

Well tried both the normal fries and cheese fries both were below average.

Nothing in particular that stands out except the hype.

In short doesn’t taste like what it looks like. | review_rating:5, text:Located at the entrance of Sunway Pyramid. This is the second Shake Shack American burger restaurant in town (1st outlet at TRX).

The burgers here looks small in size but really packs a punch! Their signature smoky flavours makes it quite hard to stop eating as soon as you take the first bite. Go for their hot favourite  "Double Shack" burger and addictive crinkled cut fries. Hot dog is on the menu too.

Wonderful experience with each and every bite! Definitely worth returning. | review_rating:3, text:Not the best, but certainly not the worst burger joint either. Would say that I'd rate Shake Shack a little higher if the prices wasn't so outrageous.
I ordered the Avocado strraky beef burger. Taste-wise, I do l like their burger buns, but the burger itself was lacking any smokeyness or flavor. The ice cream, was just like any other ice cream. And lastly the Malaysia-exclusive Bunga Raya Shake, which was way too sweet too the point that I couldn't finish it.
But other than that, service was great, and the whole place had a nice vibe to it. | review_rating:2, text:I wouldn’t say the best burger in town. I only love the fact the crispy beef streak was good and the burger is juicy and not greasy. The hotdog was hard and dry. I can’t say I like the shake, too sweet and not thick enough. I didn’t taste the malt. The fries is a big disappointment - just a normal frozen store bought crinkle cut fries and comes with the broken small bits. With that price, should be a fresh thick cut real potatoes.

name: Myfeet
location: LG1.116C, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I have been shopping with MyFeet for many many years... it was such an unpleasant experience today as I went there to get another pair as mine spoilt after 1 year+... all these years it was the male store assistant serving us... this time he was busy with other customer... so the female store assistant served us... she showed horrible customer service... as we are browsing around.. she had no intention to serve at all... I asked her for my size, which one got stock she just pointed but we saw there was another design of the size we needed on display so took and put on.. asked her can we have that... she just answered rudely "I told u no stock, that is display!".. we tried to be patient and ask so which got stock? She again answered rudely "I told you already only this design"... so we asked which one? She just kept saying "I told u already!!"... so we asked her, can't you just tell properly and at least let us try since u already have limited stocks.. she still continued to mumble "I already told you!"

This is really truly disappointing... this is a good shoe but with store assistant like that, it is just horrible!!! I hope the management takes action on this!!! | review_rating:1, text:Bought a pair of slipper back in February this year. And the slipper broke. Went for an exchange for a brand  new pair in June. It broke again. Such bad quality for a slipper worth RM299?. Will never buy again. Not even a cheap slipper and it can only last 3-4 months. On top of this, they don't even provide free repair | review_rating:5, text:Mr. Sofian was very polite, helpful, and knowledgeable 🙏 | review_rating:5, text:We were amazed with the service the male sales person offers! He explained everything about our arch and how important for us to wear a sandals with good support.

Customization soles is also available here at around 400++, which takes about 1-2weeks. Whilst other sandals are priced at RM299.

The male sales assistant also showed us what exercises to do, and run analysis on our feet (flat feet/high arch also show us which designs suit for bunions), explaining how myfeet can help our condition.

Thumbs up! | review_rating:1, text:I have been buying MyFeet sandals for  years also but I find the quality nowadays is not good .
The sandal base
tend to open up after a few months, I even got 2 pairs that broke into 2. As I always buy and keep a spare pair of sandals, recently I wore the new pair, after walking at the shopping complex for 2 hrs, the base came off. Omg I had to slowly inch my way to the car park to change to another pair of sandals.
The outlet in Sunway Pyramid says they don't repair anymore. I took to the roadside cobbler, he told me MyFeet sandals he can't glue as he has experience glueing them and a week later customer brought back to him after it came off again.
Now I don't know where to send for repairs as this is a new sandals that cost RM299. I hope MyFeet can advise.
I have another 2 old pairs where the base has also open up.😡

name: Kebab King
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:First time trying so ordered chicken kebab and requested for add on chicken RM6 but I’m shocked to see the amount of chicken given! I spent RM11 for the original kebab and RM6 for the add on. Unbelievable! Small chicken bits and it’s really daylight robbery. Will not buy again. Very disappointed. | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to take away something quick for child on the way back home. This must be one of the worst kebab purchases I made locally. RM11 and it contains little chicken (taken from some Tupperware, not cut in front of you), hard bread and last minute 'put into toaster' action. Basically threw it away, regretful purchase. Nothing against the 'foreigner' manning this kiosk, it's just not worth it. Any Subway is few hundred times better. | review_rating:1, text:This shop used to be my favourite back then. But recently came here for beef kebab + extra kebab + canned soft drinks that cost me RM30 (I didn’t take the receipt since I always came here). The kebab doesn’t really taste like meat kebab. More to kebab with chilli sauce & a lil bit of cabbage. I don’t know why its getting so expensive but they don’t maintain the service. How can you put extra charge and reduce the meat at the same time. It’s not worth it. RM30 can get better food elsewhere. Sila mereput. Bye. | review_rating:1, text:Bought meat kebab. Got only vege with lots of sauce. Very less meat portion. Pricy. A few years back was better.Now not worth it at all! The owner must have told the staff to make like a million kebabs from the small portion of meat. Look at the photo. Hardly can see any meat. Not gonna repeat ever. | review_rating:5, text:I understand they have to reduce meat because of rising costs and rent. Those who rely on a fixed income (makan gaji) will never understand. So, in order to get the same taste as 20 years ago, I will order 'extra meat'. It tastes so good! It's difficult to find a kebab stall that bakes its bread.
