name: Nail ShahSo
location: LOT F1.AV.173 &175 (First floor) Sunway Pyramid, Blue Atrium , Asian Avenue, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I NEVER NEVER NEVER have experienced such a scam in my entire life! This service is the worst service you can imagine, it's literally STEALING from customers! HOW can clients be charged so much for such poor service!
I asked for a basic manicure for 48RM, I was far from imagining that this only included nail trimming, no foot soaking, no cleaning, no filing of heels! absolutely nothing, just cut nails, file nails! when I asked the lady who did the pedicure if my feet should not be filed and if it was included in the pedicure, she told me yes but that my heels are hard, so she recommends the medical pedicure (88 RM) rather than the basic one! I thought it would be better, it was worse! She attacked the skin on my feet without wetting them or cleaning them, she just put a tiny bit of emollient product for the heels which she left on for less than 2 minutes, that's all, and she removed the calluses using a special blade. No scrub, no wash, no mask, no massage, no filing, in 15-20 minutes everything was finished and the cashier charged me for 2 pedicures! I paid for 136 RM for just cutting my nails, buffing them a little bit and cutting the callus wich is a scandal! It’s not about money, it’s a question of principles, and it was extremely disappointing!
And by the way : zero hygiene, zero professionalism, zero service, zero skills. | review_rating:5, text:Fantastic nail service
Na Na actually understood my requirements I was so happy as I wanted same color
Excellent job by Susan
I recommend this nail parlor 👌👍 | review_rating:5, text:I do manicure and pedicure at Sunsuria Forum Setia Alam few years ago. Really love the service. I used halal nail color for my nails. | review_rating:5, text:I saw my girlfriend’s nails and feet after her manicure and pedicure, and they look amazing! She’s super happy with how they turned out. Her nails look neat, and her feet are so soft. She’s definitely feeling relaxed and pampered. I’m really glad she had such a great experience! | review_rating:5, text:Had such a relaxing and wonderful experience at Nail Shahso! The staff was friendly, professional, and paid great attention to detail. My nails turned out beautifully, and the whole process felt so pampering. The ambiance was cozy and clean, making it the perfect place to unwind.

Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for top-notch nail care. Will definitely be coming back! 💅✨

name: Stellar
location: LG1.22, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:i had an amazing experience getting my piercing done at Stellar Jewellery Shop! The staff provided excellent service. They were very knowledgeable and gave great suggestions on the best materials to use, also explained the aftercare process clearly, ensuring I felt comfortable and confident in taking care of my piercing. The whole process was smooth, professional, and hygienic. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking to get a piercing! | review_rating:2, text:Brought my 3 years old daughter for ear piercing today. Wanted two ears to be pierced at the same time so that it could be done at one go. They marked the piercing area first. To my horror the junior staff pierced higher than the marked area. We had to remove the piercing and pierce another time. In total 3 times.  This traumatised my poor child. They claim they are professionals in piercing children's ears. They can't even pierce according to their markings. Paid a very high price for this just to get my daughter traumatized. | review_rating:5, text:Had my second piercing done here. Staffs are very friendly and helpful in their recommendations. They also teach you how to take care of the piercing. Good experience. | review_rating:5, text:This place has incredibly helpful and pleasant staff! I was worried about getting my ear pierced because I have sensitive skin, but the staff was really helpful in providing information on the items and materials.

Fear not, every stud is inside the cartridge itself, which is dispose after each piercing and is extremely sterile and hygienic.

To make sure the piercing is taken care of, I also received a complimentary aftercare package that includes a small bottle of lotion and a monthly check-up for 3 months so they can keep an eye on your healing process!

Really recommend this place for ear piercing!🤍 | review_rating:5, text:I had my first piercing experience here, and I have no regrets about this! I got both my earlobes pierced at the same time by 2 ladies so that I didn't want to feel the pain twice lol. However, it didn't hurt as I had expected. It took only 10 minutes or so for the whole process. Thank you :D

name: Arokaya House (Thai Traditional Massage)
location: LG2 110,111,112, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Not recommended this place. They didn’t ask at all whether we would like to have male or female massager. Very unprofessional. Not to mention the massaging skill. Overall unsatisfactory | review_rating:5, text:Was serviced by Lu and my mum by Bong. They were very very polite and professional. We felt so comfortable and they managed to target all the severe spots. Make an early booking for these two masseuse. | review_rating:1, text:Very harsh massage. And the masseuse keep talking with the lady next room, it was not at all relaxing. And the staff at the reception wasn’t friendly. | review_rating:1, text:Wouldn’t recommend this place.
I was told by the receptionist lady that there was no masseuse available, so I thought a masseur would do because I had requested a 1 hour head, shoulder, and back massage. I told the lady to tell him to avoid from the sensitive areas like the chest and underarms.
We agreed & proceed with the payment.

However, there are a few things that have severely disappointed me:

1. The masseur asked me to lie face down and begin with leg massage. I was confused and asked him, but his response was brief: "wait" till he focused on so much of my hip, at which point I asked if he could start with head and shoulder massage?

2. When we continue with the head and shoulder massage, he tends to “massage” my chest, which makes me feel so uncomfortable that I have to stop him right away.

3. He assumed the massage was 30mins instead of 60 mins until I ask him to double check with the receptionist again.

4. I think they need proper training / professional training, comparable what he has done on the right side, but it was different on the left. Either too much emphasis on the right or only for a short time on the left.

5. Overall experience was really bad due to poor communication. Even if you ask a basic question, either no response or unable to communicate. The massage was ineffective as it did not help on my stiff shoulder and heavy head. | review_rating:4, text:Good massage after long day walk in Sunway pyramid shopping mall. Not cozy environment but reasonable price if compared to Thai Odyssey

name: Zirconia
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: YEAST
location: Yeast, Lobby Level, Sunway Pyramid Hotel, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:[too rich ah]
1) overall - decent cafe offering plenty of selection such as coffee, butter croissant, pastries, onion soup, mushroom truffle risotto, egg Mayo croissant, pulled beef brisket and many more, great place to hangout with friends, Yeast is located @ Sunway Pyramid Hotel
2) latte - great taste and great coffee
3) baked eggs - tasted good, loved the baguette underneath the sauce, soaked well and flavourful, perfect runny eggs
4) cheesy bacon omelette - tasted alright, pretty decent and normal
5) egg benedict (Oeufs Benedictine) - simple bread on the bottom, top it off with 2 poached eggs and Bearnaise sauce, it was not as good | review_rating:4, text:Note:
1) located in Sunway hotel, lobby area
2) very peaceful environment for chillax
3) variety of breads and pastry available for breakfast, lunch items (hot food) available from 11am

This is an amazing venue for weekend breakfast, very relaxing! 🤩 The coffee art is  really fabulous, the level of detail is beautiful especially the peacock 🦚

The breads and pastries are lovely and fresh. We ordered the basket but could not finish, the waiter kindly helped us pack for take-away 😁

There were not many ppl there, maybe it was too early. Felt like we were on holiday for the morning 😊 | review_rating:5, text:Absolutely love the food here ! French fare in a spacious hotel lobby setting . Although the menu here is smaller than their main branch in Bangsar, the quality and taste maintains . My partner loved the basket of breads and ordered a 2nd basket . They were generous with the butter and olive oil with balsamic vinegar too . For starters we ordered the soup of the day which was potato and smoked duck, and onion soup . Both were flavourful and not too salty . From the Mains , we ordered duck confit, seafood vol au vent , mushroom risotto with truffle and my favourite steak and frites . My steak was done medium well, just the way I like it. The seafood vol au vent was delicious too although there could have been just a little more sauce in the pastry . The mushroom risotto with truffle is a must try ! Service here is top notch too . All in all, a very good dinner celebration . | review_rating:5, text:Ordered Egg Mayo Croissant Salmon and Greens (RM29). The croissant is so buttery and fluffy and complement with the egg mayo and salmon. Almond croissant have a denser texture. I think I'll just order normal croissant next time. The hot coffee (RM8) has a very strong coffee aroma. The service is very good. I'll visit again | review_rating:3, text:The food quality has dropped. The signature chocolate drink was horrible. I think premix chocolate powder drink taste better than that. So diluted. Same goes to the latte. Mini lamb burgers and pasta were average. Nothing mind blowing

reviews:

THE BOMB 🧋 queues were non-stop but the staff were very fast and efficient. The counter person was very friendly too! Pair your bbt with their pink cactus pearls!

Try out their pink cactus soft serve, it’s been very good 👍 | review_rating:3, text:First try today as they have buy 1 free 1 on 31 December 2024. I ordered chrysanthemum milk tea with chrysanthemum boba and golden black milk tea with pink cactus boba. Both drinks are 50% sugar and regular ice. The drinks are indeed still very sweet even though the sugar level is at 50%. The chrysanthemum milk tea is sweeter than the golden black milk tea. | review_rating:2, text:Drink was good. Boba was very dry inside. I guess they used premade bobas and then put them in water. I ended up not eating all the bobas. | review_rating:1, text:Ordered Chrysanthemum Milk Tea with 25% sugar and less ice, but it tasted overly sweet, almost as if it were 101% sugar. I wonder how it would taste with normal sugar level🤢.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Located at Level Ground (right opposite Armani Exchange).
Good lighting and ventilation…
Fast and efficient service by friendly staffs.. They were very welcoming.. Clean environment…. reasonable price…
Variables available here included sunglasses, heels, bags, wallets
More choices available compared to other outlets. All the sizes that we requested was available and the shoes/heels were comfortable to walk with. Thus we ended up buying 2 pairs.

Can pay via cash & cards.
Preferred parking & cashless parking kiosk at CP3 | review_rating:1, text:went this store, but no one like to entertain us. notice when customer where they're appearance are better or classy. from the counter worker going to them and greeting welcome. i ask my wife to buy from other shop. still got this mentality within your workers.. | review_rating:5, text:Went yesterday night and had an amazing customer service from this malay boy. Kudos to him! 100 | review_rating:5, text:have someone staff name yasid good staff and perfect customer service even though the store is full of customers he still treats me well. and he told me how to take care of the bag and the quality. respect for him thank you yasid you are kind staff | review_rating:5, text:Anis was super helpful, friendly and attentive! location: Lot F1.AV.128, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I’d always been a fan of Shihlin food for the past 7 years of my life however the amount of price increases is shocking. Well this isn’t really a franchise control but I’m just putting out there.

Food is great and quality and portion have never dropped ever since I first ate it and I love their new flavours each time. I still remember their golden boneless chicken, (please bring it back).

I would have nothing to change but if I was picky it would be the cleanliness of the seating area. I understand they are understaff sometimes so please HR hire more staff during peak days and hours | review_rating:2, text:The chicken is so thin, totally different thickness with branch in jb. No next time. | review_rating:3, text:operation hour is 10am to 10pm but why 9.20 the staff said closed already ? its still early. If 9.40 i okay | review_rating:4, text:Waiting time is longer than expected even there is not much of customer. Taste is standard as usual. | review_rating:2, text:Poor service. I have to wait 15 min just to pay not plus waiting time for the order to deliver. So poor. Food is good but service poor.

name: No.1 Gadget
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Tomaz Watchmaker
location: 1st Floor, Lot F1, 56, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I was originally searching for Grand Seiko and decided to stop by their store while my girlfriend went to the toilet. I was drawn in by the staff, who provided detailed explanations and answered all my questions about their watches. What started as a five-minute visit turned into thirty minutes, during which I took a look at one of their limited edition watches. The staff shared extensive details about that watch, and I encouraged my girlfriend to choose one as well. In the end, I decided to purchase because of the ethics and professionalism they demonstrated. I will take pride in wearing the Tomaz ethic on my watch. I entered as a non-fan but left as a new enthusiast. Thank you! They also give us two pairs of shoes as a gift with a huge discount on the two watches! ❤️ | review_rating:5, text:The ambiance here is always inviting and comfortable. I was completely impressed with their professionalism and customer service. We are served by staff named Tracy. She's trying her best to give us the best she can. Thank you for your services. | review_rating:5, text:Our 1st time here. We were greet by Tracy who is very attentive. She entertained us with passion and knowledge. Finally bought a watch for my wife. Thanks Tracy for ur hospitality! Keep up the positive vibe! | review_rating:5, text:Our first time here. We couldn't be happier with this customer experience from the moment step into the outlet. Miss Yan handled us the utmost professionalism (deserves 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟). | review_rating:5, text:Watchmaker, and I couldn’t be happier with my experience! The craftsmanship of the watches is exceptional—elegant, reliable, and truly a testament to fine watchmaking.

A special shoutout to Yan, the sales representative, for providing top-notch customer service. Yan was incredibly knowledgeable, patient, and attentive, ensuring I found the perfect watch to suit my style. They answered all my questions with professionalism and made the entire shopping experience smooth and enjoyable.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a great shopping experience at Nike Sunway Pyramid! Hani was super helpful and friendly, making sure I found the perfect pair of shoes. Was served by Hani with great customer service will definitely be back for her! | review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing experience at the Nike store thanks to this amazing staff with blond hair. Her exceptional service truly stood out. She was incredibly knowledgeable about the products and went above and beyond to help me find exactly what I needed. Hani was patient, attentive, and made sure I was comfortable with my choices before making a purchase. I didn’t feel forced to purchase anything but rather felt as if a true friend was helping me out. Her friendly and approachable demeanor made the shopping experience enjoyable and stress-free. Kudos to Hani for making my visit memorable! I highly recommend seeking her assistance if you visit the store! 10/10! | review_rating:5, text:Went to try some dunks at this outlet and the female staff with blonde hair is very helpful , she knew my size but brought two different sizes just for me to compare which pair I feel more comfortable in, not only that but she made it very personalised as she asked what style I like , what colour and whether I’m a high or low toe person .Even though I came very close to store closing hours , the staff took her time and made sure I had the right size . Would come again to buy from her !

Very good service and will consider buying in store rather than online 👍 The staff is a G | review_rating:5, text:Not seen many outlets but this looks like a nice one. Not an avid shoe shopper so I didn't really know what to look for. Being all lost, a nice yappy malay lady with blonde hair came to help. Spoke so fast but couldn't seem to decide to speak english or bm which was amusing. Me being myself, was happy to go with the recommendation, she promptly found me the correct size, I made the purchase and left happy thanks to nice blonde malay lady | review_rating:4, text:Definitely one of the nicest Nike stores we've been to shop. Very pleasant to see the latest products they have to offer here as the environment is very pleasant.

Service was decent but some of the staff can come off as a little snobbish. Some were friendly but struggled to speak English fluently.

But would always drop by whenever we're in pyramid. 👍🏻

name: Hooga
category: furniture_store, home_improvement_store, home_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.57 & LG2.58A, Lower Ground Two, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway Pyramid, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:This Singaporean store had increased the price to 20% & 40% on all items in the store, compared to last year. Even the store doing the current promotion with 15% off on all regular items in the store but still unable to get back the last year price anymore. Please look for alternative at others place, they are NOT the only one in the shopping mall | review_rating:4, text:There's always something special about visiting a shop like HOOGA, especially when you're there with your loved ones. It's almost akin to the magical feeling you get when you visit IKEA, for me at least, where you can imagine buying furniture for your home. Loved the ambience, choices of colors and the neatly arranged items for sale. Everything feels premium and of high quality regardless of which product you are looking for. Have a go, you won't be disappointed. | review_rating:5, text:We come back to the same Hooga shop every year to buy things back home! It’s funny because we always meet the same sales assistent and he’s always so good In his services!!! Always helpful with stock advise and questions for the different items In the shop! Always smiling and helpful! Great packaging for the things we have to carry back home and we were able to leave the stuff In the shop while we shopped in other stores!!! Believe me - the quality of the items is the best! There is always the best discounts on the items In the shop! CHEAP COMPARED TO THE QUALITY YOU RECEIVE!
They have the softest and best quality for bedding - you will sleep like an angel! And the diffuser section is AMAZING! we had ours for home and still smell amazing after almost a year! | review_rating:1, text:There was an Indian staff member named Chew who had a very unfriendly attitude at work. He looked down on me for buying things and had a very bad attitude. | review_rating:5, text:Hooga here has s special place for plants. They have artificial plants, pots in different designs and also some stuff for pets.

location: Unit No. G1.71 Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:first proper frag testing that was fun all because of one worker, called herself fina. she was willing to let me try so many pefumes and even let me fullwear any choice i wanted. nvr had the guts to be this brave in any frag store sbb other places was not tht friendly. will come again for the experience | review_rating:5, text:Excellent service.

Never faced any rude staff there. My fav SA kak Safina always treat their customers with good attitude and love to share about fragrance. Experience to try the new release BORNTOSTANDOUT there too😆love to come again. | review_rating:5, text:I had an incredible experience at this perfume shop, largely due to the exceptional service provided by Fina. Her extensive knowledge, personalized approach, and genuine passion for fragrances made the entire visit unforgettable. With her expert guidance, I discovered the perfect scent that exceeded my expectations. Fina's attention to detail, warm demeanor, and commitment to customer satisfaction are truly commendable. I highly recommend this shop, and I look forward to returning for future fragrance endeavors. | review_rating:5, text:I am writing this review to commend Ms. Diana for her exceptional service.

Ms. Diana was friendly and patient, taking the time to recommend and let us sample a wide variety of Diptyque perfumes. Thanks to her assistance, we discovered and fell in love with the fragrance Doson.

Before completing our purchase, she thoroughly explained the membership program and its benefits, ensuring we were well-informed.

From the moment we entered the store, our shopping experience was delightful. However, I noted that the store does not have a portable card machine, requiring customers to go to the payment counter to complete transactions.

Overall, I highly recommend Kens Apothecary for purchasing Diptyque products. | review_rating:5, text:Thanks safina for explaining about each products thoroughly and patiencely. Came to the boutique today just to browse for my next perfume, and was greeted by her, sound product knowledge and friendly to answer all qs. Look for safina if you come to the store.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The staff at this store were very polite and kind, creating a welcoming atmosphere. They were also knowledgeable about the products, which made me feel confident in my purchase. The product selection is excellent, with something for the whole family to enjoy, and everything was well-organized and easy to browse. Plus, the prices were slightly cheaper compared to buying in Japan. Overall, a wonderful shopping experience! | review_rating:5, text:Very good service and Amazing staff
Shoutout to Ain /Nadia and Sahira , real amazing people | review_rating:5, text:Very good service. Amazing staff. Staff very good. S | review_rating:5, text:Simply the best. You have a wide variety of models and not to forget, such a helpful staff who will check and advice for the models you're looking for. At times you will be rewarded with Free gifts too (depending on the promotion 😂). At the counter, Miss Sahira, is very responsive for any of our enquiries, such a wonderful person. | review_rating:5, text:Amazing gift wrapping by Ain :) thank you! It’s a gift

reviews: review_rating:1, text:Today around 3pm had a Horrible experience from Staff working there, racist staff discriminating customers. Lady working there with a male giving me awful stares. Woman staff Whispering to the other male working while staring at me. Really gives off a bad impression. Lady staff kept making noises as if she was annoyed at me being there. If you don’t want me to shop there then let it be. Never entering the store again. Will tell all my friends about this experience… Would never recommend to anyone… | review_rating:1, text:Customer service really bad was at there at 3:11pm and guy at front of shop who was supoosed to help me was looking at me weirdly as if i was broke and not able to purchase the product. He didn't help me at first and when he did he made sounds and showed weird facial expression. When i tried on the pants i bought and didn't want a few the staff who was a woman showed annoyed facial expression and talked shit about me to her colleague. Only one staff there was ok enough to help me he was the cashier at my checkout. The brand is veryy good. But the staff in this branch is very very very bad. Not only the service, but also the attitude. Better go to another branch with better service. Hope the manager will take action to both staff. name: Old Nanyang Coffee
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LOT NO F1.AV.177-181, 1ST FLOOR, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Food was super value for money. Not only the value is there but the taste is good. A great variety to choose from makes the eating experience better for a choosy eater like me or diner with kids. I love the red bean soup, many people can’t cook red bean soup well so it’s hard to find a restaurant with nice red bean soup. The abalone mix roasted meat rice will be the reason why we return again. A feedback for the owner, pls wash table cloth properly, the table we first sat stink, we changed seats immediately. | review_rating:5, text:My family we always hunt for nice or decent Siew Yok (roast pork belly).

This place serves a nice one. It is crispy skin, with the nicely tasty seasoned base. And most important, the meat doesn’t have the after taste or frozen meat smell!

You can see we even ordered extra siew yok to savour again! | review_rating:1, text:1.  Spaghetti (Bolognese)
- The sauce appears watery, pooling around the edges of the plate, which indicates poor consistency.
- The sauce-to-spaghetti ratio seems off, with an excess of liquid making the dish look less appetizing.

2. Chicken Chop with Fries and Coleslaw
- The chicken chop looks over-sauced, which might result in a soggy texture, especially if it's fried.
- The sauce consistency appears thin and overly glossy, which might make the dish feel greasy.
- Fries seem undercooked or lacking a crispy appearance, making them look unap

3. Iced Drink - Ribena Longan
- The iced drink has a murky appearance, which could be due to uneven mixing or dilution from melted ice.
- The lemon slice is visible but seems more like an afterthought rather than a deliberate garnish.

Our dining experience was further diminished by poor service. When we arrived, the waiter insisted on showing us to a smaller table, despite us expressing our preference for a larger one. While we understand that some larger tables were reserved, the staff made no effort to check for other unreserved options that could have accommodated us comfortably. This lack of initiative and effort left a poor impression and made us feel like an inconvenience rather than valued customers. | review_rating:5, text:Came here for a quick lunch. Food portion were quite big and arrived quickly. Overall an enjoyable experience. Recommended | review_rating:5, text:My fav spot to yumcha with friends and family. Very relaxing & comfortable atmosphere and most importantly the air conditioning in this area is NOTICEABLY MORE COOLER. ( Iykyk) Their prices are also pretty reasonable compared to other spots in the mall. You get good quality without feeling like you’re overpaying. The drinks here are also pretty good. Both the coffee and teh beng are smooth and taste great without being too strong or overly sweet.
Will definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a place to unwind at Sunway Pyramid!
**Sunway points can be collected here

name: SWATCH
location: Jalan PJS 11-15 3 Unit, No. LG1.09, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I visited Swatch to replace my strap. Unfortunately, the new strap was scratched during installation. When I pointed it out, the staff explained that it was due to the difficulty of installing the strap and said they couldn't do anything about it.

I even tried polishing the screen afterward, but the scratches remain visible. (Image in reference). While I understand challenges can arise, I expected more care and a better resolution. I hope the team can improve their service for similar situations in the future. | review_rating:4, text:Energy For Life's free battery replacement comes with a key condition that many are not aware nor it is stated in their Swatch Malaysia website. The condition is that the watch must be presented for the free battery replacement with the old battery regardless whether it leaking chemical or in any condition. Even if you have to remove the chemical leaking old battery, you must keep it for them.

I strongly suggest Swatch Malaysia amend their website to state this condition clearly and also train their staff to advise customers accordingly.

P.S. Gratitude to supervisor Ms. Yong Han and staff Shafiq of Swatch Sunway Pyramid for their assistance earlier. | review_rating:5, text:Very knowledgable staff. Knows the latest trends.

I showed him my another watch of Stranger Things last year. He knows the latest news like the new watch featuring Star wars too.

Forgot to ask for his name but very friendly and knowledgeable person. | review_rating:5, text:Firstly, I'm very glad that Swatch reopened here so I can get battery replacement easily since it's nearer to me. After that, got my first watch purchase from the Dragon Year collection at this outlet and was attended by Joe, the senior sales executive.

He was nothing but amazing in his service. Took the time to chat with me and my husband. He answered our queries very well, showing his extensive knowledge about the company and products.

What a good representation of Swatch! I will be coming back for more. Well done! Keep it up! | review_rating:5, text:Trainee Danish was very helpful and offered excellent customer service! I am very happy with my purchase.

Her friendly and approachable demeanor made the whole process enjoyable, and I never felt pressured into making a purchase. I highly recommend reaching out to Phoebe for anyone interested in LG PuriCare products – she truly goes above and beyond! | review_rating:5, text:Signed up for the water filter machine. She will really explain and follow up in details to make sure every thing in order. Highly Recommended!

location: LG2.150, Lower Ground Two, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, No: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I initially bought 4 boxes of contact lenses at A-Look. Service staff friendly and i purchase additional 4 boxes but later found them for RM50 cheaper at all other optical shops. It turned out to be a bad deal, and I regret the purchase. Will not return definately.  Glad that they have no stock for glasses we want too. Rate on price not the service. | review_rating:5, text:I visited so many optical stores but was not satisfied with any of their designs or quality. Then I happened to come across A-Look Sunway Pyramid and their designs are really up my alley. Whether it’s a small fix or a new purchase, the service is always efficient and commendable. It’s become a no-brainer to consider this store in the future. | review_rating:5, text:Got myself a new pair of glasses last month, and I was being recommended to a pair of lightweight titanium frame. It holds onto my ear without causing any strains or discomfort. The staff are definitely professional enough to answer my questions and dispel my worries. Kudos to the staff named Jie. | review_rating:5, text:Thanks Sinn Wan for the awesome service, has came back to A-look Sunway many times cause really enjoy his patience and explanation and he always ensure that my glasses are comfortable and suites me. Never rushed me before. Great job, will definitely come back. | review_rating:5, text:Great service by staff especially the manager, SK in helping to provide advice when I change my single vision to  multifocal lense.

Noticed another staff helping another customer to change a nose pad without expecting anything in return.Service with genuine heart to customers.

name: Kyochon
location: 2.95, Level LG2, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I recently visited KyoChon 1991 at Sunway Pyramid, and I must say, it was an amazing experience from start to finish!

The food is absolutely delicious – the Korean fried chicken is crispy, flavorful, and perfectly seasoned. I highly recommend trying their signature Red Pepper Whole Chicken, they’re simply mouthwatering.

Not to forget the must have radish and seaweed soup to complete your meal! The portions are generous too, making it great value for the quality of food.

The service was exceptional. The staff were friendly, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed without being intrusive. It really added to the overall positive experience.

The atmosphere of the restaurant is cozy and welcoming, with a modern yet comfortable vibe, perfect for a casual meal or a gathering with friends. The interior is well-designed, and you can tell they put a lot of thought into creating a relaxing dining environment.

All in all, KyoChon 1991 is a fantastic spot for anyone craving quality Korean fried chicken and top-notch service. I’ll definitely be coming back! | review_rating:3, text:Located at LG2 near MBG Fruit Shop and DIY Shop.. Atmosphere is great and place is quite big..

The Menu is okay but compare to other Outlet i think the menu is too little or perhaps already change of menu?

Food is great.. the spicyness is wow quite spicy suitable for spicy lover and the honey garlic is also delicious.. price is moderate.

Service? Okay the thing make one to eat here was the waiter out front that is friendly...but when i sat at the table their is two malay lady that is not so friendly while taking order...they even argue who to take order. What a snub. The cashier staff was great..

Overall - Meh but okay...can try here, no obligation but for me, i rather go different outlet.. experience wise is not great. | review_rating:5, text:Look for En Khairul if you want a great experience. Very attentive and cheerful handling order and customer. We can see he is giving the best service. Thank you 👍 | review_rating:5, text:The service is good and fast. Their food especially the boneless chicken portion is just right for me. Their dessert is totally delicious, especially considering that I'm a fan of chocolate. Really love it!😋 | review_rating:3, text:Waited almost 30 minutes for our food. The cup of tea was so small and not refillable😅 The chicken tasted good though. Crunchy and savoury. Though the set looked quite sad  in portion wise and sides for rm20 something.

name: Fipper, Feel The Rubber
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: K Fry
location: Lot OB.K4, Oasis Boulevard, GF, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:It was really good and quite similar with real Korean chicken. I thought the six pcs of boneless chicken will small portion but actually the portion was huge! 100% recommend! Must order anchovies rice ball! | review_rating:3, text:Alright this place absolutely deserves its stars , I was skeptical as anyone is with a new shop. But I decided to order and the service by Raesa was top tier for a busy fast food. As for food I was expecting the least but I was surprised by the flavor one of the best fried chicken in Malaysia (imho)soo crispy but juicy AND flavorful not too salty either. Would definitely visit again to try the other dishes on their menu. Note : I ordered the snow cheese spicy chicken (and the portion was massive). Keep up the service guys.

Editing this review because I have had an upset stomach after trying this place twice but didn’t expect really. | review_rating:5, text:Love the smell and the taste of the tuna rice ball! The cheesy bumbuk spicy tastes good as well but it's kinda too spicy for me as someone don't really can eat spicy.

The service was great! The waiter noticed that I didn't have a fork and bought one for me without me requesting it. | review_rating:5, text:Loved my experience here! First time here and loved the food. The waitress was kind enough to explain to us before we ordered our food. Very delicious! | review_rating:4, text:Service is consider top notch for an averagely priced restaurant in a shopping mall, the food is good, but I find that the fried chicken is a little bit lack of flavor, rice balls and japchae was really delicious, will definitely come back again for more.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This timberland store has shifted to another shop lot with a brand new store design. It is now more spacious and brighter than before. | review_rating:4, text:Friendly salesperson. Patient and detailed in his explanation.  Bought my first Timberland boots. | review_rating:5, text:I had the most wonderful shopping experience! First of all, I would like to note the friendliness of the staff. They greeted me from the doorway and asked me how I was doing and how they could help me. I was looking for a gift for my husband and Mr. Amirrudin helped me a lot in choosing a gift for my husband. Patiently and with a smile on his face, he showed me the product, helped me choose the size and I felt that he was not just trying to sell, but really trying to help me, which immediately bribed me! Instead of one thing, I bought three perfectly matched T-shirts. Mr. Amirrudin has high communication and customer-oriented skills! Thank him for his work! And also a very nice and friendly girl Nelfi, who helped me pay for all my purchases. I definitely recommend visiting this branch of Timberland to anyone who is looking for an attentive attitude towards themselves! | review_rating:1, text:Rude unprofessional sales person (male). Walk away in the middle of sales. Waited 10mins for him to comeback to handle the payment. Shoes brand new but full of scratches and loose thread, recommended to another branch with available stock but turn out shop closed down (midvalley). | review_rating:5, text:What a great service from TBL Pyramid staff!! Very knowledgable person, super friendly!! & u guys just made our day!! Happy to get a pair of Icon Yellow Boot with the protection too.
Recommended!!
5⭐️ U guys deserve it
Definitely would come back again to ur store 👍

name: Naelofar Hijab
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Ooppa
location: Lot LG1.128,Lower Ground 1, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, LG1.128, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Went here right after an eye condition diagnosis. I was assisted by Mr Alan Yam and oh god, he was extremely helpful and dint push any sales more than what I was required.
Each and every single concern of mine was attended well and he was there, truout my one hour visit to make sure i am extremely satisfied with the frame I chose.

Definitely a to go place hereafter. | review_rating:5, text:Well stocked, well trained staff in a very humble shop in Sunway. When you're faced with competition from the other bigger chain specs stores, the only way to stand out is with customer service. And both Nelson and Izzah excel from start to finish.

During an initial visit, I tried on many different pairs and was attended to by Nelson, who politely and calmly helped me with my choices. But, I didn't get anything, thinking that I should look around first.

However, I didn't receive the same treatment elsewhere, even though I found something I really liked. And because of that, I went back to Oopa to get two pairs because of the service level.

The range that they have here may not be as much as others, but you feel really satisfied spending your money here for the service and care that's shown as a customer - and that's priceless.

Keep up the good work! | review_rating:5, text:I was served by Izzah. She was very attentive to my needs and actually provided good recommendations for my frame and lens. I found the whole experience very relaxed and easy-going so would definitely recommend this to my friends. | review_rating:5, text:I recently visited this spec shop and was thoroughly impressed by the excellent service I received. The staff were incredibly knowledgeable and helpful, guiding me through the selection process with ease. They took the time to understand my needs and preferences, ensuring I found the perfect pair of specs.
The quality of the products is top-notch, and the overall experience was seamless.

I highly recommend this shop to anyone in need of new specs or eyewear.

Kudos to Ms Izzah Tajul, Maryam.

Five stars all the way! | review_rating:5, text:I bought two glasses at this store and Izzah was very patient and attentive with my questions and the glasses preference. She explained really well on the lenses and as well was very accommodating for the frames choices as I was really contemplating with the designs. Please get izzah for assistance needed because she’s very helpful, friendly and nice!

name: Body Perfect
location: Unit SPWLG1.01, Lower Ground One, West 3, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The onsen experience at Body Perfect (ONLY FOR FEMALE)offers true authenticity, with mineral-rich waters imported directly from Japan, allowing us to enjoy the essence of traditional Japanese hot springs without leaving our city.

We had the opportunity to experience an invigorating icy-cold onsen at 9°C, soaking just one leg in was enough to make me shiver and go numb! I can't imagine fully submerging my entire body. To maximize the benefits, it's essential to follow the correct sequence, and thanks to Cyrus, the beauty manager, we learned how to do it properly. Otherwise, we might have just jumped straight into the pool without knowing what’s best! 😜

Next, we proceeded through three hot onsen pools in sequence:

1️⃣ Skin Renewal Micro Nano Bubble Onsen (36°C)
🇯🇵 Deep cleanses and provides anti-aging benefits. This was our favorite, as our skin felt incredibly smooth while soaking in the pool.

2️⃣ Revitalizing Hydroluxe Therapy Onsen (38°C)
🇯🇵 Oxygenates the skin and muscles, allowing the skin to "breathe" better. According to Cyrus, this pool is perfect for my partner, as her youthful skin benefits from the oxygenation, keeping it supple and radiant.

3️⃣ Detoxifying Salt Onsen (40°C)
🇯🇵 Restores the skin’s natural glow. As per Cyrus’ advice, this pool was best suited for me, especially considering my age and muscle strain in my shoulders. It helped relieve deep muscle tension and provided much-needed relaxation.

Gradually increasing the temperature allows the body to adjust safely, preventing dizziness or discomfort that may occur due to sudden temperature changes.

Throughout our experience, Jane, the attentive attendant, ensured we were well taken care of. She even noticed I was wearing a necklace and kindly reminded me to remove it, as the heat could cause discomfort when wearing gold. 👍

Finally, after a 5 minute rest, we moved on to the Volcanic Himalayan Salt Sauna Room, which was another new and exciting experience. The walls were beautifully designed with volcanic Himalayan salt, known for its relaxation and respiratory health benefits, including relief for sinus issues.

Inside the sauna, there were two levels of benches. We started on the lower bench with milder heat before moving to the upper bench, where the intensity increased. The moment I sat on the second bench, sweat immediately started dripping from my forehead and neck, such an invigorating detox!

Overall, I truly loved my experience here with my niece. Body Perfect is a trusted, government-recognized brand, ensuring peace of mind with proper documentation and signatures to protect both parties throughout the procedure. This added an extra layer of trust to the entire journey.

A heartfelt thank you to Sunway Pyramid and Body Perfect Aesthetic & Wellness for giving me a whole new level of relaxation, an experience I can continue to enjoy, even after returning from my recent Japan trip!

P/S: You don't need to worry hearing the word "Onsen", they do provide disposable bra and panty ya. Kind of certain transparency but still rather than nothing right? 😂 And psst..they provide other 100 type of services(facial,slimming, wellness, women care,etc) which you may try out. Body perfect is newly opened on Dec 2024. Moved from Sphinx Sunway Pyramid ( more than 15 years operating here) | review_rating:5, text:First Onsen experience. Complimentary by Sunway. Professional Cryus explain and introduce to us before we start our Onsen. Great experience for me and my friend especially the 9° pool. Hope next time will have chance to come back again. Hopefully can improve on the disposable bra and panty, with thicker cloths. Thank you Body Perfect. | review_rating:5, text:beautiful spa land, had chance to try out the onsen + cold plunge, followed by a facial. the onsen is beautifully crafted with 3 different heated onsen and also a sauna with salt rock walls. it was a wonderful experience thank you to Jane, Cyrus, and Candy. highly recommend anyone looking for a spa day. | review_rating:4, text:Amazing place to relax !! The frontdesk staffs gave us warmest welcome and serve us with welcome drink. Cyrus was our beauty advisor and Jane assist us all the time during our onsen experience. Feel relaxed after and totally enjoyed the session. | review_rating:5, text:Body Perfect Sunway Pyramid has been my go-to spa for over 10 years! The staff is incredibly nice and attentive… they have recently moved to a new location within the same mall, and the new setup is absolutely stunning.

Highly recommend!

name: Madam Kwan's
location: Lot LG1.47, Lower Ground 1, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I have dinner at this restaurant and dissatisfied regarding the time after order the food. It take very long time for them to serve. Second point is the Asam fish head not fresh for the fish head. Got one smell, and the fish got a lot of scale. The only the I feel is nice is the coconut rice smells good and taste delicious. This is the thing you can try.
Overall this visit is unpleasant. Cause other table already serving and we keep waiting almost 40/45 mins. We order around 9 dishes, yet nothing come first. Till we complain with the waiter only one of the ladies apologise. In the end there is a guy waiter who see us very unhappy and provide us the desert cendol. Lastly this waiter guy good and smart help us cancel the two dish , cause other food we eat till 80/90% finish. Still hope they could improve in future. Cause other outlet so far didn’t have this issue. 💪 | review_rating:4, text:Taste is subjective. Tried ordering online & struggled. Thankfully waitress was helpful. Had the Cantonese fried beef noodle RM 24.90 & local ice coffee white RM 7.50. plus 10% + 6%.
I was expecting tough beef but it was nice & tender & piping hot. Coffee was nice to complete the meal. Good crowd helped me decide where to eat. | review_rating:4, text:This is my second time dining at this outlet, and the food here continues to be the best compared to all the other outlets. We had dumpling soup, glass noodles with soft shell crab and otak-otak fried rice.

The dumpling soup is a delightful blend of flavours and textures. The minced prawn and chicken filling in the dumplings is succulent and well seasoned, providing a savoury bite with each spoonful. The broth is light yet flavourful, perfectly complementing the dumplings.

The claypot glass noodles with soft shell crab is a dish that truly standout. The glass noodles are stir fried in dark soy sauce, giving them a rich and umami flavour. The highlight, of course, is the soft shell crab, which is cooked to perfection. The crab is crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, adding a delightful crunch to the dish. The combination of textures and flavours makes this a must try.

Lastly, the otak-otak fried rice is a unique and flavourful dish. The rice is perfectly cooked and infused with the distinct taste of otak-otak, a special fish cake. The dish is well balanced and not overly spicy, making it enjoyable for a wide range of palates. It’s a creative twist on traditional fried rice that is sure to impress. | review_rating:5, text:You must dine at Madam Kwan’s at Sunway Pyramid. The Satay is the best i have tasted in my lifetime! Madam Kwan has perfected her Satay with the juiciest and perfect satay marinade and the satay sauce is also the best in terms of taste and consistency. Madam Kwan’s Salted Fish Fried Rice is to die for. Its very rich in flavour, moist and the bits of salted fish is so crunchy and they do not stinge on it. There are even toppings of ikan bilis. We just had to order a second plate of the Salted Fish Fried Rice ! The Nasi Bojari is also the best so far. These dishes were recommended by their staff Ika who is very  friendly and her customer service is unparalleled!  We ended our meal with another recommendation by Ika - Fritters with Ice Cream. The batter was just right, light and tasty and the banana wasn’t sweet and was complimented very well with the vanilla ice cream. Well done Madam Kwan ! | review_rating:5, text:I can't lie about Madan Kwan's food—it's excellent as usual. I have nothing to complain about regarding the food; however, it was my first time visiting the Sunway Pyramid branch over the weekend, and the service was not as expected. It was much worse than I anticipated. I had to call the staff for everything, including utensils, plates, and even coffee, which was served with out sugar! I had to reach out multiple times for assistance. I hope they can improve this aspect of their service.

name: Childhood
category: bakery, confectionery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG 2, 76, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway Mentari, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Small store at LG floor of Sunway Pyramid shopping mall. They are selling all kind of items from the past, which reminds of childhood memories. You can find candies, cookies, pastries, toys, etc here. Items price slightly higher side.

The place has great interior design with nice decorations all over the store. The design & decorations will remind us of old times. The store is clean, bright and well maintained. Items were well arranged and displayed.

Staffs were not that friendly, as they keep staring at customer even when we are window shopping, looking at the items in the store. They were also gossiping about customers, which gave bad impression about the store. | review_rating:1, text:I bought a kaya ball from here and I found a stapler after I bite into it. If I swallowed the stapler, it could have gotten worse. I asked the staff where is the boss and they said “they don’t know the boss” so I called the customer service number posted in the store, but it was a wrong number. So I went online and went to their official website. No one answers the number in the website. I will really get a lawyer and sue if no one deals with this matter. | review_rating:4, text:This shop sells retro toys, food, games and more. We bought some traditional biscuits here which tastes good. A good place to find nostalgic items. | review_rating:3, text:Traditional confectionery at high end prices. Some of the products are stale. | review_rating:1, text:This shop looks good at the first glance despite the overpriced goods, until we see the unpleasant scene of DYING and DEAD FISH kept in the filthy water bottles. If you are not going to take care of them or ask your staff to take care of them and just using the fishes as nostalgic decoration, you’re outright cruel. By no means people with conscience will support your business. Please start taking care of the fish or else pass it to someone who will.

Will never enter this shop again.

The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: STUFF’D
category: turkish_restaurant, mexican_restaurant, american_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.53A, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Good place for healthy, light meals. Taste-wise its really not bad and they don't skimp on ingredients.

Ordered chicken kebab today (though I almost got hurt biting into a bone chip). Saw another review here that they also found bone chips in their kebabs. Something that I've not encountered in their other outlets. Perhaps a quality control issue.

The newly renovated stuff'd now uses machine ordering. The machine lagged when I was making payment, and staff were too busy to entertain my problems because Grab riders were more of a priority. After awhile, one of them rerouted the payment to the normal counter cashier (what was the point of the machine, then?)

Waiting time: Almost 20 minutes for a kebab. Not really acceptable considering most customers are here during their short lunch break. Like I've mentioned up there, they prioritize Grabfood more than walk-in orders.

The space is too tiny for the amount of customers that drop by. Best to takeaway.
Probably won't be back in a long time until they've fixed their machines and service. | review_rating:3, text:Update**
Bought kebab today and it's absolutely soaked. Dripping everywhere as soon as I start eating and towards the end it was hard to even take a bite with all the water. Maybe teach your staff to properly drain the vege so we don't end up with damp kebab.

Frequent this place, always order chicken, today first time order beef and regretted. There were 3 bone chips in my beef kebab, could easily had chip my tooth. | review_rating:3, text:so is it burrito or kebab?

if the former, then it simply isn't as good as the competition round the corner.  which is the general dilemma of "premium" fast food. | review_rating:5, text:As was ordering for a lunch meeting, pre-ordered the bowls.

The bowls were made just prior to collection as they were packing up when I reached.

It's a hearty meal & with options to add or omit as desired.

The veg bowl option selected is  guacamole (hummus is the other, or can add it with a charge).

The sauces selected were habanero sauce (fiery & it lit my day) & mayo cucumber. The cilantro rice has a good flavour.

Will certainly be back. | review_rating:4, text:[holiao]
1) Overall - kebab shop selling healthy food that comes with varieties of fresh ingredients to choose from, good service with online ordering too, limited seating, great place for quick lunch and takeaways, food selection are burrito, beef taco, chicken quesadilla, salad bowl and kebab from
Stuff'd @ Sunway Pyramid

name: Sairist All In Print
location: No. 3, Lot FFKC-002 1st Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:would give a zero star if possible, ordered a customised t -shirt for our friend and she charged us 95 ringgit for the t shirt and printing which is totally fine with us. But when the result came out, the design is not even covering the whole shirt it's just a small section in the middle, when you're thinking of a design of a t-shirt it should be covering the generally area of the t-shirt but we got this instead for RM95, totally unacceptable. ( blurred out our friends face)

ps. it was printed in just 15min, so keep that in mind | review_rating:5, text:Had something very urgent to print while the owner mentioned they usually don't print documents, he was very accommodating and agreed to print without any qualms. Very friendly as well. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recommended!!! I needed some personalized items and this shop did not fail. They also set the delivery to my home address smoothly. The price is reasonable with execellent quality. The shop created my personalized request for multiple items in less than 2 hours. Superb service!! Will promote ur shop to my friends. Thank u so much!!! | review_rating:5, text:Printed some custom items here a few times. Great for last minute gifts. Got my printing done in less than 1 hour. The lady at this shop is friendly | review_rating:1, text:Unreliable . Staff always not at station. Came two Sundays in a row and nobody stationed. Called the number that given for enquiry, she asked to come back 1 hour plus later as she is ‘out’

name: AsterSpring
location: LG 1.97, Lower Ground One, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful experience at AsterSpring! The staff Janet was incredibly professional, and the environment was calm and relaxing. My facial treatment left my skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Highly recommend for anyone looking to pamper themselves with quality skincare treatments! | review_rating:5, text:Janet provides very good service. Always love a good therapeutic session with aster spring! | review_rating:5, text:Aster Spring excels in service, and Tracy Tham, the Manager, personifies their commitment.
Tracy's outstanding leadership and customer-centric approach make each visit memorable.
The entire staff, under Tracy's guidance, goes above and beyond, showcasing exceptional
customer service. Highly recommend for skincare needs! | review_rating:1, text:I did the acne targeted facial here “acne recovery therapy” and I’m not happy at all at the results after two facials. The skin on my face is more sensitive and prone to spots than ever. I have started to get breakouts on my chin which I have never done before! My pores are more open I feel which is where the breakouts come from. the forehead also have stubborn breakouts that won’t go even with 2 months on highly rated dermalogica products such as the “age bright serum” which was super expensive yet has done little for my breakouts. Before this acne treatment, my “acne” was hardly noticeable and persistent but after this treatment it is due to my skin being more sensitive. I am extremely disappointed and frustrated. As I am from abroad and was only staying at Malaysia for short-term, I am not able to make a complaint in person or fight to get compensation - so I leave this review to warn other customers. If your skin breakouts aren’t severe and inflammatory, just go for natural treatments. This one was intensive and only made my skin worse. | review_rating:5, text:I have been a member of Aster Spring from the time it opened till present and Tracy (Sunway Pyramid branch) has always been very helpful, polite and I just love her facials plus product recommendations. My daughter too loves her facials and is always very happy with her service. Am going to sign up for facials for my son as well. Kathy too has always been polite and helpful. Love the service we get at this branch! They’re both assets to the company. Keep up the great work!
