name: Swich Café
category: ice_cream_shop, dessert_shop, confectionery, bakery, wholesaler, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.133B, Lower Ground Level Two, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3 Jalan, Jalan PJS 11/5, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Once upon a time, there was a cafe serving cakes and coffee at the old former HP Towers, this was many years back. And somewhere last year we patron a cafe of the same name at Atria without realizing it was the same owner…and now they have opened a new outlet at Sunway Pyramid and come to ‘realize again’ that the owner is a good friend’s sister hahaha…they serve really nice cakes like the durian and cempedak cakes, valhorna chocolate croffle, tiramisu, gelatos and not forgetting good coffee…should give it a go. 20250121 back here with the missus, the durian bomb is still the best | review_rating:4, text:Nice cosy cafe at Sunway Pyramud new wing with good seating.

Prices for cakes, drinks and waffles come at a slight premium of RM20+

Deco is clean and simple.

Cakes, drinks and waffle are quite tasty.

Worth the quick dessert stop. | review_rating:5, text:New cafe located at Sunway Pyramid's newly renovated space, The Oasis. Randomly walked past and saw the variety of cakes sitting in the fridge display.

They have alcoholic and non-alcoholic options. We tried 2 non-alcoholic cakes, cempedak cake and chocolate valrhona cake. The cempedak cake was an absolute delight - sponge layer was soft and light, while the cream was sweet and fresh. Couldn't get enough of it!

Unfortunately, the chocolate valrhona was quite disappointing. The supposed mousse inside was hard and didn't taste fresh. Actually, the whole cake felt pretty tough and hard to cut and chew. It just felt like i was eating a few days' old cake.

Besides cake, they sell gelato, waffles and other desserts too. It's definitely worth a try. | review_rating:5, text:Their tiramisu gelato is the best tiramisu gelato i’ve had. It’s not just tiramisu flavour but as if you’re having bits of tiramisu. We had their delicious buttermilk waffle topped with Sicilian pistachio gelato. We were greeted and served by wilson who is amazing. | review_rating:5, text:I always love their cakes since they started in Atria. I went to the one at sunway last week- and Cempedak cake is still as good as i remembered. Friendly staff and good place to chill over coffee and desserts !

name: MALENE
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! name: Potato Corner
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:It's located at LG2 near ice rink. Sitting area is quite small,  like 3 tables. Pay and get your number. First choose your size (Large, Jumbo, Mega, Giga n Tera), then choose flavour (number of flavours depends on which size you order). If you want Truffle, need to add RM1. I like the sweet corn & Truffle flavour. Cheese common but it taste great too. | review_rating:1, text:The quality of the french fries is totally not on par even compared to that from McDonald. Doesn't taste much of the taste from the potato.

Not to mentioned, the size of the so called "Large" size is a bit of a disappointment.

*Note: review come with free gift | review_rating:4, text:Always long queue, passed by at 930pm where there is no queue so just try it lah. To my surprise the fries is really good, got few flavours to choose from and i pick sour cream and onion. Comes with popcorn chicken as well. The chicken are meaty and juicy! I liked the food but its kinda pricy... | review_rating:4, text:Just tried Potato Corner for the first time and I must say, the fries were pretty decent with a generous amount of toppings. The tom yam chicken pop was a standout dish, bursting with flavor. The service was okay, nothing extraordinary. The best part was that the prices were quite affordable. Overall, a casual spot to grab some tasty snacks. | review_rating:1, text:I was at your sunway pyramid outlet at 1.10pm on 16th October 2024, wanted to try the fries and chicken pop corn. There’s only 1 staff working there and no one at the cashier, he was talking to somebody around there when I want to order. I call him and no response, after a while then he came to to the cashier counter.

As this is my first time trying the fries and chicken pop corn, I ask him is there any recommendation or any signature flavor for the fries… he rudely told me that there no recommendation… whatever u like, you choose…

It is so rude that I don’t feel like buying it after order the set that cost 18.80, can’t clearly remember what the price…  it’s nothing wrong with the taste as I haven’t try it, but it’s the staff attitude that piss off customers.. hope that the management will look into this staff otherwise he is ruining your company hard build reputation & name.

name: adidas Brand Center
category: clothing_store, sporting_goods_store, shoe_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot LG1.18 - 1.20A, LG Floor, 47500, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Massive store, that’s why it’s the brand centre I suppose? I went to pick up an online order and unfortunately, there were some hiccups. After showering my order number, the staff went to look for my parcel and said it’s not there. Impossible, because I have a picture of it being delivered. After the second time, they managed to find my parcel. That was the only issue. While waiting for the staff to look for my item, I browsed around and they had a crazy sale. I ended up buying shoes because it was up to 70% off for it! | review_rating:5, text:Fantastic set up. This is the biggest and the most comprehensive outlet of Adidas. Best Adidas outlet in Malaysia without a doubt. The staffs are all pro-active and very knowledgeable about its products. It has 2 floors. Adidas Performance at the lower floor and Adidas Originals on the upper floor. Widest selection is available here and you get the latest products and customization here too 👍 highly recommended. Well done! | review_rating:1, text:I was at your adidas branch on the 26th of January on Sunday. Went there to purchase & customize a Jersey. STAFF no. 1 served me and went to confirm with the customization team which letters and numbers were available in stock. After confirming, STAFF no. 1 said that ONLY THE LETTER A was not in stock so he recommended me to purchase the letter at the Liverpool store opposite of adidas ( apparently he said that adidas customers do that when adidas runs out of letters or numbers ) So I went and purchase the letter A at the Liverpool store and went back to adidas to finally purchase the jersey. When I came back to the store I was served by STAFF NO. 2. STAFF NO. 2 brought me to the customization area to confirm the customization after I had told them the story of me purchasing the letter A. When I was at the customization counter suddenly the customization staff now said NUMBER 1 is also out of stock? To add another plot twist to the story after going back and forth with the staffs there, the same customization staff that initially SAID THE LETTER A and NUMBER 1 was unavailable suddenly said THE LETTER S is also out of stock when I showed him the player’s name and number for the second time? And what would have happened and how would it have been resolved if I went to the Liverpool store again and purchased the number 1 only for the hopeless customization staff to say that now the letter S is also out of stock? :D
( Do note that In the midst of encountering all these 3 incompetent staff and me going back and forth purchasing the unavailable letter at a different store I already showed them the Name and Number I wanted to put on the Jersey ) I don’t usually get triggered or mad at things like this as I am also working as a retail staff and I know how fussy certain customers can get sometimes but honestly it was your staffs fault for handing out wrong information over and over again. Wouldn’t it just be settled if any of the 3 staff actually would have just told me which letter and number was unavailable in the first place? Hence, today was probably the dumbest customer service I’ve encountered in my years of being a customer.

On a happy note, another Female customization staff was working on that day but she was at the upper floor as she was in charge of the redemption counter on that day ( based on the information given to me ) she was the one who apologized and insisted on reimbursing me for the initial letter A that I purchased. Kudos to her for helping out in settling the matter as the other Male customization staff kept laughing and saying that “I don’t know” a million times throughout the whole issue. Felt bad that she was the one who had to take out money from her own pocket when it was the initial 3 useless staff that caused the whole problem with their wrong information to begin with.

According to the female staff, she said that the customization team and the retail team aren’t linked together. So my opinion / suggestion is for both side to get correct information beforehand so something stupid like this does not happen again because it’s quite troublesome for your customers when each staff is giving out a different story every time. | review_rating:1, text:Had a sales guy ( Ashraf? Not sure how to spell his name) , we wanted to purchase 2 shirts, then he tried to force us to buy a pair of sneakers (???) coz was on discount, even though we said the shoes were not to our fitting and liking.

When we went to pay for the shirts, he got angry when we refused to purchase the shoes, gave an angry stare down,

Semi threw a tantrum ... gave the cashier his sales ID and walked off on a big huff.

😅Dude...don't scold customer lah if you can't hit your sales target...wuuuttt. | review_rating:5, text:Myself and my husband were browsing Adidas online store and there were few unique edition which has limited unit and size. We contacted several outlets and I would say Sunway Pyramid customer service is top notch from staff name Anis. We arrived the outlet 2 hour after conversation via phone and when we arrived Anis walked to us and greet us immediately if we are the one call and enquiry. We were  completely impressed with her professionalism and customer service. She patiently answer and feedback about the shoes we were looking for. Definitely extra mile staff 👍

name: Genius Games
location: F1-40A, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Major issue with staff knowledge as well as honesty, recently wanted to get a controller for pc to use and for gaming but didn't have the console, at first looked at the X box controllers because they seem to work for all my friends but was too pricey, then they recommended me a ps4 controller and told me it works well. Bought it for a staggering price of 159 and turns out it doesn't work with pcs or any games I had but when I checked the games setting they all supported Xbox controllers while most of them didn't do PS4. In order to make my controller work I had to download a third party software. Overall store lacks professionalism in their field and honesty to their customers | review_rating:1, text:I came to the store to replace my screen protector on my Nintendo switch. When they handed my switch back to me it was scratched and when I came back and showed them the guy at the store simply giggled and said oops, he had absolutely no care for the fact that he damaged my switch. Absolutely awful customer service and this is coming from someone who is never picky abt service but it’s ridiculous for me to pay for you to fix my switch then for you to damage it and do absolutely nothing but giggle. Incredibly unprofessional and rude | review_rating:1, text:Scratched my kids Nintendo Switch while changing the screen protector and then proceeded to stand there and smirk. Never even apologized. Avoid at all costs. DO NOT SHOP HERE. | review_rating:1, text:attempted to steal my game cartridge when i gave them my switch to place a screen protector on, when i realised my game was missing they played dumb and after i threatened them they did the whole “oh look what’s on the floor”

not cool | review_rating:5, text:Have been here multiple times over the years. Never once had an issue with staff, or faulty products. I’ve bought all sorts of stuff from them, including 3DS games, Switch controllers, Xbox 360 hard drives, Switch games, Xbox 360 games, etc. Never had issues even once.

Have never encountered rude staff either, they are always friendly and conduct service with a smile. The old guy is the best by far, though. And he always gives good deals impromptu.

Not deserving of all the negative reviews, tbh.

reviews:
review_rating:2, text:I love shopping at this outlet as there are variety of gift collections. Unfortunately, staff named Yasmin was a bit rude to me. I accidentally stand in her way, and she did a smirk and annoying sound to indicate that she is irrirated. When i wanted to pay at the counter, she only stare at me, and waiting for her team member to assist eventhough she clearly saw that her tm going out for break. Service 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 | review_rating:1, text:Staff named Yasmin is extremely rude. I wanted to pay in cash but the store did not have any coins to give me my change. I didn’t have coins either to which Yasmin then responded “well what do you want me to do” and stared at me waiting for me to provide a solution. In the end she cancelled the purchase. | review_rating:5, text:Ordered a lot of cookies n needed to pack nicely with ribbon.
We came during the late evening, took them 3 hours to do. This is the biggest order, according to the outlet.
They did OT until 11.30pm without complaining. When we came to collect, everything was packed nicely. And can see that they're very tired. But still put on a smile when they hand us the cookies.

Thank you very much for the best customer service ever by the 2 Malay girls🙏🏻❤️
Thanks to them, we are able to get all of the cookies gifts for the next day's event. | review_rating:1, text:this happened 2 months ago. There was 2 cashier, 1 malay girl and another one too (i didnt pay attention at this person). So this malay cashier was at the counter and i asked her this cookie, before she even proceeded to scoop out the cookie she showed attitude. It was ok i let it brush out but the simplest thing as a worker in a any store need to be patience right but this girl as if she dont want any customers she straight up says the bill. What the hell?? Without even asking “is there anymore else maam” , not even that she just said this much (to pay) hello i can buy the whole shop if i wanted to do it. There is no manners or whatsoever. Just because i were choosing much more, she removed the glass window (which is normal i understand) but she literally banged that down (glass window) :) i just stared and just start pointing out without speaking because i reallly dont like her and her attitude/manners. Then during payment finish she didnt hand out the cookies instead bang it on the counter. There is a difference of just putting down and slam/bang on it. I can hear that sound of bang. I really lose my shit on there and wanted to scold her. I had endured every stages she has showed me , not necessarily to bang my cookies which I bought in MY MONEY not hers at all. We are the one paying her, if she cannot show a proper service dont work lah. Why are you making yourself a joke to the public. Even you have a major problem in home dont show that in your work place, work place is not a space for you to release your anger especially to your customers. I did not scold her and decided to stop going to Sunway Pyramid Famous Amos outlet anymore. This malay girl was wearing a glasses , i didnt saw the name but yes she was really a bad cashier. Better fire her. If she is not treating her customers well then no need to work. Very bad service. | review_rating:1, text:Both of the staff are very rude especially Yasmin. Keep on throwing things and seems annoyed whenever I asked about the products. Very very rude even had the audacity to scold customer zzzz. Very unprofessional

review_rating:5, text:Good service and staff Reen is very friendly to introduce the products to us. Definitely will come back again when we need anything prom prism+ | review_rating:1, text:I am beyond frustrated with Prism+. They promised a simple one-on-one exchange process for warranty claims, but the reality was far from that. Instead of a straightforward exchange or repair, I was forced to jump through countless hoops and complete endless steps just to get any kind of response. After all of that, they didn’t even exchange or repair the defective product.

What makes this worse is that they don’t even have a service center to handle issues directly. It’s all just a frustrating online back-and-forth with no actual support. I regret purchasing from this company and would advise others to stay away unless you want to deal with endless delays and a complete lack of customer care. | review_rating:2, text:I bought a Google TV Q series in 2022 via PRISM online platform (it comes with 2 years warranty).Now - Nov 24, my TV is 2 years 10 months old, it starts having problem, blank (black) screen after power on. name: Asus Concept Store
location: F1.AV.126-127, 129 & 130, Asian Avenue, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Yesterday, I had the pleasure of purchasing the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED, and the experience was nothing short of excellent. The seller was communicative and professional from start to finish, making the entire process smooth and enjoyable.

Before finalizing the purchase, I had a discussion with him regarding the laptop, its specifications, and additional items. He was knowledgeable, patient, and happy to address my questions. As part of the deal, I also received a laptop bag and a complimentary pen drive, which added great value to the purchase.

What stood out most was his approach—he wasn’t pushy or overly eager to close the deal. Instead, he gave me ample space and time to make an informed decision, which I truly appreciated. His cool and professional demeanor made it easy to trust his recommendations and services.

The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED itself is a fantastic device—sleek, powerful, and visually stunning with its OLED display. Coupled with the seller's outstanding service, it was a purchase I’m very satisfied with.

For anyone looking for a stress-free buying experience, I highly recommend this seller. It's rare to find someone who combines professionalism with a personal touch so effortlessly! | review_rating:5, text:Needed a basic laptop for my daughter's work. Bought a Asus E1404F, 8GB Ram, 512gb SSD from this store, the salesperson is very helpful and experienced. Good model for students. | review_rating:5, text:I just brought asus vivobook go E1504F ( R3-7320U, 8 gb ram, 512gb ssd 15.6 fhd amd radeon graphic, sliver w11h, H&S)
,no bad for student on study | review_rating:5, text:I recently Purchased an Asus Vivobook 16 as a replacement for my old Asus x570 which is 6 years old. The new Vivobook is thin, light, has larger 16 inch clear screen and came with 16GB RAM which makes browsing very fast. The AMD R5 7530U also uses very low power consumption. It came with free bag and also had Raya discount which is an added plus point. | review_rating:5, text:Like Vivobook series for they are light weighted laptop with attractive features and specifications. I selected Vivobook 16 for bigger display screen and latest processor yet affordable.

name: Ăn Viet
category: vietnamese_restaurant, cafe, wholesaler, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG1.46, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Food and Price:

1. Spring Roll Vermicelli - RM17.90
2. Rice Pork Chop - RM 19.90
3. Plain Water - RM1.20

Total with 16% tax = RM45.25

Overall the foods are served with normal Vietnamese food standard. Not too bad also not super good.

Portion is enough. Simple meal. | review_rating:5, text:It’s my first time to visit. The food tastes good to me because it’s not too spicy. The Vietnamese bread is a bit hard, but the grilled pork chop inside tastes good. I like the soup to be hot enough but not too heavy on MSG. I love the lemongrass and ginger tea with its strong ginger flavor. Spicy, the service staff are very polite, especially the male waiter at the cash register. He deserves praise for his politeness and patience. The overall meal is enjoyable and delicious to me. | review_rating:5, text:Came here for lunch on weekday, quite packed during lunch hour.

Their food is very good is all i can say, i did not have high expection for this place but wow. Everything is just good, even their service is good also. One thing that let me down is their Iced Dripped Coffee is not that strong. I wish they would let us enjoy the dripping process and allow us to pour into the cup ourselves to adjust the thickness and flavour we want.

Will come again for sure | review_rating:4, text:Visited twice, the first visit was a great experience, food was served quickly despite it was full house on a weekend. Food portion was big, and tasted delicious. Recommend the avocado coffee, we requested for less sugar and it was yummy.

Second visit was quite a let down. We ordered the banh mi pork chop, but the pork had a very strong strange taste, it’s the taste everybody is afraid of when eating pork. We couldn’t even finish.

I will return to this restaurant but I might not order pork dishes anymore | review_rating:4, text:We came here for our reunion lunch, oh gosh their beef balls really gave my sis and i a huge surprise! Both of our first visit and we were so in love with their beef balls! Lemon grass drinks definitely not our taste…… Gonna try out their pillow rice balls on our next visit.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Master Philip at Subway is one if the Best at Tit Tar. I am patient from Indonesia especially came and all muscles bones problems can be immediately cure. this is based in my own experience and I honestly feel very comfortable. it is good to have to regular check on our muscles since relax muscles will ease lots of problems and pain. | review_rating:5, text:I’m very happy with my treatment from Steve and will definitely come back. Very very good and I’ve been to a lot of different chiropractors. Genuinely impressed with his knowledge and technique.
Only thing that I wasn’t expecting was that I won’t be given a change of clothes like in all the other chiro clinics I’ve been to (but they were all in other countries so that’s not their fault, just my wrong assumption) Still would be nice to mention to the customer to wear comfortable clothes or mention it to me at the reception when I’m wearing a skirt. | review_rating:5, text:I have been experiencing back & waist pain for the past few months. After several treatments here at Tit Tar Man, I have gotten much better and definitely sleep more well at night.

Glad that I made the visit! | review_rating:3, text:The establishment looks high-end on the outside. When you walk into the treatment area, it's a rude awakening. Treatment areas are divided only by curtains and you can hear every word and every conversation from the master and his/her patient next to you. To me, this lack of privacy is quite unnerving.

It's also time for the management to consider changing the treatment table. It's kind of disgusting to lie on this disintegrating surface knowing that many others have been in the same position. | review_rating:5, text:Saw the ad from social media and came for the promo. staff was nice and advised clearly about the pricing and services Treatmentwise, the masters are very professional and helpful. targetting your problem area. highly recommended for an alternative to medicine.

location: Lot LG2.42A, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:[holiao]
1) Overall - Fast food chain selling various of food such as root beer, waffle, fried chicken, coney, float and more, almost self service, spacious seating with washing basin provided by
A&W at Sunway Pyramid
2) coney - juicy coney with generous of minced beef gravy, highly recommended
3) mozza burger - tender and juicy beef patty, flavorful, fluffy bun, must try
4) curly fries - never disappoint
5) waffle - tasted good, fluffy and fragrant | review_rating:1, text:Gee thanks a&w for serving my rootbeer in a broken mug while not providing any straws anymore, very progressive of you. Like bro what if people are physically challenged and need a straw genius at least have some in stock. And broken mugs cannot throw? Clearly not the first knock this mug experienced and yall still continue serving this. Whats worse is i got served brown straight cut fries when my order says curly fries. I get it yall think your customers can’t tell shapes apart lmao | review_rating:1, text:I had a disappointing experience at this A&W outlet, primarily due to the poor food quality which was notably inconsistent. The waffles were unappealing, appearing artificial and were served cold and overly crispy. The ice cream was haphazardly presented in fragments rather than in a complete, rounded scoop. Additionally, the curly fries were served cold, suggesting they had been sitting out for hours. The root beer float lacked fizziness and was served without a straw, which was inconvenient. Furthermore, the spoon provided for the float was incorrect; it wasn’t the long spoon typically used for such drinks. This experience was starkly inferior compared to what I’ve previously enjoyed at other A&W locations abroad. Very disappointing overall. | review_rating:4, text:Nice roots beer n orange juice , but the need to beware of the floor skirting near the front counter, see lots of ppl nearly fall due to uneven floor skirting | review_rating:5, text:1. 4.rootbear rasa maintain sedap..

5. Good service from Staff Nadirah & dapat free  lagi air botol..

reviews: review_rating:1, text:Very poor service despite no one bother when you go in and when asked if got sell shoes sales very rude answer | review_rating:1, text:Bought a sling bag for my husband for his birthday from Lacoste Sunway Pyramid. After 9 days of using it (Yes, just 9 days!) the paint on the logo came off. We went in and request for an exchange or refund or ANY sort of solution with the original receipt and tag because it was clearly faulty. The lady that was “in-charged” says they can’t do anything. It is clearly faulty that I think even a fake one from online won’t do that within a month, let alone only 9 days of using it. They provide no solution at all and just ask us to contact Lacoste ourselves by giving us the generic website. It wasn’t even an discounted item and we paid FULL PRICE for such absurd product and service. The quality of the product is already disappointing enough, but with the attitude of that staff showing no sympathy (yup, not even an apology and all she say was “cannot refund” without any explanation) was just enough to show how Lacoste as a brand and their staffs value their customers. Period. | review_rating:1, text:Do not shop here, staff do not honour guarantee and will be rude to you when you ask for a refund or replacement, manager will hide in the corner texting the staff what to say to you instead of being upfront and honouring the brand. | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to exchange a shoe whitin 7 days, but failed. The shoe made my leg hurtled and even can see the wound. They still can't do exchange. What the xxxx? | review_rating:1, text:Do not recommend any foreigners or locals make purchases at this store until management is changed and customer values are in mind at the store as we made a purchase here and the item was defective, we returned within the guarantee period and the staff had 0% care when handling us about the defective product they made me come back an hour later just to say "can't" exchange or refund with no explanation why, we pushed for a reason even mentioning Malaysian consumer law word for word to them with no care at all from them, they gave us a website saying email the website but the website isn't even a Lacoste website, do not shop here at Sunway Pyramid.

name: E Fix
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Chicken Claypot House
location: Lot No. OB2.G.U2, Oasis Boulevard, Ground Floor Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Short review:
Sesame Chicken Claypot ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Suancai Fish ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Long review:
In my 4th visit, I decided not to go for those chicken hotpot options and settled for a sesame chicken claypot and suancai fish. Yes, even Chicken Claypot House cannot deny the popularity of this dish now in Malaysia and has introduced it into their menu as a seasonal offer.
Sesame Chicken Claypot ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
I thoroughly enjoyed this dish. The sauce was really savory with just enough of that sesame taste. In addition to that, the finely chopped and pre-fried ginger gave this dish that extra fragrant taste. So it was not good for my dieting plan as I ended up having two and a half bowl of rice just because of it. The chicken was also pre-marinated I believe. It was flavorful although the kitchen staff gave me mostly chicken breast.

One criticism I have for this restaurant is its rice. It's very lumpy and has limited the joy of having this sauce on the rice. 1 star for the rice.

Suancai Fish ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
For this dish, it came in a humongous bowl. There's not a lot of fish slices but the quality of the fish is there. No earthy taste unlike Tai Er. For me, that is my number one criteria when it comes to eating fish. To be fair to Tai Er, the first and the last time I was there was about one and half years ago. I hope things have changed now for them. Coming back to Chicken Claypot House's version, the peppercorn soup gives you quite the heat after consuming it for a while. But it was good and I like the fact that the sourish taste did not go overboard as to render it acidic in taste. Another important thing to note is that it did not come with a THICK layer of oil unlike the others that I have tried before. So I did not have to spend time filtering away the oil. So it does hold up well to other restaurants that specialize in this dish. | review_rating:4, text:Soups are super tasty and big bowl .love the fish soup portion reasonable come with 龟苓膏 and herbal tea. Recommended. | review_rating:4, text:1. Signature claypot chicken: It was delicious and paired well with rice. The chicken was flavorful.

2. Herbal chicken soup: Just okay. The herbal taste wasn't particularly strong, with limited chicken pieces.

3. Fish head steamboat: A new addition to the menu. The dish had a decent taste.

Generally, the food here had a heavy flavor and left us feeling quite thirsty after the meal. It was enjoyable, but we would recommend having a beverage on hand to counterbalance the strong taste. | review_rating:3, text:Indoor aircond environment, not to worry having steamboat even under warm weather. This eatery has few branches and their have several main dishes / pot soup to choose from, then you can add other ingredients.

Taste ok, nothing much to shout about. Definately not a cheap choice | review_rating:3, text:First time there and I have to say it wasn't a happy experience. RM78 chicken herbal soup for two is steep. You have to pay rm2 for Condiments. We added on tongho vegy and just a small handful costed rm8.90. the pricing and portions didn't make any sense.

Worked out to over rm60/pax with just veg and tofu added, 2 small rice and one glass of Chinese tea. I can't say I have much to say about the service either.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Food is good. Went there for 3rd visit, taste is consistent. But the kimchi marination for beef getting lesser each time. Take 150g beef will be enough for 1 person. Long waiting time during weekend if they did not have spot for 2 person. They will asked if you willing to join table with another customer. Service is fast as not much preparation on their side. The grilling smell is not too overwhelming, doesn’t really stick to your cloth. Overall, all good. Wish they had more seating so people don’t need to wait to the table | review_rating:5, text:Latest Yakiniku joint in Sunway Pyramid. Great spread of premium beef (Angus and Wagyu), seafood, lamb, chicken and sides. Individual BBQ pit with good ventilation exhaust does not leave any odour in the air or on clothes 👍

Service staff were attentive and polite.

Marinated BBQ meats were moist, tender and tasty. Seafood and vegetables could have better been served with some oil/marinade on the side to prevent it from being too dry during BBQ.

Overall nice dining venue and would surely come back again. | review_rating:5, text:Latest Yakiniku in Sunway Pyramid, I like that I have the option to sit at my own mini table, it remind me of Ichiran ramen solo table. The meat quality especially the beef tongue was better then expected and the miso soup quality was also decent. I recommended people to don't skip order the beef tongue despite there's no set for it. It's quite surprise to know that they provide himalayan pink salt instead of normal salt.

The waiter was very professional and trying to make me feel comfortable. He was patiently explain to me about the menu. I also overheard him explain to an old couple behind me for quite a long time without getting annoyed. Big respect for the waiter patience.

Overall, the pricing may be a bit steep but for the quality they provided and the service they provided i think it's worth it. Would visit again if I got pass by. | review_rating:5, text:Had a pleasant dining experience at Yakiniku Kuro~ Especially love their Premium Australia Infused Steak Cut! Beef is so juicy and delicious! Love it 😻 Would definitely revisit again! | review_rating:5, text:Literally my favorite yakiniku restaurant. I had a similar one in Thailand but personally I think the fatty beef (idk the name) one is so much better, much juicier. The sauce is just great but I love eating meat with just salt. Once I’m bored of salt I eat their sauce.

name: Samsonite (Pop Up)
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

location: F1.41, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Early morning 7早8早 😴 go Pyramid get Honor special promotion RM 18.00 (their Facebook photo info claim is Retail Price RM 149) 10K PowerBank 🔋⚡for 📱📲 📷📸 😓
Staff there say has another optional same price Rock PowerBank 10k.. What ROCK ?? 🧐🤔
2020 October 10 | review_rating:5, text:Buy honor watch gs prk Best price shop promo. Best ruggard watch..love the staff answers all my questions.. 5/5 star.. | review_rating:3, text:Honor is a good brand and getting better every year, but the sales guys I have experienced two times here are quite bad. Just save your time and do you research and read reviews online, before buying on the official Honor Shopee OS. Can even purchase it there by monthly BNPL installments. I recommend the Honor laptops and 5G phones above RM1500. | review_rating:1, text:Went to honor pyramid outlet on 6 Dec. The guy was Unfriendly, uninterested when asked him how to reset honor wrist watch to my phone. He doesn't really bother to assist when I hv prob doing it. Continued looking at his phone!! He further commented that it is my Samsung phone having the issue. Asked me to go to samsung customer service instead. Lousy customer service. BAD image for HONOR!!!

manning the outlet. | review_rating:5, text:Bought 3 Honor bands from Adrian and a Huawei handphone as well. Service was beyond excellent. As I live in Melbourne, he even provide after sales service when I encountered problems pairing my devices. He followed up persistently for a few days until my problem was resolved. Superb service!! Would have given him 10 STARS if I could. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

name: BananaBro
location: LG2.85 Lower Ground Two, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I enjoyed my lunch w the set it was fulfilling.
The service was quite fast from 1 waiter man but quite slow from 1 waiter lady which can clearly saw her attitude I'm not certain if she has a lot of things on her plate but it was quite unprofessional judging her from her body posture.

I can see a bit lack of staffing or poor task delegations. The waiter be the cashier and serve the customers at the same time cleans the table. That is why only 4star.

Highly recommended for food but need to have patience for the staff to clear tables and serves customers the food. | review_rating:5, text:I have been to many banana bro branches. I must say the service here is superb. Very friendly staff. Very generous portion that they service. They even reminded me to use my points to redeem free drinks and side dishes.
Will definitely return to this place in future. | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing Experience – Poor Management & Slow Service

I had one of the worst dining experiences at this restaurant. Despite six empty tables, we had to wait 30 minutes just for the staff to clean one so we could sit. The place is clearly understaffed, crammed and the existing employees work extremely slowly—taking orders, serving food, and even handling payments not within stipulated time-frame which leads for congestion and long queue.

Most frustrating and disappointing scenarios is thier very own employee is serving the customers without break time and most of the suffering with empty stomach for accomplishing duty.

The lack of crowd management and efficiency is frustrating, especially for hungry customers waiting for food. If you value your time and good service, this is not the place to visit. Definitely not worth the wait! | review_rating:4, text:Would have given 5 star if not for that poor service. Waited for some time for a table even though there were empty ones but not cleared. One staff had the audacity to ask to move from a bigger table (cleared) to a smaller table (dirty and full of uncleared dishes). She should have the courtesy to clear the smaller table before asking anyone to change table.

Anyway, food was good and portion was generous. Will definitely come back with more people so that I can order more side dishes. | review_rating:1, text:Shortage of staff working when we arrive around6pm during weekend. Table not full but they close to receive customers saying they can’t afford full house customers. Return to try after 1hr then only they open their door. Food serve weren’t hygiene. What I scooped from the cabbage? Seems like bite n spit back. Hav I guess wrongly? Even though they mentioned vegetables  are refillable but only managed to eat one round then no more add on because not enough vege..seriously gonna wait for more than half an hour for refill.. yea no fried veggies to refill even though they said is refillable. Very disappointed with this shop. Only rempah fried chicken was good. Not worthy. Will not return.

name: Hou Duck
location: LG2.129A, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 2 & 136D, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:New food shop located right beside Jaya Grocer. Tried the Peking duck (half), signature fried rice and braised noodle. Food was above average. Very tender duck meat and crispy duck skin. Popiah skin paired with duck sauce, cucumber, leek and crispy duck skin. Braised noodle in Hokkien style was generous with ingredients : prawn, fishcakes and squid

One downside is the fried rice is quite oily. | review_rating:3, text:The roasted duck is super skinny 👀.
The char siu is chewy and delicious.

The waitress seemed very kancheong rushing me to place an order and not giving time to think. The serving time was quite long too.

Overall, it’s considered pricey for the portion they provide. | review_rating:3, text:The whole Peking duck is really worth the value to try.
Whole duck come with twenty pancake (Chun Bing), each pancake with "divider" in between, not like some restaurant, the whole pancake stack together, hard to remove.

Nut the rice doesn't feel like it has any water, maybe the water ratio is not correct.
Noodle are too salty. | review_rating:5, text:Peking Duck: Crispy, Full of Aroma, Juicy & tender
Authentic!
Braised noodles with duck meat: full of wok hei yummy

trio eggs vege: average, small portion

Environment: relatively small as compared to traveling duck (same boss) | review_rating:5, text:Had an amazing dining experience at Hou Duck @ Sunway Pyramid! The Peking duck was simply divine – perfectly crispy skin with tender, flavorful meat. The presentation was impeccable, and the wraps and condiments complemented the duck beautifully. The ambiance was cozy, and the service was attentive. Highly recommend for Peking duck lovers!

name: Ah Cheng Laksa
location: Lot LG2.88, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Was having dinner at Ah Cheng Laksa Sunway Pyramid on 23/2. Ordered a buttermilk chicken chop rice and it came as picture shown below. The chicken was completely over fried and became black on the top. Voiced out to the staff in the kitchen and the manager responded with “it’s cooked in this way, usually. Doesn’t seem to be something wrong.” The staff clearly did not admit this is wrong and they did not try to compensate or offer anything to replace. I would say this is the worst thing that could possibly happen to a F&B company. Quality control - bad. Staff quality - not up to standard and not educated as they did not know what’s the right thing to do they face issues. Perhaps this is the last time that I would step into the same restaurant unless the company is willing to change and make it better. | review_rating:4, text:It's a bit crampy. No service as you scan to order. Fried Popiah Aet Rm11.90 with 1 drink (popiah, outside crunchy but inside like not cook, could be it's inside freezer n they fried it when there's order), Keropok lekor Set Rm11.89 with 1 drink (Lekor is too soft inside) & Laksa Junior set Rm15.90 with 1 ABC (theres kidney beans, corn, peanuts & cincau). | review_rating:4, text:The food was good, but the service was super slow. We needed to ask several times before we got our food | review_rating:4, text:Halal certified.  The Asam Laksa is the best seller for a good reason. Super tasty and just a bit spicy.  Added fish and it was totally worth it.  Staff are friendly and the kitchen is lightning fast. Dining area is clean and the place has a good vibe. | review_rating:4, text:Must try the Asam Laksa! The longer you eat it the better it gets. The Ayam Rendang was ok but nothing special about it. One thing I noticed was everything was cooked to order which was a surprise. I recommend trying this place out when you visit Sunway.

location: Lot LG2.37, Level LG2, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I’m absolutely in love with the staff. They were so friendly and helpful with me (just an aunty trying to get free stuff). Guiding me thru the app and how to redeem a B1F1. It was kind of them to be so patient with me. The drinks were exceptionally good, as always. I love ZUS!! Thank you again, for the wonderful experience and memories! | review_rating:4, text:This is my very first time to try the drinks in this outlet. The look and feel of the outlet were good, service was good, the taste of the drinks was good with lots of creative favours but not enough aroma and kaw yet, anyway your drinks are much much more better a lot than Costa Coffee in KLIA 1 | review_rating:5, text:My drinks were served lightning fast. They even remember who ordered what, so instead of calling out the order number, they gestured to me when my drinks were ready. I tried the honey lemon and iced chocolate. Both were very good, especially the honey lemon. I can taste a lot of honey when most businesses usually put a lot of lemon or tea. The price is very reasonable for the quality. Considering the other options, I think I'm switching to Zus Coffee as my go-to drinks shop. | review_rating:5, text:I’m absolutely in love with the staff. They were so friendly and helpful. The drinks were exceptionally good, as always. I love ZUS!! Thank you again, for the wonderful experience and memories! | review_rating:5, text:Very efficient staff despite a big crowd of customers. Cashier was also friendly. And surprisingly my Butterbae was ready within 5 minutes!
Highly recommend this outlet!

review_rating:4, text:Food was average. Look wise need to improve. Using dark soya sauce all the food looks darker.the mango salad was good and refreshing. | review_rating:3, text:Fish glue is frozen, glass noodle only 1 prawn, soup is ok, and Thai tea is good. Service needs improvement. One Utama Johnny's is far better. | review_rating:1, text:Service so bad, this is 3 rd time happened to me. I order my food, after waiting for 25 minutes, suddenly the crew n supervisor advice my order not available. I understand it's a peak season but please don't waste customers time waiting. | review_rating:1, text:The customer service was very cold, odd & bewildering.
The atmosphere as per exhibited by the waitress was bordeline hostile.

Question:

1. Is it the SOP that takeaway customers are not allowed to be seated in order to view the menu & make the selection?

The restaurant was only a handful of customers since it was after lunch hour (1521 hours). Thus, there are a lot of empty tables. In addition, there were no customer queuing anyway.

2. Is it the SOP that takeaway customers is warranted to wait outside of the restaurant while awaiting for the meal to be ready?

It really baffles me that I was not allowed to be seated because I have chose to takeway my meals.

The waitress in a way insisted me to wait outside for my meal, whereas, I have ordered 2 drinks for dine-in (the drinks were noted as takeaway in the receipt, even though I have stated otherwise).

If not because of one (1) of the waiter (a gentleman), I would have to stand outside while waiting for my meal.

3. Is it the SOP as well for the customer to clear the table from the drinks which were consumed as dine-in?
(As aforementioned, the drinks were packed as takeaway, whereas I had it ordered as dine-in).

This is my 1st & final visit to Johnny's (Sunway Pyramid's branch). | review_rating:2, text:The service was mediocre at best, there's a stupid robot waiter with songs playing like its necessary to have it.

we sat at the table near the cash register and behind it is the dishwashing station, while we're eating, the staff kept throwing dishes in the sink with no utmost regard for the patron and making loud noises.

it's so noisy that we can't eat in peace, while we want to ask for more sauce we can see nobody is really looking over the table eager to serve, had to yell to get their attention.

maybe the management don't really care for the customer wellbeing.

name: Brooks
location: F1.58C, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had an excellent experience at the Brooks Outlet, thanks to Mr. Iskandar! From the moment I walked in, he was incredibly attentive, friendly, and helpful. He took the time to provide detailed information about the different trail shoes, ensuring I found the perfect pair for my needs. What impressed me the most was his knowledge and dedication—he even taught me the proper way to tie my shoes for the best fit and support.

It’s rare to find such outstanding customer service, and Mr. Iskandar truly went above and beyond. Kudos to Brooks for having such an amazing employee! I highly recommend visiting if you're looking for expert advice and top-notch service. | review_rating:5, text:I had been served by two friendly handsome guys and a gentle lady. ISKANDAR AND MANSON look for them. They not only salesperson. They have very good knowledge. | review_rating:5, text:I was so happy with my purchase today. At first the shoes I like doesn’t have my size. Manson is so great at recommending suitable shoes for my feet and also explain the functionality of the shoes and how to take care of it, plus how to wear it properly so you can protect ur feet/leg. It was a fun and happy moment having Manson during the purchase. My friend couldn’t resist and also bought the limited ed cascadia. I got myself a Ghost max. Super happy and will come back for Manson for next purchase. Super duper recommended! | review_rating:5, text:The salesperson, Manson is very knowledgeable about the functions of the shoes. He explained to me patiently and recommended the shoes that suits me. Great experience and good service. | review_rating:5, text:1) I went to this Brooks outlet for the first time. I was served by Mr.Syed. He seemed knowlegeable about shoes, polite and not hard-pressing me to buy. He listened to my preferences and opinions intently until I said I wanted to compare Brooks with another shoe store nearby.
2) I went to the other shoe store and in summary was not satisfied with my encounter there.
3) I returned to Brooks and Mr.Syed took the time to entertain my queries with enthusiasm. I finally bought a pair of 17 for trail and hiking. By this time, the store owner arrived and I expressed my satisfying experience there. The owner requested me to write a review and this is why you can read this note now.
4) One lesson learnt is, respect and honour your customer well by employing a knowlegeable staff with the correct attitude and aptitude, like Mr.Syed. Tqvm.

name: Moobeeii Art Garden
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Neubodi
location: G1.81, G Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Great customer service and staff is very helpful. They are also very knowledgeable about bras. Recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Enjoyed my experience with Anis here. She is very professional and patient in assisting me on my bra selection and sizing. Very good service. Well done! | review_rating:5, text:10/10 service
(This is coming from a person who has worn the wrong size and didn't know how to wear a bra properly for the past 5-6 years)

The bra's are expensive but it's definitely worth the service that they give you.
For the first time in my life, the people working there wasn't like. "Aunty see, Aunty know."
When I say body positivity, this is the place for that.
They don't mention anything about your size, or how big or small your bust size or cup is. No word about it at all. As it should be.

I've struggled finding the right size that was comfortable for me and my chest. Yes, the ladies might be invasive and touching those places but they point things out to me that I have never noticed before since no one told me. Especially showing me how to wear a bra properly, literally hands on me.

For the first time in my life, I feel more confident in my body - especially my breast. There is nothing wrong with small or large breast, we are all special in our own way :)

If you struggle to find a size perfect for you and need the service that helps you feel confident in yourself (even just a little) come here.
They are all nice ladies. | review_rating:5, text:Good service by MaiLi :) Very attentive & resposible to her customer | review_rating:5, text:Very good customer service, staff very helpful  and knowledgeable..get my bra in correct size overall satisfying..recommended 👍🏻

reviews: review_rating:5, text:I am a fan & supporter of this Korean brand since I switched from Laneige 5 years ago in 2019 when Yoona was the spokesperson for this brand. Everything is good on products, promotion and services. The previous Manager was very professional, and the current one is very experienced. But nowadays I don’t see much variety and colours of this brand anymore, many products has discontinued, it is getting more & more casual and simple, the colour & shape of products are almost the same and very difficult to identify the item that I am looking for until I read the shelf taller or told & explain by the staff. I really miss the colours, and hope that it will be back again in future | review_rating:5, text:had a very pleasant experience this evening at innisfree! the staff was very attentive, friendly and knowledgeable as she explained each products that would suit me. she also wrote a note for my future reference! :) thank you! | review_rating:1, text:Absolutely racist. Get better service!! | review_rating:5, text:I’m so happy I met Aiko at the Sunway Pyramid 10th Anniversary pop-up store today! So i just told her i wanted to pay and i left after paying. I was in and out for less than 3 mins because of this experience. I will never step foot in this innisfree anymore. This is the first time i was treated this way. And i actually read through some of the reviews of this outlet and there are others who experience this. My time stamp was 22nd Nov 2024 1.56pm.

name: Honor
location: Lot F1.48, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I recently visited the Honor store at Sunway Pyramid and had an excellent experience, thanks to the outstanding service provided by Jayden, one of the sales assistants. Jayden was incredibly knowledgeable about the products, patiently answered all my questions, and guided me to choose the perfect phone that met my needs and budget.

His professionalism and friendly attitude made the shopping experience smooth and enjoyable. He also took the time to explain the features of the phone I purchased and made sure I understood everything before leaving the store.

I highly recommend this store for anyone looking for an Honor device, and a special shoutout to Jayden for his exceptional customer service!

Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ | review_rating:5, text:First time been here, nice and friendly staff's.. Will recommended you guys out there to drop by here. Staff named: Hayley. Thanks so much. 😃 | review_rating:5, text:Great place, I had a emergency of needed of temporary phone. I managed to get a good phone which was under RM500, which helped by Mr Kenny. He was extraordinary in helping me get a phone according to my request. He was not like any salesman, he helped me from price point and the price point. Kudos!! to the team, hope we get to do business more in near future. Once again would give at most appreciation to the team. | review_rating:5, text:Recommend salesman Kenny as he has been very helpful and patiently answer and explain towards my questions and enquiries
Bought my phone from here | review_rating:5, text:I can't speak highly enough of Honor Sunway Store. The entire experience, from the moment I walked in, was fantastic. Ms Hayley serviced me when I was there to get an elderly friendly mobile phone for my father. I was asking for a phone which is with bigger font and stylus compatible. She recommended me for the model Honor 90. Ms Hayley was not only knowledgeable but also took the time to address all my questions and concerns with her professionalism.
I left the store feeling satisfied with the service I received. If you're looking for a reputable mobile store with a compassionate customer service, look no further than Honor Sunway Store .

reviews: review_rating:5, text:Finally bought new mattress and have a good experience with the high quality item. name: MIX STORE
category: convenience_store, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2－132A & 132B, Oasis Entrance, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:2days ago I went to this store in Sunway Pyramid to buy some snacks n nuts for my friends n guests who are coming to visit me during this Chinese New Year festive period. Previously I did buy some walnuts, cashew nuts n peanuts but my family members have eaten them all already. Since I was shopping in Sunway Pyramid, I walked into this store n was amazed by the huge varieties of different types of snacks, nuts , biscuits , chips n candies n jellies on sale. All these were packed n sealed in attractive n easy to carry packages. There were healthy snacks, instant vegetable snacks,children’s snacks, candy n jelly n various nuts n drinks- all imported from China. As for the bottled drinks, they were selling sugar cane juice, lime juice n orange juice. As for the nuts, if you buy one big packet of assorted nuts , you will get another packet free of charge. These were all beautifully gift wrapped .  So I browsed around the shelves n bought some packets of mixed nuts n healthy snacks . | review_rating:5, text:Took over Yubiso store....strategic location in Sunway Pyramid, become my frequent visited store. I like here because they have few good ready-make frozen seafoods dishes ( actually from local 5* restaurants and all info.written in Chinese words only )available here. Won't leave without empty handed, can't resist to try most of the snacks here....attracted by colourful bright and cute packaging...still the pricey comparing with China price. | review_rating:1, text:Don’t be fooled by huge variety. Stock expiry dates not checked properly. They sell expired goods. Family member did not check and bought this snack, tasted stale & realized it’s expired. I wanted to buy their yogurt pack of 12, but luckily I checked and realized ALL the packs were expired 3 months ago - expired YOGURT left for customers to buy! | review_rating:5, text:One of the best for snacks lover | review_rating:5, text:Good shop that you can find  so many products in here!!

name: G-Shock
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Koi The
location: Sunway Pyramid, Lot LG2.125, Lower Ground 2, Blue Atrium, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Even though I’m not really into the tea craze nowadays, I found KOI Thé’s Iced Black Tea Lychee refreshing and enjoyable. The drink was nicely crafted with a pleasant balance of flavors, perfect for a quick cool down. However, the place was quite packed, and the service felt a bit slow. The waiting wasn’t the best part, but overall, a decent spot for a treat. | review_rating:4, text:KOI tea is really aromatic and rich in tea flavor. It is not something common like all other bubble tea competitors served. The ingredients like bubble and grass jelly are fresh and not over cooked. Although the tea choices is quite limited, but every tea choices in menu is up to standard and really worth to try. You can choose the sweetness of drinks in 5 level. The staff is also caring enough to cover your cold drink cup with a piece of tissue (to block your hand from touching the cold surface of cup directly). | review_rating:4, text:Bubbles are so chewy and not hard. Flavor is nice but their 50% sugar tasted like 25%. Looking at other "too sweet" reviews, I guess their sugar isnt very standard. Otherwise, flavors here are nice. I got hazelnut milk tea and my friends got and enjoyed other flavors. | review_rating:1, text:Unpleasant experience from order Koi in foodpanda, the shop staff wrongly prepare order, I've order 3 cups but they only prepare 1 cup and to add on it even the drink is incorrect. This is such a ridiculous mistake, I have to go through a lot of hassle to cancel order through foodpanda. | review_rating:4, text:There are some seats inside the shop. Most of ppl took it to go. Matcha series was good and Caramel macchiato was too sweet (even though I said ' less sugar')

Golden honey bubble tea was the best for me so far. :)
