name: Cotton On
location: LG1.130 & LG1.131, Pyramid, Sunway Pyramid, Shop, 3, Jalan PJS 11/16, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Casual clothing store for both her and him. All prices were generally higher than I expected. Couldn't find any garment that was made of 100% cotton. | review_rating:5, text:Mohd Shazwan the supervisor was awesome! Had perks voucher drama and he calmly helped me, WHILE charging my phone. Well done for doing a fab job managing an annoyed customer;) | review_rating:5, text:Had a great experience with retail staff, Alex. The sweetest, most patient n  helpful person   😊
Thank you, Alex! | review_rating:5, text:God bless YOUUUU🤭🤭🤭🙏🏽🙏🏽🙏🏽thank youuuu soooo muchhhhh💞💞 | review_rating:1, text:Staff at Sunway Pyramid are rude, especially the ones working at the counters.

On 2nd of February 2019, at 8:58 I had a nasty encounter with 3 cashiers with foul attitudes towards me wanting to swap my change for a better note (the one they gave me had a significantly big hole on it) as not all stores accept torn notes. The male cashier (MUHD SYAFIQ) pretended to exchange the note but instead gave me the same one with a hole (he covered it with his fingers). The other male (AHMAD AMNAN) who was in charge of handling my purchase completely ignored my request to change notes and walked off. Not only are the staff ignorant and dishonest, a female salesperson/cashier (idrk) mocked at my request to change notes. She even made the comment saying "It is still accepted" and continued to make rude comments on me to her co-workers.

These behaviors are not what staff who are working at the service industry should have. They are clearly not well behaved and that reflects on how the shopping experience at cotton on is terrible.

name: Dandy
location: LG2-128A, Blue Atrium, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Ordered the mixed grill, falafel platter, and summer at the sea. The food was quite good. They were grilled and fried nicely, with balanced taste. However, the portion was quite small, considering the price was on the higher side. The Lebanese coffee was  good. Services were good. Staff were friendly and attentive. | review_rating:4, text:We ordered 3 main dishes and 4 drinks. The quality, presentation and portion of the food is pretty good.

Our mix platter were generally okay. My son love the yogurt sauce and I think he complimented it at least 10 times. Lol. The lamb meat is a little on the tough, chewier side. The kebab is also a little dense. Chicken breast cutlets a little overcooked. Hummus needs more olive oil & I would prefer if you don't spread it so thinly on the plate. By the time it is served it almost dried out. Probably just spread on certain portion of the plate and keep it thicker.

The beef burger (served using a pita bread) is good. My only comment is the sauce used in it taste a little like cheap cheese sauce. Otherwise, the nachos, salad are good. The meat inside is flavorful but still also on the dense side. I think maybe is the same meat mixture as the kebab.

The buffalo wings batter is really crispy. The fries are done so well. Super crispy and well seasoned.

The drinks were all great in taste and presentation.

We love the atmosphere and the service attitude. ♥️ | review_rating:4, text:Good menu variety, very unique fusion of modern mediterranean food. Place is comfortable and bright, and service is good. Loved the nachos and especially that dipping sauce that came with it.
Ordered the falafel wrap because it seemed pretty unique. Taste was great but somehow it didn't sit well with my stomach later on.
We got the free baklava set from signing up and honestly it was not too sweet and just nice. Overall, I'd recommend to still give this place a try. | review_rating:5, text:The shop are beautiful and clean. Apparently, it just opened 4 weeks ago. The waiter mentioned that there are a few other branches. The food is delicious.

It was my first time trying Lebanese coffee. The coffee wasn’t too strong and suited my taste. It also had a hint of cardamom and a slightly spiced flavor.

All the staff were very kind and customer-friendly. The prices of the food were quite reasonable and not too expensive. Worth it. However, the downside is that the internet at the shop was a bit weak, so ordering online was a bit slow and challenging. Hopefully, the management will take note of this.

1) lebanese coffee 5🌟
2) Original Roaster 5🌟
3) Dandy buffalo wings 4.8 🌟
4) Dandy Rib-Eye 5🌟 | review_rating:5, text:Visited Dandy and we were absolutely impressed by the great taste and variety of food! Each dish we tried was packed with flavor and prepared to perfection. The menu offers such a wide selection, making it hard to choose – which is why we’ll definitely be coming back to explore more of their offerings. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a satisfying dining experience!

name: Giant B Pure Honey
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

review_rating:2, text:Registered member but still Failed to get discount! Disappointed 😞Get nothing discount but Wasting Time 😞 | review_rating:5, text:Clothes were pretty nice and staff was very helpful with choosing and recommending clothes.

Won't coming back to this shop again! | review_rating:1, text:Today I was taking my shirt ready to pay at the counter. Suddenly I saw the staff take my shirt to exchange at the back with a shirt with dirts. I asked her why change? She said it’s the last one, then I looked at the direction of the rack with the same clothes with many sizes. Then, she only change back the shirt I took for me. First time buying shirt from this boutique and I was quite shocked with the staff’s attitude.

review_rating:1, text:I initially bought 4 boxes of contact lenses at A-Look. they even show the package; to show that their items are brand new

and they're also very helpful when setting up the new laptop too | review_rating:5, text:Salesman here is the best! He recommends me laptop that suits my prefrences and budget. Since I have a tight budget, I requested to pay with cash and credit card installment tho I know I never heard of this kind of payment. To the suprise, they said its okay to pay half with cash, and the rest with installment. So I paid the Rm3,699  , RM699 with cash, and the other RM3k with Maybank CC installment for 1year. Im so happy with my purchase🎉 Even got RM50 e-wallet, free backpack and wireless mouse as free gift😁 Hopefully can code happily after this with this new laptop🥰 | review_rating:5, text:HP is always my trusted brand. name: Mail Boxes Etc
location: CP3.01, Car Park Level 3 (Orange Atrium) Sunway Pyramid, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The guy in counter is soft spoken. despite the long line. he handled customers very well. Kudos to him and this place to set up a printing service in the mall. Paid M40 price for photostat IC but it was worth not going out in the hot sun to find another place | review_rating:2, text:I went to collect my parcel today. After the foreign worker asked me for the pin, he asked me, "Sampai bila?" I was confused by his question and thought he was asking about the expiry or last collection date. So, I showed him my phone, but he started checking all the previous messages. I reminded him that the other parcels mentioned in the previous messages had already been collected and that he only needed to check the last message.

He spoke to me in an unfriendly manner and asked, "Parcel bila sampai?" That was when I finally understood his question. I informed him that the parcel had just arrived today. However, at the end, he said to me in a blaming tone, "Lain kali bagi tahu parcel bila sampai, sini parcel banyak."

Another staff member (Kakak with glasses) kindly explained to me that, because they have so many parcels, they usually categorize them by the received date.

I understand the workload, but I must say this:

Normally, I drop my parcels at the Mentari branch, but since that branch was full, I decided to use this branch instead. However, I will never drop my parcels here again.

Please provide proper training to your foreign worker in Bahasa Malaysia to avoid giving customers incorrect information and then blaming us for it afterward. | review_rating:5, text:The malay staff is veryyyyyy friendly and provided good services! | review_rating:5, text:Friendly staff, make easy process to shipping. Very helpful... | review_rating:1, text:Dropped my parcels at 7pm  today, and they have 2 hours to scan before closing and yet they did not scanned it.

Thanks to them I have lost my Preferred status in Shopee due to "Late Shipment" even though I as a seller has already tried my very best to post it out on the very same day.  However, we seller being "punished" for these irresponsible staff working in this outlet.

Yes I know you need to serve your walk ins, but please be mindful to scan it la after serving them, so hard to scan ke?

Not demure at all. Not responsible at all.

Don't forget we platform sellers, are your customers too.

Update to reply owner:

Your reply already shows that you don't even bother about it. Thanks for proving my point. Again , I dont expect the parcels to scan IMMEDIATELY.  Expecting people to give you good review and rating while don't even have the means to reply customer that you will try your best to serve better? How you know that I don't bother to change my rating? Arrogant.

name: AED
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Attended this store twice and in both events, the salesperson (both the female and male, i dont know their names) seem to be in bad mood. i feel like talking to a wall with the lack of smile and response. Hope you guys can improve your customer service because I have always received such good energy when I went to other shoes store, but this one? 😵‍💫😵‍💫😵‍💫 | review_rating:2, text:Varieties colour and model to choose. It just the sales person that im not so satisfied.

The sales person name Aisya if im not mistaken. At first i was excited to buy the shoes but didnt received any smile with her but when she talk with other customer i saw she can smile n laugh might be a regular customer there. But when it come to serve us, theres no smile at all until we buy 1 pair of shoe then can hear her voice n a-little bit smile. But still in retail industry especially you work facing customer everyday that is unacceptable. Not so welcoming. Im sorry. Ive been in this industry totally unacceptable. Thank you. | review_rating:1, text:Rude staff, worst service. Act like they are high class people, just because the shoes are famous doesn't mean that you are good. You are just a customer service staff. ASICS should work hard on your staff selection and training, I would rather go to Atmos or JD to buy shoes, instead of beating with your terrible staff! | review_rating:4, text:Good experience, served by a very passionate / knowledgeable Sales consultant ( Hafiz) I would say, at first was undecided of which shoe model, range that suits me... But after Hafiz's explanations and advise...letting me trying out few pairs...

ON.. I got my pair of New Asics running shoes.

Management

You put the Right person at the right place....👍👍👍👍

Happy for you. | review_rating:5, text:In June 2024, approximately four months ago, I acquired my first pair of Asics Gel Nimbus 26 and received exemplary customer service. Hafiz, the sales associate who assisted me, exhibited a commendable level of expertise, patience, and attentiveness to my requirements.

I highly recommend seeking out Hafiz for assistance with your purchases, as my experience with him has been nothing short of satisfactory.

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I came to this store on January 2 at 4:30 PM. There was a lady handling the shop, and I bought something from her. When we asked her about the location of the shop, she gave us an unpleasant look and responded with an attitude as if she didn’t want to entertain us. The customer service was really disappointing. A simple question shouldn’t be met with such an attitude. | review_rating:1, text:What type of quality is this , you are real outlet , not merged with other bakery. Heavily burnt egg tarts can still be sold? The staff of this shop rude to customers not only me.I didnot expect too high for the food quality because sometimes have small mistake can be accepted but you on service line at least be polite to you customer. | review_rating:1, text:They displayed durian tarts with crème brûlée label. name: Myfeet
location: LG1.116C, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I have been shopping with MyFeet for many many years... it was such an unpleasant experience today as I went there to get another pair as mine spoilt after 1 year+... all these years it was the male store assistant serving us... this time he was busy with other customer... so the female store assistant served us... she showed horrible customer service... as we are browsing around.. she had no intention to serve at all... I asked her for my size, which one got stock she just pointed but we saw there was another design of the size we needed on display so took and put on.. asked her can we have that... she just answered rudely "I told u no stock, that is display!".. we tried to be patient and ask so which got stock? She again answered rudely "I told you already only this design"... so we asked which one? She just kept saying "I told u already!!"... so we asked her, can't you just tell properly and at least let us try since u already have limited stocks.. she still continued to mumble "I already told you!"

This is really truly disappointing... this is a good shoe but with store assistant like that, it is just horrible!!! I hope the management takes action on this!!! | review_rating:1, text:Bought a pair of slipper back in February this year. And the slipper broke. Went for an exchange for a brand  new pair in June. It broke again. Such bad quality for a slipper worth RM299?. Will never buy again. Not even a cheap slipper and it can only last 3-4 months. On top of this, they don't even provide free repair | review_rating:5, text:Mr. Sofian was very polite, helpful, and knowledgeable 🙏 | review_rating:5, text:We were amazed with the service the male sales person offers! He explained everything about our arch and how important for us to wear a sandals with good support.

Customization soles is also available here at around 400++, which takes about 1-2weeks. Whilst other sandals are priced at RM299.

The male sales assistant also showed us what exercises to do, and run analysis on our feet (flat feet/high arch also show us which designs suit for bunions), explaining how myfeet can help our condition.

Thumbs up! | review_rating:1, text:I have been buying MyFeet sandals for  years also but I find the quality nowadays is not good .
The sandal base
tend to open up after a few months, I even got 2 pairs that broke into 2. As I always buy and keep a spare pair of sandals, recently I wore the new pair, after walking at the shopping complex for 2 hrs, the base came off. Omg I had to slowly inch my way to the car park to change to another pair of sandals.
The outlet in Sunway Pyramid says they don't repair anymore. I took to the roadside cobbler, he told me MyFeet sandals he can't glue as he has experience glueing them and a week later customer brought back to him after it came off again.
Now I don't know where to send for repairs as this is a new sandals that cost RM299. I hope MyFeet can advise.
I have another 2 old pairs where the base has also open up.😡

name: GEM STUDIO
category: nail_salon, hair_salon, beauty_salon, hair_care, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot F1. 13, Sunway pyramid shopping mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I spent over RM700+ on a haircut, scalp treatment, and retexturing treatment, handled by Avenn, the outlet manager, and her assistant, Erica. Avenn was incredibly professional, managing everything from A-Z with great care and a friendly, welcoming attitude.

It was my first visit to this salon, and what stood out to me was their approach. They recommend treatments based on your hair condition and explain every step of the process so you’re always in the loop. They also inform you of any promotions without being hard sell. Since I’m a hijabi, I opted for a private room.

Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:I came here to accompany my sister but ended up being overwhelmed by the friendliness of the staff. I decided to try their scalp treatment, and I’m so glad I did! I didn’t realize how dirty my scalp was until the staff explained it to me clearly and professionally. I’m extremely satisfied with the service, and the entire scalp treatment was done exceptionally well. A big thank you and shoutout to Avenn, Marie and Victor for their excellent care. Highly recommend this salon in Sunway Pyramid!👍 | review_rating:5, text:Walk in on a Thursday evening for a quick haircut. At first, I was a little surprised by the price of a simple cut and wash. But overall I feel it's worth it as the stylist (Moon) was very meticulous and cuts my hair carefully. Usually my hair cuts end up with more misses, so I'm very resistant with layering my hair.

The end results looks great on me, so I also decided to upgrade and get a scalp treatment. | review_rating:5, text:Thank you, Moon, for the great service and hairstyle recommendation! worth the price. I’m satisfied with the haircut and enjoyed the massage during hair wash 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing experience at Gem Studio! From the moment I walked in, I was warmly greeted and felt right at home. The ambiance is relaxing, and the staff are incredibly professional and friendly. My stylist, Jass, listened carefully to what I wanted and delivered even better results than I expected! My hair has never looked healthier or more vibrant. I highly recommend this salon for anyone looking for top-notch service and a welcoming atmosphere. I’ll definitely be coming back.

name: Aldo
location: Lot 1.93, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This my second time to the store,  Jesselyn is so professional and nice at the same time. She show you anything you wish with kindness without knowing if you are going to buy or not. Jesselyn keep her standard very high.
Salespeople like her need to be supported.
Thank you 🙏 | review_rating:1, text:ALDO a brand with nice shoes collections but unexpectedly I had a very unpleasant shopping experience at Sunway Pyramid outlet on 7th June 2022. I was served by a sales executive (I’ve forgotten his name, a skinny softie Malay guy) I was looking for a pair of sandals, while browsing around, a beautiful and comfy pair catches my eyes.The shopping experience was unfriendly. We are not welcomed by the team at the first stage. Not even a single word or voice from the so called sales executive during attending me. I’m the one who approaching him and asking for the size availability, asking for the ongoing promotions and things lead into the payment stage at the cashier counter. My shopping was less than 10 minutes until the payment stage. It’s just a pair of sandals cost at RM229 (if I’m not mistaken with the accurate price) The guy passed me an iPad without saying anything by putting it on the cashier directly in front of me. When looked into it ,noted that was a CRM customer details membership form and I just fill in the the details. I have doubt with the “password” column. Therefore , I clarify with the staff “excuse me, may I know why & what the password required for? “ It was unexpected that the staff’s attitude was rude instead of explaining to me regarding my concerns, he took the iPad from me directly key in & reconfirm the required password by himself. What an attitude????
Not even saying anything but showing his annoying face and the body signs was so OMG!!!!
It was really a big turn off and ruined my shopping experience! I’ve changed my mind not to proceed the the purchase. I’ll make it short into conclusion, it was unpleasant shopping experience, very rude customer service manners, staffs training not up to the standard in retails & customer service line. I do hope The Management ALDO look serious in this matter as in brand image & future improvements. | review_rating:5, text:Third time i go here to take a look for a shoe, after that salesgirl named jesselyn, answered my enquires that so much help and cause me to accidentally purchase one of the shoe she suggested. With this knowledge of the salesman i recommended to go here to get a consultant by the salesman which give you so much pleasure to shopping here | review_rating:5, text:Great service , they offered to bring down my shoe size which was sold out ,  from another branch ! | review_rating:1, text:I ordered shoes online from aldo the website as a gift for my friend. When received, it was nicely packed so i gave to packed to my friend and didn't check at that time but when my friend opened it in home later. the shoes were used, it was clearly visible from the sole that they were either used or "try shoes". Pathetic experience and very irresponsible

name: Haagen-Dazs
category: ice_cream_shop, dessert_shop, confectionery, coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Lot No. LG1. Rink, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This store is located on the LG1 Floor (equivalent to Level 2) of Sunway Pyramid. Navigating to the store can be somewhat confusing using the mall’s information guide.

However, its vantage point offers a significant view overlooking Sunway Pyramid Ice, a rink capable of hosting ice-skating and ice hockey activities.

The store is surrounded by various food and beverage outlets, contributing to high human traffic in the area. Its internal and external environments are clean, spacious, and brightly illuminated, fostering a welcoming and relaxing atmosphere.

Its interior design features comfortable couches alongside a high bar table and chairs, enhancing its inviting appeal. | review_rating:5, text:Haagen-Dazs never disappoints! Yes, it’s on the sweeter side, but the flavors are always rich and satisfying. The staff was super kind and patient, letting me sample all the flavors before I finally decided on my 3 scoops. Great service and delicious ice cream | review_rating:3, text:I am the supporter & fan of Hagen-Dazs since 1998 (25 years). Good place for ice cream with good location to view ice skating. But the quality & taste of ice cream had drop tremendously but the price is also increased tremendously on ice cream creations. The colour of Green tea favour is NO longer dark green. There are many new comer & new brand in the market are much better taste than this brand. Please do more research & innovation or just close shop to prevent more losses | review_rating:5, text:Their staff are very friendly, helpful and polite. Their ice cream is so delicious and gooodddd! I love their service and place to sit is comfortable. The best part is I got to taste the sample first before I can make my decision to buy. Overall, I love to buy my ice cream from here. I would highly recommend everyone to go here and get YOUR OWN ICE CREAM ✨ | review_rating:1, text:I ordered coffee-flavored ice cream. To my surprise, for the price, I paid for a single scoop I was given a small scoop, nearly half of the cup. So stingy to be generous to give a nice big scoop that nicely fits the cup. I nicely complained to the Chinese guy about it, and all he said was that's how it's being served! He couldn't be careless to rectify the situation. I told him overseas they are so generous to give us a big scoop! I do not understand why the management failed to take action. There are plenty of ice cream companies that serve even better than Haagen Dasz.

name: Thai Odyssey
location: Lot LG 2A.01 (B), Lower Ground 2-A, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Had regularly visited this chain of branches in other states. As usual, the place is clean and staff is good. However a massage is only as good as the skills of the therapist. My therapist this time round didn't use/have sufficient strength despite telling her to go harder. The rhythm was also slower then normal. Hope her skills improve quickly. | review_rating:3, text:Went for leg massage 60 min for RM102.6 as other body massage was fully booked today during public holiday. The place was quiet and relaxing. The standard of foot massage was not up to par with the like of full body massage in TO. Acupressure was light, I didn’t get much relief from my tired legs, the therapist’s nails graze my skin on some strokes .  I’ve been to other TO outlets and had both full body aromatherapy and Thai massage many times. I must say this is by far the most disappointing service I received from TO. Not worth of my money.
I also went for leg massage with another competitor (its name starting with “S”) , and it was a great experience! | review_rating:2, text:The experience was unpleasant!

Came to T.O about 3pm for Traditional Thai Massage, coincidentally have available time slot for this service that I prefer.

But the assigned masseur I think she is new and I can feel that she is unsure about what she’s doing, is like thinking what’s the next sequence. The pressure point and the strength was just okay only…

Didn’t really enjoy the whole massage process and don’t feel relax at all. | review_rating:4, text:Please do call for booking as it's always fulled. I want to say thank you to the staff who help massage me. She not just good massager but also very friendly and warm with smile. I like it very much especially your aroma oil. The 2 things lack are very less sign to your shop which I tour whole mall to locate your shop as this is my first time to this branch as I been to many of your branches and bad in noise cancelling. Basically I can't relax much because of it. The noise from ice skate area can be hear which spoil the relaxation mood. The place is clean and comfy. Overall was just fine. | review_rating:5, text:If you're reading google review to ensure if it's the right place to get a massage, stop reading and just go fot it!! Seriously, this is the best place ever! The strength of the therapist is just perfect for me! (p.s. I rarely go for a massage). For woman, worry not, all of the therapist are woman. Their service is 💯! My therapist today is from thailand, she can't understand english that much, but we are able to communicate well. I'm telling you! The ambience, massage, service, hygiene, everything is just perfectt!!!! However, this place have 1 cons, they don't have toilet inside. For me, I use mall's toilet before I enter Thai Odyssey.

name: CHAGEE
location: LG2.142B, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Had a wonderful experience at this Chagee branch in Sunway Pyramid. One of the workers, Nabila, provided a pleasant experience from guiding me on how to order and helping send my beverage to my table. Such service left a very positive impression on this branch. Keep it up! | review_rating:5, text:All Staff very efficient on jobs.. drink most nice and make my mood feel good.. the product is good for health.. I love the grapefruit jasmine tea..not so sweet.. just enjoy the tea with love worth for money .. | review_rating:5, text:As a tea lover, I have been a lot of Chagee store, some store doesn’t give excellent service but this Chagee @ LG2 Sunway Pyramid is something different. Nabila (staff) was the one who approached me, she took her time to explain every drinks in the menu and recommend me a few drinks. Even though i know which one is the best tea but her diligence and excellent service is what matters. Thanks to the excellent experience I had, I would come again to this branch and without a doubt I will recommend it to others. Again, I would like to give a shoutout to Nabila for making my day! | review_rating:5, text:Beautiful shop, seating area a bit compact, not for long stay or sit in and do work. If there's window oversee outside could be nicer. Service all ok. | review_rating:4, text:Very busy location and queue, theres currently a promotion for a 7 years anniversary pin. It was a bit confusing that the poster on the wall tells you to order online to get a promotion, but it does not go together for the pin. The drinks were fine not worth the price of almost 30RM for 2.

reviews: review_rating:1, text:As usual pathetic services from Digi. Only 1 person/counter that could give numbers on a Saturday noon and the queue is super long. The same counter spends a lot of time answering queries to customers while there are dedicated counters for it. I see a lot of unhappy customers. Another man questioned them. But their response was yea, just 1 counter. Could do better. | review_rating:1, text:I don’t understand the hospitality of the staff here. I was sitting on one of the chairs while waiting for my number to be called. Then this one staff just turned out from nowhere and asked me to move to other spot because she needed to call out another customer’s ticket number. There were so many empty spots. Instead of asking your customer to move, why didnt the staff move instead? Other than that, I was requesting to transfer to other provider. The staff who served me did not even try to persuade me to continue using their services. I found out that there were competitive packages offered by browsing through a file on the side, but not even one word from the staff l. I guess the file is only for decoration purpose. Great way to keep business up by losing customer. | review_rating:1, text:Horrible and ridiculous ticketing system with no info provided. The staff with tablet gave a ticket number but only 1 counter was in service, it takes 15mins for 1 number to be called. In fact, there are several other staff at no-number counters that moved through customers more quickly than the ones who got the ticket number. Insanely inefficient and punishing system. | review_rating:5, text:Excellent customer service by one of your staff name Shakti. At first they ask to take Que and it take sometime but He able to fullfill my inquiries and change my e-sim without need to wait for counter Que.I understand maybe they still not renovate yet as I went toTTDI outlet before and just scan for QUE.TQ Shakti, superb | review_rating:5, text:Mr Shah and Mr Suffian endeavour to help me to set the correct APN settings for Digi Broadbsnd and the speed is fantastically fast

location: F1.26, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Lot of staff sitting here to serve customer,  but no one seems engaged. 3 staff dealing customer and 3 supervisors watching them.  With new office with dome and lot of lighting they want to attract customer. But very slow and lost staff. Find other service center. Waiting time is 30min to see someone. Horrible | review_rating:1, text:I was sitting on a bench near the U Mobile outlet when one of the workers started catcalling me. He had brown hair styled in a mullet cut and appeared to be Malay. This behaviour made me feel very uncomfortable and I believe it’s important for businesses to ensure their staff act professionally. Btw it's in-front of gadget hub store | review_rating:4, text:Be very alert.. there's the agent and office. The agent could not give the proper promotion.  The office is on a shoplot as stated in the address, not a mere kiosk.

It is an extreme conflict of interest, especially when u hear something different from the office. | review_rating:1, text:Extremely bad experience with UMobile Sunway Pyramid Centre, all staffs trying to act busy by looking at their own laptop or phone and ignored the customers. After walking around about 15 mins finally 1 staff noticed me and ask me to scan QR for the queue number and never advise the next steps and continue to play with his phone. I continue to wait for my queue number to be call but no movement at all, after another 10 mins i give up and walk away. After this bad experience i decided to stay with my existing telco. | review_rating:5, text:11.12 around 5.30pm. After about 45 minutes, we get our turn attendant by staff from Counter 2, he was very polite and listened to our queries and provided optional solutions to our problem. As there was only one chair and there was two of us. He kind enough to offered me an available chair to sit while attending to us. This small gesture of kindness really made a big impact to customers and especially to front-liners. Thanks and keep the great services.

name: CHATEAU DE C.A.F.F.E.I.N.E.E.S
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

review_rating:1, text:Closed system before 10pm. Wasting my time to rushing coming all the way to pick up my medication. Please improve your team professionalism. | review_rating:2, text:Beware when buying prescriptions here, it is marked up to almost 100%. When i rejected the items, they dropped it back to the usual price. The differences amounted to about rm60.

I would have given it 1 star but the cashier and staff were all really nice. I just dont understand why this system is implemented | review_rating:2, text:Phone customer service very poor, not responsive n follow up to customer whether stock arrive or not.... | review_rating:5, text:Excellent and helpful service by the staffs especially the pharmacist and attendant. They helped my son in selecting the most suitable wrist guard after my son sprained his wrist. | review_rating:5, text:Stocks well organized, friendly staff and pharmacist are so extraordinary on products explanations….

name: Lung Ngen Claypot Coffee
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.138, C2, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway46150, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Visited during the opening.

Ordered a Claypot Thai Milk Coffee.

Was so looking forward to an "immersive tasting experience". Unfortunately, none at all! Neither was there any touted "exotic aroma" nor "intricate flavours". Coffee was mediocre -- lacked strength and richness. Disappointed!

Also ordered Pak Lung's Roti Bakar. Pandan was good - smooth, rich, creamy and fragrant. But roti bakar was squashed as if someone had squeezed it and wasn't well toasted.

Nevertheless, splendid location with good vantage point to watch the world go by. Good pitstop to take a break from shopping. | review_rating:4, text:The aroma is very nice when you are near the shop.
I like their menu choices, habe tried the thai milk tea and butterfly pea milk. Both refreshing and smells very nice.
Only downside is that its way too sweet for me. | review_rating:5, text:Opening Promotion till 11/11/24, buy 2 free 1.

Excellent coffee with a unique flavor where it is fused with Pandan leaves.

Do remember to ask for your preferred level of sweetness.

Good place to sit and watch the world breeze by. | review_rating:5, text:Located at LG2, beside the escalator near Bungkus Kaw Kaw..

The atmosphere is great and comfy.. eventhough there is only 7 table at this shop.. to stop and take a stop is great here.. have your coffee or teatime here..

Currently the menu that i LOVE is Claypot Thai Tea Milk, Claypot Thai Tea Coffee, Claypot Thai Cocoa, Claypot Thai Horkasai, Thai Lemon Tea and Last But Not Least Thai Claypot Thai Green Milk Tea.. The Price is reasonable to upgrade only Add On RM1.. The packaging itself is nice and engaging..

Staff is friendly and great.. very helpful and help customer to guide what is their signature drink.. overall happy with this drink..

Recommended to try here in LUNG NGEN Thai Claypot Coffee.. ☕️🍵

Just come here again.. as usual the service is topnotch.. :) | review_rating:5, text:Honestly one of the good (not too sweet) tea or coffee if you like it Thai Style. The prices are in the reasonable range of about RM10-12. Should give it a try!

name: PRO MEDIC
location: CP 2.01 Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Thank you dr tang and nurse, uma for treating my scalded skin. Had to move to another clinic as my burned wound was not healing properly in the previous clinic. Both of them deserve more than 5 stars and I’m glad I’ve found Pro Medic in time!

To Dr Tang: thank you for treating me so carefully and it’s really recovering better on my second visit after just few days!

To nurse Uma: thanks for offering your hand knowing that I’m in pain and I hope that I didn’t squeeze your hand too hard! 🤣

You guys rock and thanks for taking me in today although it’s during your lunch hours💕 | review_rating:5, text:I had an exceptional experience at Pro Medic Clinic. The doctor and staff were warm, professional, and attentive from the moment I arrived, and the clinic itself was clean and well-organized. The medical team thoroughly explained my condition and treatment options, answering all my questions with patience and clarity, making me feel genuinely cared for. The entire process was efficient, with minimal wait time and seamless coordination. I’m grateful to have found such a compassionate and high-quality clinic, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of excellent care! | review_rating:5, text:I recently had the pleasure of visiting the Pro-Medical Clinic at Sunway, and I must say, it was an excellent experience!

The doctor at this clinic is incredibly accommodating. They took the time to listen to my concerns and provided thoughtful advice tailored to my needs. It was evident that they genuinely care about their patients' well-being.

Additionally, the assistant was equally friendly and helpful. They made the entire process smooth and comfortable, ensuring that I felt at ease during my visit.

One of the standout features of this clinic is its spotless cleanliness. The environment was well-maintained, which added to my overall comfort and confidence in the care I received.

I highly recommend the Pro-Medical Clinic at Sunway to anyone seeking quality medical attention. You won’t be disappointed! | review_rating:5, text:The clinic is clean and well-organized. The process from registration to the doctor’s check-up and receiving medication was smooth.

The doctor took time to thoroughly diagnose me. A staff member named Uma was especially kind and thoughtful, following up with me the next day to check on my condition, and I appreciate that.

Overall, it was a great experience. | review_rating:5, text:As a foreigners visiting Malaysia all the way from South Africa, my husband and I just wanted to leave a note to say how grateful we are to Pro Medic Clinic staff. We were treated with the utmost professionalism and everyone was so welcoming, helpful and amazing. Visiting a clinic in a foreign country was daunting but they really helped us recover from illness, they even took blood tests to ensure we were treated correctly. We are so impressed with the service.
6 Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Subway
location: LG2.32, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I went to buy food from subway and i saw cockroach roaming inside the bun storage. I told the staff to call their manager to inform the issue and requested them not to sell the food to any other customer. After few minutes i went back to check and saw them selling food to a customer. I also made report to the sunway management and they made them to throw away the bun. The management should have tell them to deep cleaning by closing their store. Who knows there might be more cockroach and also might have gong to the meat area.i have video proof. Not recomended to eat here. | review_rating:3, text:Ordered white coffee and 2 macadamia but given only 1 cookie by the foreign worker also tables are not cleaned promptly I'm so sad huhu | review_rating:1, text:Ordered combo meal which include chocolate chip cookie, accidentally have this staplet stuck at my gum when bite on the cookie, please ensure your food safety when prepare the food

Surprisingly there is no olive available in this outlet. | review_rating:1, text:The old lady cashier with the lazy eye was taking my order and was very rude. Not only did she throw my plastic cup in the basket, I could hear her mumbling under her breath. My love, you get payed RM8 an hour, don’t make this any harder❤️ | review_rating:3, text:The staff didn’t cut the bread evenly and the lady is so rude to the customers as the customers called her few times but she didn’t answer him instead telling the customer to be patient.

name: Ăn Viet
category: vietnamese_restaurant, cafe, wholesaler, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG1.46, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Food and Price:

1. Spring Roll Vermicelli - RM17.90
2. Rice Pork Chop - RM 19.90
3. Plain Water - RM1.20

Total with 16% tax = RM45.25

Overall the foods are served with normal Vietnamese food standard. Not too bad also not super good.

Portion is enough. Simple meal. | review_rating:5, text:It’s my first time to visit. The food tastes good to me because it’s not too spicy. The Vietnamese bread is a bit hard, but the grilled pork chop inside tastes good. I like the soup to be hot enough but not too heavy on MSG. I love the lemongrass and ginger tea with its strong ginger flavor. Spicy, the service staff are very polite, especially the male waiter at the cash register. He deserves praise for his politeness and patience. The overall meal is enjoyable and delicious to me. | review_rating:5, text:Came here for lunch on weekday, quite packed during lunch hour.

Their food is very good is all i can say, i did not have high expection for this place but wow. Everything is just good, even their service is good also. One thing that let me down is their Iced Dripped Coffee is not that strong. I wish they would let us enjoy the dripping process and allow us to pour into the cup ourselves to adjust the thickness and flavour we want.

Will come again for sure | review_rating:4, text:Visited twice, the first visit was a great experience, food was served quickly despite it was full house on a weekend. Food portion was big, and tasted delicious. Recommend the avocado coffee, we requested for less sugar and it was yummy.

Second visit was quite a let down. We ordered the banh mi pork chop, but the pork had a very strong strange taste, it’s the taste everybody is afraid of when eating pork. We couldn’t even finish.

I will return to this restaurant but I might not order pork dishes anymore | review_rating:4, text:We came here for our reunion lunch, oh gosh their beef balls really gave my sis and i a huge surprise! Both of our first visit and we were so in love with their beef balls! Lemon grass drinks definitely not our taste…… Gonna try out their pillow rice balls on our next visit.

name: LG1 Ice Rink Railing
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

Thanks to Haris | review_rating:5, text:Great & super easy trade in experience with Haris at the Sunway Pyramid outlet! Thanks for your help to choose phone suitable for me and my budget. I really suggest all people to go to this place. | review_rating:5, text:Good customer service from nas and ash regarding my trade in and inquiry buying secondhand device from compasia online ✌🏻

name: Sushi King
category: japanese_restaurant, sushi_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot, LG1.42, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful solo lunch at this sushi shop today. The food was fresh and flavorful, and the restaurant had a pleasant, inviting ambiance.  But what really made my day was the exceptional service I received from William. He was friendly, attentive, and genuinely made me feel welcome.  A great place for a delicious meal, whether you're dining alone or with friends. | review_rating:5, text:Located beside the lift near the parking area.. in front of it is the ice skating.. (Below it)

First of all.. the food is nice and fast.. and the converyer machine is always have food.. one of the best place to eat sushi king.. is this outlet.. all item have...no problem to ask any of the staff ..

The service itself is tiptop.. feel welcome when you come to eat here.. if have a question the staff explain it.. just ask them.. really good service.. anyway shout out to service team and cashier Dian for great service..

Rekemended to come here if other outlet is poor service or rude.. so give this outlet a try. :) | review_rating:4, text:Food is good. The food is piping hot when we received eventho it taking quite abit of time. The portion is also not to bad. Its not something that prepared half hearted.

The only complain is their seating. Hard to get up when the sent the ordered menu thru kaiten belt (with the train like item. Haha. Idk the name). Unless i put my leg on the seat, only then can comfortably take the food as it’s place quite high (problem for short people).

Overall ok. | review_rating:5, text:The food is good, can also redeem the birthday complementary during the birthday month.
The service is good - Thanks Willam for providing the good service while serving the ice cream.
Atmosphere is also good. | review_rating:1, text:Absolutely disgusted with my experience at Sushi King. The service was beyond atrocious—an unacceptably long wait for everything. The sushi? Low quality, borderline inedible, and definitely not fresh. To top it all off, the ordering tablet was completely useless because it didn’t even have WiFi. How is that even possible in this day and age? And seriously, ONE robot to serve the entire restaurant? What a joke! The whole place felt like a chaotic mess with zero regard for customer satisfaction. I wouldn’t step foot in this place again if they paid me. Avoid at all cost !

Costumer service priority first my Ass
Norwegian salmon your mother
Who is even the CEO of sushi king? A joker?

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I have good experience while shopping here, this one is my third purchase already. The salesman that always assist me is Jaydoo and Albert. They are very nice, polite and very helpfull person. 😍 next time will buy again here! I hope they get salary increase because both of them deserve it!! Much love 🫶🏻🫶🏻 | review_rating:5, text:I really love the necklace i bought earlier, thumbs up to the design and quality of the Jewelry. Not just salestalk but they both build rapport and treat customers with care prefectly, Superb service👍 They also recommended what suits best for me. We'll definitely come back. | review_rating:5, text:The designs incredible & Elegance, I buy Bracelet & Ring. Super Good Quality. The Seller Are Also Very Friendly And Satisfying. They Handle Their Customers With Personal Attention. You Earn My Loyalty!! Will Be Coming Back Sooon. Thank You. | review_rating:5, text:Had a really great experience shopping there with my fiancé. We were attended by Jaydoo -  super professional & very knowledgeable. He could tell our ring size just from one look & is able to pick out styles that fits us individually and as a couple. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Had good experience at Vinstella Sunway. Was looking for couple rings at Vinstella because their rings are beautiful and affordable. I was appreciated with salesman Jaydoo's service as he was very helpful and patient although it was close to closing time (We can see his passion in his job until we thought he was the boss)
The ring size we wanted was nt available in his branch, but he helped us check with other branches for the availability . Vinstella even has ring engravement service, so he help us do all the processes and assist us in the delivery of rings to us after the rings are ready. As it was CNY, we got some cute free gift also. Thank you so much! 💍💍

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. name: LUCKIN COFFEE
category: cafe, coffee_shop, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Visited this coffee shop during their launch week, and the place was understandably busy. The queue and waiting time were over 45 minutes, but I have to say, it was worth it. The coffee tasted great, and the pricing was reasonable.

Definitely a spot worth checking out if you're a coffee lover. Just be prepared for the wait during peak times, especially during their early days! | review_rating:4, text:Last week I took a few friends who came from outstation to shop in Sunway Pyramid. We walked around this huge n complex shopping mall cos there were so many different exits n entrances. It was like a maze n you can easily lose your direction n get lost. We bought a couple of snacks n then on the ground floor we saw a large crowd queuing up outside a shop. Being curious n feeling kiasu, we went over to have a look. Wow it was Luckin Coffee the popular n famous brand of coffee from China. But why the large crowd? We discovered that they were having a promotion. Only RM 2.99 per cup of coffee of your choice from their menu. They offer a wide variety of coffees which range from RM 10 _ RM 15. So cheap n highly affordable. So we also joined the queue. The workers worked very fast n were very efficient in preparing the coffee. We didn't need to wait long before we got our coffee. They were very orderly n systematic in their operation too. First we had to scan the QR code n then download the app n then register n then choose your coffee n then you make your payment. Finally just wait for your order n then collect your coffee from the main counter. Everything went very smoothly n fast n without any mistakes at all. Wonderful experience for us all to see n watch how this China system worked. | review_rating:4, text:During the launch week, I happened to visit Sunway and was able to use the offer rate to get a drink and handle the queue.
It took an hour to receive the drinks after making a reservation through the application because I was there during the first week. My friends purchased coffee, and the taste of my drink—chocolate—was passable. According to the menu, the price seems reasonable. | review_rating:4, text:Tasty coffee. Nice interior. Well built app. But due to the new opening offer, the queue and waiting time was too long. I waited more than 30 minutes to get my coffee. | review_rating:5, text:Came here on grand opening day and waited almost 30mins to get my order! coffee was good, got nice promo on that day and staff are a lot and they serve pretty quick despite long q 🎉🇫🇷🐷

name: Seen
location: G1-89, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I am very impressed with the customer service at this shop.  I was immediately greeted when I stepped into the shop early in the morning.  The guy happily smiling with his warm greeting made my experience in the shop very pleasant.  I asked for his name - Aizad.  He gives honest advise , professional and friendly.  He attended to my needs efficiently.   I went on last Sunday to do my specs. Today , Thur I got my specs.  Fast👍. I made my second pair 😀 | review_rating:5, text:Fantastic service. Very professional and understands how to help pick out glasses that fit well and are functional. Shafila understands the best type of frame for a person's face. She helps with the difficult decision of which frame to choose. I highly recommend Shafila. She sells high quality glasses. Best experience I have ever had for glasses. Staff are knowledgeable and spent time ensuring it was the right fit. I recommend it highly 🫡 | review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic experience at Seen Sunway Pyramid! I purchased a pair of Moscot glasses and Prada sunglasses, and I have to give a big thumbs up to Ms. Lee Jin. She patiently explained all the details about the frames and lenses and assisted me for two hours straight!

If you’re planning to shop here, I highly recommend looking for Ms. Lee Jin. Her professionalism, dedication, and attention to detail made the entire process enjoyable and stress-free.

Thank you, Seen Sunway Pyramid, and an even bigger thank you to Ms. Lee Jin for the outstanding service! | review_rating:4, text:Recently, I had some issues with my glasses, and the gentlemen here was very kind to fix the issue for free. Btw, they are having a buy 1, free 1 promo now. They have variety of brands too. Good place to consider for eye wear. | review_rating:5, text:The sales assistant Gayathiri was very pleasant and helpful. Every time I come in she’d be efficient and accommodate all my vision needs. Highly recommended.

name: Spectrum Forex Money Changer
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:They delivers exceptional service and unbeatable rates, far better than the other branches. It’s a weird why more customers don’t know about this fantastic shop. Friendly, professional, and always goes the extra mile. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great deals and outstanding customer care.
I would recommend mr.fairoze services at SPECTRUM 3 in Sunway Pyramid Mall
Don’t miss out this is the place to go! | review_rating:1, text:Good rate but bad attitude.

I went to the G floor branch (next to Parkson).

The first time I went to counter 1 to change A currency, I said I wanted to split two receipts, he said he couldn’t split the transaction and asked me to queue up again.

OK, Second time I went to counter 1 again (only 1 counter is open) and changed A currency.

Seeing that there was no one in line behind me, I said I wanted to change B currency, he said no, he could only change money from one country per person at a time, which means I had to wait until someone came to queue up to change money before I could change money for the third time?

Meanwhile counter 2 is open, then I pointed to counter 2 and asked if I could change money, counter 1 said NO, because counter 2 is new and he didn’t know how to do it.

So does a money changer have such a rule now??? | review_rating:4, text:SMALL MONEY CHANGER IN A BIG MALL. FAST SERVICE.
EXCHANGE RATE IS AVERAGE.
MUST SHOW YOUR NRIC OR PASSPORT TO BUY OR SELL THE CURRENCIES. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recomended.Good rate and good service. Same rate as the other shop in the middle but no queue compared to the middle one. | review_rating:5, text:This is consider the best rate money changer in Subang Jaya area and after Mid Valley. Another option you may go for competitive rate within same area is Subang Parade. To those customers who had issue with uncle previously, it is depend on how you talk or behave toward him at first. I had deal with him for more than 10 years but never have any issue based on mutual respect of each others. He is a nice guy anyway. Recommend this place!

Thank you, Glo! | review_rating:5, text:Rose has been very attentive to my skin. Would have given 5 stars but only gave 4 stars because when I was there for my 10am appointment, I noticed that Glo Sunway Pyramid was short of staff and I’m a bit worried about safety when the beautician is attending to a customer in the private rooms and any strangers could just walk in and cause harm. Perhaps the management should prioritize security to avoid any strangers walking in while the reception is left unattended.

name: Tim Hortons
location: G1.122A & B, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:First time trying this Canadian franchise cafe. Staffs were really friendly and nice. The coffee and donuts were good. I like the donuts here. Not oily. Dough texture is fluffy and not very sweet. Price is also very reasonable compared to other cafes in this mall.
I didn't know there are 5 Tim Hortons branches in the country. Will definitely return again. | review_rating:5, text:I visited the new Tim Hortons Signature store at Sunway Pyramid and was impressed! The Maple Cinnamon Latte was perfectly brewed, and the Truffle Mushroom & Cheese Sourdough Melt was delicious. The craft bar concept adds a unique touch, and the donuts were a perfect sweet treat. Great atmosphere, friendly staff, and a must-visit for coffee lovers! | review_rating:5, text:Tried the signature maple cinnamon, about what you'd expect sweet but the cinnamon isn't over powering like the sbux variants. The coffee also came at warm temp not too hot which is ideal.
Had the plain sugar donut, so light just like eating baked flour. I don't think it's anything special given everyone can do donuts these days.
The toasted sourdough sandwiches are pretty decent for the price. Only thing was given only 30% occupied still takes a while to toast. Can't imagine what happens on a packed lunch time.
Also customer service at the tables were poor most tables have cutlery, plates lying around and are unwiped. This would never happen at McDonald's | review_rating:5, text:Had great time indulging good coffee and light bites at this 2nd outlet of Tim Hortons! The atmosphere is cozy, the staff are always smiling, and the good coffee 😍 highly recommended to experience their coffee craft bar and must try Kyoto Drip! And of course the donuts! Truly like the line on their box “All you need is 🍩 & ❤️”! | review_rating:3, text:Canadian coffee chain similiar to starbucks and Dunkin Donut combined 😂, it entered Malaysian market last year and expands rapidly. Place is well set up, spacious, very cozy and clean.

Service is rather slow, waited for 10 minutes when there’s a really just a handful of patrons in the cafe when we came in. Coffee is served in the paper cup despite they have the ceramic coffee cups displayed (really annoying). Coffee tastes average just like any commercial big chains. Price is reasonable 👍⭐️.

Overall nothing much to shout of besides their maple leaf table 😂 , maybe for anyone still wants to boycott Starbucks this could be an option before Donald Trump makes Canada an American state😂😂
