name: Estee Lauder
location: G1. 128B, GROUND FLOOR, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:My mom went to the store to check her membership, but she mistakenly thought her membership was with Estée Lauder instead of Channel. We politely thanked the staff, but three of them rolled their eyes and said, "It's Channellllll, not Estée Lauder," in a very rude tone, particularly the Malay staff member.

With such untrained staff, I guess there's no hope for my mom to try any of your products.

I use Estée Lauder, but I will not be purchasing any items from this store. I believe the management should consider sending in "mystery shoppers" to assess service quality. It's awful. | review_rating:5, text:We dropped by this well stocked Estee Lauder outlet. The shop assistant was helpful and took time to explain the product differences and applied the samples to try. We are happy with our purchase here. | review_rating:5, text:This comment is for Ms Janice. She is a good SA . I have get a good sales service from her. | review_rating:1, text:I’m writing this as a very disappointed customer. I am a working mother and can’t really find a time to go physical store to buy it. Since I need urgently as my current stock is almost finishing. Then I book a delivery guy (Lalamove) to help me to buy. As the moment Lalamove guy was there the sales person at Estée Lauder Sunway pyramid refuse to sell to him saying they can’t buy on behalf.. how is this practical? In that case my husband can’t buy fro me? Or I can’t hire a delivery person to buy for me. Isn’t that the product must reach to customer for the convenience side. I had to pay the delivery guy for nothing.

Worst customer service ever. | review_rating:1, text:I went there to ask something about the products with my bf but we saw there are only one staff there serving a customer so we choose to come back later. After that, we came back into the shop again she was still serving the customer so we waited there but this staff has no sign of wanted to serve us she even not looking at us at all I know we look younger than the customer but she shouldn't act like we are a transparent glass I'm so disappointed at this shop.

name: Simple Life Healthy (Vegetarian)
location: F1. 86A, FIRST FLOOR, Oasis 3, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had been to other branches of Simple Life. This time, there's a noticable taste quality that is not up to mark. Taste are milder and lack certain memorial flavours. We hope the Chefs can make this branding great again. Expended menu. Service and price are reasonable. | review_rating:5, text:Quiet and rustic, this restaurant is a hidden jewel tucked away behind the hustle and bustle of the Orange Atrium. I only found this place as my hotel had a convenient path to the mall. Honestly, this place is better than I expected. Large, generous portions, and staff were very courteous. 10/10. Recommend the lei cha, hotpot and the mushrooms(deep-fried) Will definitely come back when I have the chance. | review_rating:5, text:Amazing vegeterian food, and the food is presented very nicely as well. The portion is really big and well-worth the price. Most importantly, the food here are much healthier than the normal Malaysian food.

There are so many great drink options and I was pleasantly suprised at how big the drink was. They are very generous with the toppings (longan, goji berries, and red dates).

There are so many interesting options on the menu and I cannot wait to come back again to try! | review_rating:5, text:Simple Life is Back and Better!

I used to be a regular customer before the old store closed. After trying the other branches, I was disappointed by the noticeable drop in quality. However, a friend told me Simple Life was back in Sunway, and after she enjoyed her visit, I decided to give it a chance.

I’m so glad I did! Simple Life has definitely come back stronger. This is my second visit here, and I’ll definitely return—most likely every time I’m in Sunway! | review_rating:5, text:Simple Life provides excellent meal prep and its atmosphere is very calming. I throughly enjoy the food and staff is very friendly ☺️

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Bought a bracelet from this branch. 5 star service from staff Joana. I needed my bracelet shorten and she went up and beyond to make sure that I get my bracelet back within such a short period of time. Happy with service | review_rating:5, text:Very good service by ms Joana. She is very Detail-oriented and always gave professional advice. Really appreciate her nice service👍 | review_rating:5, text:I want to say thank you so much to Joana, for helping me choose my new pendant. & also for being so patient (I did come back 2 days later to exchange my pendant design😆). Best customer service 🫶🏻
This is my first purchase from Lazo Diamond.
and I’m really impressed on the white gold selections. Everything is so nice + trendy designs.
If you’re a fan of white gold & diamonds, please come here & look for Joana. She deserves a raise!
Will definitely come back again☺️ | review_rating:5, text:Bought my necklace and ring from sales advisor - Clay, he’s very attentive and patient. I love how he’s friendly and helpful to us, will definitely come back and look for him again if I ever need to purchase any jewelry in future ! | review_rating:4, text:First time to this outlet. Purchased a ring, chain and pendant. Except for one male staff member, the rest of the ladies were not bothered at all about hospitality. They 'forgot' to smile 😳
To that one person who took the time to be so helpful, thank you. Keep up the great job Carl and all the best!! 👍😊😊😊 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

**Please train your staff to be courteous to anyone who walks in the store even if they are just coming in to look. Thank you #BeLikeCarl 😊

name: Sanctury
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Mr. Siew Bao
category: bakery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Mr. Siew Bao at Sunway Pyramid is a solid spot for local pastries! I’d give it four stars because the service is friendly, and the pastries are above average. The Siew Bao and egg tarts hit that local flavor just right, and prices are reasonable, so you can grab a few without overthinking it. Good choice if you’re in the mood for some tasty, classic Malaysian treats! | review_rating:5, text:the pastries here is fresh and superb! the choco tart is not too sweet which I love it so much and for the puffs i got durian and chocolate, everything is perfect surprisingly. | review_rating:2, text:Located inside the sunway pyramid and taste it for myself for total disappointment.

The durian cream puff.
There is nothing taste and smell like a durian. It was flat. If u ever know the famous durian cracker (keropok) in yellow packaging...it has better taste and aroma.
Honestly i tried few places too....nothing good compared to the one sell at jonker walk, melaka. | review_rating:5, text:👍🏻👍🏻 | review_rating:1, text:女员工套着手套拿了食物，没脱掉手套收钱
然后又用摸过零钱的手套 继续拿食物 给其他顾客 再收钱💁
可以不要这么不卫生吗？会拉肚子的勒...

name: ROMP
location: F1.06, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Although the girls are really kind and pleasant, the male staff member may not comprehend the concept of personal space. When I visited/shopping there, he stayed so close to me that it seemed like I intended to steal their clothes. All I want to do is pay, okay?? | review_rating:2, text:Staff service are good but the bosses service is very bad and also bad altitude.
The clothes looks nice but ONCE you wash the colour fade off. YES ONLY ONCE. The price is not match with quality. 👎 | review_rating:1, text:I really like to go this place and buy clothes but there is one time i was looking for male jeans for my brother and there is one old guy server which i believe is the manager(?) Apparently he compared the jeans with hype. He said that the jeans is in a good quality and cheap than hype. After i went to this place i go and check the quality at hype which apparently is better and stretchable. Hype is expensive but is in better option. I like romp design but the same guy keep showing me other design that i hate. He said the price is higher because the quality is good. But i went to other shop and found a same design with a cheaper price and mich more better quality. This server is very  annoying. Because i want to try the clothes that i choose but he always comeback and bring other design. I hate the mathcing pair. I want to choose my own  clothes 🙄 i hope they let us breath and choose whatever we want to wear🙄 | review_rating:1, text:I just saw a review and i had a same experience as the person who made the review. The same old server keep pestering me even when i say i would like to walk around myself. I also notice that some of the tshirt had the same design but different writing which i find ridiculous. There is one time i bought the skirt and i thought he would give me a new one. But he gave me the display and i hate it so much. I heard the staff ask if she would take the new skirt for me but i saw the guy say no need. But thankful the staff get me a new pair of skirt and change the one the guy had pit at the counter. I hope they didnt do this again because it is the same as fraud and lie to the customer. | review_rating:4, text:The quality and design of the skirts and jeans is best and reasonable , but the service is too hard sell , i just want to look and see to carefully thinking what to buy bcos they are variety of choices , then got 1 female aunty keep hard sell me to buy all , these makes me frustrated as i have budget

name: BUNGKUS KAW KAW
location: LG2.75A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:The taste of the nasi lemak bungkus is no longer what it was. The sambal udang taste was flat. Non-spicy.
The toasted bread had a tiny slice of butter. I would think that they have lost their charm.
Service, too, is dropping. | review_rating:2, text:Normal, very normal. Hot Coffee at RM7.80 without the taste of coffee, only sweetness.
But they are conveniently situated in the mall, this is the expensive version of Old Town White Coffee. Nothing special. | review_rating:5, text:Delicious Bungkus at Sunway Pyramid!

I recently visited Bungkus Kawkaw at Sunway Pyramid and was thoroughly impressed with my meal. The New Nasi Lemak Rendang was a highlight - the rendang sauce was creamy, spicy, and perfectly balanced, served with a side of fragrant coconut rice.

To quench my thirst, I opted for the Teh Kawkaw, which was a strong and bold black tea that hit the spot.

The ordering process was efficient - simply pay and wait for your food to be prepared. The wait was well worth it, as the food was freshly prepared and packed with flavor.

Overall, I highly recommend Bungkus Kawkaw for a satisfying and delicious meal. Don't miss out on the Nasi Lemak Rendang and Teh Kawkaw - a perfect combination! | review_rating:1, text:My first time breakfast here. Not coming back. Very disappointed. Overrated and overpriced. Food taste nothing special. Quantity below average. A small cup of teh tarik is RM6.70. Basic nasi lemak bungkus daun pisang with only half an egg is RM4.90. Like airline prices.

Not sure what the hype is all about. You can easily get better and cheaper alternatives for breakfast elsewhere nearby. | review_rating:4, text:Conveniently located in the mall. Super cheap and simple tasty food. Limited selection but I guess that’s the idea. Nicely packaged in paper and banana leaf for take away. Lot of drink options.Plenty of a sitting area. Takes both cash & card.

name: H&M
location: No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:H&M at Sunway Pyramid is a spacious and well-organized store, offering a wide variety of clothing options for men, women, and children. The layout is easy to navigate, making it simple to find what you’re looking for, whether it’s casual wear, office attire, or trendy accessories. The staff are generally helpful and friendly, though sometimes it can take a while to get assistance when the store is busy. They keep the store clean and well-stocked, and the fitting rooms are comfortable and well-lit. Overall, it’s a great place to shop for affordable fashion, with a good selection of styles and sizes. Four stars for a reliable shopping experience! | review_rating:5, text:H&M Branch in Sunway super spacious and well organized, aircond is cold and fitting room are a lot 💥🙃🏊 Staff is informative and friendly as well which is good ⚫️⚫️✈️ | review_rating:4, text:Well known overseas brand in the local market. Huge shop in the mall, probably lacking the signage to the fitting room in a corner. Came about the fitting room’s location when I was looking around for a place to sit. Please ensure you are able to stand/walk around (no any seats available), while your other half/members are browsing-shopping/queuing for the fitting room (to try out the variety of clothing designs/fashions - huge age-range able to cater). Probably lacking in the customer’s satisfaction in terms of finer details, like providing a little seats. | review_rating:3, text:It is no longer interesting and not the same as before MCO (March, 2020) anymore with more choices, style, colours, cutting but the quality is getting worse, promotion not that good or attractive anymore, and the price went up even it is made in Cambodia or Bangladesh | review_rating:1, text:I'm not allow to follow my girl to the fitting room. The malay girl in charge without tudung is very inpolite. Her tone of the voice was very loud. She embaress me in front of other customers. She told me I have to stand outside. When my girl opens the door then only i can walk towards to the door. I  am not even allow to stand outside of the entrance door of my girl's fitting room. What kind of rules is This?? No other shopping outlets practice This!!. It's ridiculous!!. Very dissapointing!!. Your customer service need to improve!! NEVER WANT TO GO TO H&M SUNWAY OUTLET AGAIN!! Please look into this very seriously.

name: GORDON RAMSAY BAR & GRILL
category: fine_dining_restaurant, bar_and_grill, bar, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lobby Level Sunway Resort, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Gordon Ramsay’s restaurant at Sunway Resort offers a stylish atmosphere and impeccable service, but unfortunately, the food doesn’t quite live up to the premium price tag. While the dishes are well-presented and the flavors are decent, they don’t offer the bold, unforgettable taste one might expect from a Michelin-starred chef. For the price, the portion sizes feel a bit lacking, leaving it hard to justify the value for money. A nice experience for those looking to try a celebrity chef’s restaurant, but there are better options for the price in KL. | review_rating:5, text:My husband and I had a delightful afternoon tea here on Valentine’s Day, and it was an experience to remember. From the moment we arrived, the staff were incredibly warm, professional, and attentive, ensuring we felt welcomed and well taken care of.

The ambience was elegant yet cosy, creating the perfect setting for a relaxing afternoon. To make the occasion even more special, a live violinist performed romantic melodies, adding a beautiful touch to the atmosphere.

The afternoon tea selection was beautifully presented, featuring a wonderful assortment of freshly made pastries, sandwiches, and fine teas. One of the highlights was Gordon’s signature Beef Wellington, which was cooked to perfection—crispy on the outside, tender and flavorful on the inside. Every dish was crafted with high-quality ingredients and impeccable attention to detail.

Despite the exceptional quality of the food and service, the price was quite reasonable, making it a great value for the experience provided. Everything from the service to the ambience exceeded our expectations. It was a truly enjoyable and romantic afternoon, and we would highly recommend this place for anyone looking for an elegant yet affordable afternoon tea experience. We will definitely be returning! | review_rating:5, text:My husband and I had the most unforgettable birthday celebration here. From the moment we walked in, I was in awe of the stunning interior decor and the exceptional, five-star service. Anthony, who served us, and all the staff went above and beyond to make the evening feel truly special. They even surprised us with a beautiful card and a complimentary non-alcoholic gin and tonic, which added a thoughtful touch to the experience. Thanks a lot Anthony for your superb service and everyone there!

As fans of Gordon Ramsay, dining at his restaurant was a thrill, especially seeing a photo of the celebrity chef himself on the wall! Our three-course meal was incredible, every dish worth every penny. For any Ramsay fan, this place is a must-visit, perfect for a memorable celebration.

We can’t wait to return to explore more of the menu and perhaps indulge in their afternoon tea. Highly recommended! | review_rating:4, text:Celebrated a special occasion here and it was a very enjoyable experience with good food on the whole and even better service. We arrived earlier for pre-dinner drinks at the bar and the cocktails were exceptional - among the best we've had in Malaysia and definitely a strong start to the evening. A surprising menu highlight was the Bone Marrow (beef tartare) which was excellent. Signature dishes (Beef Wellington, Arnold Bennett Souffle, Apple Tarte Tartin) did not disappoint. Only underwhelming dish was probably the Black Cod which we found underseasoned and lacking in flavor. Extensive wine list even by the glass. All in all a great place to go for an evening to remember. | review_rating:5, text:I recently dined at Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill in Sunway City, Kuala Lumpur to celebrate my wife’s birthday, and it was an unforgettable experience that truly lived up to its renowned reputation.

Food:
The food was nothing short of perfection. The Bar & Grill Burger was a standout, bursting with flavour and crafted to absolute perfection. The Grilled Miso Salmon was another highlight, with its rich, umami flavors and tender texture. To top it all off, the Blackberry Parfait was a dessert masterpiece, refreshing, indulgent, and the perfect ending to an incredible meal. Each dish was thoughtfully prepared and presented with finesse.

Drinks:
The drinks selection was outstanding, featuring a carefully curated range of beverages to complement the exquisite dishes. Whether you prefer a fine selection or something refreshing, the options are tailored to enhance the overall dining experience.

Service:
The service was impeccable. The staff were attentive, friendly, and ensured we had everything we needed for a special evening. They went above and beyond to make my wife’s birthday celebration memorable.

Important Notes:
1. If you make an online reservation, the payment made during booking will be deducted from your final bill, a seamless and convenient process.

2. For Muslim diners, the restaurant offers a ‘Halal’ dietary exception option when making reservations, showcasing their thoughtful consideration for all guests.

Overall, Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill offers a fantastic dining experience with exceptional food, drinks, and service. Highly recommended for special occasions or anyone looking to indulge in fine dining!

name: POISON APPLE
location: Suite G-01, Ground Floor, Pinnacle Annexe, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Ambiance is good. Food is worth a try. We tried baked salmon cheese rice, chicken chop, fish n chips, white dory carbonara &  spaghetti bolognese. | review_rating:3, text:Nice place.....sadly terrible service. Made reservation 3 weeks ahead yet when we arrived a table was being set up next to the sink and costume wardrobe....hence had no choice but ask for a change and opted for the couch. While the table was not big, requested that the food is not served all at once...which fell on deaf ears....we ended up having to hold the sharing plates. Again repeated to hold the next dish....waiter just said kitchen prepares all at once...with no consideration there was no space on the table to place the plate. We opted to order cocktails later and moved to the next table to enjoy the cocktails which looked interesting in the pics we saw. Snow whites potion was served as expected...with dry ice etc. Then the 7 dwarfs which tasted mostly like cough syrup. Would not pass off as cocktails at all. Not a hint of alcohol in it. The the Signature.....came in a plain martini glass..When asked why doesnt appear as in image on menu.....was told ran out of dry ice...at 9.30 pm!!!!! And that cocktail too...was BAD! So go for the food and the ambience....don't order cocktails.....and be prepared for unhappy waiters! | review_rating:5, text:Love this place a lot!!!! Will definitely come again & highly recommended as well. Choices of drinks & food, so so good!!! Worth it to try!

Staff please don’t be shy to communicate 😁 Hoping the staff can suggest wat to drink & eat as well. They seems to be shy 😅

Overall must try place!! Very very nice ❤️ | review_rating:3, text:Celebrated friend birthday at here and first time coming here....

The deco and design is in Snow White theme overall quite nice 😊

We ordered Roman Feast set with RM398 excluded 16% tax...the food is still OK......wedges are crunchy....I love the creamy mushrooms soup....however the portion is so so and the set had 2 salad....which we think is not so worthy...included beverage each people only drink 1, and we had 6 people, we spent around RM110 per headcount....which the price might just eat 1 piece pizza? 1 bowl mushrooms? Haha so we really think not so worthwhile 🤣

The service was OK, they help to take pic, play birthday song... | review_rating:4, text:The location of the restaurant is kinda secret. If not familiar with that area, will have to look for quite a long time. Even asking the staff at nearby shop lot also they have no idea where is it

name: YAMAGUCHI FISH MARKET
category: seafood_restaurant, market, restaurant, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Suite G-01, Ground Floor, Pinnacle Annexe, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:The worse seafood I have ever eaten!
The lobster in salt is terribly salty. Presentation is nice for everything.
The steam fish is overcook.
The crabs platters only taste of curry powder.

We cannot finished the lobster  because of saltiness.

Definitely won't come back again | review_rating:5, text:I'm happy with their WhatsApp reservation service. They also provide useful information on price changes on their menu and share promotion meals through WhatsApp.

Finding the shop was a little tricky as it's located beside the Sunway Pinnacle building. You can park your car inside the Sunway Pinnacle to access the next building where the shop is located.

The food quality was excellent. I particularly enjoyed their fish head noodle with crab and clams. The broth was simply delicious. Their signature wine prawns were very fresh, and the wine was super tasty. However, their lala soup was too spicy for me to drink with just a normal spicy level. The crabs were fresh too. I will definitely visit again for their sushi meals. 🍣 | review_rating:1, text:I visited Yamaguchi Fish Market Restaurant for the Seafood High Tea and was quite disappointed with the food quality. Considering the price(RM102/pax), there are better options available elsewhere. The selection was very limited, with only 14 items to choose from. The salmon sashimi was not fresh, and despite my request for only two of each item, they served the full set. Additionally, drinks were not included in the buffet. The only positive aspect was the food presentation. | review_rating:4, text:Food super good. Drinks a bit overpriced. | review_rating:4, text:The second outlet of this restaurant, located in The Pinnacle Annexe, Sunway was opened in April 1, 2022 – the main branch, located in Kampung Pandan was launched in November 2015.
It occupies 2 floors and has lots of seating capacity.  The decoration is rather haphazard, not that it matters when it comes to food and drinks.  The latter I suspect is the main draw come dinner time.
While the menu is extensive (not using the word lightly here!) and mainly promotes Japanese cuisine, there is also a small section catered to Chinese food.  What was a surprise was that they have quite a good range of set lunches as well!  We order the Teppanyaki Beef set, Teppanyaki chicken set, the Sang Hah Mee and a Lala Noodles Soup.  While the lala noodles was just ordinary, both the beef and chicken were pretty good; generous chunks of meat carefully cooked, almost to perfection in teppanyaki sauce.  The dipping sauce completely complemented the meat, being slightly tangy and sweet.  A more familiar chili paste provided some burn, if required. It also came with a plate of rice, edamame, chawanmushi, tofu and miso soup.   The sang hah mee was generous, a large plate of egg noodles drenched with eggy sauce and topped with one very fresh fairly large prawn (into 2 halves).  One is also allowed add-ons, a soup, a drink and dessert at give away prices.  One normally do not expect the add-ons to taste really good, but the mushroom soup was lovely and the ice-lemon tea refreshingly good too!
Although the service is not top notch, who cares when the food, in my opinion is a steal, particularly the sang hah mee.
(Footnote: I recently ate at a “famous” old school sang hah mee stall in the centre of KL and had to pay triple the price for a prawn smaller than the one I had at Yamaguchi.  Even the serving of noodles was more generous!)

name: Beutea
location: F1, 78, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Beutea 茶仙子 at Sunway Pyramid is another one of those trendy tea spots popping up everywhere, especially popular with the younger crowd. I gave it a try, but honestly, it didn't wow me. The drinks were a bit pricey, and the flavors just didn’t stand out for me. The service was polite, but everything felt lethargic and slow. The ambience was okay—not bad, but nothing that made me want to stay longer. Overall, I’m giving it 3 stars. I’m not really one to fall for the latest tea trends anyway! | review_rating:5, text:The service is good but not quick as they have many orders during promotion day. The ambience is nice and comfortable. The lights are bright and the design is beautiful. It makes you feel like you’re in their China branch. The drinks taste good and not too sweet. Highly recommend the white peach oolong milk tea. | review_rating:4, text:Had an afternoon break here while shopping to rest my feet. There was some seatings available within the store. Just that I find the service abit slow. Thought the prices had increased compared to the last time and now it’s costing more than a cup of Starbucks coffee so maybe next time will consider again before getting a cup. | review_rating:5, text:Always like their milk tea, normally I would order long Jing or oolong milk tea.
The deco here is also very deliberate. It gives a zen feeling. Ample table and chairs. | review_rating:5, text:At Top Floor.. have an apps for easy order...place is nice and cozy.. On Top VCR Sunway..

The Tea is nice and flavourful.. and the price is worth the price.. The taste is also good and nice...

Staff is fast and good service...nice place to try tea beside coffee..

Rekemended to try this brand of Tea.. :)

name: COTTON ON BODY
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: DR KO DERMACEUTICAL
location: Unit G1.86, Ground Floor Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I was assisted by Puteri and Diana, who were very helpful and knowledgeable. I’ve been using Drko skincare for 3 months, and I’m loving the results! My skin has improved significantly, especially with the addition of treatments at Drko Clinic for even better results. Lagi berbaloi beli skincare drko secara retail, compared to clinic and shoppe. | review_rating:5, text:Visited their outlet for the 1st time and the staffs
( Diana &  Carl )are so polite and very very friendly.
I grabed few skincares as they were having 12.12 promo. | review_rating:5, text:Really recommended . I was assist by Karl, his explanation really clear and helpful. Hopefully Dr.Ko product can help my skin barrier . | review_rating:5, text:My first time at Dr Ko & Becky (my sales assistant) was amazing, she is very knowledgeable and explained to me in detail about the products. Helped me advised the best routine for my hormonal acne + dry skin. She was very patient and helped me applied all the products to my skin (it was a mini facial experience). She didn’t pressure me to buy anything but ended up buying all the products she recommended. Top notch service! ✨✅👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:I like this product very much. I have sensitive skin, and many products I tried were not suitable until I used Dermax and Ko Dermacare. Now my sensitivity has improved a lot. I will continue to use it👍

her/his (I'm not sure) attitude was not pleasant and I felt like I was holding the staff up from going home

being attracted by the 30% discount but the overall experience was terrible | review_rating:1, text:Staff bad services with not smile at all..

reviews: review_rating:5, text:Fossil at Sunway Pyramid offers a clean, well-maintained shopping environment with friendly and attentive service. Their selection includes stylish wallets and card holders, though they are on the pricier side. The store also carries a range of watches for both men and women, with designs that are fashionable and suitable for young adults or those seeking affordable options. While some watch styles are basic, they still appeal to a trendy audience. Overall, Fossil delivers a pleasant shopping experience with quality products, making it a good stop for those willing to spend a bit more for style and brand reliability. | review_rating:5, text:Best service from shah fossil sunway pyramid! Would definitely repeat!

location: Lot F1.88 & F1.97, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:A fashion store aimed at young and trendy customers. The clothes are of varying materials and quality. The interior is bright and welcoming. The fitting rooms are clean and bright. There was a long queue to the fitting room, which was of course a negative experience. | review_rating:2, text:3 staff at the fitting room being rude and very not friendly. Siap jeling2 at customer. Worst experience here | review_rating:5, text:It is good after the renovation. The clothing choices are more varied compared to other outlets. I like shopping here | review_rating:5, text:One of their current flagship retail stores. This concept store by Padini is host to a variety of numerous house brands including popular names like Vincci, Padini Authentics, P&Co, Seed, Miki and many other labels. The layout is decidedly shopper friendly and large lanes allow leisure browsing by shoppers.

All in all, a very pleasant experience when we came by to do some Christmas and Lunar New Year shopping for the kids and there was quite a fair amount of choice along with quite substantial discounts on certain labels. If you're a harried parent looking for stylish and affordable seasonal fashion for the younger (and adult) set, this may be your one stop place for it. Highly recommended. | review_rating:5, text:Too many people were using fitting room but there a lady was controlling which is not occupying and the cashir also did very well

name: Sushi Jiro
category: sushi_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, restaurant, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2.122D, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The environment feels so cozy and calm. I really like the vibe during weekdays, not too many people and too busy. I ordered some salmon or tuna set(i forgot) as you can see in one of the pictures.  It was good and the price really affordable for 1 set. The most delicious dish in the shop was chawanmushi. I like it soo much, it was not too smelly like a fishy smell(coz of the egg). It really cleans your taste buds after eating the fresh tuna/salmon(dip too much sauce,salty). One thing, I didn't like about the place was that you needed to order through the QR code provided on the table, i have a problem connecting it for 15Minutes and gotta call the staff to help me. Overall, a great and delicious delicacy to dine in here. | review_rating:5, text:Good service and explanation from the staff name Joanne.  The sushi was awesome especially the salmon sushi and sashimi, perfect portion and quality.
The vibe was great we get to serve to seat on conveyor belt even the shop was in full house situation. We had a great dinner and will definitely visit  again. | review_rating:2, text:Often to eat sushi jiro in mid valley branch and we love that, is my first time in here, the food quality here need to be improve, we often order lady finger in mid valley, but the lady finger here was overcooked, and for the ramen and chawanmushi, the hot dish supposed to be serve in hot ( in my mind set ) but sorry we get a warm dish here, a lot of menu items is sold out, btw I never seen menu items sold out in mid valley branch even we walk in at 9pm, quite disappointed in here | review_rating:4, text:Dishes here are average, salmon sashimi isn’t as fresh.
But in general a good and simple place, if you are craving japanese food. | review_rating:4, text:This value for money Japanese Sushi offers really good tasty foods. I particularly love their Unagi don.
Will definitely return for more flavoursome choices.
Superb 👍

name: Zensuous
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: TEVA
location: F1.58A, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:I recently visited Teva at Sunway Pyramid and was impressed with their selection of sandals. Whether you're looking for something for everyday walking or a more durable pair for hiking or trekking, they have great options. Teva is my second favorite sandal brand after Keen, and their products didn't disappoint. The shop itself was clean and well-organized, making it easy to browse. However, the customer service was just average, not particularly memorable. Overall, it's a solid place to find comfortable and practical footwear. Four stars for the quality and variety of sandals. | review_rating:5, text:I had a great experience shopping at Teva Sunway Pyramid. The quality of the sandal I purchased is outstanding comfortable, stylish, and well-made. I will repeat to come to Teva again. | review_rating:5, text:they attend customer very well with patience. good service, recommended place to shop sandals! | review_rating:4, text:Staff at this store know their products well and are most helpful and patient.

name: Superdry
location: G1.66, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Superdry store Sunway pyramid always top notch..staffs are very helpful especially Yus treat us like his friend 🙂 | review_rating:4, text:i went here on cny celebration,crowded of people need to know what time are good to go,still the place where you can go that have evrything which is from makeup,clothes,jewellery and most importantly various of food to choose | review_rating:5, text:Love my jeans and t-shirt on weekends😎Shopping here was amazing as the sa here was very helpful and comprises a very friendly team (all 3 of them). Managed to get the right cut of jeans and comfy stylish t-shirts! | review_rating:1, text:As I looked for the price of the bag, a Malay girl came up to me and said rudely and disrespected, "376 "(price of the bag) I'm not feeling well about it. What she showed was, "Oh, you can't afford it." | review_rating:5, text:Sale of 40% in here, has a lot beautiful clothes

name: Focus Point
location: LG2.06 (A), 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The sales assistant  Aliyah was amazing.. so amazing we went to three other shops ..but still came back to her. And eventhough she didn't  have the design  we wanted in the premise.. she found it and ordered the exact one. Plus this store gave us a 50 percent discount | review_rating:5, text:I went here to get my eyeglass. The lady who served me was very polite and helpful. Focus point have good selection of frames, from affordable ones to expensive ones.

They have wide selections of lenses too. You can easily customize your eyeglass according to your specs and budget.

I got my eyeglass within 2 working days. Very fast service.

Located at LG2.06. You can get there from the main entrance lobby, take the stairs 2 floors down. | review_rating:4, text:"Attended by staff member Kar Soon, who was very pleasant and provided excellent service. I'm very happy with his assistance." | review_rating:5, text:I went to Focus Point Sunway Pyramid to buy a new pair of reading glasses.   I was advised to have my eyes checked thoroughly.  Mr. Ben and his team members are so knowledgeable and explained to me with excellent customer service.  I didn’t feel rushed and took a  longer time to get the perfect lenses for my eyes.  They also have a great selection of quality frames, great advice and make sure everything is correct and good with your new glasses.   They will advise you to try frames until you find the right pair without any pressure to buy them that fits your budget.  It is highly recommended to come here for excellent customer service and quality frames.  Looking forward to coming again!! | review_rating:5, text:I am a regular Focus Point customer and have visited their several stores around Klang Valley. The staff is always very polite in every store. However, my experience with this particular store was amazing. I interacted with Ben here, and I must say he really knows details about glasses and understands customer service very well. Keep up the good work. Highly recommended.

name: POISON APPLE
location: Suite G-01, Ground Floor, Pinnacle Annexe, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Ambiance is good. Food is worth a try. We tried baked salmon cheese rice, chicken chop, fish n chips, white dory carbonara &  spaghetti bolognese. | review_rating:3, text:Nice place.....sadly terrible service. Made reservation 3 weeks ahead yet when we arrived a table was being set up next to the sink and costume wardrobe....hence had no choice but ask for a change and opted for the couch. While the table was not big, requested that the food is not served all at once...which fell on deaf ears....we ended up having to hold the sharing plates. Again repeated to hold the next dish....waiter just said kitchen prepares all at once...with no consideration there was no space on the table to place the plate. We opted to order cocktails later and moved to the next table to enjoy the cocktails which looked interesting in the pics we saw. Snow whites potion was served as expected...with dry ice etc. Then the 7 dwarfs which tasted mostly like cough syrup. Would not pass off as cocktails at all. Not a hint of alcohol in it. The the Signature.....came in a plain martini glass..When asked why doesnt appear as in image on menu.....was told ran out of dry ice...at 9.30 pm!!!!! And that cocktail too...was BAD! So go for the food and the ambience....don't order cocktails.....and be prepared for unhappy waiters! | review_rating:5, text:Love this place a lot!!!! Will definitely come again & highly recommended as well. Choices of drinks & food, so so good!!! Worth it to try!

Staff please don’t be shy to communicate 😁 Hoping the staff can suggest wat to drink & eat as well. They seems to be shy 😅

Overall must try place!! Very very nice ❤️ | review_rating:3, text:Celebrated friend birthday at here and first time coming here....

The deco and design is in Snow White theme overall quite nice 😊

We ordered Roman Feast set with RM398 excluded 16% tax...the food is still OK......wedges are crunchy....I love the creamy mushrooms soup....however the portion is so so and the set had 2 salad....which we think is not so worthy...included beverage each people only drink 1, and we had 6 people, we spent around RM110 per headcount....which the price might just eat 1 piece pizza? 1 bowl mushrooms? Haha so we really think not so worthwhile 🤣

The service was OK, they help to take pic, play birthday song... | review_rating:4, text:The location of the restaurant is kinda secret. If not familiar with that area, will have to look for quite a long time. Even asking the staff at nearby shop lot also they have no idea where is it

name: WOK HEY
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15 LG2.43A, Lower Ground 2, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:I purchase wok hey like everyday for my lunch, very reasonable price for fried rice and protein choice, for a shop in a mall. No hidden charges also HALAL😀Very satisfied for their services, attentive and friendly, tq so much for not miss any my requests, good job guys | review_rating:4, text:Had shanghai fried rice, surprisingly it was really good. the fried rice was full of wok hey and they serve it hot from the wok. It’s a really good option for take away, but not dine in. The reason for not getting 5 star was dine in they also had to use plastic bag, could have serve on a tray instead. | review_rating:4, text:If you want simple, good old Chinese-style fried rice, Wok Hey is a good place for you. They have only a few options of fried rice but you can add on a number of vegetables and sides at additional price. The price is quite expensive but for the taste and portion, I'd say they're pretty decent. They're also served in takeaway boxes so if you don't finish, you can just close up the box and tapau your food home. The staff was very shy and tried to avoid interaction and kept it to a minimum. There are limited tables facing the ice rink reserved for customers but it's not that great if the place is crowded. | review_rating:5, text:The shop may not look fancy, but the food is fantastic. The fried rice and fresh ramen have that perfect 'wok hey' flavor. The seating is limited, and sometimes you'll need to clean your table due to the busy crowd, but the tasty food makes it all worth it. | review_rating:4, text:Ordered prawn fried rice then add on chicken n beef…… tasted better than my expectation. If u crave for Din Tai Fung fried rice and doesn’t wanna break the bank, this is a gd option

name: Wah Chan
location: Lot No. LG 2.141, Lower Ground 2, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Two thumbs up for Lilian Leong, highly recommended to look for her, bought a bangle and necklace from her. Excellent service! Very polite and friendly, very patient. Explain everything very clearly to me. All the staff here are very welcoming. Lot of design to choose from. Sure will come back if I need to buy more jewellery. | review_rating:5, text:6 July 2024, first time bought a gold bracelet gift for my mom as a teenager. To be honest i dont have much knowledges about gold, but Mr.Derreck explained well & very friendly service from him… i came last week to choose the design, normally must give deposit if you want to buy later but i promised him i really want to buy few days later and he kept for me ! .. the way he treat  me ( customer ) as a salesman really makes me inspired to buy more golds 😆✌🏻… nice gold design, nice service, nice environment 😃✌🏻 | review_rating:1, text:Had a terrible experience with Wah Chan. TRIED TO SCAM ME. I went there to trade in my gold ring, and this sales guy didn't even bother to test it or anything. He just held it, weighed it, and told me the gold purity is 720 and only worth a grand. My gold is actually 999. If you're thinking of trading in your gold, STAY FAR AWAY from Wah Chan. I would give it negative star or zero star if I could. | review_rating:5, text:Derreck was the salesperson. We initially were just comparing prices. He was very genuine and knowledgeable, hence we decided to purchase gold from him. Customers may look for him in the future :) | review_rating:5, text:First time getting my first solitaire diamond earring and a diamond band from Wah Chan in Sunway. We were served by a lovely lady named Lilian. She was down to earth and most importantly no pushy. We felt comfortable with her , we purchased our jewelries without hesitation.

Thank you again Lilian.
We will come back again! ☺️

name: MBSJ Kiosk
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Sukiya
location: LG2-30, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I have so much anger for this restaurant.

1) No one gives me a QR code when I sit down. I had to go to the counter to take it MYSELF! The waiters weren't even busy, the restaurant only has a few (5-6) customers.

2) Just as my food was served, I saw a cockroach climbing on my table. I raised my hand for so long (and 3 times) yet no one comes.

The customer service is so bad that I will never come here anymore. I absolutely DON'T recommend this restaurant to anyone. | review_rating:1, text:1. Customer service is out! No greetings, No smile and No explaination given as to how to order etc.

2. Cutleries is dirty and table is not clean when customer leave eventhough outlet is not busy.

3. Ordered their gyudon n yakiniku beef but we felf cheated as the same beef is being used for those menu. When asked their staff, they said oh! gyudon & yakiniku is actually the cooking style (MEANS THEY DON'T EVEN HAVE PRODUCT KNOWLEDGE)! No manager / No supervisor at the outlet. Staff had to call the manager and to my surprise, even the manager do not have product knowledge as to what is gyudon & yakiniku is! Manager blammed on the management. So as the customer i feel you guys are cheating ur customers. Price is different for both gyudon & yakiniku. | review_rating:1, text:Regret. Truly regrettable coming here. Better put other food in my belly and experience great pyramid eateries beside this one. Food is same as other reviewers, disappointing, cold, even for plating they don't put a single effort.

Outstanding mention goes to the service: the woman working here that I will put the picture as listed. Not friendly, not polite, almost fall down bring my food just in front of my table without any single apologise directly throw the food on my table. I was quite shocked honestly but she's just not supposed to be in F&B industry. If u had a bad day, it's the worse decision to throw it to customers. Dear employer, kindly review your employees. | review_rating:1, text:Really bad experience dining here. Got fool by the marketing advertisement
that say Yakiniku Don comes with thicker beef slice than the Gyudon offers. Came to surprise is just the same beef from the menu gyudon with higher selling price. Already asked the staff but he said only one type of beef served.Does not make sense at all. | review_rating:1, text:Just randomly picked this restaurant as in rush. Onsen is COLD (egg fr fridge), miso soup is too salty, ramen soup is not hot. Endamame is overly boiled. When feedback to the staff, i was told they pre prepared the onsen and all kept refrigerated! Is this how it should be done?

The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: KRISPY KREME DOUGHNUTS
category: donut_shop, bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Taste not fresh. The donuts need to improve, texture too soft. I ordered half dozen, and almond not crispy, those Oreo/biscoff not fresh.
Good things is buy 6 free 2. But the taste need to improve 🙃 | review_rating:5, text:I just want to compliment their service. the staff called Meera/Mira is such a sweetheart. I had a pleasant experience with her service. Such a warm welcome and she provided very good service to me. | review_rating:4, text:Krispy Kreme Ramadan Treats by @krispykreme.malaysia #malaysia

Krispy Kreme Malaysia 🇲🇾 has come up with 3 superb flavours in conjunction of the Ramadan month 🌙. So we managed to try the ..
-Ketayap 🍩. Based on the local snack “kuih ketayap” which is stuffed with sweetened coconut filling and pandan juice . So yeaaa.. the sweetness does replicate the pandan and the coconut 🥥 filling was a great addition.

-Eid Ketupat🍩. Based on Ketupat prints , which is rice packed inside a diamond-shaped container of woven palm leaf pouch.
The outer layer is colour icing sugar and the inside is a custard cream ... superb bonus 😋

-Almond London🍩. Based on local famous chocolate almond cookies. It has a coat of chocolate 🍫, topped with biscuit and almond crumbles. This is our least favourite among all.

-Double chocolate 🍩. Well this is one of the favourite of all time , Chocolate toppings and chocolate filling 🍫🍫🤟. That’s a double hit combo !!

Happy Friday!!!

#krispykreme #krispykremedoughnuts #ketayap #eidketupat #almondlondon #bestoftheday #klfoodie #klnow #bbcfood #foodinsider #eater #tasty #cafehoppingmalaysia #mycafefood #buzzfeedfood #netflixfood #eatnowkl #bestfoodfeed #worthit | review_rating:1, text:Purchased half dozen of donuts on 3rd August around 8pm. And the staff was ignoring us while we are standing waiting to be served. Not just that, none of them are smiling at all. The worst customer service ever for Krispy Kreme. | review_rating:3, text:I think I prefer Dunkin Donuts than Krispy Kreme.
Their texture, jam, fillings and toppings, all of these, I think Dunkin is better
But I have to say their Powdered Strawberry Filled is nice. The jam wasn’t that sweet and you can eat  some strawberry flesh inside.
Others were just normal.
Price is reasonable.

I bought this One Dozen Assorted Doughnuts on grab, and I only get 3 non-chocolate donuts 🥲
Sweetened chocolate easy to get jelak and seriously don’t know how they distribute the donuts flavor 🥲

name: The Brew House
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Deborah is super kind and helpful. I wanted to make a small gift for my wife for returning to work and she helped me customise the drawings to perfection. Price is awesome, service is great. Highly recommend! | review_rating:1, text:My mum ordered 3 hand pastel portraits from this girl in Dec 22, took 3 months and still was not ready in March 23, had to chase to to get the portraits, could not cancel as paid deposit. Had a first portrait hand drawn pastel that was done in Oct 22 - it was decent, so decided to have extra 3 more done which took longer, when received, the strokes of the the new hand pastel art looked different from the 1st received in Oct, looks really good and exact detailing, but on detail inspection - seems like a  combination of digital art and hand pastel? shown to another artists and 'digital art' was mentioned on first look without second thought. My mum called her and queried about the artwork and would like a replacement as she was not happy with it, but the girl say that she can buy a new one instead and deny digital art work by saying 'oh is there is such a thing?' to the word 'digital art'. Sounds very dodgy and would not recommend her unless she is drawing in front of you or made it clear 100% hand drawn. Very disappointed in how this is managed as the response from the girl is very questionable, with possibility of dishonesty and no transparency. We would be understanding if she would have declared if it was not full 100% hand drawn. | review_rating:5, text:Paintings look vivid! | review_rating:5, text:No Review

name: Hana Dining + Sake Bar
category: restaurant, sushi_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, bar, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: OB2.G.U1, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I frequent the Hana Dining restaurant in IPC quite a bit, so I was looking forward to trying this branch out. The food is about the same, so that's good. The service is also not bad. In those regards, they're the quite similar. The ambience and atmosphere, however, is much better here. There is a lot more space, and it's got a more chilled vibe in comparison. The menu is also extensive, so there's something for everyone. I would say it's a good place to visit for a nice dinner after shopping and/or a movie, especially if you love Japanese food. Recommended! | review_rating:3, text:Decent japanese restaurant at Sunway Pyramid.

Service is pretty friendly. Seating is both ample and spacious.

Interior deco at the entrance has a Japanese feel.

The food however is mediocre is both taste and quality compared to the price you pay. Not bad but not great either.

The sake quality is also mediocre, At a range of RM150++, again you get what you pay for.

Overall, an acceptable place for a Japanese meal but nothing awesome. | review_rating:5, text:Food was decent and also fresh during my dining. Staff was pretty friendly from start till end of the service experience.

The soothing atmosphere along with the music being played just makes the experience more delightful.

Great work | review_rating:2, text:Those foods were not very surprised and the price was worth for nothing. Everything wasn’t served hot enough and those sashimi weren’t fresh also… taste sour of tuna and the prawn was too fishy… Maybe i’d over expected to this restaurant before visited … | review_rating:1, text:Skip this place! There were worms in the drinks, and the food and service are absolutely terrible. The staff have terrible attitudes—ask them a question, and they won’t even bother responding. The few dishes I ordered that were supposed to be hot came out ice-cold, and they didn’t even provide a spoon. To make matters worse, they only served the green tea after everything else. And that guy in the picture? His disrespectful glare and complete lack of customer service are infuriating. Worst of all, they let worms fly or crawl all over their teapot before serving it to customers. Avoid this place at all costs!!!

reviews: review_rating:1, text:I went yesterday 24/10/2024. The sales person initially encouraged to go for 2 items for 30% discount. After that, ask us why not we go for more, as if we go for more than 2 items, we will get additional 10% discount on top of the 30% discount. So, because of this, we get the kids to try on their shoes and the kids are in love with the sport shoes. However, to our much disappointment, when we are about to pay, we feel weird, that the calculation didnt match what we were told, and the sales person just told us that, sorry, the promotion had ended a day earlier, but how can? as a big company did such a mistake. We still ended up buying because we didnt want the kids to be upset after choosing and trying and confirming their shoes, we ended paying RM87x instead of RM79x. This is really so unprofessional way, how can the staff be so unprofessional, or the company no notification of the promotion ended? I appreciate Anta to reply us for this matter. We were regular customer of ANTA, but truly disappointed with this misinformation and service yesterday at Sunway Pyramid branch. | review_rating:5, text:Great location and good service. The shop assistant was very patient when we were trying out various shoes. Wide variety of shoes and clothings available. Well done!! | review_rating:5, text:Ain provided exceptional service! Her patience and professionalism in assisting with apparel sizes were greatly appreciated. She even went above and beyond by sourcing new pieces for us. The sportswear is incredibly comfortable and perfect for Malaysia's weather. Highly recommended 👍👍 | review_rating:5, text:Great service by the 2 staff this morning 👍🏼Finally managed to get a comfortable running shoe | review_rating:5, text:Lovely.
