name: Samsung Service Centre
location: Lot F1.27, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I am writing to formally lodge a complaint regarding the poor service I experienced at your authorized service centre in Sunway Pyramid. The lack of communication, persistent stock shortages, and difficulty in reaching the service centre have caused significant inconvenience. Below is a timeline of the incident and my key concerns.

Timeline of the Incident:
16 February 2025 – I contacted the Sunway Pyramid service centre to schedule a screen replacement for my Samsung S23 Ultra. I was informed that the screen was out of stock but would be restocked on 18 February 2025. Following this, I requested to book an appointment for 22 February 2025, and the service centre advised me to send my details via WhatsApp. I did so, and they acknowledged my request with a "noted" response. Based on this, I assumed my appointment was confirmed.

22 February 2025 – I called the service centre to reschedule my appointment to 23 February 2025. It was only then that I was informed that the screen was still out of stock.

Complaint Points:
Poor Communication – If I had not called on 22 February, I would have traveled to the service centre on 23 February only to find out the screen was still unavailable. Why wasn’t I informed in advance that the stock had not arrived? As a service provider, the service centre should proactively notify customers if their scheduled repairs cannot proceed due to stock unavailability.

Frequent Stock Shortages – Why does the service centre frequently face stock shortages for essential replacement parts? Does this mean customers will always have to wait indefinitely to get their devices repaired? Being unable to use my phone for an extended period has caused unnecessary inconvenience, and potential financial losses.

Extremely Difficult to Contact – I found it extremely difficult to reach the service centre. As an authorized service provider for a global brand like Samsung, the service centre should have a more accessible and responsive customer support system.

The poor service I experienced has been frustrating and unacceptable. As a loyal Samsung customer, I expect better service quality and a more reliable repair process | review_rating:2, text:Left my fold 4 with the center on Saturday, received a call to collect in on Thursday. They claim to replace the screen but I can see that it is still the same screen (there is a slight mark on the screen. It is still there, meaning it's the same screen). They fix the issue with the phone turning off when using the inner screen. However, the center returned my phone with scratches and screen bubbling. They do not handle your phone with care. I suggest take lots of photo and video as evidence before you hand over to them. | review_rating:5, text:came in with a flip 3 samsung that half of the screen was damage, i want to tranfers my data from that phone but couldnt since the screen cant be use. the obvious solution was to replace the flip 3 screen that cost rm1k but i dont want to do that since it was an old phone and already have a new one. however, there was this nice uncle samsung worker who go out of his way to help me, even took out a usb mouse to help me tranfer the data. couldnt be more grateful for the uncle | review_rating:1, text:Brought my s20 to repair for cracked screen but after repair my screen have issues with tapping which it move around itself. Visiting 2nd time within a week and informed that my phone when sent it to them it is already have this issue which supposed I am sure supposed not to be. As luckily I have video record as proof my phone condition before left my phone to them.

The problem didn't been solved and I don't wish to send my phone there again. Now it become my backup phone and I bought another new phone because of their poor workmanship.

Please be reminded they may told you estimated 4 to 5 working days but you still need to chase them for a follow-up and at last can be taken even more than 1 week time to collect your item. Worst thing is your phone's problem didn't get solved after long waiting time.

I am a Samsung users for more than 10 years but tbh if your phone have problems, it is better you find phone repair specialist rather than their authorized service center. Why? because my new phone's screen cracked again and i decided to bring my to phone repair specialist. Price is similar to them but service lagi tip-top. | review_rating:5, text:Am really happy with the attentiveness and the problem solving measures done by the customer service personal. He explained well and was very friendly. Keep up the good work!!

reviews: review_rating:4, text:Sports Direct at Sunway Pyramid provides a solid shopping experience for sports enthusiasts. The store is spacious, well-organized, and stocked with a wide variety of quality sportswear and equipment for all needs. Prices are reasonable, with occasional great deals on branded items. The service was above average—staff were helpful and responsive, though there’s still room for improvement in providing personalized assistance. Overall, it’s a reliable and convenient spot for finding the right gear. Four stars! | review_rating:3, text:Sports Direct at Sunway Pyramid is a great place for sports gear! They have a wide range of sports shoes, clothes, equipment, and accessories at good prices. The store is well-organized, and the staff is helpful. Whether you're looking for sportswear or gear for different sports, this store has it all! | review_rating:5, text:The best customer service received by DIAN, I was soooooo overwhelmed by the shop and did not know what to buy and where to find what I wanted. She helped me find the correct size, colours I liked. She was with me all through and I’m so happy I came here. Will be bringing my sister too 🩵 please ask for her when you go there. So sweet girl. | review_rating:4, text:During my short visit, I received good help in navigating the different variants of the product I was looking for. Even though they didn't have the metallic variant I wanted, I was satisfied with the help I received from the knowledgeable staff. | review_rating:1, text:Doesn't know how to string a tennis racket properly. The string pattern is messed up at the bottom part. They also broke my grommet and its a brand new racket never strung before and the strings are damaged badly like it has been purposely cut (i didn't buy the string from them). I am really disappointed due to the damaged grommet because this particular racket doesn't sell replacements. I wish you can train your staff more instead of causing damages to customers properties now I have to re string the racket and hope the string doesn't snap because of the broken grommet.

name: 3CE
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

location: Lot G1.PT.03A, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Good shop with authentic alcohol, wide ranges of selection of craft beers, brandy cognac, wines and whisky and more. Will recommend to others who are passionate about good alcohols and wants alot of choices | review_rating:5, text:Very friendly and helpful staff. Bought a very good red wine with reasonable price from this store that recommended by the staff. | review_rating:5, text:Their wine in a glass concept is so nice! Workers there are so friendly. | review_rating:5, text:Good ambience..they got draft beer also…staff friendly and helpful | review_rating:4, text:Found a new chill out, u can buy and drink at their store

name: Souper Tang
location: Lot LG1.112, Level LG1, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The setting is more spacious compared to the previous outlet. The dishes we had are delicious and nourishing, with highlights including their signature herbal soups. The portions are suited for only 2-3 people and may feel slightly pricey.

Anyway the flavours and quality make it worth a visit. | review_rating:4, text:The four-star rating was for the double-boiled wild mushroom nourishing soup. While the portion size was small and the price was high, the taste was good.  However, the braised chicken feet with abalone sauce was average. | review_rating:5, text:Very cosy environment with healthy Chinese herbal cuisine.  Customer service is good.  We also brought their products and make herbal soups at home too.  Highly recommended for dining or buying their products | review_rating:5, text:First visit to Souper Tang @ Sunway Pyramid. It’s clean and spacious. Very attentive, observant and helpful stuff. The food is delicious especially this hot stone rice bowl. Highly recommended and will come back for next visit. | review_rating:3, text:I went to this branch a couple of times but seem like the staffs are not attentive whether they are busy or not.

The soup is not 炖 but a concentrated version. With that I think the price is a bit steep. The bird nest is a tad expensive with the amount of bird nest that mixed with white fungus to confuse non-regular consumers of bird nest. The fried egg truffle is definitely over priced with minimum truffle taste. (Went on 20th Dec 2024).

I visited another time on 3rd Jan 2025 and went back to have the herbal chicken which has lower chance to go wrong.

Somehow I feel that the general food portion can be improved since most dishes are priced higher than average.

name: Secret Recipe
location: LG 2.48, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:"Secret Recipe" at Sunway Pyramid is a well-loved establishment that consistently receives positive feedback from its customers. The vibrant atmosphere, coupled with its diverse menu, ensures that patrons keep coming back for more. The restaurant offers a wide array of dishes ranging from Western classics to local Malaysian favorites, catering to different tastes and preferences. Their cakes, which are a signature of the brand, are especially popular, with flavors like chocolate indulgence and cheesecake often earning rave reviews.

Many visitors appreciate the consistent quality of the food, as it’s always freshly prepared and served with care. The portions are generous, making it a satisfying dining experience for both individuals and groups. The attentive staff are another highlight, with many customers mentioning how friendly and professional they are, adding to the overall pleasant dining atmosphere.

For those who value convenience, Secret Recipe at Sunway Pyramid is conveniently located within the bustling mall, making it an ideal spot for a break from shopping or after a movie. The ambiance is perfect for casual outings, family gatherings, or even business meetings, offering a relaxed yet stylish setting.

Whether it’s the delicious food, the great customer service, or the convenient location, Secret Recipe continues to receive glowing feedback from its patrons, earning it a solid reputation as one of the top dining options in Sunway Pyramid. | review_rating:5, text:I love going to secret recipe...fairly easy to order through the QR for dine in and claim the voucher and points at the payment counter after eating...I love all their cake slices...they also have promotions for the heavy meals, pastry and cake at specific times. I definitely recommend coming here...price wise is standard. | review_rating:5, text:I love their customer service so much. When I enter the shop, they greet me with big smile on their face and assist me to my table. I love the staff especially all the waiter that serve me and I remembered few staff’s name that serving me that time, if Im not mistaken their name is Asyiqin and Sarah.. both is so friendly and helpfull. They always smiling while serving their customers . The food was amazing too. Very delicious and tasty. My favorite is their Mee Kari and manggo lassi. So sedap and sangat banyak! ♥️ | review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing experience at Secret Recipe today! The staff were friendly, courteous, and incredibly attentive. I was pleasantly surprised by the complimentary fish crackers, and they were more than happy to switch my spaghetti to chicken since I can’t eat beef. One of the staff even brought me extra serviettes without me asking, as she noticed mine were already filthy — such a thoughtful touch! Their exceptional service truly made my day. Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Food here was awesome, Service was also great. Waiters were friendly and food also came quick.
Cashier was also friendly and asked about our food here

category: cafe, health, restaurant, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG1.110A, Sunway Pyramid (Blue Atrium No, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Ordered my DIY bowl. Was disappointed with it. Couscous came in cold. Chicken was cold too. The whole bowl was cold in general. Ordered the aglio olio and it was ok in general. Eat only if you’re in a rush and health conscious. | review_rating:1, text:I ordered through Foodpanda, and the salmon was BAD! The texture was soft and mushy. I got a stomachache after eating just 1/3 of it before realizing how awful the salmon cubes were. Seriously, this is TERRIBLE! How can you not check your food quality before sending it out to customers? | review_rating:5, text:I order the wholesome bowl, food is good. The staff was very nice and helpful, I was able to use my voucher from Grab Food successfully. | review_rating:2, text:I don’t like this kind of wrap quality oh. Look at the photo how much liquid drip out the moment I hold up the wrap trying to eat it. The wrap also did not heat up. Wrap ingredients are cold. Not appetizing. | review_rating:5, text:Fresh ingredients, wide selection of toppings, generous food portion and the juices are freshly squeeze with no sugar added.
Food prices are decent.
Definitely one of my regular go-to place for healthy eats.

name: Guardian
location: LG2.06, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Yes 👍 Yes 👍 Yes 👍
My FIRST shopping experience with GUARDIAN @ Sunway Pyramid 😍 as it was my first trip to Malaysia 🇲🇾 my friends recommended me this store and ✨I LOVED IT✨❤️❤️❤️ Thanks to EFFE for consulting me about all the local products and “must have” items because of EFFE I left the store with 3 large shopping bags 🛍️😄 and thanks Hakeem for fast checkout at the cashier 💸🧾 Thanks to a lady from Medicine/Vitamins 💊section for explaining me about local Malaysian products 😊 By the way, there are great OFFERS and PROMOTIONS, which makes you save money 💰 for more shopping 👏😉🌟 I CAN NOT WAIT TO BE BACK TO KUALA LUMPUR and shop at GUARDIAN store again 🥰

Enjoy, Diana💋 | review_rating:1, text:I am writing to share feedback about my recent experience at your store involving one of your cashiers, Nurul.

While waiting in line at her counter, there was no signage indicating that the counter was closed. When I reached her, she instructed me to go to another counter, which was already occupied with refund issues. After some time, I noticed that she reopened the counter and served another customer instead of inviting me back.

This situation caused unnecessary inconvenience and frustration. I would appreciate it if you could address this matter and ensure clearer communication in the future to improve the overall customer experience.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. | review_rating:5, text:I recently did my AIA Vitality health check here, and the pharmacist, En. Naim, was extremely helpful and patient. He took the time to explain all the terms and results thoroughly. I will definitely return for the excellent service. | review_rating:4, text:The store is organized and clean. Before purchase the PWP item, it is better to clarify with the counter staff for better understanding the details. In general, the staff is friendly and helpful. | review_rating:5, text:I bought some plaster here.  The staff are really nice.  Although the product has been mentioned, but the staff still mention it clearly to me. Really a great place. Recommend it.

name: PENANG CHENDUL
location: LG2.90, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Penang Chendul at Sunway Pyramid was a bit of a letdown. The service was slow and unremarkable, with food delivery feeling sluggish. While the coffee was strong and sweet, the overall dining experience didn't stand out. The ambience was quite plain, lacking any unique charm. Given the number of better dining options nearby, I’d rate this restaurant 2 stars. There’s definitely room for improvement. | review_rating:3, text:For those craving for the famous Cendol at Lorong Selamat, Georgetown, Penang, can come here for temporary enjoyment. During the 1st 2 years from opening, the green cendol, Melaka sugar and coconut milk were very good, original and same as the original stall in Penang, but the taste and quality had dropped after that and recently it was back to standard but not that original since it opened anymore. The restaurant right now more look like Warong or Malay Restaurant, just come here for a bowl of cendol is more than enough or just drive up to Georgetown for the original type. The owner of this Cendol, not the owner of this restaurant as it is the franchise restaurant, Mr. Tan Chong Kim and his family (Jimm, Florence & Owen) should regular visit and spot check on the quality and standard at the franchise restaurants before the franchise restaurants screw up the taste and image of his father or grandfather’s (Mr. Tan Teik Fuang) hard created cendol. You may consider to terminate the franchise agreement with them, if you feel that the taste is not as original or tasty as from your stall | review_rating:5, text:Currently got first sign up gift buy one free one signature chendul, claiming process is very fast, and muarchi Rm3 with any purchase👍🏻
Asam laksa and rojak was delicious here👍🏻
Only setback was not enough air-conditioning here. | review_rating:5, text:I was contemplating to eat a good cendul until I came across Penang Chendul in Sunway pyramid when the staff Verral approached me.
He was very attentive and keen to let me know the current promotion and also suggest what to eat in the shop.
I'm very happy with the services and would come again for sure! | review_rating:5, text:One of my favorite places for cendol. Can redeem with maxis or hotlink for a cheaper price. Food ok.

name: YAMAGUCHI FISH MARKET
category: seafood_restaurant, market, restaurant, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Suite G-01, Ground Floor, Pinnacle Annexe, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:The worse seafood I have ever eaten!
The lobster in salt is terribly salty. Presentation is nice for everything.
The steam fish is overcook.
The crabs platters only taste of curry powder.

We cannot finished the lobster  because of saltiness.

Definitely won't come back again | review_rating:5, text:I'm happy with their WhatsApp reservation service. They also provide useful information on price changes on their menu and share promotion meals through WhatsApp.

Finding the shop was a little tricky as it's located beside the Sunway Pinnacle building. You can park your car inside the Sunway Pinnacle to access the next building where the shop is located.

The food quality was excellent. I particularly enjoyed their fish head noodle with crab and clams. The broth was simply delicious. Their signature wine prawns were very fresh, and the wine was super tasty. However, their lala soup was too spicy for me to drink with just a normal spicy level. The crabs were fresh too. I will definitely visit again for their sushi meals. 🍣 | review_rating:1, text:I visited Yamaguchi Fish Market Restaurant for the Seafood High Tea and was quite disappointed with the food quality. Considering the price(RM102/pax), there are better options available elsewhere. The selection was very limited, with only 14 items to choose from. The salmon sashimi was not fresh, and despite my request for only two of each item, they served the full set. Additionally, drinks were not included in the buffet. The only positive aspect was the food presentation. | review_rating:4, text:Food super good. Drinks a bit overpriced. | review_rating:4, text:The second outlet of this restaurant, located in The Pinnacle Annexe, Sunway was opened in April 1, 2022 – the main branch, located in Kampung Pandan was launched in November 2015.
It occupies 2 floors and has lots of seating capacity.  The decoration is rather haphazard, not that it matters when it comes to food and drinks.  The latter I suspect is the main draw come dinner time.
While the menu is extensive (not using the word lightly here!) and mainly promotes Japanese cuisine, there is also a small section catered to Chinese food.  What was a surprise was that they have quite a good range of set lunches as well!  We order the Teppanyaki Beef set, Teppanyaki chicken set, the Sang Hah Mee and a Lala Noodles Soup.  While the lala noodles was just ordinary, both the beef and chicken were pretty good; generous chunks of meat carefully cooked, almost to perfection in teppanyaki sauce.  The dipping sauce completely complemented the meat, being slightly tangy and sweet.  A more familiar chili paste provided some burn, if required. It also came with a plate of rice, edamame, chawanmushi, tofu and miso soup.   The sang hah mee was generous, a large plate of egg noodles drenched with eggy sauce and topped with one very fresh fairly large prawn (into 2 halves).  One is also allowed add-ons, a soup, a drink and dessert at give away prices.  One normally do not expect the add-ons to taste really good, but the mushroom soup was lovely and the ice-lemon tea refreshingly good too!
Although the service is not top notch, who cares when the food, in my opinion is a steal, particularly the sang hah mee.
(Footnote: I recently ate at a “famous” old school sang hah mee stall in the centre of KL and had to pay triple the price for a prawn smaller than the one I had at Yamaguchi.  Even the serving of noodles was more generous!)

name: 1 MOBILE STORE
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I recently purchased a laptop and had an excellent experience with the service provided. The staff was knowledgeable, patient, and helped me find the perfect device that suited both my budget and performance needs. They provided clear comparisons between different models, ensuring I made an informed decision.

The purchasing process was smooth, with fast and hassle-free payment options. Additionally, the after-sales support was impressive—responsive and helpful in addressing any questions I had about setup and optimization. The laptop itself performs exceptionally well, delivering great speed, battery life, and display quality as promised.

Overall, I highly recommend this service to anyone looking for a reliable and efficient laptop buying experience. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recommended. excellent service and i bought two laptops here itself. The sales guy Tapu is very helpful. | review_rating:5, text:Good service. Very fast and Shahin knows his products very well. Happy with purchase. | review_rating:5, text:I am glad to purchase an AI Boost integrated in Intel Core Ultra processor Laptop. The staff Shahin is super good in service, clear my doubt & solve all my problem. A nice environment store. Ended, purchased 2set of computer here, happily. | review_rating:5, text:Tapu was very helpful with my purchase as i specify that i wanted a laptop that is good enough for a student. Very recommended. Thank you

reviews: review_rating:5, text:Been eating at the Sunway Pyramid outlet for many years, I’m a regular here esp for lunch break. Love how affordable the pastas here are without compromising the taste. And if some days the pasta is a little uncooked or overcooked/salty, I’d let them know and they were courteous noting on the feedback. The supervisor there is friendly & helpful. Staff are overall nice. Short waiting time. Thumbs up. | review_rating:5, text:Have been eating here for more than 5 years. Consistent and excellent taste. Would highly recommend their baked penne pasta. Really good comfort food and worth the price and taste! Excellent service as well! | review_rating:5, text:The pasta are delicious and the server is kind and welcoming, my favourite is their pesto pasta and chicken cabonara. It is also affordable for students and have smaller portions for those who can't eat so much. Great place 10/10!!! | review_rating:3, text:The Milanese chicken spaghetti was disappointing. While the portion size was generous, the dish lacked flavor, leaving it bland and unremarkable. The chicken, unfortunately, was tough, making the overall experience underwhelming. | review_rating:5, text:Tasty meals at reasonable prices. The customer service was excellent, and the food quality is impressive for the cost. Suggest giving a try to any of their spaghetti dishes that feature olive oil.

name: Popular
location: LG1.123, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Popular at Sunway Pyramid is a pretty decent bookstore with a nice variety of books and a great selection of stationery. The place is neat and organized, so it’s easy to find what you need. The stationery section really stands out if you’re into that kind of thing. Service was just okay—nothing special, but they get the job done. It’s a huge store, and it has everything you’d expect for a quick browse. Overall, a reliable spot if you’re in the mall and need books or supplies, and definitely worth checking out! | review_rating:5, text:Hi I was a tourist that visited this bookshop on Thursday and I had asked for a Malaysian cook book to cook nasi lemak and satay skewers and chicken rendang the two young Malaysian hijab girls were very helpful and stopped what they were doing and walked with me to the section and flicked through the pages to find the perfect one I can’t thank them enough give them the recognition they deserve (also they didn’t have name tags but I will attach photos of the books) terima kasih | review_rating:5, text:They always have a special price. They have Dragon Ball comics, etc. but perhaps Popular can put a chairs like other bookstores. I’m a disabled person & it is hard for me to take a rest while shopping in the store. There’s no place for me to sit for a while. | review_rating:1, text:Popular Sunway pyramid store manager, please manage your cashier counter as customer queue is not moving at all for 10 mins, do not exploit or mistreat your customers’ trust and support. | review_rating:4, text:This is probably one of the biggest Popular outlets around and it has a variety of books to choose from, especially their English fiction section. I love that they're always adding and updating more new books, and that they regularly have promotions going on.

However, sometimes they have too many overlapping promotions that even their system cannot handle and the staff are not familiar with. There have been too many instances where I find same books (same publication, size etc), but they're tagged different prices. Some books are tagged a certain amount but when I got to the counter, they said they were tagged wrongly and the price was actually higher than displayed by the tag.

As a regular patron, this had happened too many times especially when they have many different promotions at the same time (ie all books for 20% for 2 books or more but they also have 10% on fiction so if you buy fiction, even if you buy 2 books or more, you're only entitled to get 10% each). This makes the shopping experience here very unpleasant. The only way to know for sure how much you have to pay exactly is by checking at the counter, which is troublesome especially if there's large crowd.

However, other than this, I really like this outlet because of the variety of books available. Hope they'll improve on the system and pricing especially when they want to have overlapping discounts.

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:It was my first time dining at this outlet. I have eaten at other Texas Chicken outlets before.

I tried one of the Menu Rahmah dishes for a late lunch. The rice portion was quite small compared to the very first time I had the same meal at another place. Should be genuine in serving the budget meal. Otherwise, don't serve it. Hope the management will look into this.

Otherwise, it's a nice and big store. Staff are courteous and friendly. | review_rating:4, text:Food is serve quick despite a lot of crowd, and they are piping hot. I tried their garlic chicken, not really nice, still prefer the ori taste. Their mash potato taste quite weird. But overall still better than KFC. | review_rating:5, text:they have the charging port and you can bring your laptop to do work there. they assigned 2 PIC to clean the table quickly. the crowd very fast moving, the view is pretty and the chicken is fresh from the oven. so far is a good chicken shop | review_rating:4, text:This outlet is clean. I saw the staff cleaning the tables very quickly. The food is fresh and the service is fast! Flavors are also good. Try the mexicana wrap, spicy if you can tolerate it. | review_rating:3, text:Texas Chicken always better than KFC, fresher chicken, bigger and tasty. Delivery ok too but sometimes took longer time but it's ok not as bad as KFC delivery. The fries not crunchy and soft and I noticed the tissue sometimes just one piece only or none, maybe encourage people use less paper, can reuse the box because is paper too. Acceptable la.

name: Putien
location: LG1.43A, Lower Ground 1, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Visited a few Putien restaurants and always enjoy the dishes served. However, recent visit to this particular Putien restaurant located at Sunway Pyramid was disappointing. Perhaps it was due to Chinese New Year that the dishes from the set meal were served in a rush and a few of the dishes were served at the same time.

The table is not big enough and the staff were busy transferring the dishes to smaller plates. It was chaotic and customers were not able to eat in peace. The acoustic was poor and it was really noisy. The squirrel fish was over fried and stingy with the sauce. Would not recommend to dine in this particular branch. | review_rating:3, text:Visited today for dinner. Female Staff taking Q n waiting list is very kind enough to bring me to see the atmosphere of the restaurant .
The food is slightly below average.  The chicken meat is very dry...
Ending our 7-8 courses meal. The guy staff left the order list on the table and quickly keep our dirty / finish plate.
At this moment, felt like they are rushing us...  needed to improve on the service  n food | review_rating:5, text:Love their food very much, it is fresh and very delicious, the service is very good, attentive and thoughtful, and the environment is clean. Worth coming again | review_rating:5, text:Great Fujian Michelin restaurants inside the Sunway Pyramid. Food quality is excellent and well maintained.
There is a meal set that suits 3-4 people with only RM188. We normally will order the meals set that comes with their popular dishes, eg. Deep Fried Squirrel Fish, lychee meat, special spinach, crispy oyster etc. And added a few more side dishes.
The service is good and friendly staff. Their price is on the high side, and it is good for business dining or for some special occasions. | review_rating:5, text:Two of us had dinner at Putien this evening. We decided to have Braised Bean Curd with Chinese Cabbage and Fried Heng Hwa Bee Hoon. The Braised Bean Curd had a simple broth but the ingredients made it very flavourful. Putien is generous in their ingredients content. The Bee Hoon vermicelli is very fine and though the condiments look very basic, it was the best Bee Hoon we had tasted so far. The service by Alvin Lim was really great as he introduced himself to us and said to call on him should we need further assistance. He was very polite and attentive. We ended the meal with a very refreshing and complimentary dessert. We strongly recommend having a great meal with good service at Putien !

name: MyeongDong Topokki
location: F1. AV.148, Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Ok first of all, I was shocked menu changed already and I asked nicely regarding the promotion for 10% off for value set and which is the value set? Oh wow didn't know you all changed the menu already and no free tea in my order anymore. I had to purchase separately and next the person at the cashier can't reply me nicely and was super lazy to even layan. If you're that tired, don't work. I'm also a working person and just finished work to just eat. Refill for side dishes now also up to 3 times only. Anchovies also not provided anymore haha. Was my favourite but I guess no more. Oh also no soup provided nor allowed to refill the sauce anymore as have to pay. As for this bibimbap no more mushrooms and replaced with corns ?!?! Myeongdong topokki has disappointed me very much now. It used to be my go to place all the time. As for this branch, pls improve your customer service as not everyone knows about your new menu/promotion and such. Dah la I'm not in my mood cuz of previous person also lazy and wanted to shoo me away from the shop. | review_rating:5, text:I ordered the Kimchi Fried Rice with tamago and corn, the Korean Milk Tea and a piece of hotteok. The fried rice had a generous portion (which is good but its too much for me). The korean milk teas was sweet but not too sweet (if you mix it properly). The hotteok for me was not something I'd get again because the filling was way too sweet. Overall experience = 8/10, will come back to try other food | review_rating:5, text:Located near the blue atrium.. Near Like Small Shop Places.. Place is nice and comfortable.. well maintain by staff...

Staff girl at cashier and yang kemas semua sangat professional.. bile nak order well prepare and always smile.. smooth ordering.. just my opinion at one point i am glad that my order come fast but my point of view is, if there is other customer please serve them accordingly by the number.. not jump2 number.. some might not be okay with that.. kitchen my alert DONT JUMP ORDER...

Food taste is nice.. well cook and season.. as this is my 2nd outlet i visit after ioi city mall.. the price is quite worthy and You Get Free Flow Panchan and Green Tea Drink..

Overall is rekemended and nice to visit and taste Korea Cuisine.. :) | review_rating:1, text:This place was nice before the menu change. What's with the crazy amount of mayo? Where's the anchovies and soup? No more free green tea? This place is terrible now. To top it off, the cashier lady was terrible and rude. Never coming back again. | review_rating:4, text:First time here for early dinner. Ordered chicken ramyun, ramyun with teokbokki and seafood jigae. Very affordable and the plus was the jigae which was so rich and nice to eat. Drinks can be refilled 3x hence for the price we paid it was good.

Overall, service was ok though the food took about 20mins to be served.

reviews:

I was looking for bed related items and bought everything here. Unfortunately, my landlord told me the wrong size of my bed, so I bought everything queen sized. Luckilly the employees were so kind to arrange that I could return and change everything the same day. Great service and good prices!

name: OASIS Rewards Counter
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

Tissot
Machine (iPhone)

And many branded kind of outlet have staff with very much dog kind judgemental characters

However, Ms Annie works quite long with Tissot sunway Pyramid have a very soulfull customer service.

I was there last year just to check out. She serviced well. Yesterday 03032024 I and my Patner went and she was the same again and provided very good service.

No regret...

review_rating:2, text:Registered member but still Failed to get discount! Disappointed 😞Get nothing discount but Wasting Time 😞 | review_rating:5, text:Clothes were pretty nice and staff was very helpful with choosing and recommending clothes.

Hope the boss can give them bonus haha | review_rating:1, text:Happily shopping for new clothes for cny, went in this shop, took one short pants and try , but it does suit me well, so return back to the staff, the rude staff with spec on directly grab the clothe on my hand and her long nail scratch my hand. I looked into her face and she didn't even look at me . I'm the customer I have the right not to buy the clothes if it does not suit me wel， why I need to be treated like this. Saw many ppl have bad comment on the staff in this boutique too, tapas management , aren't you gonna do something? So rude!!!Bad experience!!! Won't coming back to this shop again! | review_rating:1, text:Today I was taking my shirt ready to pay at the counter. Suddenly I saw the staff take my shirt to exchange at the back with a shirt with dirts. I asked her why change? She said it’s the last one, then I looked at the direction of the rack with the same clothes with many sizes. Then, she only change back the shirt I took for me. First time buying shirt from this boutique and I was quite shocked with the staff’s attitude.

location: LG2.28 Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall No. 3 Jalan PJS11/15 Bandar Sunway 47500 Petaling Jaya Selangor MY, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Seriously good for halal certified dim sum.  The siew Mai, prawn egg fried rice, Har Kao, glutinous rice, prawn fritter, fried beef Kway teow were good. | review_rating:4, text:The best halal place to get halal tasty dim sum fast and near! Immediate location to go to in order to satisfy that tastebud!

The portion is getting smaller and smaller by the day. Such a disspointment though. Everything seems to shrink. Sad! Food, drink, size...quantity!

New menus available especially when it comes to dishes so we tried those salted butter prawn and the portion is so not what we expected. They should really mention "for illustration purposes only" in the menu.

Service is acceptable and everything else is tolerable. What a letdown if it keeps going from utterly amazing to barely good. | review_rating:4, text:Good services as usual. Efficient and attentive to customer. All food come out great, price are slightly on higher side but reasonable. All their dimsum come with thin layet with good portion of filling. The golden fried rice and beef ball are our favorite, congee also really good as comfort food if you are not feelling weel. We are regular patron and will continue to support. All menu is halal. | review_rating:5, text:So delicious. I love the golden fried rice, porridge and the crispy chee chong fun. | review_rating:3, text:Food taste not bad, but very atas price. A small tiny glass of water cost rm1 which wasn't expected. Service was good and staff was really nice. Overall, good experience but wont eat again.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. reviews: review_rating:1, text:That one free hair chubby girl was very rude, my mom went to the store under dressed and only wear slippers, the girl look down on her as she did not served my mom well until my mom told her that she own michael kors’ watch where she bought from US. name: Formosa
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:19.08.2024 Monday My first try at this place. The braised pork rice was quite tasty for me. I ordered their RM13 rice set with tofu and egg. Though it looked small bowl, but it's enough for a small eater like me. Food was hot and it was served quick. I will come back to try other dishes. More people come to eat after 12pm. I was there 1130am and the place was empty. | review_rating:5, text:Always best! Although chicken is getting thinner but the taste from 10 years ago until today is still the same! | review_rating:5, text:We were just walking by this place and saw the huge Taiwanese style fried chicken chop on other people's tables. We had to try it after seeing it. Can smell the Taiwan night market from their foods. | review_rating:4, text:Ordered this set for only RM 13, it has braised meat rice, tofu and braised egg. It doesn't taste like your typical taiwanese braised meat rice, but it has its own unique and delicious taste to it! Portion is just nice too. Highly recommend! | review_rating:4, text:Located within Sunway Pyramid Mall, Formosa is a venerable Taiwanese food stall that has stood the test of time as one of the oldest eateries in this bustling mall. It's a place where Asian comfort food takes center stage, and their Taiwanese Hot Crispy Chicken Rice Set exemplifies this perfectly.

This dish, priced from RM19.50, is a true indulgence. It features crispy, slightly spicy fried chicken served flat out, accompanied by their incredibly flavorful braised sauce and a bed of tofu rice. This combination of textures and flavors is nothing short of addictive.

The Taiwanese Hot Crispy Chicken Rice Set doesn't stop at the chicken alone; it includes a full meal experience. Alongside the crispy chicken, you'll find a serving of braised sauce-topped rice, with the option to add a braised egg, tofu, or both, depending on your preference. To complete the meal, it even comes with a refreshing bubble milk tea.

For those looking to elevate their culinary adventure, an extra plate of Taiwanese sausage is a wise choice. When everything is combined and generously topped with their garlicy chili sambal paste, the flavors harmonize in a symphony of deliciousness that's sure to leave your taste buds dancing.

Formosa has earned its reputation as a go-to spot for students in the area seeking a quick and satisfying lunch or dinner. With its reasonable prices and substantial food portions, it offers a dining experience that's not only delicious but also budget-friendly.

name: Gintell Rest N Go
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

location: LG1.126B, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Absolutely loved my experience at Yolé in Sunway Pyramid! The service was outstanding—staff were friendly, attentive, and quick to help. I tried their frozen yogurt with fresh fruit toppings, and it was perfect—creamy, refreshing, and full of flavor. They offer a great variety of flavors and toppings, making it easy to customize. It’s clear they take pride in both their service and quality. Perfect place for a sweet treat; definitely worth a visit. Five stars! | review_rating:5, text:it was a pleasant surprise. The texture was smooth without any icy or grainy feel. It contains no added sugar, but is not too sour in taste. The environment was also clean, modern, and welcoming. The ambiance made it a great place to relax and enjoy the frozen yogurt. | review_rating:5, text:Really good with the bubble waffle 💕 yogurt is 0% added sugar, the sauces make it sweet 😜 | review_rating:5, text:I ordered the frappe and it’s not too sweet, absolutely delicious! | review_rating:5, text:The best frozen yoghurt I had ♥️🤍✨ it is our ho to place and we keep ordering this online too

review_rating:5, text:Great customer service and staff is very helpful. They are also very knowledgeable about bras. Recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Enjoyed my experience with Anis here. She is very professional and patient in assisting me on my bra selection and sizing. Very good service. Well done! | review_rating:5, text:10/10 service
(This is coming from a person who has worn the wrong size and didn't know how to wear a bra properly for the past 5-6 years)

The bra's are expensive but it's definitely worth the service that they give you.
For the first time in my life, the people working there wasn't like. "Aunty see, Aunty know."
When I say body positivity, this is the place for that.
They don't mention anything about your size, or how big or small your bust size or cup is. No word about it at all. As it should be.

I've struggled finding the right size that was comfortable for me and my chest. Yes, the ladies might be invasive and touching those places but they point things out to me that I have never noticed before since no one told me. Especially showing me how to wear a bra properly, literally hands on me.

For the first time in my life, I feel more confident in my body - especially my breast. There is nothing wrong with small or large breast, we are all special in our own way :)

If you struggle to find a size perfect for you and need the service that helps you feel confident in yourself (even just a little) come here.
They are all nice ladies. | review_rating:5, text:Good service by MaiLi :) Very attentive & resposible to her customer | review_rating:5, text:Very good customer service, staff very helpful  and knowledgeable..get my bra in correct size overall satisfying..recommended 👍🏻

reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Food is decent but Service was a tad slow . Waited almost 20 minutes for sushi to arrive. Perhaps it was due to peak hours. Worth the try . Unagi based dishes were good. | review_rating:3, text:Raised has been our favourite Japanese restaurant despite there are some other more premium restaurants. However, tonight experience is not favourable. Food quality deteriorates a lot. All the dishes that we ordered are our regular dishes, but the quality has been very poor this time. Probably caused by long serving time after the food ready by the kitchen. The ingredients also seems to cut off from standard menu. | review_rating:2, text:It was my first time visiting this place. This was the quality and look of the menu once I was seated. It was gross and the entire place looked tired and shabby. First impression is the last impression. Says it all. Quality of sushi averaged very small bites especially the maki and sashimi. | review_rating:4, text:Rakuzen is almost always consistent in terms of food and service. They've lasted through the years, and that in itself is a statement of how good they are. They were also one of the earliest Japanese food franchises, and it's a credit to them that they have maintained their standards for the most part. Their sushi and bento dishes are very good, and it's perfect for a meal for one. If you're a sharing group, their ala carte dishes are also terrific. The same goes for their varied rolls. Service is mostly good here, although they can sometimes be slow getting to the tables if they're crowded for the evening. Overall, recommended! | review_rating:3, text:I hate to leave 3 stars but the food came late (10min after all the food on the table) and was a bit on the cold side.

Portion size was great. Miso soup good too.

name: Asus Concept Store
location: F1.AV.126-127, 129 & 130, Asian Avenue, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Yesterday, I had the pleasure of purchasing the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED, and the experience was nothing short of excellent. The seller was communicative and professional from start to finish, making the entire process smooth and enjoyable.

Before finalizing the purchase, I had a discussion with him regarding the laptop, its specifications, and additional items. He was knowledgeable, patient, and happy to address my questions. As part of the deal, I also received a laptop bag and a complimentary pen drive, which added great value to the purchase.

What stood out most was his approach—he wasn’t pushy or overly eager to close the deal. Instead, he gave me ample space and time to make an informed decision, which I truly appreciated. His cool and professional demeanor made it easy to trust his recommendations and services.

The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED itself is a fantastic device—sleek, powerful, and visually stunning with its OLED display. Coupled with the seller's outstanding service, it was a purchase I’m very satisfied with.

For anyone looking for a stress-free buying experience, I highly recommend this seller. It's rare to find someone who combines professionalism with a personal touch so effortlessly! | review_rating:5, text:Needed a basic laptop for my daughter's work. Bought a Asus E1404F, 8GB Ram, 512gb SSD from this store, the salesperson is very helpful and experienced. Good model for students. | review_rating:5, text:I just brought asus vivobook go E1504F ( R3-7320U, 8 gb ram, 512gb ssd 15.6 fhd amd radeon graphic, sliver w11h, H&S)
,no bad for student on study | review_rating:5, text:I recently Purchased an Asus Vivobook 16 as a replacement for my old Asus x570 which is 6 years old. The new Vivobook is thin, light, has larger 16 inch clear screen and came with 16GB RAM which makes browsing very fast. The AMD R5 7530U also uses very low power consumption. It came with free bag and also had Raya discount which is an added plus point. | review_rating:5, text:Like Vivobook series for they are light weighted laptop with attractive features and specifications. I selected Vivobook 16 for bigger display screen and latest processor yet affordable.

We bought some extra accessories from him too .

This shop indeed is a good place to shop for all electronic gadgets though . They even have a repair centre which is adjacent to the shop . Overall , it’s a good experience shopping & with excellent after sale service

name: ATM RHB Bank
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Body Perfect
location: Unit SPWLG1.01, Lower Ground One, West 3, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The onsen experience at Body Perfect (ONLY FOR FEMALE)offers true authenticity, with mineral-rich waters imported directly from Japan, allowing us to enjoy the essence of traditional Japanese hot springs without leaving our city.

We had the opportunity to experience an invigorating icy-cold onsen at 9°C, soaking just one leg in was enough to make me shiver and go numb! I can't imagine fully submerging my entire body. To maximize the benefits, it's essential to follow the correct sequence, and thanks to Cyrus, the beauty manager, we learned how to do it properly. Otherwise, we might have just jumped straight into the pool without knowing what’s best! 😜

Next, we proceeded through three hot onsen pools in sequence:

1️⃣ Skin Renewal Micro Nano Bubble Onsen (36°C)
🇯🇵 Deep cleanses and provides anti-aging benefits. This was our favorite, as our skin felt incredibly smooth while soaking in the pool.

2️⃣ Revitalizing Hydroluxe Therapy Onsen (38°C)
🇯🇵 Oxygenates the skin and muscles, allowing the skin to "breathe" better. According to Cyrus, this pool is perfect for my partner, as her youthful skin benefits from the oxygenation, keeping it supple and radiant.

3️⃣ Detoxifying Salt Onsen (40°C)
🇯🇵 Restores the skin’s natural glow. As per Cyrus’ advice, this pool was best suited for me, especially considering my age and muscle strain in my shoulders. It helped relieve deep muscle tension and provided much-needed relaxation.

Gradually increasing the temperature allows the body to adjust safely, preventing dizziness or discomfort that may occur due to sudden temperature changes.

Throughout our experience, Jane, the attentive attendant, ensured we were well taken care of. She even noticed I was wearing a necklace and kindly reminded me to remove it, as the heat could cause discomfort when wearing gold. 👍

Finally, after a 5 minute rest, we moved on to the Volcanic Himalayan Salt Sauna Room, which was another new and exciting experience. The walls were beautifully designed with volcanic Himalayan salt, known for its relaxation and respiratory health benefits, including relief for sinus issues.

Inside the sauna, there were two levels of benches. We started on the lower bench with milder heat before moving to the upper bench, where the intensity increased. The moment I sat on the second bench, sweat immediately started dripping from my forehead and neck, such an invigorating detox!

Overall, I truly loved my experience here with my niece. Body Perfect is a trusted, government-recognized brand, ensuring peace of mind with proper documentation and signatures to protect both parties throughout the procedure. This added an extra layer of trust to the entire journey.

A heartfelt thank you to Sunway Pyramid and Body Perfect Aesthetic & Wellness for giving me a whole new level of relaxation, an experience I can continue to enjoy, even after returning from my recent Japan trip!

P/S: You don't need to worry hearing the word "Onsen", they do provide disposable bra and panty ya. Kind of certain transparency but still rather than nothing right? 😂 And psst..they provide other 100 type of services(facial,slimming, wellness, women care,etc) which you may try out. Body perfect is newly opened on Dec 2024. Moved from Sphinx Sunway Pyramid ( more than 15 years operating here) | review_rating:5, text:First Onsen experience. Complimentary by Sunway. Professional Cryus explain and introduce to us before we start our Onsen. Great experience for me and my friend especially the 9° pool. Hope next time will have chance to come back again. Hopefully can improve on the disposable bra and panty, with thicker cloths. Thank you Body Perfect. | review_rating:5, text:beautiful spa land, had chance to try out the onsen + cold plunge, followed by a facial. the onsen is beautifully crafted with 3 different heated onsen and also a sauna with salt rock walls. it was a wonderful experience thank you to Jane, Cyrus, and Candy. highly recommend anyone looking for a spa day. | review_rating:4, text:Amazing place to relax !! The frontdesk staffs gave us warmest welcome and serve us with welcome drink. Cyrus was our beauty advisor and Jane assist us all the time during our onsen experience. Feel relaxed after and totally enjoyed the session. | review_rating:5, text:Body Perfect Sunway Pyramid has been my go-to spa for over 10 years! The staff is incredibly nice and attentive… they have recently moved to a new location within the same mall, and the new setup is absolutely stunning.

Highly recommend!

Came to fulfill my temptation.

Staffs are friendly. Price reasonable. Big portion as i have small stomach.
Delicious broth with cha siew and ramen.

Now using UOB bank card, you will get free ice cream.
7th anniversary also u may win a prize too. Try your luck.
