reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Nice drink buy one free one , quite nice for this pandan kokuto latte

Updated Review: from 4 - 1 Star

The staff was friendly and hardworking, but I felt bad for her—she was running around trying to serve a crowd all by herself. It’s unacceptable for one person to handle everything. This is a clear failure of management, not the staff’s fault. | review_rating:5, text:This outlet considered as the most happening FamilyMart in town. Like to hang out here with Japanese ice cream cone after lunch or dinner and buy Japanese bread for next morning breakfast | review_rating:1, text:I came here to bought oden. I requested them to pack the mee separate. They said the packaging is out of stock and I asked them can you use the soup bowl? They said cannot. And don’t even apologize.. | review_rating:1, text:I bought udon yesterday, no fork or spoon provided, everthing out of stock,expect me eating udon with bare hand?, shouldn't except the payment if u can't provide utensil. | review_rating:2, text:The sandwiches & items are expensive. The shrunken size of the items don’t match the prize. One of the worst outlets we hv been to as normally only 2 staff, one or two counter is open everyday and on weekends!! They’re understaff. The long line of customers waiting to pay makes it very frustrating & inconvenient!! Rather go somewhere else. The Management shld hire more staff or put in place payment kiosks for customers convenience like the Bandar Sunway outlet in Jalan PJS 11/9

name: Gong Cha
location: Lot LG2.41, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:i ordered strawberry earl grey latte from Gong cha sunway pyramid through grabfood sebab i was attracted to the loads amount of strawberry puree in the drink when i saw reviews online. tapi bila this drink delivered to me, the amount of strawberry in my drink was so pathetic. Jauh macam langit dengan bumi compared to the ones i saw online. I minum pun dah tak balance rasa strawberry and earl grey tu sebab amount of the puree so pathetic. lagi rasa earl grey je. Kalau i nak minum earl grey kosong semata, baik i order mixue je. disappointing. | review_rating:1, text:I have the similar experience with previous reviewer NG NG too.

Was there this afternoon.
Only 1 Malay lady manning the store.
She ignored me for 30 secs, while we waited at the counter, waiting for her to serve us.
She was next to the counter wiping some containers.
We have to call her to make an order, obviously she saw us all the while.
She then reply with a sour grape face say wait. Then I saw there is QR on the counter and I proceed to scan the QR and play my phone.
She then continue ignore me after done her wiping. Another client come and she served them and continue ignore me.
The QR link to a order website but is pointed to ss15 branch. After ordering show to she, she say not sure if can switch to here Sunway branch. In the end I need go ss15 branch to collect my drink. When arrive there is a Malay lady manning the store too but say no prepare my drink cause not sure if I come? Luckily she can prepare the drink in short time.

Overall have bad experience with ordering from Gong Cha staff in this Sunway branch. There is no improvement since other buyer have comment similar few months ago. | review_rating:1, text:Was there today afternoon around 7pm above. A malay girl was at the front counter. The way she attend to us was very not welcoming to the customer. No smile at all, with sour face.  Even after we say thank you to her also she didnt reply anything plus with bored face. Maybe that girl baru kena tinggal boyfriend kot, but with that kind of attitude jangan lah jaga front counter. Bawa lari rezeki je. | review_rating:1, text:Cannot cash?? Only QR & debit?? I que in 15 minutes and there's no sign till i want order and cashier say cannot cash. Then just the shop & no need to open if cannot cash. Cashier also speak with lower voice. | review_rating:2, text:Haven't order for so long while this time when I pick up my drinks when my order was ready, I asked the staff to make sure the order was mine meanwhile the staff at the cashier just moved her sight from her phone to me 1 second and nodded her head without saying anything. This also happened when I'm ordering, should have improve your service.

category: bakery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.139C, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Love the vibe of the new location of Komugi Sunway Pyramid. It is brightly lit and the staffs are all very friendly to customers. Came here on a Monday afternoon and I was welcomed warmly. They even have halal baumkuchen cake here! | review_rating:5, text:Komugi offers a delightful selection of Japanese-inspired bread and pastries, known for their soft textures and rich, buttery flavors. The balance of sweetness and fluffiness makes each bite satisfying. With a cozy ambiance and friendly service, it is a great spot for a quick treat or takeaway. | review_rating:5, text:Nice shop, pleasant looking & friendly staff. Overwhelmed with wide selection of food | review_rating:1, text:Wow, amazing customer service at Komugi Sunway Pyramid! Staff are so “professional” that they think shouting at customers is the best way to help. We just needed guidance on using the membership app, but apparently, not knowing how to use it is offensive enough to deserve an attitude.

Love how their staff bring personal emotions to work — because, you know, throwing tantrums at customers is the true mark of professionalism. Aren’t we all impressed by how well they manage their emotions? Truly inspiring behavior from grown adults.

Thanks for the “memorable” experience, Komugi! | review_rating:1, text:The supervisor is arrogant and ignore the que placement how it suppose to be. I was telling him to just tell the customer to que at designated que position. But he insist and just said its okey to have the wrong way of que. As an interior designer who been designing retails and shops, when we indicate the place to que, it should be that way, or else the shop flow will be distrupted.

name: Auntie Anne's Pretzel
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

It was 17th July, around 9.45pm plus. We saw a pair of slippers and maybe other things that we were in need to get it. I'm not sure who was the staffs but there was one malay guy and one malay girl that wore hijab. I understand they want to go home early. But it's not even 10pm yet and she can tell me that Im not allowed to go in nor buy anything. She was quite rude however she was basically rejecting me. | review_rating:3, text:I do prefer the old location. And the staff. reviews: review_rating:5, text:Fossil at Sunway Pyramid offers a clean, well-maintained shopping environment with friendly and attentive service. Their selection includes stylish wallets and card holders, though they are on the pricier side. The store also carries a range of watches for both men and women, with designs that are fashionable and suitable for young adults or those seeking affordable options. While some watch styles are basic, they still appeal to a trendy audience. Overall, Fossil delivers a pleasant shopping experience with quality products, making it a good stop for those willing to spend a bit more for style and brand reliability. | review_rating:5, text:Best service from shah fossil sunway pyramid! Thank you for entertain me👍🏻👍🏻 he was super friendly, and patiently waiting me for choosing watch🫶🏻 | review_rating:5, text:The person who served me was Achok. He was super friendly, helpful and so amazing in handling customers. Always smiling and chill in handling my questions. | review_rating:5, text:Bought a very nice Carlie Mini watch. The staff MiMi is very helpful and giving good services such as free name engraving of our choosing. Totally recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Bro Achok was very friendly, patience & giving good service and experience for us. He also helped to suggest the best wallet for me. Would definitely repeat!

category: ice_cream_shop, dessert_shop, confectionery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot F1-96C, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Inside Scoop at Sunway Pyramid is the perfect place for anyone with a sweet tooth. Their wide variety of ice cream flavors, from classic to unique, ensures there’s something for everyone. The ice cream is rich, creamy, and made with quality ingredients, with popular picks like salted caramel and durian ice cream standing out. The cozy, vibrant setting adds to the experience, and the service is friendly. While a bit on the pricier side, the indulgence is well worth it for a treat. A great stop for ice cream lovers! | review_rating:5, text:Went there after dinner. Had 3 types of  ice-cream. Gorgeous selection of passion fruit, cempedak and durian. Really enjoyable. | review_rating:5, text:Clean with ample seating space. The ice cream is nice, very reasonable price. Perfect place to chill after lunch or dinner. It also located at corner of Sunway Pyramid with very less people traffic so very convinient. Will be one of our go to place for ice cream | review_rating:5, text:Love the atmosphere and arrangement of the layout. Also got plug to do work, convenient for study place | review_rating:5, text:They were so friendly! Thank you guys for giving us to taste the rocher mooncake tester for free . The waffles were crunchy on the outside and soft inside. We liked it . Kudos 💖

name: Popular
location: LG1.123, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Popular at Sunway Pyramid is a pretty decent bookstore with a nice variety of books and a great selection of stationery. The place is neat and organized, so it’s easy to find what you need. The stationery section really stands out if you’re into that kind of thing. Service was just okay—nothing special, but they get the job done. It’s a huge store, and it has everything you’d expect for a quick browse. Overall, a reliable spot if you’re in the mall and need books or supplies, and definitely worth checking out! | review_rating:5, text:Hi I was a tourist that visited this bookshop on Thursday and I had asked for a Malaysian cook book to cook nasi lemak and satay skewers and chicken rendang the two young Malaysian hijab girls were very helpful and stopped what they were doing and walked with me to the section and flicked through the pages to find the perfect one I can’t thank them enough give them the recognition they deserve (also they didn’t have name tags but I will attach photos of the books) terima kasih | review_rating:5, text:They always have a special price. They have Dragon Ball comics, etc. but perhaps Popular can put a chairs like other bookstores. I’m a disabled person & it is hard for me to take a rest while shopping in the store. There’s no place for me to sit for a while. | review_rating:1, text:Popular Sunway pyramid store manager, please manage your cashier counter as customer queue is not moving at all for 10 mins, do not exploit or mistreat your customers’ trust and support. | review_rating:4, text:This is probably one of the biggest Popular outlets around and it has a variety of books to choose from, especially their English fiction section. I love that they're always adding and updating more new books, and that they regularly have promotions going on.

However, sometimes they have too many overlapping promotions that even their system cannot handle and the staff are not familiar with. There have been too many instances where I find same books (same publication, size etc), but they're tagged different prices. Some books are tagged a certain amount but when I got to the counter, they said they were tagged wrongly and the price was actually higher than displayed by the tag.

As a regular patron, this had happened too many times especially when they have many different promotions at the same time (ie all books for 20% for 2 books or more but they also have 10% on fiction so if you buy fiction, even if you buy 2 books or more, you're only entitled to get 10% each). This makes the shopping experience here very unpleasant. The only way to know for sure how much you have to pay exactly is by checking at the counter, which is troublesome especially if there's large crowd.

However, other than this, I really like this outlet because of the variety of books available. Hope they'll improve on the system and pricing especially when they want to have overlapping discounts.

reviews: review_rating:4, text:One of the best cookie store. We had tried both Malaysia and Thailand stores, outlets in both countries tasted consistent. The cookie can be kept for few days, just need to refrigerate then reheat them in oven. Price is moderate, on par with other cookie stores in Malaysia | review_rating:2, text:I’m sorry but it’s just too overrated for me! The cookies do not taste fresh and they feel like they’re just being heated up and served 🫠🫠 | review_rating:1, text:Middle of cookie uncooked. Can still taste the uncooked dough. 👎 | review_rating:5, text:Friendly staff , the cookies so good ! 🥳 | review_rating:5, text:Good service from the staff and yummy cookies

name: WOK HEY
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15 LG2.43A, Lower Ground 2, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:I purchase wok hey like everyday for my lunch, very reasonable price for fried rice and protein choice, for a shop in a mall. No hidden charges also HALAL😀Very satisfied for their services, attentive and friendly, tq so much for not miss any my requests, good job guys | review_rating:4, text:Had shanghai fried rice, surprisingly it was really good. the fried rice was full of wok hey and they serve it hot from the wok. It’s a really good option for take away, but not dine in. The reason for not getting 5 star was dine in they also had to use plastic bag, could have serve on a tray instead. | review_rating:4, text:If you want simple, good old Chinese-style fried rice, Wok Hey is a good place for you. They have only a few options of fried rice but you can add on a number of vegetables and sides at additional price. The price is quite expensive but for the taste and portion, I'd say they're pretty decent. They're also served in takeaway boxes so if you don't finish, you can just close up the box and tapau your food home. The staff was very shy and tried to avoid interaction and kept it to a minimum. There are limited tables facing the ice rink reserved for customers but it's not that great if the place is crowded. | review_rating:5, text:The shop may not look fancy, but the food is fantastic. The fried rice and fresh ramen have that perfect 'wok hey' flavor. The seating is limited, and sometimes you'll need to clean your table due to the busy crowd, but the tasty food makes it all worth it. | review_rating:4, text:Ordered prawn fried rice then add on chicken n beef…… tasted better than my expectation. If u crave for Din Tai Fung fried rice and doesn’t wanna break the bank, this is a gd option

name: Xanse Hats & Badges
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Asus Concept Store
location: F1.AV.126-127, 129 & 130, Asian Avenue, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Yesterday, I had the pleasure of purchasing the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED, and the experience was nothing short of excellent. The seller was communicative and professional from start to finish, making the entire process smooth and enjoyable.

Before finalizing the purchase, I had a discussion with him regarding the laptop, its specifications, and additional items. He was knowledgeable, patient, and happy to address my questions. As part of the deal, I also received a laptop bag and a complimentary pen drive, which added great value to the purchase.

What stood out most was his approach—he wasn’t pushy or overly eager to close the deal. Instead, he gave me ample space and time to make an informed decision, which I truly appreciated. His cool and professional demeanor made it easy to trust his recommendations and services.

The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED itself is a fantastic device—sleek, powerful, and visually stunning with its OLED display. Coupled with the seller's outstanding service, it was a purchase I’m very satisfied with.

For anyone looking for a stress-free buying experience, I highly recommend this seller. It's rare to find someone who combines professionalism with a personal touch so effortlessly! | review_rating:5, text:Needed a basic laptop for my daughter's work. Bought a Asus E1404F, 8GB Ram, 512gb SSD from this store, the salesperson is very helpful and experienced. Good model for students. | review_rating:5, text:I just brought asus vivobook go E1504F ( R3-7320U, 8 gb ram, 512gb ssd 15.6 fhd amd radeon graphic, sliver w11h, H&S)
,no bad for student on study | review_rating:5, text:I recently Purchased an Asus Vivobook 16 as a replacement for my old Asus x570 which is 6 years old. The new Vivobook is thin, light, has larger 16 inch clear screen and came with 16GB RAM which makes browsing very fast. The AMD R5 7530U also uses very low power consumption. It came with free bag and also had Raya discount which is an added plus point. | review_rating:5, text:Like Vivobook series for they are light weighted laptop with attractive features and specifications. I selected Vivobook 16 for bigger display screen and latest processor yet affordable.

name: Sushi King
category: japanese_restaurant, sushi_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot, LG1.42, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful solo lunch at this sushi shop today. The food was fresh and flavorful, and the restaurant had a pleasant, inviting ambiance.  But what really made my day was the exceptional service I received from William. He was friendly, attentive, and genuinely made me feel welcome.  A great place for a delicious meal, whether you're dining alone or with friends. | review_rating:5, text:Located beside the lift near the parking area.. in front of it is the ice skating.. (Below it)

First of all.. the food is nice and fast.. and the converyer machine is always have food.. one of the best place to eat sushi king.. is this outlet.. all item have...no problem to ask any of the staff ..

The service itself is tiptop.. feel welcome when you come to eat here.. if have a question the staff explain it.. just ask them.. really good service.. anyway shout out to service team and cashier Dian for great service..

Rekemended to come here if other outlet is poor service or rude.. so give this outlet a try. :) | review_rating:4, text:Food is good. The food is piping hot when we received eventho it taking quite abit of time. The portion is also not to bad. Its not something that prepared half hearted.

The only complain is their seating. Hard to get up when the sent the ordered menu thru kaiten belt (with the train like item. Haha. Idk the name). Unless i put my leg on the seat, only then can comfortably take the food as it’s place quite high (problem for short people).

Overall ok. | review_rating:5, text:The food is good, can also redeem the birthday complementary during the birthday month.
The service is good - Thanks Willam for providing the good service while serving the ice cream.
Atmosphere is also good. | review_rating:1, text:Absolutely disgusted with my experience at Sushi King. The service was beyond atrocious—an unacceptably long wait for everything. The sushi? Low quality, borderline inedible, and definitely not fresh. To top it all off, the ordering tablet was completely useless because it didn’t even have WiFi. How is that even possible in this day and age? And seriously, ONE robot to serve the entire restaurant? What a joke! The whole place felt like a chaotic mess with zero regard for customer satisfaction. I wouldn’t step foot in this place again if they paid me. Avoid at all cost !

Costumer service priority first my Ass
Norwegian salmon your mother
Who is even the CEO of sushi king? A joker?

name: Snowflake
category: dessert_restaurant, dessert_shop, confectionery, restaurant, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1.87, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Snowflake has been a favorite of mine for years, and their black sesame supreme is the highlight of my visits. The shaved ice is incredibly smooth and finely shaved, creating a melt-in-your-mouth experience with every spoonful. What sets it apart is the generous and rich black sesame flavor that infuses each bite. The black sesame balls served alongside are soft and chewy that complements the ice perfectly. Whether indulging in it as a sweet treat after a meal or simply enjoying it as a refreshing snack, it’s often the perfect dessert to cool down and satisfy my cravings whenever I'm at Sunway Pyramid or Pavilion! | review_rating:4, text:There aren't many Snowflake branches around anymore, so it's good to see this one doing well. For after-dinner desserts, Snowflake is a great option. I particularly like the Mango Delight and the Soya series here. There are also hot and ice desserts, whichever you're in the mood for. The branch isn't really big, but it's cosy enough to have a sit down and have a nice chat. Recommended.

Update: They recently went through a renovation, and it looks a lot better. There's also more seating because of it now. So there's more reason to visit. | review_rating:4, text:Great dessert or any time snack.  Prices are a little high but the stuff is tasty.  Staff are friendly and quick with your order.  They have hot and cold items all which are made to order.  You can order from Grab as well.  Free Mall WiFi.  Seating area is clean but the chairs are too hard. | review_rating:4, text:I’m in KL for the weekend.. Went to Sunway Pyramid for window shopping. Had the delicious desserts at Snowflake.. Not too sweet, one of my favour. | review_rating:5, text:The matcha one tasted great. Taro balls were fresh and chewy. Grass jelly and all other toppings were good.
One downside was the temperature of the restaurant. It was hot in the area where the shop located and think it was due to construction work nearby.

location: F1.RINK.A, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Kumar ,Farez ,Aiman & Casilao has been very helpful in my purchases and very supportive in aiding regarding hardware products. name: Seen
location: G1-89, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I am very impressed with the customer service at this shop.  I was immediately greeted when I stepped into the shop early in the morning.  The guy happily smiling with his warm greeting made my experience in the shop very pleasant.  I asked for his name - Aizad.  He gives honest advise , professional and friendly.  He attended to my needs efficiently.   I went on last Sunday to do my specs. Today , Thur I got my specs.  Fast👍. I made my second pair 😀 | review_rating:5, text:Fantastic service. Very professional and understands how to help pick out glasses that fit well and are functional. Shafila understands the best type of frame for a person's face. She helps with the difficult decision of which frame to choose. I highly recommend Shafila. She sells high quality glasses. Best experience I have ever had for glasses. Staff are knowledgeable and spent time ensuring it was the right fit. I recommend it highly 🫡 | review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic experience at Seen Sunway Pyramid! I purchased a pair of Moscot glasses and Prada sunglasses, and I have to give a big thumbs up to Ms. Lee Jin. She patiently explained all the details about the frames and lenses and assisted me for two hours straight!

If you’re planning to shop here, I highly recommend looking for Ms. Lee Jin. Her professionalism, dedication, and attention to detail made the entire process enjoyable and stress-free.

Thank you, Seen Sunway Pyramid, and an even bigger thank you to Ms. Lee Jin for the outstanding service! | review_rating:4, text:Recently, I had some issues with my glasses, and the gentlemen here was very kind to fix the issue for free. Btw, they are having a buy 1, free 1 promo now. They have variety of brands too. Good place to consider for eye wear. | review_rating:5, text:The sales assistant Gayathiri was very pleasant and helpful. Every time I come in she’d be efficient and accommodate all my vision needs. Highly recommended.

name: Central Avenue
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Dolly
location: LG2.28 Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall No. 3 Jalan PJS11/15 Bandar Sunway 47500 Petaling Jaya Selangor MY, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Seriously good for halal certified dim sum.  The siew Mai, prawn egg fried rice, Har Kao, glutinous rice, prawn fritter, fried beef Kway teow were good. | review_rating:4, text:The best halal place to get halal tasty dim sum fast and near! Immediate location to go to in order to satisfy that tastebud!

The portion is getting smaller and smaller by the day. Such a disspointment though. Everything seems to shrink. Sad! Food, drink, size...quantity!

New menus available especially when it comes to dishes so we tried those salted butter prawn and the portion is so not what we expected. They should really mention "for illustration purposes only" in the menu.

Service is acceptable and everything else is tolerable. What a letdown if it keeps going from utterly amazing to barely good. | review_rating:4, text:Good services as usual. Efficient and attentive to customer. All food come out great, price are slightly on higher side but reasonable. All their dimsum come with thin layet with good portion of filling. The golden fried rice and beef ball are our favorite, congee also really good as comfort food if you are not feelling weel. We are regular patron and will continue to support. All menu is halal. | review_rating:5, text:So delicious. I love the golden fried rice, porridge and the crispy chee chong fun. | review_rating:3, text:Food taste not bad, but very atas price. A small tiny glass of water cost rm1 which wasn't expected. Service was good and staff was really nice. Overall, good experience but wont eat again.

name: Oga Tea & Dining
location: LG1.122C, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:This cafe offers great value for some of its dishes. The green tea is particularly impressive, flavorful, and worth the price. Although the spaghetti is on the pricier side, it’s worth it, with fresh prawns cooked perfectly. We also tried the big breakfast, and while the sausage was surprisingly deep-fried instead of pan-fried, it was still tasty. The salad was fresh and enjoyable. Overall, the food quality justifies the prices, making it a nice spot to visit for a satisfying meal. | review_rating:3, text:Overall, I think this place has potential, but it's not quite there yet.

We ordered tea and dessert, which tastes really good and reasonable to the pricing. However, management needs to put in the time to train their employees to elevate the place.

I looked at the menu and saw so many different types of teas. This is for people who are willing to pay the money to try out nuances between different types of teas.
The place presents itself as a more sophisticated place, not just your regular cafe. So, I asked the waitress for recommendations.

To my disappointment, the waitresses there were clearly part-timers hired to only serve tables. They also didn't have a person dedicated to recommend teas or talk about why is it brewed a certain way.

This should have been the selling point of the place-- yet it is not fully utilized.

From this experience, it goes from a potential spot for tea lovers who want to try different types of teas-- to suddenly just a regular cafe.

To be honest, the staff were polite, I find no fault in the service itself. I just can tell that no further training was given for them -- or 1 dedicated person -- to make the experience better. Again, I wouldn't write this much if it's just a regular cafe.

I can see that there is potential, and I can tell what the initial vision was.  I hope to see the place improve over time, or, to accept the route of being a regular cafe, where customers will start to ask about the price versus what you're getting. Just food for thought! | review_rating:3, text:The price vs environment doesn't match. It is a tad pricey for the food portion and serving doesn't come together if you come in group. Personally I find it awkward that I have to sit at the outside and it is so noisyto chill. The dessert is nice and matched with the price. Overall is alright but with such price, repeat visit is less | review_rating:5, text:Came here for lunch and we order the katsu curry rice and egg sandwich.

The katsu chicken set was delicious and the side dish that came with the set was good pairing.

The sandwich also another dish worth to order, the bread is thin and fluffy.

Will check out their other dish in future. | review_rating:3, text:The chazuke at OGA is really nice and stands out as the highlight of the menu. However, the restaurant has very limited space, making it feel a bit cramped during busy hours. Desserts are popular and tend to sell out quickly, which can be disappointing if you arrive late. While the food quality is ok, the prices are quite high, and I feel they might not fully justify the overall experience. A decent spot, but there’s room for improvement.

name: Ayam Penyet Express
location: Bandar Sunway LG2.86, Lower Ground 2, Marrakesh, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Petaling Jaya Sunway, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I've been patronising this restaurant whenever I'm here in Sunway Pyramid, I bring my friends here too. But I've noticed the drop in food quality.

The chicken doesn't smell and taste fresh. The colour of the fried chicken is dark and dull in colour (as compared to the past, and also compared to other penyet shops).

The dark colour of the chicken doesn't feels alright to me. But since I've ordered, I just finish it, and see what will happen @@.

The sambal also look different too, now very dull in colour, watery and doesn't have the good sambar chilli smell.

I'll try out another shop that is newly open in the mall instead next time. | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing and Unfair Treatment

I had a very disappointing experience at this restaurant. A group of eight people before me was allowed to dine in, but when I, alone, asked for a table, I was refused without any clear explanation. The waitress seemed willing to accept my request, but the cashier refused. This inconsistency in service made me feel unwelcome and unfairly treated. If there are specific policies about solo diners, they should be communicated clearly and applied consistently. Unfortunately, based on this experience, I wouldn’t recommend this place to others. | review_rating:3, text:Delicious and spicy sambal and dish. Need improvement on the fried chicken and fish.
Cozy environment,  good service. Price is good. | review_rating:3, text:Nasi ayam penyet - Dry chicken meat and black bones, taste very plain and dry. Please improve the food quality. | review_rating:5, text:Recommended to try their food, really flavorful and filling. Waitress is really nice and the place is comfortable to eat.

I usually go for the lele but my friend swears by the chicken. It’s crispy and nice and the sambal is really the cherry on top!

Delicious!

name: Strip
location: F1-29, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I am a regular customer at Strip Sunway Pyramid and I've always come back because of the professionalism and good service.
My therapist Joeann was amiable, knowledgeable and skilled at her job. She also recommended skincare products without being overly pushy, which is something I appreciate.
Overall, there's a level of comfort and care offered that I value and I'll be returning every time I'm back in town! | review_rating:5, text:I have been to several places for waxing and Strip Sunway Pyramid is on top of my list. Clean and tidy outlet with friendly staff. My favourite waxing therapist is Suki. She’s very jovial, and have good attitude all the time. She always make sure I’m comfortable and relax during our sessions and thus making it less painful and pleasant experience. I also purchased and tried the laser AFT treatment because i’m very comfortable with Suki. I would totally recommend everyone to get her service. This outlet also recently renovated and look so nice and cozy now. | review_rating:5, text:Been coming here since 2017, they have the best services until now. The best therepist is Suki I love her! Very kind polite and gentle when waxing. Alma & Yuri are very friendly and fast to respond my appointment msgs. | review_rating:5, text:Joeann was a great therapist and did the waxing job well. This place is also very punctual in their timing and will remind you of your appointment. Quality of products are always the best here as usual. #votestripfav | review_rating:5, text:Therapist: Joeann
My service with Joeann was excellent! She’s so professional and polite. She made me feel comfortable and was vey quick but efficient with her service! Love love love Strip!!

name: MyeongDong Topokki
location: F1. AV.148, Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Ok first of all, I was shocked menu changed already and I asked nicely regarding the promotion for 10% off for value set and which is the value set? Oh wow didn't know you all changed the menu already and no free tea in my order anymore. I had to purchase separately and next the person at the cashier can't reply me nicely and was super lazy to even layan. If you're that tired, don't work. I'm also a working person and just finished work to just eat. Refill for side dishes now also up to 3 times only. Anchovies also not provided anymore haha. Was my favourite but I guess no more. Oh also no soup provided nor allowed to refill the sauce anymore as have to pay. As for this bibimbap no more mushrooms and replaced with corns ?!?! Myeongdong topokki has disappointed me very much now. It used to be my go to place all the time. As for this branch, pls improve your customer service as not everyone knows about your new menu/promotion and such. Dah la I'm not in my mood cuz of previous person also lazy and wanted to shoo me away from the shop. | review_rating:5, text:I ordered the Kimchi Fried Rice with tamago and corn, the Korean Milk Tea and a piece of hotteok. The fried rice had a generous portion (which is good but its too much for me). The korean milk teas was sweet but not too sweet (if you mix it properly). The hotteok for me was not something I'd get again because the filling was way too sweet. Overall experience = 8/10, will come back to try other food | review_rating:5, text:Located near the blue atrium.. Near Like Small Shop Places.. Place is nice and comfortable.. well maintain by staff...

Staff girl at cashier and yang kemas semua sangat professional.. bile nak order well prepare and always smile.. smooth ordering.. just my opinion at one point i am glad that my order come fast but my point of view is, if there is other customer please serve them accordingly by the number.. not jump2 number.. some might not be okay with that.. kitchen my alert DONT JUMP ORDER...

Food taste is nice.. well cook and season.. as this is my 2nd outlet i visit after ioi city mall.. the price is quite worthy and You Get Free Flow Panchan and Green Tea Drink..

Overall is rekemended and nice to visit and taste Korea Cuisine.. :) | review_rating:1, text:This place was nice before the menu change. What's with the crazy amount of mayo? Where's the anchovies and soup? No more free green tea? This place is terrible now. To top it off, the cashier lady was terrible and rude. Never coming back again. | review_rating:4, text:First time here for early dinner. Ordered chicken ramyun, ramyun with teokbokki and seafood jigae. Very affordable and the plus was the jigae which was so rich and nice to eat. Drinks can be refilled 3x hence for the price we paid it was good.

Overall, service was ok though the food took about 20mins to be served.

location: G1.45, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Ramen is amazing, rich and tasty soup base. Fresh garlic cloves provided upon request. Long queue during peak hours. | review_rating:4, text:Salmon belly sashimi was great.. thick cut and very fresh.

Pork fried rice was tasty salty...

The truffle ramen wasn't the best I tried before.. it was a tad salty and truffle taste not as strong as some others.

Shiro special ramen is ok but the noodles was a little tough as I chose the normal option. | review_rating:5, text:One of the good qc ramen in town, (but I feel last time yummier) haha
First time tried their pork rice, very small portion but enough for me.
Green tea is free refill. | review_rating:5, text:The restaurant is easy to find in the mall. Space big and comfortable. The only problem is music too louder. The food so far is not bad, the portion so far so good. | review_rating:5, text:Missed Japan ramen, especially Ippudo Ramen.
Came to fulfill my temptation.

Staffs are friendly. Price reasonable. Big portion as i have small stomach.
Delicious broth with cha siew and ramen.

Now using UOB bank card, you will get free ice cream.
7th anniversary also u may win a prize too. Try your luck.

•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Mission-Q
location: F1.19A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Was a great experience and very fun and interactive! The physicality was great with a lot of rooms and different challenges with various puzzles. Nicole and Noelle was great hosts and game masters explaining the game very thorough and helpful!
Amazing stuff, will come back for more rooms! | review_rating:5, text:Such an awesome adventure playing Tomb of Life & Death - one of my fave games so far. Besides Midnight Inn at the 1 Utama location. Daniel and Elisha were super awesome crew guiding us thru the whole amazing experience. Loved the design and challenges. Will def come back! Great work!!!! Highly recommended escape room!!!! | review_rating:5, text:Just done experiencing one of the best escape room in Sunway! The environment of the front desk is very welcoming, we were served by Nicole, as she's our master for the game. I played saving King Arthur, and it was fun! We did used 2 hints, and Ken came and helped us with the hints! Fun games, indeed. Recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Elisha & Nicole were extremely helpful throughout the game! We did the game “saving king arthur”, the story and puzzles were enjoyable! However I did wished certain exits could’ve been more discreet - it’s a bit difficult to escape (physically) where people walk in&out staring at us. Regardless, wonderful experience, would definitely return to try other rooms! | review_rating:5, text:I had such a fun and challenging time at Mission Q! It's a puzzle-based escape room experience with different themed rooms, each with its own unique story. We tried the "Saving King Arthur" room, which involved rescuing a king, and "The Harvest," a backstory with missing organs—both were creative and engaging! The difficulty levels and physical activity vary per room, and even though we chose the lower difficulty ones, they still tested our brainpower quite a bit! 😂 We managed to escape both rooms we attempted, which was a great accomplishment for us. You’re also allowed up to three clues from the staff, which definitely helped without giving too much away.

Speaking of the staff, Elisha and Ken were fantastic,both were super helpful and polite throughout. Whenever we got stuck, they provided just the right amount of micro clues, letting us figure things out without spoiling the puzzles. I really appreciated that. They were also knowledgeable and answered all our questions with ease.

Overall, it was a fun and interesting experience, and I thoroughly enjoyed it with my siblings. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a challenging yet enjoyable escape room experience!You're lucky if you had the same staffs as mine, Elisha and Ken.

name: Sunway Lagoon Kedai Runcit
category: tourist_attraction, water_park, amusement_center, wildlife_park, zoo, amusement_park, park, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/11, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a really great time with the whole family. The wife was happy to watch some of our stuff near the small wave pool while the kids and I hit the rides. It was a great time for us to go as there were not very big crowds meaning it did not take very long to get on the rides other than climbing all the steps to get up to them. Highly recommended for all the family from young kids to young adults. The big wave pool with 5m high waves every 1 minute from 4.30pm was a highlight too. Make sure you get to the front. | review_rating:5, text:Each park was truly fun. There are a lot of activities for you to do despite age. There are many water activities. So, it's wise you wear your swimwear and roam around. There are lockers in every park as I remember and you can rent a locker to keep your belongings safe. I went on  weekend so there were too many people and had to wait in lines for a considerable amount of time. But enter the place when it opens and you can enjoy every activity. Overall really fun day! Recommended! | review_rating:4, text:A family fun water park having a big wave pool, water rides and an area train to reach various fun areas of this big park. Apart from the water park, Sunway Lagoon has various other attraction parks like a small zoo, Scream room a 5 D theatre and many other attractions. You get an entrance band to go to all activities. Once you reach the park you need to go down with multiple level escalator. There are many changing areas separate for both men and women with showers and different size lookers to store your belongings and clothes. Overall it was a family fun for the whole day. | review_rating:5, text:My wife and I recently booked the villa package for 2 days and 1 night at around RM1.6K, and we had an amazing experience! A big thank you to Sunway for allowing us to check in early at 11 AM instead of the usual 2 PM. This thoughtful gesture made our trip so much smoother, as we could head straight to the theme park without worrying about our belongings.

The villa itself was spacious, beautifully designed, and incredibly comfortable—perfect for a relaxing retreat. A special shoutout to Shahmin and his team for their outstanding hospitality; they were friendly, helpful, and truly enhanced our stay. While the food was decent, it could be improved to match the overall high standards of the experience.

Overall, we would rate our stay 8.5/10 and would definitely consider returning. Thank you, Sunway, for a wonderful time! | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing Experience – Not Worth the Money

I genuinely cannot understand why this place gets 5-star ratings. The ride attendants are rude and unhelpful, and customer service is clueless—even the so-called “customer specialists” don’t know how to handle guests. The park itself is old, decaying, and poorly maintained. The shacks and huts are a complete waste of time, and the wave pool only operates for 45 minutes at the very end of the day. The whole place smells bad and feels like it’s falling apart.

For a family of five, we spent $700 AUD—absolutely not worth it. There are so many better places in Malaysia to visit for a fraction of the cost. Even with a quick pass, there was no need to wait for rides, which only made the purchase feel like a scam. The photos online are misleading, so don’t fall for the marketing.

This was our experience in January/February 2025. Save your money and your time—there are far better options out there.

name: Cinnabon
category: bakery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2.135B, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Got 2 boxes of cinnamons! Original and chocolate omg both are soooo good. It is a must to reheat, just 3 minutes 180deg into the airfryer. Buns are crispy and chewy, flavours are super yums after toasting. Just downsize is the size, some big some small. | review_rating:1, text:i am very disappointed with the Cinnabon i bought recently. its was quite upset for me when i noticed they close down the stall at One Utama and Sunway Pyramid. Therefore, i am very excited when i known they will reopen in Nu sentral, TRX and sunway pyramid etc.

The cinnabun taste as good as before when the open in NU sentral and i have bought many times from there when i passed by however when i tried once from sunway pyramid ,the cinnabon taste is completely different , it does not taste like previous, the bun is very hard and dry, just like some cinamon bread i can get from any bakery shop. afterwards, I give another chance to get from Nu sentral again and thought its was the outlet issues , unfortunately the taste is just worse like sunway pyramid.

Cinnabon isn’t cheap and quite pricy for many people, so when we get this type of low quality food will double the disappointment… hope the owner can have a quality control and dont use cheap flour just to earn more money! | review_rating:4, text:Biscoff mini cinnamon was good . Big and mini cinnamon rolls available! | review_rating:2, text:Are we now not allowed to buy those which are on display? 1 for RM12.90, 2 for RM25.90. However, RM25.90 are only for pre-packed as those on display are for a la-carte only? Ridiculous business model!! Those pre-packed ones need to be reheated, so I requested them to reheat it and they put the whole box into their oven 30secs. If this is how Cinnabon do business, can expect no business real soon. | review_rating:5, text:Staff is good and nice. Answer me nicely and serve with patient. Cinnamon rolls is good tho. Very recommend is Pecan Bon! Have lots of sweet n crunchy pecan on top! All time favorite.

reviews: review_rating:5, text:The ambiance here is inviting and comfortable. The staffs are professional and really helpful. I had a quick and easy trade-in experience with Haris. Thanks to Haris | review_rating:5, text:Great & super easy trade in experience with Haris at the Sunway Pyramid outlet! Will definitely come back to CompAsia for future trade ins 😊 | review_rating:5, text:Staffs was very helpful and friendly name Ezanie . Thanks for your help to choose phone suitable for me and my budget. location: No. 18, Digital Centre, Asia Avenue, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:not recommended for screen protector here 😕 at first the lady say it is the best which is certified worldwide RM129, then they simply just use this kind of machine to make the screen protector for u, very not honest seller.. will not come again 😢 | review_rating:5, text:Fixed my Samsung Flip's hinge here. Boss offered price way below Samsung Service Centre and promised 2 days to fix, but only used less than a day to complete my service.

Very fast service and price is reasonable. Will definitely come again! | review_rating:5, text:Genuinely impressed by how professional yet approachable Mr Lee & wife are when I just asked for quotation, came back a few days later to get my MacBook battery replaced, suffice to say he delivered what he promised, quick and hassle free! The duo are also attentive and helpful to all visiting clients, what more could you ask for!  Competitive pricing and generous after sales warranty, most importantly quick result delivery. 10/10 would recommend L&M to anyone with the needs for gadget repairing | review_rating:5, text:Highly recommended this shop boss n lady boss very nice and friendly….help u clean the casing 😀 | review_rating:5, text:had an amazing experience coming to this shop !!! :DD they managed to repair my old phone in under 30mins and I really appreciate their effectiveness and speed. Highly recommended to come and take a look and visit. The owners were kind and helpful too! 🤩

name: DubuYo
location: LG2.92, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The food is amazing! Don’t be fooled by the small portion sizes (for me)—they left me completely full by the end. However, the spicy chicken isn't very spicy, so if you're a spice lover, your cravings might not be fully satisfied here. | review_rating:4, text:I order spicy seafood ramyeon and the food is exactly like the pic on menu, the set was included with drinks and side dishes for rm20. The ramyeon was really tasty, spicy enough and did NOT SOGGY! ...The roasted barley was good bcs i dont want to drink sweet peach tea ....but the side dishes was like meh to me... Only the kimchi was okey for me....staff service also polite and overall I rate 4.5/5!!! | review_rating:1, text:Disgusting. Should have read the google reviews before coming. Posts that says dirty or food poisoning, mostly is 99% true. Went and had dinner, had few bites of the tofu stew, and then i saw the squid ring.

First time in my life i see squid ring has this “texture”. I tried to scrap off with my finger and it came off easily. Made a complain to cancel the food and asked what was it. The staff came back later and say because its frozen squid ring, after cooked, the skin becomes like this cause of the bubbles. Really? Like really im supposed to believe that? Or is it a fly laid eggs on it thats why it has those white things? Don’t say they are sesame seed also because they are smaller than that. I’ve asked a chef that has been dealing with frozen squid rings for years, he mentioned he never seen such thing before.

Third photo is an example of fly eggs (zoomed in) that was sent by my friend that works in pest control company. Not sure if its the same thing found on the squid, but better be safe than sorry.

Last visit for Dubuyo outlets. | review_rating:4, text:Great food options with affordable prices and set menus available too.

Got the honey garlic chicken lunch set. Portion is worth the price.
But while the food was still tasty, the chicken did not actually taste like honey garlic. Food presentation for this dish could be improved. The iced barley tea was also extremely watered down. Tasted like nothing but ice water.

Would still come back but maybe try a different dish.

The soondubu and ramyeon looked good. | review_rating:5, text:Great place! The food was delicious, the portions were big, and everything was satisfying. but there was a small mix-up with my friend’s order. However, they quickly fixed it, so overall, it was a nice experience.

location: LG1.130 & LG1.131, Pyramid, Sunway Pyramid, Shop, 3, Jalan PJS 11/16, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Casual clothing store for both her and him. All prices were generally higher than I expected. Couldn't find any garment that was made of 100% cotton. | review_rating:5, text:Mohd Shazwan the supervisor was awesome! Had perks voucher drama and he calmly helped me, WHILE charging my phone. Well done for doing a fab job managing an annoyed customer;) | review_rating:5, text:Had a great experience with retail staff, Alex. The sweetest, most patient n  helpful person   😊
Thank you, Alex! | review_rating:5, text:God bless YOUUUU🤭🤭🤭🙏🏽🙏🏽🙏🏽thank youuuu soooo muchhhhh💞💞 | review_rating:1, text:Staff at Sunway Pyramid are rude, especially the ones working at the counters.

On 2nd of February 2019, at 8:58 I had a nasty encounter with 3 cashiers with foul attitudes towards me wanting to swap my change for a better note (the one they gave me had a significantly big hole on it) as not all stores accept torn notes. The male cashier (MUHD SYAFIQ) pretended to exchange the note but instead gave me the same one with a hole (he covered it with his fingers). The other male (AHMAD AMNAN) who was in charge of handling my purchase completely ignored my request to change notes and walked off. Not only are the staff ignorant and dishonest, a female salesperson/cashier (idrk) mocked at my request to change notes. She even made the comment saying "It is still accepted" and continued to make rude comments on me to her co-workers.

These behaviors are not what staff who are working at the service industry should have. They are clearly not well behaved and that reflects on how the shopping experience at cotton on is terrible.

name: HEYTEA
location: F1.07, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a pleasant first visit! The girl with glasses who served us was incredibly patient and took the time to explain everything thoroughly, she answered all my questions without rushing. The shop itself is clean, hygienic, and has a high-end appearance. A great experience overall! | review_rating:5, text:Had bubble milk tea here and it’s good. Bubble is chewy but not that chewy until mouth to get tired. Got my drink few minutes after order placed. Staff are friendly | review_rating:5, text:I tried the Coconut Mango Boom and Crisp Grape Boom from Heytea, and they were both so good! The Coconut Mango Boom was super creamy and refreshing, with real mango chunks that made it even better. The Crisp Grape Boom was light, sweet, and tasted just like fresh grapes.

Both drinks were super refreshing, and I’ll definitely come back for more! | review_rating:5, text:I recently had the pleasure of visiting Heytea for the first time, and I must say, it was a delightful experience! On a weekend, I was pleasantly surprised to find the place less crowded than I had anticipated, allowing for a more relaxed atmosphere.

There’s a small seating area where you can unwind and take in the ambiance.

Tried the Coconut Mango Boom, and it was truly a decent drink! The combination of coconut and mango was refreshing, making it a perfect choice for a warm day. What really stood out to me was the ability to customize the sugar level, which is a thoughtful touch. It’s great to have the option to adjust sweetness according to personal preference; this kind of flexibility is often hard to find in many bubble tea shops.

As for the pricing, I found it quite reasonable for the quality of the drinks. | review_rating:1, text:I already order with this girl two time! Every time she take order from customer is very rude and impolite, her face will be angry! I visit on last Thursday her friend ask her come out for ordering and she is very unhappy because she just came out from kitchen and she ask about our order with very low voice and in clear so at the finally she take wrong with my order! Today is she again, I went to order she speak very low voice again, I was unclearly what she is speaking so I said “Sorry ?” then she reply me very loud and rude “Welcome to Heytea!” with a angry face! I straight walk away and I swear will not visit SUNWAY PURAMID HEYTEA again!!!!! Not good service!!!!

name: CIMB Fast Banking
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
