location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Christy Ng
location: Lot No. G1.106, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Purchased a bag today. Service was OK.
Good la the sales person takde ikut kat belakang which something that I like haha u like some other shops. | review_rating:5, text:Miss Sarah from Christy Ng Sunway Pyramid branch is the best staff I've ever encountered! ❤️She always update me when there's new stocks and accomodate all my requests even during her day off.

In terms of the bags of CN, they have the most sturdy bags and trendiest as well! Best local bag brand! | review_rating:2, text:Suggest to train ur workers be polite to customer, at least say thank you when hand over receipt. Thats the minimum.. | review_rating:1, text:21.12.2023 I came in about 10-ish morning. There were 2 Malay female staffs inside. One was arranging, one at the cashier. No welcome greetings after they noticed I came. When I asked about a product, the staff from the cashier answered one word. When I asked another thing, she answered one word also. They don't bother to try to assist me more  as I do showed interest in buying as I let her see a screenshot of the bag I wanted. | review_rating:1, text:went to the shop and ask if i can check the condition of the bag and one of the staff said “tengok la” with such bad attitude, after checking the bag there was some defective so i asked to change to another bag and the staff was very rude before going to change it

name: Uniqlo
location: Unit No. LG1.67, LG1.68, LG1.69, LG2.66, LG2.65 Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I had a fantastic experience at Uniqlo in Sunway Pyramid! The service was incredibly efficient—staff were friendly, attentive, and quick to help with any questions or sizes. The store was well-organized, making it easy to find everything I needed. As always, Uniqlo’s clothing and accessories are top-notch in quality, with a great range of stylish yet practical options for every season. Whether you’re shopping for basics or something trendy, they have it all. Highly recommend this location for its excellent service and high-quality products! | review_rating:4, text:This Uniqlo store has two floors. The clothes are well-organized, tidy, and neat. The clean environment provides good vibes for browsing, and you may find something that suits your preference and style. | review_rating:5, text:Shop attendant is very friendly, arrangement of the clothing section is very convenient for shopping purposes, quite like the concept compare to other Uniqlo stores | review_rating:5, text:This branch of Uniqlo is very large, occupying two floors. The decor is nice and the store is very well stocked. Items on offer are reasonably priced. It's worth visiting to buy some clothing here. | review_rating:5, text:at first i went to H&M, but they said close already so i came to Uniqlo and got me a pant. the service was really good. the staff who assisted me was so friendly. i felt so welcomed, compared to H&M.

they also asked me if i wanted an alteration, even when it was about 20-30 minutes before the closing. but they managed to make it done in few minutes. kudos to the team.

name: Childhood
category: confectionery, bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG 2, 76, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway Mentari, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Small store at LG floor of Sunway Pyramid shopping mall. They are selling all kind of items from the past, which reminds of childhood memories. You can find candies, cookies, pastries, toys, etc here. Items price slightly higher side.

The place has great interior design with nice decorations all over the store. The design & decorations will remind us of old times. The store is clean, bright and well maintained. Items were well arranged and displayed.

Staffs were not that friendly, as they keep staring at customer even when we are window shopping, looking at the items in the store. They were also gossiping about customers, which gave bad impression about the store. | review_rating:1, text:I bought a kaya ball from here and I found a stapler after I bite into it. If I swallowed the stapler, it could have gotten worse. I asked the staff where is the boss and they said “they don’t know the boss” so I called the customer service number posted in the store, but it was a wrong number. So I went online and went to their official website. No one answers the number in the website. I will really get a lawyer and sue if no one deals with this matter. | review_rating:4, text:This shop sells retro toys, food, games and more. We bought some traditional biscuits here which tastes good. A good place to find nostalgic items. | review_rating:3, text:Traditional confectionery at high end prices. Some of the products are stale. | review_rating:1, text:This shop looks good at the first glance despite the overpriced goods, until we see the unpleasant scene of DYING and DEAD FISH kept in the filthy water bottles. If you are not going to take care of them or ask your staff to take care of them and just using the fishes as nostalgic decoration, you’re outright cruel. By no means people with conscience will support your business. Please start taking care of the fish or else pass it to someone who will.

Will never enter this shop again.

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
category: cafe, breakfast_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Ground Floor, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:One of the slowest coffee bean cafe. Queue is super lengthy despite have 6 workers. I had terrible experience ordering for Spanish latte. I request without sugar but they remove the vanila powder . Not only that, the cashier was hesitate to accept card payment. I insist since i left my wallet at home. I heard an indonesian girl feels upset as she do not have cash at that time and want to use card payment. Usual order usually takes 30 mins for a cup of coffee. The queue was the most painful part | review_rating:4, text:The atmosphere is good for a quick break or catching up with friends. The service was fast and efficient. Had their cold brew and  bagels, coffee was good and bagels were absolutely delicious. Definitely a spot I'd recommend for anyone looking to relax and enjoy a good snack or coffee. | review_rating:1, text:My experience with Coffee Bean usually good But this one at Sunway Pyramid is worst.  When ordering, this cashier shown a sour face.  Don't answer question. And show me an impatient attitude in ordering.  It's Saturday 14 sept. As usual a busy weekend. But I felt the customer does not deserve a sour face.  The cashier can smile or laugh with the staff/ colleagues but not to the customer is something very wrong.
If you the management of coffee bean, pls do something. Improve staff competency and attitude. You are in the F&B industry.
I believe you can find your staff at the receipt attached. | review_rating:5, text:A very convenient joint located at G floor of Sunway Pyramid. You can enjoy your coffee and meal while watching people skate. Or it is a perfect place to have a sip or two while waiting your loved ones do their shopping .

This is not my first time here. Been here many times for their nice food, good coffee, good vibes, and yes.... clean toilet is nearby. What a good  setup.

Great service too. I think it is an enjoyable place to meet up with friends or to complete simple paper work, as I always see people with their laptops.

Starting your day with a perfect blend of good coffee and being surrounded with many people from all walks of life....is always amazing. | review_rating:2, text:First CBTL outlet that refuses to give me a straw for iced drink. Staff said straws are reserved for “ice blended” beverages only. Is this policy only applicable to this outlet? Coz other outlets just give me one straw for each cold beverage without any problems.

name: Faber-Castell
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Ohhh, was walking around to look for some stuffs, and I saw this Faber-Castell counter. I must be behind time, didn't know  Faber/Castell has outlets now. So, I had stop to look at the colourful colour pencils. One which I yearn for during my school days, but couldn't afford. No cheap, esp those at rm600 and above, Fabre-Castell indeed is branded. | review_rating:5, text:Customer Assistant En.Fadhill very patient to give explanation on all the products that I  interested and had 0 knowledge, till I understand and clear bout my requirements as a beginner in doodle art which products suits me well and make further consideration on my next purchase list. With his experience in art, he has been serving Faber Castell for along the 7yrs, glad to have experience retail assistant like him. Will make return visit again. | review_rating:5, text:excellent service.
I had to get a fountain pen as a Christmas present for my friend and wanted to engrave her name on it to make it special. At first the salesman told me the person to engraves is only coming on Friday, which is the day i needed the present. (i bought it on wednesday) Told the salesman my situation and he helped me call the engraver and i managed to collect the pen on monday.
Really appreciated the help. Thank you. | review_rating:5, text:Huge thanks to Aisah who showed soooo much kindness and patience during my selection of pen!! Keep up with the good service ! | review_rating:5, text:Great service by the salesperson En.Fadhill and managed to get the pens engraved on the spot.

location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Nice and fast service even on weekend and full house. Portion also good especially with the vegetable. Always come here if i want to eat chicken rice shop. | review_rating:4, text:Generous portion of rice and chicken. Noodles too soft, it would be better if more chewy.

name: Johnson Fitness
location: LG2.78 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I really like this store because there are many interesting options,more variety of equipment, reasonable prices even for quality products and the employees are very friendly and willing to provide a lot of good information | review_rating:1, text:Super bad after sales service!!

I bought a Johnson treadmill from Sunway pyramid outlet. Always face misalignment problem.

Call for service appointments, only allow “one date in a month” for appointment. Ok fine. They set me 12-2pm for service. I purposely take leave and wait for the technician come, until 3pm still no show face and not even a call. I tried call the technician several time only pick up my call. He told me can’t make it!! What? If u can’t make it, why not early inform? Why wait customer to call u several time only inform?

This not the 1st time, last time I wait at home until 9pm also no show face!

I will never buy from Johnson anymore!
Other fitness equipment shop have more good after sales service! | review_rating:5, text:Very good service and friendly staff .. enjoying when purchase from them .. recommend this brand for beginners thats want to buy an equipment for workout.. | review_rating:5, text:super helpful staff and provide good info | review_rating:5, text:Good service and explaination.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Katherine very friendly and very welcoming. I want to buy gift for my friends but don’t have any idea, I told her my budget and how many pax gift I’m looking for, she definitely did a big help for me. Free for wrapping the gift in single pack and no extra charged. Thanks Katherine for the good services, definitely my wonderful first shopping experience in L’occitane because of her🫶🏻 | review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful experience shopping at L’Occitane Sunway Pyramid while looking for a birthday gift for my mom. The beauty advisor, Ms. Dayana, made the entire process seamless and enjoyable. She attentively listened to my preferences and went above and beyond to ensure I found the perfect gift.

Her knowledge of the products and thoughtful recommendations truly impressed me. I felt valued as a customer and appreciated her warm, professional approach.

Not only do I love the product I purchased, but the overall experience was exceptional. Thank you, Ms. Dayana, and L’Occitane, for making my visit such a pleasant one. I’ll definitely return for future purchases! | review_rating:5, text:The best service! Came here (sunway pyramid) to buy a gift to sis in law and got hooked with your body care products introduced by your great staff, Dayana. | review_rating:5, text:Free diagnose hair and scalp at Loccitane and get sample to try. Helpful and experienced staff Katherine gave advice of correct way to apply products and what to use to solve my scalp issue. Tq | review_rating:5, text:My first time recycling my empties here. The process was quick and hassle-free. The lady who assisted me was sweet and polite. Got my hand cream after recycling 12 items. Will be back here next time.

name: MIX STORE
category: convenience_store, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2－132A & 132B, Oasis Entrance, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:2days ago I went to this store in Sunway Pyramid to buy some snacks n nuts for my friends n guests who are coming to visit me during this Chinese New Year festive period. Previously I did buy some walnuts, cashew nuts n peanuts but my family members have eaten them all already. Since I was shopping in Sunway Pyramid, I walked into this store n was amazed by the huge varieties of different types of snacks, nuts , biscuits , chips n candies n jellies on sale. All these were packed n sealed in attractive n easy to carry packages. There were healthy snacks, instant vegetable snacks,children’s snacks, candy n jelly n various nuts n drinks- all imported from China. As for the bottled drinks, they were selling sugar cane juice, lime juice n orange juice. As for the nuts, if you buy one big packet of assorted nuts , you will get another packet free of charge. These were all beautifully gift wrapped .  So I browsed around the shelves n bought some packets of mixed nuts n healthy snacks . | review_rating:5, text:Took over Yubiso store....strategic location in Sunway Pyramid, become my frequent visited store. I like here because they have few good ready-make frozen seafoods dishes ( actually from local 5* restaurants and all info.written in Chinese words only )available here. Won't leave without empty handed, can't resist to try most of the snacks here....attracted by colourful bright and cute packaging...still the pricey comparing with China price. | review_rating:1, text:Don’t be fooled by huge variety. Stock expiry dates not checked properly. They sell expired goods. Family member did not check and bought this snack, tasted stale & realized it’s expired. I wanted to buy their yogurt pack of 12, but luckily I checked and realized ALL the packs were expired 3 months ago - expired YOGURT left for customers to buy! | review_rating:5, text:One of the best for snacks lover | review_rating:5, text:Good shop that you can find  so many products in here!!

name: ROYCE'
category: chocolate_shop, candy_store, dessert_shop, confectionery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: F1.02A, Frist Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:My visit to ROYCE’ Chocolate at Sunway Pyramid was absolutely delightful and deserving of five stars. The store’s elegant presentation and wide array of premium chocolates made it a haven for chocolate lovers. I was particularly impressed by their signature Nama Chocolate, which was velvety smooth and rich in flavor. The staff were attentive and knowledgeable, offering helpful recommendations tailored to my preferences. With its luxurious treats and impeccable service, ROYCE’ is the perfect destination for indulgence or gifting. | review_rating:5, text:Good service by the staff working this morning - also good taste the chocolate - choc lover now | review_rating:5, text:Both staff very helpful on explaining the chocolate products, well-versed and friendly towards me. Would be monthly place to buy for wifey 😁👍 | review_rating:4, text:Affordable chocolate to snack on. My family has been loving the gift box, you can get lots of different flavour at one go! | review_rating:2, text:I bought the chocolate at Sunway Pyramid Tuesday around 5pm.
When I at the counter, a Malay male staff was very occupied with his mobile phone, obviously personal events as I can hear his voice messages. He ignored and walk in customer. I was later attended by another short hair lady that was doing her paperwork. She appears to be lack of product knowledge, questions posted such as which one is less milky taste, what’s inside an orange/cherry choc (half pure orange half pure cherry? Or mixture of these flavour?), her reply is “I don’t know, I don’t know”. Seriously? However, she is polite. Until payment, the male staff still on his phone. So I left the choc at store and returned to pick up my choc after two hours, I was attended by the male staff, he is STILL busy with his voice messages. While attending to me, his hand still swiping his phone. This is unacceptable. The staffs really need to be polished to serve such premium brand chocolates, and trained on what is customer service.

name: Palsaik Korean BBQ
location: OB.K5-K6A, Oasis Boulevard, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Palsaik is one of the best, if not the best, Korean BBQ restaurants around. Palsaik is the whole package in terms of the quality of their meats and their sides. I've never had a bad time going to Palsaik and always leave satisfied. The service is also excellent as servers are constantly nearby. They cook for you as well, and they do a good job at it, too. This particular branch is really nice as it's the most spacious I've seen. They also have a nice kids' room attached to the restaurant. Price-wise, it is on the high side compared to other Korean BBQ places. However, what you get for your money is worth well it! Definitely and highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Had a great meal here! There were three of us, and we went for their set for two—it was just the right amount. Also got the vegetable pancake, which was super crispy and delicious!

The staff were friendly and attentive, and the biggest win? We walked out not smelling like oil or smoky bbq. You know that scent that usually clings to your clothes after Korean BBQ? None of that here!

Oh, and the banchan were refillable, which is always a plus. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:New dine in place in Sunway Pyramid. The interior design is nice and comfy, the staffs are friendly and helpful. It’s a cozy place for gathering and dine in. The is a playroom available for kid 3-12 years old too!

The taste of food is average according to my own preference. The menu did mention about the weight of the pork slice for 2 pax but personally think it’s small portion 😅 I definitely pork lover hence the portion is small for me.

Yummy yoghurt ice cream and it’s free flow, so with the bancan!

Overall happy with the dine in experience! One suggestion is if there is more choices for kid menu, that’s definitely perfect as it’s limited choice for toddler. | review_rating:5, text:First time invited by my friends in this place.. will be come again for bring my family due to play room provided for parents eating with peace.

Very uncomparation with other BBQ and hot pot restaurant perfect matching 2 in 1 set , affordable price and enjoying unlimited free desert ice cream with quality yoghurt ice cream free flow.. The pity of staff restaurant keeps refilling until the machine needs time to freeze ice cream. But lucky with display-hanging
"Notice preparation on progress." Good practise every 5-7minutes. I still can enjoy the ice cream!

I also never expected free-flow side dishes/vegetables in here , Normally, we ask only to provide as normal restaurants practise.

Good to gain memory. At least, this is my future place for dine perfect combination. Never try, Never know.

Impressive in detailing informing customers service from time being, Even busy weekend still manageable but still feel provide services.

No choice. I've to become a regular guest here as a service provider, and alertness attention from the manager meets up my expectations.

As Mention enjoy peacefully, play room is temptation for me.. hehe.

Food is quite affordable price and has more choices for me in different varieties of BBQ, even Ala Carte.  Good space and large table suitable for family gatherings, so far this  place is the most plenty big table. But lucky do a reservation early.

Friendly and comfortable environment better than other restaurant I went before. Great recommended overall, but this is not a super fine dining restaurant expected but a friendly, caring, and comfortable restaurant as my thoughts. | review_rating:5, text:love the foods, services, and dining ambience. ordered mini palsaik set, including their signature 8 flavours pork belly. generous food portion v reasonable price and superb services. staff will BBQ the meat for customers and let u know when the meat is done. they will give advice or recommend based on the dishes u order. for example, we planned to order the fried rice but the fried rice taste not good if paired v the hot pot soup we had ordered, so the waitress gave us advise to change the fried rice we choose earlier. they provided free ais cream n free flow side dishes. if u don't want pork, they also served beef, chicken, and seafood for BBQ. there is a playroom for kids, bonus for them.

name: nononsense coffee
location: LG 1.33 LG 1.35 - LG Sunway Pyramid Sunway City Sunway 3, Jalan PJS 11/15 Sunway City, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:First visit today; Friday morning 11am. Not too busy. Had a simple black coffee hot. Not much of a serious coffee drinker; taste different from normal; amazing fragrance and deep taste. Enjoyed the coffee and ambience. Great port of call away from the busy mall scene outside. | review_rating:5, text:A very unique spot tucked away, offering a peaceful escape from the busy mall atmosphere. The coffee was fantastic – rich and full of flavor. However, found the chocolate roll to be a bit underwhelming, as it lacked the depth of flavors I was hoping for. Overall, it’s a great place to unwind with a good cup of coffee. | review_rating:4, text:I love the ambience of the place, very unique and is based on Japanese anime. The staffs were very friendly and helpful. They have desserts and drinks so I ordered the dark chocolate cake and a fujisan drink. Honestly, the dessert is just average but I like their drink. It is slightly pricey and the place is small but it's a good place for those who want to do quick office work. | review_rating:5, text:A cozy and quiet coffee shop hidden away in a busy mall. The coffee selection was great and I really enjoyed my cup! Great place to sit down and relax in the midst of a busy mall. Will visit again and definitely recommend to others. | review_rating:5, text:Price is on the higher end, the coffee was very good but a little too sour for my own preference, match latte was perfect. Great atmosphere.

name: Dunkin Donuts
category: donut_shop, bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot LG2.43 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47400 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I ordered a box of 3 Assorted Donuts through Grab and I got the Blueberry Filled, Bavarian Filled along with the Sugar Raised donuts for RM12.60. The donut flavours were not my first few choices since most of them were sold out around 5pm. It was also my first time having Dunkin' Donuts and the donuts were absolutely amazing! The Blueberry Filled donut was what I expected it to be but the Bavarian Filled donut had an interesting flavour, however I wish there were more fillings inside. You also cannot go wrong with the Sugar Raised donuts and honestly only getting one was not enough. I would definitely try more flavours next time since I really enjoyed my late afternoon snack :) | review_rating:1, text:A Disappointing Experience

I recently visited a Dunkin' Donuts outlet and was left feeling frustrated and disappointed by the customer service.

When I was deciding on my order, the staff member insisted that I purchase four donuts to receive a box. While I understand the desire to minimize waste, it felt inflexible and inconvenient, especially for a smaller order.

Moreover, the lack of a larger bag to carry the individual paper bags was surprising. It seemed like a minor detail, but it added to the overall inconvenience of the experience.

While Dunkin' Donuts has historically offered boxes for smaller orders, this recent experience suggests a potential downgrade in customer service. It's important to remember that good customer service can significantly impact a customer's overall satisfaction.

I hope that Dunkin' Donuts will take steps to improve their customer service policies and training to ensure a more positive experience for future customers. | review_rating:3, text:Sweet treat is not for me, but I do drop here to pack these colourful, vibrant, attractive and hunger calling donuts. Just so pleasant to look at, I opted for the 6 in a pack, chosen between the various types donuts, the latest to coincide with Spider-Man concept. Had just a tiny bite, when I dropped the pack at my friend's, sure, soft and fluffy, sugar rush treats. | review_rating:5, text:One of the best Dunkin' Donuts, always fresh. Usually run out of the popular choices towards the ens of the night | review_rating:1, text:Worst experience... Please refer to the pictures as evidence... I bought the half dozen dd n ice coffee with less ice... Unfortunately, my cup were half filled only... Hahaha... When i ask why is it like this? The staff said Because you only get 75ml of coffee... Hahaha... I say is it ok looking like this? The bright short round girl said yes its like that if less ice... Previously, i've work at F&B such as Subway, pizza hut in my study years n one thing commonly they teach us is courtesy and politeness towards customer... Put yourself in my shoes n imagine if u received ur drinks looking like this... All the best...

name: Mgp Label
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Potato Corner
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:It's located at LG2 near ice rink. Sitting area is quite small,  like 3 tables. Pay and get your number. First choose your size (Large, Jumbo, Mega, Giga n Tera), then choose flavour (number of flavours depends on which size you order). If you want Truffle, need to add RM1. I like the sweet corn & Truffle flavour. Cheese common but it taste great too. | review_rating:1, text:The quality of the french fries is totally not on par even compared to that from McDonald. Doesn't taste much of the taste from the potato.

Not to mentioned, the size of the so called "Large" size is a bit of a disappointment.

*Note: review come with free gift | review_rating:4, text:Always long queue, passed by at 930pm where there is no queue so just try it lah. To my surprise the fries is really good, got few flavours to choose from and i pick sour cream and onion. Comes with popcorn chicken as well. The chicken are meaty and juicy! I liked the food but its kinda pricy... | review_rating:4, text:Just tried Potato Corner for the first time and I must say, the fries were pretty decent with a generous amount of toppings. The tom yam chicken pop was a standout dish, bursting with flavor. The service was okay, nothing extraordinary. The best part was that the prices were quite affordable. Overall, a casual spot to grab some tasty snacks. | review_rating:1, text:I was at your sunway pyramid outlet at 1.10pm on 16th October 2024, wanted to try the fries and chicken pop corn. There’s only 1 staff working there and no one at the cashier, he was talking to somebody around there when I want to order. I call him and no response, after a while then he came to to the cashier counter.

As this is my first time trying the fries and chicken pop corn, I ask him is there any recommendation or any signature flavor for the fries… he rudely told me that there no recommendation… whatever u like, you choose…

It is so rude that I don’t feel like buying it after order the set that cost 18.80, can’t clearly remember what the price…  it’s nothing wrong with the taste as I haven’t try it, but it’s the staff attitude that piss off customers.. hope that the management will look into this staff otherwise he is ruining your company hard build reputation & name.
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 9:30 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 9:30 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 9:30 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 9:30 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 9:30 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 9:30 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 9:30 PM

name: Benjamin Barker
location: Lot G1.90, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The store itself is one of the most aesthetically pleasing clothing stores I’ve stepped in. Fabulous selection of clothing articles and premium quality of fabric. The design and cut of the jackets and trousers are perfectly fitting for someone like me. The service and friendly conversation from Penny was helpful and sociable. Would definitely visit and purchase from the store again. | review_rating:5, text:Great looking suits for a very good price. If youre planning to buy off the rack, you should consider this place.

Had amazing service from Danial here who was attentive and knowledgeable. | review_rating:5, text:I was here on Saturday afternoon, the shop attendant is so attentive and helpful. Wonderful service, strongly recommended!! Thank you for a pleasant time of shopping 🙏Great service is rare nowadays but not in this shop.

name: Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant
category: cafe, chinese_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot F1.73, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Cozy Atmosphere with Hit-or-Miss Dishes

The atmosphere is cozy and comfortable, with air conditioning making it a pleasant place to dine. However, do note that weekends can get busy, and you might need to queue.

As for the food, the polo bun is a standout—fresh and flavorful. The cheese rice is decent but has room for improvement. The croissant egg tart, while unique, was a bit too sweet for my taste, though others might enjoy it more.

Overall, it's worth a visit for the cozy ambiance and to try the signature items. | review_rating:2, text:Came in for lunch and we ordered the wanton soup noodle and the steamed pork patty with salted fish. I must say the presentation of the actual food is not as great and with the price at this range, I just can't  justify the value. The taste is alright, can't say there is any wow factor that will keep me coming back to this restaurant where never I have craving for Hong kee food. | review_rating:3, text:Overall experience was pleasant, food is good. The polo bun is nice and a must order.

What was unpleasant is the shark fin soup. Looks unappetizing and with the price of 16.90, nothing was inside the soup other than a few pieces of sliced mushroom | review_rating:5, text:New popular place to dine and chill. I’m very impressed with the quality of food here, especially the Char Siew and Roasted Pork Belly. The curry fishball was really tasty especially the curry, goes well with the fried rice! The milk tea was super fragrant, must be from the “Black & White evaporated milk”. The desserts like Chendol and 杨枝甘露 were very good as well so please reserve some stomach space for them! Park near lift lobby C! | review_rating:4, text:curry pork chop is very good.  oink is cooked to perfect intersection of tender and toothsome, with the curry providing taste and the breading texture.  potatoes are likewise done to perfection.

outside seating on the atrium does not lead itself to degustation.  so pick interior seat if you intend to enjoy the food.

name: HUUK
location: Lot 100, LG 2 ( marrakesh ) Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Terry"I had an amazing experience with this hairstylist! Their skills are truly exceptional, and they perfectly understood what I wanted. The attention to detail and professionalism were outstanding. They not only gave me a fantastic haircut but also shared tips for maintaining my hair. The friendly and warm atmosphere made the visit even more enjoyable. I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for a top-notch hairstylist who truly cares about their clients. I’ll definitely be coming back for my next haircut!" | review_rating:5, text:Very professional Barber Emran did haircut for my husband did slow and cleanly cut making sure hit don’t goes onto customer neck and speak very well. Will come again as what my husband wanna try other services ( beard trim nose waxing etc) | review_rating:5, text:I recently visited Huuk in Malaysia and had a fantastic experience with my barber, Martin. The shop itself has a clean, welcoming vibe, with a comfortable setup and friendly staff who make you feel right at home. The attention to detail in the atmosphere really adds to the overall experience.

Martin is an exceptional barber who goes above and beyond. He takes the time to understand exactly what you’re looking for, offering expert suggestions that always result in a sharp, clean cut. His precision and skill are evident, and he doesn’t rush the process, making sure you leave looking your best. I walked out feeling incredibly satisfied with my haircut. If you’re looking for a quality barbershop experience and a talented barber, Huuk and Martin are a winning combination. Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Overall great service, barbers are friendly, professional and will respond accordingly to your requests; just make sure to have at least some reference for your hairstyle as it will make the process much smoother. Tqsm | review_rating:5, text:First try on this barber, and got handsome Terry for my cut. He is very friendly and specific is cutting. The price is definitely worth it. Recommend to book first before come, because most of the time is full. Definitely will come back in future. (1st🖼️ After cut) (2nd🖼️ Before cut)

name: Kate Spade New York

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks
location: Lot F1.AV.128, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I’d always been a fan of Shihlin food for the past 7 years of my life however the amount of price increases is shocking. Well this isn’t really a franchise control but I’m just putting out there.

Food is great and quality and portion have never dropped ever since I first ate it and I love their new flavours each time. I still remember their golden boneless chicken, (please bring it back).

I would have nothing to change but if I was picky it would be the cleanliness of the seating area. I understand they are understaff sometimes so please HR hire more staff during peak days and hours | review_rating:2, text:The chicken is so thin, totally different thickness with branch in jb. No next time. | review_rating:3, text:operation hour is 10am to 10pm but why 9.20 the staff said closed already ? its still early. If 9.40 i okay | review_rating:4, text:Waiting time is longer than expected even there is not much of customer. Taste is standard as usual. | review_rating:2, text:Poor service. I have to wait 15 min just to pay not plus waiting time for the order to deliver. So poor. Food is good but service poor.

name: Christy Ng
location: Lot No. G1.106, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Purchased a bag today. Service was OK.
Good la the sales person takde ikut kat belakang which something that I like haha u like some other shops. | review_rating:5, text:Miss Sarah from Christy Ng Sunway Pyramid branch is the best staff I've ever encountered! ❤️She always update me when there's new stocks and accomodate all my requests even during her day off.

In terms of the bags of CN, they have the most sturdy bags and trendiest as well! Best local bag brand! | review_rating:2, text:Suggest to train ur workers be polite to customer, at least say thank you when hand over receipt. Thats the minimum.. | review_rating:1, text:21.12.2023 I came in about 10-ish morning. There were 2 Malay female staffs inside. One was arranging, one at the cashier. No welcome greetings after they noticed I came. When I asked about a product, the staff from the cashier answered one word. When I asked another thing, she answered one word also. They don't bother to try to assist me more  as I do showed interest in buying as I let her see a screenshot of the bag I wanted. | review_rating:1, text:went to the shop and ask if i can check the condition of the bag and one of the staff said “tengok la” with such bad attitude, after checking the bag there was some defective so i asked to change to another bag and the staff was very rude before going to change it

name: Armani Exchange
location: G1.03 & G1.05, Lower Ground, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Highstreet branded fashion retail boutique with a wide variety of ready-to-wear clothing and accessories for both genders. The store assistants are immensely helpful and also discreetly courteous with helpful suggestions and clothing tips. Just the thing for fashion klutzes like yours truly. The only drawback would be amount of choices especially for the latest collections if the patrons have had the chance to visit their outlets across the causeway. | review_rating:5, text:Best place and the staffs are good, look for Apai he will sort out your problem | review_rating:1, text:really bad quality item!!!!!! | review_rating:5, text:Suka sangat utk shopping kat sini... and Kak Azie the best one layanan dia tip top🫰🫰👍👍🥳🥳🥳 | review_rating:4, text:No Review

name: Daiso
location: LG2.08B - LG2.10 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:After our dinner at Shake Shack on the ground floor of Sunway Pyramid, we went to do some shopping in Daiso here. The place was rather busy n at one point , customers had to queue up at the payment counter to make their payment. We browsed through the various sections of this store. It was full of different types of goods ranging from cosmetics, household, clothes, kitchen utensils n cutlery,stationery to even food n beverage. You name it n you can find almost anything here. No wonder so many people like to shop here. The prices are really reasonable n most items are usually priced at only RM 5.90 only. Except for other bigger n more expensive items- these come with a higher price. You can shop at your own leisure without any sales person breathing down your neck. What I bought were a pair of bathroom slippers,a face towel, a plastic comb , a plastic brush, 2 pairs of reading glasses n a few packets of munchies. We had to queue up when making payments. | review_rating:5, text:The staff in all the outlets, not just this store are full of Filipinos, I always thought that I were in Philippines more than in Japan or Malaysia when  I visited Daiso, until I heard of Japanese song & woke up from Manila. But during my recent visit in May 2024, it started to see some local staff working there, especially as Cashier. This store is popular among young people, student, foreigner & tourist, especially female. Even though, the Japanese Yen had been down to the Forex rate of 3.0 but the price is never down but keep on increasing. Previously back to 3-4 years ago due to high Forex of Japanese Yen, Daisho keep on increased the price. Please adjust the price or you will lose of business & customer. | review_rating:4, text:Daiso is a store offering a variety of everyday essentials at budget-friendly prices. They have a wide selection of products for your home and personal needs, including stationery, kitchenware, home decor, storage solutions, cleaning supplies, and DIY materials. Whether you're looking for kitchen essentials, cleaning tools, bathroom accessories, or personal care products, you may find what you need. | review_rating:2, text:I have always been a loyal customer of Daiso because it offers unique also practical items that cannot be found elsewhere. So I give an extra star of this review.

However, today (Oct 6) when I was about to check out, a local cashier was chit chatting with her colleague and didn't provide me with any basic payment info's properly. When I requested to scan my Sunway Pals, she impatiently told me I should have mentioned it earlier and processed it without saying thank you. Shouldn't it be her responsibility to ask the customer beforehand, rather than the customer having to make the request?

I hope the management here provides proper training so that poor staff attitudes don't affect the shopping experience of customers, especially in such a prosperous mall. | review_rating:5, text:Very spacious outlet. Very nice to shop here. Many Christmas stuffs to due this holiday season. Very properly arrange the stuffs here. Brightly lit and easy to move around despite with many customers. I love to shop in Daiso outlet. Good place.

name: One Mobile
location: Lot No F1.38A, F1.39 & F1.39A, F Floor, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Phone crashed with some ribbon issues not functioning well. Came to One Specialist Mobile and met Mr Mickey who identifies my phone issue right away. He was very kind and patience and gave me the cost effective solutions without burning my pocket. He even gave me tips after phone was repaired. Solution was settled within 1 working day. Please look for Mr Mickey if you have any handset issue/problems. He can deal with any problems 😏 | review_rating:5, text:Very happy with the excellent service from Jeffrey to help me replace the iphone which I bought for my son due to a phone issue. Very helpful and fast service rendered. Thank you to Jeffrey, keep up the good work. Highly recommended. | review_rating:5, text:Absolutely Boombastic! 🚀 Lightning-fast service – got my battery swapped in under an hour! 🔋🔥 Highly recommended! Seek out Admond and Sanjana – they're total rockstars! 🌟💪 Big shout-out to the guy in charge too, top-notch! 👍👍👍 | review_rating:5, text:Thank you Desmond and Jason for helping me to repair my phone as water damage 🥹 They are professional, can find them at Sunway Pyramid once have problem!
#repair #phone | review_rating:5, text:Desmond was extremely informative in sharing info of the products. Also helped me to repair my mums android phone. Highly recommended.

•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Oltre Moda
location: LG 1. 91, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I visited this shop over the weekend, and unfortunately, had a negative experience with one of the Malay staff members, who seemed to speak with a Kelantanese dialect. She appeared to be in her 40s and was quite rude, often rolling her eyes and speaking in a very harsh manner. Her communication with customers was poor, lacking politeness and respect. To make matters worse, she made inappropriate comments, even body-shaming customers.

Although the dresses sold here are beautiful and reasonably priced between RM100-250, I decided not to make a purchase because of this sales assistant's rude behavior. She didn’t smile, was unprofessional, and her attitude completely ruined the shopping experience. Credit to the owner for offering such lovely products, but I suggest ensuring that staff have better attitudes to avoid driving customers away. | review_rating:5, text:The shopkeeper was very good at picking dresses for me to try according to my company annual dinner theme: masquerade night. I was quite worried that I can't fit the dress because I am quite plump. However, the dress fit perfectly without any alteration and showing my waistline, making me look slim. The dress is within my budget too. Will definitely visit the store again. | review_rating:1, text:worst quality experience in my life ever. glitter dropped everywhere with purchased rm300+ "AFTER DISCOUNT" somemore. bad quality which you can find any better one around the mall with reasonable price. not going to stepped in again. what a nightmare! | review_rating:5, text:Discovering this shop was a delightful surprise as my family and I shopped for a graduation dress. Rain, the shop assistant, proved to be a true asset with her exceptional service. She effortlessly guided us to the nicest dresses, and we ended up purchasing three, finding them worth every penny. The next day, when I wanted to exchange a dress for a lighter color, Rain's fashion expertise shone through as she suggested unique patterns I hadn't considered. This shop not only offers adorable designs at reasonable prices but is elevated by Rain's professionalism and genuine understanding of customers' needs. It has become my go-to destination for stylish attire, and Rain is undoubtedly the gem that makes the shopping experience truly remarkable. Highly recommended for those seeking quality and personalized service. | review_rating:4, text:I went there to buy a dress yesterday and I honestly enjoyed it. Even though the sales lady was quite rushed, she will still ask you whether what type of dresses you are looking for? If you wanted it sleeveless or not etc. and she pick some dresses for you to let you try on and she would go ahead of her way to get even more dresses and see if you would look good on it or not.

name: Tai Er
location: LOT G1.98A&98B, SUNWAY PYRAMID SHOPPING MALL, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Overall, the experience here is pleasant. The food tastes good but leans towards a heavier and oilier base. If you can't handle spicy food, I’d recommend avoiding the dishes I ordered.

Portion-wise, the servings are generous, but the pricing is on the higher side. For example, the medium-sized Spicy Sour Soup Dory Fish costs RM108, but it's enough to be shared among four ladies. The 双椒辣子鸡 costs RM49, which I find a bit overpriced because the chicken cubes are really small and mixed with other ingredients. Based on the taste, I believe they’ve added fried potato cubes, so most of the dish consists of vegetables—mainly two types of chili and potato cubes. The potato is fine to eat, but the chili depends on your spice tolerance.

Service-wise, I was impressed. They have a unique way of calling for staff using a peace ✌🏻 hand sign, which I found interesting (but personally for me as an introverted person, I was really shy to do it). The service team was attentive and had a good attitude.

I might return, but I’d definitely bring at least two more friends to share the portions—if you're a small eater, you won’t be able to finish everything on your own! | review_rating:5, text:Today finally managed to get a chance to dine here after 2 times failed to get in for the past 1 year.  Now I understand why this restaurant and their branches are always long q and full house. This is a happening modern Chinese restaurant with nice environment, vibes and prompt service. The foods were very good and delicious, white rice was nice, free flow of dried mandarin orange skin tea, hot and ice water are available. Phone charging cable, USB plugs and good quality of tissue paper are provided. Really have nothing to complain and no idea of what to pin point or find fault. Highly and strongly recommend to dine here, no regret! | review_rating:4, text:Popular chinese sour fish soup spot. Decently great food and their signature taste good. Fish used was normal though and a tad bit oily.

The chicken in spicy 🌶 oil is worth trying whereas the prawns with fen si is savory but a bit oily as well. The veggies was normal but the fried chicken with sweet & sour sauce was worth the try.

Prepare to wait on hols or weekends but they do have a queue system which is good and the service staff will give u a call when it's your turn. | review_rating:5, text:Some may say it is cheap fish but I think it tasted delicious. That’s what matters most, isn’t it? Spices+pepper on point, spicy just the way we like it🫶🏻

Not recommended to order the spicy chicken with chilli pepper, it was expensive and taste was really just so so. The order took a while to come, when we were almost done with our meal.

Free Roselle + orange peel drink on self service.

Overall very happy with the fish ❤️ | review_rating:5, text:Food is delish, sauerkraut spicy fish portion is huge, its so cute how the dish is served. fragrant spicy not too spicy, unlimited roselle dried mandarin peel drink, always nice service
We had mala century egg
Dried chilli long bean
Sweet & sour pork with fish crackers
Signature sauerkraut spicy soup fish

name: ANTA Sports
location: G1.046 & G1, 047, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:I went yesterday 24/10/2024. The sales person initially encouraged to go for 2 items for 30% discount. After that, ask us why not we go for more, as if we go for more than 2 items, we will get additional 10% discount on top of the 30% discount. So, because of this, we get the kids to try on their shoes and the kids are in love with the sport shoes. However, to our much disappointment, when we are about to pay, we feel weird, that the calculation didnt match what we were told, and the sales person just told us that, sorry, the promotion had ended a day earlier, but how can? as a big company did such a mistake. We still ended up buying because we didnt want the kids to be upset after choosing and trying and confirming their shoes, we ended paying RM87x instead of RM79x. This is really so unprofessional way, how can the staff be so unprofessional, or the company no notification of the promotion ended? I appreciate Anta to reply us for this matter. We were regular customer of ANTA, but truly disappointed with this misinformation and service yesterday at Sunway Pyramid branch. | review_rating:5, text:Great location and good service. The shop assistant was very patient when we were trying out various shoes. Wide variety of shoes and clothings available. Well done!! | review_rating:5, text:Ain provided exceptional service! Her patience and professionalism in assisting with apparel sizes were greatly appreciated. She even went above and beyond by sourcing new pieces for us. The sportswear is incredibly comfortable and perfect for Malaysia's weather. Highly recommended 👍👍 | review_rating:5, text:Great service by the 2 staff this morning 👍🏼Finally managed to get a comfortable running shoe | review_rating:5, text:Lovely. Found the design and comfort i was looking for. The sales person, Nazreen, is very Helpful and 'Proactive'. Service do help make a big difference, its not just about 'brand'.

name: Ole-Ole Bali
location: G1.136, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:As a plant-based diner, finding a satisfying meal at a predominantly meat-centric restaurant can be a challenge, but Ole Ole Bali at Sunway Pyramid pleasantly surprised us with its thoughtful vegetarian options.

During a recent lunch treat by my boss, I opted for the Grilled Vege Ciabatta, a delightful combination of chargrilled vegetables nestled in a warm, crusty ciabatta. The flavors were well-balanced, and the fresh ingredients made for a hearty and satisfying bite. Accompanying my meal was the Lemongrass Mojito, an incredibly refreshing drink that was the perfect antidote to the sweltering afternoon heat. The vibrant mix of lemongrass and mint was both cooling and invigorating—highly recommended for those looking for a non-alcoholic thirst-quencher.

While my colleagues enjoyed their respective meals, I truly appreciated the effort put into crafting a flavorful and well-prepared plant-based option. Ole Ole Bali may not be a fully vegetarian restaurant, but it certainly caters to those seeking fresh, wholesome, and delicious plant-based alternatives.

Here are some pictures of our meals—because good food deserves to be shared! | review_rating:4, text:Excellent ambience. Makes you feel you are in Bali more than Malaysia. Food presentation is good & food is served relatively quickly. The portion is huge and more than adequate for two persons to share. Only the grilled chicken seems a bit tough. Would have been better if they had used fresh chicken. | review_rating:3, text:2nd visit to this chain restaurant.

Personally the dishes aren't quite my taste, everything seems a bit bland or not much flavor n  too oily for me either grilled or fried dish.

The same side dish is served at every rice set dish.

Chicken chop looks a bit over fried, it is a bit too dry.

Grill chicken is very oily.

Original serving of the pulut hita drink is too sweet... Should request for less sugar.

Somehow the food presentation is awesome.

Everyone has got different expectations n preferences on food taste.

The management has a great way of promoting the restaurant with a free birthday meal...... | review_rating:5, text:Big portion. We only ordered 2 mains and a dessert, and left the place full! Delicious grilled chicken and nasi campur. The pisang bakar dessert was outstanding as well. The wait can be a little long. | review_rating:5, text:Loved this restaurant! It has a stunning Bali vibe, and the decor is simply amazing, perfectly complementing the Indo-Bali cuisine. It was our first visit, as we came to celebrate a birthday. All the dishes were great, the Tipat Cantuk stood out as my favorite.

Visited on a weekday around 7pm and waited about 20 minutes in front of the restaurant after receiving a waiting number. A phone call/watsapp notification for our turn would have been more convenient.

name: Pazzion
location: LG1.125, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:We dropped by this place for ladies shoes. They have a nice variety of shoe styles from casual to formal and even some with bling. They have some handbags too. The staff was helpful and friendly and we managed to find a nice pair of shoes to buy. | review_rating:5, text:After being quite taken aback from visiting a larger department store within the same complex, and seeing their lack of leather footwear on offer, I was delighted to come across Pazzion at Sunway Pyramid.😊 Extremely helpful and friendly staff, who also gave appropriate recommendations according to me specifications without being salesy or pushy - Came away with two pairs of excellent quality, unique and beautiful leather shoes to add to the wardrobe. Thank you!🙏🏼💖 | review_rating:5, text:PAZZION Malaysia at Sunway Pyramid is a super cute shoe store! They have a great selection of shoes, from sandals to heels, and the styles are all really trendy. The store is well-decorated and has a cozy vibe. The staff are friendly and always ready to help you find the perfect pair of shoes. The prices are a bit on the high side, but the quality is worth it. I always leave the store feeling super stylish! | review_rating:5, text:Friendly and helpful staffs. No hard-selling at the same time. Great experience here. | review_rating:5, text:Great place to shop for handbags and shoes. Staffs here really friendly and helpful when you need suggestions and assistance.

name: DEKORI
category: dessert_shop, confectionery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG 1. 18A, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Visited this dessert shop for the first time and noted that there was no physical menu available; instead, there was a small iPad screen, which made it difficult to view options. Additionally, many items were unavailable. The shop was quite crowded on a Sunday evening, and I waited nearly 20 minutes for one bingsu to be prepared. In terms of flavor, it was acceptable but rather plain, and I found the prices to be on the higher side. Based on this experience, I am unlikely to return. | review_rating:3, text:Service were efficient both at the order counter n food preparations. Portion seems small n condiments too, not as much as expected, compared to the price. Taste wise was ok n like the option to add how much sugar to taste. Will come again for others | review_rating:2, text:The service was so bad. They had no menu on the counter, it was just an iPad screen which was so small. Then when we wanted order some desserts we chose, the worker said there wasn’t any stock for the taro. Then after we decided on another dessert to order, he again told us there is no stock again. So frustrating. He could have just told us before us choosing that there are some items that aren’t available.

overall the food was okay. A bit pricey for the boba taufufa. such a small bowl for like the price of Rm 20.

For the snowflake strawberry yogurt, it was too high and when you eat it, it will just drop on the tray. So just keep in mind it’s very high risk in wastage. | review_rating:1, text:Not worth it!!! Not worth the price!!!
Dekori used to be my go-to dessert, however not anymore…
The portion become much smaller, with the toppings become lesser, which you can even see the shaved ice at the bottom of the toppings….
Disappointed… | review_rating:5, text:had pearl milk tea taufufa.

name: QCD
location: F1, 50 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Overall, my experience with this service provider is HORRIBLE.

On the 21/11/2024, I bought my AirPods 4 in Nu Sentral @ Machines.
However, on the 29/11/2024, I found out that my left side AirPods had this windy sound which should not be there. I went to the nearest Machines and they told me that I have to go for their service provider, which the nearest is Sunway Pyramid for me.

First Visit (29/11): After getting my AirPods diagnosed, the staff and the technician said it was fine. I was very doubtful, and I left. BUT! The issue came back again! So, I booked another appointment with the service provider.

Second Visit (30/11): I left my AirPods with them again and I agreed to the 3-7 days checking.

Third Visit (3/12): I was told that my AirPods were fine. SHOCKED with the outcome, I tested the AirPods in front of them and the issue is STILL THERE. I even told the staff to try it out, and the staff let the technician tried it out too.
Guess what? THEY JUST CONFIRMED THE ISSUE RIGHT IN FRONT OF ME.

I was like: Wait, I waited FOR NOTHING.

The pissed off moment was: Even though I bought my AirPods on the 21/11, I have not done ANY damages to it (why would I? RM829 weyh), I solely DESERVE a full-on exchange of the product.

But? The service provider staff SAID NO. You have to leave the AirPods 4 AGAIN to check if the issue persists.

I was like: WAIT. HOLD UP. You just confessed that there IS an issue. Why do you need to wait for it again?
I demanded a full-on exchange of the ENTIRE product. The staff had to go back and called the manager (WHO, BY THE WAY, HE/SHE ISN’T EVEN IN THE OFFICE).
Furiously, I demanded to talk to the manager on the phone, but the staff refused to.
After the bickering, the staff went back in the room, came out, and agreed to swap THE LEFT SIDE OF THE AIRPODS 4.
I was like, NO WAY. I am entitled to have a full exchange of the product.

Conclusion:-
1. I am still waiting for another 3-7 days.
2. I want a full-on exchange (didn’t get it)
3. And the manager isn’t there at all.

Unprofessional and betrayed by the service of Machines and this service provider.

I will keep on updating my complaint.

10/12/2024
Update:-
My issue has been resolved on the 7/12/2024. There was a Malay lady and Nabil who attended me when I went to pick my AirPods 4 up.  | review_rating:3, text:I sent my phone for repair since it’s still under warranty period, the personnel told me it will take 3-7 working days. I called after 7 working day as the phone is not ready for collection, the person who pick up the call is so unfriendly, anything I asked also reply with one word, usually “ No” is the answer. Don’t she knows that she is in servicing line and need to handle customers’ queries? Not helpful at all, end up I have to Apple directly | review_rating:5, text:I recently had an issue with my phone battery and was assisted by the staff, Nabil. He was incredibly helpful and explained the problem clearly, mentioning that the battery replacement would require removing my brand-new screen protector. I was a bit sad about that, but he reassured me he would try his best to save it. Not only did he manage to save and perfectly reapply the screen protector, but the entire process was completed in precisely 3 hours as promised. His attention to detail and excellent service really stood out. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:QCD has taken my complaint about the green screen problem seriously. They explained clearly on the conditions for replacement of the screen with estimated duration. QCD staff politely answers all my curiosity and questions. Thank you to Nabil, Danial, David and all. | review_rating:5, text:Good services by Nabil. Attended by him with a friendly and good checking. Detected battery swollen. Stated the price for battery and service terms and condition clearly before accepting device to be submitted.

Less than 24hours called by Nabil to collect the device. Good service and report by Syed to apple team. Definitely good experience as iphone user.
