name: Toilet
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing time dining here with my family. We love the Pizza here very much! It’s delicious! The pizza are made from sourdough. The thickness of the pizza  is just how I like my pizza to be. As for the price? It is alright for us considering how large it is. The service was good.. warm and friendly. Will definitely come back here again! Definitely one of my favourite pizza place now for sure! | review_rating:5, text:The pizza was absolutely amazing, taste and size. Came here with my family and all of us enjoyed it. We ordered beef pepperoni since it’s a classic, tried the crab and bacon pizza, and mac & cheese which all are delicious and thin crust just the way we like it. The drinks also are nice. Service was immaculate, friendly and accommodating. Definitely will come again. Do say Hi to Chef Gordon 😁. | review_rating:3, text:The pizza is a disappointment. It is not piping hot when served. Probably was cooked earlier? The dough is not soft and the toppings are too little for the price paid - RM 62 for one. I rather have a small pizza full of good toppings than a big one with sparsely scattered toppings. Also with such big size pizza, you can't even try other things.

There's no place to wash your hands. I have to use the mall's toilet. I thought pizza is supposed to be eaten by hand? Street pizza right?

Fortunately, the service staff are good. | review_rating:5, text:Good service and good food. We ordered bottomless pizza and drinks, can unlimited until your full. The service team and head chef very nice service. Our annual anniversary very happy. Thanks you so much, must come again. | review_rating:3, text:I feel that the food is quite average. Pizza was okay, couldn't really taste the pulled lamb on the pizza. The signature French fries with fried chicken and baked with cheese also so so. The French fries was a bit soggy. The beef lasagne was slightly warm and it is not served hot. Hence overall the experience was average and the food price is on the high side. Likely, we won't be visiting again.

name: Tea Garden
location: LG1.40 & 1.41, Lower Ground 1, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Tea Garden Restaurant at Sunway Pyramid is an absolute gem for anyone looking for delicious Halal-certified Chinese cuisine with a great variety of dishes. The food was fresh, flavorful, and well-presented, making for an excellent dining experience.

We ordered the fried rice, porridge, and stir-fried radish cake, and every dish was perfectly cooked with the right balance of seasoning. The fried rice was aromatic, packed with shrimp and eggs, while the porridge was silky smooth with crispy shallots and fresh spring onions. The radish cake had a nice crisp exterior with soft, flavorful bites.

The ambiance is warm and inviting, perfect for families and friends. The service was fast and friendly, ensuring we had a pleasant meal. With their Halal certification, this restaurant is a great spot for Muslims who love authentic Chinese flavors.

Highly recommend for those craving quality comfort food in a cozy setting. Definitely coming back! | review_rating:4, text:Food is not bad. I actually wanted to go to another restaurant but they were having blackout issue so my Mrs suggested this shop and their Radish Cake.

It’s really nice. The coffee was also as how I asked for it, less sugar.

There is plenty of other dishes which I wanted to try out but I didn’t have much time to couldn’t try others.

Service is good. Nice ambiance.

Ohh and they have HALAL cert. | review_rating:3, text:The Restaurant is serving local food. The local bread dish like roti bakar is not up to the local standards. Can get better options. Nasi Lemak and meehoon is a little above average | review_rating:5, text:Although I’ve been staying in this area for around two years, this was my first time trying this restaurant.

It’s in a corner of the mall, and I only just noticed it.

The restaurant mainly serves Malaysian cuisine, and I ordered the cendol and fried kuey teow. The food was average, but the ambiance and staff service were good. The serving pace was also fast. | review_rating:2, text:The white coffee ice was a total let down. It's diluted/ watery. They skimmed on ice. By the time the ice fully melted, the coffee became near tasteless. The nasi lemak rendang I had was so so.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: QCD
location: F1, 50 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Overall, my experience with this service provider is HORRIBLE.

On the 21/11/2024, I bought my AirPods 4 in Nu Sentral @ Machines.
However, on the 29/11/2024, I found out that my left side AirPods had this windy sound which should not be there. I went to the nearest Machines and they told me that I have to go for their service provider, which the nearest is Sunway Pyramid for me.

First Visit (29/11): After getting my AirPods diagnosed, the staff and the technician said it was fine. I was very doubtful, and I left. BUT! The issue came back again! So, I booked another appointment with the service provider.

Second Visit (30/11): I left my AirPods with them again and I agreed to the 3-7 days checking.

Third Visit (3/12): I was told that my AirPods were fine. SHOCKED with the outcome, I tested the AirPods in front of them and the issue is STILL THERE. I even told the staff to try it out, and the staff let the technician tried it out too.
Guess what? THEY JUST CONFIRMED THE ISSUE RIGHT IN FRONT OF ME.

I was like: Wait, I waited FOR NOTHING.

The pissed off moment was: Even though I bought my AirPods on the 21/11, I have not done ANY damages to it (why would I? RM829 weyh), I solely DESERVE a full-on exchange of the product.

But? The service provider staff SAID NO. You have to leave the AirPods 4 AGAIN to check if the issue persists.

I was like: WAIT. HOLD UP. You just confessed that there IS an issue. Why do you need to wait for it again?
I demanded a full-on exchange of the ENTIRE product. The staff had to go back and called the manager (WHO, BY THE WAY, HE/SHE ISN’T EVEN IN THE OFFICE).
Furiously, I demanded to talk to the manager on the phone, but the staff refused to.
After the bickering, the staff went back in the room, came out, and agreed to swap THE LEFT SIDE OF THE AIRPODS 4.
I was like, NO WAY. I am entitled to have a full exchange of the product.

Conclusion:-
1. I am still waiting for another 3-7 days.
2. I want a full-on exchange (didn’t get it)
3. And the manager isn’t there at all.

Unprofessional and betrayed by the service of Machines and this service provider.

I will keep on updating my complaint.

10/12/2024
Update:-
My issue has been resolved on the 7/12/2024. There was a Malay lady and Nabil who attended me when I went to pick my AirPods 4 up.  | review_rating:3, text:I sent my phone for repair since it’s still under warranty period, the personnel told me it will take 3-7 working days. I called after 7 working day as the phone is not ready for collection, the person who pick up the call is so unfriendly, anything I asked also reply with one word, usually “ No” is the answer. Don’t she knows that she is in servicing line and need to handle customers’ queries? Not helpful at all, end up I have to Apple directly | review_rating:5, text:I recently had an issue with my phone battery and was assisted by the staff, Nabil. He was incredibly helpful and explained the problem clearly, mentioning that the battery replacement would require removing my brand-new screen protector. I was a bit sad about that, but he reassured me he would try his best to save it. Not only did he manage to save and perfectly reapply the screen protector, but the entire process was completed in precisely 3 hours as promised. His attention to detail and excellent service really stood out. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:QCD has taken my complaint about the green screen problem seriously. They explained clearly on the conditions for replacement of the screen with estimated duration. QCD staff politely answers all my curiosity and questions. Thank you to Nabil, Danial, David and all. | review_rating:5, text:Good services by Nabil. Attended by him with a friendly and good checking. Detected battery swollen. Stated the price for battery and service terms and condition clearly before accepting device to be submitted.

Less than 24hours called by Nabil to collect the device. Good service and report by Syed to apple team. Definitely good experience as iphone user.

name: Acer Concept Store
category: electronics_store, wholesaler, consultant, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1.AV. 106, 107A, 108, 119, 120A & 121, Asian Avenue, Sunway pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:I had a great experience at the Acer Official Concept Store at Sunway Pyramid. The customer service was friendly, professional, and informative, helping me find exactly what I was looking for. Although the store isn’t very large, it’s well-organized and packed with a good selection of Acer laptops and accessories. I was impressed with the affordable prices and managed to purchase a laptop for under RM3,000. The staff even helped me install antivirus software on the spot, making the entire process smooth and convenient. Highly satisfied with the service here! | review_rating:5, text:I had an excellent experience at the Acer Laptop Store. The staff specially Abullah was friendly and knowledgeable, helping me find the perfect laptop for my needs. The selection was impressive, with various models available at competitive prices. Plus, the warranty options provided extra peace of mind. I highly recommend this store for anyone in the market for an Acer laptop! | review_rating:5, text:I had a FANTASTIC time with Abdullah here. He was very patient, I came several times, had a million questions, and he handled all of it extremely professionally, on top of being super friendly. The products on display are quite variegated, and it seems there a laptop for every type of customer. There's high-end laptops, affordable units, as well as gaming options, and for all of them, the deals are great compared to what I saw in Low Yat. Well done guys! Happy customer :) | review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful experience at the Acer Laptop Store, largely thanks to Abdullah. He was very helpful and well-informed, assisting me in selecting the perfect laptop for my requirements. The store offered a wide variety of models at reasonable prices. Abdullah's friendly support made my visit enjoyable and stress-free. I highly recommend this store for anyone searching for an Acer laptop! | review_rating:5, text:I recently made a purchase of acer swift go 14 in the sunway pyramid acer store. The salesperson (Rehan) was friendly and professional while introducing which model met my study requirements (basic programming and stuff). I really enjoyed the visit and purchase, which came along with affordable student price.

location: LG1.110A, Sunway Pyramid (Blue Atrium No, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Ordered my DIY bowl. Was disappointed with it. Couscous came in cold. Chicken was cold too. The whole bowl was cold in general. Ordered the aglio olio and it was ok in general. Eat only if you’re in a rush and health conscious. | review_rating:1, text:I ordered through Foodpanda, and the salmon was BAD! The texture was soft and mushy. I got a stomachache after eating just 1/3 of it before realizing how awful the salmon cubes were. Seriously, this is TERRIBLE! How can you not check your food quality before sending it out to customers? | review_rating:5, text:I order the wholesome bowl, food is good. The staff was very nice and helpful, I was able to use my voucher from Grab Food successfully. | review_rating:2, text:I don’t like this kind of wrap quality oh. Look at the photo how much liquid drip out the moment I hold up the wrap trying to eat it. The wrap also did not heat up. Wrap ingredients are cold. Not appetizing. | review_rating:5, text:Fresh ingredients, wide selection of toppings, generous food portion and the juices are freshly squeeze with no sugar added.
Food prices are decent.
Definitely one of my regular go-to place for healthy eats.

name: Dragon-i Peking Duck
location: GF.43, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a pleasant experience here! As soon as we arrived, we were assigned a great seat with a full view of Sunway Lagoon and comfy sofa chairs, perfect for relaxing. The service was decent, nothing extraordinary but no complaints either. The food was nice, standard and consistent, so you can’t really go wrong with the taste. Overall, it was a solid experience, and I’ll definitely be coming back! | review_rating:5, text:Love their pecking duck, it's absolutely fresh n very yummy. We always come here for duck. The rest of the food on the menu is good too, great to service, very attentive and polite. Nawl Mang is excellent. We are attended by him., and he's very good 👍👍👍 | review_rating:5, text:Excellent food and service paired with a classy Chinese-inspired aesthetic. We tried many dishes, and all were delicious. The staff were very welcoming, and always topped off our drinks without asking and with a smile!

Our favourite dish was the red braised pork (红烧肉), which had a perfectly balanced sauce and meat that melted in the mouth. The truffle xiao long bao were good too, albeit the truffle aroma was not as strong as other competitors. Every other dish was good.

Overall a great place to dine for authentic and delicious Chinese food, highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Very popular Chinese restaurant since decade of time ago, not cheap price but the quality is there.
Definitely a place suitable for family or a group of friends to have 吃饭叫菜
三杯鸡 nice, recommend!
肉碎长豆 nice, recommend!
番茄炒蛋 I feel this one so so because they cook with capsicum which I think tomato egg should remain tomato and egg only

If you are alone or two pax only, can order their fried rice, tang bao or noodles. | review_rating:5, text:Over the years, the food at Dragon-i has really improved, especially the 小笼包, which is incredibly delicious. The thin skin wraps around the flavorful soup, making you keep eating basket after basket until your wallet is empty. The other dishes are also quite good, and the Mee tarik is very tasty too.

location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:We dropped by this apparel shop and managed to buy a couple of items. They have a variety of jeans brands and prices are reasonable. A good place to look for jeans. | review_rating:5, text:First time buying jeans from here, recommended from my friend. Quality not bad. Salesperson Cik Wana was really helpful in choosing the right and the best jeans for me. Thank you, Wana! | review_rating:5, text:Had a really good & pleasant experience. Staff by the name of Kit was so helpful & was always on standby to help you the moment you exit the fitting room. Top notch customer service skills. Keep it up! | review_rating:5, text:I'm not sure why there are some bad reviews about this place and the boss. I am a large bodied person and I have been going to this shop for many years and my experience with the workers and the boss has been very pleasent. The boss is very friendly and always smiling and joking. He even remembered me from pre-covid. It is like some of the reviewers are talking about a different shop altogether. | review_rating:2, text:Came here. As per previous revire by the ex-staff, can understand why. As the boss is always shouting and annoys his staff in front of the customers.   I felt the staffs services are already good to us, only because their boss sitting there and nag them, they are not seems enjoy working there..
The boss himself are Not customer friendly at all, we bargain for the price if cant, can tell nicely but he is not . He need to change attitude if want do a good business.

name: GF Ice Rink Railing
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

reviews: review_rating:1, text:Staff looks professional but with zero attitude aka ‘annoying’. I just want to buy one makeup product, very straight forward to the product and not even trying first. Yet they still ‘passing around’ among them who will treat the customer which is looks super anonoying. name: Sephora
location: Lot G1.132 & G1.132A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:The sales girl assist well, she introduce according to your needs, but some ready stock might sold, please double check the stock first when you eye on certain product to avoid disappointment.
She also assist me to get the sold out item in Sephora apps and I receive the product in 1-2 days time after payment done. It’s free shipping, if you still considering whether to get the product or not, ask them check the stock in apps too, so that you can consider a few more days.
Shop smart! | review_rating:1, text:I recently visited Sephora to inquire about a tinted moisturizer, and while the consultant initially seemed helpful, things took a sharp turn when I decided not to make a purchase. Her attitude shifted noticeably, and she walked off without so much as a polite closing remark. I understand that not every consultation leads to a sale, but being professional and courteous shouldn’t depend on the customer’s buying decision.

It was disappointing to feel dismissed for simply taking time to consider my options. Sephora is known for creating a welcoming shopping environment, but this experience fell short. I hope this feedback can serve as a reminder to maintain consistency in customer service, regardless of the outcome. | review_rating:5, text:Had a wonderful experience with Alice from Sephora Sunway Pyramid today.
Thank you Alice for being so helpful and kind in helping me with my exchange today, and also for going out of your way to ensure I would be able to get what I needed! Your attitude is exactly what many other Sephora sales associates should strive to emulate. | review_rating:5, text:We had a couple of great experiences shopping at Sephora in Sunway Pyramid.

Just for your information, the beauty consultant Ms Alya Wong is very well versed in beauty products. On top of that, she is also very approachable and listens to the needs of her clients.

All in all, we are very satisfied with her professionalism and the assistance she had rendered us while shopping at Sephora (Sunway Pyramid).

Thank You, Ms Alya Wong... | review_rating:5, text:They have stock for most of the items. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Tourists get 5% off when they show their passport ( hard or soft copy).

name: Ramen Bankara
location: Unit LG2.131A, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Order their weekend only available dish call Kiwami Bankara Ramen RM39. 90 & Tonkotsu Ramen RM25.90.
To be honest, among these 2, still prefer Tonkotsu.More cheaper & tasty in my opinion.
Kiwami very oily & not thick enough the taste.
Adding tamago egg & osen tamago egg with RM4 & RM3 respectively.
Honey Almond sago with mint taste good and refreshing.
Recommended for those who would like to eat ramen can give it a try. | review_rating:4, text:Food & Price:

Total price: RM101.95 (incld 16% tax)

1. Ramen Bankara - RM25.90 - The soup is strong with pork broth, it really comes from the pork bone essence. Taste very nice and ramen is chewy and good.
2. Tsukemen - RM30 - This is special, and had stronger taste. Ramen is much thicker and chewy than Bankara.
3. Chicken Nanban - RM21 - The nanban sauce is mix with mayo, egg and some salad. And the chicken although not hot, but crispy. The mixture of it is nice.
4. Almond Drink - RM11 - Their handmade honey almond drink, it is very dense and the almond taste will not too strong until you hardly accept it. The honey did neutralise the almond flavour.

Environment:
- Environment is good and comfortable.

Overall, it is good choice for ramen, just the price range is slightly at the high side. Recommend 👍🏼 | review_rating:4, text:Tried their recommended Kakuni Bankara, the broth base is shoyu, so expect a quite high level of saltiness. The pork belly has been cooking for so long, it just melts as soon as your chopsticks touch it. Not my kind of noodles, it's on the thicker side, but it grabs onto the broth very well. Just wished they given us the option to choose the level doneness of the noodles. The tsukemen is probably three times the salty level of the ramen, but it's good none the less. The option to add garlic tableside was great. Really elevates the flavour of the broth. | review_rating:4, text:Tried their tonkatsu broth and is flavorsome and thick. Although too salty for me, but will probably suit those who prefers strong flavors. The kakuni and chasiu is tender and juicy,  5 ⭐. If there's a bone to pick, I would prefer to savour a bowl of ramen that costs more than RM40 from a ceramic bowl rather than melamine ones. The rest is all good.

Service is excellent with friendly smiles. | review_rating:5, text:Ramen Bankara at Sunway Pyramid offers a fantastic dining experience for ramen lovers. The tonkotsu broth is rich, flavorful, and comforting, and the noodles are perfectly cooked. The menu offers a variety of options, from classic ramen to delicious side dishes. The ambiance is cozy, and the service is friendly and efficient. It’s a great spot for a hearty meal, especially after a day of shopping. Highly recommended for anyone craving a satisfying bowl of ramen!

name: Sisters Crispy Popiah
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:It’s been more than 10 years since my last visit. The filling still as crispy as before. Ideal place to grab quick meal. But they forgot to ask me whether I want it to be spicy or not. | review_rating:4, text:If you looking for a quick bite to eat, this is the place to be. There are chairs for you to sit to enjoy the popiah or take away. I liked the crispy crunch inside the popiah. Flavourful but a bit salty for me. One standard popiah cost RM6.50 for one or two for RM12. If you like the spicy one, they have it too. I had one first then later went shopping and ordered another one before going home. Yum | review_rating:5, text:One of the best among all sisters crispy popiah. Have a few chair to sit and dine in. | review_rating:5, text:Taste good.
Have a few stool for dine in | review_rating:5, text:I have ordered the mix which cost me RM12, a little expensive but I think it's worth the price. Abit loose but the flavor is chef kiss, definitely will come back again

name: The Boring Coco
location: LG1.25, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:small seat yet nice to chill and enjoy coconut shake & icecream 🍨
their ice cream is superb! | review_rating:5, text:Finally found Coconut Blended drink (with or without ice cream) in Klang Valley that is delicious! I don't have to go far away anymore for Coconut drink!
Recommended to try! | review_rating:5, text:Had my coconut ice cream at Sunway Pyramid outlet today. Absolutely love it. Personal opinion, better than "the other" brand.

The ingredients use here is fresh. Had mine with peanuts, nata and coconut flakes. You'll definitely know if your nuts are not fresh.

The sweetness of the ice cream is just spot on. Not too overpowering. And it is just so creamy and smooth, like how a good quality ice cream should be.

Will come back again. | review_rating:1, text:Just bought their fresh coconut drink. Totally disappointed with the drink. Charged me RM10.90 but gave me an iced water. The staff said it is like water because there’s no sugar. I couldn’t believe the reply from them. I’m am sure they made a mistake because I can differentiate the taste of water and fresh coconut with no sugar. Will never buy from them again. Just hope I don’t get sick because of what they served. | review_rating:5, text:Need to write review before can redeem birthday gift. Will update honest opinion after trying!

Updated:-
Taste: somewhere in the middle, not the best but not too bad too. If I had to pay rm13+ for it, there is another stall that sells better coconut shake at half the price, but not near pyramid la 🥲

name: Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant
category: cafe, chinese_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot F1.73, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Cozy Atmosphere with Hit-or-Miss Dishes

The atmosphere is cozy and comfortable, with air conditioning making it a pleasant place to dine. However, do note that weekends can get busy, and you might need to queue.

As for the food, the polo bun is a standout—fresh and flavorful. The cheese rice is decent but has room for improvement. The croissant egg tart, while unique, was a bit too sweet for my taste, though others might enjoy it more.

Overall, it's worth a visit for the cozy ambiance and to try the signature items. | review_rating:2, text:Came in for lunch and we ordered the wanton soup noodle and the steamed pork patty with salted fish. I must say the presentation of the actual food is not as great and with the price at this range, I just can't  justify the value. The taste is alright, can't say there is any wow factor that will keep me coming back to this restaurant where never I have craving for Hong kee food. | review_rating:3, text:Overall experience was pleasant, food is good. The polo bun is nice and a must order.

What was unpleasant is the shark fin soup. Looks unappetizing and with the price of 16.90, nothing was inside the soup other than a few pieces of sliced mushroom | review_rating:5, text:New popular place to dine and chill. I’m very impressed with the quality of food here, especially the Char Siew and Roasted Pork Belly. The curry fishball was really tasty especially the curry, goes well with the fried rice! The milk tea was super fragrant, must be from the “Black & White evaporated milk”. The desserts like Chendol and 杨枝甘露 were very good as well so please reserve some stomach space for them! Park near lift lobby C! | review_rating:4, text:curry pork chop is very good.  oink is cooked to perfect intersection of tender and toothsome, with the curry providing taste and the breading texture.  potatoes are likewise done to perfection.

outside seating on the atrium does not lead itself to degustation.  so pick interior seat if you intend to enjoy the food.

location: Lot LG 2.77,LG2 Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Yesterday i bought the herbs of gold q10, there is promotion if buy 1 can get free fish oil, but they did not inform me about the promotion. And then, they did not inform that the nutrigo q10 has buy 2 box free 1 bottle promotion. They did not check properly before letting the customer know, we got the promotion at others outlet. I bought so many from this place yesterday but staff there dont even bother to check on the promotion for me. Bad service | review_rating:5, text:The BEST Pharmacy in KL 👏 I placed an urgent BIG order and they made sure it happened exactly as discussed. Full trust in their ability and service 🥳 Well done Team 👍 Cheers. Dr Aly, FANZCA Anaesthetist | review_rating:5, text:The staff here are awesome especially Kausalyaa and Agalya. Very helpful and knowledgeable about the products. Managed to introduce the right supplements for customers. Highly recommended | review_rating:5, text:One of the best pharmacy in Malaysia!
Let's join their membership ship & get more rewards & benefits!
Good service & good product 💯 | review_rating:1, text:The cashier misled the customer. When the customer wanted to make a payment and gave her the Sunway Pals card to scan, she said the payment had to be made first. Then she asked if I had a Caring membership. After giving her the membership and making the payment, she said that after using the Caring member card, the Sunway Pals card couldn't be used. What a joke!!

name: Haidilao Hotpot
location: G1.PT.02 Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I have been to Hai Di Lao Sunway Pyramid many times, but this visit truly stood out thanks to the exceptional service provided by 繆聪治. His cheerful demeanor and constant smile made my dining experience extra enjoyable.

What impressed me the most was his thoughtful gesture when he found out my birthday is next week. Following the restaurant’s SOP, he brought out a complimentary birthday cake, but this time, he went above and beyond by using creative plating techniques that gave the presentation a fine dining touch. It was truly memorable and made me feel so special!

Thank you, 繆聪治, for your outstanding service and attention to detail. I will definitely be returning and recommending this place to friends and family! | review_rating:5, text:Had a good dining experience between 2pm to 5pm so it’s not too crowded. Soup broth was thick (加浓), and the ingredients were so fresh! Love the free flow desserts (ice cream, soy bean curd, ice jelly, and hot white fungus.  Another Kano Delighter was the photo printing station, what a delight to be able to print 3 photos! | review_rating:5, text:Finding parking in Sunway Pyramid is kinda headache during weekend. No queue when arrive this restaurant. It was surprisingly that we got the same table like last time. Food is great and fresh although massively overpriced. We ordered 4 hotpot soup with different base. All soups are tasty. My family was really enjoying the lunch here. | review_rating:5, text:It so great to have this Eng yik jun 邢偉俊to serve us today, we felt very welcome from him & giving us very great service & he has good knowledge to recommend & assisting to introduce the today’s special menu/food; it’s indeed our lucky day to visit this Hai Di Lau outlet today. | review_rating:3, text:Even though the food is fresh, the prices are on the high side.

They were having a promotion and one of the waitresses and a waiter would do a song and dance for you. A promotional novelty.

The place is clean and the service is rather attentive even though there is one waiter serving 5 to 6 tables.

You get 4 different types of soup which were good. The tomato base soup is good for those not able to handle spicy soup.

The ice cream stick servednis the local ice cream and the fruit  slices were fresh especially the watermelon pieces.

name: Surau
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Za Altera
location: B1, Blue Atrium, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had previously taken my jeans to another place for alterations, but unfortunately, they made a mistake that I thought was beyond fixing. However, when I brought my jeans here, the staff,
Nang was incredibly friendly and offered great suggestions on how to salvage them. Their service was not only affordable but also demonstrated excellent workmanship. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Have been to this tailor multiple times; they have always provided excellent service. Have had my jeans and Indian traditional costume tailored here, and it was well done. I have also used their express service to tailor clothes then would be needed the same day, and they did not disappoint by providing to my needs and not cutting ends or quality to meet the short-time demand.

The Indian uncle tailor was really helpful and understand well what was needed to be tailored without much explanation and the cashier was also very friendly and helpful too.

I have also firsthand seen them service their other customer beyond needed to ensure that customer have received their goods and needs are met.

Would highly recommend this tailor for your tailoring needs. | review_rating:5, text:Exceptional Alteration Service – Highly Recommended!

I’ve been using Dua Za Altera’s alteration services for over five years, and they have never disappointed me. Their craftsmanship is impeccable, and the results always exceed my expectations. Whether it’s minor adjustments or major alterations, they handle everything with precision and professionalism.

I’m extremely satisfied with their service, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for top-quality alterations. Thank you, Za Altera Pyramid, for your excellent work!

Let me know if you want any refinements! | review_rating:5, text:Ning is such a sweetheart, I came here needing urgent alteration for my jeans, and they did it so fast. Worth the price, I’m a fan now❤️ | review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic experience at this alteration shop! The staff was professional, friendly, and paid great attention to detail. They altered my clothes perfectly, and the fit was exactly what I wanted. Highly recomended！

name: Mission-Q
location: F1.19A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Was a great experience and very fun and interactive! The physicality was great with a lot of rooms and different challenges with various puzzles. Nicole and Noelle was great hosts and game masters explaining the game very thorough and helpful!
Amazing stuff, will come back for more rooms! | review_rating:5, text:Such an awesome adventure playing Tomb of Life & Death - one of my fave games so far. Besides Midnight Inn at the 1 Utama location. Daniel and Elisha were super awesome crew guiding us thru the whole amazing experience. Loved the design and challenges. Will def come back! Great work!!!! Highly recommended escape room!!!! | review_rating:5, text:Just done experiencing one of the best escape room in Sunway! The environment of the front desk is very welcoming, we were served by Nicole, as she's our master for the game. I played saving King Arthur, and it was fun! We did used 2 hints, and Ken came and helped us with the hints! Fun games, indeed. Recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Elisha & Nicole were extremely helpful throughout the game! We did the game “saving king arthur”, the story and puzzles were enjoyable! However I did wished certain exits could’ve been more discreet - it’s a bit difficult to escape (physically) where people walk in&out staring at us. Regardless, wonderful experience, would definitely return to try other rooms! | review_rating:5, text:I had such a fun and challenging time at Mission Q! It's a puzzle-based escape room experience with different themed rooms, each with its own unique story. We tried the "Saving King Arthur" room, which involved rescuing a king, and "The Harvest," a backstory with missing organs—both were creative and engaging! The difficulty levels and physical activity vary per room, and even though we chose the lower difficulty ones, they still tested our brainpower quite a bit! 😂 We managed to escape both rooms we attempted, which was a great accomplishment for us. You’re also allowed up to three clues from the staff, which definitely helped without giving too much away.

Speaking of the staff, Elisha and Ken were fantastic,both were super helpful and polite throughout. Whenever we got stuck, they provided just the right amount of micro clues, letting us figure things out without spoiling the puzzles. I really appreciated that. They were also knowledgeable and answered all our questions with ease.

Overall, it was a fun and interesting experience, and I thoroughly enjoyed it with my siblings. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a challenging yet enjoyable escape room experience!You're lucky if you had the same staffs as mine, Elisha and Ken.

name: Jaya Grocer
category: grocery_store, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2-130, Lower Ground Floor 2, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Jaya Grocer at Sunway Pyramid was an overwhelming experience, earning it 3 stars. The store was packed with people, and the atmosphere felt chaotic, making it difficult to shop comfortably. The crowd seemed impatient, adding to the sense of suffocation as I navigated the aisles. While the selection of products is good, I would much prefer grocery shopping in a setting that feels calm and organized. For those planning a visit, I recommend coming during quieter times to avoid the busy rush. Overall, it’s a decent grocery spot but best enjoyed when the crowds are minimal. | review_rating:5, text:12 November 2024 - Yes! finally it is opened at the permanent location, congratulations! It look good and cozy but it is below my expectations due to space as it is not as big as the branches in Jaya Shopping Centre PJ, Starling Mall PJ and Sunway GEO Avenue. Anyway, so far so good but lots of work on improvement on shelf arrangements, merchandise displays and stabilisation of the self service cashier check out counters need to be done, as this is the very good potential location in Subang Jaya area.

Before November 2024 - This is the 2nd temporary outlet after forced to moved down from LG2 due to major renovation after AEON moved out (after 20 years there) from the mall. This time the outlet look more better feel with space & more variety of items. Hope it can be ready with permanent outlet at LG2 by December 2024 for Christmas with big space & different from others outlet | review_rating:1, text:I rarely give bad reviews but i've bought a tray of kampung eggs (exp. far away) from Jaya Grocer Sunway Pyramid on Dec 24, 2024—6-7 were rotten and black.

Raised a serious food safety concern with Nutriplus and customer service, but the response was pathetic. Days passed with no meaningful reply or action. No escalation to a manager, no urgency, just radio silence. And to top it off, they tried upselling me in their response? Are you kidding? Food safety isn’t optional—this should’ve been addressed immediately, with proper follow-up and resolution.

Jaya Grocer CS, learn from ZUS Coffee  they don’t mess around when customers raise valid concerns. Step it up. | review_rating:1, text:12/2/24 , just bought crispy roast pork at jaya grocer sunway pyramid costs me $18.67 but gave me all hard skin n not fresh one. i used to buy at jaya grocer empire subang n no issue. my son used to eat tis but tis time he was upset as all are hard skin n cant eat at all. super duper angry n cheated ppl $ | review_rating:4, text:Great place to stock up on food and supplies. It is basically the Fairprice of Malaysia, only comparable to Lotus or  Costco. Many foods that are imported from the US, and honestly a whole lot of people. More checkouts should definitely be implemented. Otherwise, this is a great supermarket as a whole!

name: SHOPLOOOH
location: LG1.76, Sunway Pyramid Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Used to be fans of Shoploooh, always wanted to support local brand but the price getting more and more expensive with poor quality & very simple design, 79 for a singlet! Definitely not worth for it... | review_rating:5, text:I was greeted very warmly by a kind petite lady as I entered the outlet. She actively suggested few outfits for me without behaving pushy, making me really comfortable with her service! Their clothes are of good quality too, definitely reasonable at the price point. Keep it up! ♥︎ | review_rating:5, text:Shoploooh set their aesthetic line. Street fashion, Office wear and many different styles. Good quality fabrics and unique design. A boutique that you are able to find clothing that suit your needs as well as gifts to friends and family. | review_rating:2, text:Understand limitation of customer entering shop to follow sop. But when queue up and stand outside and staff already saw it just ignore us and no smiling. Suggest that staff could have greetings with customer even customer waiting.Even we get inside, the lady boss not smiling at all like we owe her money. The fitting room side Indian staff serve good and have recommendations for outfit. | review_rating:1, text:Went to this shop with my sister. We paid the bill separately. I bought 5 units while my sister bought 2 units. I made payment first. The counter lady informed my sister that they ran out of small paper bag and try to fit into my bag instead. I told her we need to separate but she insisted NOT to give her a bigger size paper bag. Spent almost more than 800 bucks in there together but not willing to give an additional big size paper bag. Speechless.
Would give zero star if I can.
15th Jan 2022, 8pm. In case the management needs to investigate who was the cashier lady who worked that day. If she is the boss herself, read it and admit your own terrible service.

name: Padini Concept Store
location: Lot F1.88 & F1.97, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:A fashion store aimed at young and trendy customers. The clothes are of varying materials and quality. The interior is bright and welcoming. The fitting rooms are clean and bright. There was a long queue to the fitting room, which was of course a negative experience. | review_rating:2, text:3 staff at the fitting room being rude and very not friendly. Siap jeling2 at customer. Worst experience here | review_rating:5, text:It is good after the renovation. The clothing choices are more varied compared to other outlets. I like shopping here | review_rating:5, text:One of their current flagship retail stores. This concept store by Padini is host to a variety of numerous house brands including popular names like Vincci, Padini Authentics, P&Co, Seed, Miki and many other labels. The layout is decidedly shopper friendly and large lanes allow leisure browsing by shoppers.

All in all, a very pleasant experience when we came by to do some Christmas and Lunar New Year shopping for the kids and there was quite a fair amount of choice along with quite substantial discounts on certain labels. If you're a harried parent looking for stylish and affordable seasonal fashion for the younger (and adult) set, this may be your one stop place for it. Highly recommended. | review_rating:5, text:Too many people were using fitting room but there a lady was controlling which is not occupying and the cashir also did very well

name: BIBI'S POPIAH
location: F1.58F, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:Bibi’s Popiah at Sunway Pyramid is a good spot if you’re in the mood for fresh, tasty popiah! I’d give them four stars for the authentic flavor, with that classic balance of crunch and softness. There was a bit of a wait since it’s popular and plenty of people were ordering, so service wasn’t super quick. The staff handled it well—though they weren’t exactly friendly, they stayed calm and kept things moving smoothly. Prices are fair, so it’s easy to grab a few rolls without spending too much. Worth checking out if you’re around! | review_rating:1, text:The staff wore the same hand gloves to collect payment (in cash), hand me the mobile phone to collect my phone number, and to my surprise make my popiah too! Oh god! To my dismay, the other staff that I saw wrapping popiah of the customer before me is washing dishes and touching the bin with the SAME PAIR OF GLOVES! I am not surprised if she uses the same pair to prepare food later. This is super unhygienic. No matter how good is the popiah, unfortunately I will not return again until this practice is discontinued. This defeats the purpose of wearing a hand gloves. | review_rating:3, text:We loved the branch in SS15, so was excited for this one in Sunway pyramid. Sadly it's not as good. It's not crunchy like the one in SS15, most probably cause it's a franchise and they can't do things fresh from the kitchen here. Staff was super slow, was testing my patience 😅 most probably got to drive to ss15 for the best experience for now. Maybe after they figure out quality control for all their franchises, it'll be a lot better | review_rating:2, text:Quite careless. Ordered shrimp popiah n right in front of me she's making seaweed popiah. There's no one else around so I had to say something for them to recheck and redo. If I didn't say anything that's what I would have gotten. Shrimp popiah uses the tiny shrimps with shells on. Not really my thing. | review_rating:5, text:Super nice popiah, crunchy keropok combine with flavourful turnip. The sauce is very nice, a combination of spicy and sweet... yums. Can request for extra chilli if you like extra heat! Will definitely come back again!

The only down side is long waiting time after order
Also why dont they serve in plates if it is dine in, i can understand they use paper box if take away
The good taste delicious especially MElts
The brownie cake is really petite and dry, even the spoon is larger than the cake | review_rating:3, text:I just visited to buy a personal pizza for takeaway. Just sat near the collection counter. I better buy in auntie Annie's and the staff attitude is not well mannered and seems not interested in talking with customers or future customers. | review_rating:4, text:The food was alright for a fast food pizza joint. name: Chatramue
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Rocku Yakiniku
location: LG 1.43, LG 1, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:I wanna highlight the food and live band were really enjoyable, but the service left me feeling disappointed. After ordering, I waited over 10 minutes for my food, only to then wait an additional 10 to 20 minutes when I asked for a new grill net because the one in use was charred with black coal, which I feared would affect the meat. The   Despite repeatedly ringing the service bell, no staff member attended to my table until half an hour before our allotted time was up, as the staff ask us to make the last order because there is a lot of customer are coming in as he said which make me rushed to make the last  order. This hurried approach felt completely unjustified, especially considering the 6% service tax I had already paid is it worth it? | review_rating:5, text:We chose this restaurant for dinner on a Wednesday afternoon, and the kebab was very tasty, with some of the sauces marinating the flavours. But I personally liked it best plain without the seasoning. The gentleman who served us was also very responsive! Changed the charcoal for us and was very appreciative of the service. Will be back next time! | review_rating:5, text:From the cozy, Japanese-inspired decor to the sizzling grills at each table, this Japanese grill offers an unforgettable experience. We ordered a selection of meats, and the quality of every ingredient was top-notch. The beef was incredibly tender, and the rich, marbled flavor paired perfectly with the house sauces. Maybe due to shortage of staff and not able to attend to us immediately and need to call for 2-3 times.However, I still highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for an authentic Japanese grill experience with buffet style, eat as much as you can! | review_rating:5, text:I’d like to take a moment to share my experience:

1.    This was my first time dining at the restaurant.
2.	I was particularly impressed by the front counter staff member, Nicole, who provided an excellent introduction to the menu. Her friendly demeanor and warm smile made the experience welcoming, and she explained the menu thoroughly, understanding customers’ preferences and offering tailored recommendations. Her attentiveness and professionalism in promoting the dishes contributed to a positive first impression.
3.	Regarding the dining experience, there was one point of dissatisfaction with the garlic butter side dish. Although I ordered garlic butter, it arrived without any butter. I requested it a second time, but unfortunately, it was still served without butter. I also noticed a customer at a nearby table sharing similar feedback with the staff.
4.	When I mentioned this issue to Nicole, she was genuinely surprised and expressed her intention to relay the feedback to her supervisor. Her responsiveness and willingness to address the concern, despite it being a minor issue, were greatly appreciated.

Overall Impression: Aside from the missing butter, the overall dining experience was enjoyable, thanks largely to Nicole’s kindness and helpfulness. Her proactive approach to resolving the issue demonstrated her commitment to customer satisfaction. | review_rating:3, text:I was here 23/12/24 and i came here to eat at 2.22pm till around 4.15pm. When i came here there were some tables not being cleared.. and some of the other tables were still with customers eating.. ok Fine.. as i was eating, i saw more and more tables that were left uncleared till i feel the whole restaurant was like a dumpster.. on top of that, the service was slow. I am not sure what these staff were doing but tables that are uncleared SHOULD not be left unattended but still can welcome new customers to come into the restaurant.. plus, the trolley that is used to collect the plates and cutleries were left where customers are eating.. this for me is unacceptable.. the food is good here.. but this is shocking for me! What the hell is going on?

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Laem Charoen Thai Seafood
location: G1.98, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Ordered 5 course set meal.
Add some chilli garlic prawn and battered squid.
Super delicious…
Price also not so expensive..
The food taste was very authentic..
Dining environment was clean and comfortable to dine..
Waiter/ waitress also attentive..
Can repeat again..
Recommended 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Definitely will repeat again , the creamy tomyam was superb! . Love the texture of the aromatic fish but the Sauce too salty for me . But the restt of the food was amazing . And thanks for the best suggestion and great service by Yusoof and Rudyy | review_rating:4, text:This is a famous Thai restaurant in Bangkok, and most parts of Thailand. The food matches the taste very well. We had the 5 course meal the price was affordable for 4 people. Sadly, that day we went there was a lot of food that were out of stock. However, the alternative was still okay. We wanted fish sauce with chili, which is a norm in Thailand. However, one of the staff which was I think a Chinese was very rude didn’t serve us and gave us a bad tone. The rest of the staff were helpful and friendly. Smiled throughout. Only one of the staff working on Wednesday. | review_rating:5, text:The fish sauce sea bass is absolutely delicious. We ordered set meal with 5 dishes and it's great. Will come again | review_rating:5, text:Decent Thai food w lotsa flavours and heat! Attentive and helpful staff. Enjoyed their yee sang v much, tangy and tasty.

name: A Decade
location: LG2.52 & 2.53, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The restaurant is really nice and offers good food for fair prices. There is a wide range of different food: western food, traditional local food and wok. All very nice, the same with the drinks which we enjoyed. Definitely coming back for another meal if I am in this Mall again. | review_rating:5, text:We really enjoyed our Nasi Kerabu, and the portions were great too. For small eater, better to order one main and one appetizer to share for 2 pax.

We struggled to finish our own Nasi Kerabu. Drinks were great too. Kat Chai Bing, and Teh Tarik were on point.

Only thing maybe the beef rendang was too little, but the ayam percik was just nice. | review_rating:5, text:What a great experience dining here! I really fall in love with all the foods that i ordered. My husband was having a Nasi Goreng Udang, and me having a Moonlight Hokkien Kuey Teow suggested by a lovely hijabi waitress ; Intan. Tbh, the food is beyond the universe. It was my first time having a hokkien kuey teow that super delicious!! We also having a Original Cheong Fun. Sedap gila ! Kudos to the kitchen team for the super nice meal. Thank you chef and team! Thank you kakak for the nice drink also! Thanks to  the floor team for the great service! Thank you A Decade for the very best experience ever 🫶🏻 | review_rating:5, text:An amazing dining experience from start to finish! The menu had a great variety, and everything we tried was cooked to perfection. The service was quick and professional, and the decor added a lovely touch to the overall vibe. Highly recommend for anyone looking for great food and a great time! | review_rating:4, text:Nasi lemak daging rendang is nice. But the ice cendol is not recommended because the ice is not fluffy and is very hard as if eating stone, otherwise i will give 5 stars

name: Signature Healthland
location: Ob3 G1-10, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Definitely will be back for our thai massage here. Our masseurs were very skillful.

At first they suggested for us to take packages, but we weren’t sure whether we would like the massage as many masseurs were not that good based on past experiences.

But they proved us wrong. Next trip we will take the package and visit at least once or twice a month.

We were served by two different receptionist and both were polite with us. After seeing the reviews here, we thought we would experience the same rudeness. Glad that they have improved their customer service.

Kudos! | review_rating:5, text:Had a 90 minutes foot, head and shoulders massage here. It was amazing. Overall I'm happy with the service provided by the staff , from the front desk staff to the masseuse. They served cold tea before the massage, which was perfect on a hot sunny day. The massage took place in a cinema-like room and they would play a movie during the whole process. After the massage, the masseuse served us hot ginger tea. The only thing that spoiled my whole experience was a group of customers who were being so loud and talking on the phone. Good thing they arrived when my massage was about to end. I hope Healthland can impose a rule for customers to be quiet and phones should be on vibrate/silent mode. | review_rating:5, text:Finally enjoyed a nice 2 hours Aroma Oil treatment massage and it was legendarily great. Very professional masseuse and the whole place was beautiful, quiet and relaxing. Most probably advisable to go there in the early hours of their time to avoid the rush hour. All in all, I will definitely come back again and again... Your body feels extremely relax and calmer after the massage here.. | review_rating:5, text:For the promotion price of RM130 for two hours worth of message (foot + traditional Thai) this is a steal!  The atmosphere and facilities was top notch you could even say the best. Guess that’s why this is ‘signature’. Thumbs up to their service and masseuse too! | review_rating:5, text:Had a very great 2 hours massage from the Therapist no 1112.  I had back pain for a while. And she managed to relief it. Will definitely come back . They have different types of massages. I choose the Aromatherapy.
