reviews:
review_rating:3, text:I got to try a few before choosing which flavors I wanted. Then I would put the order in the machine and make the payment. Choosing the flavors I wanted and paying was far from easy and without the help of the staff it was almost impossible to operate the machine correctly. It's a shame to have such a complicated ordering and payment process for such good ice cream flavors. | review_rating:4, text:Enjoyed 31% on Wednesday with my pink shirt. Got to enjoy double junior scoops with rm10.50.
Vatieties of choices to choose. Love the nutty ice cream. | review_rating:1, text:the ice cream is not cold enough!!!
other than that the service of the worker need too be improve. they is one malay service is so rude i don’t think so this is how to serve as a serve crew ! such a shame | review_rating:4, text:Best place to have Baskin Robbins ice-creams here. You can sit as long as you want after tired shopping because it's hidden from the counter and at the back of it. Also, this outlet has more variety flavors and ice-cream cakes ready-made. | review_rating:1, text:The counter person was not there when the shop was supposed to be open. It said on a small note that there are gone for a while. It looks very unprofessional. Hope there is improvements.

review_rating:5, text:Love how gentle and calming the process was along the facial treatment session, I even heard a person next room snoring 😂

My facial was done by Fanni and it's highly recommended. Satisfied with my facial. Will definitely visit again. | review_rating:5, text:Done Facial MMP. Very satisfying and felt clean and refresh after the facial.  Being customer for Sunway pyramid Adonis since 1995 till now.  Very good experience and highly recommended.  The manager taken care of me since many years Ie Jessie is very experienced. | review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing experience with the face washing service at Adonis. The staff was extremely friendly and professional. They made me feel comfortable and relaxed throughout the entire process. The techniques used were top-notch, and my face felt incredibly clean and refreshed afterwards. I highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a great face washing service. It truly exceeded my expectations.

name: Coffea Coffee
category: cafe, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG 1 . 106, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I was there on a friday, from early when they opened until around 11am, and the vibes were pretty nice, the dark, wooden aesthetics are nice, and it was quiet and chill.

I got a pain au chocolat and a caramel latte for 9.50 and 16.00 respectively, totalling to 27.05 after tax, which is a little steep of a pricing to be honest, but its just a little more expensive than usual cafe prices nowadays, so its still acceptable.

the pain au chocolat was average, nothing extraordinary, it had nice layers and a fair amount of chocolate inside, but for the price, I personally wouldn’t get it again, but it’s not bad.
the caramel latte was actually quite enjoyable, it fit my tastes well, it’s somewhat sweet with good caramel flavour, but not overwhelmingly sweet, and the coffee flavour was present but more mellow than others i’d say, which is still quite nice. and their ice is really crunchy👍🧊

service was standard too, order and pay at counter, get a beeper thing, take a seat and wait until it beeps to go get your order.

overall not bad, would be back again to try different things.

🐊🐊 | review_rating:3, text:First time tried it here in sunway pyramid. The coffee is surprisingly bad. The overburnt and the acidity is way off chart. Coffea coffee in Plaza Masalam Shah Alam is way better. Here is very meh. Please standardize ur barista | review_rating:4, text:Recommendations for contemporary coffee places, very happy to find a good coffee location. After being tired of shopping, the iced coffee and various pastries are very delicious. Good service, very affordable prices. will be a regular here again | review_rating:3, text:Food
Butter cake:
It was just delicious paired with hot chocolate, So soft and buttery just like a homemade cake

Croissant:
Pretty good and it came with a bit of butter. Nice to dunk it in hot chocolate

Ice tea:
It was to diluted and did not taste good

Service:
Its Self service

Atmosphere:
Chill cafe in the middle of the mall, good place to hangout with friends

Quite pricey and the Ice tea was not worth it | review_rating:1, text:This is the worst cheesecake I've ever eaten in my life. It tasted weird & dry. The coffee was good, but this cake spoiled the whole experience 🤢

name: JYNNS x Lo Hong Ka
category: health, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Your sunway pyramid branch really suck ,When my husband and I arrived at your store, an auntie came up to ask what I wanted. At that moment, I hadn’t decided yet, so I told her to wait a moment. Later when I was ready to order, she didn’t even look at me. The girl at the counter also acted as if I were invisible. Then, my husband told her that no one was attending to us. That’s when the auntie loudly said, “I asked your wife, and she didn’t answer!”

I was thinking, what kind of service is this? Totally unprofessional. When a customer asks you to wait, you wait. Do you understand? This is just terrible. | review_rating:1, text:Bought their bird nest and found a small insect in it. Contacted them for exchange but was told no exchange or refund is allowed after 7 days of purchase. This is even after sending them multiple emails/texts on FB, Instagram etc. Then got a call asking to “fill their form” as they did not receive my email. Truly disappointed with the experience. | review_rating:2, text:Temporarily closed for renovations | review_rating:3, text:Nice | review_rating:1, text:我在那边做工少给工资说我没有打卡可是我明明都打卡了，少了整整300多，说我没有打卡分钟不要去那边买，顾客要是稍微态度不好那边的员工都能蛐蛐你一整天

name: Happy Kid
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Typo
location: LG1.126A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Terrible service. Went to the shop to do a last minute christmas gift purchase and they don’t allow to pay by online payment or qr pay. I ordered it online instead to collect it from the store where the items are all in stock but the lady working there was very sarcastic and despite knowing I was in an urgent to get the gifts she said you must wait 3-4 working days to collect it. Hopeless worker and you have the audacity to even be sarcastic. Honestly you don’t even deserve one star rating at all. | review_rating:5, text:First of all, you can collect points and easy to redeem. Didn’t manage to get this Barbie stuff from the first batch. It’s been out for few days however they didn’t sell it online. So I have to rush to the nearest Typo to get this. I’m a forever Barbie lover! | review_rating:5, text:Typo at Sunway Pyramid is a quirky, vibrant store brimming with unique stationery, quirky gifts, and stylish home décor. | review_rating:5, text:A lot of funny, high quality and useful stuff with very affordable price | review_rating:5, text:Great for picking up fun little quirky gifts.

name: Burger King
location: Unit No. F1.87A & F1.90, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Center, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:When I'm hungry and don't know what to eat, I know where to go to get enough protein. This burger shop is located in a corner on the F floor. Simple interior but purposeful and functional (comfortable chairs and table). | review_rating:5, text:located at 1st flr Sunway pyramid , just opposite the Padini shop is a good location for us, while the female is busy shopping , the male could just sit back n relax here | review_rating:4, text:Nothing much to comment on as we were there for a quick bite and we got it quick 😄. However, would much appreciate if the 🍔 and 🍟 were served hot in a cold environment. Service is acceptable and just maybe, my timing was out 😅 | review_rating:1, text:This is very sad but I have to explain the bad experiences I have been getting from here.
The Lady in counter Juliana, the worst service provider I have met. No greeting, not even mentioning anything about not available items until we ordered and suddenly except 3 rest all Not Available. I purposely stayed after our transection and guess what! She greeted the MY couple after us. Racist! She is too bad for this kind of environment! I will come back to check and will report to HQ soon.

The girl wearing black shirt was very enthusiastic at her job! Always present and looking for customers. | review_rating:5, text:Burger King in the theme park is convenient for a quick bite, but expect long lines during peak times. The food is standard, but seating can be limited and crowded. It’s fine for a fast meal, though the overall experience could be smoother.

name: Dolly
location: LG2.28 Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall No. 3 Jalan PJS11/15 Bandar Sunway 47500 Petaling Jaya Selangor MY, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Seriously good for halal certified dim sum.  The siew Mai, prawn egg fried rice, Har Kao, glutinous rice, prawn fritter, fried beef Kway teow were good. | review_rating:4, text:The best halal place to get halal tasty dim sum fast and near! Immediate location to go to in order to satisfy that tastebud!

The portion is getting smaller and smaller by the day. Such a disspointment though. Everything seems to shrink. Sad! Food, drink, size...quantity!

New menus available especially when it comes to dishes so we tried those salted butter prawn and the portion is so not what we expected. They should really mention "for illustration purposes only" in the menu.

Service is acceptable and everything else is tolerable. What a letdown if it keeps going from utterly amazing to barely good. | review_rating:4, text:Good services as usual. Efficient and attentive to customer. All food come out great, price are slightly on higher side but reasonable. All their dimsum come with thin layet with good portion of filling. The golden fried rice and beef ball are our favorite, congee also really good as comfort food if you are not feelling weel. We are regular patron and will continue to support. All menu is halal. | review_rating:5, text:So delicious. I love the golden fried rice, porridge and the crispy chee chong fun. | review_rating:3, text:Food taste not bad, but very atas price. A small tiny glass of water cost rm1 which wasn't expected. Service was good and staff was really nice. Overall, good experience but wont eat again.

name: Cubix
location: Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:This stores staff are absolutely disgusting, i was the only one in the store and all they did was stare at me! They need to properly train their staff to normally work and not disturb their customers, moreover their products quality is disgusting for the price, i mean you can find better quality items for half the price at other stores! This store is just a heavy money wanting business that doesnt care about their customers. | review_rating:1, text:made me pay 4x the price of something i dropped and absolutely disgusting behaviour as they cussed at me. Please don't come here. | review_rating:1, text:Went to sunway pyramid yesterday. They placed a barking toy dog in front of the outlet, which I believed to attract customers. Caught my daughter attention and she go over to lightly tap its head, not even bringing it down.

Then there was this aunty in red colour shirt waved to her, indicating her to remove her hand. If that's the case, then either you put it in a display box or at least put some note stating no touching or whatever.

I thought is a very expensive toys and have a quick check, where shopee selling it for less than RM20, half the price from your retail. I don't mind getting it from your shop since my daughter like it but with this kind of attitude, No thanks. | review_rating:1, text:extremely rude auntie. no integrity and very bad service. Even if this shop gives out free things, i will never go there again. First and last time. How can someone treat people so rudely is something i can never imagine. All the reviews here are right, should have seen the reviews before coming to this place. utterly disappointed that sunway pyramid has a store like this. | review_rating:1, text:fake Pokemon cards.. don't come here if U want Pokemon cards

name: Trim N Shave Barber Salon
location: 11, Jalan PJS 8/12, Dataran Mentari, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Fast and experienced, the barbers here are quick on the snip and manage to comply with most of the finicky demands from many of the walk-ins I saw while I waited for my kid to get his mop top tidied up with a trim. Unlike most of the other barber shops around the area, this place has a good number of experienced barbers in wait for the next client that sits down on the chair. The place also provides quality traditional shaving and beard trimming packages as well as shoulder massage services all for the price of a song, almost. They also provide haircuts by their students during weekday working hours which is probably the ticket for school going kids.

If you're curious about how a proper full package barbering experience feels like, this place is well worth your time and easy on your purse to add. The outlet also accepts payment via debit or credit cards.  Recommended all the same. | review_rating:5, text:Fast and efficient, many of the barbering stylists here can give a reasonably priced haircut, shave, or hair wash at very reasonable prices. One of the few barber shops around the area that accepts credit and/or debit cards. | review_rating:5, text:Getting my hair and beard trimmed from here from more than 2 years and prefer here among any other places cuz of their well experienced barbers.  they are not just friendly but well mannered people, especially those Pakistani men they know their job and do it very professionally moreover their hygiene and cleanliness is very good and well maintained, prices are affordable and worth it. On weekends it’s crowded so better visit in weekdays. You can ask them what haircut or beard style would suit you better according to your face shape and hair type. It’s my permanent barber place now 😍😍😍. | review_rating:5, text:My husband cut hair with Ali. He did a very good job. Really took his time to cut and shave quite fast. Will come back. | review_rating:5, text:Nice barbers. They pay attention to your request on preference of styling also make suggestions to your request. Reasonable pricing and a loyalty offer if you sign in on Insta. Very good barbershop

The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Deborah is super kind and helpful. I wanted to make a small gift for my wife for returning to work and she helped me customise the drawings to perfection. Price is awesome, service is great. Highly recommend! | review_rating:1, text:My mum ordered 3 hand pastel portraits from this girl in Dec 22, took 3 months and still was not ready in March 23, had to chase to to get the portraits, could not cancel as paid deposit. Had a first portrait hand drawn pastel that was done in Oct 22 - it was decent, so decided to have extra 3 more done which took longer, when received, the strokes of the the new hand pastel art looked different from the 1st received in Oct, looks really good and exact detailing, but on detail inspection - seems like a  combination of digital art and hand pastel? shown to another artists and 'digital art' was mentioned on first look without second thought. My mum called her and queried about the artwork and would like a replacement as she was not happy with it, but the girl say that she can buy a new one instead and deny digital art work by saying 'oh is there is such a thing?' to the word 'digital art'. Sounds very dodgy and would not recommend her unless she is drawing in front of you or made it clear 100% hand drawn. Very disappointed in how this is managed as the response from the girl is very questionable, with possibility of dishonesty and no transparency. We would be understanding if she would have declared if it was not full 100% hand drawn. | review_rating:5, text:Paintings look vivid! | review_rating:5, text:No Review

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I went to buy food from subway and i saw cockroach roaming inside the bun storage. I told the staff to call their manager to inform the issue and requested them not to sell the food to any other customer. After few minutes i went back to check and saw them selling food to a customer. I also made report to the sunway management and they made them to throw away the bun. The management should have tell them to deep cleaning by closing their store. Who knows there might be more cockroach and also might have gong to the meat area.i have video proof. Not recomended to eat here. | review_rating:3, text:Ordered white coffee and 2 macadamia but given only 1 cookie by the foreign worker also tables are not cleaned promptly I'm so sad huhu | review_rating:1, text:Ordered combo meal which include chocolate chip cookie, accidentally have this staplet stuck at my gum when bite on the cookie, please ensure your food safety when prepare the food

name: Cruz
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Worst service from owner.
Came to the store and requested the dress Im looking for. Went to fitting room and started changing.

The fitting room there were no doors only curtain that hang at the door frame to cover.
2 curtains from both sides per fitting room.

Was changing the dress halfway. The owner did not ask for my consent not inform me anything and just barged in and looked at me wearing the dress halfway. She asked ok or not after that and thought Ididnt know how to wear the dress correctly as ifs upside down/flippers over. I said ok then I said I can do it I'm wearing now. Then she left but the curtain was left opened about half.

Complaints:
Did not ask for my permission/consent before coming in.
Did not inform me verbally before coming in.
Did not have my INFORMED CONSENT before coming in.
Invasion of privacy (doesn't matter if they have their clothes on or not)
The cctv was angled outside the fitting room. This incident was RECORDED and there is a solid evidence. If there's none from the footage, I believe you have probably deleted it. But I have witnesses as well.

I've read your reviews and turns out I'm not the only victim that encounter this. You either apologize or might as well shut down the store. With that kind of behavior I don't think anyone would even come and help/support with your business.

I felt to traumatized and speechless during that incident because it was very random and unexpected and I was not even informed. I was so close to burst out in tears full of fear but I managed to handle it well.

So what if you're a female? Does that give you any rights for you to just barged in like that without my consent? You're not even my family member nor friends what gives you the right to treat your customers like that? Did no one teach you how to respect others privacy?

Please fix your behavior. I will not report you to the police but I will make sure others know about your behavior. Either you fix it now or you can start to prepare yourself in court. Tq. | review_rating:5, text:don't have enough salesperson to assist , is more of selfservice like mcdonald somehow is happy with the purchase | review_rating:1, text:Staff has terrible attitude towards customer | review_rating:1, text:service rude. i tengah try baju main buka je langsir 😡 and dari mula masuk sampai habis asyik follow belakang i. harap boleh diperbaiki | review_rating:1, text:No Review

name: Dragon-i Peking Duck
location: GF.43, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a pleasant experience here! As soon as we arrived, we were assigned a great seat with a full view of Sunway Lagoon and comfy sofa chairs, perfect for relaxing. The service was decent, nothing extraordinary but no complaints either. The food was nice, standard and consistent, so you can’t really go wrong with the taste. Overall, it was a solid experience, and I’ll definitely be coming back! | review_rating:5, text:Love their pecking duck, it's absolutely fresh n very yummy. We always come here for duck. The rest of the food on the menu is good too, great to service, very attentive and polite. Nawl Mang is excellent. We are attended by him., and he's very good 👍👍👍 | review_rating:5, text:Excellent food and service paired with a classy Chinese-inspired aesthetic. We tried many dishes, and all were delicious. The staff were very welcoming, and always topped off our drinks without asking and with a smile!

Our favourite dish was the red braised pork (红烧肉), which had a perfectly balanced sauce and meat that melted in the mouth. The truffle xiao long bao were good too, albeit the truffle aroma was not as strong as other competitors. Every other dish was good.

Overall a great place to dine for authentic and delicious Chinese food, highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Very popular Chinese restaurant since decade of time ago, not cheap price but the quality is there.
Definitely a place suitable for family or a group of friends to have 吃饭叫菜
三杯鸡 nice, recommend!
肉碎长豆 nice, recommend!
番茄炒蛋 I feel this one so so because they cook with capsicum which I think tomato egg should remain tomato and egg only

If you are alone or two pax only, can order their fried rice, tang bao or noodles. | review_rating:5, text:Over the years, the food at Dragon-i has really improved, especially the 小笼包, which is incredibly delicious. The thin skin wraps around the flavorful soup, making you keep eating basket after basket until your wallet is empty. The other dishes are also quite good, and the Mee tarik is very tasty too.

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Got in the queue at 6.49pm for the usual discounts on Wednesday. Once reached the counter, only to be informed that the staff had passed the “end of queue for promo” sign to the person 2 steps in front of me. No communication or whatsoever from staff when I was in the queue. Maybe this is the marketing strategy to make people still buy cause customers already wasted their time queuing for nothing🤷🏻‍♂️ | review_rating:1, text:llao llao luxe is not worth it, paid rm 20.9 for such a mini yogurt ice cream (way smaller than medium size llao llao) | review_rating:5, text:Thank you, Llao Llao SP staff! Even though it was busy with the 33% promotion, they were so kind and polite, giving the best service. | review_rating:1, text:Bad service!!I requested for extra small spoon as usual but the staff stated that Rm1 is required for an extra small spoon??? The dessert is already expensive and still want to charge for extra tiny spoons? Last time it used to be free! | review_rating:1, text:Mr. Frank if I am not mistaken, provided the worst service possible today. We had llao llao at this branch today around 3pm. We ordered 2 at first and requested to add on another. When we reached the cashier, he shouted at us if we ordered 2 or 3 even after telling him that we ordered 3... Not sure whether he was having a bad day but that shouldnt be the way to treat your customers.
Also, he showed a lot of attitude when we requested for some tissue.
I have been a loyal customer to your brand and this branch but after being trated like this in front of so many people, i dont think i will ever visit this branch again.
Here is a picture of the staff that showed a lot of unnecessary attitude. Hopefully your company would improve on the quality of your service.
Really disappointed with everything that happened at llao llao today.

name: Pos Malaysia
category: post_office, courier_service, government_office, finance, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot LL 3.03, Sunway Pyramid, No. 33 Jalan 11/115, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The kakak is very patient and good service! | review_rating:1, text:The 2 ladies that served me were quite rude. I was mailing a photocard to my friend and needed an envelope so I went here to inquire. The 2 ladies kept saying they don’t sell envelope and cannot help me mail it, so I was searching other places in pyramid that I can buy an envelope from while taking a seat there for rest. While sitting, I received a call from my father and took the call quietly in Korean (as I’m Korean) and quickly finished the call. After the call finished, the 2 ladies had a 180 attitude change towards me, beckoned me to the counter as they now suddenly “wanted to help” and can help me mail my cards. All the while asking me about my heritage and saying “oh sorry I thought you were Indonesian or Chinese.” I was flabbergasted at their attitude and how it suddenly changed after they knew I was Korean, so I left the store and went somewhere else to mail my things. | review_rating:5, text:No queue on monday at 11:50am, nice and friendly staff, she even let me borrow her glue. For those who still wandering where this post office is, you need to use the escalator located between KFC and McDonalds to go downstairs, this post office will be on your left. | review_rating:1, text:Worse experience ever! Was there on Sunday afternoon arnd 2:30pm. There was not a single customer but the 2 staffs behave as if the whole world owe them a living! So rude & arrogant 🙄 Very unfriendly & unhelpful. Whatever U ask, they said don't know - only know how to throw U alot of abbreviated quotes. What the hell! | review_rating:2, text:Bad experience, not sure if I am a customer or she is a customer. Very bad attitude, sighing a lot, and disrespectful.
Just do a good job in management before opening a store.

name: KENS APOTHECARY
location: Unit No. G1.71 Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:first proper frag testing that was fun all because of one worker, called herself fina. she was willing to let me try so many pefumes and even let me fullwear any choice i wanted. nvr had the guts to be this brave in any frag store sbb other places was not tht friendly. will come again for the experience | review_rating:5, text:Excellent service.

Never faced any rude staff there. My fav SA kak Safina always treat their customers with good attitude and love to share about fragrance. Experience to try the new release BORNTOSTANDOUT there too😆love to come again. | review_rating:5, text:I had an incredible experience at this perfume shop, largely due to the exceptional service provided by Fina. Her extensive knowledge, personalized approach, and genuine passion for fragrances made the entire visit unforgettable. With her expert guidance, I discovered the perfect scent that exceeded my expectations. Fina's attention to detail, warm demeanor, and commitment to customer satisfaction are truly commendable. I highly recommend this shop, and I look forward to returning for future fragrance endeavors. | review_rating:5, text:I am writing this review to commend Ms. Diana for her exceptional service.

Ms. Diana was friendly and patient, taking the time to recommend and let us sample a wide variety of Diptyque perfumes. Thanks to her assistance, we discovered and fell in love with the fragrance Doson.

Before completing our purchase, she thoroughly explained the membership program and its benefits, ensuring we were well-informed.

From the moment we entered the store, our shopping experience was delightful. However, I noted that the store does not have a portable card machine, requiring customers to go to the payment counter to complete transactions.

Overall, I highly recommend Kens Apothecary for purchasing Diptyque products. | review_rating:5, text:Thanks safina for explaining about each products thoroughly and patiencely. Came to the boutique today just to browse for my next perfume, and was greeted by her, sound product knowledge and friendly to answer all qs. Look for safina if you come to the store.

However, the QR menu system struggles with slow internet, especially in corner seats. A decent spot, but there’s room for improvement. | review_rating:5, text:Had a great time at Genki Sushi today! name: Supamala Hotpot
location: Lot LG2.122C, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had lunch here with my friends, and it was a wonderful experience! We didn’t make a reservation, but luckily, they had a table available. We were attended by Ms. Hana, who was incredibly helpful and attentive throughout our meal. We requested the staff to sing the birthday song for our birthday celebration, and Ms. Hana kindly fulfilled our request even though it usually requires a booking.

The restaurant offers a wide variety of meat choices and set menus with varying prices. The meat slices were thick and satisfying, and it’s free flow, which is fantastic! I highly recommend trying their mango + red bean bingsu—it’s absolutely delicious.

Overall, the food was great, but what stood out the most was their top-notch customer service. We’ll definitely be coming back! | review_rating:5, text:I’d love to share my first dining experience at Supamala Hotpot in Sunway Pyramid. We received outstanding service from Ms. Hanna, who explained the menu to us in detail. The highlight of our visit was Ms. Hanna’s thoughtful effort in organizing a birthday celebration, making the experience even more memorable 🥰 .This was my best lunch experience here 🩷 Highly recommended and I will definitely be back! Thanks a lot Ms Hanna 🫰🏻 | review_rating:5, text:This hotpot buffet restaurant offers unlimited beef, lamb, and seafood ingredients—a paradise for meat lovers!  ✨ Ramadan Special Lunch Deal (11AM - 4PM) ✅ 90-minute dining time ✅ 🆓 Free buffet set upgrade! Order the Basic Set and get upgraded to the Meaty Set, or the Meaty Set to the All-In-One Set! No extra cost, just more enjoyment!  We tried four soup bases: 🔥 Sichuan Spicy Butter Soup — authentic and fiery! 🍲 Japanese Sukiyaki Soup — sweet and savory, perfect for meat 🐔 Collagen Chicken Soup — mild and smooth 🍄 Wild Mushroom Soup — great for those who prefer a lighter flavor  The main meat options include: 🥩 Lamb shoulder, lamb leg, beef slices, and brisket—all premium cuts! Paired with a variety of veggies like potatoes, lotus root, spinach, broccoli, and soup-absorbing crispy rolls. Noodle lovers can enjoy Supamala noodles too!  Unlimited refills of Teh O Ais (iced tea) to keep you refreshed throughout the meal!  Overall rating: 🍽️ Food: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 👥 Service: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 🍃 Ambiance: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 | review_rating:5, text:I recently had an early dinner with my family at Supamala Hotpot, and it was a great experience! The service was excellent—friendly staff and quick with bringing everything we needed, which made the meal smooth and enjoyable. The hotpot buffet was a hit with everyone; it was fun, tasty, and had plenty of options to keep both adults and kids happy. The restaurant was spotless, and the view of Sunway Lagoon from our table added a nice touch to the atmosphere. Perfect for families, including young kids, though I think they could improve by adding a better variety of Malay kuih muih to the dessert selection. Definitely worth a visit! | review_rating:5, text:This is our fifth visit to Supamala Hotpot and once again, the food has exceeded our expectations. The quality and taste have remained consistently impressive, it is a go to spot for hotpot lovers.

Our favorites soup is the Wild Mushroom and Chicken Collagen Soup. It's rich, flavorful, and perfect for a comforting meal. The combination of the earthy mushrooms and the creamy, nourishing collagen broth is a standout.

The service is another reason we keep coming back. The staff is always friendly, attentive and ready to assist, ensuring a smooth dining experience.

We’ve enjoyed both their buffet and a la carte offerings and both have been great choices. .

Overall, Supamala Hotpot continues to be a place that guarantees a satisfying meal every time.

The pictures are from our first visit here.

name: KWAN KEE STORE
category: bakery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.79B, Lower Ground 2 Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Restaurant Review: Kwan Kee Store

Kwan Kee Store, a Michelin-recognized spot, is a must-visit for those who appreciate traditional Hong Kong pastries. Their dedication to authentic flavors and quality ingredients is evident in their offerings.

The white sugar sponge cake stands out with its light, fluffy texture and just the right level of sweetness—perfect for those who prefer a more delicate taste. The steamed red bean cake and pandan cake are also excellent, packed with red beans and maintaining a balanced, natural flavor without being overly sweet.

However, the Musang King rice roll falls a bit short. While the concept is interesting, it lacks the strong durian fragrance that one might expect from Musang King, leaving room for improvement in flavor intensity.

Price is on the high side, some might think worth it but some might not. | review_rating:4, text:I've tried a few items but I don't remember the names. The service was really good, there was a guy who was very friendly and explained the snacks to us. Sadly, this branch is just a no-seat brach that brings only a number of items. I've been eyeing other snacks from their instagram but it's a bit hard to go to the main store. Anyway, I really like the mango flavoured roll, not sure what it's called, but you can see the photo. | review_rating:5, text:It's more like a take away concept, although there is a couple of seats, but it looks more like a waiting area. Many those I wanted to try were sold out that day. I like both the steamed Pandan Cake and Brown Sugar Rice Bowl Cake. | review_rating:5, text:They provide samples to try before buying. I liked the black sesame layer cake, soft and flavorful. Also bought the signature White sugar sponge cake to try.
The store setup is pretty simple and mainly for takeaway. | review_rating:3, text:The snacks are just average, the famous white rice cake, was abit sour when I ate it.
Don’t think the desserts are worth the hype.

But the shop quite congested, so have to be careful if you’re bringing big shopping bags 😂 don’t knock things over.

I came here to get my cat food, meowing head. So far one of the best for my cats. And they shed less fur with this dry food. | review_rating:1, text:On 18/7/2024@5.45pm, im going there to buy some of treats for my fur babies.. its took only RM20.95.
Already paid using debit card.. and the transaction is successful..
but suddenly the indian guy.. come run to me.. he said the transaction was failed (he said because the payment receipt not come out from the machine) , but at the same time, my account deduct the money already .. so need me to repay back .. because of the staff lack of knowledge, forcing like crazy, keep saying stupid things, very bad on problem solvings (which is, they have to call their bank centre first, because of so lazy to do so, they choose to force customers to pay double with guarantee bank will refund the money). so i have to pay another RM20.95 but until now no refundable from bank..
so total i spend is RM 41.90 for only treats that cost me RM20.95 . Such a scam! ..
Not worth it..i won’t go here again! | review_rating:5, text:I’ve gotten hamsters from them and they’re all so cute!!! The staff there makes sure the hamsters are good and healthy before you bring them home and they even give you some tips for hamster care! 100% recommend getting hamsters there if you’re interested

name: Perfect Match
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

category: chocolate_shop, dessert_shop, candy_store, confectionery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1.02A, Frist Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:My visit to ROYCE’ Chocolate at Sunway Pyramid was absolutely delightful and deserving of five stars. The store’s elegant presentation and wide array of premium chocolates made it a haven for chocolate lovers. I was particularly impressed by their signature Nama Chocolate, which was velvety smooth and rich in flavor. The staff were attentive and knowledgeable, offering helpful recommendations tailored to my preferences. With its luxurious treats and impeccable service, ROYCE’ is the perfect destination for indulgence or gifting. | review_rating:5, text:Good service by the staff working this morning - also good taste the chocolate - choc lover now | review_rating:5, text:Both staff very helpful on explaining the chocolate products, well-versed and friendly towards me. Would be monthly place to buy for wifey 😁👍 | review_rating:4, text:Affordable chocolate to snack on. My family has been loving the gift box, you can get lots of different flavour at one go! | review_rating:2, text:I bought the chocolate at Sunway Pyramid Tuesday around 5pm.
When I at the counter, a Malay male staff was very occupied with his mobile phone, obviously personal events as I can hear his voice messages. He ignored and walk in customer. I was later attended by another short hair lady that was doing her paperwork. She appears to be lack of product knowledge, questions posted such as which one is less milky taste, what’s inside an orange/cherry choc (half pure orange half pure cherry? Or mixture of these flavour?), her reply is “I don’t know, I don’t know”. Seriously? However, she is polite. Until payment, the male staff still on his phone. So I left the choc at store and returned to pick up my choc after two hours, I was attended by the male staff, he is STILL busy with his voice messages. While attending to me, his hand still swiping his phone. This is unacceptable. The staffs really need to be polished to serve such premium brand chocolates, and trained on what is customer service.

name: SWATCH
location: Jalan PJS 11-15 3 Unit, No. LG1.09, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I visited Swatch to replace my strap. Unfortunately, the new strap was scratched during installation. When I pointed it out, the staff explained that it was due to the difficulty of installing the strap and said they couldn't do anything about it.

I even tried polishing the screen afterward, but the scratches remain visible. (Image in reference). While I understand challenges can arise, I expected more care and a better resolution. I hope the team can improve their service for similar situations in the future. | review_rating:4, text:Energy For Life's free battery replacement comes with a key condition that many are not aware nor it is stated in their Swatch Malaysia website. The condition is that the watch must be presented for the free battery replacement with the old battery regardless whether it leaking chemical or in any condition. Even if you have to remove the chemical leaking old battery, you must keep it for them.

I strongly suggest Swatch Malaysia amend their website to state this condition clearly and also train their staff to advise customers accordingly.

P.S. Gratitude to supervisor Ms. Yong Han and staff Shafiq of Swatch Sunway Pyramid for their assistance earlier. | review_rating:5, text:Very knowledgable staff. Knows the latest trends.

I showed him my another watch of Stranger Things last year. He knows the latest news like the new watch featuring Star wars too.

Forgot to ask for his name but very friendly and knowledgeable person. | review_rating:5, text:Firstly, I'm very glad that Swatch reopened here so I can get battery replacement easily since it's nearer to me. After that, got my first watch purchase from the Dragon Year collection at this outlet and was attended by Joe, the senior sales executive.

He was nothing but amazing in his service. Took the time to chat with me and my husband. He answered our queries very well, showing his extensive knowledge about the company and products.

What a good representation of Swatch! I will be coming back for more. Well done! Keep it up! | review_rating:5, text:Trainee Danish was very helpful and offered excellent customer service! I am very happy with my purchase.

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Beutea 茶仙子 at Sunway Pyramid is another one of those trendy tea spots popping up everywhere, especially popular with the younger crowd. I gave it a try, but honestly, it didn't wow me. The drinks were a bit pricey, and the flavors just didn’t stand out for me. The service was polite, but everything felt lethargic and slow. The ambience was okay—not bad, but nothing that made me want to stay longer. Overall, I’m giving it 3 stars. I’m not really one to fall for the latest tea trends anyway! | review_rating:5, text:The service is good but not quick as they have many orders during promotion day. The ambience is nice and comfortable. The lights are bright and the design is beautiful. It makes you feel like you’re in their China branch. The drinks taste good and not too sweet. Highly recommend the white peach oolong milk tea. | review_rating:4, text:Had an afternoon break here while shopping to rest my feet. There was some seatings available within the store. Just that I find the service abit slow. Thought the prices had increased compared to the last time and now it’s costing more than a cup of Starbucks coffee so maybe next time will consider again before getting a cup. | review_rating:5, text:Always like their milk tea, normally I would order long Jing or oolong milk tea.
The deco here is also very deliberate. It gives a zen feeling. Ample table and chairs. | review_rating:5, text:At Top Floor.. have an apps for easy order...place is nice and cozy.. On Top VCR Sunway..

The Tea is nice and flavourful.. and the price is worth the price.. The taste is also good and nice...

Staff is fast and good service...nice place to try tea beside coffee..

Rekemended to try this brand of Tea.. :)

name: Fleurs
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Nam Heong
location: Lot LG1.98B, No.3, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:How come the sunway branch serves chicken rice with so little chicken? even the chicken rice from stalls outsides gives more chicken. i always go to the one in main place and the portion is so big and the staff there are ready to serve. Here hardly can find staff on floor. Always missing in and out. Not coming here anymore. | review_rating:5, text:Delicious chicken rice! The flavors were spot on, and the chicken was tender and juicy. The rice was fragrant and perfectly cooked. The restaurant has a clean, welcoming atmosphere with great service. Definitely a five-star experience—I’ll be coming back! | review_rating:2, text:After renovation, this place just became their petaling street branch. Limited selection of dishes, no more pastry.

Chicken rice is overpriced for providing only 4 pcs of chicken and most of the part is bone. Ginger minced is tasteless and chili sauce doesnt have enough garlic taste. The BBQ chicken is tender and the sauce abit to salty for me.

Kopi still hit the spot and liver taste great. | review_rating:4, text:A restaurant located inside Sunway Pyramid shopping mall (next to Mr DIY) - 2 floors below Asian Village.

Serving all and everything Ipoh. Especially like their chicken tart. The fillings are delicious, and the pastry is so fluff and nice in your mouth.

Their coffee, nothing to criticise as it gives you the full flavor of Ipoh. Anything more, it's not Ipoh already.

October 8, 2024 - it's been a while we didn't visit this old hangout of ours. As they are having a Tuesday promo of free Ipoh White Coffee, and so happened, we were hungry, so we ordered bbq meat rice and Wonton noodles. The noodles are good, but the bbq meat is a bit too saucy. | review_rating:4, text:Really like the atmosphere and decor of this restaurant. Friendly tentative staff.  Speaking to the Tea Time Specials, they're all a good price and the portions are amazing.  Egg tarts are pretty good.  The butter kaya toast was delicious.  White coffee was good too.  Clean facility.  Free WiFi.

name: Sakae Sushi
location: OB.K6, Ground Floor, Oasis Boulevard, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Waaaah, happy to see Sakae sushi offering other types of meals than sushi. It shock me to see the food come out this way. Big brand, but presentation and food quality is totally out. Ordered the Sundubu Jjigae RM26 (soup is cook with chilli flakes. Too much, it tends to be bitter), taste like f*&^%.....oooops mind my language, tofu smashed, eggs gone, my jjigae become a pile of vomits (check out my photo & Sakae photo). Kimchi fried rice RM22 (portion was unbelievable small) & finally Kyushu Paitan Ramen Rm20 (Soup terribly oily, noddles overcook, taste wise 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢) . Well, bye-bye & tata to this restaurant. Horrible meal. I seldom give 1 star unless it's really terrible. | review_rating:2, text:Had the worst shoyu ramen today. Soggy noodles, tasteless broth. It's a large portion of noodles, which is usually a good thing for me but with this one it felt like it took forever to finish it because it just wasn't good. Added probably 2 tbsp of their table soy sauce into the soup. It's possible the dish was left too long before it was served, because there was very little soup - maybe all soaked up by the noodles 🙈  Even my husband, who likes his noodles soft, didn't enjoy this.

The kimchi lava fried rice was also mediocre - the rice was mushy (my husband liked it that way tho), not enough flavour so this also had to be eaten with their soy sauce. The "lava" is just a runny egg omelette - you need to top up cheese to get the cheesey effect shown in the photos. At least we got a 20% discount for this dish though.

Service was decent, place is clean and tidy. But never coming back here. Super regret that we decided to try this (enticed by the photos!) instead of going to our regular noodle place 2 doors down. | review_rating:4, text:Less crowd this section of place. Food could be better, but with the quietness of the area, we like to eat it here. | review_rating:4, text:An outlet in the famous Sunway Pyramid Mall. Quality is ok. Design is ok. Staffs look very young. Overall is ok. Most importantly, it looks clean and well maintained. Hygiene is one of if not the most important thing. This is located in a corner area near G2000, which is a little hidden and not so easy to find. | review_rating:2, text:Rather expensive for a sushi restaurant so I thought maybe then it would be good. Albeit the food was okay, the environment wasn't very clean. It looks clean from the outside but small cockroaches are walking around on the table. It really put off the mood to eat. Regretful that I didn't check the reviews before coming here because it seems like it's been a problem for a while. Took a picture despite being grossed out by it.. 🤢

Overall, my first time experience here was not great. Staff was good, food was okay, cockroaches... 👎👎 Probably won't come back until they fix the 🪳 problem.

I spent about 160MYR at the store.
When I was paying my goods, I JUST asked to them It is possible to pay cash and card separately.

I don’t know Malay language, so I couldn’t understand what they said each other.
But I totally can feel they ignore me through the atmosphere.
after paying, I said that I don’t need receipt, then she said “oookaaayyyy”.
Is it right attitude of the server to customers?
This store needs to HR education more. | review_rating:1, text:Worst sales representative I have ever met in my life. name: BIBI'S POPIAH
location: F1.58F, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:4, text:Bibi’s Popiah at Sunway Pyramid is a good spot if you’re in the mood for fresh, tasty popiah! I’d give them four stars for the authentic flavor, with that classic balance of crunch and softness. There was a bit of a wait since it’s popular and plenty of people were ordering, so service wasn’t super quick. The staff handled it well—though they weren’t exactly friendly, they stayed calm and kept things moving smoothly. Prices are fair, so it’s easy to grab a few rolls without spending too much. Worth checking out if you’re around! | review_rating:1, text:The staff wore the same hand gloves to collect payment (in cash), hand me the mobile phone to collect my phone number, and to my surprise make my popiah too! Oh god! To my dismay, the other staff that I saw wrapping popiah of the customer before me is washing dishes and touching the bin with the SAME PAIR OF GLOVES! I am not surprised if she uses the same pair to prepare food later. This is super unhygienic. No matter how good is the popiah, unfortunately I will not return again until this practice is discontinued. This defeats the purpose of wearing a hand gloves. | review_rating:3, text:We loved the branch in SS15, so was excited for this one in Sunway pyramid. Sadly it's not as good. It's not crunchy like the one in SS15, most probably cause it's a franchise and they can't do things fresh from the kitchen here. Staff was super slow, was testing my patience 😅 most probably got to drive to ss15 for the best experience for now. Maybe after they figure out quality control for all their franchises, it'll be a lot better | review_rating:2, text:Quite careless. Ordered shrimp popiah n right in front of me she's making seaweed popiah. There's no one else around so I had to say something for them to recheck and redo. If I didn't say anything that's what I would have gotten. Shrimp popiah uses the tiny shrimps with shells on. Not really my thing. | review_rating:5, text:Super nice popiah, crunchy keropok combine with flavourful turnip. The sauce is very nice, a combination of spicy and sweet... yums. Can request for extra chilli if you like extra heat! Will definitely come back again!

name: LEATHER AVENUE
location: Lot LG1.129A, Lower Ground One, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Mr.Iskandar was very professional and provided great detailed explanations on differences between different materials of luggages and recommend based on my needs. Highly recommend. Products also quality at reasonable price 👌 👍 | review_rating:1, text:Bought 2 Mendoza luggage in April 2024. Used once in May 2024 and by the second time using in October 2024, the inside strap snapped. Poor sewing quality. Contact the outlet, and they said they don't provide any warranty nor any repair and asked to seek an outside luggage repair shop to fix it.

It is only second usage, and moreover, only 6 months from purchase.

Won't make any more purchases with this shop. | review_rating:5, text:The staff were incredibly knowledgeable and helped me find the perfect suitcase for my upcoming trip. They took the time to understand my travel needs, explaining the features of different luggage options. | review_rating:1, text:I’m a consumer which bought a Mendoza luggage from Leather Avenue located in Sunway Pyramid. The sales guy clearly stated that 30% discount will be given when two item is bought, however, it was found on the receipt that only 20% was given. I called back to the shop and they said that they charged the price wrongly and ask us to go back to the shop immediately to get back our money. No compensation was given but causing more and more problems and inconvenience to customers. I’m not satisfied with the service so I’ve asked for a refund as I wanted to return the product back. This option is rejected and it shows how bad the service of this brand and how unprofessional this brand is as they did not train their employees well to prevent such things from happening. It also shows how bad the brand is as it’s after sales service is too bad. Besides, it’s already 2 weeks time and they have not processed the refund. | review_rating:5, text:Had a fabulous experience this morning. I stopped in looking for a wallet for my dad. There were two sales associates at the shop and both were super helpful and patient with me, especially the male associate who was helping me specifically (sorry didn’t catch your name!). I was trying to choose between two wallets with very different price points and they did not try to push me to the more expensive one. In fact the male associate actually pointed at the cheaper one saying the design of it would probably be more to the liking of an older gentleman. The display wallet was the last one so they couldn’t give me a new one, but polished the display one up for me, and also let me know that they offered lifetime polishing for the particular brand of wallet that I purchased, Charles Berkeley, my dad just needed to stop by any Leather Avenue outlet.

Thank you both for your patience and helpfulness! Dad seems happy with the purchase :)

name: TMT Megastore by Thunder Match
location: F1.85A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I wanna give a very honest review on this.

So I bought a logitech mouse for 300+ which sells between 250-300 on lazada. You have to understand that all shops here especially the tech shops in Asian Avenue will sell items at higher prices. This is because rent for pyramid is high. Those who give ratings such as *overprice* without a good reason - no comments.

I did NOT buy a laptop so I am not aware of the quality of service this place offers and so you have to take ur own risk when buying from here.

Pros: You can exchange faulty peripherals with other peripherals from other brands within 14 days of purchase if u are a member. (Rm300 purchase gives u free membership).

You also get 1 year warranty.

Cons: Slightly more expensive.

_________

My personal opinion: I try not to buy from lazada and stuff for electronic devices because they is no certification that it is original and it is very difficult to exchange or send ur device for warranty when u purchase it online. I would pay the extra RM 50 for the reassurance from this shop. (Peripherals ONLY)

For laptops: I can't give a review so do keep that in mind. | review_rating:1, text:Worst store ever. I've let them changed my HDD to SSD. They secretly changed my BIOS and say that my BIOS was slow but actually they have put a defect one in my laptop. | review_rating:1, text:I bought a RM4k laptop right there and it's 1 year ago and 6 months is on service. I went to there for 5 more times just for repairing my laptop | review_rating:1, text:I have to back and forth for my newly brought laptop , really piss me off . Really regret to have my laptop bought here , I have to get back to here for the third time in order to solve my laptop problem | review_rating:1, text:very bad warranty claim system and they sell overpriced items.don't buy from them

name: JUICY FRESH JUICE BAR
location: LG 1.70A Sunway Pyramid Jalan PJS 11/15, Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:I normally get my juice fix here because the menu is easy to understand.
But the service here is lackluster, like what most reviews have said. The cashier was a foriegn worker and I didn't know what he was mumbling.
Most tables are left dirty and not cleaned. The rubbish bin looks disgusting. | review_rating:1, text:I’ve always wanted to try Juicy ever since I started using Shopee e-vouchers. Today, I finally gave it a shot and ordered an Avocado drink since it was on sale for just RM8. While it was tasty and decent for the price, I don’t think it quite met the standard of a full-priced RM12.90 drink.

What really let me down, however, was the cashier’s attitude during my visit. As a first-timer at Juicy, I was hoping for a little guidance, but the female staff didn’t bother explaining the avocado drink options on the menu. Instead, she abruptly asked, “Avocado apa?” without pointing out the choices from the start. After I paid, she handed me the receipt without a word of thanks. Even though I said “thank you” to her, she didn’t smile or acknowledge it—her expression clearly showed she didn’t want to be there.

The lack of professionalism became even more apparent when the next customer (as seen in the photo) pointed out a mistake in their order. Rather than apologising and fixing the drink, the staff exchanged annoyed glances with each other. Based on this experience and previous Google reviews, it’s obvious that the staff could use serious training in customer service and might not be suited for Front-of-House roles in F&B. | review_rating:5, text:Have always love the juices here. My A Time FAV, AVOCADO Milk. Rm12.90 , 1 size only. Its licated at LG1, opp of Leather Avenue. After a tired shopping, may drop by here chillax with a cup of juice. | review_rating:1, text:I don’t leave usually like to leave negative reviews but I have noticed this pattern with your employees especially the new cashier. Today I came at 9:20, they were already tallying up the cash which is fine but as  I approached the counter they look disinterested in taking the order infact I would say they were annoyed that I came to buy. They were whispering when I approached. I am a frequent visitor at sunway pyramid but I realised that this only happens at your shop and I have noticed this multiple times prior to this occasion also. I understand everyone wants to finish  and close up to go back home but 9:20 it’s seems ridiculous. Even after my turn there were 3 more group of customers and the main cashier’s attitude was the same. What’s weird is that the cashier and the other worker seem to be giggling with each other but when serving customers they seemed like they just couldn’t care. I am not asking for much, just at least pretend to be interested if you’re in the service industry. I work in f&b too so I understand. | review_rating:1, text:Poorly trained staff very rude, acting like they will doing you a favour. Juice  itself
was good. Should of walked to look for a Boost Juice. Will not support again.

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Dropby for afternoon tea, ordered their own house blend cafe latte with lemon cake.
7oz latte ice with price RM 14.80 before tax really high and taste really so so, espresso should be more to make it more bold taste.
Lemon cake soft & moisturise, taste good, just a bit sweet, sugar level if reduce 2 steps will be perfect. | review_rating:5, text:Good coffee here and granny apple cake is yummy

Love the banana nut bread too.

Located in new oasis area. LG1.

One level above Jaya Grocer | review_rating:3, text:So did Whisk managed to whisk me away from my usual Zus with its iced latte? At RM15.70 and in a smaller volume, not quite yet. It is fine with its mild bitter aftertaste lingering just briefly to let the milk taste break through. I will however stay with my usual Spanish latte at RM11.20. Sometimes I get two for the price of one. I think Whisk has another one at Mont Kiara and I remembered I had the same iced latte in a bigger glass. Anyway, this is at Sunway Pyramid. | review_rating:5, text:Hands down best coffee I had in a long time. Carrot cake was also really good. | review_rating:5, text:Fantastic vibes and people. The guys here know their coffee. The filter coffee is great. Prices are reasonable. Much better than the other chains coffee around.

reviews: review_rating:5, text:Met make-up stylist [ Sue Teoh ] at City Mart , SUPERBBBB EXCELLENT AND FRIENDLY!!!! Makes me loving Shu Uemura even moreeeeee , thank you so much for the help, guidances and recommendations during my visit 💖 | review_rating:5, text:I recently attended a makeup workshop at the Shu Uemura Sunway Pyramid counter with my mom, who has no makeup experience. Melanie, the store manager, was incredibly patient and skilled, teaching my mom in a way that made her feel confident. What stood out was her genuine care—she didn’t hard-sell us but only recommended products we truly needed. Melanie’s professionalism and expertise make her an asset to Shu Uemura, and I hope her excellent service is recognized! | review_rating:5, text:I cannot express enough gratitude for Melanie's exceptional service! I found myself in a last-minute predicament needing my eyebrows done for my wedding, and everywhere was closing up. Thankfully, Melanie came to the rescue at 9:30 pm with open arms and a heart of gold. Not only did she accommodate my urgent request, but she also delivered a flawless 100/10 job on my eyebrows. Melanie's warmth, politeness, and bubbly personality made the experience truly delightful. It's evident that she takes immense pride in her work and genuinely cares about her clients' needs. Without a doubt, the best service I've ever received. Melanie is an absolute gem in the beauty industry, and I highly recommend her to anyone in need of eyebrow services. Thank you, Melanie, for being like an angel in my time of desperation! | review_rating:1, text:Came here to get my eyebrow pencil and there is only 2 BA on duty. When I approached one of the BA who is doing an eyebrow trimming for a customer, she replied to me with an unfriendly manner saying “we only have two person”. What I  am expecting is just to tell me politely how long I am gonna wait till someone is able to serve me. Such a lousy service nowadays! If you ever see the pink hair BA in the boutique, just walk off cos she will definitely spoil your lovely day! | review_rating:5, text:a chinese lady Sue Teoh sales assistant is super good for me to go back again to Shu uemura sunway pyramid ! 😊

name: Lollipop Pink
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
