name: HEYTEA
location: F1.07, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a pleasant first visit! The girl with glasses who served us was incredibly patient and took the time to explain everything thoroughly, she answered all my questions without rushing. The shop itself is clean, hygienic, and has a high-end appearance. A great experience overall! | review_rating:5, text:Had bubble milk tea here and it’s good. Bubble is chewy but not that chewy until mouth to get tired. Got my drink few minutes after order placed. Staff are friendly | review_rating:5, text:I tried the Coconut Mango Boom and Crisp Grape Boom from Heytea, and they were both so good! The Coconut Mango Boom was super creamy and refreshing, with real mango chunks that made it even better. The Crisp Grape Boom was light, sweet, and tasted just like fresh grapes.

Both drinks were super refreshing, and I’ll definitely come back for more! | review_rating:5, text:I recently had the pleasure of visiting Heytea for the first time, and I must say, it was a delightful experience! On a weekend, I was pleasantly surprised to find the place less crowded than I had anticipated, allowing for a more relaxed atmosphere.

There’s a small seating area where you can unwind and take in the ambiance.

Tried the Coconut Mango Boom, and it was truly a decent drink! The combination of coconut and mango was refreshing, making it a perfect choice for a warm day. What really stood out to me was the ability to customize the sugar level, which is a thoughtful touch. It’s great to have the option to adjust sweetness according to personal preference; this kind of flexibility is often hard to find in many bubble tea shops.

As for the pricing, I found it quite reasonable for the quality of the drinks. | review_rating:1, text:I already order with this girl two time! Every time she take order from customer is very rude and impolite, her face will be angry! I visit on last Thursday her friend ask her come out for ordering and she is very unhappy because she just came out from kitchen and she ask about our order with very low voice and in clear so at the finally she take wrong with my order! Today is she again, I went to order she speak very low voice again, I was unclearly what she is speaking so I said “Sorry ?” then she reply me very loud and rude “Welcome to Heytea!” with a angry face! I straight walk away and I swear will not visit SUNWAY PURAMID HEYTEA again!!!!! Not good service!!!!

I'm regular customer of sixty eight and I buy most of my inner garments here because the quality is good and can last a long time, so it's worth the price point. Plus, their prices reduce alot when there is ongoing promotion | review_rating:2, text:I'd rate 5 stars if not for the bad attitude of one of the staff there (Tall, wore glasses, long black hair, tan skin). When I asked whether there's more sizes, she answered in a very impatient manner. Then I asked her if she could help me to update my membership account as a staff in Nu Sentral has registered my account under Hong Kong, she then proceeded to act passive agressive and told me to register a new account myself. Even though it's not her fault regarding the issue about my account, but she could have explained to me in a better manner. It's not the first time she has acted very rudely, the first time I bought from this branch, she was the cashier and she was also acting very unfriendly for no reason... | review_rating:5, text:Very nice products. Staff is very polite, friendly and helpful. | review_rating:1, text:Kindly be aware of the scamming here. A staff was helping to do cashier and I'm going to pay with card. Their terminal shown declined but immediately I got notication from bank saying it has successfully gone through. But they keep telling me they do not receive the payment.
The fat malay lady then come and tell me to contact my bank side as I'm the one being frustrated. Dude imagine you paid double and the merchant told you they got nothing and puss everything to bank.
The initial cashier girl then saying previously there's customer who faced this problem as well. I was like if your terminal on and off have problem, don't play with other money.
The fat lady I'm not sure who named puteri or Putra pls man, she legit have to go through training and understand the word customer service.

name: Torii Teppanyaki
location: LG2.131B, Level LG2, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic lunch at Torii Teppanyaki! They offer a wide variety of interesting menu options, making me excited to visit again when I’m in Sunway. The staff was friendly and welcoming, and the plating made the dishes look even more appealing. Plus, the food was served quickly, so I didn’t have to wait long. Overall, a great lunch experience! | review_rating:5, text:Had a great experience at Torii Teppanyaki! The staff were super friendly and made us feel really welcome. The food was delicious—fresh, flavorful, and cooked perfectly right in front of us. The place is also really clean and comfortable. Definitely worth a visit! | review_rating:5, text:The food tasted even more delicious with the friendly and attentive staff, and it arrived in a timely manner. The warm and welcoming atmosphere made the experience even more enjoyable. I highly recommend their signature dish, the chicken katsu set meal—it’s absolutely delicious! | review_rating:5, text:Value for money teppanyaki place. The beef is really nice! Salmon okonomiyaki was good. Chicken teppanyaki & the prawns were also nice. The lamb rice could be better as the lamb was overcooked & tough, better to order other proteins cuz the plate is sizzling. Hausboom drinks are fun & tasty. Service is good. | review_rating:3, text:Ordered the golden prosperity bundle and got ourselves chicken and beef.
The beef slice was overly done, too hard to chew. The cook needs more training as the serving was in hot plate (this continued to cook the beef). On the other hand, chicken was cooked perfectly. Not to give too high expectation on the free lou sang.

name: The Walking Hotpot
location: F1.AV199, Asian Avenue, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Good place to eat if you craving for hotpot. Portion is good and mala soup also very nice. Can give it a try! | review_rating:5, text:I recently visited The Walking Hotpot for the first time, and it was an absolutely delightful experience! This cozy spot offers individual hotpot servings, allowing everyone to enjoy their favorite flavors without compromise.

The moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and inviting ambiance. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, guiding me through their extensive menu and helping me choose the perfect broth and ingredients.

I opted for the spicy mala bowl, and it did not disappoint! The flavors were rich and robust, with just the right amount of heat to keep things exciting. I chose the beef bowl, and the beef slices were thin, delicious, and generously portioned with lots of fresh ingredients. I heard it’s specially made for mala lovers, and I really loved it.

One of the highlights was the Osmanthus Ice Jelly – a must-try! The unique taste of this cool drink was both refreshing and tasty, making it a perfect complement to the hotpot.

Additionally, I would highly recommend the Australian Beef Slice, Pork Slice, and Lamb Slice. All the meat slices were incredibly fresh and enhanced the overall dining experience.

The portion sizes were generous, and the pricing was reasonable considering the quality and experience. It's perfect for both solo dining and small groups who prefer a personalized touch to their hotpot meal.

Overall, The Walking Hotpot exceeded my expectations. It's a gem for hotpot enthusiasts looking for a personalized and flavorful dining experience. I’ll definitely be back to try more of their broths and ingredients!

Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:This is the perfect place for solo diners who want to eat hotpot. For RM19.90 you can get a hotpot with 4 items and a drink. Very worth it. Food was served fast and it was pretty delicious. The portion was very filling for me. Will definitely be back again. | review_rating:5, text:Nice place, went here before they expanded the space. Food very nice | review_rating:4, text:I ordered the set hotpot here, costs RM19.90 for just 4 different sides with a broth of your choice. Price wise if quite okay for small eater, but you if you consider yourself a big eater, you might need to top up more sides. Some sides like pork slices or fish slices have surcharge so do take note when ordering the set.

name: Power Bank
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

What impressed me the most was his suggestion to try the shoes on a treadmill to ensure the right fit - a thoughtful touch that truly sets this store apart. En. Ahmad's deep knowledge of the products and his friendly, encouraging attitude made the experience unforgettable.

When the size we wanted was out of stock, En. Ahmad went above and beyond to source it from other branches for us. His dedication and willingness to help were truly outstanding.

I've been to several Running Lab branches before, but I've never encountered someone as dedicated and knowledgeable as En. Ahmad. I am so glad I decided to visit this branch today! Both my sister and I ended up making purchases, and we left feeling completely satisfied.

In contrast, I’ve always had great experiences at Zara in Mid Valley, where the staff are friendly and attentive. I hope the service at Sunway Pyramid can be improved to match the high standards I’ve experienced elsewhere. And also please smile to customer | review_rating:4, text:Used to love to shop for this brand for my daily working, formal and casual outfits but it is no longer interesting and not the same as before MCO (March, 2020) anymore with more choices, style, colours, cutting but the quality is getting worse, promotion not that good or attractive anymore, and the price went up even it is made in Cambodia, Bangladesh, Indonesia, India, Pakistan, Vietnam and China, it is very difficult to find something made in Morocco, Turkey, Spain and Portugal anymore | review_rating:1, text:This Zara branch has always been my go-to. They usually have great stock availability, an excellent layout that makes shopping easy, and the staff used to be welcoming. But my last visit was disappointing.

At the counter, without greeting, the cashier immediately assumed I was returning the item, which I found strange but amusing at first. But then, after paying, she stamped "no exchange" on my receipt with no explanation and an annoyed look. While I can overlook the rude attitude, this isn’t typical based on my shopping experience at Zara - most staff would clarify if there’s a special condition for a purchase. As far as I know the item was new and it was most definitely a first-time purchase.

I still love the layout and ambience of the store, I hope the staff’s attitude is something management can work on to make sure a better experience for all customers.

name: Chizu
category: cafe, bakery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG1.08, sunway pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:Restaurant Review: A Disappointing Dining Experience

I recently visited this restaurant after being drawn in by a 50% discount promotion. Unfortunately, the experience left me feeling underwhelmed and questioning the value for money. Here’s a breakdown of my visit:

Atmosphere ★★★★☆ (4/5)
The restaurant has a cozy and inviting vibe with wooden tables and tasteful decorations. Since it’s located inside a mall, the air conditioning keeps the space comfortable, making it a pleasant spot to sit and relax. However, the ambiance didn’t quite make up for the other shortcomings.

Service ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
The ordering process is straightforward—you place your order at the counter, and the staff delivers it to your table. While the staff was polite, it took about 10 minutes for our food to arrive, which is reasonable but not particularly fast. The service was average, with no standout moments of hospitality.

Food ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
The food was disappointing overall. The portions were noticeably smaller than advertised, and the quality didn’t justify the price.
•	Chicken Katsu Cromburger ★★☆☆☆ (2/5):
The burger looked promising at first glance, with fresh and soft bread. However, the chicken was tough and difficult to chew, which ruined the dish. I added scrambled eggs and vegetables for an extra RM8, but they were bland and didn’t add much flavor.
•	Chicken Pepperoni Croissant ★★★☆☆ (3/5):
This dish fared slightly better than the cromburger. The croissant was flaky and buttery, but the chicken pepperoni filling lacked seasoning and excitement. It was edible but not memorable.
The overall taste of the dishes felt uninspired, with no standout flavors or attention to detail in preparation.

Price ★☆☆☆☆ (1/5)
This is where things went downhill fast. The 50% discount promotion was misleading—it only applied if you ordered an overpriced drink. I ended up ordering a Bloody Mocha with Cheese for nearly RM17, which was overly sweet and gimmicky. With additional charges like RM8 for scrambled eggs, my total bill for two people came to almost RM78 after taxes. For this price, I expected much higher quality food and larger portions.

Parking - N/A
Since this restaurant is located inside a mall, parking depends entirely on the mall’s facilities. It wasn’t an issue during my visit, but this will vary based on location and time of day.

Final Verdict: Not Worth Revisiting
With its tricky marketing tactics, overpriced menu items, and below-average food quality, I won’t be returning to this restaurant anytime soon. While the atmosphere was pleasant enough, it doesn’t make up for the lackluster dining experience or poor value for money. If you’re looking for better options in this price range, there are plenty of other restaurants that offer superior quality at a fairer price.
Ideal Times to Visit: If you’re still curious about trying this place despite its flaws, visiting during off-peak hours might ensure faster service and a quieter atmosphere.

Legend:
•	★☆☆☆☆ = Bad
•	★★☆☆☆ = Below Average
•	★★★☆☆ = Average
•	★★★★☆ = Good
•	★★★★★ = Excellent | review_rating:3, text:I wished they had an option to make it hot cause it tasted cold and not that crisp. The matcha croissant icing is kinda sweet for my liking, the filling is good and creamy. The ribbon croissant has good taste on the pistachio side but the chocolate side tasted cheap, definitely not high quality chocolate. | review_rating:4, text:Chizu at Sunway Pyramid offers delicious pastries that are definitely on the pricier side, but the taste makes them worth trying. The pastries are fresh, with unique flavors that pair well with their drinks. The service was average—nothing remarkable—but the staff were polite and efficient. The café has a cozy vibe, making it a pleasant spot to relax or catch up with friends. While the prices might deter some, the quality of the food makes it a nice indulgence for pastry lovers. Overall, a tasty experience! | review_rating:4, text:Small cafe in the middle of the mall with an appealing selection of pastries. Tried the original egg tart which was okay! Had an oat milk cappuccino which was quite strong. Food and drinks took a while to arrive but were delivered to the seat. | review_rating:4, text:Having a great banana loaf which served in warm, the taste just fit to buds 😋
Tart and puff not served in hot with a bit disturbed after the banana loaf🫢
Fair price with the service, food and environment 👌

name: Lovisa
location: G1.52, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:My daughters had their ears pierced for the first time. What a pleasant experience it was. Would like to specially mention the Store Manager, Ross for her patience and excellent customer service in explaining to us the best options for my girls. And to top it off, Lovisa issued a Certificate of Bravery to both my girls. For parents who want to have their girls ears pierced for the first time, Lovisa is strongly recommended especially the Sunway Pyramid outlet. Service at the best. Thanks Ross for making it a memorable experience for the girls 🤼‍♀️ | review_rating:5, text:Ross did an amazing job piercing my daughter’s ears. She was really scared, but Ross was incredibly patient and gentle, making her feel comfortable throughout the whole process. The two free gifts to comfort her were such a thoughtful touch. Highly recommend Ross for anyone looking for a great piercing experience, especially if you’re nervous! | review_rating:5, text:Got our piercings done today, and was rlly in love with the service by a lady named Ross. The store do look like they needed more assistance tho, but despite that she’s the only one is store at that moment, she was rlly patience with every customer with their questions and also providing services to them. She was assuring me that she’ll come to me too to get my piercing done cuz the store that time was packed with customers. Overall a great experience, would definitely recommend anyone that’s looking to get their piercings done here. | review_rating:5, text:I did my first set of lobe piercings here! I entered the store to browse, but one of the staff there, Ross, started a conversation with me and that's when I asked about their piercing services.
I was planning to get needle piercing elsewhere at first but because Ross was helpful and knowledgeable, I ended up coming back here for their hand-pressure piercing.
Was pierced by Ross, who made me feel comfortable throughout - the whole thing was super quick and painless! It's been a week now and following the aftercare advice my ears are healing nicely with no swelling and minimal pain.
I've been to other Lovisa branches and honestly I am usually skeptical of the staff's skills but this Sunway Pyramid branch proved me wrong, they are professional, friendly and helpful.
I'll be back here for some surgical steel or titanium earrings once my healing period is up 🙌🏼 | review_rating:5, text:Went for piercing today, the Malay lady was super attentive and thank you for piercing very professionally!

If there’s anymore piercings I’d like to do in the future or to recommend my friends I would definitely recommend!! ☺️

name: Auri
location: G1.79 & 1.80 Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Thanks to your staff (a cute girl wearing tudung) help me to check if the item available at ioi city mall branch. Sadly my size mmg dah sold out! | review_rating:1, text:I have told the staff to inform the boss that he/she is just stupid by not providing/selling any paper bag/plaster bag/recycle bag for any purchases.

They will ask you to buy up to RM200 so that they give you a free bag. Below that then you have to carry any the purchased clothes with bare hand. If you need money so desperately, please SELL whatever bag which your customer can carry. What a shame.

Go at your own risk. | review_rating:5, text:The store is well organized and all of the item, is very nicely done. Will definitely come back! | review_rating:5, text:Nice environment to shop in and has great customer service. will mention to my friends about this store. | review_rating:5, text:the staff is very helpful

name: Kiehl's Since 1851
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Yi Poh
location: F1.AV.147 & F1.AV.195, First Floor, Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Nice place at Asian Street in Sunway Pyramid. There are many options of noodles. I took the premium char siew rice set .. the food is ok, but rice is a bit undercooked. My friend had the noodle set, and it's quite value for money. We also ordered some side dishes. | review_rating:3, text:Value meals are among my more affordable food in the mall. Ordered Hakka noodles which texture and taste was somewhat lacking in that traditional chewiness, aroma and taste of a good old bowl of traditional hakka noodles. Then fried wanton was a little bland. Prefer Tang Ping restaurant in SS2.
Ordering process thru the phone including payment was clinical and somewhat impersonal and distant. Slight mistake in the delivery of the drink and similar mistake observed in other customer order. Both the food, environment and service fail to draw me back there again. | review_rating:5, text:Nice atmosphere👍👍. Great view! Located at the top floor food street. Unlike some other branches, This Yi Poh branch is consistently serving quality dishes👍👍. Serving is by robots, waiting time not too long. Good crowds during weekends. Need to order by scanning QR codes (bad for older people) 🥲. Price is very reasonable. ⭐️.

Recommended place for a good value quick meal in Sunway Pyramid | review_rating:3, text:Was there for dinner around 845pm. Had hotpot mala pan mee (super spicy but nice :)), Wantan Mee dry (fried wantan is nice, noodles biasa je) & Wantan mee soup (tasteless). While eating baby croaches, climb onto my leg, ask hubby for help. Phobia ald, keep looking at my leg while I eat. The croaches could have come from some other place as I see Yi Poh staff,  sweeping n moping the floor around 950pm. | review_rating:1, text:Been taking YiPoh for so many times and the food was good and amazing however today to my surprise the curry mee which i always order beside Hakka Mee and Wan Tan Mee is totally waste of money .

It doesn't taste like Curry Mee and doesn't look like Curry Mee. It looks like Hokkien Prawn mee Soup.. but taste not even near it. No coconut milk at all!

This was the worst Curry Mee i had ever tasted and experience in YiPoh Sunway.
I wish im able to load a video. Pic doesn't show how bad it was , as it was colour corrected.
I bet the standards n SOP of food prep has gone downhill Pls do something 🙏🏻

Thank you

name: Snowflake
category: dessert_restaurant, dessert_shop, confectionery, restaurant, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1.87, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Snowflake has been a favorite of mine for years, and their black sesame supreme is the highlight of my visits. The shaved ice is incredibly smooth and finely shaved, creating a melt-in-your-mouth experience with every spoonful. What sets it apart is the generous and rich black sesame flavor that infuses each bite. The black sesame balls served alongside are soft and chewy that complements the ice perfectly. Whether indulging in it as a sweet treat after a meal or simply enjoying it as a refreshing snack, it’s often the perfect dessert to cool down and satisfy my cravings whenever I'm at Sunway Pyramid or Pavilion! | review_rating:4, text:There aren't many Snowflake branches around anymore, so it's good to see this one doing well. For after-dinner desserts, Snowflake is a great option. I particularly like the Mango Delight and the Soya series here. There are also hot and ice desserts, whichever you're in the mood for. The branch isn't really big, but it's cosy enough to have a sit down and have a nice chat. Recommended.

Update: They recently went through a renovation, and it looks a lot better. There's also more seating because of it now. So there's more reason to visit. | review_rating:4, text:Great dessert or any time snack.  Prices are a little high but the stuff is tasty.  Staff are friendly and quick with your order.  They have hot and cold items all which are made to order.  You can order from Grab as well.  Free Mall WiFi.  Seating area is clean but the chairs are too hard. | review_rating:4, text:I’m in KL for the weekend.. Went to Sunway Pyramid for window shopping. Had the delicious desserts at Snowflake.. Not too sweet, one of my favour. | review_rating:5, text:The matcha one tasted great. Taro balls were fresh and chewy. Grass jelly and all other toppings were good.
One downside was the temperature of the restaurant. It was hot in the area where the shop located and think it was due to construction work nearby.

name: Baskin Robbins
category: ice_cream_shop, bakery, dessert_shop, confectionery, wholesaler, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Lot F1.57, G Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:I got to try a few before choosing which flavors I wanted. Then I would put the order in the machine and make the payment. Choosing the flavors I wanted and paying was far from easy and without the help of the staff it was almost impossible to operate the machine correctly. It's a shame to have such a complicated ordering and payment process for such good ice cream flavors. | review_rating:4, text:Enjoyed 31% on Wednesday with my pink shirt. Got to enjoy double junior scoops with rm10.50.
Vatieties of choices to choose. Love the nutty ice cream. | review_rating:1, text:the ice cream is not cold enough!!!
other than that the service of the worker need too be improve. they is one malay service is so rude i don’t think so this is how to serve as a serve crew ! such a shame | review_rating:4, text:Best place to have Baskin Robbins ice-creams here. You can sit as long as you want after tired shopping because it's hidden from the counter and at the back of it. Also, this outlet has more variety flavors and ice-cream cakes ready-made. | review_rating:1, text:The counter person was not there when the shop was supposed to be open. It said on a small note that there are gone for a while. It looks very unprofessional. Hope there is improvements.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Love the quality of the underwear, 'Skinxwear', and the service is good. Thank you. | review_rating:3, text:Didn't have the style that i wanted.
Should bring in more thongs. | review_rating:5, text:生意兴隆~到此一游

name: Ooppa
location: Lot LG1.128,Lower Ground 1, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, LG1.128, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Went here right after an eye condition diagnosis. I was assisted by Mr Alan Yam and oh god, he was extremely helpful and dint push any sales more than what I was required.
Each and every single concern of mine was attended well and he was there, truout my one hour visit to make sure i am extremely satisfied with the frame I chose.

Definitely a to go place hereafter. | review_rating:5, text:Well stocked, well trained staff in a very humble shop in Sunway. When you're faced with competition from the other bigger chain specs stores, the only way to stand out is with customer service. And both Nelson and Izzah excel from start to finish.

During an initial visit, I tried on many different pairs and was attended to by Nelson, who politely and calmly helped me with my choices. But, I didn't get anything, thinking that I should look around first.

However, I didn't receive the same treatment elsewhere, even though I found something I really liked. And because of that, I went back to Oopa to get two pairs because of the service level.

The range that they have here may not be as much as others, but you feel really satisfied spending your money here for the service and care that's shown as a customer - and that's priceless.

Keep up the good work! | review_rating:5, text:I was served by Izzah. She was very attentive to my needs and actually provided good recommendations for my frame and lens. I found the whole experience very relaxed and easy-going so would definitely recommend this to my friends. | review_rating:5, text:I recently visited this spec shop and was thoroughly impressed by the excellent service I received. The staff were incredibly knowledgeable and helpful, guiding me through the selection process with ease. They took the time to understand my needs and preferences, ensuring I found the perfect pair of specs.
The quality of the products is top-notch, and the overall experience was seamless.

I highly recommend this shop to anyone in need of new specs or eyewear.

Kudos to Ms Izzah Tajul, Maryam.

Five stars all the way! | review_rating:5, text:I bought two glasses at this store and Izzah was very patient and attentive with my questions and the glasses preference. She explained really well on the lenses and as well was very accommodating for the frames choices as I was really contemplating with the designs. Please get izzah for assistance needed because she’s very helpful, friendly and nice!
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Boat Noodle
location: F1.79, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:It's a fun spot for a quick and tasty bite! I sampled three boat noodle varieties:
1. Pathumtani beef rice noodle (soy sauce based)
2. Ayutthaya chicken spring noodle (stronger herbal broth)
3. Creamy tom yum chicken rice noodle (seasonal, spicy and yummy!)

Personally, I prefer the chewier rice noodles.  The soups were all good – really depends on one's taste. I also ordered fried chicken skin; it was crunchy but average, still a fun snack. The Thai milk tea was decent. | review_rating:5, text:I was disappointed when Boat Noodle closed down at Sunway Pyramid, but I’m happy to say it’s recently reopened! The restaurant looks much better now—cleaner, more modern, and the interior design feels premium while still staying true to its brand identity. The service was quick and the staff friendly. My food arrived just five minutes after placing the order. Overall, I had a wonderful dining experience here | review_rating:5, text:Warm and welcoming staff made me feel right at home, offering great dish recommendations. The boat noodles were perfectly cooked with a flavorful broth, tender beef, and fresh herbs—small portions but packed with taste. The cozy ambiance and attentive service made the experience even better. Highly recommended for both food and hospitality! | review_rating:5, text:I loveeeee the environment so much! Cosyyyy.

Service tiptop.
The foods were soooooo good. I had my normal meals Ayuthaya Rice Noodles and chicken skin. Soooo fresh and presentable as you can see in my photos.

Iced Lemon Tea is recommended, the sweetness level is just nice.

Keep it up!!

Located in Sunway Pyramid. I came early, 10 am sharp. Like always, by 10 am Sunway already packed with people, so plan your trip here. | review_rating:5, text:A very warm welcome from all the staffs. The food and drink was good as usual because I just ordered my regular go-to meals. One of the staffs, Salsa who served me is very polite and friendly. I feel so at home even though I came to eat here alone. Overall I’m very satisfied and will come again.

name: Palsaik Korean BBQ
location: OB.K5-K6A, Oasis Boulevard, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Palsaik is one of the best, if not the best, Korean BBQ restaurants around. Palsaik is the whole package in terms of the quality of their meats and their sides. I've never had a bad time going to Palsaik and always leave satisfied. The service is also excellent as servers are constantly nearby. They cook for you as well, and they do a good job at it, too. This particular branch is really nice as it's the most spacious I've seen. They also have a nice kids' room attached to the restaurant. Price-wise, it is on the high side compared to other Korean BBQ places. However, what you get for your money is worth well it! Definitely and highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Had a great meal here! There were three of us, and we went for their set for two—it was just the right amount. Also got the vegetable pancake, which was super crispy and delicious!

The staff were friendly and attentive, and the biggest win? We walked out not smelling like oil or smoky bbq. You know that scent that usually clings to your clothes after Korean BBQ? None of that here!

Oh, and the banchan were refillable, which is always a plus. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:New dine in place in Sunway Pyramid. The interior design is nice and comfy, the staffs are friendly and helpful. It’s a cozy place for gathering and dine in. The is a playroom available for kid 3-12 years old too!

The taste of food is average according to my own preference. The menu did mention about the weight of the pork slice for 2 pax but personally think it’s small portion 😅 I definitely pork lover hence the portion is small for me.

Yummy yoghurt ice cream and it’s free flow, so with the bancan!

Overall happy with the dine in experience! One suggestion is if there is more choices for kid menu, that’s definitely perfect as it’s limited choice for toddler. | review_rating:5, text:First time invited by my friends in this place.. will be come again for bring my family due to play room provided for parents eating with peace.

Very uncomparation with other BBQ and hot pot restaurant perfect matching 2 in 1 set , affordable price and enjoying unlimited free desert ice cream with quality yoghurt ice cream free flow.. The pity of staff restaurant keeps refilling until the machine needs time to freeze ice cream. But lucky with display-hanging
"Notice preparation on progress." Good practise every 5-7minutes. I still can enjoy the ice cream!

I also never expected free-flow side dishes/vegetables in here , Normally, we ask only to provide as normal restaurants practise.

Good to gain memory. At least, this is my future place for dine perfect combination. Never try, Never know.

Impressive in detailing informing customers service from time being, Even busy weekend still manageable but still feel provide services.

No choice. I've to become a regular guest here as a service provider, and alertness attention from the manager meets up my expectations.

As Mention enjoy peacefully, play room is temptation for me.. hehe.

Food is quite affordable price and has more choices for me in different varieties of BBQ, even Ala Carte.  Good space and large table suitable for family gatherings, so far this  place is the most plenty big table. But lucky do a reservation early.

Friendly and comfortable environment better than other restaurant I went before. Great recommended overall, but this is not a super fine dining restaurant expected but a friendly, caring, and comfortable restaurant as my thoughts. | review_rating:5, text:love the foods, services, and dining ambience. ordered mini palsaik set, including their signature 8 flavours pork belly. generous food portion v reasonable price and superb services. staff will BBQ the meat for customers and let u know when the meat is done. they will give advice or recommend based on the dishes u order. for example, we planned to order the fried rice but the fried rice taste not good if paired v the hot pot soup we had ordered, so the waitress gave us advise to change the fried rice we choose earlier. they provided free ais cream n free flow side dishes. if u don't want pork, they also served beef, chicken, and seafood for BBQ. there is a playroom for kids, bonus for them.

name: Li-Ning
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a large shopping spree in this branch. Both new arrivals and older products are available for purchase!
Had wonderful assistance from advisors.

Although we completely forgot to use a member discount, got immediate help and repeated the transaction with the discount applied with no questions asked. | review_rating:3, text:Li-Ning at Sunway Pyramid is a fantastic sportswear store! They offer a wide range of sports shoes, athletic apparel, and accessories like socks and bags. The store is spacious and neatly arranged, making it easy to find exactly what you need. Whether you're into running, training, or casual sportswear, they have high-quality options. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, providing great assistance. A must-visit for sports enthusiasts! | review_rating:4, text:Good service by Mr Leo. However, the management should ensure that vouchers issued by Sunway Pals could be used.  The Sunway Pal voucher of RM30 could not be used and the staff used the customer app vouchers and provided some badges as a replacement. | review_rating:4, text:Great store if you’re a badminton fan!
They only sell Li-Ning here. But the selection of racquets is very extensive.
They usually have promotions here - but I wish the promotions were better on the high end racquets.
The staff here are great.
They’ll restring your racquet in under 1 hour usually.
They also stock the new Tectonic range of racquets! Again, I wish they offered a promotion on these. | review_rating:5, text:Good Experience, very friendly staff eventhough there was few groups of customer and she was working alone, she helped us through the whole journey of acquiring a christmas gift.

name: Only.my
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

Spend 1000rm in a single receipt to be upgraded to RED status for new customers. | review_rating:3, text:I think the pin point should be updated. | review_rating:5, text:Best brand and fashion for guys. | review_rating:5, text:No Review

name: Oga Tea & Dining
location: LG1.122C, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:This cafe offers great value for some of its dishes. The green tea is particularly impressive, flavorful, and worth the price. Although the spaghetti is on the pricier side, it’s worth it, with fresh prawns cooked perfectly. We also tried the big breakfast, and while the sausage was surprisingly deep-fried instead of pan-fried, it was still tasty. The salad was fresh and enjoyable. Overall, the food quality justifies the prices, making it a nice spot to visit for a satisfying meal. | review_rating:3, text:Overall, I think this place has potential, but it's not quite there yet.

We ordered tea and dessert, which tastes really good and reasonable to the pricing. However, management needs to put in the time to train their employees to elevate the place.

I looked at the menu and saw so many different types of teas. This is for people who are willing to pay the money to try out nuances between different types of teas.
The place presents itself as a more sophisticated place, not just your regular cafe. So, I asked the waitress for recommendations.

To my disappointment, the waitresses there were clearly part-timers hired to only serve tables. They also didn't have a person dedicated to recommend teas or talk about why is it brewed a certain way.

This should have been the selling point of the place-- yet it is not fully utilized.

From this experience, it goes from a potential spot for tea lovers who want to try different types of teas-- to suddenly just a regular cafe.

To be honest, the staff were polite, I find no fault in the service itself. I just can tell that no further training was given for them -- or 1 dedicated person -- to make the experience better. Again, I wouldn't write this much if it's just a regular cafe.

I can see that there is potential, and I can tell what the initial vision was.  I hope to see the place improve over time, or, to accept the route of being a regular cafe, where customers will start to ask about the price versus what you're getting. Just food for thought! | review_rating:3, text:The price vs environment doesn't match. It is a tad pricey for the food portion and serving doesn't come together if you come in group. Personally I find it awkward that I have to sit at the outside and it is so noisyto chill. The dessert is nice and matched with the price. Overall is alright but with such price, repeat visit is less | review_rating:5, text:Came here for lunch and we order the katsu curry rice and egg sandwich.

The katsu chicken set was delicious and the side dish that came with the set was good pairing.

The sandwich also another dish worth to order, the bread is thin and fluffy.

Will check out their other dish in future. | review_rating:3, text:The chazuke at OGA is really nice and stands out as the highlight of the menu. However, the restaurant has very limited space, making it feel a bit cramped during busy hours. Desserts are popular and tend to sell out quickly, which can be disappointing if you arrive late. While the food quality is ok, the prices are quite high, and I feel they might not fully justify the overall experience. A decent spot, but there’s room for improvement.

name: Cinnabon
category: bakery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2.135B, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Got 2 boxes of cinnamons! Original and chocolate omg both are soooo good. It is a must to reheat, just 3 minutes 180deg into the airfryer. Buns are crispy and chewy, flavours are super yums after toasting. Just downsize is the size, some big some small. | review_rating:1, text:i am very disappointed with the Cinnabon i bought recently. its was quite upset for me when i noticed they close down the stall at One Utama and Sunway Pyramid. Therefore, i am very excited when i known they will reopen in Nu sentral, TRX and sunway pyramid etc.

The cinnabun taste as good as before when the open in NU sentral and i have bought many times from there when i passed by however when i tried once from sunway pyramid ,the cinnabon taste is completely different , it does not taste like previous, the bun is very hard and dry, just like some cinamon bread i can get from any bakery shop. afterwards, I give another chance to get from Nu sentral again and thought its was the outlet issues , unfortunately the taste is just worse like sunway pyramid.

Cinnabon isn’t cheap and quite pricy for many people, so when we get this type of low quality food will double the disappointment… hope the owner can have a quality control and dont use cheap flour just to earn more money! | review_rating:4, text:Biscoff mini cinnamon was good . Big and mini cinnamon rolls available! | review_rating:2, text:Are we now not allowed to buy those which are on display? 1 for RM12.90, 2 for RM25.90. However, RM25.90 are only for pre-packed as those on display are for a la-carte only? Ridiculous business model!! Those pre-packed ones need to be reheated, so I requested them to reheat it and they put the whole box into their oven 30secs. If this is how Cinnabon do business, can expect no business real soon. | review_rating:5, text:Staff is good and nice. Answer me nicely and serve with patient. Cinnamon rolls is good tho. Very recommend is Pecan Bon! Have lots of sweet n crunchy pecan on top! All time favorite.

name: PRISM+
location: Lot F1.15, First Floor, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Good service and staff Reen is very friendly to introduce the products to us. Definitely will come back again when we need anything prom prism+ | review_rating:1, text:I am beyond frustrated with Prism+. They promised a simple one-on-one exchange process for warranty claims, but the reality was far from that. Instead of a straightforward exchange or repair, I was forced to jump through countless hoops and complete endless steps just to get any kind of response. After all of that, they didn’t even exchange or repair the defective product.

What makes this worse is that they don’t even have a service center to handle issues directly. It’s all just a frustrating online back-and-forth with no actual support. I regret purchasing from this company and would advise others to stay away unless you want to deal with endless delays and a complete lack of customer care. | review_rating:2, text:I bought a Google TV Q series in 2022 via PRISM online platform (it comes with 2 years warranty).Now - Nov 24, my TV is 2 years 10 months old, it starts having problem, blank (black) screen after power on. Spoke to customer support, since my TV is after warranty period (even though is only 10 months after warranty) the TV is less than 3 years old, they told me they cannot help and offer me a 15% discount if I choose to buy a new unit of TV.
You think this is a good solution and acceptable customers support after sales? | review_rating:5, text:wonderful and good service by the sunway prism+ team. Manager (didn’t get his name), Vino and Vinayk helped me a lot in guiding me what to buy and providing me information on their products. They were very helpful from day 1. I would also like to thank Vino for replying to my messages even it was late at night, she was patient and helpful despite it being after working hours for her. Good customer service and attitude, very friendly!! | review_rating:5, text:Good service and amazing products! Team is super helpful, especially Jana, Reen and Puven!

name: Surau
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Parkson
location: G1.22,LL1.26, LL2.21 & LL3.05, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:We dropped by this place to look for ladies apparel. They have many brands with reasonable prices, especially during sales. The sales assistant at one of the sections was helpful and got us a new item from stock. A good place for clothes during festive season. | review_rating:3, text:A similar store to other Parkson stores. However, it is on three floors and each floor is geared towards a different gender. The ground floor is aimed at children and young people. | review_rating:4, text:Parkson is a reliable place for a quality shopping experience. They offer a great range of products, from clothing and accessories to home essentials and beauty items, catering to different tastes and budgets. The store layout is well-organized, making it easy to find what you need. The staff is friendly and generally helpful, providing good customer service. The sales and discounts are a nice bonus, offering great deals on quality products. The only room for improvement would be a more diverse variety in certain sections, but overall, it's a great place to shop! | review_rating:4, text:Love the clothes and items here but we all know it’s the holidays. Queue to Pay is extremely long and only 1 person at counter…
Should have more staff to handle during peak times.
Choices 5*
Service/Cashier 1* | review_rating:1, text:very bad experience at here, for Brand Larrie girl shoes, all way we need to try shoes, no body to serve us, staff at the photo Larrie Brand are playing phone, or chit chat with Scholl brand staff only, and  discuss about holiday, and plan for MC to get their holiday, and the way he talk is going instruct me to make payment at cashier 2, very horrible service.

review_rating:5, text:The staff at this store were very polite and kind, creating a welcoming atmosphere. They were also knowledgeable about the products, which made me feel confident in my purchase. name: DEKORI
category: dessert_shop, confectionery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG 1. 18A, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Visited this dessert shop for the first time and noted that there was no physical menu available; instead, there was a small iPad screen, which made it difficult to view options. Additionally, many items were unavailable. The shop was quite crowded on a Sunday evening, and I waited nearly 20 minutes for one bingsu to be prepared. In terms of flavor, it was acceptable but rather plain, and I found the prices to be on the higher side. Based on this experience, I am unlikely to return. | review_rating:3, text:Service were efficient both at the order counter n food preparations. Portion seems small n condiments too, not as much as expected, compared to the price. Taste wise was ok n like the option to add how much sugar to taste. Will come again for others | review_rating:2, text:The service was so bad. They had no menu on the counter, it was just an iPad screen which was so small. Then when we wanted order some desserts we chose, the worker said there wasn’t any stock for the taro. Then after we decided on another dessert to order, he again told us there is no stock again. So frustrating. He could have just told us before us choosing that there are some items that aren’t available.

overall the food was okay. A bit pricey for the boba taufufa. such a small bowl for like the price of Rm 20.

For the snowflake strawberry yogurt, it was too high and when you eat it, it will just drop on the tray. So just keep in mind it’s very high risk in wastage. | review_rating:1, text:Not worth it!!! Not worth the price!!!
Dekori used to be my go-to dessert, however not anymore…
The portion become much smaller, with the toppings become lesser, which you can even see the shaved ice at the bottom of the toppings….
Disappointed… | review_rating:5, text:had pearl milk tea taufufa.

taste: surprisingly it taste very good. probably the sugar water makes it good. also the pearl is "crunchy" not "gummy". taufufa is soft like usual.

5 stars!

name: Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre (SPCC)
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:One of the big shopping mall in Kuala Lumpur with various branded to casual retail shops,restaurants and fast food easily available.
Also a skating ring compass time. | review_rating:5, text:I love how spacious it is compared to other conversations I've been to.
Personally, I don't like hot environments. So I love how cold this place is!!
(Whenever I think of this conversation centre I always think of COS-MIC.)
Also, I didn't see any elevators that can be used to go to the convention centre floor. It would be great if there was! | review_rating:5, text:My second time there when I visited Kuala Lumpur. Definitely a place to go for shopping and food. A lot has changed since the years have passed. | review_rating:5, text:The convention center is huge and spacious. Went there for the big bad wolf book sales for the first time. The place was well maintained and neat. | review_rating:5, text:Great place to have meeting, celebrations and quality time pass.

category: ice_cream_shop, dessert_shop, confectionery, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 1.58H, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:The baby blue is smooth and creamy, with a unique flavour I have yet to find elsewhere. I strongly reccomend it! Wonderful selection. The pistachio is good as well. Staff is friendly. | review_rating:1, text:Hated my very first experience. Veryx100 unfriendly staffs. Judging customers all the way as if like its her father’s ice cream shop. It’s only 9.15 pm but already rushing to close the shop. Allowed the previous customers to have a taste but when it’s our turn, she said they have already kept the testers. Like???? It’s not like we want to try the flavours for an hour??? Mostly will take only about 5 mins only. Very unprofessional. Will not repeat thanks | review_rating:5, text:Really nice ice cream, and putkin (one of the staff) was amazing: I was trying to treat my friend and she helped me sneak the payment! Very greatful!! And she was nice and smiling 😁

name: Ichiban Ramen
category: ramen_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Unit No.LG 2.31, Lower Ground Two, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:the food is good here, especially their ramen; the  broth is quite creamy and delicious! and dumpling filling is alot too.
recommended | review_rating:4, text:Had lunch at Ichiban Ramen and tried the spicy Ichiban ramen. The ramen noodles were perfectly kenyal (springy) and had a nice texture, which I really enjoyed! However, the broth could use a bit more kick—the spice level was milder than expected and didn't quite hit the mark.

The environment was comfortable, not too hot or too cold, which was nice. I ordered the lunch set, but it required an additional RM3 for an iced lemon tea, which felt a bit off since you'd expect the set to be a better value without add-ons.

The service was okay, though sometimes it took a while to get the staff's attention as they didn’t always check for raised hands. Overall, an okay experience, but a few improvements would make it even better | review_rating:3, text:Food was ok, even though it could have been better. The chicken slightly dry. Ramen also slightly pricey to compare with big bowl but normal portion (at least to us lah). Ramen soup also ok-lah just like that. AND do not add on extra chilli. Not worth it to pay for small chilli plate size. The kimchi fried rice quite decent. Can come and try but might not come again so soon. | review_rating:5, text:Decided to go there for a quick lunch Service was great especially by the waiter Daniel He was super attentive Price was reasonable for the lunch set which comes with a drink, fruit and soup | review_rating:3, text:Quite busy. Food could be better, portions are a bit small, and too salty. Food took quite some time to get here also. All in all, not really a restaurant I would come back to.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

Regret.. regret.. regret .

Lesson learn:

name: Aeroline
location: LG, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Jalan Pjs 11/15, Taman Bandar Sunway, 46150, Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:VLT 8817, Scania 6X2 Double Deck equipped with the SKSBUS D3DD body.

14/10/2024
Seats 61A, 61B
8:30AM
Aeroline Penang—Corus Hotel KL

Trip started PROMPTLY at 8:30 AM, no delays. Driver and crew, Faiz was very nice. They helped with check in, seat directory and baggage. The driver was very skilful when navigating through the narrow roads. In one instance, it was a 2 lane road and there was one car illegally parked.  The driver still managed to drive by without even needing to reverse.

At around 8:35, Faiz came down the row with comfy blue blankets and headphones.  The headphones worked great with the on-board entertainment (OBE). The OBE was equipped with many movies and songs, of different genres.

At about 9, Faiz served food to us. It had spicy rice, potato wedges and egg. The food was 9/10, tasty! He also served hot drinks which also tasted great!

The rest of the trip, he went around a few times to collect trash.

There was one stop at a fuel station for 15 MINUTES break.

At about 1PM-1:30PM, we arrived at Corus Hotel. Driver was nice enough to let me take videos of the bus.

2 mineral water bottles with Aeroline branding is provided.

Overall, awesome ride. It deserves more than 5 stars!

Bus Quality:

Can clearly tell that the bus was very well kept. The seats were clean and comfortable, recliner and leg rest was working. Screen was working, WC was also very clean. Tray Table also works perfectly fine. | review_rating:4, text:Suggest the food to be improved because the portion is too little. Other than that overall is good. Thanks. | review_rating:3, text:For those who want to travel with Aeroline, tips: DO NOT choose lower cabinet, it's near the toilet) as it smells bad everytime other passagers open the toilet door. Especially during evening journey. | review_rating:5, text:Superb bus service. They have a lounge in the ground floor of the bus where you can literally have a work desk.  You can get lot of work done on your commute from KL to Singapore or vice versa. Staff are nice. There is a small toilet and pantry next to the lounge which also has a tv. | review_rating:4, text:One of the most comfortable method to get into Singapore. Very comfortable buses with huge seats and included meals also. Toilet available in bus as well. It's a little more expensive than normal express bus, although for the comfort, it's quite worth the little extra money. Recommended.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The kakak is very patient and good service! | review_rating:1, text:The 2 ladies that served me were quite rude. I was mailing a photocard to my friend and needed an envelope so I went here to inquire. The 2 ladies kept saying they don’t sell envelope and cannot help me mail it, so I was searching other places in pyramid that I can buy an envelope from while taking a seat there for rest. While sitting, I received a call from my father and took the call quietly in Korean (as I’m Korean) and quickly finished the call. After the call finished, the 2 ladies had a 180 attitude change towards me, beckoned me to the counter as they now suddenly “wanted to help” and can help me mail my cards. All the while asking me about my heritage and saying “oh sorry I thought you were Indonesian or Chinese.” I was flabbergasted at their attitude and how it suddenly changed after they knew I was Korean, so I left the store and went somewhere else to mail my things. | review_rating:5, text:No queue on monday at 11:50am, nice and friendly staff, she even let me borrow her glue. For those who still wandering where this post office is, you need to use the escalator located between KFC and McDonalds to go downstairs, this post office will be on your left. | review_rating:1, text:Worse experience ever! Was there on Sunday afternoon arnd 2:30pm. There was not a single customer but the 2 staffs behave as if the whole world owe them a living! So rude & arrogant 🙄 Very unfriendly & unhelpful. Whatever U ask, they said don't know - only know how to throw U alot of abbreviated quotes. What the hell! | review_rating:2, text:Bad experience, not sure if I am a customer or she is a customer. Just do a good job in management before opening a store.

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Today, I visited your branch at Sunway Pyramid Tealive Plus to purchase a drink. I saw a customer who had the same chocolate smoothie order as mine. She took a sip, realized it wasn’t the drink she originally ordered, and asked for a replacement. Your staff then replaced the drink for her, but tried to give me the drink that the customer had already taken a sip from. I directly told the staff that I saw the customer drink from it and return it. However, they didn’t make a new drink for me and tried to give me the old one. I felt this was very unethical and unsanitary! She kept insisting that it was new and hadn’t been consumed. | review_rating:5, text:I purchased a custom-made Pokémon tumbler for only RM 69 during the event. What stood out most was their staff's swift service and their continuous checking to ensure I received my tumbler.

Hurry up to grab a 20% discount on any yogurt by snapping a picture with a Pokémon character and sharing it on social media! | review_rating:1, text:A very bad experience in this outlet today! The staff were very rude and inconsiderate and treat different customers differently! Purchased two cups of beverages and requested for a normal paper bag with hanger because need to drive back want to charge me money! Never experience this in other outlets and the attitude is super rude. I am not requesting for special pokemon bag, just the normal paper one. I never see Zus or any other mill tea outlet treat customer like this before. Be more considerate la, don't just think of making profit in everything! | review_rating:1, text:My Digital ID Kiosk (ROSAK). Should put a sign "ROSAK" on the kiosk because it's NOT WORKING. | review_rating:5, text:My favourite place to grab a drink at tealive. 🧋🧋
Signature cocoa is my favourite drink, and this time, I decided to upgrade the standard cup into a straw less cup, more environmentally friendly cup without the straw. 🧋🧋🧋
But the straw less cup upgrade cost extra RM4 if I’m not mistaken, so it’s best to reuse the cup by taking the cup home.
