name: Mantra Indian Cuisine
category: indian_restaurant, thai_restaurant, sandwich_shop, meal_takeaway, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.122, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Located in the bustling Sunway Pyramid, Mantra Restaurant offers a welcoming escape for those craving hearty and flavorful Indian cuisine. The restaurant boasts a warm, casual setting, making it a great spot for a relaxed meal amidst the shopping hub’s vibrant energy.

For our lunch, we opted for the Vegetarian Banana Leaf Set, which came with a refreshing Iced Lemon Tea. The meal arrived promptly, with a generous spread of rice, assorted vegetable curries, crispy papadam, and flavorful condiments neatly arranged.

The portions were more than satisfying, ensuring a fulfilling meal. The variety of vegetable dishes offered a good mix of textures and flavors, from creamy dhal to tangy pickles and spiced stir-fried vegetables. Each component complemented the others, creating a well-balanced and wholesome dining experience.

The Iced Lemon Tea was a welcome addition, providing a refreshing contrast to the warm, spice-laden dishes. While not overly sweet, it had just the right amount of tartness to cleanse the palate between bites.

Service was efficient and friendly, with the staff ensuring our needs were met without being intrusive. Given the reasonable pricing and generous portions, the meal felt like great value for money. | review_rating:5, text:It is such a wonderful dining experience. The two waiters are patiently waiting for our order. We ordered vegetarian thali set that comes with a serving of naan. The side dishes are so nice, the naan is crispy and fresh. We had paneer with black dhal and tomato, which is excellent! What a great choice. We added another serving of Kashmiri Pulao rice, and it is so good. The cashew nuts are crunchy and fresh and added such flavour to the rice. We had maggo lassi to finish. What a wonderful dining experience. Highly recommended. | review_rating:5, text:Best Indian food in this side of KL. I was on long stay at the sunway pyramid hotel and a regular visitor here, whenever I get a craving for Home food taste.
Amazing Serving experience, even the samosa is served with fresh salad and ketchup.
All their food items are prepared very well and reasonably quick. The prices are slightly on the higher side, but totally acceptable considering this shop is inside a Mall.
The ambience is excellent as well!
I highly recommend everyone to go here. | review_rating:5, text:I ordered the chicken biryani, but it was just okay, with the rice portion being disappointingly small. The naan was overly crispy, almost like a papad, which was not what I expected. The paneer masala was merely satisfactory, lacking the flavor I was hoping for. On the positive side, the ambiance was pleasant and enjoyable, creating a nice dining environment. Overall, the food didn’t quite live up to expectations, but the setting made it a decent experience. | review_rating:3, text:Looks like a potentially great place but other than the authentic decor and playing, the food really disappointed. The mango lassi was so sour, the masala tea was spicy more than milky/sweet. Thankfully the main dishes were better but overall is not was the best Indian dining experience. If you’re dining here, I can recommend the rice, chicken tikka and prawn curry.

The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

name: Trim N Shave Barber Salon
location: 11, Jalan PJS 8/12, Dataran Mentari, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Fast and experienced, the barbers here are quick on the snip and manage to comply with most of the finicky demands from many of the walk-ins I saw while I waited for my kid to get his mop top tidied up with a trim. Unlike most of the other barber shops around the area, this place has a good number of experienced barbers in wait for the next client that sits down on the chair. The place also provides quality traditional shaving and beard trimming packages as well as shoulder massage services all for the price of a song, almost. They also provide haircuts by their students during weekday working hours which is probably the ticket for school going kids.

If you're curious about how a proper full package barbering experience feels like, this place is well worth your time and easy on your purse to add. The outlet also accepts payment via debit or credit cards.  Recommended all the same. | review_rating:5, text:Fast and efficient, many of the barbering stylists here can give a reasonably priced haircut, shave, or hair wash at very reasonable prices. One of the few barber shops around the area that accepts credit and/or debit cards. | review_rating:5, text:Getting my hair and beard trimmed from here from more than 2 years and prefer here among any other places cuz of their well experienced barbers.  they are not just friendly but well mannered people, especially those Pakistani men they know their job and do it very professionally moreover their hygiene and cleanliness is very good and well maintained, prices are affordable and worth it. On weekends it’s crowded so better visit in weekdays. You can ask them what haircut or beard style would suit you better according to your face shape and hair type. It’s my permanent barber place now 😍😍😍. | review_rating:5, text:My husband cut hair with Ali. He did a very good job. Really took his time to cut and shave quite fast. Will come back. | review_rating:5, text:Nice barbers. They pay attention to your request on preference of styling also make suggestions to your request. Reasonable pricing and a loyalty offer if you sign in on Insta. Very good barbershop

name: Akemi Home
location: G1.113A, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Bought 1 HIROMU SOFA set on the 3rd_Nov, PROMISED to delivered before Christmas but came in after 1/1/2025.
Worse think is what you saw, what you felt, what you paid for were not what they delivered
We bought the HIROMU SOFA set because of its COMFORT. What they delivered is just another ordinary SOFA Set. HARD AND NOT COMFORTABLE. THEY DONT HAVE CLOUD-LIKE COMFORT LIKE THE SHOWROOM UNIT.

We complained, they said they can't do much as their factory is in Ipoh (who care where is your factory as I'm buying from AKEMI).

We even asked them to exchange the SHOW ROOM UNIT with the new SOFA SET that they delivered but they said cannot.
We went to the store want them to send their staff to personally go to our house to "feel" the sofa delivered but they declined.
Finally they agreed to come over to check on the SOFA delivered but it is 2 weeks later i..e. SUNDAY 26JANUARY 2025. My goodness, is this AKEMI customer service? I personal feeling is that they will not turn up citing CNY, TOO BUSY! | review_rating:1, text:Buying bed sheet sets , surprise to find out that I need to pay RM5 for a bag ??!! Understandable if this for apparel or grocery , that we can use our own bag ; but this is a furnishing store … buying bed sheet sets , wasn’t prepare to put them all in my bag or bring a recycle bag 😠 and the bag it’s RM5 each !!!
Staff team is patient and well mannered , rating 1-star for this stupid policy 🤦🏻‍♀️ | review_rating:1, text:Im a regular customer of Akemi. I used to purchase bedsheet set through the website. This time i gave try purchasing at the physical store at Akemi Sunway Pyramid. Came on 04/02/2025 around 7:50pm. The staff was busy doing nothing than talking with each other. When i try to approach them, it seems they doesn’t like to serve me and just giving the cheap look. (Maybe because im indian)….Rude and unfriendly staff (especially the soft guy). I will not return back here and will not purchase anything by Akemi. Thanks for the disappointing service🙏 | review_rating:4, text:No Review | review_rating:5, text:No Review

name: Sisters Crispy Popiah
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:It’s been more than 10 years since my last visit. The filling still as crispy as before. Ideal place to grab quick meal. But they forgot to ask me whether I want it to be spicy or not. | review_rating:4, text:If you looking for a quick bite to eat, this is the place to be. There are chairs for you to sit to enjoy the popiah or take away. I liked the crispy crunch inside the popiah. Flavourful but a bit salty for me. One standard popiah cost RM6.50 for one or two for RM12. If you like the spicy one, they have it too. I had one first then later went shopping and ordered another one before going home. Yum | review_rating:5, text:One of the best among all sisters crispy popiah. Have a few chair to sit and dine in. | review_rating:5, text:Taste good.
Have a few stool for dine in | review_rating:5, text:I have ordered the mix which cost me RM12, a little expensive but I think it's worth the price. Abit loose but the flavor is chef kiss, definitely will come back again

name: Sacoor One
location: Unit: G1.06, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I came to purchase a suit for formal occasions, and was pleasantly surprised by the range and quality of options. The suits here are ready-made but will be altered to fit to your specific body shape.

The highlight of my visit was the excellent customer service from Izzul. He was respectful, attentive, and also proactive in making recommendations based on his experience and taste. This is a level of professionalism that sets a new standard in Malaysia. Well done Sacoor One and Izzul! | review_rating:1, text:Teribble shopping experience! Will not be shopping here anymore or any sacoor one outlets! Bought clothes and paid for the clothes and just went it for pinning and alteration. But the service was teribble, the female staff seemed very rude, untrained and questioned me on my purchases. I had to produce a receipt before she was able to retrieve my purchases which I had already paid for. There was no manager on duty and i couldnt lodge an official complain. I have since requested a full refund as I will not be treated as such after spending RM1.2K. I will take my money else where and shop else where. You just lost a customer of 5 years! | review_rating:5, text:I recently bought a suit from Sacoor One at Sunway Pyramid, and the experience was exceptional, largely thanks to a sales associate named Izzul. He was professional, offering great advice on suit alterations and how to match clothing for any occasion.

What stood out was Izzul’s patience; he made me feel comfortable and confident in my purchase. I also want to extend my gratitude to abang tailor for his professionalism. The alterations made to my new suit were impeccable, fitting me perfectly.

Beyond the excellent service, the quality of clothing from Sacoor One is top-notch, ensuring that each piece is not only stylish but durable. I highly recommend visiting Sacoor One and asking for Izzul if you’re looking for quality clothing and outstanding service. If the management reads this, please consider giving Izzul and the tailor a pay raise or incentives for their exceptional customer service. 👍👍👍 | review_rating:1, text:Bad experience, bought 2 shirts for a wedding and couldn’t use them since they screwed with the sleeves. | review_rating:5, text:I just bought two suits from here and shoutout to Izzul for the great customer service and shopping experience!! location: Lot F1.86C, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:This my second time eating at Mr Dalgakbi after 10 years, not liking it. Just full of carbo, not much chicken, nothing else in the pot unless you order side, taste basically gochujang sauce with a lot of sugar.
Service and place is ok. | review_rating:4, text:The food is average depending on what you've ordered. There are some options for spicy and original so need to double check before ordering the food. The price I would say is reasonable. The service is fast but feels like the staffs are foreigners so you need to explain to them a few times before placing the order. Overall, it's a good place to have lunch with friends or colleagues. | review_rating:5, text:The best Mr Dakgalbi branch, been here for the past 3 years. Service is fast and the food never disappoints.

We always order (for 3 pax)
- 2 pax set Mr Dakgalbi chicken
- Add on 1 dakgalbi
- Add on 2 ramen
- Add on 1 cheese fondue
= best combo ever! ❤️‍🔥

Tips: Add on cheese fondue instead of cheese if you are a cheese lover, recommended.

The chicken is tender, enough spiciness kena dengan tekak Malaysians. Side dishes like kimchi and radish are always served fresh.

The staffs are always friendly and helpful. They remember your order without jotting down anything! | review_rating:5, text:Superb food here. Tasty and juicy.. big portioning and good service.

Octopus and chicken is irresistible !!

Staff was friendly and helpfuk | review_rating:5, text:The portion vs the price is totally worth it. And I cannot stress enough the thigh honey fried chicken which uses breadcrumbs batter is as good if not better than Kyochons honey chicken wings. These ones are boneless.

Service for this branch is great too. Waiters and waitresses are friendly, responsive and helpful.

name: MYNEWS.COM
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: APT
location: F1.AV.03, First Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I was service by a short hair female hair stylish. Her cutting skill was good. However it will be better if she could put on a friendly smile. She looks very stern.
Anyway I'm happy with my hairdo for RM40. Is worth it. | review_rating:5, text:a very much thank you to stylist Anne which attended to my hairstyling. Not only Anne give a good haircut, she attentive and provides a good chat. Anne also recommend treatment for my hair, which after a few days my hair really did felt better and much stronger. I’ve also bought a product recommended by her, it does help. Overall a great experience. | review_rating:1, text:I went to APT for a hair wash and normal dry. I went here because I've been to APT Salon several times when I lived in Penang and the service and quality there was good. And even prices were very reasonable.
Over here, in Sunway Pyramid, they charged me 60+ RM for my thin hair. I was still okay to pay because I wanted good service.
The person who washed my hair couldn't understand a word of English. He took me directly to the hair wash basin for the wash, unlike how it used to be done at the Penang branch. Before starting I asked him to shampoo only once as my hair tends to get too dry with double shampooing. But he went ahead and shampooed twice anyway.
Then when he was applying conditioner I requested that he leave it on for a couple of minutes so it can actually condition my hair and he said ok, but washed it off in less than 15 seconds. 🤷‍♀️
Then, while blowdrying he used the high heat blast from the very beginning and kept bringing it very close to my scalp. And he kept focussing on the back of my scalp while the front was just airdrying and setting to become kind-of messy-frizzy..
After he was done I had to ask him to apply hair serum, and That's something that he should have done without me asking considering how sadly he had blow-dried my hair.
After the wash my scalp has been completely damaged. It's been almost 3 weeks now since this hair wash and my scalp has not recovered yet. The back portion of my scalp is still soar and extremely itchy and i usually never have an itchy scalp. I've never faced this issue ever before. I'm not sure if it's bad products used or bad technique or both together, but it's ruined my scalp. All I wanted was a relaxing hair wash. But instead left disappointed with a damaged scalp.
One thing salon Staff should understand is that everyone coming there has different hair types and should be handled according to that. ONE METHOD/FORMULA DOESN'T FIT ALL when it comes to hair. Especially in Malaysia where you find a mix of people from so many ethnicities it's expected all the more.
Anyway all in all, bad service and disappointing experience.
I will definitely not return to this salon again | review_rating:5, text:Did my hair (colour and cut) with Bryan. Was lucking when i came walkin he’s attended me. Love the consultation and also the result! Will definitely come again 👍🏼 | review_rating:1, text:Serena i really don't understand what she is thinking, doesn't she feel guilty for giving someone else a haircut like this? Spending RM399 on a haircut like this, shame on you. aunty 👎

location: LG1.22, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:i had an amazing experience getting my piercing done at Stellar Jewellery Shop! The staff provided excellent service. They were very knowledgeable and gave great suggestions on the best materials to use, also explained the aftercare process clearly, ensuring I felt comfortable and confident in taking care of my piercing. The whole process was smooth, professional, and hygienic. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking to get a piercing! | review_rating:2, text:Brought my 3 years old daughter for ear piercing today. Wanted two ears to be pierced at the same time so that it could be done at one go. They marked the piercing area first. To my horror the junior staff pierced higher than the marked area. We had to remove the piercing and pierce another time. In total 3 times.  This traumatised my poor child. They claim they are professionals in piercing children's ears. They can't even pierce according to their markings. Paid a very high price for this just to get my daughter traumatized. | review_rating:5, text:Had my second piercing done here. Staffs are very friendly and helpful in their recommendations. They also teach you how to take care of the piercing. Good experience. | review_rating:5, text:This place has incredibly helpful and pleasant staff! I was worried about getting my ear pierced because I have sensitive skin, but the staff was really helpful in providing information on the items and materials.

Fear not, every stud is inside the cartridge itself, which is dispose after each piercing and is extremely sterile and hygienic.

To make sure the piercing is taken care of, I also received a complimentary aftercare package that includes a small bottle of lotion and a monthly check-up for 3 months so they can keep an eye on your healing process!

Really recommend this place for ear piercing!🤍 | review_rating:5, text:I had my first piercing experience here, and I have no regrets about this! I got both my earlobes pierced at the same time by 2 ladies so that I didn't want to feel the pain twice lol. However, it didn't hurt as I had expected. It took only 10 minutes or so for the whole process. Thank you :D

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This perfume store is a local brand that sells quality perfume.
I remember back in those days when the company started, they used to have charity, perfume bottles drawn by down syndrome kids. But now it's more of generic packaging.

Their shower gel smell really good.
For the perfume, they're selling EDT and EDP.
Angelique smell really calming and the smell is not that bold. Rosette smells like just rose scent. Magnolia is very popular with it's fruity and flowery scent.
The price of their products is moderate and more near to commoners price range.
So if you want a special memorable gift that is affordable, this local brand is really a good choice. | review_rating:5, text:Steel Magnolia. Nice and Pleasing Parfume

reviews: review_rating:5, text:Star archery has reasonably priced packages, which is a great activity for first-timers or anyone looking to pass the time at the mall. There’s also a dedicated corner for kids. The staff are friendly and helpful, providing guidance to ensure a fun and safe experience. | review_rating:5, text:Nice place, went there with my mom to have some fun, it was really cheap, I don’t remember the exact prices but I remember that it wasn’t expensive. name: Wheel Chair
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Texas Chicken
location: Sunway Pyramid Mall Unit No. LG2.127A & OB3.LG2.1D, Lower Ground, Two and Oasis Boulevard, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:It was my first time dining at this outlet. I have eaten at other Texas Chicken outlets before.

I tried one of the Menu Rahmah dishes for a late lunch. The rice portion was quite small compared to the very first time I had the same meal at another place. Should be genuine in serving the budget meal. Otherwise, don't serve it. Hope the management will look into this.

Otherwise, it's a nice and big store. Staff are courteous and friendly. | review_rating:4, text:Food is serve quick despite a lot of crowd, and they are piping hot. I tried their garlic chicken, not really nice, still prefer the ori taste. Their mash potato taste quite weird. But overall still better than KFC. | review_rating:5, text:they have the charging port and you can bring your laptop to do work there. they assigned 2 PIC to clean the table quickly. the crowd very fast moving, the view is pretty and the chicken is fresh from the oven. so far is a good chicken shop | review_rating:4, text:This outlet is clean. I saw the staff cleaning the tables very quickly. The food is fresh and the service is fast! Flavors are also good. Try the mexicana wrap, spicy if you can tolerate it. | review_rating:3, text:Texas Chicken always better than KFC, fresher chicken, bigger and tasty. Delivery ok too but sometimes took longer time but it's ok not as bad as KFC delivery. The fries not crunchy and soft and I noticed the tissue sometimes just one piece only or none, maybe encourage people use less paper, can reuse the box because is paper too. Acceptable la.

name: Shu Uemura
location: G 1.131A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Met make-up stylist [ Sue Teoh ] at City Mart , SUPERBBBB EXCELLENT AND FRIENDLY!!!! Makes me loving Shu Uemura even moreeeeee , thank you so much for the help, guidances and recommendations during my visit 💖 | review_rating:5, text:I recently attended a makeup workshop at the Shu Uemura Sunway Pyramid counter with my mom, who has no makeup experience. Melanie, the store manager, was incredibly patient and skilled, teaching my mom in a way that made her feel confident. What stood out was her genuine care—she didn’t hard-sell us but only recommended products we truly needed. Melanie’s professionalism and expertise make her an asset to Shu Uemura, and I hope her excellent service is recognized! | review_rating:5, text:I cannot express enough gratitude for Melanie's exceptional service! I found myself in a last-minute predicament needing my eyebrows done for my wedding, and everywhere was closing up. Thankfully, Melanie came to the rescue at 9:30 pm with open arms and a heart of gold. Not only did she accommodate my urgent request, but she also delivered a flawless 100/10 job on my eyebrows. Melanie's warmth, politeness, and bubbly personality made the experience truly delightful. It's evident that she takes immense pride in her work and genuinely cares about her clients' needs. Without a doubt, the best service I've ever received. Melanie is an absolute gem in the beauty industry, and I highly recommend her to anyone in need of eyebrow services. Thank you, Melanie, for being like an angel in my time of desperation! | review_rating:1, text:Came here to get my eyebrow pencil and there is only 2 BA on duty. When I approached one of the BA who is doing an eyebrow trimming for a customer, she replied to me with an unfriendly manner saying “we only have two person”. What I  am expecting is just to tell me politely how long I am gonna wait till someone is able to serve me. Such a lousy service nowadays! If you ever see the pink hair BA in the boutique, just walk off cos she will definitely spoil your lovely day! | review_rating:5, text:a chinese lady Sue Teoh sales assistant is super good for me to go back again to Shu uemura sunway pyramid ! 😊

name: Clarks
location: LG1,127 Lower Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Centre, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:We had a disappointing experience at the Sunway Pyramid branch on September 1, 2024, around 4:30 pm. The male staff member who assisted us was extremely slow and appeared disinterested, as though he was fasting. He informed us that all shoes on the rack were 31% off, while new arrivals were not on sale. However, as we were about to make our purchase, another staff member told us that the prices on the shoes were fixed, and the discount was only 15% if we signed up for a membership. This significant discrepancy in pricing led us to leave without questioning them further. To add to our frustration, when I mentioned our expectation of a 31% discount, a female staff member wearing a tudung rolled her eyes and began discussing us as we exited the store. We were deeply disappointed by the lack of proper customer service and hospitality at Clark's. Horrible customer service and misleading price offered to customers. | review_rating:1, text:2 days ago I went to Clarks Pyramid. just ask if there is a warranty on the purchase of shoes only. I bought shoes worth rm499 in March 2024. Only used 3 times, the side straps have already come off. The male staff told me that the shoes were not stored properly. blame me on the way of care. hello sir, my shoes have only been worn 3 times. I'm the one who doesn't know how to take care of shoes or the shoes you sell have problems?. The staff is very rude. we were talking to him and left and went into the store room. very rude. Fyi I already wassap my problem to the CS Clarks piramid on May 2024. But no responds. Also I try to find tel no for Clarks HQ but there is no number. | review_rating:5, text:Clarks is my fav shoes brand! Eina,Elly & Saiful is very helpful n i happy with their service. Lepas ni will stick kat sunway jela.. tq gais ❤️ | review_rating:5, text:Met the worlds most helpful sales assistant Ms Wani, at the Clark’s outlet in Sunway Pyramid! She took the time to help me and patiently assisted me in making my purchase. Come here and look for her for a great Clark’s experience! | review_rating:2, text:New store itself it good looking and wide range of products. But the staff is not professional and honest.  They tried to sell me the display unit (R shoe) without telling ,having brought the L shoe from inside - straightaway went to cashier point and billed - when I asked whether this is a new pair she said Yes. Then I took the R shoe and showed her the marks due to people trying being the display unit. Then she went inside and spoke with the other assistant and came out and said it is the last pair.
I anyways bought a different color of the same model because I wanted the model . But it was very unpleasant customer experience.

location: Lot F1.46, Level F, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Amazing wet and dry vacuum! Super powerful suction, easy to use and works perfectly for both dust and spills. Makes cleaning so much easier! Huge thanks to Danial for his great service he explained everything clearly. Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Danial was really helpful in assisting us to make our selection, showing us how to operate our new vacuum mop and even carrying this for us all the way to the carpark. Excellent customer service and can’t wait to use our new vacuum mop at home! | review_rating:5, text:Great cordless vacuum with strong suction and a sleek design. Easy to use, lightweight, and comes with useful attachments. Battery life is decent, but could be better for deep cleaning sessions. Overall, a solid choice for everyday cleaning! | review_rating:5, text:I bought Dreame x50 ultra here… Abang explained to us patiently and service is good! This is my 2nd purchase here, product quality is very good as well! | review_rating:5, text:Great experience with the store staff Daniel, went through the process very well. And happy with the purchase. Thanks alot!

name: Legend of Tea
location: LG 1.98, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Amazing tea, bought the 普洱 with 糯米香叶, a type of 熟茶which is smooth and fragrant! Highly recommend the tea here, with friendly and knowledgeable staff! Usually very crowded on weekends, so come here on weekdays to have a relaxing Yam Cha session 😎 | review_rating:5, text:Shoutout to the guy who looks around 20-is bcs he gives me great customer service! Should give him an increment!  Good knowledge, he explained about the benefits to me. Very friendly staff! He even suggested the tea that's suitable about my problem! I bought the osmanthus tea bcs of his suggestion! | review_rating:1, text:Disappointing matcha ice cream. Used to be good but standards were not maintained at all. You’re better off w Family Mart’s matcha green tea ice cream for less than RM3 vs paying for this nonsense for RM4.60. Worse yet - it’s coupled with a horrendous customer service by the person running the place (specked tan guy w receding hair). Plain rude. This will be my last visit.
Food taste - 3/10
Customer service - 0/10

Not worth the visit. | review_rating:5, text:This place is manager by 2 very courteous, friendly and attentive gentlemen. Both are very knowledgeable in the art of tea. Should you have a need to find a suitable present or corporate gifts, be sure to check with them for appropriate gift sets.

However, if you are a newbie in the art of tea, don't worry. They do have a tea tasting session to figure out what's suitable to your body and taste that tickle your taste buds.

.I bought varieties of tea from them. | review_rating:3, text:Green tea ice cream is nice, but the staffs is not so kind.. that day i was buying two ice cream, when i want to pay, i have no hand to pick up the 2nd ice cream, so the staff just put it on the counter table, and what happen next is, the ice cream drop on the floor... The staff then just pass me some tissue to let me clean myself and the mess. After that, i thought the staff is going to give me another cone as their apology, since i dun even touch the ice cream yet, but no, i was paying for a dropped ice cream which i think it's not even my careless to drop it... Felt a bit disappointed with the service...
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Sunway Lagoon Hotel
location: Jalan PJS 11/15, Off, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I love this hotel. They are indeed one of the best ones I have gone to so far. The staffs were very friendly and welcoming. The room was clean and comfy. I love the room's view. Just that the room's door is not soundproof so you can basically hear the outside noise since my room is next to the home keeping room. Otherwise this is a perfect place for families to spend time together since they have Sunway lagoon theme park next to the hotel. | review_rating:5, text:Had the pleasure of staying at Sunway Lagoon Hotel. The staffs were very friendly, especially Tayyab. Always helpful whenever we need assistance. Breakfast at the buffet restaurants has an abundance of delicious choices. Would love to return for a stay here. Highly recommended. Keep up the great job! | review_rating:5, text:Awesome experience. Rooms are nice, TV could be better. Right next to a mall, and a theme park, so good for a getaway vacation.Buffet has quite large variety. Probably the best in Puchong/Sunway. | review_rating:5, text:I recently had the pleasure of staying at Sunway Lagoon Hotel, and i cannot speak highly enough about the exceptional hospitality and service I experienced. From the moment I arrived, the staff went above and beyond to make me feel welcome. The check-in process was smooth, and every member of the team was friendly, attentive, and genuinely interested in ensuring my stay was perfect.

The rooms were not only impeccably clean but also beautifully designed with comfort in mind. I appreciated the thoughtful touches, from the cozy bedding to the well-stocked amenities that made my stay feel luxurious.

What truly stood out, however, was the personalized service. The staff always greeted me with a warm smile. It’s rare to find such a balance of professionalism and warmth, and it made all the difference in my stay.

I highly recommend the Sunway Lagoon Hotel for anyone seeking a memorable and comfortable stay. The hospitality here is unmatched, and I will certainly be returning on my next visit. Five stars.. well done.

Specially thanks goes to Mrs.Karen and Mrs.Yukiko for providing a personalized and impeccable experience.

Thank you.. appreciated | review_rating:5, text:We had a very good experience here. The bellhop was very cheerful towards my kids, even playfully teasing them and made us laugh. He was also very helpful and careful with our luggages. Thank you so much for the experience

I didn’t get his name, but his face was shown in this video walking by 😊 in his brown uniform.

Loved the food there ❤️ I was fascinated with the cute donut tree
opening_hours: N/A

name: Dunlopillo
category: furniture_store, home_improvement_store, home_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.139A-2, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I’m not a customer yet :)

but I would like to praise Dunlopillo’s staff Cathy (not sure about the spelling).

She gave good advice on  the functions of topper and mattress, she knows her stuff and answers me patiently.
There’s no harm to praise and give a good review even I’m not a customer yet :)

Tq so much! | review_rating:1, text:Bad customer service … pls ensure your staffs are well mannered especially the ones at the front desk
Thank you
Sunway pyramid outlet !
You don’t even deserve a single star! | review_rating:1, text:Bad service for the old Lady Chinese staff
I was plan to order 2 set of bed 🛌 from your store
And the staff show out lcly attitude .
And dun really wanna to explain
Okay ,fine i can order at other brands store which more professional.
Your product just few thousand not as LV Dior expensive store okay?

I like the product but i hate the service 😒  how the staff attitude how the product be .please hire a better personality staff | review_rating:1, text:Pretty useless showroom. They don't even have the full range of products to view. I went there to look for the Deluxe Latex Contour pillow and was told they don't have that. Was informed by the sales lady that the owner only stocked 2 type of pillows. Certainly looks like the owner is only interested to sell the high end pillows!!! Don't waste your time to go there. | review_rating:5, text:Another great 2nd visit and purchase with Dunlopillo Sunway Pyramid. Lady aunty served and well explained to us and do not rush us for making decision or hard sell the high range bed set to us. Will definitely recommend to my friends and family. Good service and good product 👍

name: Muji
location: LG1.113,Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:It's a fairly large store with a welcoming interior. They sell a little bit of everything here. Suitcases and travel accessories, beds, pillows, sheets, duvets, towels, storage boxes, beauty accessories and makeup, pots and pans, cutlery, office supplies, clothes, food and coffee.There are chairs and tables to sitt and eat/drink. | review_rating:5, text:MUJI Cafe at Sunway Pyramid is a great spot for coffee, desserts, pastries, and gelato. The selection of cakes, pastries, and refreshing gelato pairs perfectly with their rich, aromatic coffee. The minimalist and cozy setting makes it a nice place to relax while enjoying a sweet treat. Perfect for a casual stop during shopping or to unwind with a coffee. Friendly service and a lovely atmosphere! | review_rating:5, text:MUJI at Sunway Pyramid offers a calm and minimalist shopping experience. The store is well-organized, making it easy to find their signature simple and functional products. From quality clothing to home goods and stationery, the variety is impressive. The staff are helpful and polite, though the store can get crowded at peak times, which slightly affects the browsing experience. Overall, it's a great place for anyone who appreciates MUJI's aesthetic and philosophy. Would definitely return for more essentials! | review_rating:5, text:Beautiful bright space with lovely merchandise display. There is a cafe within which serves pretty good coffee at a reasonable price. Highly recommend their matcha ice cream too! | review_rating:4, text:Went to the newly open MUJI store at the Oasis. The area was huge. They provide map in store so that you know where to get your item.

Coffee and gelato is available in the store. But there is always a long queue.

The staff was attentive and very helpful. Kudos for the customer service.

name: Shake Shack
category: hamburger_restaurant, american_restaurant, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: OB.K2, OB.K3 & OB.K3C, Oasis Boulevard, Main Entrance, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Second Shake Shack outlet in KL, had the Double Shack Burger, 50-50, and the fries. Burger had sufficient crust and the meatiness came thru. I appreciate a burger that’s more about the meat and cheese and less about the sauce it’s drowned in. Was better than the one in TRX.

Fries were fresh, crispy and well salted but I’m not a fan of crinkle cut. The 50-50 had a strong lemony taste with a hint of tea. Not too sweet.

Overall not too bad, though go into it like you’re getting a burger at a sit down restaurant, not fast food as the prices are definitely not cheap. | review_rating:2, text:Honestly expected a lot from a burger for this price range I mean its not five guys lol.

Taste was average or should I say no taste at all ? Loads of meat does NOT equal to good food.

Exorbitant price for the burger and it comes on its own ? Bro are you serious no sides I mean at least should mention that on the menu so that we can order the sides together.

Well tried both the normal fries and cheese fries both were below average.

Nothing in particular that stands out except the hype.

In short doesn’t taste like what it looks like. | review_rating:5, text:Located at the entrance of Sunway Pyramid. This is the second Shake Shack American burger restaurant in town (1st outlet at TRX).

The burgers here looks small in size but really packs a punch! Their signature smoky flavours makes it quite hard to stop eating as soon as you take the first bite. Go for their hot favourite  "Double Shack" burger and addictive crinkled cut fries. Hot dog is on the menu too.

Wonderful experience with each and every bite! Definitely worth returning. | review_rating:3, text:Not the best, but certainly not the worst burger joint either. Would say that I'd rate Shake Shack a little higher if the prices wasn't so outrageous.
I ordered the Avocado strraky beef burger. Taste-wise, I do l like their burger buns, but the burger itself was lacking any smokeyness or flavor. The ice cream, was just like any other ice cream. And lastly the Malaysia-exclusive Bunga Raya Shake, which was way too sweet too the point that I couldn't finish it.
But other than that, service was great, and the whole place had a nice vibe to it. | review_rating:2, text:I wouldn’t say the best burger in town. I only love the fact the crispy beef streak was good and the burger is juicy and not greasy. The hotdog was hard and dry. I can’t say I like the shake, too sweet and not thick enough. I didn’t taste the malt. The fries is a big disappointment - just a normal frozen store bought crinkle cut fries and comes with the broken small bits. With that price, should be a fresh thick cut real potatoes.

name: Art Toys Cafe
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Lot F1-89A, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Overall nice concept cafe.. 23nov will have a Labubu Lucky Draw.. they also have All Day Promotion (Coffee or Tea Free Croissant)

So many nice figure, and so cozy.. the food itself is nice and soft (Croissant) and the price is affordable for the drink is 67% cocoa is great taste just the glass is quite small for cold.. maybe the glass can be big a bit cause the hot drink and the cold drink is small big... ridiculous..

The staff service is okay.. maybe can be upgrade.  When there is no customer, they are free but then suddenly there a few customer they cant coop with it.. so whats the S.O.P.. do send your drink and food to customer or do we need to take by ourself.. cause some they send and some take by theirself.. so whats your end said?

Overall rekemended to try this cafe.. if you come to sunway pyramid... | review_rating:1, text:The banner said that the "shop, play & win" event is from 23/11/2024 to 20/12/2024. We have asked a staff there and he said just order RM20 and above then can play dice and have chances to win labubu toys. When we want to play the dice after the food has been served, the staff said that we can only pick a ball for the gift and is not the labubu event as per advertised. He said that the labubu event is over. It's very ridiculous and very bad experience here because none of the banner nor notice mentioned that the labubu event is for grand opening!!! | review_rating:5, text:Super delicious of the croissants and cake! A nice cozy place for meeting all kinds of art toys. | review_rating:4, text:Nice cake, nice toys, nice environment, average coffee. | review_rating:1, text:order drinks only wait 20min haven't done 🙄

name: Don Don Donki
category: asian_grocery_store, grocery_store, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: F1.39B, Ice Skating Rink, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Order Saba Don, you will have 10% discount when grab the Don after 6pm.

It’s delicious, just a little salty. There’s microwave for you to reheat your food and place to dine.

Got the Saba Don for RM12.80 (after discount). | review_rating:4, text:Lots of food and snacks and flavours available, especially Japan ones that is hard to find locally. Pretty good place to shop if you like cooking too as they sell a lot of meat and coming ingredients. If you want to dine in there's a seating area complete with a microwave to heat your food up. The convenience section Jumbo Chicken that I got tastes a bit old, maybe the food turnover rate for takeaway food is not high enough in this branch. | review_rating:5, text:Lots of assorted food and drinks over here mostly imported from japan. Sushi, beef, takoyaki, green tea, beer, ramen, jap cooking ingredients and so many more | review_rating:4, text:there were a lot of snacks n items like a Japanese one.
clean shop and kind staff | review_rating:5, text:Crowded with many Japanese products, the self-service checkout system is convenient and user friendly. There is a seating area where you can sit and eat or charge your device.

name: Fresh Line
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

reviews: review_rating:5, text:I’ve bought few pieces for an event, amazingly what I worn is always amazing and help me look different from others! Baddasttt | review_rating:5, text:Nice design. Customer service got rooms to improve. Should set up online platforms | review_rating:5, text:No Review

name: New Balance
category: shoe_store, clothing_store, sporting_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: F1, 52, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I've been wanting to buy the 574 Classic for a long time, and I am so glad I decided to make my purchase here. The store is very welcoming, with a great selection of products. I was assisted by a very kind and knowledgeable salesman (I didn't get his name, unfortunately), who was extremely attentive and took the time to explain the features of the 574 Classic. His expertise and friendly demeanor made the shopping experience enjoyable, and I left feeling very satisfied with my purchase. Highly recommend this store for anyone looking for great service and quality products!

Keep up the good job! | review_rating:5, text:Helpful staffs and good selection of shoes. Ambience in shop was good. We went into Asics next door before coming here and the staff who served us treated us very badly. So glad we came over to New Balance instead. Thank you. | review_rating:5, text:Forgot to take down the saleman’s name, went to buy a new pair for shoes for travel. This salesman was so technical, even explained the structure of shoes to us, very informative and knowledgable. Recommended me the right walking shoes | review_rating:5, text:I'm really happy with the salesperson who shares the knowledge on buying shoes for newbies like myself. Good job n keep up bro.... | review_rating:5, text:Nice shop.

They have the feet scanner that shows you the size of your feet in details. Like in mm and the corresponding shoe size.

The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a wonderful shopping and ear piercing experience at Wanderlust Sunway Pyramid today, Christmas day 2024. I came by the shop this afternoon and was assisted by a patient, lovely young lady. I took quite a while to decide on my first piece of Wanderlust + Co jewellery but eventually decided on the blooming tulips bracelet. Just my luck, it was the last one!

Only downside is that the bracelet was too short for my liking and fortunately my young daughter loves it more than I do. I will probably be back to get my own one soon! | review_rating:5, text:Farisha was sooooo helpful with my piercing!! name: Pull & Bear
location: Lot G1, 59 & 60 Grd Flr, 3, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Trendy clothes, lot of to choose from, love those collaboration collections! Average prices consider reasonable. Bought a few clothes from this store, some of the knitwear looks nice, bought one as well. Would love to see more of collaborations! Keep up the good work! | review_rating:1, text:Clothes are alright, just that the staff are questionable. They crowd together rather than helping customers. One of the male staff shouted really loudly which gave me a bit of a scare. The changing rooms are technically open for people to peek through. | review_rating:4, text:Design, quality, price and sale are better a lots than Zara and Mango. The staff there will reply you in Malay when you ask them in English, the management should give more priority to employ the English speaker to work there as here is not kampung area, East Coast or Northern | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to change the size of the shirt after my girlfriend brought the shirt. Salesperson did told her that she could take out the price tag and change it within 30 days. Today I went to Pull&Bear in Sunway Pyramid, they said as per the policy the price tag cannot be taken out.

Dear Pull&Bear, please do take this seriously as your staff are not properly trained. Show us your the purchase and refund policy.

Such ridiculous staff you had there. Don’t even care to look at the receipt.

Need an explanation for this matter. Thanks! | review_rating:1, text:We experienced extremely unprofessional behavior from Eva, a Malay lady staff with glasses who works at the counter on November 3rd.

When we informed her that the clothes we had reserved were no longer available, she not only failed to apologize but also displayed a dismissive attitude with side-eye, which is entirely inappropriate for someone work in the customer service industry.

P&B HR department please look into this matter, as such conduct is unacceptable in a customer-facing role.

name: JOLLIBEE
location: Lot LG2.126A, Lower Ground 2, Blue Atrium, Sunway Pyramid Mall, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Came by for a quick late lunch since there was almost no queue at the ordering kiosks. The orders were quickly fulfilled via a numbered ticket on your order receipt.

Taste wise, biting into either their fried chicken or beef burgers is quite nostalgic if you have had their offerings from childhood. It still tastes pretty decent and some of the menu options on display do reflect the pinoy influence on the menu options here. All in all, a decent alternative to the competition at the Golden Arches and other similar outlets. Oh, and they have Mountain Dew. Recommended if you've never tried this or used to enjoy their offerings as a kid. | review_rating:5, text:First time tried Jollibees. Love it. Fried chickens taste different from others franchise. Like the sweetness of the spaghetti (suit for my kid). Kinda fond with pineapple juice to cleanse the taste after the meal. Mashed potatoes not too soft and the gravy not thick which I preferred thick. Coleslaw fresh and sweet. Unfortunately service kinda slow. | review_rating:2, text:This isn't my first visit here, but my most recent visit left me dissappointed with the food. I ordered the Burger steak thay comes with a rice and a burger patty. Needless to say, check out my photo to see how depressing that burger patty looks. I had to hold it up with a fork to take this photo or else its so thin that it sinks beneath the sauce. The taste was ok, but portion was really not worth the money.
The only saving grace was the peach mango pie which has been my all-time favourite.
Will I be back? Maybe, but I would go for the Jolly spaghetti or chicken next time. | review_rating:4, text:My first time trying Jollibee yesterday. I ordered a set which had 1 piece of chicken, a burger, spagetti and a drink. And I added an ala carte hotdog so that I get to try a wide range of their food.
The burger was relatively small in size but the taste of the burger meat was pretty nice, compared to other fast food burgers. It had a pleasant distinct smoky flavour.
Am happy they had spagetti because I love spagetti.
The special thing about their fried chicken was their brown sauce which had herb taste in it. And the chicken seasoning was nice too.
The sausage in the hot dog tasted good too - it had a unique smoky taste to it too. The BBQ sauce was a tad too sweet and overpowering.
A bit disappointed their drink was not re-fillable.

A shout out to the sweet server staff who help bring the whole lot of food to my table instead having me go collect to food fm the counter myself. | review_rating:2, text:It is very disappointing that rice and chicken together only got very small portion of gravy, cannot add on extra gravy also, the cleanliness of the seat also quite bad, need to self service to clean up the table and eat. Please improve.

reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Bought here our wedding mattress and pillow. The mattress I'm satisfy so far after about 3 years plus. The pillow now getting sunken. A bit slow for the delivery if I'm not mistaken for the delivery of mattress. | review_rating:1, text:Bad services!!! Beware everyone!!!
1. I ordered mattress bed set but ended up received with insufficient screwsss!!
2. Dropped message on their website but they don't even serve or respond to your message!!
3. Attitude of the sales girl that serve isn't professional, the face totally forced to be barely smile, not in their professional to serve customer!
4. Display mattress here are little due to their limited space. It's recommend to rather go mid-valley branch which have more displays!!
5. Conclusion, Failed!!! Failed!!! Failed to serve customer!!! | review_rating:1, text:Staff (chinese, male) were very rude with a bad attitude. name: The Walking Hotpot
location: F1.AV199, Asian Avenue, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Good place to eat if you craving for hotpot. Portion is good and mala soup also very nice. Can give it a try! | review_rating:5, text:I recently visited The Walking Hotpot for the first time, and it was an absolutely delightful experience! This cozy spot offers individual hotpot servings, allowing everyone to enjoy their favorite flavors without compromise.

The moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and inviting ambiance. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, guiding me through their extensive menu and helping me choose the perfect broth and ingredients.

I opted for the spicy mala bowl, and it did not disappoint! The flavors were rich and robust, with just the right amount of heat to keep things exciting. I chose the beef bowl, and the beef slices were thin, delicious, and generously portioned with lots of fresh ingredients. I heard it’s specially made for mala lovers, and I really loved it.

One of the highlights was the Osmanthus Ice Jelly – a must-try! The unique taste of this cool drink was both refreshing and tasty, making it a perfect complement to the hotpot.

Additionally, I would highly recommend the Australian Beef Slice, Pork Slice, and Lamb Slice. All the meat slices were incredibly fresh and enhanced the overall dining experience.

The portion sizes were generous, and the pricing was reasonable considering the quality and experience. It's perfect for both solo dining and small groups who prefer a personalized touch to their hotpot meal.

Overall, The Walking Hotpot exceeded my expectations. It's a gem for hotpot enthusiasts looking for a personalized and flavorful dining experience. I’ll definitely be back to try more of their broths and ingredients!

Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:This is the perfect place for solo diners who want to eat hotpot. For RM19.90 you can get a hotpot with 4 items and a drink. Very worth it. Food was served fast and it was pretty delicious. The portion was very filling for me. Will definitely be back again. | review_rating:5, text:Nice place, went here before they expanded the space. Food very nice | review_rating:4, text:I ordered the set hotpot here, costs RM19.90 for just 4 different sides with a broth of your choice. Price wise if quite okay for small eater, but you if you consider yourself a big eater, you might need to top up more sides. Some sides like pork slices or fish slices have surcharge so do take note when ordering the set.

The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This is the eat all you can buffet, we ordered the Angus beef package, which is good but maybe too many fat? Also birthday rewards for members are really good, birthday can eat for free and you need to get 3 people to enjoy the benefits for birthday month. I personally love the tomato soup. Lot of food to choose from. The wagyu fried rice I think can avoid, because rice tends to make you feel full. In my opinion | review_rating:5, text:Cool atmosphere.. nice seating area and great place..

Service is okay.. sometime there can be confused how the staff explain the price...but can get better...

Food wise is great.. a lot of variety to choose.. from lamb, beef, wagyu, prawn and chicken.. and the gravy also have many choice to choose from.. the side dish and dessert also come in variety choice.. price is standard and affordable.. | review_rating:5, text:Had a whole year we were content with celebrating all our birthdays here, safe to say we know our limits now. This place came out of nowhere and now i dont want it to leave. The meat selection of beef is too good for the price! Not forgetting their soup bases are really unique with the best definitely being the Sukiyaki and Spicy Pork Bone. The meat is really tender and has a small fat cap on it making it melt in your mouth. 🤤 This place is like an endangered species, please take good care of it and make sure to let them make some cash once a while. 😘 100/10 ⭐️ | review_rating:4, text:Have always passed by Wagyu and seen many people, got to try it out this time. I could say I regret I did not come soon.

They provide various options on top of beef selections; including a variety of pork meat, meatballs, vegetables, noodles and rice, desserts and drinks. All meat selections are delicious and you can tell that they are good quality. I love beef brisket, it just melted in my mouth. So many choices to choose from~ You can even choose two soup flavours! I spent a good two hours there and I was content when I walked out.
They have a free sign-up lifetime membership for points, a discount on birthday month, etc. It is a great deal. Do inquire about that further with the staff there. The staff are also helpful and fast-paced. Great place to go with friends and family! | review_rating:5, text:It was my first time visit here, and sure will come it again! The buffet offers a large variety of meats, such as pork, beef, prawn and fish and all are fresh cut upon order. Not only that, vegetables, hot & cold beverages, dessert and fruit can easily get it at the buffet counters. Besides, the staffs are very friendly, it makes the dining experience more enjoyable. It's a best place to gather or meet up with friends and family, strongly recommend to them!

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. name: Tim Hortons
location: G1.122A & B, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:First time trying this Canadian franchise cafe. Staffs were really friendly and nice. The coffee and donuts were good. I like the donuts here. Not oily. Dough texture is fluffy and not very sweet. Price is also very reasonable compared to other cafes in this mall.
I didn't know there are 5 Tim Hortons branches in the country. Will definitely return again. | review_rating:5, text:I visited the new Tim Hortons Signature store at Sunway Pyramid and was impressed! The Maple Cinnamon Latte was perfectly brewed, and the Truffle Mushroom & Cheese Sourdough Melt was delicious. The craft bar concept adds a unique touch, and the donuts were a perfect sweet treat. Great atmosphere, friendly staff, and a must-visit for coffee lovers! | review_rating:5, text:Tried the signature maple cinnamon, about what you'd expect sweet but the cinnamon isn't over powering like the sbux variants. The coffee also came at warm temp not too hot which is ideal.
Had the plain sugar donut, so light just like eating baked flour. I don't think it's anything special given everyone can do donuts these days.
The toasted sourdough sandwiches are pretty decent for the price. Only thing was given only 30% occupied still takes a while to toast. Can't imagine what happens on a packed lunch time.
Also customer service at the tables were poor most tables have cutlery, plates lying around and are unwiped. This would never happen at McDonald's | review_rating:5, text:Had great time indulging good coffee and light bites at this 2nd outlet of Tim Hortons! The atmosphere is cozy, the staff are always smiling, and the good coffee 😍 highly recommended to experience their coffee craft bar and must try Kyoto Drip! And of course the donuts! Truly like the line on their box “All you need is 🍩 & ❤️”! | review_rating:3, text:Canadian coffee chain similiar to starbucks and Dunkin Donut combined 😂, it entered Malaysian market last year and expands rapidly. Place is well set up, spacious, very cozy and clean.

Service is rather slow, waited for 10 minutes when there’s a really just a handful of patrons in the cafe when we came in. Coffee is served in the paper cup despite they have the ceramic coffee cups displayed (really annoying). Coffee tastes average just like any commercial big chains. Price is reasonable 👍⭐️.

Overall nothing much to shout of besides their maple leaf table 😂 , maybe for anyone still wants to boycott Starbucks this could be an option before Donald Trump makes Canada an American state😂😂

name: CK Dental Surgery
location: LG2A. 02-03, LG2A (B1) Floor, Blue Zone, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:bad experience ever this dental.. I waiter for 3 hours.. when i asked what is the estimated time of waiting, and the counter just keep repeating the same thing which is “this is normal for walk in”.. the counter is playing tiktok and ignore me as customer.. as i waiting, there are few customers that are yelling because of this bad services too waiting without proper timing! will not come here.. there are lot of dental way better.. | review_rating:5, text:Recently had a root canal(4 roots) & crown done by Dr Siow who did an excellent job. I highly recommend him because he never rushes & explains in detail the task at hand. If you have a fear of dentist, he will calm your anxieties. He works out of Sunway Pyramid & Sunway Velocity. All who work at these 2 locations are very helpful too. | review_rating:4, text:Highly recommend Dr Liew here !

As a patient, i feel like she is super professional and provide all solutions to me, analysis good or bad then let me choose.

She make me feel comfortable and dare to ask all questions about my teeth. Even i bring my father come here to check his teeth, my father has good feedback to her too. | review_rating:5, text:Dr. Joanne is a very kind, smart, and intelligent dentist. She understands quickly what the patient wants and does things that are exactly what the patient needs. I want to recommend CK Dental Clinic at Sunway Pyramid. Dr. Joanne is the dentist you can rely on, one of the best dentist in Malaysia. | review_rating:5, text:Dr Siow is a nice and patient doctor. He’s also very friendly and soft spoken. Recommend this dental clinic to solve your teeth problem. This is definitely a good choice for you. 👍🏻👍🏻

name: Thai Thai
location: Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Compared to the first time I ate here, the quality of the food has definitely dropped a lot. However, it has improved quite a bit since the post-COVID period. This time, since there were two of us dining, we ordered à la carte. The Tom Yum noodles were spicy and sour enough, and the basil chicken rice had a good flavor. As for the dessert, it was a bit too sweet. I hope there will be a pleasant surprise when I visit again next time. | review_rating:3, text:Thai Thai is a great Thai restaurant with a lovely Thai-inspired atmosphere. We tried the classic Tom Yum soup, which was full of tangy and spicy flavors, and the seafood was really fresh. The Pad Thai was also delicious, with a perfect balance of sweet and mildly spicy flavors. The service was excellent, with friendly and efficient staff. Overall, it’s a fantastic spot for dining with friends or family. If you're a fan of Thai food, I highly recommend it. | review_rating:5, text:This thai restaurant has a dedicated vegetarian menu which seems to be mostly vegan.

The dishes overall were decent for a non vegan place, flavorful and fresh, quality ingredients. The papaya salad and tom yum was good | review_rating:1, text:Ordered a pineapple fried rice but it's with 3 type of beans( green peas, corn and carrot?) And shredded chicken?. Oh my god, pls don't claim it as Thai food if you can't even cook a proper pineapple fried rice. This is basic! Wasted my tummy! | review_rating:5, text:The food is very good, especially the tomyam and pineapple fried rice.  The service is very good. Highly recommended this place to eat.
