From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: The Parenthood
location: SPWF003, First Floor, Green Zone Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:2, text:This place is more suitable for older children and not toddler as all the slides are quite high up and the surface not soft enough for toddlers. Furthermore there is a bus area whereby there is some kitchen toys and soft blocks available for play but the condition is very bad, the soft blocks has been chew off and there isn’t much kitchen utensils to play with, only an empty kitchen counter there. Worst still there are many uncovered electric plug points there whereby toddlers will be able to touch it freely, the electric plug point shouldn’t be built there or at least it must be covered up with child protection measures. My young daughter went to play with the switch and i have to constantly tell her not to touch it! This is unacceptable as this is a children playground. Overall this place are more suitable for older kids whereby they can climb higher and know not to touch electric points. There isn’t much things available for toddlers i would say. | review_rating:5, text:We recently hosted our son’s 5th birthday party at The Parenthood, Sunway Subang, and it was an absolutely amazing experience! From start to finish, the entire process was seamless, and both our family and friends had an incredible time.

The venue itself is perfect for kids with a variety of activities that kept everyone entertained. The indoor play areas are spacious, well-maintained, and suitable for children of all ages. My son and his friends had a blast exploring all the fun attractions. It was also a great place for adults to relax and catch up, while keeping an eye on the little ones.

The staff at The Parenthood were super friendly and helpful, making sure everything ran smoothly. They took care of all our needs, from setup to ensuring the kids were safe and having fun.

The birthday party packages were fantastic too, offering a wide selection of entertainment options, delicious food, and even personalized touches to make the day special. We couldn’t have asked for a better place to celebrate this milestone.

Overall, our experience at The Parenthood was outstanding, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking to host a memorable party for their little ones. Everyone had a blast, and it was a birthday celebration to remember! | review_rating:5, text:We celebrated our son’s birthday at Parenthood, and it was an incredible experience! The staff was wonderfully attentive, making sure everything was set up perfectly and that all the kids were having a blast. The play areas were safe, clean, and full of fun activities that kept the kids entertained for hours. They even offered a variety of options for party themes, and the decorations made it feel magical. The food was kid-friendly and tasty, and they took care of every little detail, so we could just relax and enjoy the day with family and friends. Highly recommend Parenthood for any birthday celebration—our son had the best day! | review_rating:5, text:Came across this huge playground and had the pleasure of trying with my child one weekday.

Entry was swift. Staff are helpful and accommodating. Siligent on cleaning even on a non busy day. It has different play sections, which is good, so older kids will not hurt by accident the younger ones. There are lots of slides, which is fun even for small built adults.

The entrance fee is very reasonable for a whole day play.  About 30 ringgit on weekday / 60 ringgit on weekend, public and school holiday.
Re entry is allowed as long as within that day and with a guardian or parent going in together. Extra guardian or parent is charged 5 ringgit.

Socks is needed to enter like most playgrounds. They charge a reasonable 7 ringgit in case you need it.

There's also a cafe inside where parents could rest while waiting. Opposite the playground is a  shop for kids stuff.

Overall, it's worth it to try. | review_rating:3, text:A beautifully designed play area for children, with the London bus outside being the most attractive feature! It’s a fun place for kids to explore and enjoy.

However, I felt a little disappointed as the playground space is smaller than last year, and the horse carousel ride is no longer there. The area feels shorter than before, which affects the overall play experience.

One major concern is safety—the staff should keep an eye on kids playing rough, especially on the big slide. Since children of all ages play together, some older kids don’t follow the play rules, making it scary for kids under 7 to enjoy themselves.

Hope the management can improve the playground space and safety monitoring in the future!

reviews: review_rating:4, text:I recently visited Teva at Sunway Pyramid and was impressed with their selection of sandals. Whether you're looking for something for everyday walking or a more durable pair for hiking or trekking, they have great options. Teva is my second favorite sandal brand after Keen, and their products didn't disappoint. The shop itself was clean and well-organized, making it easy to browse. However, the customer service was just average, not particularly memorable. Overall, it's a solid place to find comfortable and practical footwear. Four stars for the quality and variety of sandals. | review_rating:5, text:I had a great experience shopping at Teva Sunway Pyramid. The quality of the sandal I purchased is outstanding comfortable, stylish, and well-made. I will repeat to come to Teva again. | review_rating:5, text:they attend customer very well with patience. good service, recommended place to shop sandals! | review_rating:4, text:Staff at this store know their products well and are most helpful and patient.

name: THE OWLS CAFE
location: Unit G1.PT.08, Ground Floor, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:The Mentaiko fried bointo flakes were done perfectly.  Fries were so good.  Such a crispy snap.  The Waffles here are pretty good too. Crispy exterior, soft interior and smells so good. All the dishes are so well presented.  Great place to stop for a snack, date or meal.

Friendly staff.  Fast kitchen. Free WiFi.  Clean facility.  Nicely decorated interior.  Lots of natural light.

Prices are a little high for the portion.  Location is very noisy on weekends.  Located between hotel and mall. | review_rating:2, text:For a cafe that heavily advertises their waffles, be prepared to wait at least 40 mins for 1 waffle order. We went at 4pm, off-peak hour. They said they only have 2 waffle maker machines, and each waffle order takes time to prepare. Imagine ordering more than 1! The staff will try their best to avoid you knowing that you will ask for your order. Once the order is delivered, there were no apologies as they will rush off and away from you as fast as they could. Also, the photos showed whole blueberries and bigger strawberry pieces on the waffles, but you only get them in halves. Who cuts blueberries that are already tiny anyway? 😂 The price charged for the food and service was not worth it. The staffs were not welcoming either, maybe they’re new and don’t know how serve customers. Very disappointing 😢 please do better. | review_rating:4, text:A cozy cafe in Sunway Pyramid, near the Sunway Lagoon Hotel side. I like the owl themed deco, with the light streaming through the glass wall overlooking Sunway Lagoon theme park. I shifted my table there but realized it was a little too warm at 6pm, and shifted back to the other corner where there were cushion seats.

The salad made me feel so healthy - it was colourful and delicious. I wanted to try the savoury chicken waffle, but ended up eating the chicken with the salad, and treating the fluffy waffle as my dessert! 🤣 | review_rating:5, text:The Owls Cafe in Sunway Pyramid offers a delightful selection of desserts that are sure to satisfy any sweet tooth. From waffles to cakes, each dessert is crafted with care and bursts with flavor. The cafe's location provides a stunning view of the Sunway Lagoon Theme Park, making it an ideal spot for visitors to take a break, relax, and enjoy the scenery. With its cozy atmosphere and delicious treats, it’s the perfect place to unwind after a day of shopping or exploring the theme park. | review_rating:4, text:part of the charm here is expectation of management, which is executed here at maskirova levels.  we managed to order off the waffle and breakfast menus, besides notices that both were unavailable.

the chicken and waffles was very good.  the shasukha less so.  the latter came in a portions too dimunitive, and with a taste profile more italian than moroccan.  so some call to tinker there, and to not reuse the pasta sauce.

this is a pricey joint, so expectations would be higher.

name: Dar Al-Arab
category: middle_eastern_restaurant, lebanese_restaurant, fine_dining_restaurant, indonesian_restaurant, meal_delivery, food_delivery, restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.123, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Finding this restaurant is like a treasure hunt if you are coming here for the first time.  To find it you need to enter via the Sunway Lagoon side of the Sunway Pyramid Mall and then head to a little alley at the side of the Jollibee restaurant. Walk approximately 10-15 metres and then where you'll see the restaurant on your right.

Now the decor and atmosphere of the restaurant is a close replica of a typical Middle Eastern cafe in the movies unless you have actually travelled there.

The waiting staff is courteous and accommodating.  Furthermore the staff that waited on us was pretty proficient in Mandarin and Hokkien which was a delightful surprise to me and my friend.

Now for the food... What can I say. It was really yummy with the lamb stewed to falling of the bone and the chicken was fork tender. The mix platter kebabs was scrumptious as well with just a minor misharmony with the chicken kebab being a tad dry in this symphony of good food vibes.

The pricing for the food is quite reasonable with each pax coming to approx RM30-40.

The verdict. Definitely will come again for a special occasion or to have. A taste of the Middle East. | review_rating:5, text:Delicious and authentic middle eastern food! We ordered the big platter and we satisfied. Service was fast. The place has a nice decor and cozy. Would return here the next time we are at Sunway. | review_rating:5, text:Friendly and helpful staff who even came out all the way to the atrium to bring me into the restaurant. Nice place to celebrate birthday with family with freebie and discount. Delicious food with huge serving, tender juicy lamb | review_rating:5, text:Their food is so so good!! Every dish we got were just *chef’s kiss*. Their balcony/outdoor seating looks over Sunway lagoon so you can enjoy ur meal with a view! They have great service too, Mr Abdur-Rahman was very friendly!! | review_rating:5, text:I missed Arabic food. Thus, I tried to search around kl but couldn't find many choices. Luckily, I found one inside the sunway pyramid shopping mall! Quiet place, nice food, fast serving, and very friendly waiter! Price wise, I think acceptable as the portion consider big (somemore inside shopping mall). If I ever miss Arabic food, here is my choice!

name: Haagen-Dazs
category: ice_cream_shop, dessert_shop, confectionery, coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: Lot No. LG1. Rink, Lower Ground One, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This store is located on the LG1 Floor (equivalent to Level 2) of Sunway Pyramid. Navigating to the store can be somewhat confusing using the mall’s information guide.

However, its vantage point offers a significant view overlooking Sunway Pyramid Ice, a rink capable of hosting ice-skating and ice hockey activities.

The store is surrounded by various food and beverage outlets, contributing to high human traffic in the area. Its internal and external environments are clean, spacious, and brightly illuminated, fostering a welcoming and relaxing atmosphere.

Its interior design features comfortable couches alongside a high bar table and chairs, enhancing its inviting appeal. | review_rating:5, text:Haagen-Dazs never disappoints! Yes, it’s on the sweeter side, but the flavors are always rich and satisfying. The staff was super kind and patient, letting me sample all the flavors before I finally decided on my 3 scoops. Great service and delicious ice cream | review_rating:3, text:I am the supporter & fan of Hagen-Dazs since 1998 (25 years). Good place for ice cream with good location to view ice skating. But the quality & taste of ice cream had drop tremendously but the price is also increased tremendously on ice cream creations. The colour of Green tea favour is NO longer dark green. There are many new comer & new brand in the market are much better taste than this brand. Please do more research & innovation or just close shop to prevent more losses | review_rating:5, text:Their staff are very friendly, helpful and polite. Their ice cream is so delicious and gooodddd! I love their service and place to sit is comfortable. The best part is I got to taste the sample first before I can make my decision to buy. Overall, I love to buy my ice cream from here. I would highly recommend everyone to go here and get YOUR OWN ICE CREAM ✨ | review_rating:1, text:I ordered coffee-flavored ice cream. To my surprise, for the price, I paid for a single scoop I was given a small scoop, nearly half of the cup. So stingy to be generous to give a nice big scoop that nicely fits the cup. I nicely complained to the Chinese guy about it, and all he said was that's how it's being served! He couldn't be careless to rectify the situation. I told him overseas they are so generous to give us a big scoop! I do not understand why the management failed to take action. There are plenty of ice cream companies that serve even better than Haagen Dasz.

name: Bruno
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Kenangan Coffee
category: cafe, coffee_shop, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot LG1.118A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Salted Caramel Macchiato is like at Starbucks but half the price. Decent curry puff that was reheated properly. Great service too. Would come here next time! | review_rating:2, text:Nothing fantastic about the coffee. Just wanted to support local brand. Even registered my membership. Please train your staff. Went to collect my drink. The malay lady staff has attitude problem. She was not very friendly. Not even a thank you from her. She even threw a tantrum by banging my drink on the counter like she was unsatisfied! | review_rating:5, text:Always a great coffee time in Kenangan. Has to be the best coffee chain ever! | review_rating:3, text:New coffee chain in town. Simple & clean set up. A handful of seats around the cafe. Usual cafe pricing. Friendly staff. Been here twice now. Once with 50% promo for 1st time users & the other with certain amount off.

We had the avocado milk & avocado coffee on both occasions. There were good although a bit sweet. The coffee version is the best. Interesting combination. Avocado adds an interesting creaminess to the drink. Also tried their firecracker sausage & banana choco chip muffin. Average at best. Happy that they can warm it up for dine in.

Felt a bit too pricey for what it is. Even with the promos. Many better options around. | review_rating:3, text:Heard of this so called famous Indonesian chain coffee. Decided to give it a try. We ordered kenangan latte, creamy latte and one slice of chocolate cake. The kenangan latte is super sweet and it is horrible. Luckily we ordered less sweet for the creamy latte. This outlet has very limited seats. There am were many people waiting around for others to finish their drinks and leave.

category: beauty_salon, skin_care_clinic, spa, massage, hair_care, health, point_of_interest, establishment

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Great experience and good services. The staff is knowledgable, able to provide in depth explaination about my skin condition. Recommended 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:I had a really good experience here. The staff was friendly, and Xinyi was very knowledgeable. She understood my skin condition and recommended the right treatment for me. So far, everything is great, and I’m happy with the result of my treatment. Definitely recommended! | review_rating:5, text:The beauty salon has wonderful and professional staff. They explained in detail with the skin analysis machine so that I am informed of what can I do to improve my skin condition and understanding the current skin condition.
Wonderful and relaxing facial massage - I truly enjoyed and will come back again very soon. | review_rating:5, text:My beautician Venus is truly skillful. I had Rainne as my consultant.. she guided and suggested the type of treatment that will suitable for my skin. Venus was never the less the best person to get facial and shoulder massage. Throughout my time being there, it was so calm and comforting. Both the personnel who were assigned to me were amazing and they really do cater to my needs. If you want a great facial treatment experience with instant results.. this is the place to be..

name: Diamond & Platinum
location: Lot G1.133, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Diamond & Platinum is well known for its exquisite craftsmanship .

In terms of design, Diamond & Platinum offers a diverse range, from simple and elegant pendants to elaborate statement pieces. Their designs strike a balance between classic and modern aesthetics, making them versatile enough for daily wear or special occasions.

The customer service experience at Diamond & Platinum is also one of the best. Their staff is knowledgeable, patient, and willing to assist in finding the perfect piece that suits personal preferences and budget. Additionally, their certification process ensures authenticity, giving customers confidence in their purchase.

Definitely my preferred choice. | review_rating:5, text:Great design with awesome service. Purchased our engagement ring here and returned for other accessories. Shout out to Sean Lee for his splendid service and follow ups on phone messages too. It's been a journey with D&P from engagement rings to wedding accessories. | review_rating:5, text:Bought my diamond chain and necklace from SA Vivian and she’s very patient in advising and gives honest recommendation on whats suitable. The designs are very modern, beautiful and competitive compared to other boutiques. Great service! | review_rating:5, text:Came here to bought my engagement ring and special thanks to Jinnie Pung for her excellent services and follow- ups via WhatsApp. We have a pleasant experience from jewelry introductions to ensuring the ring was delivered to the most convenient location for us. Will definitely visit again ! | review_rating:5, text:I really love the design that D&P has. Jane is really helpful in helping me choosing the right fit for the ring! Definitely will come here again.

reviews: review_rating:5, text:The Body Shop at Sunway Pyramid gets a solid five stars from me! The staff here are courteous and super helpful, making it a breeze to find what I needed. The shop is well-organized, and you can feel their commitment to eco-friendly values, which I really appreciate. Though their men’s deodorant options were a bit limited, my favorite one was there, so no complaints! The store design is also on point—bright, clean, and welcoming. I’ll definitely be coming back for more quality products and excellent service! | review_rating:5, text:Nadia provides damn good service .. was purchasing at parade where she was previously and now i started purchasing at pyramid since she moved here.. she provides personalised experience | review_rating:1, text:Went there to buy a gift, but the service isn't good. Please don't judge a book by its cover, I may not dress in tuxedo but still I'm a customer. Thank you. | review_rating:5, text:I came to get a gift set for my niece today. Attended by Ms.Nufa with a wide smiling welcome greet. I'm very happy with her service, knowledge about products and good interpersonal skills. She made my purchase decision easier and wiser. Thank you Ms. Nufa once again! | review_rating:5, text:Big thanks to Amy! We love her service and she’s also very friendly. My mom really loves her service. Looking forward to seeing her again. Hopefully she’s the one who assists us again next time 😆

reviews: review_rating:1, text:very bad service from that old lady staff in ponytail, she thinks she’s the owner of ralph lauren or what? just a waiter also can act like she owns the store, i requested for an item transfer since wednesday last week now monday d also no news, and she can say u came in to the store without further notice of the item arriving yet, so what u want? u urgent is it? halo aunty, r u serious? it’s a transfer within malaysia not within antarctica.. i called pavillon last week through phone for the number of sunway ralph lauren, their attitude so much better than sunway pyramid.. sunway ralph lauren open so long d phone number also not listed, mampui.

name: iORA
location: LG1.06, 07 & 10, Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:This used to be one of my favourite shops previously. But now I have to say you provide TERRIBLE SERVICE! ( I went to Sunway Pyramid branch )

The staff completely ignored me—no greeting, no help, nothing. ( Instead they were just walking around and tidying their own dress in front of the mirror )

I was holding several pieces of clothing, and they just walked past like I didn’t exist. Not even a shopping bag offered! So rude and unprofessional.

I went in fitting room to try on, another lady was leaning against the wall and moody expressions could be clearly seen when I walked in. No “THANK YOU” and no any gestures of welcoming customers. Instead I was the one that smile and said thank you!

PLEASE ENSURE THE QUALITY OF SERVICES PROVIDED ARE ADJACENT WITH THE PRICE OF YOUR PRODUCT. THANKS!!! | review_rating:4, text:Shoppers enjoy spacious layout and friendly service at this local women's clothing store. The store is designed to feel roomy and comfortable, with plenty of space to browse the latest fashions. Staff members are helpful and friendly, and there are even a few seats for me to relax while waiting for my daughter to pick the clothes she wants. | review_rating:2, text:I like the store as it is spacious, making it comfortable to browse through the items.
However, the service level seriously needs improvement. The staff were unfriendly and unapproachable, with visibly moody expressions. When I asked a sales associate if the shirt I was holding was available in another color, I received an immediate “no” without any effort to check. When I then inquired about other available colors, the associate asked me to show the shirt again—clearly indicating she hadn’t even bothered to check initially.
I was lining up for payment and there were 3 person in front of me and at least 4 behind me and only 1 cashier is opened.
My friend had the same "unfriendly" manner in another outlet.
Perhaps the management should look into training the staff to have basic courtesy at least if not professional. | review_rating:5, text:not sure about the staffs and services here as i've not visited. but i met a pretty girl at the centre management office on tuesday. not going to say her name. but if she sees this, i hope i can get her instagram account or any social media platforms :) | review_rating:2, text:I’m visiting from US and thought everything was Super cute, but not one person in there greeted me or was kind at all! Rude personal! Reminding me of closing time and made faces.

Super happy yaa | review_rating:5, text:I was looking for a waterproof shaver specifically for beard stubble, not a clean shave, that’s the style I am after these days. I came across Nateskin, and Ian Jalleh gave me a solid 3 minute review n details on the products. I was instantly sold and ended up getting the Bush Trimmer. Thank U Ian! I finally get to my hands-on the Face Shaver 2.0. Heard great reviews about it and very excited to try it out! | review_rating:5, text:just bought the face shaver at sunway pyramid stalk and the promoter zack was so helpful. good product! | review_rating:5, text:A good service by Ethan. location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Had a large shopping spree in this branch. Both new arrivals and older products are available for purchase!
Had wonderful assistance from advisors.

Although we completely forgot to use a member discount, got immediate help and repeated the transaction with the discount applied with no questions asked. | review_rating:3, text:Li-Ning at Sunway Pyramid is a fantastic sportswear store! They offer a wide range of sports shoes, athletic apparel, and accessories like socks and bags. The store is spacious and neatly arranged, making it easy to find exactly what you need. Whether you're into running, training, or casual sportswear, they have high-quality options. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, providing great assistance. A must-visit for sports enthusiasts! | review_rating:4, text:Good service by Mr Leo. However, the management should ensure that vouchers issued by Sunway Pals could be used.  The Sunway Pal voucher of RM30 could not be used and the staff used the customer app vouchers and provided some badges as a replacement. | review_rating:4, text:Great store if you’re a badminton fan!
They only sell Li-Ning here. But the selection of racquets is very extensive.
They usually have promotions here - but I wish the promotions were better on the high end racquets.
The staff here are great.
They’ll restring your racquet in under 1 hour usually.
They also stock the new Tectonic range of racquets! Again, I wish they offered a promotion on these. | review_rating:5, text:Good Experience, very friendly staff eventhough there was few groups of customer and she was working alone, she helped us through the whole journey of acquiring a christmas gift.

name: U Mobile
location: F1.26, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Lot of staff sitting here to serve customer,  but no one seems engaged. 3 staff dealing customer and 3 supervisors watching them.  With new office with dome and lot of lighting they want to attract customer. But very slow and lost staff. Find other service center. Waiting time is 30min to see someone. Horrible | review_rating:1, text:I was sitting on a bench near the U Mobile outlet when one of the workers started catcalling me. He had brown hair styled in a mullet cut and appeared to be Malay. This behaviour made me feel very uncomfortable and I believe it’s important for businesses to ensure their staff act professionally. Btw it's in-front of gadget hub store | review_rating:4, text:Be very alert.. there's the agent and office. The agent could not give the proper promotion.  The office is on a shoplot as stated in the address, not a mere kiosk.

It is an extreme conflict of interest, especially when u hear something different from the office. | review_rating:1, text:Extremely bad experience with UMobile Sunway Pyramid Centre, all staffs trying to act busy by looking at their own laptop or phone and ignored the customers. After walking around about 15 mins finally 1 staff noticed me and ask me to scan QR for the queue number and never advise the next steps and continue to play with his phone. I continue to wait for my queue number to be call but no movement at all, after another 10 mins i give up and walk away. After this bad experience i decided to stay with my existing telco. | review_rating:5, text:11.12 around 5.30pm. After about 45 minutes, we get our turn attendant by staff from Counter 2, he was very polite and listened to our queries and provided optional solutions to our problem. As there was only one chair and there was two of us. He kind enough to offered me an available chair to sit while attending to us. This small gesture of kindness really made a big impact to customers and especially to front-liners. Thanks and keep the great services.

name: Komugi
category: bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.139C, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Love the vibe of the new location of Komugi Sunway Pyramid. It is brightly lit and the staffs are all very friendly to customers. Came here on a Monday afternoon and I was welcomed warmly. They even have halal baumkuchen cake here! | review_rating:5, text:Komugi offers a delightful selection of Japanese-inspired bread and pastries, known for their soft textures and rich, buttery flavors. The balance of sweetness and fluffiness makes each bite satisfying. With a cozy ambiance and friendly service, it is a great spot for a quick treat or takeaway. | review_rating:5, text:Nice shop, pleasant looking & friendly staff. Overwhelmed with wide selection of food | review_rating:1, text:Wow, amazing customer service at Komugi Sunway Pyramid! Staff are so “professional” that they think shouting at customers is the best way to help. We just needed guidance on using the membership app, but apparently, not knowing how to use it is offensive enough to deserve an attitude.

Love how their staff bring personal emotions to work — because, you know, throwing tantrums at customers is the true mark of professionalism. Aren’t we all impressed by how well they manage their emotions? Truly inspiring behavior from grown adults.

Thanks for the “memorable” experience, Komugi! | review_rating:1, text:The supervisor is arrogant and ignore the que placement how it suppose to be. I was telling him to just tell the customer to que at designated que position. But he insist and just said its okey to have the wrong way of que. As an interior designer who been designing retails and shops, when we indicate the place to que, it should be that way, or else the shop flow will be distrupted.

name: Zok Noodle House
location: OB.K8, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The service here is really good, and the food is equally delicious as well. Definitely one of the best branch! You should try their Wantan mee, the texture is a bit chewy, which makes it nice. The Mala soup is also a great choice, especially if you love spicy stuff. | review_rating:4, text:Portion of food consider satisfied, value for the money. We order Mala Spicy noodle and wine soup noodle. Mala spicy included pork chop and two wantan. Tasted delicious and worth it. Surrounding comfortable and this restaurant located edge of the mall. | review_rating:5, text:Visit date: 11/1/2025

Good selection of noodles. Spacious dining area with indoor and outdoor options.

Classic pork noodles (RM17.90 nett) is pretty good in taste and portion.

Service is prompt and friendly | review_rating:5, text:Ordered Tomato Soup Pork Belly Noodle 🍅
Taste good! They also provided disposable apron here so that your clothes still stay clean after eating 🫶🏻 | review_rating:5, text:The curry noodle is yummy. The environment here is comfortable. I like it. Will try other food for next visit 😊

name: Maxis
location: F1.99, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid Phase 2,No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, Petaling Jaya, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:So big center only have one working counter, also dint inform need to scan qr for queing number. They just expect us to look for that small qr code( not visible because staff blocking). Many workers walking around are just sales worker | review_rating:1, text:Staff here tend to ignore you like as if you don't exist. Even if you scan for a QR code to queue up properly, they would even end up skipping some numbers registered and they won't even call your attention for it and leave you wondering if someone will assist you or not. When someone is finally assisting us, another customer was prioritized even if we came first. Just horrible experience here unlike in the NU Sentral branch. | review_rating:1, text:Worst experience ever.
Start ticket queueing at 7.30pm
After waiting for over 40minutes, staff said system down. Went for dinner. Come back again at 9pm, 9.15pm 930pm. They said need to wait for the staff that served me earlier. Wasted 2 hours plus for nothing. | review_rating:1, text:You’re welcomed to visit here if you don’t mind getting ignored by the racist staff, queue getting cut, and wasted 2 hours on the spot then got informed that they are no longer supporting Maxis home fibre termination at the centre.

If you didn’t get any response after gotten a case no. (No one calls back), don’t bother to visit service centre because there’s nothing they can do. Just spam calling the hotline until they decided to help you.

Don’t waste your time at this branch people. Also watch out for the staff Mr.Anuar because he will ask you to take a queue number for case follow up which they won’t 🤷🏻‍♀️. | review_rating:5, text:I had an outstanding experience shopping at Maxis Center Sunway Pyramid, thanks to ROY.

From the moment I walked in, he greeted me with a friendly and welcoming attitude.  Roy took the time to listen to my needs and offered helpful suggestions without being pushy.

His knowledge of the products was impressive, and he went above and beyond to ensure I found exactly what I was looking for.

The entire process was smooth, and I left the store feeling valued as a customer. I highly recommend Roy for anyone looking for excellent service.

name: Thai Thai
location: Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Compared to the first time I ate here, the quality of the food has definitely dropped a lot. However, it has improved quite a bit since the post-COVID period. This time, since there were two of us dining, we ordered à la carte. The Tom Yum noodles were spicy and sour enough, and the basil chicken rice had a good flavor. As for the dessert, it was a bit too sweet. I hope there will be a pleasant surprise when I visit again next time. | review_rating:3, text:Thai Thai is a great Thai restaurant with a lovely Thai-inspired atmosphere. We tried the classic Tom Yum soup, which was full of tangy and spicy flavors, and the seafood was really fresh. The Pad Thai was also delicious, with a perfect balance of sweet and mildly spicy flavors. The service was excellent, with friendly and efficient staff. Overall, it’s a fantastic spot for dining with friends or family. If you're a fan of Thai food, I highly recommend it. | review_rating:5, text:This thai restaurant has a dedicated vegetarian menu which seems to be mostly vegan.

The dishes overall were decent for a non vegan place, flavorful and fresh, quality ingredients. The papaya salad and tom yum was good | review_rating:1, text:Ordered a pineapple fried rice but it's with 3 type of beans( green peas, corn and carrot?) And shredded chicken?. Oh my god, pls don't claim it as Thai food if you can't even cook a proper pineapple fried rice. This is basic! Wasted my tummy! | review_rating:5, text:The food is very good, especially the tomyam and pineapple fried rice.  The service is very good. Highly recommended this place to eat.

name: Wenisem
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

location: LG2.139A-2, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:I’m not a customer yet :)

but I would like to praise Dunlopillo’s staff Cathy (not sure about the spelling).

She gave good advice on  the functions of topper and mattress, she knows her stuff and answers me patiently.
There’s no harm to praise and give a good review even I’m not a customer yet :)

Tq so much! | review_rating:1, text:Bad customer service … pls ensure your staffs are well mannered especially the ones at the front desk
Thank you
Sunway pyramid outlet !
You don’t even deserve a single star! | review_rating:1, text:Bad service for the old Lady Chinese staff
I was plan to order 2 set of bed 🛌 from your store
And the staff show out lcly attitude .
And dun really wanna to explain
Okay ,fine i can order at other brands store which more professional.
Your product just few thousand not as LV Dior expensive store okay?

I like the product but i hate the service 😒  how the staff attitude how the product be .please hire a better personality staff | review_rating:1, text:Pretty useless showroom. They don't even have the full range of products to view. I went there to look for the Deluxe Latex Contour pillow and was told they don't have that. Was informed by the sales lady that the owner only stocked 2 type of pillows. Certainly looks like the owner is only interested to sell the high end pillows!!! Don't waste your time to go there. | review_rating:5, text:Another great 2nd visit and purchase with Dunlopillo Sunway Pyramid. Lady aunty served and well explained to us and do not rush us for making decision or hard sell the high range bed set to us. Will definitely recommend to my friends and family. Good service and good product 👍

name: Hong Kong Kim Gary
location: OB2-G-U3, Ground Floor, Oasis Boulevard 2 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, No.3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46100 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:They offer a real thick menu with so many options that it took us a while to decide what to order😂. But it was worth the time— the food was great and definitely worth its value. The staff were attentive and friendly 👍🏻👍🏻 Waiting time slightly long (30mins) as it  was super packed on weekend.

The only downside was the presence of a lot of flies inside, made the place look a bit unhygienic. Hopefully, this can be addressed soon. | review_rating:4, text:The food here not bad. Just hardly get to see the menu via online.
sharing these photo on the menu food that I love to eat 😋 | review_rating:5, text:Food quality is not bad altho the price is abit high. Service is fast and food is served fast too | review_rating:4, text:Soup is tasty. But cheese baked rice is not as tasty as it was at many years ago.
Hot charm is very nice.

Comfortable and wide environment.
Got indoor and outdoor seating. | review_rating:4, text:Menu& price: Wide range of Hong Kong style food options provided to different dietary group with inclusion of vegetarian on separate menu. You still can find vegetarian Borscht soup here. Kudos to Kim Gary. Could explore further by providing more neutral vegetable ingredients on vegetarian dishes than mock meet. Reasonable price range for set around RM20-25

Food& service: Fast serving and using electronic order with paper menu which is easier to see. Well known for their cheese baked rice with pork rib, Yin Yong tea, Borscht soup. Overall taste good. Their vegetarian curry is sufficient.

Wheelchair accessible to restaurant.

Recommended place if you dine in with vegetarian friends / family together.

name: PUMA
location: G1.103, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I recently received exceptional service from Ika, a staff member at the Puma store in Sunway. Her professionalism and dedication truly stood out, leaving a lasting impression. I sincerely hope for her continued success and growth within the Puma team, and I believe she has a bright future ahead.p | review_rating:5, text:I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for the outstanding service I received during my recent visit to this puma sunway pyramid store. The staff demonstrated impressive knowledge and were incredibly proud of the service their provided. I especially impressed by how their explain the product very well & very soft-spoken and courteous I was able to purchase my dream shoes even the crowd on weekend is very pack but the staff name Danny treat me very well , and the entire shopping experience with the staff name Danny was enjoyable and memorable. Thank you for making my day so special Danny! I will be back to find you again! 🤟🏻 | review_rating:4, text:This store must be one of Puma's flagship stores, with a huge statue of a Puma at the entrance. The store offers the brand's latest sportswear, shoes and sports accessories. | review_rating:5, text:I have a great experience here. Really good communications and helpful from each staff.Two times I come here just to purchase latest Nitro both for me and husband. Latest experience is where I wanted to purchase Nitro for my husband but they seemed to not have available size that we want and since we are from Melaka and possibly can’t come again near future to exchange. For this reason they are willing to help ship specific size to Puma Melaka just to help our exchange experience easier. I recommended to meet staff with name GG. She is very polite and cheerful with lots of recommendations together with her team. | review_rating:5, text:I visited because the runners I follow on Instagram are either part of the Puma Run Club or regularly attend Puma Run Club training events, and I really wanted to try the leg analysis. When I was there, the staff were great. Even when I was just sitting down, they asked if I needed any help. Although this is something normal, it really impressed me because my previous experiences at physical stores had either been poor or non-existent.

The store was very clean, with bright lighting. It also smelled lovely—soft and pleasant, not overpowering. Combined with the cool air-conditioning, it was incredibly comfortable. The store is spacious, and the different sections are well-organized by category.

Overall, after doing the leg analysis, I walked around to browse, and to my surprise, while I was looking at the shoes, a staff member immediately approached me to explain the details. Thank you so much for great shopping experience.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:My sister was right – this place is incredible! I'm a huge Korean chicken fan, and their buffet promotion was perfect for me. But the real highlight was the kimbap – it was exactly what I've been searching for! It's a bit of a drive, but I'm already planning my next visit. Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:One of my absolute favourite places for Korean Food. Please open more branches!

Clean and well lit. Great atmosphere with up to date kpop MVs for entertainment.
Food is always served quickly and there are frequent rotations of promotions.
Staff and cutlery are readily available so no hassle with service.

Highly recommend trying the Chicken Burger and the Rabokki.
The cheese sticks are also amazing.
Kimbab is so-so. Suitable for people with lighter palates. | review_rating:5, text:Lactose-free, egg-free fried chicken in vegetable & palm oil FINALLY!!! No tree nuts used in the fried chicken. Those who have severe multiple types of allergies will definitely find this place a haven😋 unless you’re also gluten intolerant 😭 So please JINJJA , do not change your ingredients. | review_rating:4, text:They served the best Korean chicken I’ve tasted so far. Superjuicyy freshh 🫶🏼portion of drumstick was quite good. I had the soy garlic seasoning nice and not overpowering in flavour. Love the bulgogi beef rice rolls😘 Thumbs up and will be back for more. | review_rating:5, text:really loves their monster sauce. choose this sauce if u like to suffer. monster sauce is spicy spicy.

their fried chicken, chicken burger, seaweed fries, beef bulgogi kimbab, and kpop chicken have been my go to menu since 2021 (if i am not mistaken).

finally had the chance to dine in as i previously order via grabfood. the food quality is consistent. never disappoints.

Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

location: LG1.Rink, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Have been patronising juice work thru out their outlets across klang valley. Their quality are always consistent.

Few of my favourite are mango passion, strawberry kiss and banana blast. Haven’t try their greenery option.

The only complaint will be the price point. Is getting way more expensive compared to other fruit beverage maker. Hopefully they can price back appropriately to the market level as around 20 ringgit for fruit juices is a bit too expensive. Should cap around 15 or lesser. Anyway hope they can sustain their market as competition are a lot and consumers have other choices too. | review_rating:2, text:Had the dragon sparkle which was good as well as the lychee paradise which was a let down. Every mouthful was filled with mango fibers which even though the drink tasted good, the mango fibers made it so hard to drink I had to throw it away. With that said, it’s a comfortable place to sit and rest | review_rating:5, text:First time I go to the Juice work, the staff there is really 100% friendly.. they're so gentle and always smile.. they also welcoming people too... They are so nice and easy going people... It feel so refreshing and nice being there ... Their juice is delicious and tasty too... | review_rating:4, text:After done Huawei RM 1.00 Screen Protector stopby here at Juice Works for the RM 1.00 Special Promotion Lychee Cooler (their Facebook photo info claim the normal price is RM 11.15)
2020 October 10 | review_rating:1, text:Worst experience out of the juice works outlets we have been to. The staffs are rude and have no responsibility.
We ordered the healthy drink Power size with #myDigi app promotion. The staff poured the drink to the Power size cup and it wasn't full so she added a cup of ice and blended again to pour it into the cup to make it full. We drank it and it was too bland and tasteless. We nicely feedback to the staffs and the replies we got was it's bland because it's health drink without yogurt in it and both the staffs keep insisting that's the reason the juice got bland. We then told them that they have added so much ice into it and they kept insisting they only add in half cup of ice which we saw there are a total of 2 full cup of ice (before blended the first round and 2nd round another cup). They didn't want to take responsibility for it and just simply give reasons to shoo us away instead of helping the paying customers. We then went to the cashier to tell the cashier thinking she might be the person who could at least solve the problem but she just acted blur and turned away. The staffs also asked us to move away and not blocking the cashier for other customers to make payment which then there were no customers behind us. This is SUPER RUDE. One of the staff then get our drink and then asked to pour away the ice but it was blended and we wonder how she would do that to pour away the ice? We saw her just pour the drink out to the blender and pour some juice away into the sink then pour back into the cup. And guess what the content becomes even lesser and the TASTE IS STILL BLAND. The staffs are trying to CHEAT on customers CONSTANTLY. We were so tired of their NONSENSE. At last the staff took the drink back and pour back into the blender and add one tiny piece of pineapple to add abit of taste to blend. It had a bit of taste but still the TASTE IS OFF. We were so TIRED OF talking to them anymore which lead to deaf ears so we just walked away with the healthy drink that just taste like WATER. Such A HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Terry"I had an amazing experience with this hairstylist! Their skills are truly exceptional, and they perfectly understood what I wanted. The attention to detail and professionalism were outstanding. They not only gave me a fantastic haircut but also shared tips for maintaining my hair. The friendly and warm atmosphere made the visit even more enjoyable. I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for a top-notch hairstylist who truly cares about their clients. I’ll definitely be coming back for my next haircut!" | review_rating:5, text:Very professional Barber Emran did haircut for my husband did slow and cleanly cut making sure hit don’t goes onto customer neck and speak very well. Will come again as what my husband wanna try other services ( beard trim nose waxing etc) | review_rating:5, text:I recently visited Huuk in Malaysia and had a fantastic experience with my barber, Martin. The shop itself has a clean, welcoming vibe, with a comfortable setup and friendly staff who make you feel right at home. The attention to detail in the atmosphere really adds to the overall experience.

Martin is an exceptional barber who goes above and beyond. He takes the time to understand exactly what you’re looking for, offering expert suggestions that always result in a sharp, clean cut. His precision and skill are evident, and he doesn’t rush the process, making sure you leave looking your best. I walked out feeling incredibly satisfied with my haircut. If you’re looking for a quality barbershop experience and a talented barber, Huuk and Martin are a winning combination. Highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Overall great service, barbers are friendly, professional and will respond accordingly to your requests; just make sure to have at least some reference for your hairstyle as it will make the process much smoother. Tqsm | review_rating:5, text:First try on this barber, and got handsome Terry for my cut. He is very friendly and specific is cutting. The price is definitely worth it. Recommend to book first before come, because most of the time is full. Definitely will come back in future. (1st🖼️ After cut) (2nd🖼️ Before cut)

name: Child Wheelchair
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Manuka
location: LG1.112A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Really like this Manuka Honey drinks. It's colorful and pretty looking. That's what gets me all the time. What's more, it's Manuka Honey and not the pure sugar that is making it sweet. My choice of the Immune Booster was just nice with the sweetness level. Not that I'm hoping that my immune systems will get a boost from this, I'm not naive. But the drinks do suit my taste buds. | review_rating:5, text:As a fan of health-conscious beverages, I recently tried Manuka honey drink, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in both taste and nutritional benefits.

Firstly, let's talk about the flavor. Manuka honey drink offers a delightful blend of sweetness from the honey with a subtle hint of earthiness. The richness of the honey provides a comforting warmth to each sip, making it a truly enjoyable experience.

Beyond its taste, the health benefits of Manuka honey are well-documented. Renowned for its antibacterial properties, Manuka honey is believed to support immune health and promote overall well-being. Knowing that each sip of this delicious beverage may contribute to my health gives me even more reason to indulge.

What I appreciate most about Manuka honey drink is its versatility. Whether enjoyed hot as a soothing beverage on a chilly day or chilled for a refreshing pick-me-up, it never fails to satisfy my cravings for something both healthy and delicious.

In conclusion, Manuka honey drink has earned its place as a staple in my beverage repertoire. Its delectable flavor and potential health benefits make it a standout choice for anyone looking to elevate their drinking experience. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and your body will thank you. | review_rating:5, text:Just nice packing and very gentle staff. Never get a chance on lucky draw, the Energy Boost is flavour full, just feel the rich honey. Hangover Cure, not much of a cure but it does refreshing, very cool drink. Also it is buy 1 and get free until 31st of March. Good chance to have an additional drink. | review_rating:3, text:Can get drinks to try the honey before purchasing (currently there's some promo ongoing) 🍯 honey were okay (slightly pricey as it's RM12.9 for a small drink) but the chinese girl staff wasn't too friendly | review_rating:5, text:I like Signature 10 drink because Manuka honey mix perfectly with Konjac jelly texture to give us a refreshing and satisfying taste while providing us  healthy nutrients, immunity booset and skin care elements.
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Dior
location: LOT G1.137, GROUND FLOOR SUNWAY PYRAMID SHOPPING MALL, NO. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I went to this store today with my mom. Maybe it's because we dressed casually, but when we entered, I tried some perfume samples and decided to buy a new one, as I had used it before. Unfortunately, an auntie SA suddenly approached us, briefly promoted the product, and then just left us there. My mom noticed that her expression seemed to suggest she thought we couldn't afford the price, and as a result, she didn't want to serve us . Immediately, my mom took me to another brand, where the SA was much more professional. Please make sure to properly train your sales associates. Cuz same price customer can get different service | review_rating:2, text:The concerns raised in other reviews about the service are valid—don’t expect exceptional treatment, especially from the older staff.

When I walked in and asked for input on specific product, I needed some opinions on what to get, an older staff simply pointed me to a section without offering any real help and quickly moved on to attend to someone else while also showing a strong attitude.

Only reason I'm giving 2 stars instead of 1 is because there's a chinese guy that is much friendlier and attentive compared to the rest. If he wasn't there, I wouldn't recommend anyone to go if service matters to you. | review_rating:1, text:I visited the Dior store in Sunway Pyramid on 24/12/2024, the female staff had single eyelids, tall figure, I don't remember her name, she advised me and showed contempt for me, I bought a product of Sauvage men's perfume 100ml, and with such contempt for customers, I will never return to the Dior store again. | review_rating:3, text:Previously i used to buy my makeup at Dior Sunway Pyramid. Used to entertain by a sales girl. They did a great job. But few days back, i went there to buy perfume. But unfortunately, a chinese specky sales boy who entertained me doesnt ask for my email (member). Normally they did keyed-in my data before i made a payment but this guy doesnt ask for my data at all. So i’m quite disappointed. Either he forget or he doesnt want to entertain me as his client. | review_rating:1, text:This happened a couple of years back. I'm writing now because another person said something about an old woman who works there. So here's what happened. This old lady that worked there was extremely rude and basically said that there's no shade for my skin tone in their shop in a condescending manner when I entered the store. Mind you, I'm Indian. She was constantly making comments on my skin texture by comparing it to my sister's. It made me feel very insecure.  She was also hesitant to help out. No smile or polite gestures. I left without buying anything because I was so upset. A couple of weeks later I passed by dior again. The same woman was very smiley and inviting to a few Chinese girls who were walking across to enter the branch. Feels very racist. The management should do something about this.

It's highly unprofessional for someone to treat a customer in such a manner. Do better, Dior Sunway Pyramid

name: Gadget Hub
location: Lot F1.28 First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:Always changing workers, I don’t think to let new staff doing my screen protector. Went few times and spent quite an amount of money doing android phone, apple iphone and apple ipad’s screen protector there. But what i got was, the protector they did for me was too high that causing me cannot use other phone case except silicone casing. When i got back to the shop and asked for a redo or promo, what responses they gave me was, sorry i am new worker here, my senior said basically if situation like this, you need to pay full for a new screen protector. Wow… end up i went to MOSS opposite of it, and they done fixing my screen protector without charging me… such nice workers… i won’t go back there anymore ☺️ | review_rating:4, text:Boosting the shopping vibe with friendly staff, this place has got your tech needs covered – from phone cases to holders, selfie sticks, portable speakers, and beyond! 📱🔊 | review_rating:1, text:waste of money doing screen proctectors here
opening_hours: N/A

name: YEAST
location: Yeast, Lobby Level, Sunway Pyramid Hotel, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:[too rich ah]
1) overall - decent cafe offering plenty of selection such as coffee, butter croissant, pastries, onion soup, mushroom truffle risotto, egg Mayo croissant, pulled beef brisket and many more, great place to hangout with friends, Yeast is located @ Sunway Pyramid Hotel
2) latte - great taste and great coffee
3) baked eggs - tasted good, loved the baguette underneath the sauce, soaked well and flavourful, perfect runny eggs
4) cheesy bacon omelette - tasted alright, pretty decent and normal
5) egg benedict (Oeufs Benedictine) - simple bread on the bottom, top it off with 2 poached eggs and Bearnaise sauce, it was not as good | review_rating:4, text:Note:
1) located in Sunway hotel, lobby area
2) very peaceful environment for chillax
3) variety of breads and pastry available for breakfast, lunch items (hot food) available from 11am

This is an amazing venue for weekend breakfast, very relaxing! 🤩 The coffee art is  really fabulous, the level of detail is beautiful especially the peacock 🦚

The breads and pastries are lovely and fresh. We ordered the basket but could not finish, the waiter kindly helped us pack for take-away 😁

There were not many ppl there, maybe it was too early. Felt like we were on holiday for the morning 😊 | review_rating:5, text:Absolutely love the food here ! French fare in a spacious hotel lobby setting . Although the menu here is smaller than their main branch in Bangsar, the quality and taste maintains . My partner loved the basket of breads and ordered a 2nd basket . They were generous with the butter and olive oil with balsamic vinegar too . For starters we ordered the soup of the day which was potato and smoked duck, and onion soup . Both were flavourful and not too salty . From the Mains , we ordered duck confit, seafood vol au vent , mushroom risotto with truffle and my favourite steak and frites . My steak was done medium well, just the way I like it. The seafood vol au vent was delicious too although there could have been just a little more sauce in the pastry . The mushroom risotto with truffle is a must try ! Service here is top notch too . All in all, a very good dinner celebration . | review_rating:5, text:Ordered Egg Mayo Croissant Salmon and Greens (RM29). The croissant is so buttery and fluffy and complement with the egg mayo and salmon. Almond croissant have a denser texture. I think I'll just order normal croissant next time. The hot coffee (RM8) has a very strong coffee aroma. The service is very good. I'll visit again | review_rating:3, text:The food quality has dropped. The signature chocolate drink was horrible. I think premix chocolate powder drink taste better than that. So diluted. Same goes to the latte. Mini lamb burgers and pasta were average. Nothing mind blowing

name: Arabian Oud
location: G1. 25A, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Firstly, I’m gate keeping the cologne I got, but it’s damn good 😃

Secondly, as I was also a culprit before, do not stereotype the types of smells you’ll get here. The variety is truly amazing.

Additionally, we were greeted by Ahmad who was so happy to help us and really understood my needs and preference.

Note that it is important that you come in having some sort of a scent reference. This will definitely help them help you!

Well, I found my scent. Good luck in finding yours! | review_rating:5, text:Today on 11/11/2024 i bought the perfume BELLA with sales girl Emma, very friendly and easygoing. Before this I visit branch at pavillion bukit bintang the guy arabian very rude no manners | review_rating:2, text:Very poor service at sunway pyramud .The foreigner seem like arabian staff . He was veryy rude and never give taster also by spraying. only giving the bottle cap for us to smell the fragrance. Poor service and i wanted to buy arabian knight . Due to his attitude i went off and walk off . Ill go to times square and will purchase my favourite perfume | review_rating:5, text:One of the best oriental middle east perfume..highly recommended for those who love arab fragrances..good services as well from their sales person named Ahmad..this guy deserve a raise..bought 3 oriental perfumes from him base on his recommendation and i totally satisfied with his work and advise!!! | review_rating:1, text:Would not recommend to buy from here. The sales lady will judge you and act like you could not afford their perfume. I buy this perfume brand every other month, normally from mytown and times square, my first time being in this branch, customer service is so bad, makes you feel bad to try spraying. When buying a RM 900 perfume isit too much to ask for a spray just to sniff it first. I even told her im wearing arabian madawi gold on me, still act like im just there just for a free spray. Never been judged like that at other branches. The perfume is all nice, just this one sales lady will spoil your experience. Go buy at other branches please! I think the sales lady name is sam if not mistaken
