name: Loong Kee
location: LG2.72, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Bought 2 cans of their seaweed pork floss at RM14.90 each, ended up throwing away both cans as it has a plastic smell and taste. Totally inedible. A total waste of money. | review_rating:1, text:**Review:**

I recently visited this shop to buy chicken coin and had an extremely disappointing experience. I paid RM 12.25 using my debit card, and I received an SMS confirmation of the transaction. Additionally, the charge was reflected in my bank account. Despite having proof of payment, the staff insisted that I pay again, claiming they did not receive the payment.

When I refused to pay a second time, the situation escalated quickly. The staff member became visibly angry and started throwing the debit machine around, creating a very hostile and uncomfortable environment. Their behavior was completely unprofessional and showed a total lack of respect for customers.

I was shocked by the poor service and the aggressive reaction of the staff. This kind of treatment is unacceptable, and I will definitely not be returning to this shop. I strongly advise others to avoid this place due to their terrible customer service and disrespectful staff. | review_rating:5, text:Many people queue up to buy at their store during Saturday. CNY is coming soon. This is our must eat CNY food.
We ate with Hainam Bread is so delicious ! | review_rating:4, text:Updated in January 2024

My go to store to purchase annual Chinese New Year gift sets for our loved ones.

This outlet is a bit compact, so it could be a tight squeeze for their potential customer or a bit of a turn off for them to enter. | review_rating:1, text:Change your staff 's attitude, can't even listen to what customers say first.. We cannot  communicate with the staff.. Dk is stpd la or what . The lady who served us is blonde hair lady.

name: DayOne DayOne
location: F1.75 & F1.76, first floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:The service is extremely slow and workers were not trained properly. I arrived at 3:30pm which is not peak hour, only a handful of tables seated with customers, mostly food were served. However, after waiting for 30min my food were not served, some other customers who arrived much later than me, food were already served. I wanted to asked the waiter on my order who just delivered the food to the table next to mine. But when I called him, he pretended not hearing and walked away to chit chatting with other. When I approached him again, he rudely walked to the cashier asked another person to attend to my queries.

From the place I sat I could see the kitchen staff were eating in the kitchen. While another few were standing stay far away from their customers without checking nor having eye contact with the customers. Unfortunately, the table I saw at without the bell.

The herbal noodle soup I ordered is bland and over price. I requested for soya sauce, when delivered that time there is oil inside, make me wonder if the sauce plate unclean or it's recycle. At the end I did not consume.

Definitely will not go back again. Food over price with not meeting expectations quality and services. | review_rating:5, text:If you are new to this restaurant, you might consider to try out their signature noodles. I personally don’t feel the noodle has much different with the other branches.

Only thing is that the staffs here lack of smiles. They would be more cute and handsome if they do. | review_rating:3, text:Dry Noodles were alright. The beef stew was average. The broth was tasty but a tad too salty and with the star anise just made it not very nice. Personally I don't like it. The portions were small given the high price point compared to other noodle resto. Very little contact with staff cos order thru QR and they just serve. Not sure if I'd patronize this place again. | review_rating:2, text:Had great experience in other branches and decided to have lunch here. The service here is not very bad but they seem to be much slower and also less enthusiastic.

Food, ordered their promotion bowl pork yakiniku, the taste is so weird with peppercorn in it, it never mentioned that this Japanese fusion bowl has a little bit of spice.. not what I expected from the menu. | review_rating:2, text:I had good experience eating at other branches so I decided to have lunch here. Ordered the signature braised pork chew noodles and saw a decent amount of pork under the egg. But don't let that fool you. A good 60% or more of those were actually fats and there were barely any actual meat. Wanted to fill myself up with the pickled cucumber instead so I tried asking for a refill and got rejected. Only thing decent was the atmosphere.

name: AMD Computer Brand Store
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Sephora
location: Lot G1.132 & G1.132A, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:The sales girl assist well, she introduce according to your needs, but some ready stock might sold, please double check the stock first when you eye on certain product to avoid disappointment.
She also assist me to get the sold out item in Sephora apps and I receive the product in 1-2 days time after payment done. It’s free shipping, if you still considering whether to get the product or not, ask them check the stock in apps too, so that you can consider a few more days.
Shop smart! | review_rating:1, text:I recently visited Sephora to inquire about a tinted moisturizer, and while the consultant initially seemed helpful, things took a sharp turn when I decided not to make a purchase. Her attitude shifted noticeably, and she walked off without so much as a polite closing remark. I understand that not every consultation leads to a sale, but being professional and courteous shouldn’t depend on the customer’s buying decision.

It was disappointing to feel dismissed for simply taking time to consider my options. Sephora is known for creating a welcoming shopping environment, but this experience fell short. I hope this feedback can serve as a reminder to maintain consistency in customer service, regardless of the outcome. | review_rating:5, text:Had a wonderful experience with Alice from Sephora Sunway Pyramid today.
Thank you Alice for being so helpful and kind in helping me with my exchange today, and also for going out of your way to ensure I would be able to get what I needed! Your attitude is exactly what many other Sephora sales associates should strive to emulate. | review_rating:5, text:We had a couple of great experiences shopping at Sephora in Sunway Pyramid.

Just for your information, the beauty consultant Ms Alya Wong is very well versed in beauty products. On top of that, she is also very approachable and listens to the needs of her clients.

All in all, we are very satisfied with her professionalism and the assistance she had rendered us while shopping at Sephora (Sunway Pyramid).

Thank You, Ms Alya Wong... | review_rating:5, text:They have stock for most of the items. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Tourists get 5% off when they show their passport ( hard or soft copy).

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Ordered 5 course set meal.
Add some chilli garlic prawn and battered squid.
Super delicious…
Price also not so expensive..
The food taste was very authentic..
Dining environment was clean and comfortable to dine..
Waiter/ waitress also attentive..
Can repeat again..
Recommended 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Definitely will repeat again , the creamy tomyam was superb! . Love the texture of the aromatic fish but the Sauce too salty for me . But the restt of the food was amazing . And thanks for the best suggestion and great service by Yusoof and Rudyy | review_rating:4, text:This is a famous Thai restaurant in Bangkok, and most parts of Thailand. The food matches the taste very well. We had the 5 course meal the price was affordable for 4 people. Sadly, that day we went there was a lot of food that were out of stock. However, the alternative was still okay. We wanted fish sauce with chili, which is a norm in Thailand. However, one of the staff which was I think a Chinese was very rude didn’t serve us and gave us a bad tone. The rest of the staff were helpful and friendly. Smiled throughout. Only one of the staff working on Wednesday. | review_rating:5, text:The fish sauce sea bass is absolutely delicious. We ordered set meal with 5 dishes and it's great. Will come again | review_rating:5, text:Decent Thai food w lotsa flavours and heat! Attentive and helpful staff. Enjoyed their yee sang v much, tangy and tasty.

location: Lot LG1.129A, Lower Ground One, No 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Mr.Iskandar was very professional and provided great detailed explanations on differences between different materials of luggages and recommend based on my needs. Highly recommend. Products also quality at reasonable price 👌 👍 | review_rating:1, text:Bought 2 Mendoza luggage in April 2024. Used once in May 2024 and by the second time using in October 2024, the inside strap snapped. Poor sewing quality. Contact the outlet, and they said they don't provide any warranty nor any repair and asked to seek an outside luggage repair shop to fix it.

It is only second usage, and moreover, only 6 months from purchase.

Won't make any more purchases with this shop. | review_rating:5, text:The staff were incredibly knowledgeable and helped me find the perfect suitcase for my upcoming trip. They took the time to understand my travel needs, explaining the features of different luggage options. | review_rating:1, text:I’m a consumer which bought a Mendoza luggage from Leather Avenue located in Sunway Pyramid. The sales guy clearly stated that 30% discount will be given when two item is bought, however, it was found on the receipt that only 20% was given. I called back to the shop and they said that they charged the price wrongly and ask us to go back to the shop immediately to get back our money. No compensation was given but causing more and more problems and inconvenience to customers. I’m not satisfied with the service so I’ve asked for a refund as I wanted to return the product back. This option is rejected and it shows how bad the service of this brand and how unprofessional this brand is as they did not train their employees well to prevent such things from happening. It also shows how bad the brand is as it’s after sales service is too bad. Besides, it’s already 2 weeks time and they have not processed the refund. | review_rating:5, text:Had a fabulous experience this morning. I stopped in looking for a wallet for my dad. There were two sales associates at the shop and both were super helpful and patient with me, especially the male associate who was helping me specifically (sorry didn’t catch your name!). I was trying to choose between two wallets with very different price points and they did not try to push me to the more expensive one. In fact the male associate actually pointed at the cheaper one saying the design of it would probably be more to the liking of an older gentleman. The display wallet was the last one so they couldn’t give me a new one, but polished the display one up for me, and also let me know that they offered lifetime polishing for the particular brand of wallet that I purchased, Charles Berkeley, my dad just needed to stop by any Leather Avenue outlet.

Thank you both for your patience and helpfulness! Dad seems happy with the purchase :)

name: Dyson
location: G1.71A, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Sunway City, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:This place provides the best explanations and persons that i ever meet before. The services are satisfied and i am very happy and grateful. Many products which are offered and depending on our needs. This place also provides Trade-in from our old products to be exchanged with RM 300 discount. This place also provides extended warranty for 1 year or 2 years which have benefits such as free cleaning maintenance, priority service and 10% off on purchase of accessories and parts. The great thing is that they have special edition namely Strawberry bronze. I hope my mother will be very happy to use this product.❤️ | review_rating:5, text:Had a wonderful experience buying my hair dryer for this store. Very helpful and patience staff. Recommend it to everyone. | review_rating:1, text:Wanted to have a styling session before purchasing the Airstrait but was put off by extremely wishy washy staff. Asked the male Chinese staff in a blazer at the counter about their styling session and he said you have to book in advance although none of the staff were attending to any customers. We asked for more information on how to book on the website and he wasn't very helpful. Called up multiple locations all of which were unavailable but said Sunway Pyramid has availability today. I called them up again and the same staff said there was availability but when I mentioned I was there just now he said there was only availability tomorrow. Seems like there is no proper standard to customer service as staff aren't trained well. Staff are making up when they're available even though other stores have their availability on their systems. please stop lying to customers, will purchase from Shark instead. | review_rating:5, text:My purchase was assisted by a wonderful sales advisor, Yaya. She was very sweet and concise with helping me understand the product better and gave useful advices on the warranty. | review_rating:1, text:The review for this shop does not even deserve any stars. Bad purchase experience.

Recently I dropped by Dyson service center due to the device having a technical issue. The CS informed my device record was not found in their system. On that day itself I just found that the sales person Foizah Diris did not register my device into the dyson system. Question, why did my purchase device receipt and extended warranty went missing in the system? This is a very big surprise because I need to find the physical receipts and go thru all the checking process which it should be done from your end.

name: Chanel
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: DR KO DERMACEUTICAL
location: Unit G1.86, Ground Floor Sunway Pyramid, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I was assisted by Puteri and Diana, who were very helpful and knowledgeable. I’ve been using Drko skincare for 3 months, and I’m loving the results! My skin has improved significantly, especially with the addition of treatments at Drko Clinic for even better results. Lagi berbaloi beli skincare drko secara retail, compared to clinic and shoppe. | review_rating:5, text:Visited their outlet for the 1st time and the staffs
( Diana &  Carl )are so polite and very very friendly.
I grabed few skincares as they were having 12.12 promo. | review_rating:5, text:Really recommended . I was assist by Karl, his explanation really clear and helpful. Hopefully Dr.Ko product can help my skin barrier . | review_rating:5, text:My first time at Dr Ko & Becky (my sales assistant) was amazing, she is very knowledgeable and explained to me in detail about the products. Helped me advised the best routine for my hormonal acne + dry skin. She was very patient and helped me applied all the products to my skin (it was a mini facial experience). She didn’t pressure me to buy anything but ended up buying all the products she recommended. Top notch service! ✨✅👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:I like this product very much. I have sensitive skin, and many products I tried were not suitable until I used Dermax and Ko Dermacare. Now my sensitivity has improved a lot. I will continue to use it👍

name: FOCUS POINT
location: LG2.06 (A), 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The sales assistant  Aliyah was amazing.. so amazing we went to three other shops ..but still came back to her. And eventhough she didn't  have the design  we wanted in the premise.. she found it and ordered the exact one. Plus this store gave us a 50 percent discount | review_rating:5, text:I went here to get my eyeglass. The lady who served me was very polite and helpful. Focus point have good selection of frames, from affordable ones to expensive ones.

They have wide selections of lenses too. You can easily customize your eyeglass according to your specs and budget.

I got my eyeglass within 2 working days. Very fast service.

Located at LG2.06. You can get there from the main entrance lobby, take the stairs 2 floors down. | review_rating:4, text:"Attended by staff member Kar Soon, who was very pleasant and provided excellent service. I'm very happy with his assistance." | review_rating:5, text:I went to Focus Point Sunway Pyramid to buy a new pair of reading glasses.   I was advised to have my eyes checked thoroughly.  Mr. Ben and his team members are so knowledgeable and explained to me with excellent customer service.  I didn’t feel rushed and took a  longer time to get the perfect lenses for my eyes.  They also have a great selection of quality frames, great advice and make sure everything is correct and good with your new glasses.   They will advise you to try frames until you find the right pair without any pressure to buy them that fits your budget.  It is highly recommended to come here for excellent customer service and quality frames.  Looking forward to coming again!! | review_rating:5, text:I am a regular Focus Point customer and have visited their several stores around Klang Valley. The staff is always very polite in every store. However, my experience with this particular store was amazing. I interacted with Ben here, and I must say he really knows details about glasses and understands customer service very well. Keep up the good work. Highly recommended.

name: Mr DIY
category: home_improvement_store, hardware_store, home_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot LG2.119, LG2.120 & LG2A.01, Lower Ground Two Sunway Pyramid, Petaling Jaya, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:2, text:When  there's always  a need to replace my hardware items. MR DIY strikes my mind. Because it is a all under one roof store. And most importantly, I'm saving good amount of money. This decision is wise.  But no longer! The products here are dirt cheap indeed.  But they are very poorly made. It will cause you more harm than good. Their computer gadgets can only last you several months. Stationary for instance pens dries out quickly . Hair accessories breaks and loosens easily. Only good for small hardware items. Overall, poor | review_rating:5, text:This outlet surprises me as the items are all well arranged and very neat probably it's newly open. There are varieties of items being sold but the price I would say is slightly expensive maybe because it's located inside the mall. Otherwise, this is a good place to get your DIY stuff. | review_rating:4, text:Not easy to find as it’s located right at a corner on two levels lower ground. Quite a big store and many home fixed products were available. We’re here to see the car accessories and they had quite a big offer. | review_rating:5, text:One of the biggest mr diy outlet in the area. Store is big and clean and new. But one feedback: please fix your creaky staircase | review_rating:5, text:Nice shop with a lot of variety, everything they sell is cheap compared to competitors. I like going there and just walking around as the atmosphere alone is nice, picking things I want and getting inspiration for things to put in my home.

name: Sushi Zanmai
category: sushi_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, restaurant, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: OB2-L1-01, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:3, text:The Ebidon was disappointing. The egg, which should have been a soft-cooked egg spread over the rice, felt more like a boiled egg. Additionally, the batter on the fried shrimp was soggy and lacked crispiness. On top of that, there didn’t seem to be enough staff to serve customers efficiently, which affected the overall dining experience. I hope the restaurant can improve on these aspects. | review_rating:5, text:Went during weekend, the table is unattended by waiter due to lack of staff so we have to wait for table quite a while. Service is great. Food is delicious and exceptional like always. The Spicy Ramen (S) is quite filling together with sushi moriwase. | review_rating:5, text:Sushi Zanmai food never disappointed. Menu prices start from RM15, good food at affordable pricing! Friendly staff as well | review_rating:1, text:Not children friendly, why can't you have a place to wash hands? Staff asked us to go out to the toilet, on top of that slow service. Also, i dont understand why many sushi joints dont populate the belts with sushi, this one worst so far, only 2-4 sushi at any one time during peak period. Ordered Food taste ok2x. | review_rating:1, text:please tell me the condition of the food. dont just serve it. u can obviously see with nakêd eyes that it is still frozen. from the chef to the server. both ignore that weird looking sashimi and still serve it. i dont mind to change my order or etc. staffs were chitchating so loud too. hope u can improve the quality of your food and SERVICE thanks.

name: Timekeeper Smart
location: F1.30A & F1.30B First Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:I walked into the shop with my watch spring broken, expecting to pay for repairs. But the staff was super helpful and friendly—they fixed it for free without any hassle! Really appreciate their honesty and great service. Will definitely come back for any future watch needs. | review_rating:5, text:Great service to me is when rendered from a sincere heart to give space for customer and due respect even before a purchase decision was even considered. Look for En. Irfan for his good manners and knowledge on the products on sale. | review_rating:5, text:I had a great experience at the Timekeeper, thanks to Encik Erwan. He was very polite, patient, and knowledgeable, taking the time to explain everything about the Coros Pace Pro in detail. He answered all my questions without rushing and made sure I fully understood the features before making a decision. His professionalism and friendly attitude made the whole shopping experience smooth and enjoyable. If you’re looking for excellent service, I highly recommend asking for Erwan! | review_rating:5, text:Erwan really explained all the details for the Garmin models and gave me options to choose baded on my activity. Very recommended. Thank you Erwan | review_rating:1, text:Do not come here to service your watch! They scratch my watch while attempting to open the back case during battery change. No apology given, instead the guy quietly pass me back the watch. No receipt provided too. First battery change for my watch and now it looks so battered.

name: Pommes Frites
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:Been eating at the Sunway Pyramid outlet for many years, I’m a regular here esp for lunch break. Love how affordable the pastas here are without compromising the taste. And if some days the pasta is a little uncooked or overcooked/salty, I’d let them know and they were courteous noting on the feedback. The supervisor there is friendly & helpful. Staff are overall nice. Short waiting time. Thumbs up. | review_rating:5, text:Have been eating here for more than 5 years. Consistent and excellent taste. Would highly recommend their baked penne pasta. Really good comfort food and worth the price and taste! Excellent service as well! | review_rating:5, text:The pasta are delicious and the server is kind and welcoming, my favourite is their pesto pasta and chicken cabonara. It is also affordable for students and have smaller portions for those who can't eat so much. Great place 10/10!!! | review_rating:3, text:The Milanese chicken spaghetti was disappointing. While the portion size was generous, the dish lacked flavor, leaving it bland and unremarkable. The chicken, unfortunately, was tough, making the overall experience underwhelming. | review_rating:5, text:Tasty meals at reasonable prices. The customer service was excellent, and the food quality is impressive for the cost. Suggest giving a try to any of their spaghetti dishes that feature olive oil.

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews: review_rating:1, text:Always changing workers, I don’t think to let new staff doing my screen protector. Went few times and spent quite an amount of money doing android phone, apple iphone and apple ipad’s screen protector there. But what i got was, the protector they did for me was too high that causing me cannot use other phone case except silicone casing. When i got back to the shop and asked for a redo or promo, what responses they gave me was, sorry i am new worker here, my senior said basically if situation like this, you need to pay full for a new screen protector. Wow… end up i went to MOSS opposite of it, and they done fixing my screen protector without charging me… such nice workers… i won’t go back there anymore ☺️ | review_rating:4, text:Boosting the shopping vibe with friendly staff, this place has got your tech needs covered – from phone cases to holders, selfie sticks, portable speakers, and beyond! 📱🔊 | review_rating:1, text:waste of money doing screen proctectors here

name: Elle
location: Lot LG1.59, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Walked in and wasn't greeted. It's fine. When I was done chosing my clothes, asked the sales staffs, was ignored first and second time. Then I had to called for the third time, managed to get their attention. She wasn't very happy and just pointed to the fitting room instead of opening her mouth to give me direction. Mind you, I was the only customer in this shop and no one was there for them to serve.  The girl was busy fiddling with the clothes i had just touched.  WTH!! I felt like I've stepped into an unwelcome home. Which is absurd because the shop doesn't belonged to them to begin with.

After trying on the shirt, I proceed to the cashier, asked if they have new ones instead of displayed ones. Instead of checking in her system, she just said that, these are the only ones available. What lazy staffs!! Would have bought more if it wasnt for the laziness and rudeness of these staffs. Will never shop here again.. I went to the opposite shop, Iora with similar priced items was treated so well by their friendly & helpful staffs. I ended up buying close to rm400 worth of clothes without breaking a sweat. | review_rating:1, text:Poor service with their poker face. | review_rating:2, text:Poor customer service.

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:This stores staff are absolutely disgusting, i was the only one in the store and all they did was stare at me! They need to properly train their staff to normally work and not disturb their customers, moreover their products quality is disgusting for the price, i mean you can find better quality items for half the price at other stores! This store is just a heavy money wanting business that doesnt care about their customers. | review_rating:1, text:made me pay 4x the price of something i dropped and absolutely disgusting behaviour as they cussed at me. Please don't come here. | review_rating:1, text:Went to sunway pyramid yesterday. They placed a barking toy dog in front of the outlet, which I believed to attract customers. Caught my daughter attention and she go over to lightly tap its head, not even bringing it down.

Then there was this aunty in red colour shirt waved to her, indicating her to remove her hand. If that's the case, then either you put it in a display box or at least put some note stating no touching or whatever.

I thought is a very expensive toys and have a quick check, where shopee selling it for less than RM20, half the price from your retail. I don't mind getting it from your shop since my daughter like it but with this kind of attitude, No thanks. | review_rating:1, text:extremely rude auntie. no integrity and very bad service. Even if this shop gives out free things, i will never go there again. First and last time. How can someone treat people so rudely is something i can never imagine. All the reviews here are right, should have seen the reviews before coming to this place. utterly disappointed that sunway pyramid has a store like this. | review_rating:1, text:fake Pokemon cards.. don't come here if U want Pokemon cards

name: Daiso
location: LG2.08B - LG2.10 Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:After our dinner at Shake Shack on the ground floor of Sunway Pyramid, we went to do some shopping in Daiso here. The place was rather busy n at one point , customers had to queue up at the payment counter to make their payment. We browsed through the various sections of this store. It was full of different types of goods ranging from cosmetics, household, clothes, kitchen utensils n cutlery,stationery to even food n beverage. You name it n you can find almost anything here. No wonder so many people like to shop here. The prices are really reasonable n most items are usually priced at only RM 5.90 only. Except for other bigger n more expensive items- these come with a higher price. You can shop at your own leisure without any sales person breathing down your neck. What I bought were a pair of bathroom slippers,a face towel, a plastic comb , a plastic brush, 2 pairs of reading glasses n a few packets of munchies. We had to queue up when making payments. | review_rating:5, text:The staff in all the outlets, not just this store are full of Filipinos, I always thought that I were in Philippines more than in Japan or Malaysia when  I visited Daiso, until I heard of Japanese song & woke up from Manila. But during my recent visit in May 2024, it started to see some local staff working there, especially as Cashier. This store is popular among young people, student, foreigner & tourist, especially female. Even though, the Japanese Yen had been down to the Forex rate of 3.0 but the price is never down but keep on increasing. Previously back to 3-4 years ago due to high Forex of Japanese Yen, Daisho keep on increased the price. Please adjust the price or you will lose of business & customer. | review_rating:4, text:Daiso is a store offering a variety of everyday essentials at budget-friendly prices. They have a wide selection of products for your home and personal needs, including stationery, kitchenware, home decor, storage solutions, cleaning supplies, and DIY materials. Whether you're looking for kitchen essentials, cleaning tools, bathroom accessories, or personal care products, you may find what you need. | review_rating:2, text:I have always been a loyal customer of Daiso because it offers unique also practical items that cannot be found elsewhere. So I give an extra star of this review.

However, today (Oct 6) when I was about to check out, a local cashier was chit chatting with her colleague and didn't provide me with any basic payment info's properly. When I requested to scan my Sunway Pals, she impatiently told me I should have mentioned it earlier and processed it without saying thank you. Shouldn't it be her responsibility to ask the customer beforehand, rather than the customer having to make the request?

I hope the management here provides proper training so that poor staff attitudes don't affect the shopping experience of customers, especially in such a prosperous mall. | review_rating:5, text:Very spacious outlet. Very nice to shop here. Many Christmas stuffs to due this holiday season. Very properly arrange the stuffs here. Brightly lit and easy to move around despite with many customers. I love to shop in Daiso outlet. Good place.

name: Spectrum Forex Money Changer
location: Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:They delivers exceptional service and unbeatable rates, far better than the other branches. It’s a weird why more customers don’t know about this fantastic shop. Friendly, professional, and always goes the extra mile. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great deals and outstanding customer care.
I would recommend mr.fairoze services at SPECTRUM 3 in Sunway Pyramid Mall
Don’t miss out this is the place to go! | review_rating:1, text:Good rate but bad attitude.

I went to the G floor branch (next to Parkson).

The first time I went to counter 1 to change A currency, I said I wanted to split two receipts, he said he couldn’t split the transaction and asked me to queue up again.

OK, Second time I went to counter 1 again (only 1 counter is open) and changed A currency.

Seeing that there was no one in line behind me, I said I wanted to change B currency, he said no, he could only change money from one country per person at a time, which means I had to wait until someone came to queue up to change money before I could change money for the third time?

Meanwhile counter 2 is open, then I pointed to counter 2 and asked if I could change money, counter 1 said NO, because counter 2 is new and he didn’t know how to do it.

So does a money changer have such a rule now??? | review_rating:4, text:SMALL MONEY CHANGER IN A BIG MALL. FAST SERVICE.
EXCHANGE RATE IS AVERAGE.
MUST SHOW YOUR NRIC OR PASSPORT TO BUY OR SELL THE CURRENCIES. | review_rating:5, text:Highly recomended.Good rate and good service. Same rate as the other shop in the middle but no queue compared to the middle one. | review_rating:5, text:This is consider the best rate money changer in Subang Jaya area and after Mid Valley. Another option you may go for competitive rate within same area is Subang Parade. To those customers who had issue with uncle previously, it is depend on how you talk or behave toward him at first. I had deal with him for more than 10 years but never have any issue based on mutual respect of each others. He is a nice guy anyway. Recommend this place!

reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Rakuzen
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Food is decent but Service was a tad slow . Waited almost 20 minutes for sushi to arrive. Perhaps it was due to peak hours. Worth the try . Unagi based dishes were good. | review_rating:3, text:Raised has been our favourite Japanese restaurant despite there are some other more premium restaurants. However, tonight experience is not favourable. Food quality deteriorates a lot. All the dishes that we ordered are our regular dishes, but the quality has been very poor this time. Probably caused by long serving time after the food ready by the kitchen. The ingredients also seems to cut off from standard menu. | review_rating:2, text:It was my first time visiting this place. This was the quality and look of the menu once I was seated. It was gross and the entire place looked tired and shabby. First impression is the last impression. Says it all. Quality of sushi averaged very small bites especially the maki and sashimi. | review_rating:4, text:Rakuzen is almost always consistent in terms of food and service. They've lasted through the years, and that in itself is a statement of how good they are. They were also one of the earliest Japanese food franchises, and it's a credit to them that they have maintained their standards for the most part. Their sushi and bento dishes are very good, and it's perfect for a meal for one. If you're a sharing group, their ala carte dishes are also terrific. The same goes for their varied rolls. Service is mostly good here, although they can sometimes be slow getting to the tables if they're crowded for the evening. Overall, recommended! | review_rating:3, text:I hate to leave 3 stars but the food came late (10min after all the food on the table) and was a bit on the cold side.
The tempura veg was oily (not drained well).
Portion size was great. Miso soup good too.

reviews: review_rating:1, text:I was shocked by the way one of the staff treated me. She was rude and hostile. Nice design and good quality. Also more than reasonable price. Clothes don’t get simply spoiled after washing. | review_rating:1, text:The staff is SO RUDE. You better teach ur staff on how to treat the customer properly.

name: Elle
location: Lot LG1.59, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Walked in and wasn't greeted. It's fine. When I was done chosing my clothes, asked the sales staffs, was ignored first and second time. Then I had to called for the third time, managed to get their attention. She wasn't very happy and just pointed to the fitting room instead of opening her mouth to give me direction. Mind you, I was the only customer in this shop and no one was there for them to serve.  The girl was busy fiddling with the clothes i had just touched.  WTH!! I felt like I've stepped into an unwelcome home. Which is absurd because the shop doesn't belonged to them to begin with.

After trying on the shirt, I proceed to the cashier, asked if they have new ones instead of displayed ones. Instead of checking in her system, she just said that, these are the only ones available. What lazy staffs!! Would have bought more if it wasnt for the laziness and rudeness of these staffs. Will never shop here again.. I went to the opposite shop, Iora with similar priced items was treated so well by their friendly & helpful staffs. I ended up buying close to rm400 worth of clothes without breaking a sweat. | review_rating:1, text:Poor service with their poker face. | review_rating:2, text:Poor customer service.

name: Harvey Norman
category: department_store, electronics_store, furniture_store, home_improvement_store, home_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LG2.140 Lower Ground Two, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic experience at Harvey Norman in Sunway Pyramid. The service was professional and attentive from the moment I walked in. The staff was knowledgeable and ready to assist, making sure I found exactly what I needed. They carry a wide selection of high-quality electrical products like air conditioners, fridges, washing machines, ceiling fans, and much more. The quality and variety of options make this a great one-stop shop for home appliances. It’s definitely worthwhile to shop here during their promotions as you can get excellent deals on premium products. Highly recommended! | review_rating:4, text:Ever walk into Harvey Norman and get drawn straight to the tech section? They have everything from laptops and phones to vacuums, washing machines and TVs. But that's not all! Harvey Norman also boasts an impressive selection of cool furniture. Planning a bedroom makeover? You might find the perfect inspiration there.

Plus, the staff is helpful. Don’t hesitate to ask about any deals they might have going on—you could score a sweet price on your next tech gadget or furniture piece! | review_rating:1, text:Philips promoter name Prakash at this outlet is very rude. Never encounter such rude staff of Harvey Norman before. All Harvey Norman staffs are friendly except today. I was looking for air fryer, he came and I asked him which one is good. He just showed me the bigger one. Then i wanted to ask him about the smaller 4.2L one,  he just walked away thinking i was not interested. What a rude staff! I was not happy hence I went out and came in after my dinner thinking of getting the air fryer without dealing with him. I took the box and walked to the counter to pay. He came and grab the box away from me and gave the box to another staff. And he walked away! The lady staff was so nice and attended to me. OMG what’s wrong with him . Goodness | review_rating:5, text:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Exceptional Service by Prakash Philips …

I had one of the best shopping experiences at Harvey Norman, all thanks to Prakash Philips! From the moment I walked in, he was attentive, friendly, and incredibly knowledgeable. He went above and beyond to guide me through every detail, ensuring I got the best home appliances suited to my needs and budget. His patience, professionalism, and deep product knowledge truly set him apart.

Prakash didn’t just sell products—he provided outstanding customer service, making the entire process smooth, enjoyable, and stress-free. His recommendations were spot-on, and he genuinely cared about helping me make the right choices rather than just making a sale.

Harvey Norman is lucky to have such a dedicated and passionate promoter. If you’re shopping there, I highly recommend looking for Prakash Philips—you won’t regret it | review_rating:5, text:I had the pleasure of interacting with Prakash Phillips and I was thoroughly impressed with his level of knowledge and professionalism. He took the time to explain everything in a clear and thorough manner, ensuring that I understood all the details. His expertise was evident, and he answered all my questions with confidence and clarity. It’s rare to find someone so well-informed and dedicated to providing excellent service. I truly appreciated his assistance and would highly recommend him to anyone seeking help

name: Sunway Multicare Pharmacy
location: LG2.129B, Lower Ground 2 Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Closed system before 10pm. Wasting my time to rushing coming all the way to pick up my medication. Please improve your team professionalism. | review_rating:2, text:Beware when buying prescriptions here, it is marked up to almost 100%. When i rejected the items, they dropped it back to the usual price. The differences amounted to about rm60.

I would have given it 1 star but the cashier and staff were all really nice. I just dont understand why this system is implemented | review_rating:2, text:Phone customer service very poor, not responsive n follow up to customer whether stock arrive or not.... | review_rating:5, text:Excellent and helpful service by the staffs especially the pharmacist and attendant. They helped my son in selecting the most suitable wrist guard after my son sprained his wrist. | review_rating:5, text:Stocks well organized, friendly staff and pharmacist are so extraordinary on products explanations….

name: Goldheart
location: G1.78, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:We really appreciate how professional and attentive Libby was throughout the process. Libby was so helpful and kind. She made the whole shopping experience a pleasure. | review_rating:1, text:The customer service I experienced from them is all good until I brought my ring to Sunway Pyramid Goldheart on 28 September 2024 to do size adjustment. The adjustment was done on the day and I’ve tried it as well.

They say engraving have to wait till the next day 12pm only can be done, on Sunday I called them they said the ring can be done before 2pm. Unfortunately at 1pm when I’m on my way to Sunway Pyramid I received a call from them, said that the engraving can only be done after 4pm. So I’m not able to collect it on Sunday because I don’t want to waste my time waiting there.

Today 1 October Tuesday, I went to collect my ring but the condition is bad, the surface of the ring is scratched. What I’m angry the most is the staff no inform me at the phone about this until I go and collect it they also didn’t mention about anything to me until I saw the scratches on the ring. I asked them why is it like this. Their answer is this can only be fixed at Hong Kong in 2-3 months time. I send a good condition ring over but received a scratched ring? The staff didn’t mention anything about before I ask. The staff should have realise this issue before hand and inform customer and give customer solution to solve this. When the staff handover to me, she just said, the ring is done adjustment and engraving please check, they didn’t even admit they are sorry for scratched the ring and how they can solve it until I ask them. And the scratches are on top of the ring I don’t believe no one else has seen it.

This kind of customer service attitude are bad because it’s not about how far I came to collect it or am I urgently need to use the ring. We bought the marriage ring to wear it not just to use it. It Is the customer expectation to collect a beautiful fit ring from the shop.

Kindly train your staff again and provide a right compensation to customer. Thank you. | review_rating:5, text:Professional friendly staff here
Patiently to share knowledge to client like me.

name: Mgp Label
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Very bad. I bought 3 boxes colour lens at rm120 which is promo and it’s can’t fit my eye. I return 2 boxes open and they charged me rm60 which they should purated to rm40 per box. Not worth to buy from this shop. There have a lot better service from optical shop inside Sunway pyramid which u may consider. | review_rating:5, text:Came in to get new glasses done on Monday, Arisya assisted me with checking my power and helped picked out a a really nice frame. She’s very patient (I took a long time to choose the frames 😅) so friendly and knowledgable about the lenses and frame. Very pleasant experience. Expected to come back the following week but I got my glasses on Saturday! So far there hasn’t been an issue with my new pair. They have an array of stylish and modern frames, flexible temples. Highly recommend coming here. | review_rating:5, text:Senior salesperson at this shop was very helpful in helping me to search for a new frame to fit an old lens. He took his time from frame to frame until one fitted in perfectly. Most other shop I went earlier just told me that the lens had to be shaved or the lens only fit for that particular frame I had.

Superb service. 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Leon was very helpful and friendly. Shop has lots of options. Highly recommended! | review_rating:1, text:I just bought a spec with a frame+ super thin bluecoat lenses at 100 Vision Sunway Pyramid. It doesn't worth the price and I felt that I get con! Is a thicker lenses and got dizziness a week! Salesperson was inexperience and didn't understand the needs of customer! Tricking them with incorrect information and poorly explanation! Definitely won't shop at this shop anymore!

location: F1.AV.08, First Floor, Red Zone Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall 3 Jalan PJS 11/15 Bandar Sunway 46150 Petaling Jaya Selangor, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:1, text:If you guys don’t mind buying bootlegs figurine at the price of original, then this is the perfect place for you, almost 99% of the stuff in this store is all bootleg, if you really want to buy good quality original figurine, just spend 20 mins and drive to midvalley, I can assure any figurine store in there is better than this store | review_rating:3, text:Animix is a Animation Toy Modeling Collection. Must stopby & must own it. Located Aeon Mall at Seksyen 13 Shah Alam (Selengor) multi purpose shopping mall, business offices & shop lots just 40 minutes away from Kuala Lumpur City Centre and Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA). Lots of paid parking bay available at all time. Only during peak time weekend will full. First come first taken so you need to find it. Accessible for wheelchair users & disable friendly. | review_rating:5, text:This shop is very good ! If you love to read mangas / buy mangas I suggest this place. Its very cheap, cheaper than Shoppe ( For me ) each manga cost for RM 11/RM 8. And if you say its a scam its not. Its cheap how can it be original? If your the type that cares abt original go find another shop. This shop their manga is printed. I am telling you so you know. I recommend this shop ! Its so cheap !! Definetely gonna buy more 😻😻 | review_rating:5, text:Excellent products! The quality of the comics is fabulous as well as the other products. I am outside Malaysia right now but I still wish I could visit Animix everyday! | review_rating:1, text:I'm surprised this was in the JAPAN SECTION, Everything here is fake, the figurine boxes are inaccurate to the official ones, worst part is official banpresto rem cost RM 80 at Midvalley, here fake one but also cost RM 80. I'm quite disappointed in this as not only that you are supporting fake figurines, u even print fake Manga, giving the money to frauds instead of the original creator.

name: CHATERAISE
category: dessert_shop, confectionery, bakery, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Sunway Pyramid, LG2-33, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:The Double Fantasy was filled to the brim with delicious custard and cream. RM5.80 well spent. Will repurchase.

Chocolate eclair was hard, chocolate cream not to my taste, very jelak. Should have chosen the matcha instead. RM6.80

Will try the cakes and mochi next. | review_rating:4, text:I ordered 2 cakes with my mom. Both cakes were delicious, and I liked the Japanese fresh cream in the cakes.

However I didn’t like that they used a tea pot which had a crack (not shown in my pic). | review_rating:5, text:Can't express how much I like this new outlet here? They have dine-in area and also serving coffee counter. I always love their mousse cakes but hard to take-away especially shopping in the mall. But now, I can sampling their mouse cakes, desserts, puddings, jelly,  cookies and ice-cream.

Must try their ice-cream, affordable price and imported from Japan. Very tasty, not easily melt.👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:Need to try their milk popsicles, pretty nice and you can taste up milky flavour and texture. Cakes are good, definitely need to get their strawberry short cake. Able to dine in which is great but spaces are pretty small and limited, only have 4 big table. | review_rating:5, text:I've been to the other outlets in OU and Isetan but here's their latest one. I love their pastries, they're imported from Japan and I love that they maintain the quality in terms of taste and presentation. All of them look very appealing and artistic. I love their Mochi and strawberry shortcakes. I've also tried their cream puff, and while the filling tastes really good, because they're not freshly made, the outside layer is not as tasty as I had tasted elsewhere.

For Muslim patrons, I advise you to inquire before purchasing because some of the items have alcohol but they're not written on the dislay. The staff was attentive and helpfully pointed out to me when I was choosing my desserts. Would recommend the store to display the ingredients especially sensitive ingredients like nuts and alcohol so it's easy for us patrons to carefully make our choices.

name: GEM STUDIO
category: nail_salon, beauty_salon, hair_salon, hair_care, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot F1. 13, Sunway pyramid shopping mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I spent over RM700+ on a haircut, scalp treatment, and retexturing treatment, handled by Avenn, the outlet manager, and her assistant, Erica. Avenn was incredibly professional, managing everything from A-Z with great care and a friendly, welcoming attitude.

It was my first visit to this salon, and what stood out to me was their approach. They recommend treatments based on your hair condition and explain every step of the process so you’re always in the loop. They also inform you of any promotions without being hard sell. Since I’m a hijabi, I opted for a private room.

Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:I came here to accompany my sister but ended up being overwhelmed by the friendliness of the staff. I decided to try their scalp treatment, and I’m so glad I did! I didn’t realize how dirty my scalp was until the staff explained it to me clearly and professionally. I’m extremely satisfied with the service, and the entire scalp treatment was done exceptionally well. A big thank you and shoutout to Avenn, Marie and Victor for their excellent care. Highly recommend this salon in Sunway Pyramid!👍 | review_rating:5, text:Walk in on a Thursday evening for a quick haircut. At first, I was a little surprised by the price of a simple cut and wash. But overall I feel it's worth it as the stylist (Moon) was very meticulous and cuts my hair carefully. Usually my hair cuts end up with more misses, so I'm very resistant with layering my hair.

The end results looks great on me, so I also decided to upgrade and get a scalp treatment. | review_rating:5, text:Thank you, Moon, for the great service and hairstyle recommendation! worth the price. I’m satisfied with the haircut and enjoyed the massage during hair wash 👍🏻 | review_rating:5, text:I had an amazing experience at Gem Studio! From the moment I walked in, I was warmly greeted and felt right at home. The ambiance is relaxing, and the staff are incredibly professional and friendly. My stylist, Jass, listened carefully to what I wanted and delivered even better results than I expected! My hair has never looked healthier or more vibrant. I highly recommend this salon for anyone looking for top-notch service and a welcoming atmosphere. I’ll definitely be coming back.

reviews:

name: AmLife
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. | review_rating:4, text:As a frequent visitor, here’s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
•	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒
