name: KWAN KEE STORE
category: bakery, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2.79B, Lower Ground 2 Floor, Sunway Pyramid, Shopping Mall, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:Restaurant Review: Kwan Kee Store

Kwan Kee Store, a Michelin-recognized spot, is a must-visit for those who appreciate traditional Hong Kong pastries. Their dedication to authentic flavors and quality ingredients is evident in their offerings.

The white sugar sponge cake stands out with its light, fluffy texture and just the right level of sweetness—perfect for those who prefer a more delicate taste. The steamed red bean cake and pandan cake are also excellent, packed with red beans and maintaining a balanced, natural flavor without being overly sweet.

However, the Musang King rice roll falls a bit short. While the concept is interesting, it lacks the strong durian fragrance that one might expect from Musang King, leaving room for improvement in flavor intensity.

Price is on the high side, some might think worth it but some might not. | review_rating:4, text:I've tried a few items but I don't remember the names. The service was really good, there was a guy who was very friendly and explained the snacks to us. Sadly, this branch is just a no-seat brach that brings only a number of items. I've been eyeing other snacks from their instagram but it's a bit hard to go to the main store. Anyway, I really like the mango flavoured roll, not sure what it's called, but you can see the photo. | review_rating:5, text:It's more like a take away concept, although there is a couple of seats, but it looks more like a waiting area. Many those I wanted to try were sold out that day. I like both the steamed Pandan Cake and Brown Sugar Rice Bowl Cake. | review_rating:5, text:They provide samples to try before buying. I liked the black sesame layer cake, soft and flavorful. Also bought the signature White sugar sponge cake to try.
The store setup is pretty simple and mainly for takeaway. | review_rating:3, text:The snacks are just average, the famous white rice cake, was abit sour when I ate it.
Don’t think the desserts are worth the hype.

name: Ramen Bankara
location: Unit LG2.131A, Sunway Pyramid Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:Order their weekend only available dish call Kiwami Bankara Ramen RM39. 90 & Tonkotsu Ramen RM25.90.
To be honest, among these 2, still prefer Tonkotsu.More cheaper & tasty in my opinion.
Kiwami very oily & not thick enough the taste.
Adding tamago egg & osen tamago egg with RM4 & RM3 respectively.
Honey Almond sago with mint taste good and refreshing.
Recommended for those who would like to eat ramen can give it a try. | review_rating:4, text:Food & Price:

Total price: RM101.95 (incld 16% tax)

1. Ramen Bankara - RM25.90 - The soup is strong with pork broth, it really comes from the pork bone essence. Taste very nice and ramen is chewy and good.
2. Tsukemen - RM30 - This is special, and had stronger taste. Ramen is much thicker and chewy than Bankara.
3. Chicken Nanban - RM21 - The nanban sauce is mix with mayo, egg and some salad. And the chicken although not hot, but crispy. The mixture of it is nice.
4. Almond Drink - RM11 - Their handmade honey almond drink, it is very dense and the almond taste will not too strong until you hardly accept it. The honey did neutralise the almond flavour.

Environment:
- Environment is good and comfortable.

Overall, it is good choice for ramen, just the price range is slightly at the high side. Recommend 👍🏼 | review_rating:4, text:Tried their recommended Kakuni Bankara, the broth base is shoyu, so expect a quite high level of saltiness. The pork belly has been cooking for so long, it just melts as soon as your chopsticks touch it. Not my kind of noodles, it's on the thicker side, but it grabs onto the broth very well. Just wished they given us the option to choose the level doneness of the noodles. The tsukemen is probably three times the salty level of the ramen, but it's good none the less. The option to add garlic tableside was great. Really elevates the flavour of the broth. | review_rating:4, text:Tried their tonkatsu broth and is flavorsome and thick. Although too salty for me, but will probably suit those who prefers strong flavors. The kakuni and chasiu is tender and juicy,  5 ⭐. If there's a bone to pick, I would prefer to savour a bowl of ramen that costs more than RM40 from a ceramic bowl rather than melamine ones. The rest is all good.

Service is excellent with friendly smiles. | review_rating:5, text:Ramen Bankara at Sunway Pyramid offers a fantastic dining experience for ramen lovers. The tonkotsu broth is rich, flavorful, and comforting, and the noodles are perfectly cooked. The menu offers a variety of options, from classic ramen to delicious side dishes. The ambiance is cozy, and the service is friendly and efficient. It’s a great spot for a hearty meal, especially after a day of shopping. Highly recommended for anyone craving a satisfying bowl of ramen!

name: Jardin Coffee & Tea
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, store, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: G1.96A&1, 96B, Ground Floor, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:Came for lunch at the spur of the moment. It is quite busy.

Spicy smoked duck oglio is pretty good. Duck is tender. It's not too spicy.

One can have add on of cake and coffee at a minimal cost. In fact add on of americano is free!

Americano is quite strong and to my liking. Oreo cheesecake is satisfactory.

Friendly staff. | review_rating:3, text:Jardin Coffee & Tea at Sunway Pyramid offers a simple and relaxing ambiance, making it a nice spot to unwind. The café serves a great selection of cold coffees and snacks, perfect for a quick refreshment. The overall atmosphere is calm, ideal for those seeking a quiet break from shopping. However, the service could use some improvement in terms of speed. Despite this, the staff is friendly and welcoming. It's a pleasant place to stop by when you're in the mood for a chilled coffee or a light bite. | review_rating:1, text:Ordered two cakes, Dark Choc Orange Mouse and Blueberry cheesecake, look nice but dry like very dry. Better go Coffee Bean or Starbucks 🥲 | review_rating:5, text:I had the mushroom onion sandwich and honestly did not expect it to taste so good. The portion is big and shareable between 2 people. Prices for food is generally OK for the quantity and quality.
I got my iced latte for free with my Sunway Super App birthday rewards.
Staff attitude can be improved. The male cashier looked like he was fooling around while taking orders.
There's limited seating and can get quite full when there's a convention going on in the mall. | review_rating:5, text:My first time coming here with my partner. I can say the foods are very well-cooked, my carbonara and my bf's aglio olio tasted so good! The price suits the quality and taste of the foods. The service from staffs is nice and welcoming. Besides, they didn't made us wait for the foods long, it was prepared fast. The cake is also bon appetite! Will come again here
opening_hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM

name: Pop Mart
location: Lot F1.67, First Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:4, text:If you are travelling to KL, instead of going to PavilionKL outlet, try this one. Lesser queue. Place might a bit packed. Payment using CASHLESS only, prepare your card. The queue at cashier may take some time, staff are a bit slow. | review_rating:5, text:I don't understand the low reviews.
I had a really pleasant experience from the staff, especially the cashier, was so sweet and explained everything patiently.

I got two labubus. No preorder or booking necessary. Also got some other blind boxes.

The guard at the door was also pleasant and friendly.

The only ones behaving badly were many of the customers. Violently shaking boxes, pinching and squishing even, and sometimes just being a general nuisance by blocking shelves without buying anything. Seriously - there's nothing wrong with the shop or staff. It's the customers. | review_rating:3, text:Expected better shopping experience. Perhaps next round I should try the outlet at 1 Utama instead. Was planning to 1 star only, but a sweet lady which I supposed that she’s the manager or supervisor, she explained to me in a very polite manner and give me extra paper bags since she knew that I’m gifting to my friends. | review_rating:4, text:Labubu plushie OOS gais. No pre-order avail. You get what you see. Store seems a tad crowded and selections are filled abundantly for your consideration. | review_rating:5, text:So many item sell here under the name of Pop Mart and the famous one ia Labubu, Pucky Roly Poly Kitty and more.

•	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
•	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
•	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
•	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopper’s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: Tealive Plus
location: F1.81A, 1st Floor, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, Jalan PJS 11/5, Taman Bandar Sunway, 46510 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Today, I visited your branch at Sunway Pyramid Tealive Plus to purchase a drink. I saw a customer who had the same chocolate smoothie order as mine. She took a sip, realized it wasn’t the drink she originally ordered, and asked for a replacement. Your staff then replaced the drink for her, but tried to give me the drink that the customer had already taken a sip from. I directly told the staff that I saw the customer drink from it and return it. However, they didn’t make a new drink for me and tried to give me the old one. I felt this was very unethical and unsanitary! She kept insisting that it was new and hadn’t been consumed. | review_rating:5, text:I purchased a custom-made Pokémon tumbler for only RM 69 during the event. What stood out most was their staff's swift service and their continuous checking to ensure I received my tumbler.

Hurry up to grab a 20% discount on any yogurt by snapping a picture with a Pokémon character and sharing it on social media! | review_rating:1, text:A very bad experience in this outlet today! The staff were very rude and inconsiderate and treat different customers differently! Purchased two cups of beverages and requested for a normal paper bag with hanger because need to drive back want to charge me money! Never experience this in other outlets and the attitude is super rude. I am not requesting for special pokemon bag, just the normal paper one. I never see Zus or any other mill tea outlet treat customer like this before. Be more considerate la, don't just think of making profit in everything! | review_rating:1, text:My Digital ID Kiosk (ROSAK). Should put a sign "ROSAK" on the kiosk because it's NOT WORKING. | review_rating:5, text:My favourite place to grab a drink at tealive. 🧋🧋
Signature cocoa is my favourite drink, and this time, I decided to upgrade the standard cup into a straw less cup, more environmentally friendly cup without the straw. 🧋🧋🧋
But the straw less cup upgrade cost extra RM4 if I’m not mistaken, so it’s best to reuse the cup by taking the cup home.

name: Sushi Jiro
category: sushi_restaurant, japanese_restaurant, restaurant, point_of_interest, food, establishment
location: LG2.122D, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The environment feels so cozy and calm. I really like the vibe during weekdays, not too many people and too busy. I ordered some salmon or tuna set(i forgot) as you can see in one of the pictures.  It was good and the price really affordable for 1 set. The most delicious dish in the shop was chawanmushi. I like it soo much, it was not too smelly like a fishy smell(coz of the egg). It really cleans your taste buds after eating the fresh tuna/salmon(dip too much sauce,salty). One thing, I didn't like about the place was that you needed to order through the QR code provided on the table, i have a problem connecting it for 15Minutes and gotta call the staff to help me. Overall, a great and delicious delicacy to dine in here. | review_rating:5, text:Good service and explanation from the staff name Joanne.  The sushi was awesome especially the salmon sushi and sashimi, perfect portion and quality.
The vibe was great we get to serve to seat on conveyor belt even the shop was in full house situation. We had a great dinner and will definitely visit  again. | review_rating:2, text:Often to eat sushi jiro in mid valley branch and we love that, is my first time in here, the food quality here need to be improve, we often order lady finger in mid valley, but the lady finger here was overcooked, and for the ramen and chawanmushi, the hot dish supposed to be serve in hot ( in my mind set ) but sorry we get a warm dish here, a lot of menu items is sold out, btw I never seen menu items sold out in mid valley branch even we walk in at 9pm, quite disappointed in here | review_rating:4, text:Dishes here are average, salmon sashimi isn’t as fresh.
But in general a good and simple place, if you are craving japanese food. | review_rating:4, text:This value for money Japanese Sushi offers really good tasty foods. I particularly love their Unagi don.
Will definitely return for more flavoursome choices.
Superb 👍

name: Sunway Pyramid Ice
category: ice_skating_rink, athletic_field, sports_complex, sports_activity_location, point_of_interest, establishment
location: 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:You ride in a huge puddle, if you don't skate very well, take a change of clothes with you.

According to their rules, you must ride in gloves, gloves can be bought at the entrance for 9rm (their cost price is not more than 2rm) - I think everyone understands why it is necessary to ride in gloves.

I rented PREMIUM skates - they gave out ancient, worn boots with torn clips and laces 😅

And most importantly, the skates are absolutely not stoned, it's impossible to skate.

The lockers are free, it's good, but I literally had to bend the lock and lock the door to close my drawer.

The toilet is free (thank you), but it doesn't smell very good.

In general, a dubious pleasure for Overprice | review_rating:1, text:"WE WERE GLIDING ON WATER, NOT SKATING ON ICE" ❌❌❌❌

HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE THIS TUME⛔⛔⛔

We booked Season 3, it was already wet and watery
Within a few minutes, it became sooo watery and slippery you cannot skate anymore

PLUS

So many people were skating and falling which made it impossible to enjoy it this time. | review_rating:5, text:Recommended place for ice skating. RM35/per head on school holidays, buy online RM30 only. | review_rating:3, text:Overall we had a good time however, there are room for improvements. The floor is wet and just worsen over time. So if you fall, expect to get soaked in cold waters. The surface isn't as smooth as other place I've visited.

They provide free locker rental. | review_rating:5, text:Malaysia's 1st proper ice skating rink that is world-class standard and always has people skating. On weekends, the rink can be crowded. I am happy to know that this hobby is available in a tropical country.

name: Brands Outlet
location: Lot LG2.147 & 148, Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews: review_rating:5, text:This store has been getting more & more popular with lot of customer for its affordable price, good deal, fashionable, good quality & up to trend. It really can replace Zara, Mango, H&M, Uniqlo, Muji, G2000, HLA & others. The price of short pant @ RM39, long pant @ RM49 & 3 T-shirt @ RM55 are always the signature good deal, recommend to visit & buy from this store, especially on current globally economy inflation | review_rating:4, text:This shop offers a wide range of wardrobe essentials for men, women, and children. Take a stroll through and you might just discover everything you need for your wardrobe – from casual to career wear, innerwear to accessories. Explore the possibilities! | review_rating:1, text:have staff name sofea very rude after i ask to take new shoes inside stor 😪😪😪. mcm kita freee | review_rating:1, text:Rude staff screaming to us. At fitting area. | review_rating:1, text:Went there yesterday and have to say I feel very uncomfortable browzing through this outlet because their security guards literally tailed me closely from one rack to another as though I'm about to shoplift the moment i step in (assuming because i was alone with a shopping bag). Zero effort in doing it discreetly. Brands Outlet maybe you should really train your guards how to profile people properly. I'm utterly disgusted and offended at their action.

name: Za Altera
location: B1, Blue Atrium, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:I had previously taken my jeans to another place for alterations, but unfortunately, they made a mistake that I thought was beyond fixing. However, when I brought my jeans here, the staff,
Nang was incredibly friendly and offered great suggestions on how to salvage them. Their service was not only affordable but also demonstrated excellent workmanship. Highly recommended! | review_rating:5, text:Have been to this tailor multiple times; they have always provided excellent service. Have had my jeans and Indian traditional costume tailored here, and it was well done. I have also used their express service to tailor clothes then would be needed the same day, and they did not disappoint by providing to my needs and not cutting ends or quality to meet the short-time demand.

The Indian uncle tailor was really helpful and understand well what was needed to be tailored without much explanation and the cashier was also very friendly and helpful too.

I have also firsthand seen them service their other customer beyond needed to ensure that customer have received their goods and needs are met.

Would highly recommend this tailor for your tailoring needs. | review_rating:5, text:Exceptional Alteration Service – Highly Recommended!

I’ve been using Dua Za Altera’s alteration services for over five years, and they have never disappointed me. Their craftsmanship is impeccable, and the results always exceed my expectations. Whether it’s minor adjustments or major alterations, they handle everything with precision and professionalism.

I’m extremely satisfied with their service, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for top-quality alterations. Thank you, Za Altera Pyramid, for your excellent work!

Let me know if you want any refinements! | review_rating:5, text:Ning is such a sweetheart, I came here needing urgent alteration for my jeans, and they did it so fast. Worth the price, I’m a fan now❤️ | review_rating:5, text:I had a fantastic experience at this alteration shop! The staff was professional, friendly, and paid great attention to detail. They altered my clothes perfectly, and the fit was exactly what I wanted. Highly recomended！

name: FOCUS POINT
location: LG2.06 (A), 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:5, text:The sales assistant  Aliyah was amazing.. so amazing we went to three other shops ..but still came back to her. And eventhough she didn't  have the design  we wanted in the premise.. she found it and ordered the exact one. Plus this store gave us a 50 percent discount | review_rating:5, text:I went here to get my eyeglass. The lady who served me was very polite and helpful. Focus point have good selection of frames, from affordable ones to expensive ones.

They have wide selections of lenses too. You can easily customize your eyeglass according to your specs and budget.

I got my eyeglass within 2 working days. Very fast service.

Located at LG2.06. You can get there from the main entrance lobby, take the stairs 2 floors down. | review_rating:4, text:"Attended by staff member Kar Soon, who was very pleasant and provided excellent service. I'm very happy with his assistance." | review_rating:5, text:I went to Focus Point Sunway Pyramid to buy a new pair of reading glasses.   I was advised to have my eyes checked thoroughly.  Mr. Ben and his team members are so knowledgeable and explained to me with excellent customer service.  I didn’t feel rushed and took a  longer time to get the perfect lenses for my eyes.  They also have a great selection of quality frames, great advice and make sure everything is correct and good with your new glasses.   They will advise you to try frames until you find the right pair without any pressure to buy them that fits your budget.  It is highly recommended to come here for excellent customer service and quality frames.  Looking forward to coming again!! | review_rating:5, text:I am a regular Focus Point customer and have visited their several stores around Klang Valley. The staff is always very polite in every store. However, my experience with this particular store was amazing. I interacted with Ben here, and I must say he really knows details about glasses and understands customer service very well. Keep up the good work. Highly recommended.

Amazing service from JD Sports Sunway Pyramid! I had a rushed order, and the staff entertained me with so much patience and professionalism. They assisted me via WhatsApp and shipped my order through Grab in no time—I received everything perfectly within 30 minutes! Super helpful and polite team. Highly recommend! 🙌👏 | review_rating:5, text:One of the best place to shop branded shoes. Located inside the Sunway Pyramid Mall. Easy to find and park. Friendly staff with prompt customer assistance. | review_rating:5, text:Very nice and helpful staff, were assisted by Sean and Haqim! The most nicest staff at JD sport ive ever met. Hats off. U guys rock | review_rating:5, text:Thursday, 12.30 pm. I bought new balance 530 and v2k run. The staff was friendly and the service was good. Last time I was served by azrul hakimi. The way he explained make me bought two shoes 🤣The workers there are so sweet and kind. He was very helpful and knowledgeable! I had a great experience shopping here! Would like to come here again 😊😊 for who dont know much about shoes can find staff name azrul bcs he very knowledgeable and helpful. Very recommended👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and there’s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shopping—highly recommend! | review_rating:5, text:Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether you’re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether you’re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, there’s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friends’ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitement—highly recommend it! | review_rating:5, text:My visit to Sunway Pyramid was an incredible experience. This iconic shopping mall, with its distinctive pyramid-shaped exterior, offers a unique blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. The vast array of stores includes both high-end brands and popular retail chains, catering to all tastes and budgets. The themed sections, like the Egyptian-inspired design, add an extra touch of excitement and novelty. We also had the chance to watch live ice hockey, which was an unexpected thrill! The mall is so large that we could only explore about a quarter of it in a day. The food court and various restaurants provide a diverse selection of cuisines. Whether you're shopping, dining, or enjoying the entertainment, Sunway Pyramid offers a vibrant and memorable experience 🛍️🍔🏰🏒

name: TONKATSU BY MA MAISON
location: G1.PT.09, The Link, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:We went on Monday around 6:40 PM, there was no queue.

No one bothered to show us to a table. After waiting for a few minutes, a staff member finally told us to sit wherever we liked. Once we sat down, no one brought us the menu until we asked for it.

The restaurant has a good ambience and a nice view, overlooking part of Sunway Lagoon.

The fried pork was very crispy, but it had an unpleasant smell and wasn’t tender. The side dishes, like cabbage, rice, and soup, were refillable but not for sharing. Since we were still full, we only ordered one set. | review_rating:4, text:As it is tonkatsu, the menu looks very same for different item, kinda hard to decide what to order.

The pork is hard and take much effort to chew. It's marinated quite well with a unique taste.

Chicken curry is very nice, but chicken portion much smaller and not enough for my liking.

There is a lot of condiments available to mix-in with your meal, the soup and cabbage are freeflow refillable.

Waiters are not very responsible and tend to be a bit slow. | review_rating:5, text:Right from the first staff who allocates you table, to the waitresses who took care of our table - huge thank you for making our family dinner such a pleasant one! Your attention to detail (wait staff saw our uncle gesturing eating rice with spoon to one of us and before we asked, wait staff had come over with a spoon already) and doing your best to get us a big enough table to sit comfortably deserves a huge applause.
Environment was cosy, food was good, and staff were generous in giving us our refills or offering refills when she saw our cabbage/miso/rice were almost done.
Overall a very nice evening, and feeling lucky that we chose to dine here 😄 will definitely be back again, highly recommend! | review_rating:2, text:Came here for the 2nd set of katsu for 50% till 28th Feb only… this place is honestly a miss… you won’t regret it if you have been passing by here often and telling yourself that you’d like to try it one day… I’d say.. keep walking because….. both loin and fillet I ordered wasss DRY…. DRY AF…. D.R.Y!!!! It’s not enjoyable at ALLL….. the fats on the pork did not do justice… knowing the breadcrumbs around it will
Definitely cut the top of your mouth but expecting the pork meat to be tender or atleast melts in your mouth…. ? NOPE… all is dryyyyyyyy it was hard to chew throughout 6pieces…. My jaw was tired…. Flavor wise, not much, very mild, it’s not mind blowing.

The only Thing that was good was the miso soup that came together.
Service of replenishing cabbage was 👍
Choice of white rice or multigrain and comes with tea iced or not.

This will be my first and my last.. | review_rating:1, text:Same incident happened again. I’ve saw others put a review regarding their service, we really feel disrespectful and being looked down by their staff just because we ask for refill cabbage and soup.

Before we ordered, we did ask the waiter can we share one main course by adding another side dish? If not we just add in the bottomless refill package. (Here i need to mention that I’ve dine in at another branch - Mid Valley so i knew it was workable. And the reason for us to share is we really can’t finish all if we order two main course)

The waiter said OK without explaining anything. But when we ask for refill he take the menu to us said that if u want to refill you need to add the bottomless refill, but we did ask at the very beginning. He said OK! And the way he explain to us is really make us uncomfortable is like we asking for food. But hello? It’s just cabbage? How much it cost? And fine, i know you have your own rules, but why you didn’t mention it clearly at first?

And after that we said nvm, we continue having the rest of our food. After that he suddenly come over and refilled the cabbage for us, without saying anything. This really makes us feel uncomfortably and disrespectful.

For those who want to dine here, pls think twice before you walk in. Other branches is fine, only this.

name: McDonald's
category: restaurant, breakfast_restaurant, fast_food_restaurant, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: LL2.41, Sunway Pyramid Megamall, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Service was SOOO bad, ive ordered two sets of meals from the machine with pick up order then afterwards  ordered two icecreams through the MCD app with table service. When I finished my meal my icecream didnt even came. Went to remind the waiter for the first time and responded with just an “okok”. After waited for almost half an hr my icecream still hasnt arrive. Didnt know whats the hard of making 2 icecreams. After a total of 1hr15mins finally got my icecream😮‍💨 Please mcd workers can u be more responsible and at least give a subtle response to your customers & not let them just stand there and wait? | review_rating:1, text:This is what I got from your kiosk today at 5pm. Are you sure this is choco dip not choco shit? Please get your ice-cream crew to trained well before they send for operation. Ridiculous | review_rating:2, text:The fries are all cold and didn't give us chilli packet. We ordered Americano and they gave us latte and the worse thing is they didn't tell us the machine is broken and been change to latte. Besides, the table is not clean after someone eat, the floors are dirty as well | review_rating:1, text:I ordered 4 ice creams, this weird waitress was unbearably rude. I was trying to pay in cash and waited for 5 minutes at the order box at first I thought it was crowded after 5 minutes the waitress came to pay for my order. When I went to the receiving area I waited for 20 minutes, would you believe it!! The waitress was raising her voice saying: Wait! so I waited and she was making the ice cream and giving it to the men and saying sorry for waiting , thank you, she was very annoying after 20 minutes my father came into the kitchen complaining then she made the ice cream with all fear haha ​​!!! We waited and when she gave us the ice cream my father was talking to her and she was turning around and not listening to my father and ignoring him!!!! Is this because I am Saudi!!! I did not understand the reason for this behavior, is it racist??? Anyway, look at her when we received the ice cream, my message to her is go to hell my love 😊 | review_rating:1, text:I was having a small party at ICE Rink , first order at 3.30pm for 50pcs fried chicken , 60 pcs nuggets and 6pkt french fries . 4.15pm able to pick up all the food , the service at the counter also polite and tell me if need big amount of food need to give them some time to prepare , ok then 4.30pm I place second order for 30pcs fried chicken , 100 pcs nuggets and 10 regular plus 10 large fries , I said I'll be back to collect by 5.30pm , the supervisor said OK .

5.20pm when I'm there order not done , I wait untill 5.45pm my wife call for cake cutting but my order still not prepare yet . after cake cutting the food also consume is time to replenish so I went back at 6.30pm but still no prepare yet , so I just take what ever they had for me except the FRIES.

6.45pm I assume they should prepare all the fries for me , but what await me in front is countless customer waiting for their order , and they keep giving fries to other customer which is I order ahead of them , wasn't that fast food should be first come first serve basic , finally I wait till 7.15pm I fully redeem my order from a sour face staff who throw the packet to me , but I didn't get mad I just want my food asap , no argue no complaint , just to let people know FAST FOOD doesn't mean FAST .

name: Crystal Treasures
location: LG2.12 lower ground floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:I am a regular customer at lucky gem .Usually, I went to Mid Valley or Lalaport branch. Service at mid valley or lalaport is good . However, This is the first time I went to pyramid branch and the service was terrible. There is a very rude , wearing spec skinny aunty. Her face is like owning her some million dollar and asked her opinion. She is not patient to answer my question.The string prior adjust , she asked me is it to fix at this point. However, it ended up wearing tightly . I asked her to readjust it but she reluctant and mentioned that it is normal and was told that it will loosen after wearing many times . She mentioned that if is consider tight, my hand will have mark. I asked to readjust for 3 times and more she still reluctant and she did not provide me the extra crystal , until I asked it. At the end of day, I wore it for a day and there is really mark on my hand.
I will not visit this branch anymore. Dear management , please ensure a good customer service at this branch. Mid valley or Lala port branch will advise me whether which length fits me. | review_rating:1, text:What a disappointment !
I'm a regular customer of Lucky Gems but, the branch I usually went to is Sunway Velocity and Midvalley. Since I shopping in the mall I decided to went inside for a stringing service.

What a rude long hair, wearing spectacle, skinny aunty ! What do you meant you cannot help to string ? What do you meant you scare the beads will gone or get stolen because too busy with customer ? Hello ! Please use your common sense, I'm sitting at the counter there and you are in front of me. You dare to say, you need to serve customer when half-way stringing my bracelet ?

I already come inside sit there patiently waiting you to finish serve the customer before me,  but when another customer come in you straight ran to her. Hello please, is stringing not worth your time and commission ? Please don't work in this service industry if you have such judging character aunty.

Management please educate your staff before allowing them to serve customer and take our customer complaints seriously. | review_rating:1, text:I was extremely disappointed with the staff working here, she was really rude towards me. I wanted to buy a birthstone for my mother in law, and when I asked her if they sold birthstones here, she raised her voice and never gave me a yes or no answer. I thought I could get advice about the birthstones and how they would be set as well as their charges, but this particular staff who was an older female was very crude in her answers. She should not be working there, I hope the management does something about this. As a customer looking to buy something pricey,I would expect better treatment at the very least. I walked out without even having a look at their selections just because of her rude behaviour. Utterly disappointing! | review_rating:2, text:Bought a rose quartz bracelet from here. Quality varies so choose properly. I asked if the piece I picked is with a discount and the female staff who attended to me calculated the price like as if I’m buying gold! Not once but 3 times to assure me she’s giving me the best deal, it was so funny I played along! I’m not sure if the final price is fixed or I’ve been cheated but it was within my budget for a gift, so I took it. | review_rating:1, text:I have been a very regular customer of them and on single purchase I spend almost 4-5k but i was away from country for 1 year and once i got back i wanted something specific and since i was staying in my in law house this time in Seremban i didnt want to travel so far away so i called up the shop asking to send 1 pic only of the item the staff was saying the line connection in shop is bad and annoying part is the staff even didnt bother to use their own mobile to send the picture. Totally regret purchasing from them and in future will never even step into your shop.

name: Baskin Robbins
category: ice_cream_shop, dessert_shop, confectionery, bakery, wholesaler, food_store, store, food, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lot F1.57, G Floor, Sunway Pyramid, 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:3, text:I got to try a few before choosing which flavors I wanted. Then I would put the order in the machine and make the payment. Choosing the flavors I wanted and paying was far from easy and without the help of the staff it was almost impossible to operate the machine correctly. It's a shame to have such a complicated ordering and payment process for such good ice cream flavors. | review_rating:4, text:Enjoyed 31% on Wednesday with my pink shirt. Got to enjoy double junior scoops with rm10.50.
Vatieties of choices to choose. Love the nutty ice cream. | review_rating:1, text:the ice cream is not cold enough!!!
other than that the service of the worker need too be improve. they is one malay service is so rude i don’t think so this is how to serve as a serve crew ! such a shame | review_rating:4, text:Best place to have Baskin Robbins ice-creams here. You can sit as long as you want after tired shopping because it's hidden from the counter and at the back of it. Also, this outlet has more variety flavors and ice-cream cakes ready-made. | review_rating:1, text:The counter person was not there when the shop was supposed to be open. It said on a small note that there are gone for a while. It looks very unprofessional. Hope there is improvements.

name: Linkway Café
category: coffee_shop, cafe, food_store, food, store, point_of_interest, establishment
location: Lobby Level, Sunway Resort, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
reviews:
review_rating:1, text:Comfortable seatings and reasonably polite staff. A bit warm.

Ordering: QR order system is hopeless. Doesn’t show everything that is on the actual menu, and also doesn’t show when a certain item is unavailable. Instead, the system crashes when you try to order the item that is unavailable.

Food: They look appealing but I’ve had better food in-flight. No plate for a rock hard sandwich that is 20% edible. Very messy.

Drinks: Fair. | review_rating:5, text:Had some really tasty dessert. The turkey cheese was my highlight and pistachio khunafa a close second. Very buttery, substantial and full of flavors. Might be a bit on the sweet side so best paired with coffee! | review_rating:5, text:It's a lovely cafe with friendly staff & reasonably priced.

The cafe has comfy seats & with a lovely view.

Been here numerous times. The berries smoothie is a favourite.

Tried the chocolate chip cookie & it tasted great...it was warmed slightly & that made it decadent with the chocolate chips melting when bitten Into.

The strawberry tart was mildly sweet.

The matcha latte is a perfect cuppa for matcha lovers. | review_rating:1, text:what would you least expect when visiting 5 stars hotel and accommodations is the ignorance from this restaurant manager,well he was with typical manager attire at cashier, and compromising smiles. it was very unpleasant moment that ruined our new year eve evening eventhough we changed location celebrating new year thereafter. we planned to send an email to explain the situation. we were quite familiar with sunway hotels and resorts both international or in the past of which none had ruined reputation on a travel plan. other create fame. breach of trust upholds intransigent fiasco. | review_rating:5, text:Ordered a Rojan puff and a cappuccino. I enjoyed the service and atmosphere. Quiet, coosy and if you need to do some work; it's perfect.
